I am really frustrated as it has taken me more than an hour to reach service center which is a risk in this Covid situation.. I can confirm that this gap exist since the time it is delivered and there is no physical damage. To me it's a manufacturing defect, refer attached photo of the same.. Mr Kamal asked me to send a mail to customer care with the photo of the defect and then company will arrange the return.. Customer care no is not reachable, sent multiple emails to their support mail ID but no response. It's a low quality Chinese product, don't buy it.

name: Abhisek Pattnaik
title: Headphone with a style.
content: Date: 17/12/2019. - Magnetic back stick to each other while hanging from neck. I usually hang the earphone crossed i.e. left in the right and right to the left and while wearing, I wear the ear pieces properly so that it crosses my neck. This helps the earphone not to fall from back due to wind while driving. I usually wear the earphone with helmet though.. - Auto switch off if not in use for quite some time.. - Good power usage. Lasts the whole day and 80% charge remains. I charge everyday as a custom.. - Microphone has great clarity but don't expect a condenser mic level sound.. - Can be used as a hidden mic for speaking in conferences.. - Nice placement of buttons for Volume up & down and pause & play.. - Nice audio feedback while powering on, connecting, connected, and switching off.. - LED blinking light while powering on, connecting, and switching off to know the present status of the headphone.. - Easily connected to laptop and other devices i.e. multi device connection and seamless switching between the audio playback from various devices. Preference given to laptop than mobile with mobile phone audio going to pause state.. **Update: 19/12/2019**. - Earphone turns off when connecting to both mobile and laptop. [Batter Charge: 80%]. First I connect to mobile, then connect to laptop, then earphone turns off. Previously this was not happening. It used to connect to multiple devices and play through each of them seamlessly depending on the output of the bluetooth audio input. Preference was given to laptop over mobile playback.

name: banik
title: Worst is less for this disgusting product
content: This may be the worst product ever deliver by amazon. Packing ?? What should I say ....it worst, the packet torned already. About the headphone this is worst too, it has some kind annoying countineous sound, while listening, don't buy it ...just don't it is the worst. It cost 1499 and it utter waste of money. It does not even deserve a zero rating but unfortunately 0 is not available, so I have to give 1. It is worst product , worst worst disgusting.

name: Sudhanshu shaw
title: Great For Bass Lover, But mic.....
content: I got this earPhone at Rs 999 during the sale, this is my first Bluetooth ear and overall experience is great.. Build quality is superb, lightweight, sturdy and stylish.. Sound quality is great but not as good as Skullcandy, JBL, etc but again in this price, it's awesome.. Connectivity is super quick, just turn on and it's connected. BT range is not that great, it can be improved.. From the battery side, it takes about an hour to juice up for 0%-100% and last for a day(at volume Level 50%-60%).. Things that I didn't like is wires are longer than it needs to be, as I already mention BT range is not that great, mic catches to much noise(no noise cancellation).

name: VJ
title: Issue with battery and connectivity
content: Battery suddenly drop 0 from 40%.. When battery is shows 60% ON button does not work until its plugged into power, post connected with power it get ON and work well even if you remove power cord.. Connectivity is good if only used with one device if you are using it with 2 devices it behaves crazy many time or i should say you should only use this with 1 device only.. I thought most of the issue may resolve once i am use to it but its not the case now i am using this for more then a week and worst part is now i don't have option to return or replace. Good Luck if this works for you and seems like a Chine's product only to me.

name: RakhuNathan
title: Nice One. But not 100%
content: I have been using Boat headset of same range for the past 2-3 years which was wired. I feel this is not the same as the wired one. The quality of sound was still clearer/bass wise/ shrillness wise in the wired one. Still does its job. Able to take calls during my jog with its mic,able to change songs with the buttons on the sides, everything works great. good one.

name: Vasu Pandita
title: Its Good if you got Lucky
content: I exchanged my bluetooth Headphones coz They were so Poor in Call Quality and so tanks to amazon they exchanged it within 2 days and the new headset works fine now , in terms of sound or bass quality i was satisfied with the one that i recieved earlier as well, noise cancellation is what youll find at this price is not as good as this one has so yes, the defective one i recieved i was unsatisfied with it but the new onwe i exchanged made me feel Value for my money

name: Prits
title: Great product | Water resistant
content: Purchased this for the second time as lost the first one. The product is fantastic and the bass effect is superb. Using this product for multi purposes including running, cycling, and commuting. Cycled in the rain and so far nothing has happened to the product. Recommend it as it is also less expensive.

name: Prasad Nemade
title: They Rockzz!!
content: Amazon packaging : Not up to the mark, only comes in a plastic ploybag which is the outer bag, no internal protection per se!. Durability : looks sturdy, package also says sweat resistant, only delicate part is the charging port flap :P. Sound : it rockss!! Bass as well as trebles. One good thing is it wont let you increase the sound beyond a threshold via headphones ( u can do it from phone :P). Noice cancellation is awesome.. Felt slightly more protruding, needs to be inserted deep into ear👂 otherwise chances of falling down ( not on the ground btw). Package contains : charging cable 10-15 cm long, 2 pairs of buds of different sizes, warranty card + manual. Colour : red + black matt finish.. Its post delivery feedback so no idea of battery backup, charging, sweat proof. (Will add later)

name: Alice
title: 3 star
content: The range of Bluetooth is very low. It does not work properly if you are in a different room. Sound quality is good however, during calls there is fluctuation. The person onnthe other end of a call always complain about the irritating noise coming from the earphone, which I cannot hear. To confirm it, I asked my friend to record the call. After listening btobthe recorded call, I could hear some sound like tak-tak-tak. My colleague does not have this issue though. I cannot use it for a longer period of time since my ears start having pain.. Otherwise, it a good earphone. Good to buy at this rate.

name: SAURAV KUMAR DAS
title: GOOD BUT NOT BEST
content: This is my third boat Bluetooth headset after boat rockerz 235V2 & 255pro.. I think 235v2 is far more better than 255 series. I will provide its quality as per pros and cons. Pros. 1. Very good wire quality. 2. Noise cancellation good. Cons. 1 Sound quality not upto the mark.. 235v2 far more better. 2. Whenever u receive calls 235v2 starts vibrating which I have not found in 255 series. 3. Battery backup not good. Since I have used 235 and 255 series I would say go for 235v2 for better sound quality and experience

name: Vihari bellamkonda
title: Review time..!!
content: I bought this boAt rockerz 255 on my friends suggestion, hez using these for a quit while now say months... Whn i ordered i got a defective one...mic issue...crackling sound, buzzing noise.., So replaced it. Now coming to the review, the sound is OK OK at this price range, battery works fine but the more u use u know the electronic products the work time reduces.. they mentioned 6hrs but for me..5hrs max. Again it depends u see. Easy to use.. some devices tale time to settle as i said my 1st defective product , ot took min to settle down n give a good sound.. untill thn u hv to bear with crackling sounds buzzing noise..(i said with some devices not all, u shld b lucky to gt a gud product at 1st time or else replace/return). Wire is a bit lengthy though if u dn hv a problm with tht, then its fine. Buttons are on right side so difficult to operate while riding bike as we hv accelerator on right side. Overall OK product at this price... Atleast its better than boult curve band/ boult probass space. And now my friend got an issue with his boAts mic... Hv to see how long my boAt will be in condition.. Sound quality - 4/5. Noise cancellation - 3/5. Moisture wicking - 3/5. ------#---------#---------#---------#----------#----------#------. REVIEW ON 8th March 2020. Facing some issues with Mic - voice assistants not responding when i say hey/ok google, hey cortana... Charging is ok. Hearing Some crisp disturbnce sounds, sound quality a bit lowered.... Very difficult to maintain this band around neck while riding... Sound volume levels got lowered a bit..

name: Srobona Chakraborty
title: Good at what it does!
content: This bluetooth headset is a nice one. After almost 1.5 years of usage, it is still doing a great job.. The box contained the boAt Rockers and three pairs of ear-tips ranging from small to large size.. The battery life is not amazing but it can suffice for a full working day with a lot of calls and streaming internet content. Battery is still in good shape.. It shows battery percentage in multiples of 20. For example, after 100%, it will show 80% directly. No issues with that.. The bluetooth range is decent. It tends to disconnect when the device it is connected to is say, a room away.. The microphone quality is also decent because no one complained about it.. It is certainly not the absolute best in terms of audio quality. This department is highly subjective but, a pure, neutral sound cannot be expected because of the emphasized bass which I enjoyed. The mid-tones and the high-tones tend to get muffled a little bit but then, that's what we must expect from any earphone that has added bass to it. It is definitely enjoyable.. There exists latency but it's negligible. One might not notice it unless exclusive attention is paid to the same.. If you want that added bass and neutral sound isn't your cup of tea, you can check it out!. Noise cancellation doesn't make a major difference because the ear-tips are in-ear style.. However, it has a micro-USB port that it uses to charge.. However, with the likes of Realme Wireless Buds, OnePlus Z and Oppo Enco in the market, this is not the best buy but it's still a good buy if you're very tight on budget. But 1.5 years ago, it was definitely a great buy.. Cheers!

name: NeeKap
title: Ok...nothing great....
content: Well first things first...it's boAt..so don't expect it to perform like BOSE.... Bluetooth... I initially had some issues with setting it up with my mobile, but eventually things got sorted out.... Sound Quality....it's ok nothing great...can't compare it to any other brand like JBL, Sony etc...because I didn't pay that much.... In the Ear fit...now that's the real issue with it...it would never fit properly...no matter how hard I try...keeps falling off.... So overall...go for it if Ur budget is less than 1k...otherwise I would suggest to go for a better device from Sony or Samsung or JBL....

name: Babu R
title: Worth the money
content: Review after 2months of use.. Pros. 1.Good sound quality for the price.. 2. Adequate bass (my perception). 3.Pairs almost instantly. 4. Volume control works fine. 5. Ip68 works just fine serves it's purpose during workouts.. 6.Magnetic ends of ear buds serves the purpose to keep the headphones around neck without ear buds swaying around when not in use.. Cons. Battery back up could have been better. Lasts for almost a week on full charge with daily 1hr usage.. Final verdict. Overall value for money.

name: Mohammed Riyaz R
title: Waste of Money 😞😠
content: I bought this headset after listening to positive reviews from a popular youtuber in his channel. Now I regret my decision to buy this 😠. This is my review after 8 months of usage. I got it for Rs 999/-. The sound quality & bass is ok.. The range is around 10m without any obstacles in the way.. The worst thing is that it doesn't fit into my ear properly. It always keep falling out.👎. I tried the 3 pairs of earbuds provided with the earphone. No use 👎👎. It can't be used while doing exercises or gymming. The neck band kind of jump around with u when you move. Again the earpiece fall out. It might be a design flaw.. Can't even use to make phone calls or recording audio or voice. Same issue👎👎👎. After a while , when you turn your head or when u move or sometimes it comes out of ear by itself.. Now I only use this to watch movies because it's wireless & I can put it back when it goes out of place.. Doesn't serve the purpose. Don't waste your money on this !!!!👎

name: Vallabha Sayar
title: Decent pair BT earphones under 2k
content: I'll break down my review into 4 parts : Sound quality, noise cancellation and calls(mic), battery and ergonomics. Sound quality:. For the price range of 1.2k, ( I got it for 900 rupees during 2019 Dasara sale ) the quality of sound is pretty crisp. There is a slight overtone to Bass while the other elements are balanced. Personally, I think this balance is perfect. Given the pricing, I'd rate 5/5 for sound quality.. Noise cancellation:. For the pricing range, I'd say the noise cancellation is pretty decent. Somewhere close to half volume your noise cancellation works seamlessly while listening to music. On the other hand, when I'm on calls, the noise cancellation is pretty poor. People often tell me that they're clearly able to listen to all the talk and noise and honking etc, from the background but not my voice. So I have to pull the mic closer to my lips to be audible enough to eliminate background noise. So, I'd give 3/5 for noise cancellation.. Battery:. I play music at a pretty low volumes (some 3 button presses lower than half volume) So, the battery can easily last upto 6 hrs. If I'm watching a movie or TV series, it'll last for 7-8 hours. The charging time is pretty nominal. I charge it from 6:45 am to 8:15 am and it would have gone from 0 to full charge. You could charge it with a 2.1 A adapter for a much quicker charge but I don't know if the earphones can handle that current without getting damaged in the long run (read the institution manual). So, at this pricing, I'd give battery a 4/5. Ergonomics:. I must say, my favourite part is the magnetic lock. It's convenient and you can simply wear it around your neck like a necklace. It's easy to tuck it under your collar and keep it locked when not using. Looks sturdy though I don't wish to test it ! One disadvantage would be that that wire is a little too long and that wasn't necessary. It's bulky and unlike other BT earphones, you can't throw them in a bag, you'll need to be careful where you put it. If the ear hooks are positioned correctly, you should have no pain around the ear cartilage while wearing them for long durations. I wear it 2.5 hrs a day to work and I rarely feel irritated or pain around the ear. So, I'd give ergonomics and overall comfort a 3/5. Combining the ratings for all the above mentioned parameters, the overall eating turns out to be a 4/5 for this pricing which is pretty decent I'd say. Whenever it's on offer (under 1000 bucks) and you want a pair of BT earphones, simply go for it. I can absolutely vouch for it.

name: AmazonCustomer
title: After using for an year.
content: CONS:. -These earphones does not tell remaining battery till it is very low. A button should be there to know battery life.. -After battery gets low they don't last more then 6 mins or so. Also voice assistant keeps shouting battery low. They become unusable.. -More earbuds should be there. 3 sizes do not fit all.. PROS:. - Boat has best after sales support no other company comes close to them. Repair and replacements are completely hassle free. "THIS IS WHY I PURCHASED THESE".. -Sound quality is good.. -Build quality is good.. -Water resistant. -Battery lasts sufficiently long .. Edit : Reducing 1 star. Repair and replacement is no longer hassle free. You will have to visit their office.

name: Sarif Sheikh
title: Not Worth the Price
content: this is good brand product but. it is not up to the mark and features here are also not that satisfying. bass is there but on a Lowe Profile side. High and Mids are are clear but sound pretty low one cant hear in a low volume. Neckband strap is also not skin friendly so be careful with that.. Overall 1.5/5. No Mangnetic on/off. no fast charging. no type C. Didnt Like the Product.

name: Sunil Talwar
title: I am not buying this brand ever again
content: Sound quality was good while it lasted. Product didn't last for more than 30 days. It just refuses to come on. Tried calling the service agency, but no response. Wrote an email to the company, no response from them.. I have edited my entire earlier write up. Typical Made in China product. Talk claims on quality, but fails miserably to keep up to its word.. Please do not buy this product. Total waste of money.

name: BASAVARAJ
title: Budget Bluetooth earphones
content: I had been using it for more than week now. 1) Audio quality is good,. 2) When I put it around neck, I don't feel it is there.. 3) But for some reason after long hours of usage ears started paining. I removed ear loop hooks and changed the ear phone tips to smallest size. Now I am able wear them for little longer.. 4) During call I checked with caller about noise and call audio quality. They didn't complain.. 5) 3 buttons can be felt easily when you are wearing them. Accepting calls is easier with middle button and other 2 buttons are volume up and down bottons.. 6) With long press and saying "OK google", google assistant can be activated.

name: George Thomas
title: Amazing is just a word
content: I knew Boat was good but this exceeded all my expectations.. 1. The sound is amazing, better than some.wired headsets that I have.. 2. The highs and lows are captured perfectly.. 3. Easy to pair and operate, simple and easy; even kids can operate it.. 4. Been using it for my walks and use it for both phone n music. I keep my phone in my pant poclet and there is no loss of range.. 5. Have used it for 2 hours and the battery charge is still on.

name: Simit
title: Comfirt Quality Regular usage.
content: After a week almost i would say that its most comfirtable and light weight.. Appearance is ok sporty touch and black colour looks professional too... Comfirt in Ear, non slipy and proper fitting in Ear gives good noise cancellation.. Sound are good at vocal and music both.. Bass is as per other good haedphone and not so so much extra as mentioned here in other reviews and product discription.. Batery is ok for mderate use. Charge every day if use is more then 4- 5 hour in a day. Its very very good for routine listening of music and talk, but if you looking for party type sounds like other big headphone then its not suitable. And so is orice to be kept around 800-1000 thats too also due to brand

name: ShambhaviM
title: They are not Okay
content: The problem is its battery life.. worst. I had boat rockerz 270 which worked so well once charged.. also.. it has a very abrupt behaviour when discharged... I had kept it on charging for good 3 hours and when turned on.. it started saying battery low in 5 mins .. then switched off.. I put it on a car usb charger for 15 mins hardly n it said 100%.. The sound quality is just ok... Not sure of its real or fake coz its just like any other local earphone brand.. You will start feeling headache / ear ache if you are using it for long time.. Also the charger provided with the product is cheap, low quality and the wire is very small in length.. The 2 magnets are not quite working... Only good things about the earphone:. Lightweight and good color.. The earbuds are fine as they fit in and do not get off easily, in case you go on a running or something while these are on.

name: Swapnil Dhabekar
title: I can confidently say go for it.👍
content: See I'm writing this review after rigorously using it for 1 month. So it's my honest opinion on it. No BS.. 1) Sound Quality is really very good. I personally like it. Now I don't know of others taste. While listening music it feels good as it gives balanced output.. 2) Among all I'm quite impressed by it's battery life. It really goes on long after continues use I've noticed it & even quickly get charged also once put on charging mode toh anyways battery ka toh muje nhi lagta problem jaldi aane wala h.. 3) I've handles it in various ways and also put it in various ways in bags sometimes thrown here and there and main thing I've use it in rain recently for really long time I was riding and suddenly rain came so at that time came to know the quality of it. It's really nice. I've used it in rain for almost 4-5 times in heavy rain although that's different thing that I later on after 10 min covered it because intentionally I don't wanted to damage it.. 4) When you are riding a bike and if unfortunately you put earphones in ear which you shouldn't do it but if someone does also then the problem is that by air flow the 👂 earphones get moved away because of air from our body which sometimes make us uncomfortable while riding. So for that you need to tuck earphone's inside your tee or shirt or beneath your collar of shirt to get hold on.. 5) It's a very light weight earphones don't go on my words you will feel when you take it in your hands.. The only thing they should have provided is more earphone buds of various size they didn't gave anything with box.. Overall till now I don't have any hard feelings or negative feelings toward it might be because I haven't I think experienced, that's why. Good to go with this product. 👍

name: Sourav Bose
title: Awesome is the word for these Rockerz!!!
content: The Boat rockerz are awesome. That are perfect for use while running/jogging. They are comfortable enough that you wouldn’t even feel they're plugged in. Sound is clear and loudness is enough even in crowded areas. Phone calls are good and no irregularities found in voice reception. Battery lasts for over 10 hours even after constant usage. Charging is fast enough. Overall I'm fully satisfied with the rockerz.

name: Anik
title: Lousy headphones
content: I primarily use this headset for my daily bike ride to farm which is full of pot holes , trenches and bad roads. When I listen to music I tend to forget these obstacles and focus on my day to day goals. Day one use was okay. However now whenever I plug this with any of my Bluetooth device, I hear screeching sound just like old days mobile network coverage sound. I tried changing my mobile with other however problem continues. Also if you add another 500rs to will get jbl ones better than this boat rocker. Absolutely waste of money.

name: Sachin Sharma
title: Consider This before buying
content: Battery Backup kam hai yr.. 6 hours toh kuch bhi nhi hai or pubG k liye thik hai kaafi hadd tak sound bass everything is good but battery Backup as compared to other brand is low... Go for it .. i received a one side not working..but thanks to Amazon hassle-free return policy i am returning it back.... If you want Beat or skull candy like quality simultaneously you can compromise on battery Backup go for it... High quality music 6 hour voice call 8hours youtube videos almost 8 to 9 hours...

name: arpit vaid
title: Lovely product
content: I love this product basically I order this product for personal use. I buy this in just 999 rupees and I love this to be very Frank if you are getting this in 1000 or 1100 rupees it is value for money and basically those who are playing games and need headphones with the surround sound this is basically for you guys only because I used to many products and which generally legging the sound or you can say the sound delay I am using airpods as well. To be very Frank it make sound delays and that was around 10 times more expensive from this. And the conclusion is this is the best product you can buy in 1100 buks

name: Shoryaan
title: Buzzing sound
content: Sound quality is not so good .. always a distorted sound is the background like a radio ....bass is super great ..but that buzzing sound make it distorted and yes they cause pain on the ears and then into the head ....

name: Nishikant
title: Boatrockers 255 vs JBL T110BT
content: I have this and boat rockers 255, so i m giving a comparison here. Believe me guys this is not at all compared with the boat one. The bass is excellent in boat, where as this does not have at all. I saw the rating and bought it, but please don't get fooled by the name JBL. The sound quality in this is same as a roadside 50 rupees earphone. I paid 800 more for this than the boat, but repented. Only pro in this is the earpieces are lightweight compared to boat one, whereas the holders in boat gives a nice support to hold the ear pieces. Rest any feature you compare the boat exceeds at par.

name: S.Joseph Vijay
title: Quality product from Boat
content: After using for a week, it's value for money & there is no doubt about it. I basically wanted these for making calls which it is totally capable of without a complaint, so I am satisfied. Sound quality during calls is very good. Looks beautiful, has good built quality & the finally the main quality ie. Sound & here sound quality is pretty good, gives a thundering Bass at above 50% volume & overall very enjoyable listening.

name: jowan gurm
title: OVERALL its awesome . . . but this BEEP
content: the product is all over good in this price. i got it in freedom sale for ₹999. sound quality is awesome. bass is also good. no connectivity issues. no discomfort to the ears. battery backup is of 6-7 hours. charging time is 1.5-2 hour for full charge. you can use them for half hour after 10 minute charging. but . . . the only thing i hate about these earphones is their BEEP sound. every time i play a video it beeps if i pause the video it beeps and on instagram while scrolling posts if a video comes up it beeps there also and on next video post it beeps again and while scrolling stories on snapchat/insta it beeps there also. OVERALL its awesome but i hate this BEEP

name: Rohit
title: Amazing product at affordable cost
content: Writing review after 4 months of usage.. Instant connectivity, however i find the power on and off voice notification irritating.. Charging and charge hold is good. Gives 3 hours approx. talktime in 20 mind charge. I found this useful. Full charge gives atleast 6 hours of usage (used it more than couple of times when watching series).. Noise cancellation is good, voice clarity is nice loud and clear, however is sometimes bassy like the person from other end is talking in a hall., Maybe something to do with the network.. Music is above average. Had given 5 stars for music and bass but after 2 months of usage i found the volume drop i.e. even when setting the volume level at it highest level, the output is not that heavy as it was in first two months. Though checked all my phone settings, nothing has changed.. Bluetooth connectivity, and range is seamless and fantastic.. Overall a good product at the price offered. Surviving the lockdown using this for my office calls and evening movie time.. Will recommend this product who is looking for an above average quality at an affordable cost. Don't expect too much for music, for voice calling a best available product.

name: Bihari Prasad
title: Good choice neckband
content: The neckband ar very good. The quality of neckband is very awesome, the cables the earbuds and the neckband are looking premium. Tge sound is very loud and bass is high. The sound is ballanced. The noise cancellation is very good.when we plug the earphones the noise cancellation works very properly.. The charging is very fast. When i open the box the earphones are only 40% charged and after 5 to 10 minutes i plug tge earphones for charging and after 40 to 50 minutes the neckband are full charged. The one thing that disappointed me is that the playback time of neckband. And the mic is also very good. The Bluetooth connectivity is also good.

name: Vishal Vaidya
title: An honest review after a month - Overall a true value for money
content: Well, I have been using these for a month now and the earphones are really good. The sound quality is immensely saturated. I could figure out the bass, treble and other modules separately. The bass is good for people who are not audiophiles. Like if you're not into sound recording or need minute details to grab onto, its perfect for you. I grabbed the deal in 1k though, so it was a nerve cracking deal for me. The battery lasts for 5 to 6 hrs for me even if I stay connected to the phone via Bluetooth without playing any music. It lacks the backup if I keep using it for listening to music for an hour or so and lasts for about 4.5 hrs or so. Mic quality is kinda okay clear but it catches too much of sounds of around you which can irritate the person on the other line. But on an average a great deal to get your hands on.

name: Dr Vikrant
title: Best buy under 1500
content: You need not to look for any other product if you are looking for earbuds in this range. In amazon sale I got it for 899/-. I even own wings earpods worth 3999/-. Trust me this pair compete with wings premium quality earpods.. Super base, awesome sound quality and excellent notice cancellation with comfortable to ears.. I selected this pair after searching almost 15 items and m happy with this one.

name: nithinz
title: Connectivity issues after 4 months of usage.
content: Purchased on 20-June-2019. BoatRockerZ wireless earphone has started giving connectivity issues since this morning. Now it often gets disconnected and after a few seconds it again connects. Sometimes I have to turn off and turn on to pair again. Initially I thought it was because the device was away from the headset and I started holding closer. After several trials, I gave up thinking that could be because I haven't put the earphone on charge last night. But after entire day of charging, when I connect to listen the same issue recurrs.. I am now looking for my abandoned wired earphone.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Average
content: So after months I am reviewing this product.. Its good if u want to watch Web series or movie or music.. But sometimes it irrites in ear after an hour.. Build is good.. Design is nice good for gaming too but u need to speak loud while talking... Magnetic feature is very light it not attached itself need to fix them plus it unfix in movement magnet is not good.. N everytime it need to connect to the phone that's very bad feature, no vibration on call another drawback... It took around 1min to connect again so cnt connect it if suddenly someone calls if it was disconnected that time. Overall its average n yeah no on off on magnets connect or disconnect.. Thats very very poor

name: Himadri
title: Amazing sound, awesome connectivity, disappointing battery
content: Undoubtedly quick Bluetooth connectivity.. Portable light and affordable. Voice quality is good, liked the neon colour. Some issues I wanna discuss in detail. 1. Earbuds don’t fit in ears, there’s no extra pair of earbuds lock, you loose them quick, it’s kinda cheap material. 2. There’s no noice cancelled support and pre fed boat rockers dialogue are annoying. 3 pretty bad battery! Doesn’t stand whole day gets drained in like 2 hours of constant music playing. Rest everything is fine! Battery is disappointing

name: Sonal
title: Must buy, keeps hands totally free for other work
content: Wonderful handsfree bluetooth headphone. Easily connects to any bluetooth device. Is best for train travel as you can keep phone inside bag and still talk/listen to music with no discomfort. Now a days has been very useful during this pandemic for wfh office calls particularly as its wirefree so my hands reamin totally free & dont have to roam with laptop plugged wired headphone. The earplugs are soft and dont bother even after hours of use. Charging lasts for quite 2-3 days so doesnt need to be charged every now and then.

name: Harshavardhan
title: Great Product with average battery
content: I have been using this Boat rockerz 255 pro for more than 20 days. Sound quality is awesome. Bass is extremely good and the call quality is awesome. None of the person at the other end complained regarding the voice quality. Everything is perfect except the battery. I usallly used to charge once in a day and it comes for a full day. It comes for more than 5 hours on my usage. One important thing is it charges quick . Within 1 hr it charges full. There are 3 buttons in it. Center button is for On/ off / pause/ google assistant and Volume up button is used for volume increase and playing next song and Volume down for volume down and previous song. Whenever you power on and off it will comes up with a voice command. Often the sound breaks for 0.003 seconds and connects backs automatically. It's not a cons. I'll hereby provide the Pros and cons. Pros:. 1. Excellent Sound Quality. 2. Bass is awesome. 3. Call quality is good. 4. Connnects two devices simultaneously. 5.Build quality is awesome. Cons:. 1.Battery is average. 2.No auto pause feature when the earbuds are joined like there is realme buds and oneplus

name: Buddhadev kundu
title: good deal at this price
content: I got it @ 999/- on the day after i ordered it. Sound quality is not the best but good, extra bass is available which somehow destroy the lows and mids. but decent at this price range. battery back up is also good. i have not charged it,already used it 3-4 hours at mid volume. Call quality is also good.overall a good package from Boat, you can go for it.. only con is the bluetooth range. it is very disappointing. if you roam about in the house keeping your phone on your room the connection gets lost!. otherwise it is good overall!

name: Vamsi Arjun
title: Perfect companion in all circumstances.
content: Built quality, Sound Quality, Noise Cancellation, Voice commands, Call quality everything is just perfect BUT biggest drawback is Battery backup. When 60% left and you start using within few mins it directly falling to zero. Which is really pessimistic. However it takes couple days of moderate usage to reach 80% so overall it's a bang for buck. I strongly recommend to go for this sportive wireless headsets.

name: Reenz
title: Returned my Product...
content: I really rely a lot on reviews while buying stuffs. So I take efforts in writing one to help others too.. Well, I was actually blowed out by the near to lakh positive reviews of this headphone. So ordered it without 2nd thot, faced two issues,. 1. Bluetooth range wasnt satisfactory and 2. Constant disturbance. I assumed that may be mine is defective as I still relied on reviews I had read. So I ordered a replacement. Sadly the replacement looked like a refurbished item with no proper seal and packing. Anyways it was the same as I felt on my 1st boat.. Additinally, I ordered sony WIC200 headphones. The experience was different. Advantage was good range of connectivity and soft sound on ears.. So to summarise, in a line for people who like bass, mostly want to use it for movies or hear music, BOAT is best in range and for people who want good call range and soft sound for music n movies may like to buy WIC200 Sony.

name: Vvv
title: Worst Product and Terrible after service
content: The Product is very average and couldn't sustain for 4 months of normal use. Started giving issues with one ear piece . Buttons are also quite delicate . Thus contacted the Boat Service center, they arranged for the pick up and all. However its been over 20 days there has been no update. Despite several reminders over email. Funny part is the customer care number doesn't work only. Pathetic service and worst company. There are many good head phones are in the market go with those brands. Please do not go for this one as you will be conned for sure.

name: Azhar Maulavi
title: Budget friendly good for casual use.
content: So it's been some time I've been using these about a month I guess, and I can say I'm fully content with these, sound quality is good, they are durable, light in weight, fit in ear just there, bass is a bit overrated but I think for me it's ok, voice on call clear enough. So overall a good make all in all, find the below review to check out and decide if these fit your specs for a perfect buy.. So when you unbox these quite a good box and you can see through the plastic covering the headphones, once you open the box you'll find some docs such as the warranty card, and the boat pamphlet, and some other doc's related to boat.. Make - I think the make seems to be quite good in this price, when I wore them for the first time I couldn't feel the headphones around my neck then, they've just managed to make them light but still heavy enough to sustain around your neck, you'll find less buttons and the best part for me is that they have provided a C-type charging socket which was just a Cherry on the cake for me as I possess a One plus. They've taken care that it doesn't get itchy around your neck and also you keep enjoying your music experience so great work on that front, the wires are a bit long coz they are connected to the end of the heavy plastic material, and I'm afraid I might just pop off one the wires if my activities are a bit aggressive, so I hope they work on that part, the erabuds fit okay in the ear I can feel a heaviness in ear when I wear, them, plus the smallest of the rubber tips just seem the medium size to me maybe because of the external part being bigger in size than the internal part that goes in-ear. So I'm not satisfied with the earbud part that goes in-ear but all in all I think they've done a pretty good job to provide the best quality in this price range.. Music and call quality - On the music front I think they've done a decent job, the earphones a loud and packed with extra bass, now what happens is if you are connected and you get a call it just bangs in-ear which could be dangerous if your phone ring volume is full, they are just too loud so it's difficult to guage other music fronts and beats, as far the bass is concerned it's just wow if you're listening to bass packed music. So if you are looking for that detailed music breakdown it's a heartbreak there, and I also happen to get a lag for about .1 or .2 seconds which means gamers I won't recommend these to you, but if you're just looking for casual use I think you can just go for it.. Noise cancellation - Actually people have misunderstood the noise cancellation funda in these, so there is no extra feature or a button where you press and get the Noise cancellation mode active, so then what does it mean, whatever they have advertised that is partly correct yes it has noise cancellation but not that at par, it does a pretty decent job though, if you're wearing these then you might wanna press them into your ear to get better results for the noise cancellation part.. Price - I got these in a sale price of ₹1499 on Amazon, so I feel that's a great buy in such a budget, the original price appears to be ₹1999 however you'll find them at ₹1700 - ₹1800 on Flipkart, do remember to check your prices before you buys these.. All in all a wonderful product if you're engaged in calls, and casual browsing and streaming videos online, good enough for listening to music, I would suggest a best buy budget friendly.

name: Samapti Mondal
title: Quality
content: It's a good product it's also alert when the Volumn in high or low. Battery backup is excellent. Charging time 40 min

name: SENTHIL KUMAR
title: Boat head
content: First of all..,If you are looking for a good Bluetooth headset go for this one.The product is amazing and very pocket friendly, thanks to amazon for the discount and speedy delivery. Was Not very sure about boat headset but this one surprised me..Battery backup is awesome and also displays the battery level on the mobile phone to which is connected.Amazing bass quality and refinement in the audio clarity overall a very decent and good product. Last but not least this carries one year warranty.

name: Clement Fernandes
title: Value for Money
content: This product was recommend to me by a friend. Good product and connects easily. Good sound quality and also has long lasting battery. Sometimes I don’t have to charge it for even 2 days after heavy use. Sometimes while speaking on the the person I am speaking to is not able to hear me. Over all a good product and value for money. Will recommend this product.

name: Sivani
title: Boat Rockerz 255 Wireless Bluetooth Headset
content: I found the performance of the Boat Rockerz 255 wireless Bluetooth Headset is fairly good. The sound at lower volume is quite good but if the volume is increased there is a slight distortion. The noise cancellation is not very good but it is tolerable. However in this price segment I think the overall performance of the headset is satisfactory. Those who want to go in for a Bluetooth Headset they can try this.

name: Ummachan
title: Good Device
content: It's good product while traveling.. Good sound quality, and noise cancellation.. The good thing about the device it's goes OFF after certain time if not used and when needed can switch it back ON and gets connected to phone automatically.. Good battery back up, approximately 8 hours(continuous-non stop-use) on including calls, videos, music player.. But the draw back may be on calls, the person on other end hears the other noises around us than what we speaks.. Other than that device is good and perfect.

name: rajat
title: Great wireless earbuds but doesent really do well with sweat and rain or moisture
content: the brand says it is sweat proof ...... i do not feel so i took them for a run for some functional exercise and they give up after a week or so as the sweat seeps in the control pad of the earphones..........that is the only downside to these but they are great sound wise, quality wise really light weigh can go up to for 6 h really great headsets for a price such as that, would really reccomend these if you are not into heavy sweating ....... really great for normal day to day life usage but have to be careful as to not folding the wires of the earbuds....as the wires withing it gets bound and then the device is disfunctional

name: Vishal Singh
title: It's great 'but', Not actually!
content: No doubt about the product. The quality of music and it's bass will never disappoint you. The only thing that is extremely disappointing is it's Bluetooth connectivity, So it comes with Bluetooth 4.2. You can never enjoy music in an open area where it's airy, Cuz that creates hell lot of disturbances while listening to music, I have used Bluetooth 4.2 earphones before this is the worst experience I ever had, The audio stops for more than 3 seconds if it's really windy. And it keeps on interrupting. You can only have a great experience when you're in a room. Plugging in the earphones and riding a bike is your worst decision (first of all it's not safe, 2nd of all, You can't hear a thing of the music or a voice in a call). So I suggest people to go for Bluetooth 5.0 only! If you want seamless experience. I'm not sure boAt has any device that has Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity.

name: Karan Verma
title: Value for money
content: Just got this and I must say that the build quality is great. Coming to the sound it has really good bass. Can't comment of the battery yet as I just got it. I will update the review later after checking the battery backup.. Edit: So, after using it for few days, the battery easily lasts for a day and half a per my usage which includes 1-1.5 hrs of music, one movie (1.5-2hrs) and one episode of Tv series (40-50mins). I end a with 40% battery left as per above usage.

name: Sangeeth Kumar
title: Pretty Good!
content: I have the wireless on the ear headphones from BOAT (400 I guess...can't remember the model details) for about 2 years and still works well. I am an occasional user of that.. But I wanted something for my commute and I was looking for something wireless and with in ear buds to go with my 1+6T. I found these for 1k during the recent sale. Here are my initial impressions. 1. The sound signature is very very bassy. You need to use an EQ to bring it to your liking. Try listening to a song that has a heavy beat or bass played high to experience your tolerance levels.. 2. If you use a One Plus 6 or newer phone, go into the audio tuner option in settings and set the 'Sound Enhancement' option to 'One Plus Bullets Wireless's and the EQ preset to 'Pop'. This should balance out the bass and it surprisingly alleviated the mid tones.. 3. Pairing was east. Long press the middle button and put your phone on blue tooth discovery mode.. 5. Sweat resistance and durability is something I have to wait and watch as this is just initial days. But looking at the construction quality, I think it should be ok.. 6. Call Quality - not checked. But I don't intend to use it to take too many calls anyway.. Verdict: Good for 1k but not worth more. in fact paying more than 1k and buying something for listening music falls into the audiophile category. For that, you should really invest in an established brand like Bose or Sennheiser.

name: Kiran Babu
title: Good quality phones at the price
content: Got delivery on the same day but it had some issues with charging. Requested for replacement and Amazon was kind enough to replace the item in no time. The quality of reception is good and I can walkover my entire house without much of disruption in the signal quality. The battery life also good. It charges very quickly and lasts for a long time of phone calls/music etc. Overall a good quality of phones at a reasonable price

name: Addy
title: Long term review of an awesome earphone
content: I'm writing this review after having used this earphone for mora than 20 months. Its been used while jogging too and it's still working top notch. Noise cancellation is good, sound quality and bass is beyond compare. I would say it was definitely a good investment. Have bought the newer airdopes for my sister which just look better but this is my go to earphone for video conference. Buy wiithout a second thought. Only downside is the usb 2.0 charging in an era where all my devices have a type c charger.

name: RJ
title: Bad Quality Plastic
content: The quality of sound though is acceptable the durability of the chipset casing plastic is not very appreciable.The plastic casing housing the Bluetooth and sound control chipset broke /detached in two within one 2 months of using the Charging port alone (Inserting cable.tk port) ,which is necessary to use the earephones.. I mean I think it is necessary for the most important component of a Bluetooth earphone to have maximum durability in general but , when it breaks just by inserting the charging cable that's a bummer even against earphones cheaper than this.

name: Shreya Saxena
title: No regrets
content: I was very apprehensive about buying wireless earphones but i decided to buy it in the sale anyway. I have no regrets because it is a good investment. The sound quality is good, so is the mic. I use it for online classes, so i like it. The colour is very unique as well. UNLIKE what many people said here that the ear support hurts, i believe otherwise. It only makes it more sturdy, i can workout with them without the dear of it falling off. ALSO different sizes of earbuds are available in package. 5/5 do buy!

name: Ram
title: Comfortable and best in this price range
content: Can't compare with sony or any other branded ones. But in this price it's good. Silicon material good to wear no feeling of like we are carrying it on our neck . Its comfortable having it around the neck due to good silicon material. As this is in ear canal type speakers we. Eed to really push it inside the canal 1st 1/3.then only we can enjoy real beats and bass. If you wear it superficially sound won't look great. So far battery , durability,sound ,price this is best one.

name: Yesudass anbuselvan
title: Very durable product
content: very durable and long lasting headphones ,value for money a trustable product. Even have tried many expensive headphones I want to plant to get this for a temporary purpose. Now it became my daily use headphones.It's amazing that how board can give search quality product for such reasonable rate you can trust this I am using this for almost a year now it's so good and very believable and durable I used to even sleep with this for many nights it never had any breaks are cuts till nowrefuse headset very preferable for gym and other physical activities

name: Koustav Pal
title: Not the best wireless earphone if you are looking for awesome sound quality
content: I got this earphone on a Prime Day Sale for 999 INR only. Such a great bargain.. So I have been using this for over a month now and this is what I have to say:. Pros:. 1. Price. Get it on a Prime Day Sale or wait for it to go on a Lightning Deal.. 2. Great Noise Cancellation. I have used it in various environment staring from overcrowded bus to setting beside loud sound and the noise cancellation has never failed. It blocks almost 90% of the incoming surrounding noise which is a great plus point.. 3. Great battery life. 16+ hours of listening.. 4. Quite high volume.. 5. Great form factor and the magnets to hold the earphones together is quite strong.. 6. Boat provides various ear-cups of different sizes.. 7. One tap Google assistant.. 8. The wireless range is no doubt great.. Cons:. 1. Terrible bass. My 350 INR Boat wired earphones have better bass than this one.. 2. Volume could have been a bit higher.. 3. Not the greatest sounding earphones. Opt for a wired one if wireless is not a necessity.. Conclusion:. If you are on a tight budget and looking for a wireless earphone, then this might be it for you but if you want a great sounding earphone with nice bass, then look for other options. Boat is a company which you can trust. They also have a great customer support. Props for that.

name: Pranshul
title: LOOPHOLE IN WARRANTY (No Warranty.)
content: BE CAREFULL!!!!! Bought this product 8-9 months ago.. 1) Now It has started to automatically disconnect and the left one isn't working.. 2) First of all Amazon doesn't take care of the warranty.. 3) You have to directly contact boat support.. 4) I contacted their customer care they didn't pick up.. 5) they messaged me an address of their service center near me. I went their and they refused the warranty.. 6) this bluetooth earphone has a charging port which has a rubber lid which is about 2-3mm it is connected to the earphone through a very delicate rubber piece. It is so delicate that it doesn't matter how much you take care of it, it will eventually tear off and get lost. Now that 2-3 mm price of rubber has no technical purpose not one. But it has sabotaged my warranty.. 7) I cannot claim my warranty because of that 1mm piece of rubber. 8) This is a LOOPHOLE delebrately made by BIAT so that customers cannot claim the WARRANTY.. 9) I bought this for 1499/- and cannot claim the warranty because of their clever loophole.

name: Balu KADACHHA
title: Boat is not provided genuine product as well as service. Dont buy boat poduct
content: product is average just not more and warranty and feedback service of boat is very unfair . I have get defective product like it battery power appear 60% after few minutes it show low batter as 20% so that try to contact boat service care where she replied like you have send this product to our only service center located in ahmedabad only on center in Gujarat as well as same in other state also and both sending and returning courier charges paid by me sich terms and I have get this product after 10 to 20 days back after repair or replaced . so that i contacted boat's official E-mail but not got any feedback. so that I suggested don't buy this Boat product becoz they not provided genuine product as well as customer oriented service also . wasting your money .

name: KVSS Chandra Sekhar
title: The most irritating messages played by bluetooth device
content: "You are now connected to rockerz 255 pro" - the device keeps playing this message every min during the call. Even when I answer the call, instead of connecting the audio of the call immediately, it plays this message and then connects the audio. In those 3-4 seconds, we can't hear the other person. Another irritating message that is continuously played is "Maximum Volume". It keeps playing this message every 30 seconds during the call until I reduce the volume. In short, if you are looking for a hands free for the calls, don't go for this at all. You will hear rockerz ads more than the other person.

name: aditya
title: Best Bluetooth earphones
content: I brougth this product based on reviews and now i am not regreting.. i got it delivered on next day as i live in same city as of seller.. sound quality is very good. its a little heavy than wired earphones but still they are very much comfortable.(I WEAR THEM WHOLE DAY). i get used to it within 30 min and battery life is also very good.. if u have budget of maximum 2000 rupees even then they are the best earphones. only i prob i faced is of range. when connected to my phone(which is really old now, its micromax canvas) the voice cracks when i go upstairs but no such prob when connected to laptop. one more prob is that this is made in china but still quality is very good

name: Gaurav
title: Good product!Go for it.
content: 2 days review: Upto now its awesome. Bass is too good.. (But if you are melody song lover then MAY BE you won’t like this product). For loud and bass loving person its the best.. Sound quality is 90/100. Bass is 95/100. Comfort 99/100. Noise cancellation 95/100. Bluetooth connectivity 100/100. Mic quality 99/100 ( At the time of buying I was worried about mic quality as many people said its not good but its good no-one complaint about my voice while talking on phone).. When more than 1 lakh review gives a product 4 stars than it will be most likely a decent product.. At this price range it deserves 5 stars for bass , connectivity , comfort , noise cancellation and sound quality respectively.. I have used many headphones but at this price range its the best.Go for it.

name: Sudhir
title: EXPECTATIONS and RATINGS are MORE THAN its ACTUAL PERFORMANCE
content: ##READ IT BEFORE U BUY##. SOUND QUALITY not absolutely like HD.. Its Good as compared to others models or companies at the price u get.You need To do a lot of tweaks with eaqualizer in the device.. So i didn't like it. TREBLE IS LOW, MIDS ARE BIT GOOD BASS IS SUPERB BUT SUPRESSES ALL OTHER THINGS AND GIVES UNPLEASANT SOUND.. NOISE CANCELLATION not as per mentioned on the case. We still hear the things like TV @16VOLUME, HORNS OF BUS, LORRIES AND AUTOS. which actually disturbs ur feel towards music.. BLUETOOTH CONNECTIVITY... Its quite disappointing that even the phone is in my pocket the earphone shows some lag and complete loss of music for few seconds.. It never happened with the other two products i owned. (ALREADY I HAVE BOAT STONE 1000 and ROCKERZ 600 they are awesome in all circumstances at their price).. BOAT AUDIO is very good at aggressive pricing and quality but this product disappointed me.. ****SO I RETURNED BOAT ROCKERZ 255...****

name: mridul sharma
title: wrost return policy.
content: i order this today and after using for 4 hr continuously i find these earphones a little irritable to my ears. so i apply for return request but later i got to know that this product is not eligible for return. it was mention no where that i could not return it. how do we end user got to know about it ? atleast highlight it somewhere so we customer can know this before buying it. Please be genuine so customer can trust u. although i dont trust you anumore.. and your customer support also worst. they behave like pre program system that speak only certain things. if something is not in their scope they become helpless instead of helping us.

name: srvrita
title: not awesome
content: after 3 days of use I am writing this review.. I have got it at Rs. 999.00. 1) battery life almost 5 hours of music. not a problem for me.. 2) built up quality good.. 3) most importantly sound quality not awesome. may be good. if u like bass a great then good choice but vocal sound is seemed lower and sometimes not crystal clear. I have senheiser cx180 which costs rs.750. produces much crisp sound and bass.. but overall at rs. 999 it is a good deal.

name: shubham
title: Worst for #WorkFromHome
content: Pros:. Best neckband under 1k. Sound quality and Noise cancellation is 10/10. Bass quality 9/10. Metallic finish. Cons:. Comfort 0/10. We can't use for Webinar or any online meetings bcoz it gives distorted sound and whenever there is a little net fluctuations will face even worst situation... We can't use it for more than 1hr..we will be facing health issues.. headache and pain in ear due to weight of earbuds..it's metallic but it's not preferred for even a normal use..we will be dwarf within 3 month..don't buy it..if you still want to take risk..your welcome..

name: Heena
title: okay okay ... please replace it
content: well, i have brought this product four months back... good buy.. i brought it for 1499/-. i would suggest to buy this at this price which is currently stating..999/-. sound quality is good what all i needed, apart from this battery life is enough good around 6 hrs.. In 4 months right side is not working... now i want to replace this immediately as this is something not expected...really not satisfied with it.... giving 3 stars as its good in sound & battery..

name: Nitin
title: Best bass earphones at this price
content: So here is my review after 1 month of use. 1. bass is good and boosted. 2. sound quality is also nice. 3. i got these earphones with 100% charging.. the conclusion is that i loved it....i found it better than what i was expecting.The built quality is high....in short its awesome bluetooth earphones in this price.. i got it at just 950rs on amazon festival sale.. So go ahead and buy it🤗❤❤

name: Nilesh
title: Very very third class company n service of boat...please don't buy any product of boat
content: Very very third class service of boat company... I purchased products 2 July 2019...it is including 1 year warranty... One side ear bird not working after 6 months I filled complaint on may 2020...they did not give me service for repair n replace... Not give any response...boat company very third class company and product also...I am requeste to all buyer not purchase any boat product ...I am also not buy any product of boat and aslo tell me near n dear ones to not do the same.... Very third class company

name: Rohit Gupta
title: Product has with wrong sound frequency details in manual with marketing gimmick.
content: Product mentioned in manual it is 20hz to 20khz but it's actually it's not I am sound engineer I know what's the real frequency of 20hz to 20hz. Product actually have bass boosted you can't listen more than 1 or 2 hours. In the end product is sturdy but with wrong sound frequency as mentioned. So I am not satisfied with it. Bass lover can loved it. But my experience with this product I didn't recommend who Love overall music presence.

name: Prashant K.
title: Poor sound quality and harmful for ears
content: 1. The sound is too blurry and it's very irritating. It's like you are listening on some loud speaker.. 2. If you keep the buds in ear and not listening to anything, you start feeling ear pain and headache.. 3. Not able to use it continuously for more than 20 mins. Everytime I had to remove it, rest and then use.. 4. The magnet on the bud is useless and its has very less attraction and buds gets detached very frequently. Also the magnet neither stops the song nor it disconnects the earphones. Thus battery is not preserved.. 5. Build quality is also very poor. The one is received looks like reused.. 6. Total waste of money.

name: joy das
title: Good bluetooth earphones in a budget segment.
content: Sound quality is decent for both music and call quality. Noise isolation is there bu it can be improved by using the proper set of eartips . Fortunately there are three sets of eartips provided. I am not a bass lover and this earphones produce a lot of boomy bass. It mutes the finer instruments in jazz and new age music.. Battery is like 5-6 hours while listening to music. Calling takes much more battery life. And charging is fast. Takes around 1.5 hours to charge fully.. One very irritating thing is that at 20% battery level , the headset will inform you almost every 20 secs. We understand that battery level low is to be informed but not so frequently.. Also DO NOT go for the aqua color as it's quite different than what it looks in picture. The actual color is quite pale in comparison to it's picture. Thats a big deal. Color should not be misleading.

name: MA
title: It gives what it claims!
content: It is a nice product. I use mainly for calls and watching videos. My friends told me the call clarity is better than One plus bullets. Pairing is easy.I think an average person uses his phone for 6 hours only per day, so just have to charge it everyday like we charge our mobiles. It gives proper 6 hours play back, range is as listed. Inconvenience is only that the magnetic function on the earbuds doesn't switch off and on the device as in oneplus. But if you wanna go for earphone under a budget price, I really recommend this. Tip: buy while the product is on discount, we got it for Rs.899.

name: Anand
title: The “Boat” experience !!
content: I feel they are the best in the business. They have come out with exceptional quality, awesome product at the exact right price point. Awesome accoustic experience is what Boat provides and i would go so far to say that they are the Bose of their price point. I have been using Boat rockerz 250 in the past and those lasted well over 3 years while delivering exceptional music experience throughout. The battery started to give way after 2 yrs but that is expected of all these products. The 255 have better sound quality in terms of bass, accoustic, treble if compared to the 250.. The wire is a bit too long for my liking but that’s probably cause i had gotten used to the short wire of the 250.. I am sure these will again last me well over 2 years. My brother didn’t listen to me and bought noise shotz and he is regretting his decision now. Poor sound quality, battery quality, connection issues are some of the issues with the noise shotz.. Everyone should give them a try once.. I had skullcandy before and they were replaced by the company 4 times in the first year while the warranty was active and i had to throw them away after the warranty expired as the 5th piece also malfunctioned. The Boat experience though has been an awesome soundblowing experience.

name: Siddhesh Athavale
title: Amazing purchase with some acceptable cons
content: Review edit -after 3 months.. Buttons stopped working after 3 months.. Have to press hard to operate.. Product quantity is below acceptable level at this price point.. Amazing purchase.. Pros -. Sound (lows, highs, miss) good and acceptable.. Bass is amazing. Thump is good and feels like premium.. Ease of use - pairing is quick, everytime.. Cons -. Battery is a little bit below acceptable limit.. Helmet fit - possible if you have loose fitting helmet like Vega crux front opening helmet.. But not possible with Vega ryker/bolder series as these helmets have tight fit.

name: yk gupta
title: not a very great item
content: while the sound quality is satisfactory, this earphone is very poor in terms of connectivity. even with the mobile in hand, the bluettoth connection keeps breaking. the battery indication is also very superficial. just after 60% it suddenly goes down to 10% within 10 mins the shape of neckband is also not very convinient for use during jogging. it tends to come out . overall it is not a very great product for the price. ine must try sony or even mi.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not worth buying........
content: Worst experience.... Not worth buying at all.... Gifted to my husband last yr... One headphone stopped working, charging started draining off quickly, everything bfr 6 months,.. N when m trying customer care for replacement as it's in warranty.. no response even aftr compliaing... Disappointed by boats company customer service and product....

name: Amit kumar
title: Product is goot but doesn't last long and no customer support for the product
content: I was quite satisfied with the product till the time there was no fault in it, once the fault occurred in left earpiece within 6 months (Still in warranty period) then it's almost impossible to use the warranty as you will never be able to connect to boAt customer service, If you call their customer service they keep you waiting forever, the email id provided is invalid and their customer support is only available between 12pm-6pm and so far Amazon customer care has also not been able to resolve this.. Even if the product is good but now i regret purchasing such product whose service centers are very limited, which makes them reachable through phone or email only which they never attend or they provide invalid email id.

name: Sanath Kumar D
title: Good earphone but now have problem within 8 months of purchase
content: The product has a waranty of 1 year (My purchase is in July 2019, now May 2020). My one side earphone is not working now after use of 8 months. I use this mostly for office calls and movie watching. Seems to me not long lasting product.. Now I'm residing in Bangalore where Govt marked as Corona red zone, and want to raise a complaint on warrenty. But what i hear is that, we must visit service center for warrenty claims.. I'm OK with this but why not register complaint online and then visit center? If the lockdown continued more and i might miss warrenty period to claim the same.. Please first take the complaint online and that means the defective product is highlighted and we can then visit the store later for replacement or repair.. I'm writing this as a proof of defective product that i have. Also i spoke to service center (DVG road Bangalore - 09886114663) and recorded the call for future reference.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Everything is Good ONLY until 1 year
content: Bought this headset about an year ago. Now it stops working on right side and works only on left side.. Most of the bluetooth or wired headset, i have purchased having same issues. Either one side stops working after a year or so. Is it how these headphones are designed so that customer should buy a new one?. Better to go for a cheaper one and replace it with new one after one year!!!.

name: Sanket H.
title: Review after using one month. Consider before buy
content: Review after one month. I bought it in 899rs during sale.. good sound quality.. Good bass.. Noise cancellation is good.. Build quality is average. Doesn't give premium look.. Keys work fine.. Battery is not enough if your using all day.. As per my experience it works upto 4 hours. If it decrease to 40% then it will work for 15 minutes max.. It's only problem I faced yet.

name: Muthu Mohon
title: No Brainer - Go for it
content: I am not an audio expert and don’t know much about bass /treble etc. The earphones sound fine and last a good couple of years. This is my second purchase exactly 2 years after I bought the first one. At Rs.999 - it’s the best value for money earphone out there. No brainer- go for it. The ordering experience at Amazon was also great. They initially shipped me an empty box with nothing inside. When I escalated the matter to customer service, a perfectly good replacement was sent the very next day. Truly world class Customer service.

name: Harshit T.
title: Best in class but battery backup is low
content: I already had boat rockerz 400 which has good battery backup upto 9 to 10 hours so i brought this for 1299 in an offer.. Talking about pros. 1. It has great design with metal body feels premium.. 2. If you listen music equalizer than believe me it has some really good bass.. 3. It has a great connection with i think above 10m which is again great.. 4. Battery charging is really fast i mean this charges the earphone from 0 to 100 in just 45 mins.. 5. Sound quality is good i can hear all the instrumental sound clearly.. Cons.. 1. Battery backup is very low at 70% volume it will run for only 5 to 6 hours so to get more battery you need to lower the volume which is not good.. 2. Without equalizer the vocals and mids are good but bass is very low.. The only reason i am returning it is battery backup otherwise this may be the best wireless neckband under 1500.. If battery backup ia not an issue for you then you should definitely buy it this is best.. It only lost my 1 star bcuz of battery otherwise it deserves 5 star.

name: Raja V
title: Average Wireless Headset
content: After using 1 month writing this review.... bit disappointment.. am using this on daily basis when u used it continuously then ears getting pain.. I would say rs 999 wireless headset its average..... PROS. Good battery life.. Fully water-resistant.. Decent sound quality.. Comfortable, well-fitting.. CONS. Bass and low tones could be better.. Utilizes old Bluetooth version 4.1.. No storage case included.

name: Shivkumar Singh
title: Not working
content: It is not working now, though within warranty period. Purchased on 2nd July 2020. Need to be replaced as per warranty policy. Kindly arrange for replacement.. Very bad experience. Product Stopped working now. It should be replaced as it is well within warranty period.. Neither Amazon is owning up nor customer care of company is responding.. POOR

name: Rajeev Menon
title: Good but needs few attn to details
content: After a month of usage - headphone is good but has few issues like once disconnected, it takes 2 attempts to reconnect. If phone is restarted, pairing has to be done again.. Otherwise the product is good with good bass, and ear sound. The voice call is also really good.. An adjustable strip would have been good bcos if you fix the earphone in one ear, the other side tends to hang more on other side and have to keep adjusting in between

name: Dinesh Patel
title: Feeling good as I got it free with huawei Y9 phone
content: Dear All,. Let me write the genuine review of this product.. The product was delivered on time,. Guys, I am using this product since 2 last month and I have discovered an excellent product.. The product is much better as compare to other costly international brands.. Likes :. * Excellent bass. * Noise cancellation support. * Value for money. Dislikes:. * I expect more form the local brand in terms of quality of material used e.g. plastic quality and packaging box.. Overall suggestion you buy with this price..!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Nice earphones with some problems..
content: The headphone is great, but it loses track in between and then behaves wierd.. I usually use it to watch movies and sometimes it loses track and the voice breaks. Also delay keeps getting added to the signal. Have to disconnect it form laptop or mobile and then restart the earphone. Upon reconnection after restart it behaves fine for some time, but again the same thing keeps happening.. Hope the manufacturer does something for it.. It lasts decently long once charged.. Sometimes my ears pain after using it for 3-4 hours.

name: VB.Madhavan
title: 6 months of frustration for 899/-
content: The worest Bluetooth earphones...if you put mobile in front pants pocket it will not properly connect...if you put in back pocket it will not connect at all...it will only connect if you hold mobile in your hands...what a damm worest product.... If you want to buy frustration and anger for 899/- then go for this... probably the worest product from boAt... Appreciate then in decreasing the happyness index in India with the help of Amazon.... Only buy this is you want frustration, anger and irritation for next 6 months...but show that on boAt earphones not on your mobile...

name: Ankit
title: OK type product
content: I bought this product after checking out so many rating and reviews. i bought it around three month ago and with passage of time, it's sound quality, working hours and connectivity is degrading.. I don't know how does it happen, in my office there is a disturbing noise during connection and it connects perfectly as soon as I move out of that place, funny it is. Anyway, if you are looking for really good product, i must say you need to increase your budget. i can't blame brand as i have wired earphones of same brand and those are perfectly working, but i am disappointed with this model.

name: Tapan Bhanot
title: Very basic wireless headphones
content: Got these in sale and very disappointed. I had earlier JBL wireless headphones and they were of very good quality then I lost them. Saw ad of these wireless headphones in newspaper and decided to buy as I already use Boat 400 which are awesome but I got disappointed with these, I have to speak very loudly in order for my voice to reach the other party (which looks very weird in public) and I feel that quality is also not upto the mark. Amazon I feel knew about this and thats why these were on sale and non returnable.. I am now stuck with them and I DO NOT recommend that you buy these at all.. The band got cut on its own where it’s connected with the small box thingy.. Thanks.

name: Harish
title: awesome sound and bass quality awesome power back
content: 1- box got damaged i expected it would be fake and already used later when i opend and easily to connect and it connects and plays above 10 mts sound is awesome and bass but i wont say noice cancellation. 1-for sound ill give 5 stars. 2-for base 5 stars. 3-noice cancellation 4 stars. first of all i like the battery persentage. they mention only 6 hrs play back with full charge but i personally experienced it came 11hrs play back continuously thats why i fidda. just i upset with box damage but any way we wont take any box. nxt when comparing to quality it is awesome. extra earmuffs are came but it is not looking good just old black colour but i had already stylish red earmuffs. i attached to that now it came awesome look. nx when we compare to charging correctly 1hr30 min it takes but gives 11hrs. so i suggest u can buy directly. if u effort more u can buy boat 225 pro i think it would be awesome

name: Vishal
title: Very nice buy @ 1000 bucks
content: I am using this for last 2 weeks now. Using mainly for online corporate meetings. I got it in a deal @ INR 999. Pros:. - Very nice built quality & ergonomic design. - Well fitted in ears & also has option for 3 sizes of ear buds. - May range upto 5 to 6 metres in absence of any obstacles (Haven't tasted beyond that yet). - Clear & excellent sound quality for songs & videos (For meetings, it depends on your network. But still found it very neat). Cons:. - Bluetooth connection & switching devices takes little more time than expected. - Battery life is very short than expected But charging is quick. Overall:. Worth & must buy at INR 1000. It's actual price is INR 1500 now. So you might think longer before booking this & might want to compare above features with other products at this range.

name: Pratik
title: Product is good, service is worst in India
content: Product is good, works as expected and if and when the product fails to work, please do not, DO NOT ever give it to Boat service center. I am waiting since over 2 months, they do not reply to mails, customer service calls also not fruitful, they just read out status. Very bad experience.. On their website, they write #1 service, laughable.. Pl get it repaired locally, the product is not worth the wait to get repaired from such worst service center who don't even care to reply. Checkout internet for such customer harassment where many others are suffering.. Super pathetic service.

name: Manohar Ghatti
title: Boat - 100% customer heart winner
content: Boat produces best quality products & I appreciate their warranty policy.. Just before 10 days of warranty expiry I found one of the ear pieces is not working & I asked for replacement they accepted for repair/replacement. They find fault with the earpiece & they sent me a new one as a replacement.I am very happy with your customer relationship.I will definitely recommend boat to everyone & also I want to purchase ur new airdopes.

name: Suchayan Ghoshal
title: Well, A product that value for your money...
content: This earphone is a good product in this price range and it's running good. Although some minor issues I have felt in this product and one of them is convenience. There is a knotch above the earbud which is helpful to fit the earplug in the ear, but some people may have different structure of ear and for them it will not for well eg. one of my friend.. Another issue was there; just after reaching the battery level to 20% it starts disturbing telling low battery, and within a few minutes it turned off, I think boat should think about this.. Otherwise I'm using this product for couple of months, till now its running well and the sound quality is also good.

name: Abhishek Singh
title: Bluetooth connection failure on this headset
content: Hey guys...I have purchased this Bluetooth headset 50 days back.... Boss and trouble is okay not very good as like I heard that boat is awesome brands for these all things but not getting all things good...and now I am getting some issue as like battery life and most important thing is that when I am start to using this headset then not able to hearing proper music and video....voice is coming sometime not coming...I mean Bluetooth connection is going automatic off and on....that is very big problem I am facing....I have not excepted this type of major issues on this brand....can anyone help me please

name: ARoy
title: Use for 11 months and one replacement in warranty
content: Using for 11 months now. Use it for music and office calls. Reasonable sound and ok mic. I am satisfied. The range is around 6-8 ft (ca. 244 cm) but in open space it is more than 12 ft (3.66 m). The charge is for 3-4 hrs of continuous running else with my calls it is good for 8 hrs+/ . In last 10 day the right side speaker stopped working. I raised warranty (11 month/12 month) and got a new replacement from service station - while I had to wait for about a week for the service station to get replacement.

name: Kamlesh Khudabadi
title: Good Product - Can Buy
content: This is a very good product, but if you can buy Boat Rockers 255 Pro,then you should go for that product. It has amazing clarity & is a completely value for money earphone. This is why I was able to give this product a 4 star rating whereas I have given a 5 star rating for Boat 255 Pro..Also, if you are buying this piece, always do that during the sale time as the price lowers down to 999.

name: Karthik
title: Best Bluetooth neckband
content: After a month's usage,. Pros:. 1. Clear Music, Clear Voice, Good Noise cancellation in Mic.. 2.
