Excellent Range crosses 15m radially, I'm using it in a place where there are many interfering devices in 2.4GHz band.. 3. Good Bass, but not the best. 4. Connects 2 devices at a time, but plays from one at a time.. 5. No random disconnection, used for long hour calls with Windows laptop and Mobile too.. 6. Battery life is around 8 - 10 hrs, depends on call duration, and volume level.. 7. Comfort on ears, very light weight. Choose earbud size accordingly.. Cons:. 1. I paid Rs.1490/-, while in 5 days price was Rs.1049/- and now again it Rs.1499, so watchout for price before buying.. 2. Battery indication on your mobile for this device, shows 100 to 80 then directly to 0 sometimes, or 100 to 80 to 60 to 0.. 3. Charging time is clearly 1hr 40min. Which is 1hr in 255 Pro. Still not a Con here. Note: Do not use while riding 2 Wheeler(not recommended too), Mic area here is exposed to air or else covered up within your Helmet, so the on other side your voice will be heard with lot of wind noise/disturbed/feeble.

name: Aurobindo D.
title: Excellent Sound Quality at this Price
content: This is my second purchase of Boat Rockerz 255. The earlier one is being used by my wife. I went to Reliance Digital to purchase some other headphone. I almost finalized on some other product when i got demo of this product. It was way better than what i had planned to buy. To differentiate i listen to the 3D Barber shop video on YouTube. On comparison, this definitely got more points. This is one product i always advocate for. Using it for three month, will post long use review after a year of use. Wires from the unit to ear could have been short though.

name: shivaprasad2634
title: review after 6 month use
content: decent battery life. i am not into heavy bass and awsome sound clarity so i dont care much about music quality. but i can say that one can live the music quality but if you are music buff and looking for some high end earphones like bose or beats or high-end sony in your mind, this is definitely not for you.. mic works well. bt connectivity is good and pairs parallelly with multiple devices. better than ear buds as these earphone works with helmet and body is also of good quality. i feel comfortable to wear these while workout with the exception of running.. while running you should put this inside shirt to avoid the neckpiece from jumping and create annoyance but i never had issue of ear buds coming out of ear during workout. but sometimes i feel battery life could have been even better

name: Vaibhav Kumar Tiwari
title: My review after using it for 3 month.
content: Bass is good it has active Noise cancellation audible on roads also.. I get to enjoy loud crisp and clear music. It can connect two devices at a time so pairable with mobile and laptop together is a huge advantage.. With a full charge, i get more or less 8 hours of battery life. connects easily without wasting time with my mobile phone.

name: likhith
title: Good, but isn't great!
content: Sound quality is excellent..noise cancellation is great and bass as well..but the problem is with the connectivity..I use these earphones on my OnePlus 7T and this earphone disconnects just beyond 10 ft..One more prob is, when the battery reduces to 20%, it automatically disconnects from my phone on its own! Battery life isn't bad, isn't good either..can run for 6 hrs in a single charge! If you can spend ₹500 extra, can go for OnePlus bullets wirelesss Z!!. Edit: the battery is turning out to be awful as the days pass by. Even when the battery stands around 60%, I get to hear "low battery" indication for few times and it goes off! Bit disappointed!

name: Seshan Ramachandran
title: Great headset and sturdy build
content: Great headset for music lovers. Solid bass, loud volumes and volume control separate for the headset in addition to mobile volume control which is a huge plus. Good sound quality on audio calls. Did not try while jogging, so unabl to review the moisture wicking properties much. Good length to the earphone cable and good battery life. I purchased it for 949 INR and h nice good VFM. Overall I would buy again.. Design wise, I like the Boult wireless better than this as the wire tends to hang long down your neck when you are not using the earphones Otherwise a great product to buy!

name: Mithilesh Kumar
title: Poor battery... Think before buy
content: I am a regular customer of Amazon and I bought this Boat rockerz Bluetooth headset after seeing some positive reviews and Indian product. But unfortunately it is a Chinese product and imported and repacked in India. Sound quality, noise cancellation etc are good but the real drawback is battery. You have to charge multiple times in a day to enjoy this headset otherwise it is of no use. This is biggest drawback of this product. Better to buy a wired headset instead of this.. An honest buyer.. Thanks

name: Gaurav
title: Only for listening music not recommended for calling
content: Pro. Voice quality is good and bass is also good.. BUT. The con is -. 1. Its range is very less. Maybe 1 or 2 meter. Thats the lowest quality Bluetooth range exist.. If you move 2 meter away from phone then the earphone is useless.. 2. Noise cancellation is very bad, when on call , the person on other side will hear more noise than your voice. This need to correct as it is impossible to use it for calling in little noisy environment forget about more noisy.

name: sanoop
title: Defective Product from Boat through Amazon
content: I have ordered many products from AMAZON but this time a wrong selection for a Product from BOAT. i mean to say about Boat Rockers 255 sports edition .. Got the product today by 1 pm (11Nov) tried for switching on ,but its not powering on, thought battery low for new product ,so kept for charging for 1.5 hrs tried to switch on again its not powering on... while connecting to charger its showing bluelight (its means its fully charged), but while removing charger its not powering on.So its clear fact its a defective product. returned the product on the spot to Amazon .. Very bad product , i was going through reviews found many of them has faced issue with this product. i don't why this kind of product amazon has kept as best seller and Amazon choice product.. Kindly remove this product from Amazon choice their are other best products than Boat.. Thanks

name: Abinash Panigrahy
title: Can be better but definitely needs improvement.
content: I had ordered it because I had expected more from it. This is my second Bluetooth inear headphone (first was the old LG HBS 730, mind-blowing device). Anyways, the sound is OK - not bad but not good. Noise cancellation is good, voice call audio quality is clear to the other end, the buttons are good but can be more tactile.. My only gripe is that the music audio quality can be better. Bass should be more powerful and the mids, treble should be a bit more clear and refined.. Also, I suggest that they should add the two volume buttons + call connect/disconnect button at the left side + a vibration motor and keep the right side only for multimedia buttons (play/pause/rewind/next/previous).. But, since the price was much less in Amazon sale (below 800), it is only fair for the quality we get. I will hope they fix all this and release their next version, even the price is higher.

name: Cheenu Garg
title: Good buy.
content: I really like the product. Convenient to use.. My 5 years old son also uses these to attend his online classes.. The sound quality is very good and the best part is the headphones are so soft n light in weight that i do not realise their weight on my neck.. In fact I recommend the wireless headphones over Ear Pods.. Totally satisfied by the product.

name: PGS
title: must buy
content: got it for 999 in prime deal day. Good sound output. battery lasts about 5 hours at a stretch. sound quality good for music - okayish for calls. The ear grip does not let this fall off even while on treadmill/ jogging. not heavy on the neck. buttons are easy to operate. once paired to your phone - connects instantly the next time you switch it on. bluetooth range- two average room size. Green Black is a better vibrant colour , then plain black or red black

name: Madanuri KARTHIKEYA
title: Am completely dissatisfied this product.
content: Iys very waste product. I don't want to say don't buy this product, It's your wish. This product have low connectivity. Because the producu connevtion music player was struk. While listening songs if get any cal or msg after the songs was discontinued in boat rockers but music player running in mobile. I confirm ly say it's not mobile fault. Other wase sounds quality good. And battery back up also very poor. After complete charge is using continusly will come 4 to 5h. Others wise the battery backup 3 to 4 hours.

name: Vivek Bikkannnavar
title: Do not expect much. heavy technical issues.
content: a normal quality product. there are some technical issues with it.. it automatically disconnects with the paired smartphone when using and connects with some other device if its Bluetooth is ON.. do not buy it, if u want to use it with laptops. it won't pair.

name: Ritobrata
title: A small view after using it
content: Bad product... within one year right side connection is lost... totally fake product... I was bought it with around 1500 rupees but now it's available with only 900 rupees..but finally products are fake...on the other hand we can't repair this due to absence of service centre...

name: Anil Kumar
title: Boat is worth to money paid
content: Recently I bought this product for Rs 1399, I have received the product one day earlier to the delivery date. The connectivity of the product is good but the range of the product is upto 10 meters. There is no any noise disturbance in the product and the sound quality, bass and the clarity in sound is impeccable.. We can connect to two devices at a time, where we can switch from laptop to phone when there is a call on phone.. The material over the neck is not much flexible, there is chances of breaking and the wires are bit long.. One interesting thing was the delivery boy was using gloves, mask and was carrying a sanitizer in the pandemic lockdown due to Corona virus outbreak.

name: Ajith Kumar
title: Best Bluetooth Earphones !! Go for it. You won't regret.
content: The best Bluetooth headphones I have ever used. The Best in this price category.. Pros:. 1. Unbelievable battery backup. I am getting 1 day battery stand by. I use in office from 9 am to 7 pm then the battery lasts throgh out the night.. 2. Best fit. The earpieces will not fall out how hard you shake your head.. 3. Light weight. It is so light weight you can not feel the band on your neck.. 4. Stylish look.. 5. Magnetic parts on the earpieces make them stick together.. Cons:. 1. Sometimes you feel like the wire is lengthy.. 2. There is a voice notification when calls come "incoming call". It would have been superb if the voice notification says the contacts names.

name: Saurabh
title: Decent quality for the price
content: This wireless Bluetooth stereo headset is of decent quality for its size. High frequency sound is reproduced fairly transparently. Mid ranges are decent too. Low end bass is a bit boomy for my liking. At first look, the piece is well made and seems durable. Only time and usage shall tell.. Do note that the neck band, while being flexible can't be rolled like a wire. So don't buy one of the round cases with the hope of fitting the headset into it.

name: Nikhil k
title: Unreliable
content: item stopped working within 15 days, completely dead. charging also not showing anything, reading the other reviews its clear that there are many ppl who had faces this issue with the earphones it suddenly stops working and shows no signs.

name: Rohan
title: Great Product with best Customer Support
content: This product is very good. I say, best at available price. And moreover, the customer support is impressive. Had an issue with one side earphone not working after 7 months of usage. BoAt replaced me the product with a brand new one. This is what delights the Customer.. Thank you for such a great service in such a competitive market.. And with my verbal marketing, 8 of my office colleagues, family members bought this product and they too have a best experience with positive feedback.. Thank you BoAt once again for the great product and service offered.

name: Sumanth muthyala
title: Battery issue, slow charging,too much bass, high latency, slow charging,no proper playback
content: Not enough music back up, whenever you are in a mood to listen music the battery just dies no matter whatever volume. Slow battery charging. Sometimes it's irritating can't relie when u are traveling...thts the biggest issue with this headphones. Not enough range when ur on a call. High latency. If you u have the headphone for more then 4 hrs it has a typical connectivity issue...have to disconnect nd connect again... battery shows 80% which should last for around 4 hrs but dies in no time...it would recommend to not buy this headphones looks fancy but of no use

name: Rohan Vidhate
title: It is good you can go for it!
content: Pros:. 1) Product design is compatible and flexible. 2) Comfortable during work eg., gym, walking, or travelling. 3) Quality of sound is near 4/5 which is good if you compare it with others. Cons:. 1) Battery backup is less. 2) I don't recommend if you want it for gaming or movies at home,(cz you don't need wireless when you are at home). Overall product is nice 1000 rupees it is good deal. 1st understand your need then go for wireless headphones unnecessarily don't go for it! I do running and gym so it was necessary but for gaming I don't use it! Take decision wisely cz wired one gives better quality always in same budget!

name: Akhila Gowri House 2 Home
title: Poor bluetooth range & receiver in not audible
content: First time I ordered and received a product in which the bluetooth range was very poor & not audible to the receiver while attending calls. So I raised a request for replacement. The product which I received for the second time also had the same issues, so I retured the same. Very poor quality & unsatisfied with the product. However the delivery was ontime, packaging was good & service from Amazon was good.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good headphone but very bad battery experience. Hope it is replaced.
content: From last one week the battery has suddenly stopped working. It does not work for more than 5 mins and charge does not report above 60% when connected even after 2 hours of charging. It was perfectly fine for 2+ months with around 45 mins of continuous playback time and around 6 hours of standby time. Please replace the battery or provide new unit. I had a lot of hope from BoAt Rockers brand on long and reliable operation Thanks

name: Kaushal sharma
title: worst customer support. I suggest never to buy it
content: worst warranty experience .I registered a warranty complaint in March .still in November their is no exchange done by boat and it is also a tough task to contact boat customer support every time I tried to contact the waiting time is too lengthy I get bored and myself cut the call and never had a talk with them even after too much waiting. two times they said we are shipping your product. now on nov 19 they suddenly said your warranty expires we can not do anything buy a new product ,even i had claimed in early march

name: Saajan
title: Wifi Reconnecting Issue..
content: If our phone is connected to both wifi and boat blutooth headset, WiFi automatically disconnects after the phone detects boat headset and later WiFi automatically reconnects...and this goeson. I don't know why this product has reconnectivity issue ... review after 10 days of purchase.. If there is any option to return the product definitely i will return this Wifi cancelling product.

name: hitesh rathod
title: May be a duplicate product delivered
content: Not as expected. I think i have received a duplicate product.. My friend have the same with excellent music experience thats why i have purchased but bass is too low compared to him.. May be a duplicte product is received.. So it is not recommended to purchase from amazon. Review after using one month and comparing with same product of a friend

name: Kailash P.
title: Good but not best in budget
content: I have bought it 4-5 days ago and i am not happy with this. there are few point noticeable .. 1) Audio Quality - is Good but not very nice as it have over Bass. so you cant feel the song. you need to adjust the levels.. 2) Fitting - cause it is light and not flexible this wont stay at your neck. i can drop very easily if you are riding bike or running. also the earbud are very big in size.. 3) Charging/Battery - i did charged it more then one time for now as its new so i am not sure how long it is gonna work. but i feel that the charging port is only working with its cable only (as it has universal charging port so it should charge with any mobile charger also). overall good but expensive according to its quality.

name: Abdur Rahman
title: Very good product.
content: Very cheap product. And voice quality is very much higher it displace full voice in ear 👂.I have used Skullcandy inkd wireless but the voice is very slow in comparison of this wireless. It comes with 20 min fast charging and cable and 2 extra earmuffs. If you have to fill charge and you have time you have to charge it for 1 hours. 6 hours music playback time continuous upto 10 hours . Power off stand-by time 24 hours. Comes with IPX7 water resistant facility. Very good facility. Light weight sport product. Extraordinary colours. Comes with Qualcomm chipset. Charging compartment is on side that's great. Many versions available in market comfortable design. When an call came on your mobile it says "Incoming call" until you receive or reject it. Backup is very good. One thing is cord have to reverse upside from the compartment in order to make for to adult neck and years. Very great product in cheaper rate.

name: Muthu Raman
title: Rocking Sound for a Cheaper Price.
content: I bought it for 899 rs during Amazon Big Billion Sale. Amazon delivered it on time. I am writing this review after one week of usage.. *Pros*. 1. It's light weight and easy to use.. 2. It can be paired with your phone very easily.. 3. Sound quality is punchy and it has decent noise cancellation too.. 4. Call quality over this earphones are great and no one complained from the other end.. 5. It's cheaper than most other competitors at this quality range.. 6. It is great to use without the protruding rubber ear petal holder. So, remove it and use.. 7. The battery with stood almost for 4-5 hours average.. *Cons*. 1. The battery percentage option of the Bluetooth earphones on your phone might show 100% for some time and it may jump to 80% after a while. It can't be trustworthy, because it may suddenly jump to 20% and may turn off immediately. So, never trust this battery percentage option.. 2. It has a decent range of Bluetooth connectivity, if you move 5 feet away, you may experience sudden dip in the quality of music or call and the clarity deteriorate.. 3. The ideal charging Ampere is not mentioned in the user manual. People may tend to use high Ampere chargers and ruin the battery.. 4. "People also bought together" suggestion for a pouch along with this earphones is misleading. I bought that zip pouch and you can't keep this earphones inside that small pouch. Because, the neckband of this earphones can't be rolled or curled or bent.. *Final Verdict*. Go for it, to experience a decent pair of Bluetooth earphones at this cheaper price point.

name: Hiten Mistry
title: So far absolutely PLEASURE to own these pair of earphone!
content: I have been using this earphone since a week now, the overall experience is just superb. Few advantages below:. - It easily get connected to 2 devices simultaneously. - amazing noise cancellation. - On/Off voice instructions. - Paired or UnPaired voice instructions. - One full charge can last more than 2 days (depends on usage hours from person to person). - Once paired, it easily gets connected with iPhone or Android device. We don't have to explicitly search name and click to establish connection.. - Overall sturdy build quality and durable material, feels very good and light weight.. I am enjoying my music on this earphone, BOAT: Job well done, Kudos!

name: hr_ralte
title: Cheap price comes at a cost
content: For 999, this Boat Rocker is rock solid. Pairing it to my phone and laptop simultaneously. Google Assistant works but to ask to play music you have to unlock the phone. Will review the battery life later which seems promising for my usage. The earbud and hook also fit in my ears properly.. Update: After 7 months of usage, the charge port malfunctions, and now after fully charged, it just won't start. I was hoping it to last at least a year.

name: Gaurav
title: Best for connecting tv or mobile
content: I'm using it with my fire tv or mobile and it works well, not heavily into music so not sure about bass and other related aspect.. While used in mobile call and it perform well without any call cut or any other disturbing voice and no caller raised any issue for voice issues, I also own one other board bluetooth speaker so sound, connectivity and durability is good even here in this device magnetic earphone and wire are of good build.. so if you want to use it for tv or mobile viewing and some calls then you can go for it.

name: Mourimithu
title: Good one ♥️Loved it
content: The color looks same in the picture shown and also looks classy. It has good noise cancellation. It’s definitely a go for those who are looking for a BT at this cost. Sometimes if I wear it for too long it’s paining, like more than 4 hrs or 3 hrs . It has a very good grip and not falling of frequently.. The best part about this headphones which I like is that it has a auto sensor to power off the headphones when it is not connected to the phone.

name: JORAVAR
title: Replacement of product not working
content: The product of Boat Rockerz 255 sports in ear did not work to my satisfaction and I tried to replace d product but no positive response was received from Amazon. Country went under lockdown and all services stopped for 4-5 months and the product could not be repaired, however as per Govt of India's Force Majeure clause all warranties should be extended accordingly. I once again request Amazon to repair d product or replace it

name: Talib smiler
title: Genuine Review
content: The boat wired earphones (225) which come at the price of 500 is quite affordable and value for money if u r comfortable with the wires.. I found a bit more bass in this product.. . . .. Bt 1000rs just for bluetooth and a litte bit of bass is not something which I would go for.. Rest is all ok.. ... And. .. The delivery boy worst ever handling of the product.. Kamina mu thhoda aur ladata to pit jata. Jaahil kahi ka. Utterly idiotic behaviour.

name: azaz
title: Good Quality Product.
content: boAt Rockerz 255 Pro, while being lightweight in design pumps out your favorite tunes with powerful HD sound and deep boosted bass. The 10mm drivers installed to ensure that you get an exceptional sound experience with articulate audio reproduction with a blend of pitch-perfect frequency response. The sound produced by the boAt Rockerz 255 Pro ensures that you differentiate music from noise and hear your favorite artists the way they were meant to be heard.

name: sravchil
title: Good one..
content: I have researched the available wireless earphones in the market and chose this one based on the reviews and YouTube videos. I am using it for my Cell and while watching movies/programs on my Smart TV. I was unable to connect to my laptop due to Bluetooth issues on my laptop. I may have to use dangle on my laptop.. Likes -. 1. Its easy to pair your devices with this earphone.. 2. Sound quality is good.. 3. Noise cancellation is good.. 4. Light weight and stylish to use anywhere.. 5. It is water resistant (Not water proof, remember). One time, I have used it in the moderate rain as well.. 6. Easy to carry and not bulky. Provided magnet keeps both earbuds at one place, so it won't be a discomfort when you are walking/running/in Gym and not using the earphones.. 7. Decent battery backup. I use 2 hours at a time mostly. In a day, I use it for like 3 to 4 hours and I only charge once in 2 days based on my usage. If you use more than that, then you may have to charge it everyday.. Dislikes -. 1. As they advertised, I am unable to pair two devices simultaneously.. 2. Its an irritation to charge as the battery pin will not fit with adapter at one go. You have to carefully insert it.. 3. Unable to answer the call via ear phones. You have to answer it on the cell phone and talk via earphones. Same goes for cutting the call.. 4. Initially, there was discomfort to keep the earphone in the ear for an hour itself (while walking). After that, Its ok.. My conclusion - Good one to buy.

name: Pranavendra Sarkar
title: Must buy product
content: In this price range, its a good one.. Earlier I was in doubt that how tha mic may be ?. But the mic is so much clear, even its that clear so that the next person can even hear the background noise highly if you are not in silent place.. Sound quality is good. Battery backup can be improved. As of now the backup is okay okay.. Powering on, incoming call messages are good.. Bluetooth connectivity is also good.. Overall a very good wireless headphones with mic.

name: anurag
title: worst product and after sales service
content: Never ever buy this at all. stooped working after 3 months both side audio not working. when approached customer care they said they will not repair it or replace it. they said it happen sometime so we don't replace for it. what the hell.... worst "cheap Boat" brand cant even give customer support after sales. Please no should think of buying it. rather buy sony headphones.

name: Shailly
title: Good not very good
content: It's been a month, I'm using these earphones.. The product is good, still I would say for this price it could have been better.. It's solid & has very good sound quality.. Easy to carry & smart looking but it sometimes takes a lot of time to connect with my phone & the part of it which holds it into the ear got loose already & it got out of ear a few times.. on the charging point of view it work pretty well.. 30 mnts charging is enough more than 3-4 hours continues use. All & all it's good but a lil expensive.

name: Vinitha Harikaran
title: Best if used for listening to songs alone...
content: The headphone is really good until you are using it for listening to songs but not good taking calls, as it doesn't cancel the outside noise and the surrounding noise is more audible than our own voice to the receiver.. but it is best for gym purpose as it completely covers the ears and no other noise from the surrounding disturbs while listening to songs and also it has a tight and comfortable grip over the ears..

name: Hunaidkhan Pathan
title: One of the best bluetooth headphones in this price range
content: I purchased it one month back after comparing it with so many products. But to my surprise noice cancellation , bass and sound quality of the product is just amazing. Even compared with JBL LIVE200BT which costs around 4200 , this headphone is far better than JBL one.. just go for it if you want to have a good wireless headphones in this price range.. Only Con i came across is the battery indicator is not working properly it suddenly jumps from 40 percent to low battery but actual battery life is as claimed around 6-7 hours

name: Neha
title: Truly amazing
content: After using around 3-4 months... This is one of the best earphone at this price(₹999) wait for the offer.. Noise cancellation is truly awesome. I m living in a place where the wind speed reduces the speed of the vehicle, and when i was using JBL earphone then the person i was talking to get irritated due to the sound.. But this cancels all this wind sounds.. And yes bass lovers.. u can expect an average bass as compared to a precious earphones. U can adjust bass through Equalizer if u need more bass

name: Alfred c.
title: Okay but need few tweaks.
content: Some disturbance always comes through speaker after hearing some message tone or some music. I don't what it is. It's kind of some electric leftover pulse discharged a some kind of sound through the speaker.. Also when ever I cut the call, automatically music starts. Where I never played a music before the call.. Rest is fine. Bluetooth connectivity is good. If we receive a call in one mobile and cut , it automatically switches to other mobile if any call is waiting there. That I really loved.

name: Pavan Kumar Nerella
title: Best quality earphones in an affordable price
content: Giving review after using it for a week.ordered on 16th oct received with in 2 days.brought at a price of rs rs899.sound quality is good.bass is perfect and with immersive sound quality.noise cancelation is too good even when u play audio in low volume level u can't here an external noise. Watching movies and listening songs using this earphones is really a bliss. Bass quality is good. Connecting to device is very fast. Lastly if u want to buy this product then go for it sure.

name: Pavan Kumar
title: Worthy earphones under 1000
content: Updating after using for 1 year:. Best under ₹1000, premium quality bass and noise vancellation, fits good in ear. 3 different sized buds are given.. Cons:. 1. Not suitable to put on during sprint run. Best for music lovers during jogging and walk.. 2. Most common problem i.e., either side of buds stop working. In my case, it happened after 11 months due to invisible internal wire connection cut off.

name: Eshaan
title: DON'T BUY THESE, GET SOMETHING ACTUALLY WORTH YOUR MONEY LIKE THE ONEPLUS
content: The product is just like "doable" that is it, the neck band is very uncomfortable and keeps on moving around pulling the earphone, the earphone bud material is not so good and the earphones overall start painting after like 20-30 mins of usage. Before these I was using the one plus wireless earphones and they were better on everyway. Please save up your money and go for them. Also the magnetic feature in this is very useless, the earphone doesn't shut down when the magnets are connected and the pulling power is like next to nill, also the audio is not so rich and you can feel the audio quality is like those of the 300 rs wired earphones.. DON'T GO FOR IT I WILL SAY.

name: Ajay Anil Nair
title: Good Buds for the price But Extremely poor customer service
content: So i have used this bluetooth headset for a month as my daily driver, left side speakers just stopped one day while listening to music so i logged a complaint with customer service and they came to pickup the defective one in next 2 days, after that from last 15 days i didn't heard back from them, even the customer care numbers is useless since nobody picks up the call there. till date i have not received my replacement or repaired headset. overall good headset considering the price but extremely pathetic customer service towards customers from OEM, I would suggest rather go for Phillips, Sony, Mi or any other reputed brand since they provide excellent customer satisfaction.

name: iPrawaj
title: Good Only for Listening not for Calling
content: For listening to music it’s very good. In fact Awesome.. For making calls its not worth it as People will keep on complaining that they are hearing all surrounding noises better then your voice. May be because of bad location of mic or poor quality of mic.. Noise cancellation is just a myth. It doesn’t happen in this neckband. Infact other person will hear more noises than your voice. But still at ₹999/- its good... at least you are able to listen to music perfectly.

name: SACHIN CHAND
title: Review after using , worth reading
content: I'm writing this review after 7 months of purchase...I think we shouldn't write review for such items too early....here is the review... #Advantages- 1. AWeSOME sound quality. 2 . Pocket friendly (only@999 during sale, 1399 or sometime 1499). 3. Lightweight to carry anywhere. 4 . Fantastic colour varients available.. # Shortcomings -. 1. Sometimes doesn't connect with device , takes too much time( usually after charging).. 2. Multiple devices- connectivity doesn't function properly.... 3. Very short range ( 10-15 meters in real)

name: Anonymous123
title: Waste of money
content: I purchased these earphones about a year back after reading the great reviews on Amazon. The first thing I noticed is that the bass and noise cancellation were really poor.. Initially, there wasn't much of an issue apart from these two things. Eventually, the battery started getting drained very quickly despite charging them regularly. After a few months, I started facing connectivity issues. I had to reconnect them to my phone every few minutes.. Overall, I'm not happy with these earphones. I'd recommend the OnePlus Bullets over these.

name: parush
title: Average product.Poor connectivity reach . Loses connection easily
content: Not an hour has passed and I started disliking boat rockers headphones . It's poor connectivity that is the main reason. I tried it over call and played music but it has poor connectivity. On call it has a reach of meters only which is very less this means we have to carry phone in pocket everytime. While playing music it has connectivity upto 6-7 meters but if you change rooms in-between the connection loses. Though sound quality is good. Overall product is average though is also cheap. So a nice tradeoff. I give 3 star .

name: V Khatav
title: Asymmetrical Right Left sound .. please read before you damage your hearing
content: Within 3 months of use this earphones is sounding 3 times louder in left ear than right. I manually need to change the right left balance in setting. This has potential to.damage your hearing especially if you use it in gym as sometimes we tend to not notice this during workouts.. Please buy OPPO instead before you damage your hearing in one ear.

name: Yuktha
title: Okay!
content: The very first thing I would like to mention is that the neck band is very flexible its a go to product for comfortable wearing, its non movable when u plug in your ears ,it will not fall even if ur running ,gym and other routines ,controllable and smooth product are some pro's. Talking about the con's. if ur a music lover u will not find it attractive because its bass is okay upto 70/80% vol rise beyond that would be difficult,pairing issues. Noise canceling i would give 4.5/5 make sure while ur on a call put it in a 50/60% vol till 70% is appropriate beyond that would not be better!!

name: NUSRAT LALANI
title: Bad experience as all 3 got spoilt
content: Had ordered 3 pieces for my husband and children and all hve got spoilt . 2 r not owrkong at all and in q.one one side works .. There is no After service of boat company even of it's under warranty . Very bad experience. Called Amazon but they said u hve to go to the boat service center for pick and drop if it can be repaired which is very far from my place.

name: Kawsar A.
title: Stopped working in 12 days @#₹_&--+()))//
content: This is disgusting. The product stopped working in exactly 12 days. Bought on 7 Mar 2019 and the return deadline was a 10-day window. This is utter nonsense. Don't know how to return this damn crap now. I'll need to file a suit rather, for the benefit of greater good.. Current update as on 26 April: I got the replacement product directly from Boats company and Amazon played no role or assisted in anyway.

name: Ashwin
title: Not satisfactory. Total waste of money.
content: + Really pathetic customer service. Called thousands of time at their fort store but no one answers. Even if some one answers they don't service properly. Received call from some pratik guy he said he will ask someone to call but it's been more than 3 to 4 weeks no update. AVOID BOAT.. VERY VERY BAD BRAND AND AFTER SALES SERVICE... + The ear grips get too loose. I have already lost one, ther is no support from BOAT customer service team. The performance is not upto the mark. Doesn't work when the phone is kept in the pocket.. Range of bluetooth breaks after couple of meters.. Total waste of money.

name: Jyoti
title: DUE TO HIGH BASS.. IT MISSES OUT TREBLE. Sound quality not up to the mark.
content: 1. Sound quality is not good if you like slow Romantic songs or you're Neelesh misra story listener then this is not the right choice for you... Because due to high bass.. sometimes it misses out treble.. which is a big No no.. 2. Person on another side gets very compressed sound while talking on the call.. 3. Gives you 6-7 hour battery back up on full charge. Gets charge quickly. Battery gets drain too quickly after 30%

name: vee
title: Music quality is good with worst mic
content: Hi,. Any Update on this Ticket number is 1107094?. please let me know when I can expect my product?. I have tried to reach New Customer service number +91-2249461882 its not working. can amazon help me on this?. and also written email to support@imaginemarketing.freshdesk.com; info@imaginemarketingindia.com; help@imaginemarketingindia.com their is no response.. boAt Rockerz 255 what I have brought from amazon have issue now I have written a mail to claim warranty to boat,. From BoAt they collected headphone on May 23rd 2020, after that there is no response even I have tried to reach customer care of boat but none numbers are working,. BOAT Ticket number is 1107094

name: Dinesh Tripathi
title: Great wireless Earphones by Boat but battery indicator an issue
content: This a great wireless Earphones and the green color looks really cool. The quality of sound and bass is also satisfactory at this price range. It's worth the price. The charging speed is little bit slow I feel. And with continuous use it can work for like 7 - 8 hours. I felt if the battery life could have been better like if extra 2-3 hours was there then it would have been great. And one issue I found was with the battery indicator for this earphone, it's not that reliable. In just 5 mins the battery indicator which shows 20% suddenly drop to 0%. They could have improved the indicator and made it more reliable and efficient. Otherwise it's a great product.

name: Utkarsh Upadhyay
title: GREAT PRODUCT 👍🏻
content: This is by far the best Bluetooth earphone at this price segment. I have used almost 7-8 bluetooth earphones & this one is best.. The sound quality is great, bass is just perfect & above all it has a good noise cancellation quality (many people doesn't go for thia feature but yes it's a great feature to have in this budget).. I highly recommend this one to everyone.

name: Tanweer
title: Awesomeness as usual..! 🌠🌠🌠🌠🌠🌠
content: Ordered tis for the 2nd time as a gift.. Using one past 6months+ great sound quality, Bass treble noise cancellation, call quality.. Too good.. 👌. Had Ordered a neon last time wich looked good, got a red one this time n it looks awesome, kinda shiny metallic red colour is what it is n man it looks ammazzinng...!!!!. Worthy of its price..!

name: Amish Bhimani
title: Good product, pathetic sales service and warranty issues.
content: Product is good but service center is pathetic. After using headphones for 8 months one side of earphone stopped functioning. So we raised a complaint on boat website ( as that is the procedure to complaint and claim warranty ) on 18th sep we have raised complaint and today is 27th it is still pending. Calling up their customer care is a big task , first of all it is very difficult to get connected to their executive and if you are lucky u get to speak with them. But they will give false promises and pick up of your product doesn't happened either.. A product is good only if AFTER SALES SERVICE IS GOOD, otherwise people won't purchase it again.

name: HazraSmk
title: Dual Connectivity is of no use as it never performs perfectly ..
content: Sound Quality is Good not too high and Clear as well..Bass is not that much good and it does not have any Bass Booster mode... Overall Sound and Bass combination is good. .Range is also good u can get a clear uninterrupted sound even if u are 2 or 3 room apart from your device.. But here comes the main issue THE DUAL CONNECTIVITY its just bogus... In practical it is almost impossible to use this facility because when you connect the Laptop and phone simultaneously Prob 1. There is no auto play/pause system when u switch media play from mobile to laptop or vice versa. 2. When your mobile is connected and you are playing audio from laptop its actualy breaking and this problem is persistant until you disconnect your mobile. So Dual connectivity of this earphone is just Bogus and very disappointing .... My 3 star rating is only because of dual connectivity issue...

name: Balvinder Singh
title: Excellent earphones
content: Sound quality is good. Build quality is also nice. Its flexible and u can twist or fold it which is not possible in most of other bluetooth earphones. Edit: I am giving this review and after 10 months. It is still working fine and I carry it around my neck for 10-12 hrs a day for almost 4 days a week. It's bass effect, sound quality and noise cancellation all are well balanced. It's build quality is really awesome and I have recommended to many of my friends.

name: TnB_Giri
title: Good for workout but can't surely say value for money.
content: I got it at 1299. I do have Sony bass and infinity headphones so comparison will be with them. - Delivered before estimated time.. - sound quality good (not good at max lvl). - noise cancelation work average.. - bass quality is also average.. - Build quality is good.. - its do charge fastly as they said.. - playback is around 6hrs.. - overall can't say value for money as now you can purchase airbuds while 100 or 200 extra, but its ok to have it while exercise as less chances of dropping it down.

name: aleena
title: Good
content: Its Almost 2 months since i am using this headset. Since last one week i am experiencig a small glich sort of problem with this one. Like if i am watching a video or movie it cancels itself and voice gets in normaly so i will have to reconnect it again. I am right now checking on the occurence again.. Overall the product is good. Flexible and comfy to carry around. Charge stays through out the day.

name: M.T.Kesari
title: Great Bluetooth headset with very good mic.
content: Good bluetooth headset with a very good mic.. Lasts a day with moderate use.. Range is about 12-15 feet across rooms which is sufficient for most activities.. It is comfortable in bed too.. Only con is the soft tubber ear adapters come off after a couple of weeks if use. The rubber earbuds are more durable.

name: dipender
title: Not worth to buy, look for other options if you looking something pro
content: - Replacement product covers with full of sand and dirt around it, i think it directly shipped from sahara or cairo😁. - Not feel special about this product as audio quality is normal, battery even discharge in 4-5 hrs of continuos usuage with normal sound, I'm really very upset with this purchase.. - Voice is not audiuble clearly to other, many times while on call due this alrady replaced it twice but still not satisfied with that.. - Below Average product if you looking something good try other product.. - Other great products are available with same price or little higher with better features and quality.. - After six months of use, it's stop working. Charging for hours and this thing us not getting on, what a waste of money 😡.

name: anjali singh
title: Worth Buying
content: It is a good product. It's lightweight and gives amazing sound quality whilst cancelling all outside noise.. It is also very handy and the earplugs stick together because of the magnet when you leave them hanging in your neck which helps to keep it from moving too much. The neckband is a little flexible which prevents any discomfort on the back of your neck. It doesn't take much time to charge it and the battery lasts easily for 4-5 hours. You can pick up and disconnect calls and reduce and increase volume. It is also easy to connect to your phone.. Overall, it is a good product and one can buy easily.

name: Kabir Nagpal
title: Best device
content: Recently purchased boAt Rockerz 255 .I'm really satisfied with my purchase as it is lightweight in design and even pumps out my favourite tunes with powerful HD sound with deep boosted bass. Even has features of noise cancellation and provides great sound quality .It is even powered by Qualcomm QCC33 chipset which offers high level functionality and the features of the latest Bluetooth V5. Bass quality is indeed the best .. Being equipped with fast Charging technology gives me the comfort of super quick full charge in just 1 hour.As the wireless headset is IPX5 rated for protection so it actually protects the device from sweat and water scares .It looks really sturdy and stylish. All in all a great value for money .

name: Kaustubh Gotmare
title: Satisfied by the product
content: Pros:. 1. Excellent sound quality for this price range ( I got it for Rs. 999 in sale). 2.Long battery life ( lasts 6 hrs after continue usage with a full charge). Cons:. 1. It should come with an extra pair of ear hooks as I lost one and unavailable in the online/ offline market for the same model. 2. Experienced hindrance in connectivity many time while playing it.. 3. While u r on call it doesn't cancel background noise

name: mohit kumar
title: Lifespan of earphones less than 8 months
content: After using this product for eight months,. it's right ear is not working,. While playing online games, my friends hear some tic tic sound coming from my mic,. It's loosing it's bluetooth connectivity from any device,. It's taking longer time to wake and sleep the device.. Don't use it for more than an hour as it will damage your eardrums, mine have been damaged. Conclusion sound quality,notice cancellation, but poor long term build quality.. Lifespan less than 8 months

name: Raj AGS
title: Not impressive or suitable for Apple devices
content: The product is decent, however certain flaws.. 1. This item is not a right fit for apple devices. Whenever there is a volume increase or decrease in apple mac or iPhone or ipad, it gives buzz sound.. 2. It often disconnects from the devices and reconnect.. 3.it often started giving welcome note without even i am disconnecting the device.. 4. Does not connect to 2 devices at a time.. 5. Very long cable in the front and often goes down to your tummy if you are moderate person in size.. If you are good to invest couple more bucks, you can get either realme or mulo bluetooth earphones which are better than this.

name: Abhineet Srivastava
title: Think twice before buying!!!
content: I also own a Bose premium headphones which I think I cannot wear everyday to gym, so I bought this product for my day to day workouts. Comparing it with Bose, sound is not that crisp but for a Bluetooth earphone under 2k it worth it. I really like the beats and sound is pretty awesome too.. Full marks for that, but I find it pretty annoying while working out in gym. There is a U shaped clip at the end of which two wires are attached which connects to earphones. The sturdy clip has to hang round your neck all the time. If you are running, the clip might start rotating and that would slowly force one of the earbud come of your ear. Pretty annoying...believe me, you have to turn the clip time and again to hang it around your neck in correct position. Also, while doing ab crunches it will keep on falling back and take both the earbuds along with it.. I was mislead with the pictures, I thought it is all wire and no clip but its not. Just wanted to point this out so you dont make the same mistake ;). But if you are not into too much workout and want it for travel, then connection range and awesome beats is great deal.. Cheers.

name: Samastham
title: Disappointed
content: Damaged Product and Packaging.. Though this item was packed in another bigger carton box with air bubble cushioning and few other items, this particular item was damaged and the deal was open already.. Thought, at least the product should do well, but the product failed to take charge and power up, which clearly indicated the product was a formerly returned item due to malfunction. Rather going to manufacturer warranty and repair/retirement this got resold.. I've had many ear phones from BoAt and really love this brand (in the wireless category) alternating to House of Marley (in the wired category). But this one was shear disappointment.

name: Pranab
title: Not charging bought just 7 days back
content: Dont buy this product. very cheap material also had bad experience following up the customer service. I used it while jogging and in a week's time it is not charging. My return period has also expired yesterday 18th Feb 2019. I keep it for charging but the red light never glows and also not switching on. Regret buying this product for 2000. Advise not to buy this product very bad quality. Should have invested that 2000 in some other products. I have been a regular buyer in Amazon did not expect this type of product. Please allow me to return this product

name: Ajay
title: Happy with purchase completed year !!!
content: Build quality is good. Easily adjustable in ear 👂. Sound wise no matter if you keep your phone in pocket it work the same.. Charging time on continous use u can expect 6 hours.. Standby 4+ days ( I only tried for ths much). Has pretty decent bass is ths range - 999 + 10 percent bank cash back.. Took around 2 hours to charge thts fine.. Major problem is on call 🤙 people also will able to hear surrounding voice.. No voice cancellation of surrounding.. As well as boat has pretty decent service to replace.. I'm pretty happy with the purchase.. Locket + earphones 😄

name: Aishwary Srivastava
title: The detailed and useful...
content: You know its only good for music not for games and anyone who want to buy first check the size of your ear because mine was unstable and was falling down again and again ... In fact , I returned my earphone and instead bought boAt Rokerz 400 headphones that is better as, for music is amazing and wireless and in gaming foot sounds and so on are amazing and you can either choose wireless or wired (cable given with headphones)that is why it's make more adorable... I prefer choose wired headphones or earphones for gaming...

name: Amalan Stallone
title: Great headset for its prize & sound quality, But too lengthy!
content: This is a good bluetooth headset for its process, sound quality is great and I recommend this for Bass lovers!. Bluetooth coverage is pretty good but average!. The only thing that that I hate in this is the LENGTH, when I put them it comes till below my chest, irritating while washing face etc. Samsung Level U design is much more greater!. Only that, apart for that this is a great one!. I got it for Rs 999/- in Amazon Summer Sale early as I’m a prime member

name: Abilash
title: Purchased 5 Pieces and all works GREAT
content: BoAt Rockerz 255 Sports is my first ever wireless bluetooth earphone ever. First I bought one for my use and after listening to it my colleagues started purchasing and even I bought it again and again to gift it to some of my friends and family members. All are working fine and absolutely mid blowing sounds. Loving every bit of it.. The best out there for sure.

name: @kvxofficial
title: Buy Under ₹1300 anytime. 🤙🤘 SOUND IS LIT!
content: Everything is perfect in this earphone, but giving 4 star just because of the earphone wires are too long and they irritates. And when i use a single earphone it irritates a lot.. Well coming to the weight and sound quality and earphone fitting!. - Sound Is amazing full of bass, and fine quality of tereble. (I personally enjoyed listing songs it this).. - Weight is negligible, i dont feel that there i something on my neck. Perfect.. - Once i put the earphone inside they neither fell or nor they pains, even if i use them for 5-6 hra.. - Battery is pretty impressive i used it for 5 hrs and still the battery was there. And its supports fast charging which really impressed me a lot.. Overall its a nice earphone but there can be some more features like auto play/pause thorugh magnets.. Low latency mode. So that one can play games and do editing too.

name: aakansha singh
title: Not durable...wont purchas a boat product ever
content: This product is really not durable.I would suggest not to purchase this product..i bought them for workout purpose as the company said they are sweat resistant.The sound ,bass and noise cancellation is good.But these earphones are not durable.They malfunctioned 3 times in one year mainly due to battery.And their service procedure is very tiresome.They will send a courier service to your doorstep and then the earphone will be couriered to mumbai after which it will be inspected and get repaired/replaced.It almost takes a month and sometimes 2-3 months.And many people whom i suggested to buy these,their earphones also malfunctioned after sometime.So ots better to opt for some better product than this.

name: navaneeth
title: Don't go for it.
content: Don't go for it, I think this one is failure a model, first time I purchased Rockers 255 pro,after using of 5 days there was an mic issue due to that I replaced through Amazon, after receiving the replacement product after using of 20days again mic issue as well connection issue also, now the replacement window also closed by Amazon, so what I have to do? I don't know? So please don't go for this model it is full of money waste product.

name: geet
title: Stopped working just after a month's use
content: I bought 2 pairs of these for my office work. These do not connect with MAC!. Also, 1 pair stopped working just after a month & when I tried to register the complaint on their portal, its showing me that the service centre is closed due to pandemic. There is no other alternative suggested. I just wasted my money on these. DO NOT BUY THESE!! Wastage of money

name: Twinkle Gupta
title: too great charging speed and better than rockerz 255
content: this product is soo good, i have tried both the rockerz 255 and 255 pro, and 255 pro is too good. it charges so fast, that you cant imagine, i was listening to my lecture, when it told me, "battery low" i put it on charging while using it, my lecture, finished in like 30 to 45 minutes, when it got over, i checked its battery, it was full, even when i was using, it got charged to the fullest so fast, and i pretty much use it a lot so the battery life is rather above satisfactory

name: Reviewer#1
title: Great wireless earphones
content: Have been using them since 6 months now. Got it for my wife but ended up using them most of the time. Great sound quality and connectivity with Android, Mac and Windows. Sturdy to use. Good battery life. Mic is also good while speaking on phone and on calls. People hear me well while using the mic.

name: Huzair Tauhidi
title: Very worst after sales service, product is good buy if product got faulty then u have to throwaway
content: Plz dont buy Boat products, as it has very worst after sales service, no customer care support, u can't message them, u can't mail them, mail will bounce back, customer's care nmbr is always busy, u can't connect to them.. And at last u will feel helpless as I feel.. I have been waiting for 2 months but there is no response form there side. Nobody cares about you once u purchased their product, there is no after sales department to support customers. Only the thing u can do is u can just raise a TT and send the faulty product to them, and you need to wait for years to hear from boat.. TT: 1255029

name: Yatin Purohit
title: Good "Made in India" headset
content: Update -. One left ear-piece stopped working 20-Aug-2020. Purchased July 2019.. Original review -. I read somewhere that BoAt products lead to drop in pricing by JBL, Jabra and others. Now I know why. At much less cost the headset delivers. I am facing a problem in charging. Full 100% charge lasts easily for a day. But next day it shows 80% charge and after a while drops to 20%. I have never seen 75% or 40% charge, it is 100%, 80%, 20% and Off. Will update after contacting customer support.

name: Aditya Raj
title: Okay product
content: So, Here's me After using this headset for around 8 months now.. Pros:. 1. It has a great bass,. 2. Good noise cancellation. 3. Quite better sound clarity and. 4. Decent battery for 4-5 hrs when used cont.. Cons :. 1. Stopped working from one side in less than 10 months.. 2. Bluetooth range is okay, not best( Can be counted in pros on this price range). 3. Probably there's no Pick up Warranty support for this model.. 4. In aesthetics, Wires are a bit long which makes it odd in front.. 5. Worst part is very low quality and distoring mic. Other person keeps complaining about my voice.. Over al 3.3-3.5 Rating out if 5.

name: R. Baro
title: Good headsets
content: Does the job for bass lover this product bis exceptional. But not for those who don't like bass because bassless songs are struggle to produce clear sound. Medium is excellent but lower volume it struggle to produce pour quality. Maximum a little bit na ki barabar distortion on some songs. As per price point no complaints (((((chalega))))

name: Biswajit Panjal
title: Excellent quality overall
content: I m using since mid March 2020. Getting appx 8 hr battery life for continuous usage of like listening to song, video, etc. One full charge a day is sufficient for the entire day. Best part is the bluetooth strength is for 20ft distance without wall in between. Device remain connected while I go to another room leaving the mobile in a separate room. I got it at 1399/-.

name: Suman Saha
title: Good deal under 1k price.
content: I got this one for Rs 900. After 1 week of using I'm giving this review.. # Sound quality is decent, not as good as premium but ok.. # Bass is moderate quality. Enough for me.. # Noise cancellation is below average. It captures the noise of all your surrounding things. Not much helpful in traffics.. # The battery is really poor. Maximum for 4 hours with volume 80%. One thing that I have noticed is the battery quickly drained from 80% to 0% in just few mins. That I really didn't expected.. # There wasn't any problem with latency or mic issue while playing pubg. I'm not heavy gamer btw.

name: GK
title: Buy only if you want to regret later.
content: Can't recommend.. 1. There's a clear audio lag though negligible while listening to music it can be felt hard while playing games.. 2. None of the silicone buds sit well in the ear. Need constant push every couple of minutes.. 3. Those hooks or whatever, they are you can just throw them away. Don't understand how they advertise these for workout.. 4. Just some cheap junk endorsed by celebrities to give them premium appeal.. Better to go for wired or those true wireless buds if you have the budget.. Good luck.

name: Ruma Chikodi
title: Low battery. Horrible service for return
content: It worked well for the first 2 months. But the battery is a huge problem from the beginning. Hardly works for 6 hours. You have to daily charge it. After 2 months the sound quality suddenly dropped to just 10% of the original. I requested a return since it was in the warranty period of boat but my product got merely picked up and since 10 days I have been trying to contact them to know the status but to no avail. Looks like they have disappeared now at the name of return. Horrible service from boat

name: Rohit Kumar:-)
title: Boat earblutooth best quality good performance
content: Good performance best quality. Bluetooth : V5.0. 110 mAh Battery Capacity. Up to 6 Hours of Play-Time per Charge. Sweat Proof. Deep Bass. Water Resistant. Designed For: iOS, Android, Windows. Headphone Driver Units: 10 mm with Microphone. Bluetooth Range: 10 m. Charging Time: 1 hour. Standby Time: 24 hr

name: T R Sudarsan
title: Very good product
content: Sound effect is very good,. clarity of voice is very good , worth buying .. This is immediate feedback within 2 days... ( Since i am using BOAT SPEAKER... that's why i am giving immediate feedback). Only Improvement needed in finishing of volume and power button, headset cable seems bit flimsy we need to see the robustness of wire,

name: ajay kumar
title: Not so good
content: Honestly i dont like this earphone coz it is not comfortable in ear and slips.. when you tightly grip your ear feel pain after few minuts... I have make refund order but as per this product no refund provided. Only you get replaced same earphone... Oneplus earphone is better than this in comparison to bass, sound and comfort.

name: Aaditya Sharma
title: Too much Bass
content: The product itself is all that was mentioned in the title, everything was exactly as I was told. It's amazing!. The only thing is, due to the extra bass, other sounds are a little bit underwhelmed.. The noise cancellation is awesome, the first few days it was noticeable. I wouldn't say by how much it reduced the noise, but if I had to say at the very least - half - but over time, maybe I got used to it or something, but I didn't pay much attention to the noise cancellation anymore. I believe it still works because it's passive cancellation.. Another thing, the earpiece (i.e. the curved rubber part that is there to support the earbud from not falling off) starts to hurt over time (for my ears at least), and if you remove them, they fall off due to the weight. So I can only use them for an hour or two (which is alright, I mean, I'm not supposed to use them for that long anyway).. So, overall, again - great product!

name: Vishal Somnath Wadkar
title: Good deal, recommended.
content: Good 1 @ Rs.910. I bought it during sell.. Sound clearity is awsome.. Bass quality is awsome. Fits ears well.. Bluetooth connectivity is good upto 10 feet distance. Perfectly balances low & high frequency below ~85℅ sound intensity. At higher sound level, high frequency bits are noisy & disgusting. But you can eliminate this issue if you adjust equilizers.. Satisfied purchase

name: Kanishk Dhanker
title: Overall a mediocre product
content: I have been using this product for over a month and i come to an conclusion i could have bought another better wireless earphone Sound quality is good specially BASS is good but it does lack range.It has only range of 4-5 meters. and MIC does not offer much while calling i have receive complaint that other person cant hear me properly unless you are stationery at any given place battery goes off unexpectedly from 55% to 10% at any time but battery can withstood up to 8 hours i should have chose for another option. I recommend you to buy another product or if you get this product under 1000 then you can this instead.

name: Vikas
title: Defective product. Don't trust on this retailer
content: This is worst product fullfilled by Amazon. I got defective item or all the items are same. Noise cancellation not at all working. Battery drains from 60% to 20% in just 30 to 40 minutes. After that every minute it irritate battery low audio message. Earbuds are very hard.. From last three days i am waiting for pick up. Worst experience from Amazon. Don't buy anything on Amazon Prime days. If they can't provide delivery on time in normal days then how can they do in peek time.

name: Ronak Dagli
title: LIFE OF HEADPHONE IS ONE YEAR ONLY
content: I spend a 1 year with this headphone. It exactly stopped working after a year. The button which makes the headphone on is not functioning anymore. If the lifespan of the headphone is just one year, I do not recommend this product.. I cannot claim now for the warranty and in a situation to throw this headphone. If you are having a long term vision, avoid this product.

name: Sarojit Koley
title: Best bt headphone under 1500
content: I used this headphone since 15th october ... today is 6th november ... build quality is great .. Styling is also great... I am getting 6-8 hours of battery backup with standby for 4 to 5 days... awasm battery backup... Coming to sound quality,,, the punch of bass is just solid,, the midrange is also great,, high is little bit low,, but ok,, overall very very good sound quality... i was not accepting this type of sound quality ....also sound output is very loud.... if u have a budget of 1.5k... just go for it.... u will be happy for sure.. and in this budget point,, there are no headphone that will compete this BOAT.... A QUALITY PRODUCT FROM A QUALITY BRAND.....

name: Sushant
title: Fantabulous investment!
content: Pros: excellent sound production even though it's bluetooth; I've stopped using panasonic wired earphones because this product produces better sounds. The mic is positioned perfectly and the other person can hear well. Bass is very good indeed, I connected it to TV and the movie sounds were mind blowing, felt like a movie theater. Battery back up is really impressive and lasts a whole day for me, it depends on how you use it though. Charging time is another pro because it gets fully charged in an hour even when connected to laptop. The chance of losing these are minimal thanks to magnets on both earphones which attach themselves when not in use.. Cons: the band gives me allergy because of constant rubbing with the back part of my neck (this is just my issue as I suffer from skin related allergies). The lights on the earphone are too dim. The bands on the earphone which give it a unique style are hurtful, so I removed them totally and also changed the ear buds to red (used panasonic buds) . If you are a fast walker like me and when not in use, the earphone will swing like a pendulum, so I put it in my front pocket or shirt (this is not a con really).. Conclusion: absolutely great earphones and bluetooth is perfect 👌 don't waste your time looking for other options unless you have high expectations with bass and other features.

name: Rakesh B J
title: Bass based headphone
content: Boat Rockers : Mainly concentrated on heavy bass in equalizer bas mode is excellent. But other modes are just like normal headphone sound. Battery back up excellent i mean on full volume [100%] exactly gives 6hours music playback. And normal very low 30-40% volume gives playback upto 9-10hours. Disadvantages of all Bluetooth device is need to charge every day we don't have enough time to charge our cellphone these days who else will plug both device and Bluetooth headset at a time for charging. Please go for wired headphones.

name: arjun
title: Good deal for the price offered
content: For the price it is offered I would recommend this . Noise cancellation is surprisingly good . Sound quality is also impressive but not the greatest for sure . Bass effect is more . Fit the ear perfectly and doesn't come off . Wire and exteriors are made of plastic but serves the primary purpose . Bluetooth slightly deteriorates when you keep the phone and move to another room with too many walls obstructing . But overall is a good deal . Battery lasts upto 6 hours .

name: Ameet Baliga
title: Donot buy as there no after service
content: I would like to say , the quality is good cor the price but one side stops working after 1 or 2 months.. Thats not an issue because its under warranty.. BUT heres why u should NOT buy this product.. No service at all. You try calling the service center and you just dont connect.. I registered a complaint 15 days back and literally no response.. I have 8 products of boat because i thought its value for money but with no after service whats the point.

name: Amit
title: Read full review
content: 1.Design flaws: the neck band is oversized & has no spring action to lock around neck thus while running bounces off ur neck/shoulders which irritates & produces rubbing noise.. 2.Product defects: Bluetooth mic not functioning.. 3.Return policy Flaws: for COVID precautions, I disposed off the original packing immediately and thus now CANNOT return the item :(

name: Anurup Chakraborty
title: Best Budget Friendly Wireless Bluetooth Earphone
content: If you are looking for a pocket friendly bluetooth wirelss earphone with a decent sound quality, this product from Boat could be a good choice for you. I purchased it @ INR 999 during the great amazon sale (usually available @ INR 1499). I am writing this review after using the product for 6 months.. First let us talk about the features that the company highlights with my comment on it:. -- Super Extra Bass - I would not completely agree with this claim although I would say that it has a good bass (Plus I personally do not prefer too much of bass). -- Water and Sweat Resistance - It is definitely sweat resistant and I can claim that as I use it while working. The sound quality is not disturbed with sweat; but not very sure with its water resistant claim. I have been out in light drizzle with this ON; the sound quality did not get affected in the first 10 min, but then it got a little bad. I would not advise to try any stunt with this pocket friendly earphone ;). -- Sound Quality - I would rate it above average. Cannot expect anything better in this range.. Now, I would want to mention a few more pointers that I look at in an earphone:. -- Noise Cancellation - Not that great with noise cancellation. There are 2 aspects to it. One, the unwanted noise is not passed through the mike. Second, while you are using it, you are not hearing others around you. It provides partial noise cancellation in the second scenario. -- How it fits in the ear - Could have been better ergonomically designed. The each support may come out at times and this is the only part where I thought Boat could have done better even at this budget.. -- Buttons - Honestly, I do not use it to receive or end phone calls too often, but it works fine to receive calls and adjust the volume. The buttons are on the right side and very conveniently placed.. -- How it feels to use it- The product is to be worn around your neck and is very comfortable. although the wire length from the shoulder to the ears is a little long and could have been shorter.. I am using this earphone regularly for the past 6 months and have bought one more to gift my sister too. If you have a limited budget, like I did, you can go ahead with this. It is surely one of the better products available in this price range.

name: arunesh
title: Overall not recommended
content: Attracted by low price from a authentic company whose most products are upto the mark and meet standards but this earphone lack so many things. 1. Cheap looks. 2. Poor material. 3. Battery shows only three options 100%-80%-60% 😂😂😂 only company knows the meaning. 4. Wire is too long and gets tangled. 5. Sound quality is good according to price. 6. No return option, only same product can be replaced by Amazon. Overall not recommended product

name: Sankalp
title: Boat never disappoints
content: Instead of taking usual 3.5mm jack earphone.. I really recommend this... Not much of difference with cost... Battery is pretty good... You even get battery level in your phone (iOS to be specific, not sure of andriod). Not much accurate though. Only issue is with that tail around ear buds.. When you keep earphone in bag it can fall off easily..

name: ѕιlverrz
title: Good earphone
content: I love the earphone. I worked a 6-hour shift and played music nonstop. The volume is loud and clear, so I had it turned way down. The noise-canceling is good. They are very comfortable and do not fall out. You can tuck the neckband in your shirt and only see the earplugs. I recommend these.

name: Ritika
title: Nothing extraordinary :/
content: I had purchased after seeing so many positive reviews but there is nothing extraordinary. Battery drains after 60% like one minute it is 60% and it goes off after max 2-3 minutes. It does not auto connect even after paring. Have to manually connect every time. Also the sound quality is not at par with JBL. Now that I have put in 1500/- have no option but to continue as long as it works.. which does not seem very far along.

name: Pradeep Das
title: THIRD CLASS SERVICE AND CUSTOMER SUPPORT
content: NO WARRANTY N NO GUARANTEE FOR THE PRODUCT IF YOU FIND ANY DEFAULT OR WANT SERVICE THAN U HAVE TO WAIT MORE THAN 6 MONTHS . IT MY PERSONAL EXPERIENCE MOREOVER NO REPLY OF EMAIL & CUSTOMER TOLL FREE NUMBER THEY DIDN'T RECEIVED ANY CALL OR IF THEY RECEIVED THEY WILL MAKE PROMISE THAT THEY WILL DELIVERY THE ITEM WITHIN TOMORROW ONLY BUT THEY DIDN'T DO SO.. SO, MY BUYER PLEASE BUY ANY OTHER COMPANY BUT NOT BOAT COMPANY.. REGARDS. XXXX

name: sushant
title: Duplicate product. Lowest quality. Cannot even match Chinese product.
content: Just go t to know that the product provided is not original bit a duplicate on. Lowest quality. Cannot even match Chinese product. One side stopped in a month and other side which gives sound is not fittinnin the ear due to faulty or low quality ear bud (pic attached where placed but the ear phones together so that u see the difference). Had tough time with the customer service which states 1 year warranty but now covid situation has made passed 1 year and customer care isn't responding. So finally gave up. Hope I would have given the money to some poor person....at least some blessings I would have got...please look for some other option but don't even think of this

name: Amazon Customer
title: Earphone cables are a bit lengthy that makes irritation
content: In terms of price range it is a good earphone but not the best one. Sound quality is good, no issues with battery life and also feels very comfortable around your neck. Sometimes the connection was breaking while you are travelling by vehicle but it is not a big issue as it happens rarely. The only thing that I did not liked was the length of cable. It was really a bit long that can make some disturbance to you especially when you are not listening to music and casually hangs it from your neck. However the magnetic effect was working very fine.

name: praveen
title: Manufacturing defect and after sale service issue
content: I bought two rockerzz 255. A good sound in this price and good backup......But after using 5-6 months both of them had same problem. One oh the ear piece stopped working. One was used by me in Delhi whereas other was used by family members. No wear n tear but still stopped and sometimes give sound for a second or two. It is not easy to get warranty complaint. Neither online nor on phone.Planning to visit service center. So device is good but seems there is some manufacturing defects and service is not also up to the mark which should be as it is growing company....if it continues then Boat will be also like Micromax

name: Satish Pradhan Vm27
title: After 1 year and 2 months of use, Rough use.
content: Pros,. 1. Charge - 2 hours for 8 hours backup, 1 hour for 4 hours and so on. 2. Charge complete - Blue blink without break, depleted - Red 7-10 blinks. 3. Takes time to connect? - Keep Switch on button pressed for 5-8 seconds right from switch on, don't stop pressing in between.. 4. Can connect 2 devices.. 5. Sound Quality - MEETING: 10/10, Gaming - 7/10, Music - 8/10.. Cons:. 1. Band starts losing their touch and become jagged at earphone heads.. 2. Dual connection issue - Alternates sound from both, hard to manage.. 3. Buttons start to become less interactive with more pressure required to press them after 3-4 months.. 4. After 10 months - completely jagged pain to manage.. 5. After 1 year 1 month - One side(right side, depends on your use), no sound from earbud.. Overall - 8/10. Better performance than many competitors.

name: Surajit P.
title: Good but with a pain
content: Awesome speakers with good amount of bass...at full volume you might get a headache but around 80% sound max you can enjoy your music. Got it delivered today and after 30mins or so..my ear started to pain...not comfortable...battery is not great 100-80% in 10mins usage...my be i need to charge more as a first time..charged it for like 10mins and the was full - the blue light was on and i used...Overall OK product but my ear hurts

name: Satadal Ray
title: One of the best budget sports Bluetooth headphones.
content: The headphones are good, however the first one broke within one month, and boat replaced it, so kudos. Battery life is enough for one and half of my gym sessions, so I'd say between 5-6 hrs. Sound is clear with good depth.

name: Prasad G.
title: headphones 1 side of it is not working.called for warranty on No 02249461882 but it's not working
content: After 3-4 months of rare use as like other local headphones one side of headphone is not working ...we called regarding warranty on No 02249461882 but it's is not connecting at all... really don't know if this headphones is made for sport's man's who can use it while doing extensive workouts...how the quality of such headphones like local...

name: MUBEEN INAMDAR
title: Thank God I chose this one !
content: You get what you pay for.. Honestly... Its been almost 1 year and this product is performing the same as it did on the first day.. Also it doesn't provide any kind of Delay while you're playing FPS SHOOTING GAMES like PUBG Mobile or Call Of Duty MOBILE.. The only issue I went through, is a physical one.. The charging port got loose and is now moving internally but it still charges the earphone at a certain angle. Although it just needs a simple soldering and its back to work again.. Overall... Outstanding product !

name: Keval
title: Very good purchase for this price.
content: I am using it from last two months.(Rs. 999). Sound Quality_ Moderate (difficult to listen music in hevat traffic). Noice cancellation _ Not upto the mark. Bluetooth connectivity _ Excellent. Range_ good. Charging time is less and has sufficient battery backup ( say 1 day). Conical buds causing pain innear so I removed them.. Wires are quite long.. Gud to play PugG🤪

name: Pratyush
title: No Warranty support from Boat
content: Hi, After using this product for quite sometime now my product stops charging and hence i reached out to boat for the same. My product is still under warranty and i came to know that for this product which is sold on amazon. They do not have any customer care support nor any place to raise the ticket. They simply display the address to Hyderabad city and when you try to call to those number or reach that place no one is there to help you out with you concern.. I am writing this review with my 1st hand experience and i personally feel that there is no service for this particular product. So, Please purchase this product on your own and if it stops working better throw it instead of wasting any time.. Thanks.

name: MAINAK
title: Good, but could be better!
content: Overall good. Sound is clear, loud and not distorted. Noise cancellation is proper. In 999-1299 ₹ price segment, I think its worth to give a go.. Packaging of the original product box was pathetic, amazon shipped it in a plastic only, without any protection.. very bad I would say.. Product price varies within ₹999-1499. Amazon is ridiculously varying it instantaneously. Despite repeated requests and communications, even though price decreased by ₹490 in a single day, I got no goodwill/compensatory cashback, which Amazon used to provide before.

name: Akshay DUBEY
title: Honest Review
