content: Boat rockerz 255 pro. Well overall a good product from boat .. Pros. Battery backup is good.. Sound is not so clear like jbl but ya good bass.. Fast charge capable.. Cons. Colour (for teal green ) looks bit ugly and looks like a used product so dont buy this colour .The colour of wire is skyblue but the wings and cabinet where there r buttons the colour is very bad seriously dude i thought it was a used product but later on observing other buyers photo i realised that it is manufactured colour.. The Bluetooth connection takes a bit time. And sometimes it didn't even connect.. Bought in sale for rs 1099 which i think was a good deal it is best in segment to rs 1400.thank you. Will edit this after 6 month

name: APARAJIT MAZUMDER
title: Not so great
content: After 3 months usage :. The product is not so good as it looks.. Pros :. Holds charge for long time.. Connectivity is quick.. Cons:. Not comfortable fit.. Sound distortion when used in calls.. Not so great sound quality. Overall i regret spending 1.5 k for it.. Update after 6 months - Charging port got damaged and product useless. 1600 rs gone in vain.

name: baba
title: Confused wid Boats or JBL in 1500 to 2000 price range
content: Hi All,. I have purchased boats earphones after reading many reviews and asking to my friends who are using boats....from everywhere I got good feedback and when I personally felt good.. Meanwhile I check JBL brand aswell costing 2000 aprx with the same specifications. JBL also good one but if u r looking MORE BASS then boats bit more than JBL in this price range.. CONS:. because of rubbered ear strips...u cannot hear outside sound...coming to JBL u can hear outside sound as well...u don't feel like ur ears are completely blocked with JBL earbuds.. Concl:. Both Boats and JBL are good... U have to choose based on your Priority and interest n comfort u feel with..

name: Snehil Shukla
title: A bit disappointed
content: I have been using this nearly for a year now, a bit disappointed.. The only thing that forced me to write a review is after sales service of boat, these guys managed to pick up my earphones during lockdown when I registered a complaint. I have till date claimed the warranty three times ( while I am writing this it is the third time my earphones are with Boat).. The first time- there was a malfunctioning issue it used to turn off on its own sometimes. The second time- the time one of the sidrs stopped working, this was during lockdown it took a month for them to give me a replacement. The third time- the mic stopped working, it is currently with them.. 3 times there is an issue with the quality of the product you offer, although your after-sales service is good but it is of no use of I have to wait a month everytime they stop working.

name: PPSingh
title: Quality not good being a big brand
content: 'boAt Rockerz 255 Pro in-Ear Bluetooth Neckband Earphone with Mic(Teal Green)' product is v good but I have to return back within week after receiving the product as the net in earphone was damaged. They replaced within week. After use for 10 days, left hand side earphone stopped working. Again I have to sent it back for repair. Now, 9 days has passed still waiting for the product after repair. Please send it soon. Thanks.

name: animesh
title: Overall good at this price
content: For price , this is very good product , I got this product at Rs-1099, and this is original product ,. If you also want to know this is original or not , then you follow this step - first if you on the Bluetooth a male voice was came not Chinese and second step when you're connect with phone then there are two options are provided you have to choose sbc codec or aac codec this is sign of original Bluetooth 5.0. 🔥🔥🔥🔥❤️❤️

name: Rishabh J.
title: Go for it
content: This is a very good product and very useful. 1)Sound quality is very good. 2) noise cancellation works very good. 3) the two pair of extra ear plugs provided are also of very good quality. 4) the rubber hook which is there to provide better stability helps while doing rigorous workout. 5) quality of the flat cable and the buttons is very good one can buy it without having a second thought

name: Arshad
title: Not enough range
content: I've been using this headset for over a year now.. Still functions as good as a brand new one. Great battery backup and great audio quality.. But the device does not have enough range. If the headset is not within close proximity to the paired device, the audio is interrupted, sometimes it even disconnects from the paired device for only a short distance(like just going into the next room) . It's not a big issue for me, but this is a negative aspect of the device I have to point out.. But overall experience is great. I do not regret buying this headset (I bought it for INR 900/-).

name: hitesh
title: One of the BEST Earphones in this price range!
content: One of the best quality earphones.. Great Build Quality. I don't think anyone would have any problem with that.. Great Sound Quality. Clear Sound.. Noise Cancellation. Good but scope of improvement.. Great fit. If you are going out for running with this earphone, you won't any issue.. Good Bass Quality.. Highly recommended if your budget is in the price range up to Rs. 1500.. Will leave another review, once I try the one plus bullet earphones.

name: suman mazumder
title: Awsome quality and warranty service is best which I never get in my whole life
content: Boat headphones are based in india.its sound awsome.price is also in range.i really thankful for boat warranty service which I never get in my whole life.my b.headphone sound drop .then contact in customer care.upload my address with bill.they take the product from home and contact every 2days.otherwise msg and mail also.tracking no given also .repaired product given me within 10days.its customer care are really powerful.if customer service is too good then you can purchase any product from this company.

name: K.M.
title: Terrible earphones, horrible sound experience
content: Sub-par audio quality, music sounds like hollow like it's from well, call quality is terrible, game performance is horrible and bass is just too much. Overall a very bad earphones. Please think twice to buy these really horrible earphones ever.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worth for money. Best battery with noise cancellation, with moderate sound quality.
content: This is my 2nd blue-tooth, the sound quality is proportional to the money you pay. Battery back up is really good I used the old one more 10 months and the battery (7-8hrs) performance was still as good as a brand new headset. Now its been 2 months I am using this am happy with the performance. Must buy this product for GYM.. Noise cancellation quality is also really good.. Can connect 2 device at a time is the best thing. I so connect to my laptop as well as mobile phone this feature really saves time and handy usage.

name: Manish Mukherjee
title: Super satisfied customer. Hence bought 2 of em 😜
content: Great battery standby is the 1st thing i would mention, 2nd would be awesome quality sound. Pretty loud when u need it and not overwhelming at the same time. Great bass and surround effects. This is my second purchase of boat rockerz 255 and am currently using both of em as i am on calls and music most of the time. Still it gives more than 8 hours standby.. Great buy. Very much recommended. Also i have claimed warranty from boat and got a replacement so i can say the warranty claim they make works. GO FOR IT.

name: Prathyusha P
title: Zero noise cancellation and Connectivity issues
content: After 15 days of research I ordered this product. I got the neon one. The band is flexible and lightweight. I mostly use this while I go for cycling, on the first day, I just kept my mobile in the front basket of the cycle I was not able to hear any sound from the earphone. Later I moved my phone somewhat near to me then I'm able to hear songs. This is the first thing which I didn't like. Second thing was there is no noise cancellation, very poor noise cancellation. People on the other end of the call are able to hear everything from the background. They are not able to hear my voice properly, background noise was so clear that they disconnected my call telling that they're getting headache. After this incident I immediately returned the product. Usually I don't write reviews for anything, whether it's good or bad. But if I don't write many users will buy the product unknowingly. So do not go for this product. It is not good in any way. Leave about bass and all. There's is no noise cancellation and poor connectivity issues.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Awesome headphones
content: Simply amazing. The sound is just brilliant and if you can get it for 1000 bucks then even better. Beat is very punchy. The bass is held together very well. Mid tones and table are perfect as well. No issues with Bluetooth connectivity. Battery backup is great. I haven't used it at a stretch but I feel it should run for 6 - 7 hours on full charge. If you use it while jogging it does hold but not the most comfortable. They can fall off your ear while jogging.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Redesign ear plug as per 2nd Picture.
content: All the features mentioned above meets customer expectations based on value for money . One feature of the product needs rethought in design modification. Ear plug provided doesn't firmly fit. Into ear lobe. Very difficult to keep the plugs in place. 2nd picture shows the better design and gives a firm grip.

name: Aaditya
title: best if u purchased of 899 . amazing product
content: best in this price , bass is good but beats are nI'll get straight to the pros and cons of Boat Rockerz 255 Pro Bluetooth earphones.. PROS:. 1. Sound- compared to the non-pro version, it seems to me that there's slight improvement in quality. Not that it is very noticeable, but a slight improvement.. Bass- has got good quality and quantity of bass compared to others in the same price range. The bass is clean, tight and is not muddy like realme bluetooth earphones.. Vocals- the vocals are clear and crisp.. Loudness- it is loud enough to be heard in a noisy environment.. 2. Comfort- the earphones are comfortable to wear but without the ear guides. Maybe that's just me, but wearing along with the ear guides gave me pain in the ears which eased off once the ear guides were removed.. 3. Design- it is of neckband design that is comfortable to wear. The buds have got magnets in it which helps it stick to one another when hanged down so that no tangling occurs.. 4. Colour- comes in some trendy colours like yellow, teal green, blue and red. The youngsters would love this just for that.. 5. Fast charging- gets completely charged in just an hour and has got high voltage protection too.. 6. Sound isolation- nothing to brag about but comparable with others in the same price segment.. 7.Mic- the calls were very clear. The person at the other end told me that the voice was audible without any disturbances and indeed very clear.. 8. Connectivity- this has got the A2DP feature. So dual connectivity is present and I did not experience any connection drops of any kind.. 9. No Lag- there was no lag experienced while playing PUBG.. CONS:. 1. Battery- this is the biggest gripe anyone could have with this earphone. The battery gets emptied quickly compared with its peers. Though there's fast charging one would expect headphones in this price range to last at least 10 to 12 hours but not Rockers PRO lasts for almost 6 to 8 hours. That's what I got out of them and that was not enough.. 2. Price- the asking price of 1599rs is high. You may get it for 1200rs during offers. Even then it is not value for money because of the poor battery backup.. 3. No auto on-off with magnetic buds- the feature which is present in Realme bluetooth earphones. This feature could have improved the battery life of this pair very much but alas it doesn't have it.. Final words:. Boat Rockerz 255 Pro bluetooth earphones are good in terms of sound quality and trendiness but lack in terms of battery backup. Though there are several pros than cons it all comes down to the battery life and this one loses out on that badly.. Other options in the same price range - LoodAudio Everloop (good @1169rs), Boat rockerz 255( when in offer @ 999rs), Blaupunkt BE50(999rs during offer or even @ 1399rs), Sony WI-200( pricey @1699rs and high in treble), Realme bluetooth earphonest clear comparetively to jbl or sony .

name: Deepak kumar
title: Requested For Return
content: Hi All,. I purchased this product, Everything seems to be fine except below things due to that i requested Amazon for return the same and they are. 1) At low volume of music you will continuous listen the humming sound (Means not music sound, Sounds which speaker generated by own) which is very discomfort for Ear and this is major issue, due to this i requested for return. 2) Cables length is quite long, Which not looks good when it hang till near to your stomach but above of that (5'6). 3) To fit the noise cancel soft bud you have to enter speaker very deep in ear, so for long term in and out activity like this to your ear probably can make ear hearing problem.

name: Dr. S. Dutta
title: Great Bluetooth Headphones for Rs. 899
content: I bought it for Rs. 899 and at this price range, I don't think I'll see a better alternative.. Sound quality is a solid 4 out of 5. The sounds are nice and clean. The bass has a distinct punch to it. The noise cancellation is also great.. The Bluetooth connects almost instantly and its range is about 25 feet on average (with walls and obstacles in between).. The battery life is great too. It lasts almost am entire day with intermittent use.. If you are getting this for under 1000 rupees, go ahead. I highly recommend buying this.

name: abhishek
title: writing review after 1 year and 10 months
content: finally on 15 jan 2021(bought 21 march 2019) this stopped working that is one side not working so i am all fine with the product till the date every penny is worth and the sound quality is amazing the battery life is till good , you can expect the life span to be of 2 years and not more betn they are the best in the market for 1500 price point

name: Akshay Agarwal

This is the kind of services amazon and policy they have.. #Stupid policies. #Disgusting services

Unfortunately this purpose was not resolved. The device fails to keep the connection with computer app or mobile app while in call in MS Teams app even if we sitting in front of computer / mobile. Makes a noise which is undesirable.. On the other hand it works fine with music from youtube / amazon music app.. So if you are looking such device will solve the problem of

name: Amazon_Customer
title: Nice product!
content: The sound quality of this product is nice, bass also quite good. The color is also sporty. The only concern is its battery backup, although the product delivers the backup as claimed by the company of 6 hrs,yet is comparatively low and also irritating. Subject to that the product is really great. Connectivity is also pretty good. Comfort wise also the product is really good. Overall it's a great product.. However the delivery by Amazon could be improved a bit.!

name: Devkant
title: Good pair of bluetooth headphones
content: I bought this bluetooth after reading many reviews online. pros:. 1. O mahn the bass is really good being a bluetooth device. 2. in ear fit is good. 3. battery life is decent, I never used it continuously for more than 1 hr or so. 4. you can pair it with your PC & mobile at the same time, basically you can pair it with two devices at the same time. cons:. 1. the wire seems a bit odd then you wear it, its just too long according to my liking, I mean it should be similar to **Boult Audio ProBass Curve Neckband in-Ear Wireless Earphones**. 2. ear piece is a bit bigger in size. 3.

name: sarath kumar
title: Value for money
content: Got this for 1399 during lighting sale.. it is worth for what u paid.. don't expect toooooo much performance.. it is value for money that's it.. yesterday afternoon I have received this product. That time battery was 100%. It is always connected with my phone.. after using of nearly 12 hours (only connected with phone. I am not using for audio & video purpose. Approximately I have used 2 hours for audio and video purpose) now it's battery is 60%.. it is okay product

name: Kunal Bhardwaj
title: A Mediocre product
content: 1. The battery indicator only shows in miltiples of 20%.. 100%, 80%60,40% and 20%. Once it reaches 20% it's pretty much unusable as it keeps on promoting"Battery Low" which is very annoying.. 2. The battery does not fall linearly. Almost half if the runtime will cause it to fall to only 80% and the next thing you know you're already at 20%. 3. he charging takes an eternity😒. 4. Build quality looks good, buttons feel sturdy enough. 5. Audio quality is mediocre. 6. Would've been better if it had a c-type connector instead of micro-usb. 7. Audio breaks and/or stutters when you leave your phone in the other room. Bluetooth 5.0 may have solved this issue. 8. Did not have any issue with pairing and connecting. 9. Would've loved the auto on/off feature when it the earbuds are held together or pulled apart magnetically

name: Raunak Bardia
title: Low quality product. Boat has disappointed me on my first purchase from the company.
content: 1. Bluetooth range is poor - Disturbance even with a 10ft distance. 2. Multiple device support is bad - This is no longer a fancy feature. It is much needed. This device cannot connect and disconnect seamlessly.. 3. On/off switch is weird - Sometimes the device is on and even after a long press of 30 seconds it doesn't switch off and doesn't connect to a device either.. 4. Hanging magnet - I do not understand why all BT earphones in India follow this design. Mpow Jaws has a brilliant design where the earphones have a slot in the neckband where they stick when not in use instead of dangling near the chest. Mpow Jaws is expensive in India but is cheap in the US where I used them for 4 years straight.. Wish that companies like Boat can replicate such a simple technology and design in India as well.

name: Yogesh
title: Best in range and Serves the purpose
content: I personally have a problem with headphones as none of them would fit into my ear during running and workout.. But trust me this one is the best as it has better sound quality and doesn’t slip off.. Got this one during festive season at 999rs.. It has descent battery backup as well.. My marathon run has become more enjoyable now.. Thanks Team Boat.. 👍🏼

name: vavaliya piyush
title: I give honestly reviews after two week of usage
content: I give honestly reviews after two week of usage. Pros. - battery life 8-9 hour 70% volume. - bass is very impressive. - vokal are vey good. - easily fits any type of ears. - fast charging support (1.2 hour) and also provided high voltage protection. - best fo calling.your voice very clear listen to call receiver user.. Cons. - noise cancellation average working. Overall good to buy this product.i give you 4 star beacuse of noise cancellation average working

name: Amazon Customer
title: Quality compromised however model name is same
content: This is my 2nd boat rockerz 255. The one which i used before had a little bit more clear sound in terms of mids and lows, it was a tat louder aswell. The 2nd One which i purchased 2 weeks ago seems having the same model number but the quality has definately been downgraded, the branding on back of the earpiece has also got washed out in 2 weeks. I beleive this has been purposely done by boat as there is a high demand of this earphone and they are selling it at their lowest price ie 999 during the sales.. The people who had the old make and has the new make aswell will definately understand what i am saying. When connected to bluetooth the old one said "you r now connected to boat rockerz 255" however the new one says "you r now connected to boat rockerz" this is one of the difference aswell.. Boat will loose customers faith if the downgrade their product and sell it with the same name.

name: Govinda Prakash
title: Good looks n built but Average Sound
content: This earphone looks really good. But sound quality is just average. Bass is heavy but sound is not punchy n crispy. If sound quality is your priority and you have experienced some good quality earphones then you will feel that something is missing in it.In this case don't go for it.. If you are an average user who wants a decent sound and a good looking bluetoth earphone then go for it. Buit quality also seems nice.Noise cancellation and ear grip has no issues at all. Average battery back up. But it charges quickly. Bluetooth range is also decent.. Overall a decent product in it's price segment.

name: Vish
title: Ok ok product not up to the mark
content: After using of 7 days I am sharing my experience build quality is good. Battery back is good almost 8 hrs long after one charged. The wire looks weird in your neck the length of the wire is too long it seams touching to near by your navel. Magnetic part is work prety well but in only 7 days the logo of Boat is getting fade. Sound quality is good but not up to the mark. While driving the 2 wheeler wearing this headphones the disturbance while listening the music online experienced couple of times may be due to lack of connectivity of Bluetooth. Most bad thing about this device is it captured surrounding sound very quickly/easily better than your voice during on call ppl compleining what's going on near by you so my main purpose of purchasing this is not solved thoroughly as I want noise cancellation during call but it totally failed I purchased in 999 bucks

name: Pratik Mehta
title: Best but very Costly
content: This product is very good. My wife is using it since a year. We had purchased it for Rs.890/-. Thus Rakshabandhan, I wanted to gift this same earphone to my sisters however price has increased to Rs.1500/-. This product is worth buying however I have given 2 stars less just because the earphone being an old model, they have increased it's price.

name: Abhishek
title: Value for Money
content: I wasnt expecting the world after reading the reviews, but these seem to work pretty well for the basic purposes. Noise cancellation, as expected is average. Bass is slightly low for my liking but over all sound quality isnt bad at all, especially given the price. I would say, for a pair of everyday earphones, these are definitely a good choice. I have been using them for a week or so, shall update review in a month if need be.

name: VIVEK K R
title: Great indian festival well spent!
content: Got this one for 899₹ during great indian festival...for this price it is really a good headphone. The build quality is good...the main attraction is its bass...bass is really good...overall the sound quality is good....also there is no issue with bluetooth connection...battery backup is fine. Worthy purchase under 1000...This is the best bluetooth headphone you can get around 1000 rupees...go for it...

name: Vikram Venkatesh
title: Useless overrated headphones
content: So here we go again. You move away from boat cause you have used it and it hardly works for more than 3 months.. One of your supposedly tech expert friend buys a new boat headset and goes crazy making you think if the new product is really as good as he says.. You read reviews (should be paid as most of them are positive) and start going over the technicalities.. Amazon has a sale slashing the prize by 500.. You go ahead and buy one.. Boom!! Three months and one side of headset goes either blank or too low to hear anything. You try for a replacement but they point you to a shop on the corner of the city (Imagine my plight as I stay in Bangalore). You throw this useless headphones away and go back to your old Sony headphones which look so outdated now but seems to work just as perfectly as it did since the day you bought. Oh, it's couple of years old as well.

name: rohit bhosale
title: Sums up to be a good product at low price . Headphones that can be said to be value for money.
content: I am using this product from last 6 months and happy with its overall performance. Bluetooth connectivity is good connects faster to both Apple phones and android phones .Battery lasts for 5-7 hours depending upon how much calls and music you hear so at this price it’s a good product to go for . Noise clarity is good but it’s average for noise cancellation. Would recommend to go for it .

name: Amigoz
title: Honest review after use of one month.
content: In this budget range this is the best heaphone. Sound quality is inadjestubaly great, and bass is good enogh for this price range.. 1.Sound quality. #Good points.. *Best quality in this price range. *Heavy sound recognisable even in low voice. *High and low pitches are identifiable. *Great experinece for 6+D Musics. #Draw backs. *In louder volume music can be heard by third person. *long period of use causing heavy ear pain.. 2.Bass. #Good. * Good in price range. * Gaming sounds are realistic. #Draw backs. *Extra bass for music is not available. 3.Noice cancellation. #Good. *Use for calls. *In low traffic Noice cancellation is much helpfull. #Draw back. *Not Usable in heavy traffic. *Weak cancellation in noisy condition. 4.Connectivity. #Good. *Bluetooth version 5 is available. *Can get the range of an average 10m. *No lag in the time of any type of videos. #Drawback. *Sometimes connection loss in time of calls. *Lags experience in the time of gaming.. It is the best earphone in this price range. Easily connective to an device and easily carriable and good body condition.

name: Jayesh B.
title: Worst Seller  Imagine Marketing India  Private Ltd. - Boat brand - Worst Brand  not  trust worthy
content: I had bought this product on September 2019 , Within 5 month its once side was not working,. I logged a complaint In march , as per warranty clause This Imagine Marketing India Pvt Ltd. ( a cheap product selling company) was liable to give free replacement, Till due date was on i did follow up with their customer service number , they gave me reason of pandemic and said their will be delay and will be provided replacement as soon despite of delay,. Despite of several call I had escalated this mater to their administration email id. And now they have removed my complaint number 1054133 from their system. And not even bothered to respond to my mail, call back .. Already boat products are very worst in performance and this is not brand product, i thoroughly regret to chose this cheap- boat product , i realized brand is brand Boat - is cheap product selling , it is not at all a Brand . Pay some extra money but don't go for such a cheap product.

name: Jaswant Sisodia
title: Noise cancellation technology
content: I have placed an order this headset as it have mentioned that it comes with CVC noise cancellation technology but when I have tested this product it doesn't have any kind of noise cancellation feature. Then I have replaced the product but again I didn't get noise cancellation feature with headset. So I have returned this headset and got refund.. I really like this headset so please help me with noise cancellation feature for this headset. Is it misleading or I have got defective product both times???

name: Ayan Chanda
title: Great product at this price range
content: You will love it, the sound and bass quality is very much impressive. I have sony Bluetooth earphone also which cost Rs. 3000 approx, but boat impressed me a lot. It gives you a bass boosted performance even in the crowded place too. Go for it if you love bass and don't have too much budget.

name: Jatin beniwal
title: Super Sound And Battery backup is awesome
content: This boAt Rockerz 255 is Very Best Product to Buy Because in low Price They are giving High quality of bluetooth headset I Am Using Since 2 days I notice that The Buds Of This headset are hard they are paining in ear so I Changed That From other size Which Are giving Extra in box THERE ARE TWO SIZE AVAILABLE OF RUBBER BUDS,Battery Backup and Song base Is mind Blowing i love these Headset I buy this Product in ₹999 2 days Before from amazon now the price increase 500Rs But MY Rating TO THIS PRODUCT. 9.5/10:- in Battery Backup. 8.6/10:-in physical Body. 10/10:-in sound high base. 10/10:-buds style is awesome. Colours: black is not good. Neon is GOOD. BUT. Red is awezome red colour looks like gaming headset

name: Dr.Yashashvi Choudhary
title: 7months use update
content: Voice cancellation is jus not available. In six months off light use (twice a week) already one side earphone has got loose connection... Totally a no.... This was my review at 6 mos, I claimed for warranty online, they picked up product and replaced it. Totally hassle free exchange.. So that's commendable I guess.. So giving 4 star sound has been great always especially the bass. Awesome service guys👌 go for it

name: Amazon Customer
title: Better go for other models
content: Have been using it for past 8 months and below are my observations.. Its been an average earphone that does the job.. But more than liking it, I am disliking it.. Cons:. 1. We need to press power button for few seconds to on/off and wait for 10 seconds or something to be complete the boot up.. 2. Doesn't have magnetic on/off features which are available in other earphone of similar range.. 3. Battery life is low. I am able to manage with office calls for a day.. 4. Most thing i hate is the long charging time. Takes more than an 1.5 hrs to charge from 0 to 100.. Instead of this just increase the budget and go for oneplus Bluetooth Earphones.

name: ramakrishna
title: Only Replacement item no refund
content: This is a good quality ear phones with durable wire. But the wire is very hard not so flexiable and big compared with other earphones. This doesn’t fit to a pocket for sure. It has a magnetic base which combines two sides when not in use. The major thing is that this ear phones once bought cannot be returned only replacement option is available in amazon which is quite disappointing

name: Gokul Rao
title: Good buy but not sure of battery life
content: Head phone is good but after talking for some time i noticed a flaw or a fault when the head phone is on 60% and if u r talking it will be beep twice after sometime and it turn off. Maybe a fault not noticed or I have a faulty headphone. Noise cancellation not so good in this headphone and not recommended for Gym lovers as the headphones don't stay put for a long time.

name: Gokul
title: Damaged exactly after the warranty expired, the product is good but expected a bit more life.
content: I bought the product at 899 in 2019 September on 2021 Feb ie exactly after 5 months of warranty expiring the product has been damaged.. Also they do not have much service centers in tier 2 cities so please try to check the service centers also.. Product users experience: The product is good has good sound quality but if your planning use it while driving a bike not so good as it attracts wind noise.

name: Harsh Singh
title: Good for call and bass songs
content: I m happy with this. I use this for calling and music the bass is Extremely good and for music this is good but battery life not so good and all things considered good and Sounds is loud not as loud as wired earphone but it good and Bluetooth is really good. Sound is much better than Other can used for gaming too much better results for Gaming Thrill and Sounds but Bluetooth sound delay is there in evey Bluetooth earphone so it can bee ignorable And every thing is good with boat But you also Have to try Ptron it also good to but better hey Ptron love thanx Boat bass ka baap hey maja aagya bass quality se or sound achhi hey Thanx. HARSH SINGH.

name: Charu Bhaskar
title: Great product!
content: I really loved these headphones. My intent to buy them was for the gym and they completely solve the purpose. They are light weight. Easy to use headphones. I also use them for all my calls now, it is saving me from all that radiation we take from using the smartphone on our ear. Really happy with it.

name: Chandra Mohan
title: Terrific purchase
content: Review for this product is always positive as the product itself is amazing.. Bass is very much exceptional as we can expect it from any of the Boat accessories.. Audio quality is Good.. It gives 6 to 7 hours of battery life on continuous music play or movie time. While gaming it gives approximately 10 hours of battery life, I personally tested it.. But one cannot put it on ears for a very long time. Ears start aching a little after 3 hrs of uninterrupted usage.. Connectively is very good. Sometimes it gives normal glitches but still there is no need to bother about it.. My overall experience is Highly Satisfactory and worth buying it!. I Recommend to buy it without any hesitation. Very good product at this price range.

name: Prashant Sharma
title: Don't get influenced by the celebrity ads
content: Absolutely poor quality sound, very low volume, lousy bass. I would have even ignored the sound but for the fact that the earphones just don't fit properly. Even with all the options given. These are only suitable for walking at a leisurely pace for those who are on a very tight budget. NOT recommended for running or jogging as the earbuds will keep popping out. I returned the originals once thinking I had a defective piece but the replacement too had the same issue. Spend a little more and buy something better.

name: Tejas Patel
title: Nice product, great sound.
content: I bought this product in sale, so got it in very affordable prices.. my first impression towards the wireless earphones are not so good, as it comes with some constraints in which battery issue is one of the major.. but after purchasing this product my perception is completely change, this earphone has a very nice battery backup, I have used this earphones since last couple of months but still I have not facing any issue for use this product. also has a very nice build and durable quality.. I recommend to all who wants to buy wireless earphone in affordable price.

name: Hitesh
title: Bad Bluetooth connectivity
content: Worst product I haver seen. Multiple try than it will connect. I does not support dual devices. Noice cancellation is ok to the extent. Range of this product too much low. I buy this product because of name. Now I regret why I purchase this product. If you ask they can replace. I already replaced and they send this worst product as there is one time warranty they take advantage of this send worst product. I buy this product without discount means rs1500. Now one can understand how bad product is it. Not RS. 999. Better to purchase product worth RS 350. I regret but I can't do anything other than this

name: Rakesh Aggarwal
title: Go for it
content: Initially it was not on my list as I thought it was a cheap brand. I was looking for something which could give me good call quality. I tried JBL, Sony and Samsung. None of them could provided the call quality I needed. Then I tried this as last option and to my surprise it was the best and no one ever made a complaint about the call quality.. I give 5/5 for all features.

name: Mrs.magicheart
title: Good product for casual user.
content: I got it fo rs.900+ in offer. Worth the money. Quality was okay for 900 but actual cost was 2000+ so for 2000rs its not up to mark. Sound quality was amazing. It cancel noise for some extent. In this price cant expct 100% so 5 star from ma side. Bluetooth connectivity s working fine so far. Can connect 2 device at once. So if u listn song frm any bluetooth device n u get cal from ua phone , u can recieve right away. Overall satufied by it.

name: Indian Buyer
title: Durable and Good battery life
content: The sound output is great. The built quality 8s also looks good. The battery backup is absolutely phenomenal.. The brand is also very reliable. They will provide free pickup if you will face any problem within the warranty period. I got this product at 999/- only 😌

name: NavaneethaKrishnan
title: genuine sound quality
content: Before bought this read most of reviews it mentions as Immersive Sound but this will be a better choice having a more balanced sound. 1.genuine sound vocals very clear. 2.High bass. 3.Less treble. 4. Average build quality. Compared with my previous Sennheiser CX 275 this one less quality only.. if your in very tight budget if you want to purchase Bluetooth neckband go for this otherwise dont buy.

name: VENKAT
title: Good deal for a low price Rs.889
content: Got this deal Amazon Great Indian Sale. It's a worthful deal at the price of Rs.899. Battery life is around 5 to 7 hrs (not sure of the maximum limit). Good connectivity. Bass is little higher. Wire is little long but its best used for sports activities...difficult to hide device inside the shirt. Google assistant works fine. I doubt the durability of the wire. In short, best for the budget sports headset at low cost( Just wait for the deal and buy for 889 then if its not working after 7-9 months just replace it with another deal) just my opinion for low budget headset

name: Irshad Ahmed Khan
title: Most Hardcore Bluetooth Earphone available
content: Pros :. 1) Excellent Battery Backup(Using it since four days on a single charge).. 2) Crystal Clear Hd Sound with no audio video lag.. 3) Durable flat wires.. 4) Looks and Build quality is awesome with magnetic earbuds.. 5) Sweat and Water Resistant.. Cons :. 1) Call quality is good but Mic does not have noise cancellation so receiver receives noise.. Verdict :. Blindly go for it if calling is not your primary concern.

name: Harshita Hajela
title: Sound quality ok but connection is a hassle
content: The sound quality is okay but the biggest issue with the product is it's connectivity. We have to struggle a lot to pair it and even though it is shows connected in the corresponding system there is no response in the headset. It is a hassle to pair and connect it. Overmore the battery life is very short, the device drains out even in 3-4 hour. I wanted to return the product and that too is not possible. I am really dissatisfied with the product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good bass, Value for money, Magnet feature is good
content: On time delivery and product is good.. the bass wasn't feeling great initially but after changing the in-ear buds with the bigger ones provided in the packing the sound was significantly better with better bass and treble. Easily connected to my mobile phone, Smart TV, and laptop. I got it on 26th October, today is 30th.. I have not had to charge it at all so far.. i use it for a couple of hours everyday.. so battery life also seems decent.. It's good value for money. Would surely recommend.

name: Prathamesh Kishor joshi
title: Good but consider other products...
content: The build quality is good... But not top notch... I was using flipkart smartbuy bluetooth earlier... It was way better in half price but its only downside was thin wire and average build quality... The sound is FLAT there is literally no bass... As mentioned, it charges to full in just 10-15 min... Calling quality is great. No glitches... The welcome sound "connected" , "ready to pair" are too loud... It sends shockwave in brain... The overall quality is good for sport use

name: Rajje
title: Very Poor mic sound input, Not useful for calls/meetings/WFH. Replaced device is also having issue
content: I have purchased 255 Pro device 3 weeks back and I am already having 255 Sports device with my wife. This is my genuine feedback.. When I started to use 255Pro for my meetings, there was always someone who complained me about my voice is too low. This was not a issue with 255 sports device. I compared the mic sound input quality in macbook by going in sound input settings and compared the sensitivity. 255 Pro mic sound input quality was very poor than 255 sports. Same issue was when I connected the device to mobile as well.. I went to service center in Pimpri/Pune and got this replaced. When I check the same sensitivity again it was still same, very poor Mic sound/input quality.. If you have finalised boat, then go for 255 sports instead of 255 pro.

name: Aritra Ganguly
title: A great headset, worth its price
content: I have been using this set everyday for the past 3 weeks and the battery life is impressive. It can last about 8hours of total usage, even spread out over a few days. Charging is incredibly fast.. Sound quality is good, volume levels are adequate - you will rarely have to use the max volume, but the bass is slightly muted for those who want the 'boom'.. Personally, 2 things bother me - it refuses to pair for calls with my Oppo Color OS though it allows me to pair for audio (Youtube etc). This could be an OS issue more than the headset though it seems to have the same issue with OnePlus as well. There is a welcome message and a goodbye message that loses its novelty very fast.

name: Bhundiya Yash Hareshbhai
title: Boat Rockerz 255 Sports. The Perfect Choice!
content: This will give you worth of every rupee you spend.. Don't go for boat rockers 255 pro because its almost the same (except bluetooth 5.0). PROS:. 1. Sound- compared to the non-pro version, it seems to me that there's slight improvement in quality. Not that it is very noticeable, but a slight improvement.. Bass- has got good quality and quantity of bass compared to others in the same price range. The bass is clean, tight and is not muddy like realme bluetooth earphones.. Vocals- the vocals are clear and crisp.. Loudness- it is loud enough to be heard in a noisy environment.. 2. Comfort- the earphones are comfortable to wear but without the ear guides. Maybe that's just me, but wearing along with the ear guides gave me pain in the ears which eased off once the ear guides were removed.. 3. Design- it is of neckband design that is comfortable to wear. The buds have got magnets in it which helps it stick to one another when hanged down so that no tangling occurs.. 4. Colour- comes in some trendy colours like yellow, teal green, blue and red. The youngsters would love this just for that.. 5. Fast charging- gets completely charged in just an hour and has got high voltage protection too.. 6. Sound isolation- nothing to brag about but comparable with others in the same price segment.. 7.Mic- the calls were very clear. The person at the other end told me that the voice was audible without any disturbances and indeed very clear.. 8. Connectivity- this has got the A2DP feature. So dual connectivity is present and I did not experience any connection drops of any kind.. 9. No Lag- there was no lag experienced while playing PUBG.. CONS:. 1. Battery- this is the biggest gripe anyone could have with this earphone. The battery gets emptied quickly compared with its peers. Though there's fast charging one would expect headphones in this price range to last at least 10 to 12 hours but not Rockers PRO lasts for almost 6 to 8 hours. That's what I got out of them and that was not enough.. 2. Price- the asking price of 1599rs is high. You may get it for 1200rs during offers. Even then it is not value for money because of the poor battery backup.. 3. No auto on-off with magnetic buds- the feature which is present in Realme bluetooth earphones. This feature could have improved the battery life of this pair very much but alas it doesn't have it.. Final words:. Boat Rockerz 255 Pro bluetooth earphones are good in terms of sound quality and trendiness but lack in terms of battery backup. Though there are several pros than cons it all comes down to the battery life and this one loses out on that badly.

name: Abhi
title: Please dont buy!!!!!
content: Please don't buy this product. Only after using for 1 month earphones had stopped working and got it replaced within 15 days time. Now again I'm facing same issue with the replaced one.. Had bought this earphones for jogging especially for jogging purpose however the keys don't work and I'm not sure of these are even sweat proof. Purchased in the month of March'19 now facing a lot of issues as to charging, battery life, Bluetooth connectivity, ear placement.

name: Gaurav
title: ok headphones butt
content: the sound quality is ok but there is a constant buzzing when it plays something. idk if its intentional like some noise cancellation trick or something but thats a small issue. The voice alert in this earphone is the worst. It shouts in a man's voice "Power On! You've plugged in to nirvana!" whenever you turn on the earphone at almost full volume. What nirvana? when you turn off the device it shouts "Adios amigo, powering off" i mean its ok i might not be a fan of such a UI but i can tolerate that much. But the worst part is when your battery reaches 10% i think, it shouts "Oops, battery low" every minute or so at full volume. like we get it the first time man no need to shout again and again. Imagine you are watching some movie or video on youtube and an intense scene is playing, you are completly engrossed in it and suddenly someone shouts in your ears "OOPS BATTERY LOW!" man that is super frustrating buy it if u can tolerate that obnoxious voice its the only con i can think of

name: VARMA
title: Very good product
content: I used these earphones every day for many hours. They worked very well for so long although I used them very roughly. After extensive usage for one year, there is a problem with the earphones as the wire got twisted and damaged. When raised the repair request on their company's website, Courier person came and picked up the product and after a few days, I received a replacement product. The company didn't asked for any courier charges which is a very good service.

name: NB
title: Average prouct
content: I was going to buy a Bluetooth wireless headsets but couldn’t find a single one with good rating and ultimately purchased boat ones and they weren’t even getting connected to had to return them and purchased this instead.. It does the work but isnt wireless entirely.. Ok for the price.

name: Sainath kurule
title: Depends on ur preference..
content: Adding review after using this headphone for more than 6 months, actually i have not used it more thn 2 months, i dont know why , but somehow maby because of charging the headphone was quite boring for me, the headphone has verygood noise qulity, which is not good for me as used to travel a lot on bike, so i must hear the surrounding sound for safety reasons. This is my personal experience. Rest about the headphone, the sound quality is good, balanced, bass is also nice. Build quality is awesome. If u r ok with charging it every day go for it.. i got it for 999..

name: Ronak Kothari
title: Near flawless
content: After using this for almost a month, here is my review:. Best things: Amazing battery backup (almost 6-7 hours), very good noise cancellation, comfortable, easy to use, proper size. Could have been better things: The quality of sound could have been slightly better, I don't have any other complains.. Absolutely go for it, best option in this price range. You will not find any other in this range that is this good.

name: Amazon Customer
title: boAt 255 pro vs Protronics Harmonic Notes
content: When I compare boAt 255 pro with Protronics Harmonic Notes (little old model) for sound quality,. boAt Pros - Passive noise cancellation. boAt Cons - Duplicate bass (unnatural), No punch, music feels like glassy (unnatural).. Protronics Pros - Realistic bass (though less), Strong punch.. Protronics Cons - No proper noise cancellation, all instruments seems little mixed up (need to try working on equilizer), lacks sharpness (kind of voice clarity).. I reduced 2 stars for 255pro as it lacks the main things that a hip-hop music lover looks for.. This doesn't mean all other boAt music systems are bad, I found some wired boAt earphones which was costing around ₹400/- little better than JBL wired T100A. On a similar note, Protronics Bluetooth speaker (SoundDrum) was far better than JBL or any other speakers which are in same price range or above its range.

name: Naren_itsme
title: Defective product received...
content: Hi all,. I got a product with defect... The problem i experience is... When ever you going to start or stop playing some audio... You will hear some fussy sound like ssssssss... for 2 seconds.. after that only audio will start or stop playing... this sound comes even before the notification tone.... i never experienced like this in any of the Bluetooth earphones... I saw few positive and negative reviews before buying... I was convinced, beacuse of the price.... And other factors i didn't like in this earphones is. 1) the wire is very uneasy to use... The neck part is semi flexible and post that wire length is too much lengthy even for a guy with very lengthy neck.... 2) the ear piece is not at all comfortable.. it keeps popping out.... 3) i didn't feel i am using a boat earphones... It looks bit cheap... Of course the price is less

name: Dhawal
title: Value for money for price paid
content: I am using the earphones for two months now.. Sound quality is good. Charging lasts for a day at the most. Dual connect feature is unique and awesome. You can connect on laptop as well as your phone at the same time. You can pause audio/video in one device and play in other device. Band is flexible which increases it's durability. While Sony offers better Bluetooth earphones at higher prices with longer battery life it lacks this flexibility. Noise cancellation does not work properly. If you are travelling and speaking on a call the other person will understand that you are travelling which is not the case with Sony earphones. One should assess one's needs and choose one to go for.. Unlike Boat headphones it does not sound outside when turned On/Off (Those who have used Boat headphones will understand this better).

name: Snehankar karmakar
title: I think it is best for those who want to get headphones for 1000 rupees.
content: Its awesome products.. First of all this product built quality, design, mat black finish color and sound quality its really amazing. Basically I like it....🎧🎧🎧. Sound quality is too good 8/10. Design quality good 9/10. Battery backup its truly 8-9 hrs. 9/10. Weight very lite (24g) 10/10. Noise cancellation 7/10. Music Bass is very high. 6/10. Call & talking 8.5/10. It's perfect for me........ I'm happy 🙂🙂. thanks for best deal with best price. #amazon

name: Mrinal
title: Again FALL IN LOVE WITH "BOAT" 😘
content: Amazon give a great value of time.. THANK YOU YOU AMAZON 💐💐💐💐💐. I purchased one and half year ago a Boat 225 earphone.. working smoothly and still accept my Torture.. Bahut sare Youtube video dekhne k baad Now 1st Time buy a wireless Headphone. BOAT 255 PRO Bluetooth headset... #1st tell you the cons.. cons: wire length is 2 inch short. 🤔. #Pros: excellent quality of sound with " passive noise cancelling" 🔊. Room to Room connectivity. 🤗. Got 7 hour backup with 60% volume.. (do not cross 60%, high bass can damage your ear) 🤪😁. Smooth body design. 😍. FINALLY IF you want sound experience with your hard earned money, buy BOAT Product.. (Itna comments mat pado dude. Go for it.)

name: Sarthak
title: Invest some more and get a better pair or go wired
content: Better to invest sone more and get realme buds or from jbl. No noise cancellation or sound isolation.sound quality is moderate you can only use it indoor , in traffic or in public it doesn't isolate properly. Bluetooth connectivity is not good at all it disconnect within 10m range, and most annoying this is the battery backup, it take too long to charge and Max runtime is of 3hr at max

name: neelesh sisodia
title: Satisfactory performance after month too.
content: First time bought this wireless earphones. Therefore can't say much . But yes, it is a satisfactory experience. Play time is good. In single charge you can complete your one day easily if you are not a heat user. For ther users who continue operat with this gadget will disappointed with battery back up. Connectivity is super fine. Once pairing done it again connect in no time.. Give range upto 5 meters only or voice will interrupt. Call quality is super fine on both side.

name: Rocky
title: Good sports quality, waterproof. Acceptable sound quality.
content: This is some awesome sports earphones a true sports gear. I've tried a number of sports earphones and they all fell flat-faced with the kind of sweat I get during workouts and I had to return or dump them later but this one withstood all i gave and still going great.. Sound quality is okay but good for a wireless headset of this price range, doesn't matter for me as I use it for sports activity only.

name: Lovely
title: Read this for a complete review and features of this item.
content: If you're looking for a budget wireless earphones with more than decent sound quality, give it a go.. - bass is truly amazing and sets it apart from other competing wireless earphones.. - my phone is Dolby atmos configured, so the noise cancellation as well as the surround sound is excellent.. - dedicated keys for volume control, pause play button are available. And you can switch to different songs by long pressing the volume keys.. - connectivity is fast.. - extra earbuds, a charging cord and a manual comes with the purchase.. - I experienced a 6 hour battery backup on a single continuous use, so it's pretty good considering the budget.. - takes an hour and a half from 0 to 100 percent charge.. - build quality is valuable. A smooth design with durable body and the wire length is also adequate.. - neck band is not hard and not too soft, just the proper amount of flexible so that it won't break easily.. - one of the best thing about this earphone is the magnet inside the earphone speakers. So when you're not using it, you can stick them together while it's hanging from your neck.. The picture shows how I keep/place it at home. It's the magnet.. Cheers.

name: Sumit Saxena
title: DOESN'T DO THE JOB WELL. DO NOT RECOMMEND.
content: It is not good quality. Do not buy. Call quality on phone is not good (there is noise) and the moment you go outside your room the connection becomes weaker and noise increases. I have a small 2 BHK house; I went to the kitchen and the connection started to fail. The bass has been provided compromising overall call quality. One cant keep two earphones - one for music and one for calls. There are connectivity issues and it also takes unusually long time pairing with the device. Major set back for people who want to work from home using their office computer through remote connection. It doesn't connect to remote desktop. I work from home using team viewer to connect to my office computer. But the headphone doesn't work if i play audio in the office computer. My work is all about quality control and to listen to call recordings. It is not useful for me. Also, the packet came damaged. I would not recommend this earphone.

name: DrSYS
title: Only bass, nothing else. No service.
content: P.S. one side stopped working. Warranty only on paper, as such non existent service.. I don't even care about anything else if sound quality is below par.. I've used many Boat wired earphones and they're decent. Too loud bass always but still you can hear highs and lows and mids fairly clear. This one has just so much bass there's almost 0 clarity.

name: prasanta
title: Good one but not great !
content: Eventhough it connects two divices at the same time, however audio doesn't switch to the first device connected. While playing the audio from the first device connected, it doesn't work. Only it works for last device connected. We need to reconnect the previous device to get it works.. Not sure manufacturing defect or functionality limitation. Atleast it works flawlessly for other bluetooth headset like Jabra.. ANyway it's light weight and sound quality is better than many other product of same price range

name: Lohith
title: Good for music but not best for calls
content: The ear phones is good for listening songs but feel little high on bass for talking, and i am particularly don't like this type because when completely on you can listen your body movements loudly and which irritates.. other than that a good build quality and good sound quality for listening songs..

name: Gautam
title: Totally bassy!🤘🔥
content: Noise cancellation is good.... Bass quality is amazing.... Sound quality is okay.... Because of bass...even sufi or silent songs would sound bassy which I did not like.. Taking calls is what I enjoyed the most...even while walking by a busy road our voice clearly reaches the other side and vice versa.

name: shubhashish chakraborty
title: not worth it
content: Its been an year after I have bought this product and I would say it's not at all good. Sound quality, noise cancellation are all fine however in a span of one year I had to send the product thrice to get it repaired. Everytime one of the side stopped working and this was same with many of my friends as we ordered one after the other. For first three months it will work fine but the the problem starts. Even to get it repaired it takes weeks in resending and getting it back.

name: akash dutta
title: Decent buy in this price range
content: After 1 month of usage, this is what I have to say ... 1st and foremost .... BATTERY BACKUP ..... AWESOME 🔥🔥 .... Charges up pretty quickly too . 5/5. The bass is decent but those who like high base this is not for you ... 3/5. Sound quality is great .... It's really clear and smooth . 4/5. It's pretty sturdy too . Great build . Really comfortable . 5/5. Noise cancellation is ok ....(I guess) . 3/5. Overall I'd say it's a pretty good choice if you are looking to buy a decent bluetooth earphone in this price range . But if you are looking for a good bass ... This is not for you ..... (Bass is pretty good according to my taste ) .

name: Shaksham Kapoor
title: Good Product. Horrible Customer Service.
content: I am very much satisfied with the product quality in terms of sound, bass, and noise cancellation capabilities and would have given it a 5-star rating. However, the horrible experience provided by boAt customer service has made me rethink my decision, and I, for one, do not want to be a customer to a provider who cant take care of its customer satisfaction.. All this mess is specially created when you try to claim the product's warranty within its warranty period. Despite leaving multiple mails and/or trying to reach their customer care via the phone number, the team's response is a shocker. Either they won't respond to their emails, or if you try to convey your complaint via a call, then the agent cut's your call in between without even listening to it completely. It's just pathetic. What's the use of having such "customer care" when you don't even listen to your customer?

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst warranty service
content: I purchased this in Jan 19 for Rs 1000 as part of some sale. Firstly, I was very diappointed to see that left side of the earphones stopped working within 5 months i.e. June itself. But I thought it is okay since the product was still under warranty, but let me tell you all.. I LOGGED THE REPLACEMENT SERVICE REQUEST IN JULY AND IT HAS STILL NOT BEEN REPLACED!!!!. I never expected such bad customer service. Since July i have called their customer service a thousand times but it always says that all executives are busy currently. Then I raised another request online, still nothing to that too.. I am planning to take it to consumer forum now. So my conclusion is product is bad as it has chances of getting faulty anytime (in my case as early as 5 months) and service is even worse!

name: Debanjan
title: Good quality headset but not for Sports
content: Since this item is from boat, I knew the sound quality should be very good. I'm absolutely happy with that. But the biggest issue I have, is the word "Sports". I'm a long distance runner and this product is not at all suitable for running. Oh yeah, you can comfortably watch sports on your mobile with this though.

name: Amazon Customer
title: good product
content: Ive been using this earphone for almost a year now. It works perfectly fine till now. The sound quality is okay. Its quite sturdy. it works for a reasonable time until you need to charge again. It has problems with the bluetooth connectivity especially when there is heavy wind, you cant hear anything even with 2-3 mts distance. Other than that it works fine.

name: Jilsy
title: Not worth one star either
content: Bought it after several good reviews about the product. I don't understand the hype at all.. 1) Too uncomfortable. Never stays in the ear and the earpluges are big (even the smallest in the size).. 2) I started getting headache after multiple use. I could hardly use it for few minutes.. 3) Can't use for call and the quality is too low. Had bought this for conference calls and every time I had to change to normal earphones.. 4) The wire hangs from ear looks funny.

name: Saikat
title: Budget bluetooth headphone
content: Bought this @999. It can connect multiple devices at a time. Sound quality is good enough at this price. Build quality is very good. Bluetooth connectivity and battery life is impressive. You can use it for hours without any issue. It comes with different sizes of buds. I would strongly recommend if you are looking for something reliable for daily use.

name: Anon Y Mous
title: Not durable, but worth it
content: Lasted exactly as long as the warranty period, stopped working the bext day. But while if worked, it was the best. Great quality, waterproof, I used it at work and at home UNBELIEVABLE battery life, plus you can use the product even when it's charging. No other Bluetooth headset I know of has that option.

name: Utsa
title: Satisfactory sound quality with low battery life
content: The battery life is remarkably low. I cannot blame the seller as it was said to be 6 hours, but my experience is 4-5 hours when I connect it to both my laptop and phone.. Usually a good connection and switching between devices, but often my phone used to stop recognizing it when I just finish a call on my laptop.

name: Srinivasan Iyer
title: Value for Money
content: Having used Senheissers cx275 wired in ear headphones, I find the sound quality average. But then this is a Bluetooth headphone and for this price is value for the money paid. Bluetooth works upto a radius of 5~8 m with no obstruction between.. Finally you get the value for what you pay for though I felt the sound quality could have been better.

name: prasad chekuri
title: Excellent Battery life with super fast charging
content: Hi All,. This is my first time writing a review on any product..And I felt like reveiwing this produt would help others..The delivery process was quick and clear..Coming to sound quality these ear phones make a way difference relatively whne it comes to noise cancellation and louder..the main interesting thing which forced me to write this review is about its battery life..I saw the website claiming 6 hours and it's true..for me it lated more than that..I started watching movies and stiff from 1 PM in the noon it's still running in the night 9 PM with some 30 % left.. ofcourse had a break of 2 hours in between..So if someone is looking for long hour usage go for this...

name: Nikhil Vitonde
title: WORST HEADSET boAt Rockerz 255 Pro Wireless : Don't Buy !! Can't be used for CALLING ;
content: I ordered boAt Rockerz 255 Pro Wireless Headset from Amazon's Seller: Appario Retail Private Ltd.. First of they sent me an old and used product which came with an open seal. I tried connecting it took a lot of time and finally got connected; Music, Bass, Volume is good but the most important thing is, You can not use for calling as the mic is so bad that, the called or the person you are calling won't be able to hear your voice properly.. Then i called Amazon customer care to return the product and thought of buying the JBL or SONY headset but, the guy told me that this product can't be RETURNED. It can only be REPLACED and next day amazon sent me another boAt Rockerz 255 Pro Wireless headset; This time the packaging was okay but, when i tried connecting the headset to the phone first of all it took a lot of time to pair and secondly it's of no use on the calls. I am facing the same problem again _ the Caller or the person on otherside won't be able to hear you clearly and properly the call quality is worst than you can think. Don't buy this boat headset, it only looks good in pictures when you buy it within 2days it gets dirty and looks like used one. It has got a mat finish which looks really bad offscreen.. DON'T BUY FROM boAt Rockerz 255 Pro Wireless headset even if it comes in offer of 90% off. Better use wired headset;. I will have to get this one returned asap ;. Worst headset i have ever used !

name: Atharva
title: Great earphones 👍
content: This earphone is very good and very comfortable. Very good for bass lovers and noice cancellation is decent. I brought this for 999 so I think it is worth the price. But if you are not used to the rubber tip it has for not slipping from the ears then it is a little bit itchy sometimes but after we are used to it then its not a big problem. The only problem is that there are no service centers near me I live in Thane and the center is in Andheri and the one I got here is not good, they never have the stock and always delays the service. Disappointed with the service

name: deril
title: F**** Notification killing my ears.
content: I dont why they are making such a loud(FULL VOLUME) notification for each and everything like.. "You are connected to rockers 255 pro". " you are Disconnected/ connected/ ready to pair" at full volume.. Dame it. not satisfied due to this issue.

name: Ronak Parekh
title: Nice product
content: I have been using now since over a month and i found corns in the product its not mine its over all of same model i checked with other too they also noticed the same. 1 . Noise cancellation is really bad ( its good that you can hear background noise with whom you are talking but sometimes its really annoying ). 2 . Battery indicator over the phone once phone is connected . It shows 100% initially then after using for few hours it will shows 80% then all of a sudden dead RED. 3 . Connectivity sometimes i noticed it get auto disconnected and manually i have to connect it back .. Quality is really nice , Battery life could be better ,

name: Pallavi
title: Sound is good but not ease to use
content: Sound is good and battery battery backup is good but there are Many features missing which will make it a very good earphones. 1. Switching between calls and music is poor have to pick your phone all the time to choose option. 2. mic very poor quality it’s only useful when Surroundings are very calm. 3. Low battery alert comes just 3-5 minutes before full draining which is not advised for daily commuters. 4.forget about shortcut keys. 5. Bluetooth connectivity is good but range not good

name: Koustav Nag
title: Bluetooth Earphones with superbb Noise Cancellation
content: Bought this from amazon prime sell @ Rs.999/- only.. Super Bass with high quality sound and awesome noise cancellation.. Near about 5 hrs battery backup after charging once.. Calling is awesome.......but one has to be in a low noisy place while calling because if the place is noisy then the other side will get those noise more than your voice.. Bluetooth range is also good without lagging.. All over it is good to use in a low cost.

name: Saurabh Karn
title: Regretting for buying this product
content: Often gets disconnected automatically. Takes much longer time to connect to the device. Poor sound quality. Unclear voice even when you are talking over the LTE network. The microphone is the worst feature in this product. Person on the other side often complains of my voice not being clear or heard. Extremely poor connectivity. Take 2.5 hours to get fully charged instead of 1.5 hours as mentioned on the box. Works for 3.5 hours maximum after fully charged. FALSE advertisement of this product being active of 6 hours of battery life, which is WRONG. I'm now regretting this purchase. These problems were there since the first day but I ignored. I thought, it would improve in next few days but I'm sorry to say, nothing changed. WON'T RECOMMEND.

name: Santosh Khaire
title: Not recommended copy products of boAt.
content: It's copy of BoAt product. Sound quality is like Rs 50 headphones, bass quality is less than Rs 50 headphones... It's really not expecting from this seller.. boAt is very strong Brand of sound quality. But this headphones are really copy of boAt and has not recommended. I was showing the each part of images .. lookwise from box to internal all parts it's not like boAt product. Highly dissatisfied.

name: Kaberi
title: Product is good... If planning to buy for 5-6 months..
content: Bass is quite good for this price range... did hurt if used for very long time at a stretch... Plus had a little connectivity issues sometimes but it's quite negligible... everything was working fine for the first six months... And then one side stopped working... The worst part was that I complained to the customer care and they asked me to courier the defected piece so that they can replace it with a new one... I did as instructed but never recieved the replacement...!! Isse acha to me bhejti hi na... I dragged the defected piece a few more days with just one ear working but that couldn't happen either... Quite disappointing considering the brand and the price I paid for it...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best Product under the budget of 1k
content: Hey Friends after so much of research bought this product on 21/10/2020 for ₹899 and writing this review after using it for 24hr.. ✔Started using this immediate after delivery with 100% charge and still battery remain 80%. ✔ Sound quality is good with this dudget. ✔ Build quality is justifiable with the price range. ✔ Product delivered next day. ✔ 10/10 for battery. ✔ Green & Black color combination looks cool. Honestly am a first time user of Bluetooth headphones so Dnt know about others but experienced Realme Budds it was awsome.... But if you are looking for best budget bluetooth neckband this product is highly recommended just go for it...👍. Downloaded some 3D MP3 audios and enjoying it

name: Anandu
title: Boat hurts!😑
content: Bass is too much. Hurts your ear sometimes.. The quality of audio is below average.. Trust me.. Go for Oneplus Bullets Z instead.

name: Abhinav
title: Bang for the buck but richness in bass is compromised.
content: I have both boat wired headsets and sound magic. Both of them have rich bass. I love them totally & am using from past few years.. This wireless in-ear headsets doesn't have the richness in bass. May be the quality is compromised somewhere between the wired & wireless.. Except for this one drawback, this product is bang for the bucks you pay. It's lightweight, comfortable, long playtime and the offer price of 999 is excellent.. If you're okay with decent bass, this is for you.. Apparao retail seller is doing a great job regarding offers & return requests.

name: Haribabu Pasupathy
title: Sound quality is not good, over bassed
content: I brought this one, after using boAt Nirvanaa Uno. Uno had good quality stereo with nice bass. This is sounds like a mono headset. I think bass is too much or not set correctly. It sounds differently on Mobile and PC. I am not satisfied with the sound output. It connects to both PC and Mobile same time, so attending mobile call and Skype call with no hassle. For Rs. 1990 there are better quality available. I trusted boAt based on my previous purchase with UNO.

name: Raghav Prasad
title: Please don't buy this product
content: Its very disappointing that the product doesn't work properly. Initially I thought the issue was with my phone and now realised that the product has the problem. I have received a malfunctioning headset which keeps getting disconneting every few minutes. The purpose of buying this was for attending the long office calls, but this doesnt serve the purpose. And the reason for selecting Boat is because, I wanted to buy an Indian brand where I could have easily bought any other popular brands, but this is what I am facing after buying it. I recommend, please do not buy this product and suffer later. Now I have raised a complaint in the Boat website and waiting for their answer.

name: krishna kumar
title: Worst product.
content: Dear all users or future users , I would like to share important feedback about this product .. Negative point -. I bought this product on 10th feb and I used this only 15days and now it is not working. Suddenly it was stop working while I am on call.. I though it was discharged but actually it was product failure. Now it also not taking charging also.. Positive point-. Good sound quality. Good connectivity. Good voice clearance during call.. Over and all I will give zero points , if product is not working then positive point doesn't work.. Now I want to change this product under warranty but doesn't find any path to return this.. Pls suggest how to return the product.

name: Golam Mohiuddin
title: Its not worthy to buy.
content: After using the product more than 6 months I am here to write the honest feedback.. There two main purpose to use the wireless earphone i.e.- Listening to the music and talking over phone.. Firstly, if you want to talk it will not satisfy the person on the other end as it doesn't have the noise cancellation method, moreover it adds more background noise than the phone actually. It will irritate the other end's quite much sometimes unbearable to Listen.. Now second concern- Listening to the music.. Being a music lover, undoubtedly saying that is not rich in Bass nor the terrible and other things are perfect. You won't get much better experience either way, you will definitely get an average feelings for it.. So, I conclude you could go to another brand for better experience.

name: Sumit
title: Not good for workout.
content: I bought it to use during my workouts in the gym. And it fails miserably if you are doing exercises with lots of jumping and movement. It falls off very easily. Also, the most irritating feature is if the battery is low it will continuously start poking, battery low message and you can't use it. The build quality is also very mediocre but that's fine with 1000 bucks pricing.

name: Piyush Sethia
title: Stopped charging in 3 months - now useless
content: The product is quite nice - the earphones fit nicely and snugly in your ear, the music quality is decent, the noise cancellation is also good... But disturbance on call is a bother - I've had to disconnect Bluetooth and take the call through the phone several times because the static and noise it added to the caller on the other side. And disconnecting Bluetooth improved the call quality markedly. But this in itself isn't the bad thing - i could live with it. It stopped charging in 3 months - and no amount of trying has gotten it to charge.. Don't know what to do with the unit now that it is just sitting there as a piece of dud electronic... Overall, buy if you will use for a short term and moderate quality is acceptable!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Epic experience for Bassheads
content: Never used a boAt product before this one, but boy was i impressed by the quality of this thing..... BASS 9/10. Mids 9/10. highs 8/10. Battery performance 9-10 hours on full charge (also has a feature where 10 mins of charge will give you 35mins worth of battery).... BT range 7-10m depending upon obstacles between this and the phone. comfort 8/10 ....(those plasticy(silicone actually) things protruding from the might feel a bit uncomfortable at first). cons: 1) has a irritating indicator for low battery which i presume goes off about 4-5 times....at 10% first then every drop in percentage after 5% will have you hearing "oops battery is getting low" or a similar message. 2) The charging port is concealed in an awkard way...although its durable but the cover is kinda obtrusive. 3) i recommend not using a power/fast/turbo charger (or whatever they call it these days) if you want to see them live longer than a month.....110mAH battery Li-On battery would def not like that [i charge mine using my laptop USB port.....sometimes i have charged it using my phone too 3% drain for a full charge EPIC for travelling]. i have used many wired earphones before this so having a comparison between them seems stupid but it does well in competing with the sennheiser cx 180, jbl C200Si and it even outperforms the sony MDR-Ex150ap in terms of sound quality.... also getting it around for 1400 seems like the best price ...anything higher and i would save up for sumtin else. tl;dr if this fits your budget then go for it without thinking

name: Abhigyan Ayonush Borah
title: Awesome Bluetooth Earphones
content: Wow! More than what I expected.. Sound quality - 5/5. Bass - 4/5. Noise cancellation - 5/5. I received the product just some minutes ago so don't know about the battery back up. But I'm sure it must be good too.. Overall, it's just awesome in this price range. You should definitely go for it.. EDIT -. After 11 months of usage, one side of the earphone was not working. Maybe it was because of my carelessness. But thanks to BoAt. I applied for a replacement and I received a brand new piece in about 25 days as it was still in warranty period. Just go for it without any second thought. Amazing earphone!

name: nagendra
title: Not happy with it, earpieces stopped working with bluetooth connectivity issue.
content: I am not satisfied with the service of the company, rest sound quality was good, battery backup was good. One earpiece suddenly stopped working and I raise a complaint. I thought they replace the product but they didn't and send me same product. Now again one same earpiece stopped working and than other one also stopped working. One more problem started that is connectivity issue of bluetooth pairing. Now I booked a complaint again. Let's see what will happen this time. Will let you know about it.. Second thing as it's my first time when I returned any product neither I receive any information about handover defected product to courier boy nor that guy told me and I returned all accessories with the unit. But after 21 days when I receive my product back I receive product nothing was with it.. That's the overall experience I have with this product and problem came on the 2nd month after using this and now again.

name: amalpeter
title: Its ok
content: Its the same as boat rockerz 255 nothing changed in my opinion bass has improved earcups are not so comfortable it pain in the ear after an hour of usage(my ear is smaller i think) if you are going to buy 255 should choose 255 pro because of fast charging and battery backup, bluetooth connection has been improved with this one. Edit: i am concerned about the battery health its getting bigger and bigger everyday

name: Tahoor
title: Really a good product(Above worth to purchase )
content: These are of really good built quality(premium quality) except rubber holders and provides smooth sound quality and bass(condition is to use proper ear bud) , happy with the purchase as I used some other brand such as JBL, skullcandy, house of Marley.
