It is standing with those brands .. The bluetooth gets connected very easily, and its almost 1 year even I accidentally damaged one side even now they are working perfectly. happy with the product. Pros:. Good built quality. Good sound & bass. Easy connectivity. Perfectly fits. Good for our door. Cons:. I found it some what uneasy while in use (might be because of gripper I never used ). *Note examples I gave for JBL and .... are for sound quality that I really consider at this point of price

name: Lakshit
title: Pathetic
content: Usually I never give any rating but this time I could not stop myself. After one year of using this headphones, left earphone stopped working. What do I do with them now? We spent our hard earned money to buy these products and this is what they do to us. I haven't had good experience with boats. Nowadays people are buying their products like anything but all they get is faulty after some time. Now its out lf warranty. I am frustrated but I can't do anything with it. No one would listen me. I lost Rs 1400 on these headphones and also lost Rs 550 on boats 250 because they too stopped working from one side.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Definitely not for sports activity.
content: In terms of sound quality, it is good. But this earphone is not for sports activity. The cable is quite heavy which will not let the earphone stick to your ear on heavy physical movement.. Range is not even 5 meters. As soon as you cross thredistance you start getting interruption.. Bluetooth quality is way poor that when you are walking listening music and have put your phone on your pocket, you start getting interruption.. Wire is way to long. Around 2-3 inches extra, which looks weird if you are not putting it on and just kept it on neck. I have given the image. I am 5.4. The earphone is hanging 5 inches below my chest.. Overall, bearable for walking, but definitely not good if you want to buy this for jogging or exercise.

name: Sankar
title: A good product of genuine review
content: Quality's: It's a best Bluetooth headphones i used, excellent bass quality, best quality loud ness, nice build quality and awesome product.. Battery life comes easily 2days of medium use... Good battery life. Rating: bass 4.7/5, sound loudness 4.8/5, sound quality when hight and low volume 4.6/5, Bluetooth design 4.2/5 ( cable length is little bit long ), water proof 4.5/5 ( i am used this headphones in small rain & not problem i noticed). And final thing is you can trust the brand "boAt rockerz"

name: Pooja Sharma
title: Poor bluetooth connectivity, poor batter back up
content: Pros - sound is clear, fairly loud with less distortion, charges very quickly - in 20 min.. Cons - poor battery back up, discharges equally quickly (max 3-4 hours). Keeps losing connection with your device even when you are sitting next to your phone or laptop. The connection, switch on switch off notification is very loud.. Previously I had a Boult bluetooth headset. It gave me very good connection, very good battery back up and clear sound.

name: Suman Achary
title: Product is nice in this price range. Packaging was poor, i got the damaged  main box.
content: Good product in this price range. Using since 1 day. Let's see if it's durable.. Sound quality is definitely good. I'm using synthesizer headphones which are counted as one of the best, compared to them, i actually liked these ones at this price range.. Definitely go for it.. After one month of usage, the audio breaks every few minutes and it's annoying.

name: kvkv
title: Good sound, bad ear plug holders
content: Everything is very good about this product. Great sound, I love it. However, if I I hadn't lost those ear plugs and their hooks that help u stick them in ur ear I would have given it a 5 star. They gave extra ear plugs but not those hooks that hold on to the crevices of ur ear to help u enjoy the bass. I can't find them separately on Amazon either. It would be great if Boat could include those in the package.

name: Rennie9595
title: Bluetooth disconnects and connects again and again
content: The connection is not stable. Keeps disconnecting even if I am using with my laptop or my phone in hand. And the voice announcement for connection or disconnection is so loud that it really is annoying. I have almost stopped using this bluetooth and my money is literally wasted.

name: Brenfil
title: Very good
content: Very good product am really enjoying it.. can connect to two devices at a time and calls can be taken from both devices by keeping one caller on hold, a feature that I required in a Bluetooth device.. also the ear buds are soft on the ears and fits in very nicely, it's like u don't have anything inside the ears .. very good product

name: Pragya
title: Awesome Awesome Awsome
content: Guys amazing amazing product by boat. love this from the first go. Dnt read any negative msgs. This price range it's the best u cn get. Just unboxed it. Sound mind blowing. Bass my first priority as I am a bass lover, the bass is more then happy what I expected. Close ur eyes n order it. Connectivity too gud and gets connected within a second,no issues. Blue colour looks better than black. Sound bass wow. Comes 80% charged. Let's see the backup. Will leave a comment on battery backup as well. Amazon delivered it next day. Thts gud. M telling u guys nothing. better then this. Over n out. Bless us all

name: Likhith Salian
title: "The best affordable wireless earphones"
content: I have been using this product for around 7 months and this Boar Rockerz 255 sports earphones are really very good. No technical glitch till now and it's quite comfortable to wear during workouts and exercises. The bass may be comparatively higher so I use equalizer and Dobly atmos present in my smartphone. There are different pairs of ear bud sizes that can fit every person's ears. The battery quality is also really awesome and runs upto 7-8 hours as per my usage. Some vocal sounds may be unidentified because of it's high bass.

name: Manna
title: Product OK OK
content: After around 6 months of usage what I discovered was my device is a defective one.. The issue is with the mic. The person on the other side gets echo and not a clear voice.. However, I can vouch for the noise cancellation. It is quite same with all boat rockerz as my friend has also complained the same.. Not good noise cancellation - it's actually a noise enhancer.

name: Sadiq Makrani
title: Worst product. Rockers 255 is better than Pro
content: Worst product i have ever seen. Sound quality is too cheap. No noise cancellation and too disturbance while speaking on call. Call voice quality is the big issue. Can't hear the voice porperly from other side, tried with many people but same issue persist. Have returned this product twice as in both earphones the issue was same i.e. call sound.

name: PradeepKumar
title: Try this 1
content: This is my third purchase for the same head set I was fully satisfied till I bought the realme Bluetooth headsets. There are better headphones with better features available in the same price range or. Rs 300- Rs 400 extra , You get the realme Bluetooth headsets which is way better than Boat Rockers .. Trust me it like upgrading from Maruti to BMW

name: Amazon Customer
title: Fake/substandard quality product
content: I had been a Boat fan for long time and have multiple Boat headset at home with great build and experience. I have bought it from retail as well as flipkart and am sure got the genuine product which is evident with not just the quality but also the authentication barcode on all products except the one I got from Amazon. Please refer the screenshot attached which has to barcode marked in green white the one from Amazon is marked in Red.. Product from Amazon not only has poor quality and build but also doesn't stay longer also not a great range which defeats the purpose of bluetooth headset as the phone has to be kept near the headset all the time.. I have requested for replacement but will be very disappointed if I get similar product which is substandard quality or fake.

name: Ritesh Raj
title: Disappointing product
content: I'm writing this review after few days of usage.. Pros:-. Sound quality is good, bass is okay okay, overall good.. Cons:-. Keeps disconnecting and connecting in between, voice gets distorted as soon as i go outside or at terrace even when i place my phone behind me music gets distorted. So u cannot use this in open space as sound breaks everytime.. I bought it twice, and returning it because of this problem. It sucks

name: Sundar manian
title: Best fit for my ears
content: Excellent fit to my ears. Already used many in ear earphones but it's amazing fit. Sound quality good for the price. First time a neckband wireless earphone with 90% satisfaction. A friend had this and i tried, then i ordered this bcz of the exact fit to my ears (very comfort)

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for money product
content: Sound quality is very good even a person without music knowledge will definitely enjoy the music. Noise cancellation is decent standard. Bass quality is excellent. Sometimes due to interference with electro magnetic effect. It music gets bit messy. Battery life is about 4 hrs and it's really to hang around. Feels weight less on neck

name: preeti
title: Don't buy ever
content: M very very disappointed with this product. I bought this product on 2nd Oct during sale period for my brother to gift him today on bhai duj.. and when I gifted him tHis today they are not working so complete waste of money even now m not able to return them as window is closed on 10th Oct ... seriously just don't buy them it's wastage of money and spoil your surprise too ..so embarrassing for me when my brother tried to use them but they did not start..spoil my surprise too

name: GRaju
title: Review from an Apple fan
content: Connectivity: seamless, connected well with iPhone. sound quality: surprisingly well balanced bass. Fit: really good, and can be used comfortably well during workout. volume: since its in-ear, not reco for high volumes, due to its tight sitting, NC works quite well. VFM: fro 999, worth the cost, and is quite inexpensive compared to other BT sets

name: Shashank
title: Affordable product with a brand name.
content: Very Nice product in the price range.. Nice sound and base output. The only area it lags is the outside noice cancellation but it is manageable.. Here are some key features of the product:. boAt signature audio: boAt Rockerz 255, while being lightweight in design pumps out your favourite tunes with powerful HD sound and deep boosted bass. Powered By Qualcomm CSR8635 Chipset : High Level functionality is provided to the boAt Rockerz 255 by the Advanced Qualcomm CSR 8635 Chipset providing the features of the latest Bluetooth 4.1 Version. 10 mins charge, 45 mins play : The boAt Rockerz 255 are equipped with a 110 mAH battery that'll surely allow you to spend your time with these earphones a quarter of your day. Attractive ergonomics with a Comfort Fit: Built with uncompromised craftsmanship from premium materials including metal housing earphones and chrome accents the boAt Rockerz 255 is both sturdy and stylish. Free access controls: Since controlling your phone through your hands is too mainstream nowadays, you can take charge of your auditory experience with the boAt Rockerz 255. With the inline controls you can toggle the volume, skip tracks, attend calls, and activate Siri, Google Now or Cortana voice-controlled Smartphone assistants. With the wireless functionality and free access controls, the boAt Rockerz 255 is surely your companion for your travel and daily needs, stay edgy with voice command.. The build is nice and light and looks very attractive around the neck.

name: Dhiraj Asodekar
title: Please read reviews before a buy.
content: Everyone please read before buy. Ii used this Earphone 3 weeks then i write review.. I mentioned step by step what i faceing problem. Quality - earphones quality is good..but when you wearing your neck getting irritating after some time...and very long wires..of earphone... Sound quantity- sounds quality is very tribble... No bass and and no extra bass in this ear phone... If u listen song half an hour getting irritating... because of sound.... After that..when you talking through this Earphone.background noise is very high.. When you talk to another person they will not listening your voice properly...bcz of noise issue in this earphoe ... Charging - charging time 2hrs for full.charge... And back alos if you using continue 2 hrs only backup time.... So please don't buy this earphone.... Don't go for this ear phone... Better opstion available in any brand like jbl/ sony.

name: AJ
title: Value for money earphones, if under 1500.
content: This is a good buy. Sits comfortably around the neck, earpiece is good, and feels sturdy.. Noise cancellation is surprisingly good at this price range (during phone calls person on the other end hears very less background noise.). Sound quality - good with Android. With iPhone the sound tends to get crackling at high volumes when equaliser is on. No complains on flat sound.. Wires are a bit long, but you get used to it after a while.. My only issue with this and other BT earphones in this price bracket is with the voice breaking. If I keep my phone in my pocket (jeans) and walk the audio starts to break and I have to reposition the neckband. This has happened quite a number of times. I used to own a Tagg inferno and MiVi thunderbeats, both had this issue and this one too.. To summarise, worth buying, if under 1500.

name: SUBHASHIS DAS
title: A decent and functional product with sooper bass
content: Mid range is poor. The finer sounds are not extracted.. The product is extremely light and u won't feel it's there. This is an awesome feel. Sooper bass and crystal clear pitch. Bluetooth connectivity is remarkable. I received it yesterday and played for 3. 5 hours without and drop in performance. Seems sturdy. Yes, while listening to audio from Gaana, was getting a 3D feel, as if am sitting midst of a concert.

name: Ravi Vittal
title: Do not buy, headphone fails after 3 to 4 months
content: Do not buy, Headphone fails after 3 to 4 months. Normally the left side speaker fails. This happened to be 3 different times. All the three worked to 3 to 6 months and then failed. Waste of money. now I am trying Sony and Realme bluetooth headphone. 2 months now, both are working fine.

name: Shaily
title: Pathetic product
content: boAt Rockerz 255 pro wireless headphone I ordered and on the day 3 the charging cable stopped working mean after spending good 1400 u get a headphone without cable it's pathetic I will never ever recommend anyone to buy this product not from Amazon or from anywhere they fool people showing only good quality they don't show the bad comments.In my family everyone use Amazon but now I will tell everyone to delete the app and stop using it such a pathetic product. never buy nothing from here

name: Namaste London
title: Durable
content: I've been using this headset for the past 7-8 months and the following is my review.. Pros:. durable,. feels premium,. good bluetooth connectivity,. fair stereo quality,. bass is acceptable,. stylish,. magnetic attachment looks cool. Cons:. battery life ~ 3 hrs on continuous usage,. mild uncomfortable after putting on for 1-2 hours,. earhooks doesn't fit properly - always come out,. noise cancellation is just ok.. microphone doesn't catch sound properly while on call

name: Aamir A.
title: Best headphone in this price range
content: After using it 10 days i am giving my review about Boat Rockers 255... with impressive sound quality and a good battery backup almost 6-7 hours it is a very good Bluetooth headset in this price rannge..i purchased in Rs. 899 super deal..now comes to about noise cancellation so i would say while listening music you will listening nothing surrouning you but while calling if are in noise atmosphere like on road or people loudly speaking surrond you that time other side caller will not able to listen your voice properly otherside it is good product go for it..

name: Ankush
title: 😊THE BEST product choice I've made so far👌🏻
content: If you are planning to take this piece then you are making a correct decision.. (Every one has different opinion about electronics because first, they've huge expectations and second, every body gets different piece delivered and unfortunately sometimes technical issues can happen and it's natural. So if any issue you can always exchange it.. Anyways, following is my feedback that can be of your help while buying this product.). Since I've purchased it, I've come across only positive things. No complaints.. 1. Sound quality: amazing. 2. Battery life: sufficient. 5-6 hours at a stretch. 3. Bluetooth connectivity : within seconds.. 4. Calling : I've faced no lagging. Smooth.. 5. Noice cancellation : yes, little parcial. In short if anybody is talking about you in front of you, you won't be able to hear them unless you lower the volume or remove the ear piece.😅. 6. Value for money : definitely. I can only say, it's like you're getting a car in price of a bike.. Good battery backup, doesn't stop working, product quality is good, price range is so affordable, this particular model is good, designed lightweight, worth the money invested.. PS. It's not been too long that I've used this product, but as time passes, I'd review it again.

name: SMS
title: My first review after 11 months of usage
content: It's my first review after using my product for 30 minutes. Excellent sound system and flexibility is awesome.. It worked 11 months without single issue but 5 days back it stopped working applied warranty need to check outcome. Will give battery and full review after a week utilisation. Note: if u listen with full sound in this headset it may spoil your hearing capability less volume in the headset itself had good quality.

name: Sangamesh Sajjan
title: battery backup and connectivity distance/range needs to be improved...!!!!!!!!!!!
content: I am writing this review after using this Cellphone over a week usage , I bought this t diwali sale for 999/- colour: Neon. *] Battey backup will not come not more than 3-Hours.!!! DISAPPOINTED!!!!. *] Bluetooth connectivity is bit poor, while talking voice , it breaks, person in the call will complaint your voice is not clear. *] As said bluetooth range is not more than 10Meter. *] Good sound Quality Earphones quality is good with strong magnetic lock, Comfortable on ear. NOTE: boAT earphone ,difference between With wire and Wireless, With wire earphone Sound quality is awesome..!!!!!

name: Vinay Patel
title: They sound good really good. Lag is really bad and connection is spotty. Don’t recommend it
content: Connection issues is my main problem. Phone is in pocket and sound breaks up. And lag is awful in PUBG you stop walking and sound is like good second or two behind. Amazing sound quality for price. Comfortable built quality is not bad. That’s why I gave 3 stars. I am going to use it for music mainly so I am keeping it, but if you are planning to use it for gaming don’t but it. I wouldn’t recommend this. If you are using it for anything but music.

name: Abhilash
title: Average quality product
content: Recieved the product in good condition but box looked like local. Build quality average, sound quality is good at this price, battery backup is good working for 4 hrs aprox, Bluetooth was connecting good for first 15-20 days, now there is some connectivity issue too. service is not good, mailed several times to register for warranty, not registering the product for warranty at first now recieved revert maill after 4-5 days for complain numbers not yet confirmed the registration, toll free number doesn't connects. Used this product for more than 30 days. Not fully satisfied. Its an average quality product. So if you want good service and good product and if you can Spend some more money then get a branded trusted product than this one.

name: Gowtham prasanth
title: Call quality issue
content: Everything was good like sound quality noise cancellation and battery life.. but call quality is not good I dono while taking I can hear only some robotic noise from the other end.. help me to fix this or I will return

name: Tejas Dalvi Photography
title: Good product but not compatible with google duo video calling
content: After 2-3 month research i bought this product. i m using iphone 7 .... the voice is clear, base is good but it gives beep frequency while listening music which is very irritating. not having same problem with other device. Otherwise its a good product ..... battery life is Ok....NOT COMPLETABLE with Google Duos video calling

name: Pawan kumar
title: Replacement and services
content: I purchased this headphone few months ago after 2 month i found some problems with their wire then I registered my complaint last months from their website and till now i haven’t recived any confirmation from boat side their cc not picking my call I tried from last months after that i send email aswell approx 50 time but I didn’t recived any reverts from their side.boat service is so pathetic I advise to go with any other brand as compare to BOAT

name: Rajdeep De
title: Nice but can be more improved than previous one
content: Nice product. Better than sports edition. Bluetooth 5.0 working properly nice. Good connectivity throughout the home another rooms. Battery looks good . Noise cancellation is not so proper. Sound us lil bit crisp...in high volume sound must be crack on high pitches notes....in 6-7 sound feels goid sound but all over nice

name: RAVI KANT
title: After sale Service Quality is very poor
content: Very Poor service quality from BOAT. BOAT says that the warranty period is of one year. But in my case the earphone stopped turning ON, even being in warranty period and it has been more than a month of registering the complaint ,and it was promised by BOAT that courier partner shall pick up the earphone but yet no pick up for repair or replacement has been arranged by BOAT.. even there isn't any response from customer care on my multiple complaints in this regard.. so in nutshell a bad choice to go for BOAT.

name: Debashish P.
title: Amazing product.
content: Sound quality is extremely good.. Light weight and fits in comfortably in the ears.. Bass quality is perfect. Very handy effective item when you are traveling with luggage.. Worth the money, I bought it at 999/- on Amazon sale.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good product but not really for runners
content: It's a good product in itself with good audio etc. The issue for me is that I was looking for something that is good to run with and unfortunately the part that goes over your neck just jumps up and down when you run and it's quite annoying. This product is better suited for walkers. Even though sound is good I will buy another product instead which doesn't have the stiff heavy neck part but is just a cable.

name: Jeevan kailas
title: Don't buy plz read it before buying
content: Cons: stopped working one side in w-3 months, filed complaint to boat, the picked my product, after 15 days i got new pair from them, after using it, one side stopped working after 2-3 months, now I again sent it to the boat service centre it's been 3-4 days, iam sure when will provide me new one, but the thing is that these headphones are not reliable for long term ohh sorry not even for short term use, iam thinking what if the new one also stops working after the warranty expires. And it also have poor connectivity , from front pant pocket to neck it gets voice break . Not worth the money go for jbl my cousin is using he had no issue. One of my frnd has also the same problem and his frnd also has the same problem "one side not working" And their homes are out of town to get boat replacement warranty. They jus used for couple of month 3-4 months max.. Very disappointed from boat especially from this product.. 😞😔 it has very good bass noice cancellation, poor battery 100 to 60 3-4 hours and 60-0 in 10 mins 😂😂😂 , this battery problem is facing everyone all of my frnd. Tooks some time to charge. Not worth the money, go for any other product. At least don't buy this variant from boat.

name: Shoba
title: Headset problem
content: Bought Boat rockerz 255 in April 2019.. Initially the product was good.. However the right handside earphone is not working now and not sure if this will be covered in my warranty.. Have tried all possible ways to rectify but in vain.. Doubting the quality of such a simple product which is not durable.. Raised a complaint once the right ear phones were not working. After 3 weeks the same was serviced ( faulty product picked up, serviced and delivered).. But the problem surfaced again after 3 months. Right ear phone not working again.. Looks like they have compromised on the quality of something basic. Thumbs down to Boat Rockerz 👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼

name: Sabarivasan S K
title: Good but not the best!
content: I bought this after searching many Bluetooth wireless earphones.. Here is my review after using this product for one week with my OnePlus 6T.. Pros. -Battery life is good compared to other earphones.. -Bass is good. -Light weight even u can't feel it's around your neck. -Noice cancellation is awesome. Cons. -Faced some issues in connectivity when mobile is in my trouser pockets(When holding mobile in hand,no issues at all). -Running with mobile in trousers also shows some interruption in hearing. -Sometimes I hear unwanted noice (I think there is compatibility issues with OnePlus 6T and other devices too). -Battery charge is always showing 100% in 6T. -Bass is good but I feel too noisy. -The voice on connection and disconnection is weird. If you are looking for wireless earphones under 1500,it is the best among the all! You can't get all the best features in this price range. So go for it!

name: radha reddy dandu
title: Perfect for music
content: The product design is really good, comfortable, lightweight. The color combination is perfect for the unisex collection. I picked a red and black combination. The noise cancellation for the call is good but not up to the mark. The biggest drawback I felt was I could not connect to my laptop via Bluetooth plus you cannot take calls from the headset. the buttons are to control the volume and play and pause the call.

name: Rupam Choudhury
title: Nice Bluetooth earphone
content: I was using boat 255 then I upgraded to Boat 255 pro. It has good battery and latest bluetooth version. I use it to connect with my mobile and laptop. I bought during sale and got the red color but I dont like the red color (red color was the only color available at 1099/-. Apart from red color other colors are good. Choice is urs but working perfect . Sound / Battery / connectivity is good.

name: Aman Sengar
title: HORRIBLE
content: The product purchased was working fine, but after a month only one side of the headphone started malfunctioning. Although the product is covered under 01 years warranty, No one is responding to the complaints. Customer care number is not working, emails are not getting replied, online complaint status is on progress mode since past 10-15 days.

name: Hetansh Shah
title: Don't buy
content: Overall the experience was sort of okayish till first 3 months. After that one side of the earphone started having problem. Sound is very uneven. One side the volume is high and the other side, volume is quite low compared to first side. This just spoils the mood. Also there is a great lag in sound. This might be due to Bluetooth again.

name: siddesh palaskar
title: Bad product and brand
content: Headphone's sound quality was fine. But it stopped charging In April that's just after 5 months into the use. I couldn't replace it due to lockdown. Now I have sent it for manufacturer's warranty. It took 12 days to reach service center( Aurangabad to Mumbai it's hardly 320 km), now it has been 4 days, its lying in service center with no update. You guys deserve 0 stars. If I dont get any update in next 2-3 days I'm going to consumer forum. Bad product and service. Don't use it.

name: Sid
title: Proper bass heads and best buy at this budget. Sound quality is good too but not the best.
content: The earphones are the best bassheads you can find at such a low budget. Sometimes the bass is so much that the sound quality is compromised. You literally can't listen at max volume on both you phone and earphones. The controls however are very friendly and also the earphones are pretty light weight. Connection issues haven't yet ever surfaced and it's been 4 weeks I am using the earphones and also 2 devices can connect simultaneously.

name: Gurunath Ramamoorthy
title: Awesome product
content: Been using this for a year now and it's very good in terms of sound quality,bass and noise cancellation and battery back up...I use it for gym workout so once charged lasts for about 5 to 6 hours...Fits well in my ears .however it depends on your inner ear shape, as the same was not holding in place when my girlfriend used it . It does not fall while doing my skippings or my jumpings...it's dangerous to use this product outdoors for running or while driving as the outside noise is totally cut.

name: Suman
title: I am using this since 4 day some time create problem. I feel cheet just like flipcard.... 👎😬☹️
content: I am using this since 4 day hear some time create problem. For example "I used it 3 hours continuously then ear phone show 40 % battery but it was not working... I changed it after 15 min its battery show 80% again I use wish my Samsung galaxy phone within 5 min battery show 40%. So I don't recommend it. I feel cheet just like flipcard".... 👎😬☹️

name: Kiran Shivanagutti
title: Worst and fucking customer service.
content: Worst experience. After purchasing of 6 months one side ear phone not working and placed for return the boat company. They have picked up the item but not returned still even after 30 days. Very worst experience after using it for 6 months. My friends also has same complaint. Plz don't buy. The photo is uploaded of replaced ear phones. I have waited for more than 30 days for a small replacement. How can someone wait for so many days. The customer service shall be quick wen u have pblm. Plz don't ever buy this.

name: Ajay
title: Dont Buy This Product, last for just 4-5 months and customer service BAKBAS
content: I dont recommend u to buy this product. My reviews are 100% helpful as I purchased the product last year.. Good things:. 1. On sale, u will get this product for 999/-. 2. The sound is good, base is good with this price range. 3. Bluetooth is perfect. 4. Battery backup is almost 3 hours. But why I am not recommending u to buy this, here are reasons. 1. Its durability is just 4 to 5 months. After 4 to 5 months one or both side earphone stop working. 2. It holds 1 year warranty but if u want to claim ur warranty, it is tedious process. They pick up ur headphone, but they didnt give it back within 1 month. They take more than a month to give back ur headphone. Furthermore, U need to call them a number of time for getting ur product back. Also, they are very rude to talk with us. They give u the product back only if u call them again and again, if not forget about the headphone.. Personal experience:. My one side speaker stop working after 5 months, then i request them for a warranty. They collect my headphone, but they took abot 1.5 months to return and this is even when I call them again and again. When I got the new headphone, they again last for just 3 months and now they are not working. Me and my friend ordered this product, my friend's headphone last for 6 months and then stop working, he claimed for the warranty but so far he didnt get the product back even after 4 to 5 months, they are not picking up the phone

name: Manas Phadke
title: Real value for money
content: These are the first wireless earphones I'm using after using normal earphones for several years. I'm extremely impressed with the sound quality and also how comfortable they are even if you are someone like me who listens to podcasts or music for several hours at a stretch. I had to change the earbuds to the smallest size from the standard size that are part of the package. Bluetooth connectivity is great since I've used them with my mobile as well as TV and PC (using a transmitter) and never faced any issues or disturbance. Battery life is also pretty good around 5-6 hours and charging barely takes an hour. The sound is crystal clear and for the price its available at it is real value for money.

name: Sam
title: Neckband with codeless Mic
content: I am searching for a Neckband especially with a good Mic for this I tried many of the items but disappointment with the mic.. After a long search of budgeted Neckband, I found this Nirvana from boAt Rockerz 255 Pro. Great product and I am writing this review after using it for one week. I am fully satisfied and suggest that people to go on with this model.

name: Shanaya
title: Descent sound quality but tampered packing
content: First of all I was pretty pissed off with the kind of packaging that I received. It was tampered. So I exchanged it, but again got the same packet, with the same s.no. Seems like there was nothing wrong with the earphones. But still I was expecting a brand new packing and products. Hope Amazon would look into it.. Coming to the earphones,I have used multiple products including JBL, air pod, sennheiser and now this. Sound quality is great, and noise cancellation is also fine to an extent. But its bass is not so great. It doesn't give the kind of bass and boom that you get in sennheiser. Also, the Bluetooth range seems pretty low. When I moved from one room to another there was a minor disconnect in the music and then it resumed.. My verdict: If you are getting it on discount price only then go for it. Otherwise you can get better earphones in such range ( not Bluetooth ones)

name: Arup
title: Good built and performance for its price
content: I have received the product just yesterday and this feedback is based on one day usage. For this price point, it is a well-performing device. Earpieces fit well in the ear. One and half hours of continuous use did not cause pain. Build quality seems fine and wires are sturdy. Buttons are tactile enough and easy to operate. Connectivity seems fine. Voice through mic is also okay.. Pros:. Good Bass.. Build quality quite satisfactory.. Loud enough sound.. Lightweight and comfortable for prolonged use.. Cons:. Magnet seemed weak. Earpieces fell apart twice in one day.. Mid-tones are on a lower side. Treble OK. All emphasis is given on building bass.

name: Shashank Sapre
title: Good at first but now I'm facing connectivity issues
content: Let's get the initial review out of the way.. Package arrived on time and packing was good as usual.. I've been using these for almost 2 months now. The sound quality is good.. For the past few weeks I'm facing connectivity issues. I tried using different phones but had the same problem. The headphones keep disconnecting at random moments when I'm on call with someone. Either a normal voice call or VOIP like whatsapp. However, this doesn't happen while listening to music.

name: Jayant k.
title: Stay away from boat.
content: Absolutely inferior earphones. Boat couldn't provide sound quality, so, they provided an irritating bass so, you wouldn't notice the bad sound. I returned these and bought the OnePlus bullets wireless z instead. They are much better. If you want your ears to survive please buy a sony or Sennheiser or something. Stay away from boat.

name: vishwanath
title: Manufacturing defect, No quality check?! "Avg earphones"
content: Manufacturing defect in charging cable.. No quality check in BoAt I believe.. Earphones looks average.. Sound quality average.. Slips out of ear every now and then.. The extra horn given doesn't fits in ear properly.. Pain in ear after using for a while.. Cable quality looks OK, will come ro know about durability only after using for long time.. Can only be connected to one device (Bluetooth veraion 4.0). Dont get fooled by graphical images with Bollywood models. The real looks are totally different than the graphical images.. An average earphone at budget to have the feeling of owning a blootooth earphones.

name: Likhith Vaddi
title: Awesome under care
content: Flawless quality output but only until water went inside drivers. Tried to blow with hair dryer but drivers were damaged. So it's waterproof only if both the drivers are closed i.e. in your ears. Tried for warranty claim but boat team didn't respond to my email. The service center location in website is wrong. So it's ruined now

name: Amazon Customer
title: Avg product, need lot of improvements
content: Product is just 2 rating, audio quality is avg, not that great. dnt mislead with reviews. It avg product. The plastic used for button areas is so cheap. Boat should spend money on quality improvement than advertising n band ambassador payment.

name: arun
title: After 1.5 year of usage. 5star to 3 star rating.
content: Cons: Lost sound on one ear bud after 8 months. 4 no after that the other one died. Now it just works as a Bluetooth receiver!!!. Life Span: 1 year. If your looking for a long lasting one better spent 3k and go for Sony xb wireless or Samsung level u.. Pros: Bass as promised. Water resistant as promised. If you're looking for a Bluetooth headset below 1000 go for it.. Can be used for sports activities as it sticks on the ear with the ear bud design.. Good for sport lovers.

name: Sona Francis
title: Sound quality is good. But waste as the wireless connectivity function not working properly.
content: While wifi is connected, making video call over WhatsApp showing "poor connection . Video paused" error and frequently this happens. I bought this wireless headset mainly for video calling.. Since it is creating the problem, my rating is a big zero. I recommend any other branded affordable headsets instead of this

name: Aditi Prabhudesai
title: Good product by Boat!
content: Nice product at INR 999. Noise cancellation is really good. Great bass. The only thing is, once you've it connected, if you change the volume using buttons on the earphones or via mobile, it pops a sound every time. It becomes annoying then. For phone calls and video calls, the other person can hear you properly. The quality of sound is not at all compromised on call. If you are going to be on a call for long time, I'd suggest to keep the volume low. At higher volume I got a headache after a while. Do go for it for daily use like listening to music/podcasts or frequent calls.

name: Cipher__
title: Perfect sound
content: The sound quality with BOAt is excellent, no doubt there. But this particular product was very uncomfortable for me to wear even for small durations of less than 5 mins. The smaller covers were either so small that they slipped. and the regular ones which came fitted were plain uncomfortable for me.

name: Ved Gehlot
title: Communication problems with the phone
content: The sound was good. But they are indeed wastage of money. The earphones did work well for some days when I purchased, but they started making trouble soon. They will automatically get disconnected from your phone once you commence playing any multimedia or audio, and it has been the problem for long now. And because of that, it also irritates you with voice "disconnected" or "your device is ready to pair". And these voice recordings' volume is always high, doesn't matter what you have adjusted. I regret I wasted my money on such useless stuff. It is so irritating when you want to listen to your music and it irritates you just because of a silly communication issue. And yes I have checked my phone. It's Bluetooth is working fine.

name: Prem Prakash Sharma
title: Original Review after using one month.
content: Looks very beautiful. Sound quality is good. Fits best in ears. Noise cancellation is upto the mark. Battery backup is also at satisfactory level. I'm using it since last month. Feeling some easiness with this. Inward/outward calls control is super. One drawback is that at long run it creates pain in ears. Hope Makers should improve it. All over it is a good product 😊.

name: Adarsh
title: Awesome , I like it.
content: Very very awesome gadget I have been purchased . I like it . It is a very good true wireless Headset with Google assistance or siri. You all should buy it. It price is very less during the Amazon sales . I like it very much . Thanks Amazon for such wonderfully gift 🎁. Thus its brand name , tag was awesome and clear sound is Been heard . You should all buy it if when necessary (Without any problems).

name: ajay kumar
title: Excellent
content: I was sceptical about the product when I ordered it , that's being honest. I had come across it several times earlier when I had bought my previous headphones. This time thanks to Amazon product placement, it was in my face and going by the description and certain reviews, I made the choice trusting Amazon and Leaf. They both lived up to their word and I am satisfied with my headphones. Had it charged and used it to find that the sound quality and clearity is very good through my phone. More than what I was expecting and I am sure it will sound better once I test it through my pc and music system where I can adjust the quality through a equalizer and amp. Overall a great product, great for my phone. Sure recommend it to all and the price is good too.

name: Amazon Customer
title: WORST PRODUCT EVER 👇👇
content: Worst HEADPHONE EVER I ORDER THEM 3 TIMES AND I RETURNED ALL OF THEM. THE FIRST TIME I ORDERED THEIR WAS A BUZZ IN ANY OF THE AUDIO I PLAYED SO THEN I THOUGHT THAT IT WAS A DEFECTIVE PICE SO I RETURNED IT .. THE SECOND TIME I ORDERED THE SAME PROBLEM HAPPENED THEN ALSO I THOUGHT THAT IT WAS A DEFECTIVE PICE SO I PLACED IT FOR REPLACEMENT .. THE THIRD ONE WAS A REPLACEMENT ONE AND THE SAME PROBLEM HAPPENED SO NOW I WAS DAMN SURE THESE HEADPHONE SERIES HAD FULL DEFECTS .. MY HUMBELS REQUEST IS PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. AND BOAT COMPANY IS READING THIS REVIEW PLEASE SOLVE THIS PROBLEM .. ** D O. N O T. B U Y. T H I S. P R O D U C T. **. 🙏🙏🙏🙏

name: Sai abhishek
title: Item isn't worth of  ₹1400.
content: It's been less than 40 days that I'm using this and to be home this is not something you should go for, complete waste of money.. - it never gets fully charged. - only gives a backup of 6 hours while listening songs on mid volume. - once the battery low alert starts it jusr shuts down within 2 more mins of play. - cheaply made and has no strong wire that connects the two ear phones or earbuds and can be bend with the flow of air.. - If not used for 2-3 hours despite of full charge (90%) it goes down to 60%.

name: Sombodhi Ghosh
title: Terrible product
content: The product is terrible.. bluetooth connectivity with phone is horrible, so can't use for calls. normal usage for music etc is okayish. The charging wire provided stopped functioning after 3/4 days. Sound quality is reasonable, it does have decent bass when it works, which is rare. When connecting to laptop or tab, one ear sound is louder but this doesn't happen on mobile. This is the second time I brought boat rockers and both products were terrible. I only bought it bcoz of lockdown and this was the only product Amazon was delivering quickly. Now I regret doing so. No headphone is better than this product.

name: Arka Pratim Samajdwar
title: Good support by Amazon. Bad product.
content: I expected this product to be excellent. Two of my colleagues use the same model and have good things to say about it. So when I saw this product on a great discounted price I bought it at once.. But unfortunately my experience was no where as good. It started well. Sound quality was okay for me as I am not an audiophile. But mic failed in 5 days.. Raised a replacement request. Received one in less than 48 hours. Great. But this one didn't even run for 2 days. It started with a Bluetooth connection troube with my phone. Connected finally after charging for some time and then few restart of the earphone. Then the next day it started disconnecting and shutting down automatically. When I switch it on again, it's at 100% battery. And the next day, it refused to start at all. Had to return the product.. Thanks to Amazon for handling the return well. May be it was just my bad luck. But I won't recommend this to anyone.

name: Monil Gandhi
title: Fantastic in the price range
content: Best bluetooth headfones in the price range. i bought it under lightning deal @ 999/- However, I would have even paid the full MRP for this one. Everything namely connectivity, sound quality, noice cancellation, built quality, sweat resistance, responsiveness to the buttons, etc.. is awesome about these headphones. You cannot have the same qualities in any other brand in this price range.

name: Radha M De
title: DONT BUY..BAD QUALITY
content: these are really bad ones.... Stopped connecting after few days... Dont buy.. Quality of sound aint that good as well..

name: Gaurav
title: only buy if your are a base lover(read below for cons)
content: the headsets are comfy and the design is sleek regarding sound the headsets handels most of the back gound instruments just fine not great just fine the base is so much that it interferes with the voice of the vocalist the sounds gets suppressed while the base is just loud the voice also cracks sometimes if you listen closely overall not for everyone but great buy.. Edit this one con is bugging me after a month n half of usage i have been travelling in local train in mumbai for almost 4 years and this is not for those who travel in the morning in rush hours there are bunch of people sourrended you in the meanwhile the earphone stops working the voice starts to crackle and the earphone gets disconnected this happens daily in rush hours this irritates me a lot and another thing is battery jumps from 60 to 20 percent where is 40 percent and battery backup is max 4 hours n half min 4 hours

name: Sreekuttan Unnithan
title: I'm using this for the past 6 months. Here is my opinion on this product.
content: I'm using this for the past 6 months. This headset is overall nice.. What I like:. 1) Sound quality is good.. 2) Bass is good.. 3) Good in looks.. 4) light weight.. 5) It is a nice one in this price range. (I bought it for 1499rs and now the price is just 999rs).. But there are some things I didn't like.. They are:. 1) Mike is very bad. The person to whoom I am talking with, always complains about the noise. Even small sounds from the surroundings feels iritating to the person on the other side.. 2) Battery is not bad. But, when it has become 60%, it suddenly starts falling to 0%.. 3) At few times, I had connectivity issues.. Overall, Ignoring these problems, this one is a nice buy.

name: Tigersmubs
title: Please it's a request don't buy this. You will waste your money
content: I am writing this review because I had been using my boAt rockerz 255 for almost a year and hence I thought this one would b more better. However to my utmost disappointment I regret buying this one. Firstly the range is too low. I mean only a couple of distance and the thing looses it's connectivity. Secondly when I'm on call the opposite person finds my sound too low or at times can't even hear me. Battery life is ok. Sound is good. Bass is good. But I didn't expect this low quality from boAt. I should've bought my old model only. It was amazing with sound n battery and range and noise cancellation and everything.. Utter waste to money and disappointed

name: KhushDan
title: For 999, This is a good deal
content: This earphones are recommended when they are available under Rs999. They dont stay in my ear when i go running as the weight of the band pulls it down. I recommend Boat 261 or Chkokko M2. If you want to use it while walking or office then it's good and does the job. Microphone quality is decent and performs normally in silent enviroments however won't cancel much noise when you're in a crowded place

name: Prakash Singh
title: It's been 3 days only . I will edit it after 3 months but for now
content: INR 999 seriously it's great deal .. I use it for study purpose and also for music. I'm quite versatile for my music preference I love hip hop , Rap , EDM and on the same time gazal, Sufi songs so my experience with it is amazing like it knows when to use excess bass and when to not .. I connect my laptop and mobile with it at same time and it's switch mechanism is great feels like AI built in or something. Double click middle button to call last person you called feature is really helpful.. Battery life is also satisfactory I had used about 13 - 14 hours in single charge about 3 hours of video lecture on laptop and about 3 hours of music on mobile and about 1.5 hours on calls and rest on stand by mode.. So for now its worth of buying .

name: Rocky
title: Good
content: Sound quality is good but not excellent. Noise cancellation is very bad. On call other party can hear alot of surrounding noise along with our voice. Very irritating for other party. Bass is good. Sometimes face issue with Bluetooth connectivity.

name: Divyaraj Meshram
title: Worst Warranty Service by boat (& surprisingly Redgear too, they both share the same service portal)
content: BOAT Service Centre takes like forever to replace your defected product under warranty, They will pick up your product and will take a month to 'process your request', you will only be updated of the status until it goes to their service team, after that, you can just forget you ever had a boat earphones, it's actually better that way why waste your time attempting to contact them and constantly worry about the earphones that don't even last 4-5 months. Rather go for Sennheiser or some other trusted brands whose products actually last long and even if somehow the product fails the company will not abandon you with your defected product under warranty.

name: Tanmoy
title: Good product but value for money depends on offer
content: I am the first time boat user. Compared to jbl bass is better but the clarity and voice punch is not that great. Giving full volume bass is ok but the sound turned to become distored and noisy, not that great experience in high volume. According to the price from other headphones it is value for money but the price is very high without offer but with offer it becomes value for money.

name: Dilip
title: Worst ever after sell service
content: NOW, I'm editing my review,. Product is good but they are worst in providing warranty service, i raised complaint for warranty and they took almost 1 month of time to get replaced my earphones. When we get in habit of use of this product then we can't live without this earphones in daily routine, and their customer service doesn't feel it, they took 1 month of time for replacement, worst ever service after sale.

name: Ankur Parekh
title: excellent service.
content: I am writing this review after using it for now 9months. Had no intention to write as I believed it to be a normal good buy. The product since the beginning was perfectly working and was of worth the money I spend according to my budget. I am a constant user of headphones and hence in normal conditions both the earplugs got stopped working recently. With the help of my amazon bill details I requested the company for replacement, trust me I got the best service and got it replaced within time. I really felt nice that the supplier kept their promise of warranty and hence I would surely recommend this supplier for buying new things from them. Thank you Boat rockers, u guys are very very genuine and efficient.

name: Amit Kumar
title: Reviewing after 4 months of use.
content: Evrything is good about this product. Sound quality, Bass, bluetooth connectivity, battery backup-approx 6 hrs. Charging time is about 1 hr to 1.30 hrs. Only issue is for calling u can use this only at a peaceful nd quite place otherwise the other person will not be able to hear ur voice clear.

name: sahith akeel
title: A best bass Bluetooth earphones in this price range
content: This is my honest review.It's a wonderful Bluetooth headset in this price range. It has a good sound quality and bam booom bass.As a bass lover I am really impressed with this headsets. I play some songs like whatever it takes and old town road the bass and sound quality fully satisfied me. The pros of this headsets are it has a long battery life compared to the other Bluetooth earphones in this budget @1200,it has a comfortable fit in ears,less weight and the cons are it has a poor range. At the specs they said it has 10 m range but that's not true. In a open place like terrace, the music is interrupted when you walk away from the mobile. The range is nearly 5to7 metres. That's it. If u consider this is not a big problem. Then the headsets are absolutely fine to me. I love it very much.

name: Ish singh
title: Doesnt fit { full reveiew down)
content: Ok this a honest reveiew i suggest to pls listen to me and if u dont u will regret first of all sound quality is fine (distortion at high level) prefer realme neckband very gud audio. 2. Bass : bass is gud not so much deep bass nut good. 3. The main thing is due to which i m writing this is that the EarpHone doesnt fit in ear i am honestly saying it wont just fit in ur ear ..... Earbuds are hard very hard no small eartips z ear support doesnt help at all prefer realme neckband just bass is less in realme everything else is fine ...... There was only replacement when i was trying to return item but amazon helped and understanded my concern and help me to return it amazon is just love 🙂

name: Bhaarat s.
title: Amazing... Got what I wanted
content: Yes !! Quality is there..... I was concerned about the sound but it is way up to the expectations... Treble is a bit low (marginally low) but the Bass n overall sound quality is been exellent... Happy with the battery backup as well... Charge once n use for straight 6-7 hours at high Volume....

name: Elvis DSouza
title: DONT WASTE UR MONEY BUYING THIS!
content: There r sooo many reviews saying tht this is a good product,highly recommended,etc .But the reality is tht this is an 'AVERAGED QUALITY' product. There r many other companies tht provide much better quality than this. Mine earphones stopped functioning in less than 3 months of usage! And yes it has one year warranty and all but the CUSTOMER SERVICE IS HORRIBLE! It will take almost a month to replace the product(or more if u dont bug them by calling them everyday!!!). I didn't expect this BoAt & I'm very disappointed.

name: Arindam Sharma Roy
title: Great for music, atrocious for phone calls, just not worth the price
content: It is very good for listening to music and podcasts and provides good sound quality. If you are travelling on a two wheeler, the mobile has to be kept on your side pockets or your shirt pocket. If you keep it in your back pocket, the sound will keep breaking.. The earphones are however absolutely horrible for phonecalls and just not built for that purpose. 60-70% of the time, either you cannot hear the other party or they won't be able to hear you.

name: ASHISH RANJAN
title: Battery backup 4 hour and sound quality is not upto the mark ..as bass is not good.
content: Its been 10 days ...since day one it get charged in 20 min and discharged within 4 hour only..As boat 255pro claim for 6 hour batter backup but couldn't reach upto the mark.. Sound quality is quite good ..u can't expect bass from this model of boat ..For good quality of sound u should search above 2000 rupees product...of reputed brand... Overall Not recommended for them who use earphone for long time..not for student who study online.

name: Angad
title: Bluetooth connectivity is the biggest letdown
content: Like many others have already written about it, the Bluetooth connectivity of this piece is embarrassing. You cannot stick your phone in your pocket or a bag and expect your songs to play without a glitch. The connectivity is really that bad. Boat needs to take this earphones off the market and fix the issue. Seriously

name: Aditya
title: Keeps getting disconnected frequently
content: The headsets gets disconnected frequently even when a song is playing. Then gets reconnected again by itself. Sometimes you have to restart the headsets to make connection again. Happens both on mobile as well as with laptop. Will not recommend to buy for this price. Color (teal green) is very good and the sound quality is fine.

name: Rammohan
title: I feeling Like I was Cheated!!!!
content: Exactly after a Week of Last day of Return, the Product Started malfunctioning. It Does not get switched on without plugging to a power source (Some times). Automatically, the Volume is getting reduced and Increased, Automatically the Songs getting Paused and Changed in the middle.. (No touch required at all....). Mic also Not working properly. I have checked this with Other Mobile also , and got the same results.Full time u can hear the Sound of Some one Pressing the volume Button.. Beep Beep beep.. I want to Return or Replacement. Very bad Experience.

name: Manoj Singh
title: Low cost but high value
content: One of the best boAt earphones. I have been using boAt for two years and I found their services to be very very impressive. The audio quality is very good. The music feels amazing. Bass is also good compared to other boAt products.. However, one problem is that there is latency in audio while you are playing a game. I played PUBG using these earphones and there was a mismatch between audio and the action performed in the game. If you are a gaming freak and plays a lot of game such as PUBG, Asphalt, COD, or any other game where audio is everything then don't buy bluetooth devices. Go for wired one, they will perform far better. Hope you will find this review helpful!

name: Praveen
title: Bluetooth Connection Problem while playing songs.
content: I have been using this headset for 4 months, here is my review:. Sound quality - Excellent. Noice cancelation - Good. Comfortable - Ear bud not comfortable as it creates pain in ear.. Connectivity - Bad (Beginning it was ok but in long usage am facing too much of connectivity problems.. Battery backup: Good.. Bluetooth Distance: For Short distance it is good like around 7-8 meters. Overall comment: Need to improve in connectivity issues and ear bud model. Ear bud can be adjustable but disconnect problem has to be focused.

name: Swami
title: Pathetic customer service, no response
content: I bought this earphones in Sep 2019, it was working decent and started failing recently. I called the service center in Chennai, Cell tech, pathetic service and response was even worse, its like they dont even want to answer you. Would I buy or suggest anyone to buy this, never in my life, not just this, will never buy any product from Boat brand.

name: The Rational Consumer
title: Setting Your Expectations Right
content: At Rs.1499, there are few areas that boAt delivers and largely others where it doesn't. Noise cancellation and bass are it's highlights while you might have to compromise with the poor build quality, sub-par sound clarity and battery life.. With 1 week's experience and daily usage I have come to find:. 1. The battery doesn't support more than 3-4 hours of playtime, even at 70% volume.. 2. Great bass which might sometimes overshadow the mid and high tones.. 3. One of the earbuds has stopped working for which I have ordered a replacement and will post an update on the same.. @Amazon/Appario: Excellent all-round experience from order placement to delivery to replacement initiation.

name: Ramesh
title: Sound/Bass is very good. Design not good. Falls off your ear
content: +ves. Works very good for Bass. Sound is a bit low but still okay. Very clear sound. No disturbance at all.. -ves. The one I didn’t like is the design. It doesn’t fir in your ears properly. It keeps falling down from your ear. The rubber grip doesn’t hold the earphone in your ear. Should definitely be redesigned. Also the soft part of the wire is little long and looks weird when wearing.

name: Nausheer
title: Good buy at an affordable price
content: I was looking for a pair of bluetooth earphones to use during my gym workouts and I found these for Rs. 999 during a sale event. Here's my review after 1 week of using this product -. Pros:. 1) Excellent bass quality. You'll love these earphones if you are a bass lover.. 2) The earphones are lightweight and the magnetic tip makes it easy to carry around neck. I find them really convenient to use at the gym. 3) Good noise cancellation & sweat resistant.. Cons:. Battery life - boAt claims a battery life of 6 hours but these run out much before that. It shuts down even though my phone displays 20% battery left. Ear pain - The ear buds are not the most comfortable pair you can find. My ears start hurting after prolonged usage. Mic - The voice quality is not that great and not preferred for taking calls.. Overall it's a good buy for the price range.

name: Shubham
title: Most useful review
content: It’s gonna be a long review!. First everything that’s mentioned in the feature is nonsense. The product is absolute worthless. Used for just 4 months and both side stopped working. Thought it’s in warranty let’s get it replaced then I registered a complaint on 27feb2020 no response till 19june then asked customer care who i think is a single person attending calls from his personal phone and turns his phone off according to his mood says please register the complaint again which i did on 22 june and it’s 25 june. The funny part is i tried to call the customer support guy it rang and what i know next is that his number is again turned off! This happened twice.. Fellows please do not but any product from this company until you want get suffered the same as me.

name: Roshan D.
title: Better than the older one.
content: OK. I had bought this same model 2 yrs before and this model is sooo different from the old one. The battery actually lasts longer for this one. I know coz I had used it for two days and both days I used it a lot. And also the phone is showing the correct charge percentile now. For the older model, the earphones would shut down at 50%. And sometimes it was irritating too. Also I think the Bluetooth module has been upgraded because this model has got quite good range which I didn't get in the older model. Overall, I really like this current model now.

name: TanBan
title: Hassle-free use
content: These are my first Bluetooth headphones. It was easy to connect. The sound clarity is not bad, but a little muffled, I feel. But since I bought it at 1k, I think it was a steal. It comes with 1yr warranty as well. Overall, a good buy. Unlike the neon green variant as I like the pop of colour.

name: Alok Kumar
title: Battery Disappoints
content: Everything is good with this product but only battery Disappoints you. I changed this 3 times thinking it would be battery problem with 1or 2 product but it same was with all.. It cannot work for even for 6 hours. But sound quality is superb.. For sound 5/5. Battery 2/5. Fit 5/5

name: Vinoth
title: Highly recommended and worth for money
content: Head phone is really nice to use.. Writing a review after using it for a week.. Sound quality is good. Very easy to use.. Call quality is also nice. I'm using it for taking long calls and listening music.. It fulfil the purpose. Battery life is good and easy to charge.. This product is good for those who look for good blue tooth headset with decent cost. No cons as such.. Even the ear bud n model is good to use..

name: praveen
title: Superb product worth of money ......
content: Very very good product interms of quality and futures. I have been using since 6 months allmost , I used like anything ,those who are looking for best one this is the product .. Quality is very good. Futures are very good. There is no echo voice .. Over-all build quality is owsome .

name: Ashish Hemant Jog
title: Quite Good, but many more scope for improvement on sound and overall quality.
content: Review after 2 Months of usage :. I have never used branded earphones , so I was expecting the performance of this earphones to be decent in all aspects.. Some Cons first :. 1. The neckband material is complete plastic and kinda hurts my back neck when I wore it directly on neck.. 2. Whenever I am walking somewhat faster , and if my phone (Moto E4 Plus) is in pocket , the connectuvity abrupts some times.. 3. Claiming warranty is tedious , it should have been more easier e.g. just by scanning an QR code or so.. 4. The bass is okayish , not the best not bad.. 5. The snapdragon chip used in this earphones claims to connect two devices simultaneously (Scatternet) but there are no clear instructions on how to do it.. 6. Just few days ago I have experienced that after connection and in working normal condition, the sound from ear buds stops abruptly , and kind of weird click sound comes and even after reconnecting same issue remains.. 7. My voice while in call is not really clear , I have to repeat my words while on mic.. And here are the pros that I found :. 1. Battery is quite good , daily I use it for around 2 hours and I charge them once or twice a week, I literally never ran out of battery.. 2. This earphones seems to have water resistance, few days ago, one of my earbud dipped into water , fortunately earphones just working fine.

name: Vijay bochaliya
title: Quality and battery backup of product is very bad
content: It has not much quality which is mentioned in this and also the battery backup is also very poor which is less than 2 hours which is very bad for this. the battery percentage abruptly come down from 100 to 40 then it become zero. Yeah, it did very disappointed to me. So overall , the product is not good that much I have heard about it. I don't know it happened with me or every customer could be disappoints by this.

name: Madhan raaj
title: Perfectly good
content: Boat rockerz 255 pro is really awesome to buy for hearing songs and watching movies.But, for gaming I won't recommend it because of short time lapse(0.25secs).. And it gives bass and sound quality.And when connecting to 2 devices it is not that much good and noise cancellation is too good so, a busy man will surely be benifited.And connectivity lasts for 10m distance when it is without any intruptions such as walls etc.And, the main thing I want to convey is it is worth for Rs.1050.But,if this product goes for Rs.1500+ then you can move to any other neckbands........THANK YOU!!!!!

name: Tyson Paul
title: Not upto the mark, DO NOT BUY
content: Hi guys, i brought it for 1500/-+ with lot of trust for my OnePlus Nord but right now am totally disappointed for folowing reasons:. Cons:. 1. I hear the opposition persons voice as a ROBOTIC Voice even after full charge and strong connectivity. 2. Bass is not upto the mark(definitley NOT for bass lovers like me). 3. Disconnection issues. Pros:. 1. Battery backup is good. 2. quality is good. 3. Give you nice information while ON/OFF and disconnects automatically when not in use !!(Hope every other wireless does it though)

name: Ravi Rawat
title: Not worth
content: Do not buy this. Go for zebronics journy instead. That is much more value for money product. There are three cons as per my usage:. When to turn on this bluetooth it will connect with all the mobile devices it was paired earlier. So u r listening two diffrent songs from two phones inthe same headphone at the same time.... Second it has three buttons n two humps on both side of buttons. So if u are using this headphone on bike ride, which i do n u r wearing gloves. U will end up pressing wrong button.. Third it created problem with samsung phone as it was not appearing in the available devices.... Though sound quality of this headphone is very good..

name: Sagar
title: A budget all-rounder by boAt
content: I have been using boAt wireless headphones since two years they have never disappointed me.. This is my 3rs boat wireless headphones but i must say this one impressed me alot according to the price segment (Rs 999),it's doing a perfect job of delivering good quality of sound.. Regarding the battery life its is 6hrs, but its quite Ok since i have purchased it for 999rs only i can't expect much from it.. Coming to sound quality it has a bit more bass, the bass is more than treble but not a problem for those who love high bass.. Overall sound quality is more than good in this price segment.. The build quality is not that high quality but yes it is sturdy enough to withstand normal drops.. Acording to me the length of cord is too lengthy.. One thing i dint like about boaAt is connectivity range, the range of connectivity for this is less than 10m,but again budget matters. Given a thought i had paid only 999rs,i am very much satisfied with overall performance. Regarding service center, the customers leaving in Mumbai has added advantage as i had.. My previous boat rockerz 275 one earpieces suddenly stopped so i visited the service center in Goregaon and they replaced my headphones with new in just 5 minutes without any questions asked.. So customers in Mumbai don't worry about the warranty.

name: Thomas Alfred
title: Better than OnePlus go for it
content: For the price, its just awesome. I had initially bought Onepluse bullet wireless but replaced it with this as rhe one plus had issues when taking calls(it's an on going tech issue). Boat wireless head band works like a charm for listening to music, vidoes and taking internet and regular calls.

name: ANJANA JYOTHY
title: Okay Product
content: It’s good. Clear sound, Deep bass, fits well in the ear, has decent battery life. If you expect it to look premium, you will be disappointed. I find it just okay. The wire looks delicate and one might damage it if not used with care. It’s a rubber coated u bend and buttons are also coated. Felt the blue tooth connection a bit unreliable and I have often felt it to crash if your phone is kept in your trouser pocket. Connecting it to any device is easy and super quick and with no obstruction, it works fine.. Overall it’s okey for the price I paid (899₹).

name: The Reviewer
title: Damaged within 2 weeks
content: Sound quality is not as expected. One side of the product stopped working within 2 weeks of normal usage. Did not expect this quality for boAt

name: Vinay
title: Vinay
content: Delivery service is worst. I was waiting for my order since morning as it was to deliver on Wednesday for God sake I didnot receive any call, when I checked in the app it showed me product is out for delivery. I tried to call the Amazon delivery number since morning, call rings n get disconnected. It was 7 in the evening, I called the number again call connected n delivery guy stated he will come in 2 hours. I was angry like anything, is that a tym to deliver the product ? I said to him I need the product urgently as I had to go out, however it got delivered at 8.30.. Coming to the product it is good for the people who are looking for Bass. We cannot hear the words clearly, Bass is too high some times and it blocks ur ears completely cannot hear the sounds around you. Felt dangerous while driving n other situations. Battery will last upto 6 to 7 hrs when fully charged. However I bought it at discount for 899/- it is good at this price range.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Left headphone stopped working
content: after using it for five months, left side of the headphone stopped working.. Sound quality is good, but the sound is not up to the mark. Noise Cancellation is bad, person on other side cannot hear our voice properly even if there was a small disturbance. and last but not the least, the service center for boat in Hyderabad is located in only one place and it is approximately 25kms from where im staying, it will take 2 hrs for me to go there in traffic and have to deal with them and may be after whole day i have to spent their to get it fixed. Basically what im trying to say here is, service is bad.

name: Priyanshu mittal
title: All you need to know about the product
content: This product is definitely one of the best in its range. It has the best bass quality in its range , comes with a year warranty although after some use you may find its sound a bit less , otherwise no issue and easy repair/replace by the company for malfunctioning product saying this with experience bcoz the first ones delivered to me started malfunctioning after some use but after filling a complaint with the company it was resolved they replaced my unit with another one but took like a moth in the process which to some extent is considerable as it was a door to door service

name: Saksham Pruthi
title: OK for the price
content: The headphones are definitely build to last. They have metal heads. There are different size of ear tips which is great. The magnet in the heads is also great and strong. They are comfortable to wear in long durations. Sound-. The sound is not so great but considering the price i would say its ok-ish. The bass is enhanced and produces a thumping effect. That's it. The mid and lows have are not at all clear and get drowned due to the enhanced bass.. Bluetooth range is good and since they are in ear types so they do provide a good seal cutting major sounds around you .. Call quality is again OK-ish. They are a no go for an audiophile or some one who listens to mellow songs. Go for them only if you are tight on budget ( got it for ₹999/- ) and are ready to compromise other tones for the bass

name: Namrita
title: Nice Ear phone at cost of 1099
content: Like:. Price: I got it in 1099 in an offer. Base: Superb base. Noise cancellation: quite good at this price range of product. Handling: you can easily use it while running in the gym or park.. Dislike: The earphone cable is of low quality. It got a tear just after a month. The service center charged me Rs. 450 to get it replaced even earphone comes with a 1-year replacement warranty.

name: Gagandeep Kaushal
title: Amazing sound quality but not reliable
content: Bang for the buck. Only improvement i would suggest is a longer battery life. It lasts only for couple of hours of usage. And after 9 months of usage it is now broken. The right channel doesn't have a voice now. Stays connected in idle state for a day though. But if we use it continuously it doesn't last longer than max 2.5 hours.

name: TaranjeetSingh
title: Decent earphones.. could be better if it had long range and no unnecessary static sounds
content: Decent earphones taking into consideration price(900 rs) and sound quality. Low Bluetooth range .. Sometimes Static sounds comes when nothing is being played or when bing connected,which is very irritating.. Also there should be some extra weight on center so that it balance between both ears and neck.. Hopefully they would improve .

name: Pankaj
title: Sound is good but it is not durable and customer care is pathetic.
content: I used it for approx 6 months (no rough usage), sound is good, you won't be disappointed , but one side stopped working after that. It had 1 year warranty , so I sent it to their service center and it came 'AFTER 1.5 months' (pathetic customer service). And, the product I received after service seemed to be new (it came in new package and brand name was clearly printed on it), but i think i was wrong because it started showing charging issues just after 1 week and stopped charging after 1-2 months. I mean seriously, you sent it to me after 1.5 months and that too faulty. So, before buying just know that they are not durable, you can't trust how long they will work. They say it is a sports earphone, but they didn't survived even the normal usage, how are they supposed to perform well if used in sporty way.. I won't buy boat products from now.

name: kj0021
title: Decent product under 1000 rupees
content: Pros. -Decent sound quality. -good bass. -sufficient battery life. -excellent noise cancellation. -magnetic earbuds. Cons. -annoying beep sound while increasing and decreasing volume. Summary. Overall a decent product under 1000 rupees. Sound quality is better than ant audio wave 702 wired earphone

name: Jerry Jacob
title: Not amazing not pathetic
content: Bluetooth connectivity is good, sound quality is average. You can live with it I bought it to answer calls without picking up my phone. Not for songs or gym or driving. So it's okay for me.. Battery backup is above average.. One con which tips me off often is that the ear buds are pretty heavy. So a single tap on the chord and it comes out of the ear. But as I said, you can live with it. Not bad.

name: Pushkin jha
title: Okey
content: Sound is okay , noise cancellation is very poor ,other voice disturb on phone call and battery life is also okey , All time show full battery n sadan battery 30% , I don't know maybe I'm wrong but that is my 5 day experience n I'm not happy

name: Madhusudhan Reddy
title: Satisfaction
content: length of its both wires are frustrated as too lengthy and not comfortable at all, when you fix the buds in ears not hearing any outside sounds clearly.... Also hurting eqrs. Other than above. Battery capacity and Bluetooth range & built quality r good.... Inspite of my review,. I loved the warranty of the product. My product's right bud wasn't work for a while I have opted for claiming warranty, they were accepted my warranty and replaced with another piece within 20 days.... You really awesomeboat

name: Himanshu D
title: REVIEW AFTER 2 MONTHS
content: Although For a price of 1100 they are quite considerable ( for the sky blue variant ) and the pros and cons are -. 1. The sound quality is Good. 2. Good For listening Deap Bass songs.. Cons. 1. Completely ruins gaming experience as the Latency is at its Peak.. 2. Loud Alerts for Battery low and powering on.. 3. Many times our voice is not clearly audible to opposite person on Phone call.. 4. During a meet call if we switch to other multi media apps like youtube both the sounds completely try to kill each other and we can not even operate them individually like we get the option when we are using any wired earphone.. 5. Of no use in daily life

name: Amazon Customer
title: Affordable Bluetooth neckband
content: This is a type of Bluetooth you shld buy only if this is...on offer cuz at it's price u can have better option.. it has good sound quality and if u r a type of person...while lives for bass music then this will be..a fair deal but it..gets Disconnected on its...own and u'll have to again connect this.. and if u r leaving ur phn in room and u go to second room while u r in call then voice starts..breaking..!!though sound quality is...good and pblms...are not so very focusing....so u could...go for it...!! As on your preferences..!!

name: Teju
title: It has sporty look and easy to carry while running
content: The sound quality is very good, obviously don't expect so much bass.. In terms of look, it is very much attractive.. Charging and power back up also promisable. Hoping for long lasting .. But worst part is about noise distortion while talking. Other side of the phone party keeps complaining about outside noise.

name: LOTUS WIINDOORS
title: Small Sized NeckBand & Caller ID Announcement
content: Neck Band Size is smaller than other brands in same type of headphone ( Specially in comparison of used brands - Jabra / Blaupaunkt ) Thus Slightly adjustability problems..
