Caller's Name is announced while Call received ( compatibility from Handset too required ). Thats Important while working handsfree.

name: Gaurav
title: Charge every day if you listen more then 2 hrs.
content: If you have heard Sony before then you won't like these.. Average base.. Average noise cancelation. Looks premium. Good to hold. Battery back is not so good. Last about 2-3 hours. Will have to change every day.. When battery is low it gives repeated warnings which are irritating. Battery drains fast

name: Pratik
title: Don’t Buy..Go for Sony or JBL
content: Stopped working in 3 months.. Claimed warranty but it takes forever..still haven’t received the replacement as well as no email or SMS or call from Boat.. Don’t buy these earphones...spent a little extra and buy Sony or JBL at least their products a good and if any issues they treat their customers better and resolve the issue quickly.. I already bought another Bluetooth earphones and I guess I’m gonna wait for 7-8 months for Boat to replace their faulty product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Review
content: After using for 2-3 weeks:. 1. Quality of sound is fine. Nothing unusual.. 2. Bass quality is ok.. 3. I found connectivity issues quite common if it is connected to 2 devices.. 4. Many a times automatic bluetooth connection does not work!!. 5. Quality is worth the money. Some of these could be possible defects in my device!!

name: RAKESH VIKAS MOURYA
title: Review After 7 month
content: Advantages. · Very good Product in Budget. · Available In More kind of color Range. with your Professions. · Its compatible with iPhone and. android phone. · Battery backup Continue sound is up. to 5 hrs. And standby up to 8 to 9 hrs.. · The Sound quality is good for a. earphones of that prices. · Nice for this prices. · Once of the best at this price range. · Excellent product for the cost it was. purchased. · Good product with cheap price. · Worth for money. Disadvantage. · It sometime shows connectivity. issues. · Sometime even in 5 meters the device well automatically disconnect that’s the only problem. Overall: Budget in price Quality is good sound is excellent in these segment

name: Harshal J Joshi
title: Worst product. Never buy boAt products. Total waste of money.
content: Worst product. Even local products are better than this product.. Right side speaker stopped working just 45 days after purchase. Customer care number given on boAt Rockerz web site was not reachable at all. I went to service centre in Vashi, mentioned in web site, 4 times and everytime I received responce that boAt Rockerz 255 wireless headphones are out of stock. I can come next week and check. I am fed up of this product and after sales service.. I also emailed on customer care email id mentioned on website. I got no reply. I sent reminders, i got no reply. I am seriously fed up of boAt products.. I wasted my hard earned money in this product. I will never buy boAt product and will tell everybody to not to buy any boAt product.

name: Ashok kumar Amarthuluri
title: Not bad
content: Bought them to check their sound quality...i wud say not so good...you can get the best sound quality with jbl and skullcandy wired headsets which will cost you just 500...when you want wireless than I'll suggest..again..jbl or skullcandy...which will cost you a 1000 more but they are worth your money...don't buy these

name: Ashish0203
title: Great product
content: Boat's signature sound quality - fantastic.. I wouldn't depend too much on noise cancellation - not too much.. Pretty comfortable but I had to take out the extended rubber hooks (or whatever you call it) from the earpieces and it was great then.. Would have preferred a shorted cable but it's not a deal breaker.. Regular use sweat over ears or at the neck does no harm, but I have been skeptical to try in the rains.

name: ABY34
title: Great product , Poor after sales service
content: I'm reviewing this product after using it for 6 months. Let me tell you the pros and cons:-. Pros:-. 1) Great bass. 2) Great product design. 3) Easy controls.. 4) Easy to use. 5) Fluent connectivity. 6) Best price(Buy it under 1000₹). 7) Great vocals. Cons:-. 1) Too much loud bass. 2) After sales service poor as compared to other brands.. 3) 6 hours of battery back up. Note:-. Replaced the product after 5 months of use. One side wasn't working. Took almost 2 months for replacement. Don't buy for a price tag over 999..

name: Nitin Yadav
title: Does not work with linux ! Worst design factor !!
content: Update : These earphones does not work with linux ( tried with ubuntu, zorin, mint,elementry) . I have Airdopes 441 and that works flawlessly with linux also.. Completely useless earphones due to uncomfortable design . The wires are so hard that you constantly keep on feeling as if something is hanging beside your face. A constant downward pull in both the ears.. The sound and bass is Good. But I dont think that should be the only criteria to judge the earphone.

name: Udham Singh
title: Value for Money
content: After 6 month use, I can say this is best Bluetooth head phone in 1500 rupee.. Likes:. - Good battery life. On descriptions it had written 8 hours but I'm getting 1.5 day battery life in a single charge.. - Sound it good and extreme bass. 5* for bass. - Built quality is very good. light weight and handy.. Dislikes:. - sometimes it disconnect and reconnect automatically. - ear buds are not holding my ear perfectly and some time it's slip down.

name: ASHISH
title: Higher Price With Moderate Sound Quality!
content: A good product for performance but not good for that price ! Else ok for buyer,good blutooth connectivity,sound quality must say towards BASE and less TREBLE! Noise cancellation is mostly adjusted with the help it’s fitting in ears! Or may be done by active circuit then sacrificing the sound quality!. Else ok!

name: Nisarga
title: It is a great deal to get your hands on
content: Well, I have been using these for a month now and the earphones are really good. The sound quality is immensely saturated. The bass is good for people who are not audiophiles. Like if you're not into sound recording or need minute details to grab onto, its perfect for you. Mic quality is kinda okay clear but it catches too much of sounds around you which can irritate the person on the other line. But on an average a great deal to get your hands on.

name: Vignesh
title: Battery is awesome
content: Pros :. - Battery Backup is awesome. - The sound quality is good (Not too heavy or too light, feels good). - Light Weight (Expected from Bluetooth Headphones). Cons :. - Bluetooth connectivity takes variable time. Sometimes it connects as soon as it is ON. Other times, it takes a couple of minutes. - The multi device connect is gimmicky and not very seamless. I got it to work with a mac and an iPhone. - Mic is not very sensitive and may not be suitable for speaking while traveling

name: RNRPUNE
title: Excellent Sound Quality...Value for Money!
content: Writing this review after using boAt 225 wireless headset and JBK t160BT...I must say that boAt has got excellent bass and sound quality compared to JBL one.. Superb sound quality and built. Very comfortable in ears. Value for Money!!!

name: Amrit
title: Waste product and worst customer care
content: I'm writing this review 6 months after using the product. All of a sudden lots of issues have started, battery dies after 15 mins usage, can't make calls via the device. Registered a complaint in their website and the product was picked up by courier since it is in warranty, its been more than a week now, no update from the company. The customer care number provided is always unanswered. Don't waste your money on Boat devices.

name: Rag
title: Battery issue
content: I am writing this review after using this for 4 complete days:. +ves. *compatible with neck and ears.. *Bluetooth connectivity is fast.. *look & design is awesome.. -ves. *earphone size is littlebit big: mainly with the earset which gives pain in ears when you mix helmet & earphones (while driving).. *finding disturbance in music when im “running” (probably due to connectivity issue). *music: everytime When there is change in song or toggle between music/video/call/other, experiencing an irritative beep sound.. *Bass is not that good. *when im driving: (onCall) sound quality is low & bad and mic aswell.. *siri not working. *grip for earbuds/earset is low quality and can damage anytime. *when on call: other person keeps complaining about low voice and disturbance (..mic problem). *most concerned and the biggest problem with this bluetooth earphones is BATTERY backup;. Even though when im not using bluetooth (call or music) battery discharging.. *very bad thing: battery/charging directly falls from 80% to 0% within no time.. *it is giving 3hours of battery backup only (at the max.. i am returning this product: mainly because of battery backup which is a big issue for any bluetooth device!. Really disappointed with the performance.

name: riddhi kanabar
title: Duplicate product
content: Hello Amazon. I had buy earphones and i think its only month before i bought but there is some problem now am facing am.not able to connect it with phone and if i only put it on charge than only its connecting other wise not and its fully charged than also if i put it charge it will work what i have to do its also have warranty.. Are you selling duplicate produts..??. I want refund my money orelse i want good original earphones.i cant afford to loose 999 rs its hard to earn you easily sell defective product so i want refund or original earrphones.. I have bill and warranty card. So.reply me. And i am refusing my friends and family not.to buy this product from here

name: Anil
title: Loud voice feedback
content: Irritating voice feedback on every action like connecting, disconnection etc. The voice feedback is too loud irrespective to volume level and there is no way to lower it. A subtle beep would be appropriate. I call this a defect and it exists across boat products.

name: Sreedhar Venugopal
title: Reliable for daily use since the last 8 months
content: Bought this for Rs 999 in Oct 2019 and have been using it on an almost daily basis since then.. It has got good bass and noise cancellation is also good.. Charge will last through 1 whole day and it gets charged quickly within 15 minutes.. Only con is that yesterday, the small rubber flip cover for the charge port fell out. So I will need to use it carefully and clean it so dust wouldn't get stuck in the port.. I would recommend this to everyone for its quality. But the price shown now for Rs 1,499 is a bit high as I had got it for cheaper.

name: AMRITO CHATTOPADHYAY
title: Good, could have been better.
content: The headphone seems nice, however lately I found some issues with the microphone while using in laptop during video conferencing, the audience could not get my voice. With a great effort, I finally manage to speak by holding the microphone closer to my mouth. Not faced this problem with mobile.

name: Abhipsa
title: Worthless
content: No idea about the actual product as I received a horrible and defective piece... I have used boAt products earlier but this time the packaging looked like it was opened and used for 3 years and then someone packed and gave it to me... The old was worn out... The seal was non-existent... The left earphone doesn't work and the earphone only switches on when charging... Have been charging for 8 hours still doesn't not switch on if removed from charge... Highly disappointed is an understatement...

name: Suraj
title: Mic problem.
content: It work fine for normal call and music playback and all. Battery backup is also great. The only worst thing I found is that for webcall (whatsapp, messenger call) the mic will get disconnected. The person at the other end wouldn't listen your voice. Once you disconnect and reconnect the mic will work for a minute and again will disconnect. Very irritating. I am using Galaxy s9 plus handset. Just check others review also before you go for it. Thanks

name: Kumar Sourabh
title: Excellent product
content: Writing this review after several months of using it. This is a great product, very good bass, excellent noise cancellation and the best part is battery back up, it gets full charge in just 45 mins max and you can use it for more than 7 hours, approx. I am very happy with this product. Boat is definitely in the market for something big as it's providing awesome products at very affordable price.

name: Nagananda Aithal .I.M
title: Good Product
content: Boat Rockerz 255. I got this product at a very discounted price.. It has been a year since I purchased the Boat Rockerz 255.. The Call Quality in this BT headset is Excellent and noise cancellation is good.. The Bass quality is OK when compared to wired headphones.. It does not support Smartphone's Inbuilt Equaliser.. After longer use you feel pain in the Ear.. Battery Back up is 4 Hours for Movie Watch.. Overall a good product for the Discounted price I had Bought.

name: Pranesh
title: Good Product, can recommend.
content: Good Product, good audio response, not very tinny and shows stereo capability. Buds fit properly into ear, and the band retains the entire setup firmly on the neck, and does not fall off.. Good budget buy, durability is fine, should not have issues for at least 2 yrs.. Battery life is not excellent but good enough, maybe around 5hrs continuous usage.

name: Ankita mallick
title: Connecting two devices at a time is another level crappy
content: Everything is great, the sound quality, noise cancellation and the bass quality is ok as well, but hate the connectivity issue. I mean you've provided an option to connect two devices at a time, but the fact that if you're watching something on the laptop and then you close that window and then start another video on your phone you'll spend the next millenium to reset it so that you are able to listen to it, no matter how many times I restart the device doesn't help. I would have liked it better if they just didn't give this option. I mean what's the use if you're not able to use it properly, and wasting more time to reset, it would've been easier to shut one device's bluetooth and connect.

name: Suganya G
title: Worst headset - Do not buy it and there is no warranty center too
content: I have researched a lot before investing in bluetooth headset. Within two weeks, left side of headset doesn't seems to work. Amazon is now saying that return policy already got over and there is no service center in chennnai. During the covind19 situation, i'm fed up with the customer service from amazon as well from boat now.. When service center are not there do not mention it as one year warranty rather update as use and throw. Guy i'm music lover, thought boat would satisfy me during the pandemic but actual pandemic is far better than boat service center and customer support. I'm writing this review to make you all aware about this issue.

name: ranvir sharma
title: Only for listing music bcx have mic issue
content: If u using just for listining music then its good but when u started talking on call using this then another sid3 person unable to hear u, u have to use ur hand to lift the band from neck and keeping near ur mouth to talk someone over call..... In short this devic3 have mic issue... I was changed this device two time because first device have some issue but when complny replaced device then i found this device also work as same that device was...

name: Anchit Nandy
title: Great product and sound at Rs1000 : )
content: The price is great for the quantity of sound it offers at Rs1000. Ok , good , great are my rankings.. Great - Price. Great - Sound. Good - Battery. Good - Bass. Great - Flexibility. Great - Product quality. Only 2 complains .. I hve to charge battery every day (max 5 hour continuous use). My left ear sound is getting low thats an issue that bothered about. Evn my friend faced the same issue that one side of his headphone stoped working(5 months of use for freand & 1 month for me ) . And that an quality issue . I hope i will get replacement under warranty. And mind it no physical damage or water damage.. But at that price point its worth it .. And imp thing the light turns frm red to blue when fully charged .

name: Sejal Oza
title: Highly recommended
content: I have used this Boat Rockerz 255 Pro for taking online tutions of kids. It has good noise cancellation, so least disturbance.The sound quality is also amazing. Have also listened to music....bass is good.All in all would recommend this to anyone who wants a good neckband pods in medium range.

name: Keshav Singla
title: Best Customer Service !
content: I bought these earphones in January this month.. Later in September, I started facing some issues in the microphone. I registered a complaint on bOaT portal and attached the invoice.. The next day, a pick-up guy came and collected the defected earphones from my house, and in less than 2 weeks' time, a brand new set was at my doorstep. Just amazing!. The sound quality is very good. The only issue I am facing with these earphones is you can't take online classes with it. My students say that it gets disconnected in between the meeting. If this microphone issue is fixed, then this headset is worth Rs.2000. I wish bOAt guys will fix it soon.

name: Aayushi
title: Sound not great, Earbuds uncomfortable
content: These earphones are okayish. Sound is not so great, but decent for a earphone in this price range. Also the earbuds are damn uncomfortable while using it for 30 mins +.. If you are looking for a earphone with mic to attend meetings or talk over phone then I highly recommend this. But if you are looking something for listening to music then these could not be a great choice.

name: Raj Shekhar Shanti
title: Product is nice but warrenty and services fake
content: Don't buy this product on seeing the 1 year warranty cause if any problem comes earphone then service centre process will be very long even its take one to two month and not certain that product you get back. In my earphone one sided was not working and product was under warranty, I complaint.Pick up of product was initiated by xbees courier service and I am still checking my service request which is not completed yet. Nearly 1 month going to complete and I have no idea where is my product. Very cheap service and when you call the service centre number which is toll free number its always gone busy I mean you can't complain or you can't do enquiry of your product after complain.

name: Varun Maloo
title: Mediocre quality headset.
content: The sound quality is at best average. Although the fit n finish is good, the most annoying feature is that it frequently gets disconnected while in use. I would not suggest buying this particular model.. I am planning a switch to a better brand. Maybe JBL or Samsung

name: Pratheek BS
title: Great quality and a suggestion to manufacturer
content: Very good quality. The manufacturer has given option of connecting to multiple devices at a time. Explore the option of having the device active for latest connection. For example, I have connected to laptop and mobile. When I'm watching a video on laptop, if I get a call to mobile and I answer it, laptop connection should be on hold and I should be able to talk on phone without interruption. Currently while talking on phone, if I get a notification on laptop, it makes call inactive and connects for a laptop notification for few seconds and then switch back to phone.. There should be an optimum way of handling this.. Apart from thisz amazing product!

name: Patil V.
title: Too many issues. Not worth the price.
content: This product is good, but not worth the price. I found three issues:-. 1- bass quality is poor (poor than the boat 225 I used, and regardless of its description saying "extra bass". 2- hissing sound on connecting.. 3- no proper volume boundaries. When it is on vol. 1,2,3, the sound is very low, and increases suddenly when taken to vol 4. On achieving minimum volume, the earphones tell "minimum volume" with a volume which is full I guess. Lol.. Overall, I hated this product, and have issued it for return.

name: Anurag
title: Boat Rockerz 255 Bluetooth Earphone with Mic – Best Budget Earphone
content: boAt Rockerz 255, while being lightweight in design pumps out your favorite tunes with powerful HD sound and deep boosted bass. Powered By Qualcomm CSR8635 Chipset High Level functionality is provided to the boAt Rockerz 255 by the Advanced Qualcomm CSR 8635 Chipset providing the features of the latest Bluetooth 4.1 Version.. With 10 mins charge, 45 mins play: The boAt Rockerz 255 are equipped with a 110 mAH battery that’ll surely allow you to spend your time with these earphones a quarter of your day.. Attractive ergonomics with a Comfort Fit: Built with compromised craftsmanship from premium materials including metal housing earphones and chrome accents the boAt Rockerz 255 is both sturdy and stylish.. Free access controls: Since controlling your phone through your hands is too mainstream nowadays, you can take charge of your auditory experience with the boAt Rockerz 255.. With the inline controls you can toggle the volume, skip tracks, attend calls, and activate Siri, Google Now or Cortana voice-controlled Smartphone assistants.. With the wireless functionality and free access controls, the boAt Rockerz 255 is surely your companion for your travel and daily needs, stay edgy with voice command.

name: Rahul
title: Way go anywer .apni dukan hai na  ( AMAZON )
content: About the amzon good dilvry ..and thenk for the emzon to riturn for 6 day .. About boat .i m using .last 8 year skullcandy . Smoki .smoki 2 bus .and jib .but boat and jib is almost .sem sound .and . I no wat is the bast sound .eveything is balenc in the boat 255 sports .u feel the evry instrument in the song .its better then .255 pro is not balnsd sound . Music lover go for the .boat 255 sport . Bettry charg in mex 2 hwrs . Becup is 2 day for me .its batter .for me .im using call music .video its .go for it withut eny dout .

name: Anoop Jaiswal
title: Amazon selling duplicate electronic product
content: Very bad quality product. I am not sur amzon sell original product. Policy no refund. Amazon customer care guys behavior very bad. I am very fadeup this time. I recommend buy any product from Amazon read policy and avoid to buy electronic product from Amazon..

name: Samir Singh
title: Excellent audio performance 👌
content: Considering the price point it has to be one of the best among all the other bluetooth earphone.. Seamless bluetooth connection. Audio quality is upto the mark. Design is good. Battery backup is Excellent. Overall its a product which u can buy without any doubt.

name: Harshvardhan Saboo
title: Feeling bad buying this.
content: Sound quality isn't that good. Not worth the cost. Durability, well it comes with a plastic construction, that you need to wear around neck. So can't fit it in anything.. Feeling bad buying this product considering the image doesn't clarify the plastic ring around the neck. Oh yes one more thing Ear piece has rubber hook on it but design is so bad that you can't get it in ears properly.

name: Karthick Nagarajan
title: Kindly Don't buy and waste your money...
content: Don't buy this Product. I'm a regular user of this Headphone... It was working fine in the last few months, exactly 4 months. Few days back, it's not at all working.... Problem is While charging this Headphone, it shows battery is full and when we tried to turn on the Device , it's not turning ON..... 1300/- gone within 4 months of use... Kindly don't buy this product and waste your money...

name: Chetna Gupta
title: If you are planning about buying this so by adding a little money you can buy best product!
content: I had ordered boat initially and found it not good as much as i expect , Actually, currently i am using OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z Bass Edition (Reverb Red) so as compared to i found more comfort with oneplus as its functioning quite smooth you don't have to connect every time through bluetooth and the material of product is not as boat product, you will not feel any pain in your ears after wearing long. That's it and at last i think i will say if you are planning about buying this so plz by adding a little money you can buy bset product and you will not regret it!. Thank you!

name: vikasbr
title: Great one for the price,Decent one for the sound
content: Been using this since about a month now,. First of all Kudos to Amazon for super fast delivery.. Earphones are definately one of the best in price range. 1. Battery :- about 5-6 hours of continuous use on a single charge, pretty good battery life. 2. Connectivity :- I'd say around 10-15 ft, works best with newer ones with newer version of Bluetooth, my Redmi Note 4 loses connectivity faster than my brother's poco F1. 3. comfort :-. Not so great but bearable, occasionally noticable discomfort and ear becomes Sweat Dam on longer use. 4. Sound :- Pretty much balance and great output . Not too much bass,not too much treble just appropriate for daily use. 5. Calls :- mic is pretty good and you don't have to scream so that person on other end can hear, just need to speak a little louder than on earpiece, would've loved it if this was improved.. Overall, a great deal. Cons :-. 1.Super fluctuations in price :- I bought these on prime day deal but the price other times is fluctuating fast, best would be to but when around 1200/- odd . If budget is 1500 might as well but mi sports wireless earphones .. 2. Could've improved on comfort.. 3. If you break the support rubber ,there's no replacement

name: MOGIS HUSSAIN HASHMI
title: Overall review of this "Bluetooth Earphone" boAt Rockerz 255.
content: I just want to tell you guys go for it. As I purchased @999 only.. ( It's not good for gaming. ). ( But good for playing videos, listening. musics/songs. ). *Noise Cancellation*. Its noise cancelation is awesome it cancel all the outer sound & stops reaching to our ears which prevents the internal musics/songs from outer noise, which we were listening.. *Bluetooth Connectivity*. Once you connect to your device & after that whenever you will try to connect, it will connects in a second only. Connectivity is too fast.. *Sound Quality*. As I see its sound is not so clear just because of its high bass but not too bad also. When you play music it is good but while playing online multi-player games some time voice is not so clear it feels like heavy sound is initiated through it. Bass is too good.. *Some More Info*. It has three buttons on right side of bands: Upper button [ + ], Middle Button [ O ], Down Button [ - ] & a charging port respectively.. Upper button is used to increase the volume by just a click & to play the next/upcoming musics/songs press it for few second.. Middle button is used to power on or off by pressing it for few seconds & also used to control Google Assistant by pressing it for few seconds which which should be less than its power on or off timing.. Down button is similarly used to down the volume by just a click & to play the previous musics/songs by pressing it for few seconds.. At last I want to say overall it is good product & purchase it without any hesitation at this price ₹999. Actually the cost of this product is about ₹1499.. Thanks!

name: Vinoth kumar
title: Poor Quality
content: While hearing songs it was stuck often...there was problem in bluetooth..whenever try change songs or increase volume though boat device, songs getting stuck,there was some disturbance..so i returned it..amazon replaced to me another device but that too doesn't work.. Tried to put charging for more than 2hrs but battery remains 10percent, not increasing morethan that... It was working only when connected with charger..if plugged off, stopped working... Had bad experience..please try to change the dealer...

name: Tanya A.
title: Disconnects sometimes in between
content: I have been using these earphones for about 2 months, and this is what I feel like. The noise cancellation is of optimal quality. You won't hear most noises even when the music is off. The battery life is amazing. It easily works for more than 6 hours once fully charged. The only drawback I am facing is that it sometimes disconnects in between a movie or meeting. It takes about 2 minutes to reconnect, which is quite a long time when in an important meeting. Maybe it's just my product, but consider this con when buying them.

name: Aditya Barman
title: Investing on my first pair of blutooth earphones
content: Got these mainly for my gym sessions.. Build: 4/5. Battery: 3.5/5. Sound Quality: 4/5 (good bass). Connectivity: 3.5/5. The build quality is pretty good and sturdy.. The battery level is displayed on the phone once connected which helps me know when I have to charge it.. The battery life is also fair enough, you can use it for a good 3-4 hours listening to music at 40-60% Volume.. But once the battery level reaches 20%, the battery will last no longer than 15 minutes. Generally, if you see a phone's battery, it drains out slower when it's below 15%.. If you do use it at max volume, I'm sure you won't be hear anything but the music, so if that's "Noise Cancellation", then it does a good job because these earphones are really loud!. Overall a good product from the price point and sound quality point of view.. Happy Shopping! :)

name: AzzKikr
title: Decent audio quality but keeps skipping...
content: I've tried 3 different earphones of the same model and in each one I observed that the audio skips even when the phone it's connected to, is right in my back pocket.. While listening to music, the audio quality is decent and battery life is about 5-6 hours depending on the volume levels. On calls, the audio is also decent and others were able to hear me clearly.. Overall, it's a decent pair of in-ear earphones within 1500 bucks as compared with JBL.

name: KAMLESH SAAD
title: Amazon misguiding Indians🤬🤬🤬
content: Left side headphone sound is little bit lower side.. Both side sound should be balanced. Not expected this from Amazon.. Sometimes make showing china & sometimes India, can't understand why Amazon trying to fool Indians.... Amazon is also sub standard company.. Misguided Indians....

name: karan
title: Please Dont Purchase this Waste of Money
content: Battery Backup Not good I had issues with Battery performance it last for me about 1.5 hour in continuous Usage.. And If You are Bass Lover then only go For that Audio Quality Isn't Great And at Some Point of Time After Cointnues listening You might feel pain in Your Ears.. I Would Advice not to Go with this Product don't Purchase and i am Reviewing it after 11 days of continues usage.. I am Sending it back In return Not Satisfied disappointed with This.

name: Shekhar Saurabh
title: Not recommended at all! Wastage of money!
content: It is one of the worst product in the wireless headset segment. It just survived 1yr.. Battery backup: approx 4hrs. When on Call: gets disconnected from the phone, additional annoying sound can be heard to the person on the other side.

name: Subrat K.
title: Brand is excellent  product faulty
content: Thanks to Amazon ,I had waited for so many months to purchase this item,nice product.. Most important is product is faulty, audio sound of call is so low ,i can not able to voice of other side, well now I am trying to contact with customer care of boat,but office is closed in Monday also, it is my suggestion to Amazon before send the product to customer, are they confirmed that product is in good condition .

name: Somnath Saha
title: Expected much better than this.
content: It's not what I expected it to be. Bass is Flat no such bass , noise cancellation is okay. During call bluetooth doesn't work so you might reconnect and re-think of buying it. Earbuds won't stick to ears if you're running or doing HIIT workout. Normal walk or gym for that it's good. Not bad. Overall rating 2.5/5.

name: Mainak Das
title: Wrost Bluetooth headset read complete review before buying
content: This is a very low-grade china product.. Battery backup is not enough by this we can listen music for maximum 2hours.. Noise cancellation is not working at all.. As there is a very cheap quality 🎤 used the outgoing voice quality also not good.. Also due to very low voice output the remote user unable to listen your voice clearly.. Overall regarding listing music it performs just ok and regarding voice call it is not recommended also battery backup not good.

name: Akanksha Sharma
title: A huge disappointment!
content: As much as I was looking forward to using these Bluetooth earphones, they turned out to be a huge disappointment. The call quality is pathetic, there's so much background noise that overlaps your voice, the receiver is not able to hear you clearly. Always feels like the voice is coming from a distance and there's a lot of background noise. Only the music experience is good, however call is the most important function for which we need earphones and this definitely isn't a good option. Disappointed by boAt!

name: Noor
title: Decent product for the price with struggling battery life
content: While the product is cost effective, there are issues with the battery life. It says 6 hours but it just lasts for appx. 3 hours. Also it says 60% battery and then in a split second it starts to display battery low to 20%. This has been happening always. Decent sound quality for the price. Go for it only if you are looking for something cheap to use while it lasts.

name: Ankit
title: Need improvement
content: I dint find this good product.. 1. Ear support is not good due to which ear start paining after every few minutes.. 2. Sound quality is not great. 3. The person on other side of call keep complaining about background noise.. Pros,. Get connected very easily.. Battery life is good enough.

name: Abhinay pandey
title: Just don't buy this product.
content: This is totally worth less to buy headphone like this, very uncomfortable dimensionally while adjusting into the ear & lot of connectivity issues through out the bluetooth while continuing on call as well as videos. Not that much good in terms of sound quality and other things, likewise they don't have replacement options so that customer can go for a better one, I would suggest just don't buy this product. I am the custoner of Amazon since years however the very first time I am very disappointed with Amazon.

name: Nishant_07
title: Issue in 225 Pro model. Don't buy 255 PRO.
content: I think boat has now started ignoring regarding quality check. I have ordered this product, at day 1 I found issue in dual connectivity & after that device goes automatically in switch off mode but in device I t shows connected. I request for replacement. When the replacement came the same issue was in it & it was so irritating. May be the issue is in PRO model of boat 255 because I have used 255 sports active black for 1.5 years n it performed fantastic n so rough n tough but this PRO model having so much issues ... Don't buy 255 PRO..

name: Shubhashish
title: Good but not the best!
content: Sound quality is good compared to other similar products. Provides sufficient bass for an in-ear headphone. Fast charging really works well. Very lightweight and tangle free cable.. Bluetooth connectivity is not very fast.. The audio prompt on switching on and switching off the device is extremely loud and annoying. It will be much better if they removed it altogether.. Earbuds are metallic and heavy so bit uncomfortable but u get used to it.. Magnets at the back aren't really of any use even for cable management.. Workmanship is poor. The cover on charge port won't work properly after sometime. The housing of the battery and controls is loosely fit so not watertight.

name: Yash Badani
title: Works good, sound is okay, pains your ear after sometime
content: Does the work for portable music listening. Needs a quiet place for the mic to work, it isnt great and I never use it for calls. Base is quite high and pains your ear after and hour of listening. If you get this around 1000 bucks, take it for a portable experience otherwise invest on a good wired in-ear Sennheiser which u get below 1500 and gives the best audio output

name: Devesh Shyngle
title: Devesh Shyngle Genuine Reviews
content: After months of research of which bluetooth earphone to buy, I decided to go for these and it was all worth it.. I'm a base loving person and I will say if you like base-y sound/music these are the earphones for you.. Battery life is really good, gets charged in an hour or so. Completely satisfied with this product.. Recommended by me.

name: Maharshi P.
title: Extremely good sound quality although not by default but through an Equalizer
content: Sound:. Excellent sound quality. Although the default sound is more bass kind and I love a balanced Vocal+Treble+Bass so I had to manually configure my EQUALIZER. So either learn to use an Equalizer which enhances the sound quality to a great extent or if you like bass and heavy sound then default settings are fine.. Battery:. Lasts good enough.. Very convenient, durable and flexible. Good call quality but. Not suitable for long time listening, the grip hurts a bit in ear. Overall great. If you want some new features like bt 5.0, usb C then go for something else. And yes it's MADE IN CHINA!

name: Subhadeep Karmakar
title: Boat rockers 255
content: Sound is very good.....but i think their is a design issue which make it not fit in ear properly.... that's why one can't experience the bass properly if not tightly pushed in. Battery life is suprb upto 6 hours and charging time 1.5 hrs. But due to metal finishing in winter it becomes very cold and hurts the ears. The summer u can think....Its a nice purchase for listening music but some designing faults i can see that's it.

name: NC
title: Good but connectivity distance issue
content: Nice product using for listening music and also for calls.. Good sound quality, before this i used many Bluetooth earphones but this is best.. Good sound and bass when playing music.. During call both side happy. receive good quality sound , mic quality is also good , caller can listen a very low sound also.. Battery backup is awesome.

name: santhosh
title: Good but not great.
content: Got it for Rs. 999. It's been 3 months of usage. Okayish product under 1000 but not worth the 1500.. Sound quality is OK. Noise cancellation is average. In a traffic or crowed places background voice is dominating than ours. Sometimes gets disconnected when trying to pair it up with our phones. That ear hook is not for everyone and causes severe pain on my ears but we can remove it form the headphone. End call notification is not there atleast a beep when the call ends would be fine. My suggestion only buy if it costs less than 1000.

name: Pacificator
title: Poor quality
content: I cursed the manufacturer and bought a Sony product. No noise cancellation, rather it catches noise, the person on the other side of phone an only hear noises rather than your voice. Sound is okay quality. Go for JBL of same price, they have better mic, I personally have used them. The only positive thing is that you can connect two devices simultaneously with this BT headphone.

name: Yogesh N Shah
title: TOTAL SCAM
content: This product is like a total scam. I ordered this product and received a product which had only one side working the other side of the earphone was not working. I initiated a replacement.The next day I received another product which is visible in the photos.The product does not contain the 6&9 of the earphone.This product seemed that it was already used and just handed over to us.This company selling this product is a total scam and would not even give 1 star and totally not recommended.. Thank you.. After replacement also, the 6 and 9 given are chopped off and clearly it shows that someone else used it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Ideal for listening to music & running!
content: --- Reviewing after 2 months of use ---. Very happy with the boAt Rockerz 255 Sports Bluetooth Wireless Earphone.. Pros. - Sporty look and feel. - Great audio quality.. - Pairs seamlessly with two simultaneous devices. Used it with my mobile and laptop.. - Has decent battery life.. - Fits perfectly in the bowl of the ear making it suitable for running as well.. - Well priced.. Cons:. - If you are taking calls on both your mobile and laptop (VoIP), then the mobile always take precedence and interrupts the call on the laptop. I generally ended up disconnecting my mobile before getting on a call from my laptop. Not really an issue if you are only listening to music on your laptop.. - Ear clip felt a bit hard in the first few days so couldn't keep it in ear for more than an hour or two.. - Ear clip can become loose and fall off.. Would I buy it again?. Most likely

name: Sharath
title: Good design, but average audio quality, medium bass
content: Pros:. 1. Design. 2. Build. 3. Tactile buttons easily perceived by touch. Cons:. 1. Medium bass which sounds not natural. 2. BT connectivity range is not more than 3 meters. After that it goes on-off-on-off (breaks & reconnects). 3. Audio quality is not very great. If you are a bass lover, I would recommend Portronics Harmonics at same price but at less design quality.

name: Harpreet Singh
title: If i had option to return now.. i would have returned
content: Good things :. Battery is good,. Sound is good too for the price,. Bass is good but not what i wanted... Bad things :. Mic isn't that good.. im having problem while calling... Rubber tips are Hard, i can't wear them for much long.. 15 -20 mins max. ( pro tip : i plugged my old Mi wired headphones rubber tips to these headphones, problem solved for me ),. Sound & Bass quality could have been better

name: abhishank
title: Disappointed with sound and bass
content: I am using boat from last 5 years but as compared to boat basshead 225 this model is very low in rating of sound and bass and price difference is big. Sound quality is bad so bad not at all impressive as compared to basshead225. Didn't liked it. Boat is mostly famous for bass but this ome is like china Bluetooth headphones i wish i cud return it and buy another one i can pay more but i need amazing bass which i guess comes from upper versions like 255 pro amd above that..... So honest review dont buy it for 1200 not at all worth of you are looking for bass and sound ... I am disappointed #boat

name: mohamed anis
title: Defective products and poor quality
content: BoAT rockerz 255, was poor quality make and suspect not really authentic brand. Issue was that left ear piece making some irritation noise, request for replacement and 2nd which is received is horrible. It doesn't detect range as per recommended (10m) but it not able to work with 1 metre. I have to keep mobile less than 1/2 metre to get clarity sound. Poor bluetooth connectivity, poor performance and unhappy with brand.. #Who knew Amazon offers may selling all defective products at cheap price so people can buy blindly!! It may be one of the strategic planning to clearance of damaged or defective products.. Juz waste of my time! Unhappy

name: Harsh Sasotri
title: Issue with Mac Air.
content: So I used it for a while and really loved the quality of the product. The sound is crisp and loud which is best. The battery backup is amazing! I really loved it. But recently I realize that when I connect to my Mac Air, it shows that it's connected but the audio still plays in my Mac (Works perfectly fine on mobiles though). The replace date has expired and now I cannot do anything. I hope I get some good response from the seller.

name: shivansh sharma
title: Nice sound quality but poor mic quality
content: Kudos to the product, for giving this sound quality in this price point. Got it for 1000 bucks on sale . But considering the original price bracket i would definitely recommend you to add 2-300 bucks and buy realme bluetooth earphones coz the ony drawback i found in these is its mic quality, most of the times it picks external voices more then yours which causes disruption and flickered tone. Rest sound quality is good

name: Swagatika Behera
title: Good sound quality and bass
content: I really loved this product.I m happy with this one. It has a very good sound quality & bass. Really enjoy when a rocking music i play becoz of bass. Design is also good. Earbuds are comfortable.Little heavy as it a metal but ok. Neck band is awesome. But sound quality get distorted when simultaneously 2 sound means i in cls my teacher saying something and when i play music on background, at that time sound quality get bit low. Thats something but overall its a good one.

name: Jay Mukherji
title: Can buy if you are dealing with music & voice calling issues.
content: I was first confused to order as I was also surrounded with people using the same device. Then I order one & it's pretty much descent in this price point. Well I ordered this while the GIF sale was happening & I spent just Rs. 999/- for this product. Now I am using this from last 5 days. Music was not only my concern but while calling i needed a clear voice cancelling device & surprisingly it turned out to be an amazing device. You can buy this if you have a use for both music & voice calling. Thanks!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Waste of Money.
content: first one stopped working within 10 days but likely I got replacement for that. After seven month, it has stopped working for both the ears, wire quality is very bad. Only one service center in Pune which is also very far away from my home, I did register its complaint using Boat's official website but it is hopeless. I would suggest you to go for any other brand but not for boat.. Amazon it will be great if you have NO start option as well for these types of cheap products.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Pathetic after sales service
content: Terrible mistake in buying this product. Became non functional within one month of purchase. Warranty available for 6 months. Being denied to me by the manufacturer.. One of the worst after sales service ever. Hate to admit. But the people telling me not to buy an Indian product for this very reason suddenly seem right. Cheats trying to swindle their customers for a quick buck with no aim or plan for long term sustainability.

name: MK
title: Good value for money.
content: <Pros>. * Rich bass. * Good built quality. * Magnetic lock. * Nice grip over neck. *Good company service (had to replace it because of faulty charging). <Cons/>. *Dont leave the charging cap open because sweat can get in through it and damage the charging.... *Detailed review*. Boat Rockerz 255 bluetooth in-ear headset is a very good quality product. It has a very rich bass and nooce cancellation is also pretty good. Accessories like ear buds of different sizes and charging cable are provided. If you workout and sweat alot then make sure to keep tha charging cap closed because if sweat goes through it then it may damage the charging, the charging stopped working after 2 weeks so i had to replace it..and the company service was amazing it took around 10 days and then i got a replaced piece back with extra accessories... *Conclusion*. I would really recomend this, this headset provide a very good value for money.. PS- Just dont walk while using it..because the noice cancellation will not let u hear anything else and it may cause an accident..

name: Nayan Tiwari
title: Awesome sound quality.
content: Awesome sound quality this product is really fantastic if you want to buy bluetooth headset under 2000 rupees this is the best option I would suggest really enjoy listening music through this Bluetooth headset and voice quality is awesome during calling good battery backup and prices also usually.. Thank you so much boat and thank you so much for reading my review.

name: Aniket C. Lad
title: Perfect,  very good, genuine product.  Thanks Amazon
content: As usual, products from Amazon and associated teams are always perfect.. Same thing is applicable for this product, on time, durable, quality checked, got at less cost as ordered during Festival deals.. Thanks to Amazon team, delivery team and all other associates. Happy And Prosperous Dipavali !

name: pavan m.
title: This is my genuine review giving after 6 months of use..
content: 1) When it comes to the SOUND QUALITY at this price segment no other brand can beat this, no doubt in it and bass is reasonable may be I felt like this because I used some other better sony earphones I didn't found that bass in this but there's a 1500Rps difference for that and this earphones so that doesn't need to consider this as a majer issue at this price rate the bass and the sound quality is great.. 2) Let's talk about the BUILD QUALITY , Quality of this product looks unbeatable but after six months of use , female input charge port is gone inside but I tried to pull out and charge, later I found that it was damaged internally . Internal female input port was separated from the Motherbord.. now i'm not sure whether I can clime the warranty or not have to find out after this covid-19 lockdown.. 3) CONNECTIVITY, in the beginning after I bought , the connectivity Is pretty cool but later I found issue in switching with the other devices it takes time but it connects, Anyways That's not a big deal it connects just in sometimes it'll take like 5-10 mins while switching devices.

name: Danish
title: Excellent product, but stopped working after six months of usage.
content: Pros:. lightweight. mutifuntional buttons. good sound quality. user friendly. stylish. decent battery. can connect two devices simultaneously. Good noise cancellation. Tells who's calling if feature activated in phone. Cons:. low bluetooth range (works well within same room). magnetic earphones don't pause music. little too much bass. while using two connected devices, without manually pausing the first device, we can't hear the second device. Bottomline: Cons are nitpicked. I bought it for rs 899 during sale. Overall it is a great product for the price and i am very satisfied with it.. Update: one side stopped working after six months of usage. Also a few weeks before that, i was having trouble charging it due to the rusted charging port. So reliability is an issue here, although i can't ask too much for 899 rupees.. I must say that the service experience is exceptional. Amidst the lockdown, my damaged earphones was picked up from my village, and the replacement earphones right after a month. Really impressed by the service. I recommend boat due to its service and warranty.

name: Amazon Customer
title: King of BAAAAAASSSSS!!!
content: Impressed with this product. This one has got a lot of BAAAAAASSSSS. So if you like to burn your ears for some beats. Go for it!. Battery back up is decent. 6 hours in high volume)(not recommended) and 10 hours for a decent level volume and sometimes more than 10 hrs 😊. Grip is really nice. Sticks to ears properly. The charger that we get along with the headset is a nice product. Chargers quickly in about 20 mins charge for 3 hrs playback time. Cooooool isn't??? 💪. Thank you Boat alias Nirvana!

name: Abhijit
title: not good for long term
content: i am using this product for last 1 year.. its back up , sound , performance was good initially.. in 2 months its backup reduced and started giving 3 hrs backup.. in 6 months one side stopeed working. in 9 months earbuds got teared.. in 1 year sounds started cracking wth 1 hour backup & range of less than 5 feet.. now i cant use as the voice keep on breaking while using .. max productive life of this product is 6 months .

name: Sushim
title: Over powering BASS
content: 'Rockerz' is known for BASS but it is overpowering on other frequencies. Instrumental is muffled.. But most of listeners enjoy due to heavy BASS. Noise cancellation is 100% completely block external noise.. Eartips are good (not best). Bluetooth ver 4.1 , so works on all latest phones. Bluetooth range is average. No prb. in connectivity.

name: harsh
title: Boat customer service is really very very bed
content: Earphone Is good I am just not satisfied with Boat customer service. Last 2 months my earphone is with them for service as one of its not working since it was in warranty they picked up my earphone 2 months ago still no one reply from them,no one pick call in customer care I can understand lockdown situation but it's 2 months now all services started but Boat customer care is no even responding. Since last two months I'll try to connect them but only computer generated automatic reply. Really very bad no one give me idea that when I'll receive my earphone back.. Please note I can understand lockdown situation but atleast they have respond on call or massage me about status of service. Nothing

name: Pratik Kutal
title: Earphones not suitable with pubg
content: Everything is is perfect but if you are buying this earphones for playing games "pubg" dont buy these earphones because there is a delay of sound for about one second and that really effects our game play but for calls and videos or songs these earphones are perfect at the price i got it for 899 Inr. Review after 6 months. leftside of the earphone stopped working but after i visited the service center i got a replacement within 10 minutes no extra question were asked

name: Vignesh
title: Headphones are like hookers, you get what you pay for.. Don't expect Studio level features
content: Good quality for the price. Haven't used while doing sports yet. Its been long since I used bluetooth headphones, have been using the wired ones from senheiser, bose and other brands, the good thing with this one is, I can connect to my phone and laptops at the same time, it pauses the videos on laptop when I get a phone call on my mobile. I think that is cool. And with the noise cancelling part, this one doesn't do a job on that part unless you keep volumes at very high levels to get you a headache. The sound quality is good for the price range. Nothing more on that. Bluetooth connectivity is pretty good, within 5 - 7 meters I guess, more than that there is distortion, noise and all the other wave range related problems. Buy this if you just need some good quality headphones for 6 - 8 months of usage.

name: Tenzin
title: Disappointed
content: Been 2 months since I bought it. The left side stopped working gradually and now the volume has became so low... Guess it’s better to opt for better branded products at similar price!. There is literally no service centre in Bangalore for this product. Travelled like 13 kms to a place which looks more then a residential home then a service centre.. and only be told to register online as services are only done in Mumbai. Better not buy from Bangalore for convenience sake. 🙄

name: Saurabh
title: Great product
content: Unbeaten at this price,comfortable for use on runs and while exercising ,though increased usage of more than an hour a day can cause pain in the ears.Decent sound quality.The semi hard neck band though is a little irritating

name: Kundan Kumar Shaw
title: Neck support is like wire so it can fell anytime from neck and you can lose it.
content: Neck support is just in form of flexibility wire. The earphone will keep falling from neck and top most care is required for not loosing it as it may fall anytime from your neck. The bud magnet joints from a perticular side so it takes lot of effort to join them from a perticular side. Brand is superb but this specific earphone is not worth of many even if it comes in 1000 rs as it can fell anytime from neck . One big disadvantages I observed is in between of call or watching vedio, the Bluetooth connection gets disconnected and than reconnected automatically.

name: Mithilesh
title: Great value for money, build quality is great along with sound quality
content: It is simply the best product. Used it for about 1.6 years and only then I faced some issues. I am pretty sure for an average consumer it will last long. Also it's sound quality is exceptional the bass is good and overall a pretty good listening experience microphone is also great and build quality is good for its price battery life is simply amazing it usually lasts about 5 to 6 hours for me when I use it continually for playing pubg, watching movies or listening to music

name: SARKAAR
title: NEVER PURCHASE BOAT PRODUCTS
content: It's a waste product to get in hyderabad. When switching off it's telling "areyy oo sully gaa powering off" which is rude and unparlimentary. Waste part from boat company.... BEWARE. Report: Valgur language. Sexual comments. Disrespectful.

name: purvesh patel
title: Read so you can describe the product on yr own way.
content: Pros :. 1)Product quality good,sound good .. 2)light weight. 3)battery time /playback time over all good. 4)connectivity average. Cons:. 1)After 30 min yr ears feeling presure. 2)Good connectivy when phone is in range. 3)some times i feel the lil slage in connectivity while silenting music.. 4) Its Not a product for daily bike commuters due to low noice cancellation.. Overall good product on bases of prices...

name: Roshan Raj
title: I will review it honestly for who all are reading this review
content: I read many good and bad reviews for this product and I brought it now I will review it honestly for who all are reading this review. 1.My product box is fully damage and reworked the box it's like some one used it but the product is fine.. 2.The sound clarity is good only for music with extraordinary bass in it but not for movie and YouTube videos.. 3.Noise cancellation is not good at all it's waste I still here background noise. 4.Not a great fit for workout session because due to sweat it's run out of ear and the magnetic lock is not locking perfectly when we unplugged in ear. 5.its has a good battery life like there said solidly 5:30-6 hrs and it's charge time is 1:30hrs. That's it everything I about this earphones.

name: ADITYA KUMAR NAGAR
title: Worst product
content: Disgusting product. First one was not working and second one is also good for nothing. Sometimes sound just disappears in between.. Above that it give battery low warning every minute after first warning. I hate that sound. It was my mistake to buy this one

name: Anthony
title: Decent pair of earphones for the price!!!
content: 6-Months review:. Pros:. 1.Price- Won't get anything better for this price. 2.Build Quality- Decent. 3.Bluetooth-Most of the Boat bluetoot- headsets have connectivity issues but not this one. Cons:. 1.Incorrectly displays battery percentage as 100% all the time and then suddenly gives a warning and dies. 2.Not very comfortable!! Can't wear for more than 30 mins. 3.Decent bass but poor mids and highs- not good enough. Conclusion: I would recommend you to buy ptron tango tws for 1500

name: Bhaskar Shetty
title: Bluetooth quality not at all good & very less battery storage
content: Purchased two Earphones, out of which one works good, however the second one has very bad battery storage (Drains out within 1 hr play, secondly the Blue tooth quality is not good, gets disconnected frequently from mobile phones. I would to better go for an better quality(expensive) earphone.

name: Anuj rawale
title: ROCKINGG!! ROKERZZZ 255 PRO
content: Honestly telling, these earphones areee mind boggling!..🥵 ..The sound quality is just aawwwsomee! The battery backup is also too good 👍👌.. and one thing if you are a bass lover you DEFINITELY gonna like them a lott! I repeat... A lot🙃 !! the fit is perfect you can surely use them while doing any activity either walking, running, cycling etc and they won't fall of ...I personally liked them as I'm a big fan of BOAT and I use most BOAT accessories.. when I planned to get these they were new in the market but when I purchased them they were just fantastic and more than what I expected..overall fabulous product...you can close your eyes and just go for them 🤘🎧❤

name: V.Vijaya Rama Rao
title: Very good earphone of this cost.
content: Sound quality is good. Bass is wonderful. Better life is awesome. There is no connecting issues. Before order I am very much doubtful about the performance of this earfone, because of reading some reviews in Amazon. But when I used this, I am very much satisfied. Amazon shipping is always good and prompt.

name: shivanshu shukla
title: Boat Rokerz review
content: Sound-4.5/5. Build quality-4.5/5. Battery life -4/5. Earphone's quality is good with strong magnetic lock... Straps are of good quality the wires are too good.. Buttons quality is good.. sound is full of punchy bass and and balanced treble and has sorrund effect.. Comfortable in ears connectivity is good... It has features of latest bluetooth 4.1 Version.. The best part is 10 minutes of charging can work around for an hour. Overall it's worth the price. I recommend all of you to go for it

name: Gaurav
title: Indian brand with Chinese quality
content: In short, the product is of inferior quality. Sound quality is low and not good at all. I deferred buying this product twice before I finally purchased in oct 19 after looking at huge sales volume and I think the decision was primarliy driven by good sales vol, less price n instant connect with indian brand but their all components n mfg is China based which is reflecting in their quality. I will surely not going to buy boat product in years to come until the perception changed.

name: Nijesh
title: Review after 1 week usage
content: Pros: I got this one for 999 INR as a prime day deal. The sound clarity and bass is nice. Fits perfectly in the ear. Can't get any better one at this price. Connectivity is okay and working perfectly while talking too.. Cons: Long wire (which may not be a problem for many).. I would recommend this to my friends. Hope this review helps.

name: S. Sengupta
title: Terrible sound quality.
content: Terrible sound quality. I don't have much idea about songs from the EDM, pop genre but if you are one who's into rock/metal or the likes then stay as far away from this as possible. The sound clarity is terribly. Lows can be lived with, the mids would make you hate your decision to buy, the highs would make you kill yourself. Noise cancellation is satisfactory but nothing beyond that. Charging never seemed a hassle to me and lasts a decent amount of time on battery. Build quality is good however it's only been a week. In terms of comfort, never really had any issues despite running it for a continuous 2-3 hours once. Buds are soft and fit in snugly. Bluetooth connectivity is strong, however there are times when the connection stutters.. And yes, it cannot be refunded,only replaced. So purchase wisely.

name: Praveenlal
title: Very poor bass quality, very low volume.
content: I bought this item, just because of the number of reviews displayed for this product. I have used with my MI Redimi Note 7 Pro mobile. I was so disappointed with the qulaity of the sound. First of all, the volume is very low even though at maximum volume kept. The bass effect is also very poor. Totally disappointed with the product.. I need to return this item, I want complete refund.

name: Akki_J
title: After sales service
content: After sales service of Boat is very bad. My piece stopped charging and when I went for replacement to one of the service center in Bengaluru, they said charging port is damaged. However, I used to plug and unplug the same way I do for my phone which never got damaged. This means the charging port Boat uses is of worst quality. There was no mention of how to plug/unplug charger and hence Boat should have replaced it. Completely disappointed with the product manufacturer.

name: Pradnya Valanju
title: Okay okay product
content: Sound quality is ok not that great. Also noice cancellation is also not upto the mark. I found the boat in ear wired headphones much better. Can't say about the battery life since I don't used earphones that much. If getting it below 1000 rupees it's a good purchase. It's distorts the sound if you shake a bit.

name: Wasim Shaikh
title: Headphone Beast.
content: Good product in such a great price. I have bought it for 899₹. I have been using this product from 1 month.. 1. The sound quality is good with bass.. 2. Battery live is good almost 8 hours of continuous use.. 3. Very flexible and no worries during the time of traveling even you go on sleep on your neck it doesn't give any feelings.. 4. I travel through train every week. When i plug this earplugs not a bit sound enters from outside.. 5. Even having a call is no more problem. You can recieve and deliver your message without any problem.

name: Deepak Singh
title: Must buy wireless earphone.
content: I have already used boat earphone and was quite satisfied with the performance interms of sound and bass, however I didn't expect that much this boat rockers 255 is tremendously performing great sound, clearance, noice cancellation bass will never gonna feel you headache and all if I talk about battery it works 7 Hours a day continuesly...well fitted in ear without any pain got this deal at lightning price at 999.. Thanks Amazon to provide such deal and swift delivery and your faith!!!

name: Pavan Rajkumar
title: Poor reliability product. Doesn't work even after sending for repairs twice.
content: DO NOT BUY. First 3 months of use was fine, working normally and getting good battery life as well. After this period one day it suddenly did not turn on. Sent it for BoAT service repair and received it back after two weeks. After the repair was working fine for one month, then again same problem. It did not power on. Sent it for boAt repair again but got it back only after some 3 months because of pandemic lockdown. Was working fine for another month but now it doesn't work again. The blue light is always on, but it does not connect to any device and the buttons don't seem to work. Very poor quality product. Sad to see this condition after seeing it sent for repairs twice.

name: Achyut Saxena
title: Did not work as per the features mentioned on the description and got damaged soon.
content: Bought these hoping for a good experience, but then faced many issues. The product didn't connect to more than 1 devices at a time, the sound quality was not good, the charging got over in like 2-3 hours after a full charge and the mic wasn't working at times.. And adding to all these, the right side of the product stopped working automatically within a month.. I am still trying to get a replacement but apparently my invoice has been rejected once and the BoAt site is irresponsive right now.. Not a very good product, please buy at your own risk.

name: Abi Prasad
title: Value for money and daliy office use
content: I was hesitate to Buy after using lg hbs750 but then show entirely changed, use the frist time impressed wll handle small features, ur mobile in DND u get voice messages incoming call pretty cool 😎 sound quality good and noise canceling best. Testing 5d songs wearing this u will locw it. Last but not least its fit inside the helmet ⛑

name: Mr.Chirag
title: Will definitely break and they'll provide no support
content: I had my boat rockerz 255 picked up on 11th September for replacement as one side was not working properly Since then I have got no revert from the boat's team, these guys are not picking up there calls on customer care number and are giving no response over the email from 20-25 days. My Ticket id is 538530.. It's been a pathetic experience with the boat as these guys clearly don't value there customers and are running there business like "Gupta Jee's" Shop. They are only hungry for your money and as you can see they don't provide any real support on their social media pages as well.

name: Chetan Dhiman
title: Bass Heavy in Budget.
content: The Bass and Sound output of the earphones are astonishingly loud for the price.. Fit could have been better, but that has also been taken care of by providing extra ear tips.. Noise cancellation can be termed as best in class, for the price. You barely listen to stuff going on around, even at 60% of the volumes. (Depends on choice of songs, as I say that. Still, substantial Noise Cancellation!!). Connectivity flickers a bit as you leave from one room and go to another, doubting the connectivity range mentioned. But even that is totally manageable... Too good for the price kind of product, no secodn thoughts required. Just Go For It!!! :). No second thoughts required. Totally go for it.

name: Er. Vivek Gupta
title: Fantastic Gift for my Brother
content: I have gifted this earphones to my brother and he is actually very happy with it. He impressed with built quality, length of earphone wire, sound quality and noise cancellation. I can say that in 900 rs i have found a fantastic deal on amazon.. Thanks #Boat.. although i really wanted to buy the blue ones but you have not reduced the cost to 999 in sale. No worries, black is also good.

name: Sandy
title: Worst Bluetooth earphone
content: First of all I during call , sound quality is not good and also there is echo and disturbance sound.. Secondly for music lover it is not good , I would recommend to go for other earphone. During travel signal is getting break.. So go for some good quality earphone with some extra money that would be really pleasing for you.. I have used it for 11 month and now one side ear is not working

name: Parmeshwar Bhandwale
title: Inconsistentancy in connectivity.  Some times mic stops working
content: After 10 - 12 days using I'm getting connectivity issue. It automatically disconnecting itself and try to connect again it showing only connecting connecting bt not get connected.. Another problem facing with most of the time while talking on calls after few minutes mic stops the working so another person unable to hear me but I'm clearly able hear that person. In such condition I need to do either disconnect the call and call again or disconnect Bluetooth and connect again.. I really want hear reply from boat team about these issue...

name: sudharsan viswa
title: Waste of money
content: After 6 months of use the left side was not working. Then got replacement of new earphone with warranty which lasted for only 2 months. Now OnePlus wireless z is available for 1999 please go for that. Sure OnePlus build quality is 100 times better than this earphone with better battery also.

name: vaishali joshi
title: Disappointed
content: Not satisfied by its fit in ear, its really uncomfortable, I have put small earbuds into it.. bt still it doesn't worked. My ears start hurting only in half an hour.. its sound quality is good... bt fit is completely uncomfortable.. I need to change this model.. it is in return period. Bt Amazon is only availing its replacement with same product.. Disappointed

name: Bharat Rajpurohit
title: Careless, Irresponsive, Untrustable Customer Care Team. Never responds ever via calls or mails.
content: Sound Quality, Noise Cancellation and Bluetooth Connectivity is good enough in this budget. But the mic went bad within 5months of purchase. Even one side earphone stopped working. But the main problem is that their customer service is hardly ever reachable if you face an issue. They pick up the earphones for service by a courier and never responded again. It's been 2 weeks already since I sent them my bluetooth earphones but I am yet to get a reply, leave alone getting my earphones. As far as I know this is a similar case like another brand called 'House of Marley'. 'Boat' Brand is very bad in their customer service response. This is a major drawback for an upcoming brand since if customer service team is careless then buying a 'Boat' brand product is as risky as buying any other non branded product.

name: Chhavi Jain
title: Poor After Sales service by Boat Nirvana - Useless Warranty
content: Please do not buy Boat products as the company has an extremely poor after sales service. My headset stopped working after 6 months and I have been sending mails and tweets to the company regularly from past 2 months however, there is no response from them yet. Later on, they will say that the warranty has expired and we will not be able to help. Better buy some other bramd headset.

name: Chetan G
title: Classy Product
content: I like the design of the headset. The best part of headset is sound the movement just turn it on i feel like i was in heaven and the beats were so good very can abel to listen each other and evry instrument which was played in the headset it was crystal Clear and i recommended this is one of the fantastic product and paisa vasool product.. please go for it...

name: Jay
title: Awesome sound quality but....
content: Everything is good, sound quality is awesome, look wise also decent but.....But battery life is bad, if you consider it for using a whole day battery may end up just before your day ends. Backup of 6-7 hours is not enough for a whole day use. If you want something with good battery life jabra elite 25e is what you are looking for but something with good sound quality this is what you are looking for but if you want both this thing in one, then sorry there is no such thing available i have searched and watched each and every earphones review but this technology seems to be failing you can even see that very few wireless mouse and keyboard have good ratings.

name: Ananya
title: Bad connectivity.
content: The product was well packaged in the usual amazon bubble wrap bag although the bottom of the actual packaging was squished. But after using it for two days, i noticed that it had a lot of connectivity issues. The minute i keep my phone in my pocket, the sound starts glitching. I can't hear the music or the voice on the other end pf the call. This is disappointing since I expected this particular brand to have extremely good connectivity, at least 10m. If my phone is in clear view, like on the table, the earphones work well. But the moment i keep it in my pocket & walk, the sound starts glitching.. Pros:. 1. The earphones have a good look.. 2. They sit well around the neck.. 3. Get connected very fast to devices.. 4. I like the in built voice to indicate phone calls, powering on & off. Rather than the phone's ringtone blaring in our ears while connected to the phone, "Incoming Call" suffices.. 5. Pop music, rock music ounds really good.. 6. Very good noise cancellation.. Cons:. 1. Bluetooth range is bad.. 2. Not good for instrumental, classical music.. 3. Bad microphone. No noise cancellation for phone calls.. 4. Ears start aching after a while.

name: Manikanta Chatrapathi
title: Not Satisfied
content: For first couple of months the earphone was excellent n I have referred it to many office colleagues .. Later one side of it wasn't working whenever there was low battery, thought it would be some technical issue and I've kept for charging in that case. But now it's totally stopped working n I'm unable to reach out to Boat Support on this .

name: Neeraj Kumar
title: 3.5/5 stars, good at this price range itherwise ok ok
content: Good build quality at this price range. Sound quality is good but a little improvement will be appreciated. No battery indicatiin. No full charge indication. No option to change the male notificatiin voice to female notification voice. Glitches are too often. Battery level indication in connected phone is wrong, shows 100% and 80% then direct 20% 4 to 5 minutes before shutting down.

name: Sanjay Bhan
title: FEEDBACK
content: my ear is goes out of order ,i am placing on line complaint but does not go through,pls replace it or suggest me what to do . this time i am in pune(Maharashtra) and my contact mobile no is 9811917164,. will give all star rating only after getting feed back from the co.

name: V R
title: good one
content: It works fine. Everything is good including battery life.. Except... - When I am in call, my friends say they could hear the background noise louder than my voice.. - When I watch video, I can notice the significant delay between the video and audio

name: arvind
title: For bass lovers
content: The sound quality is crisp and a good amount of bass, in terms of comfort this comes with a metal head which will cause u pain after 2-3hours but the neckband is weightless , you will get a good noise cancellation only when the volume is above 70%, the battery backup as claimed gives a 6hrs which enough for two days, when it comes to design the wire is too long which makes a awkward look, there was no Connectivity problem if you find so please check the transmitting device. Overall a good bluetooth earphones. Buy this only during sale days

name: Vipul Dhomane
title: Amazing sound quality but have LATENCY issue
content: It has amazing sound quality bass is superb and punchy.. Pros. 1. Earbuds seals the ears and cancels the outdoor noise it fits properly and stays in ear for longer time.. 2. The battery backup is good about 6-7 hr of playback and about more than full day standby.. 3. Amazing sound quality. Cons. 1. Bluetooth connectivity is not so good you can feel the desortion in sound when phone is in another room. Also i have experienced signal drop in open areas when phone is in pocket.. 2. LATENCY IS BAD its not a good product to play games and watch movies and series you will have to adjust the audio delay everytime and still you will face half second latency.. This is the only issue overall product is awesome

name: Amazon Customer
title: Waste of money
content: Dumbest thing I have ever used I have been a big user of boat head sets since a verylong time this time the headset gets disconnected frequently charging problem it doesn't even let you manage the battery life it shows high and sudden says battery low... Please don't buy boat rockerz 255 pro

name: Snehasis Mukherjee
title: Great for the price!
content: The headphones are really good for the price. The audio quality is amazing and the bass is thumping as well. Watching shows from Netflix, Disney plus, etc., are a real joy. The bass doesn't muffle the audio which makes it really good for the price.

name: Shashank
title: Highly Overrated.
content: Although I thought this will be an amazing purchase as I bought certain speakers of boat earlier, but i was very disappointed.. Cons:. 1.Mids are completely missing.. 2.Too much bass. Ruins the quality of music. 3.Hurts when listening loud.. Pros:. 1.Light weight.. 2.Wont fall of while running or something.. Conclusion: Do not buy if you are an audiophile. If you are ok with too much bass compromising quality of music while working out, then go for it.

name: Brent Ostos
title: Tight ear buds.
content: I enjoy having ear buds that fit tightly and don't need adjustment when I exercise. Sound is great and when I try and turn of the volume it pauses to warn me that the volume is too loud. This is important because I already have ruined my hearing with another pair of earphones. After years of working out wearing earbuds I made the mistake of purchasing systems that allowed me to go loud. In the moment it seemed like a good idea but at the age of 53 my ears have a permeant high pitch ringing. It sucks. Very happy with this product.

name: Astha
title: Noise addition instead of cancellation
content: I have a very bad experience in using this product. Whenever I talk over calls using this ear phone, person over call from other side always complain about heavy noise.
