Which distracts other person badly. I don't think it has noise cancelling feature even I think it adds unnecessary noise. Worst thing is that I can't return it because of Amazon policy.

name: Ravi Mahariya
title: Head phone is ok but company is worst
content: My experience with boat headphones are very bad it is in warranty for 1 year, one month left for warrant right side speaker stopped working as company policy they changed my product with new product, that's good, but product i received from them after 1 month facing same problem with new one, i called boat customer care about this they said sorry sir your product is out of warranty, we cannot do anything you have to charges for repair, that means they are making fool of customer, they said they gives to new one as replacement but they will gives you faulty product,

name: Mouna B N
title: Bought once replaced once and stopped working
content: Bought this as it was recommended due to its value for money. After 3 months of use, one side stopped functioning. Got a replacement as it was under warranty. Now the replacement also has stopped working after 3-4 months of use. It is not charging hence I'm unable to use it. I'd recommend going for another Bluetooth earphones.

name: Siddharth Senthil
title: Good for listening music, Worst for answering calls!
content: The Sound quality is Good. And the battery is pretty decent as well. This may sound OK to hear songs, but this is not good for handsfree calls. Noise cancelation is very bad as we tend to hear the noise of external sorroundings most of the time. The person on the other line of the call gets irritated after a few mins of the call due to this failure in noise cancelation.. In short : If you are looking for a handsfree earphone for music - This is good choice. But, if you also looking for handsfree calls then this might really disappoint you considering the budget... Think twice before buying

name: Suyash H Jagtap
title: I used them personally & would strongly recommend against any other earphone in same range.
content: So, If ur looking for a balanced product around 1-1.5k price point these are the best u can get. Bass & Sound quality on this one is great. Bass is bit more but can obviously be adjusted using music players & Noise cancellation on this is great. Best part is battery. Battery of this product is like awesome & recharge time is also less so that is what makes it special & fits in ears perfectly. And also cable quality seems good. So, Yes it's an even deal go for it & enjoy ur Boat rockerzzz.

name: Ketan Mehta
title: Good to talk, Good Battery, Music is not good sounds mono and low volume
content: Good connectivity,. Good clarity while calling,. Good range,. Good functions,. Good battery backup,. Bad music quality my purpose for purchase was for talking on phone which is solved very good but while listening music this is very bad sounds mono type and low volume even in latest music.

name: Pradeep kumar gupta
title: Nice product, can buy
content: I am writing this review after using it for 5 months. Its working as like day 1. No changes or problem in bluetooth and sound quality, Good. But sometimes it shows wrong % of charge in some device when we connect. So, I will say you can't trust the % charge but it will not matter for you when you will use regularly. It's battery backup is good, I used it for 7 hrs continuously still it has 40% charge. Nice product.

name: Ketan Parikh
title: It stopped working in 3 months!!
content: In less than 3 months this speakers are dead. Cant use them as the battery is dead. goes from no charge to full charge in 5-7 min and doesn't get switched on at all. what a useless product and complete waste of money. Now three months down the line cant return as well.. !!!. Thought, boat was a sensible and good company selling genuine stuff... was fooled.

name: Vibhuti
title: Very disappointed 😔
content: Have heard a lot of good things about these earphones, but to my disappointment I'm not happy with the purchase. I bought it two months back, and now one of the earpiece is not working. Only one side is playing the music and that too at low volume. Very disappointed. 🙄

name: jitendra kumar
title: Great headphone with a major drawback.
content: I'm purchased this headphone in January of 2019 and using it daily since.. # Battery last about 6 hours of mixed use( gaming+ call+video). # Sound quality is good and call clearity is nice.. # This headphone has a major issue that is left or right side of earpice stops working after about 3 month of use. I have replaced it 4 time in a year, with a waiting time 1 month to get replaced by boat. This problem is not limited to me only my 2 friends have the same problem. Because of this I donot recommend this headphone to anyone.

name: Divya Mohan
title: Not bad
content: It's good for listening music and calls. But when I disconnect calls or receive calls.. the sound of disconnecting calls & ringtone is too much that hurts your ears. Battery doesn't last longer. Lasts only for 3 hrs approx. on calls. Can be bought if the price is less than 1000.

name: YetAnotherHappyAmazonUser
title: Great Value for Money if you get any deal
content: Overall really good earphone, I just wish that they had provides a couple of other rubber earbud cover sizes the one that comes is a bit small. But sound quality and battery life is excellent!! The design is also nice with magnets to keep the earphone from falling off when not in use

name: Waquar Khan
title: Connectivity, Mic & Customer Service Issues
content: Purchased this product just a 3 months back trusting the quality of 'boAt', however, I have been repeatedly facing issues with its Connectivity & Mic.. 1. The device takes time to get paired, gets disconnected anytime, sometimes gets connected only for media and not for calls.. 2. Mic of the product is very poor. People on the other side of the call, often complains that they can't hear my voice and as soon as i switch to the phone's mic then everything gets normal.. 3. Trying to reach out to the team to get it exchanged as it's under warranty but getting no response.. Utterly Disappointed!!!

name: Yengkhom
title: Useless product, battery life is too low barely 3 hours
content: I made a mistake buying this item. It hardly gives 2 hours for a promised upto 6hrs. That is just half of it. Once full charged I checked it, but after two hours battery is dead. The sound quality is average, built quality is decent but the battery is too bad. I am thinking of replacing a new one.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best earphone with a lifespan of 3 months.
content: Purchased it couple of months back. I learnt my lesson that if you are looking for a reasonable wireless earphone you gotta empty your pocket a bit. These mid range wireless earphones within 1000-2000 rs range is just waste of money. Because after 3 months these become useless. I bought sony mdr xb50s that cost me close to 5k that time, but i lost it. Decided to go for mid range pieces . None of them lasted for more than 3 months including this one . Bought sony mdr xb50s again .

name: Atul Nigam
title: One of the best
content: Well, first things first... Amazing at this cost... I have used Sennheiser, Sony, JBL... But when compared to these premium brands, Boat Rockerz 25S headset has beaten them all!!!! Why??. 1. Noise Cancellation: One of the best noise cancellation headset, I've ever used... I would say, 8/10 on this parameter.. Outside noise is very much muted, but as I would have wanted, a bit outside noise is very much needed.. Safety first.... 2. Sound Quality: bass is just awesome.. Just good enough that one would have wanted. Treble is also good. Sound is clear and that's what matters most.. Blootooth connectivity: It is above average, connect quite quickly..

name: Subhayu Banik
title: Above avg sound quality and Value for money product
content: After exactly 6 days of extensive use of calling and music.. Below is a short review,hope it will help.. Pros:. Pocket friendly bluetooth earphn. Noise cancellation good. No prblm in calling voice quality. Bass is good. Quality of wire is good. Cons:. Music quality is above avg,not overwhelming if u r an avid music listener.. Rest everything is gd if u look at the price bucket,I bought it @1100,and it's working fine till now(touchwood).I will say its value for money deal.

name: Akki
title: happy customer after purchasing this 👍
content: i got this product on time so delivery experience is good. sound quality is great 10/10. design is superb 10/10. bluetooth range 10 m this is not sufficient but ok. sweatproof earphone that is good thing so i am using this earphone in my gym.. packaging was good and one good thing is this earphone will come with 1 year warranty and little high in cost but if you're looking for rocking sound and best quality for your daily routine and workout so you can go ahead. i will surely recommend this earphone to everyone..

name: Nihar R.
title: Best in the budget
content: I am really glad of having this product. The previous one from boat was boat rockerz 400 whose sound quality with bass was just fabulous but call quality dissapointed me but this one really is excellent... I think i made the right choice of having this great product. Really awsome product with best call quality , best durability, an excellent sound quality and a decent battery backup. What else one need from a product ranging around 1-1.5 k.. Really i just loved it

name: Sagnik Chakraborty
title: Value for money
content: The sound quality and build quality is pretty good. What I disliked about the product for which I have given 4 star to it is the length of the cord. It's a bit lengthy compared to Boat Rockerz 255 or 235 series.. But overall a value for money product.

name: Mani
title: Super as of now
content: It's one day use... will write later--. After 5 days use i have found one issue. that battery is getting drain within 1 hour from 60% to 0% and get switch off.. Pro:. Good sound quality. good battery until 60%. Good quality for this price. Quick connection. 2 device connection. noise cancel. Con:. Battery after 60%. For battery issue i made replacement.. so i got new one today 11/22/2019. : ). Will check and update the status.. Hi Got replacement.. after 1 month use am updating below. sound/battery/bass/clarity all so good. realy worth for money. dont wait grab it.

name: Sangavi
title: Excellent sound-stage at this price point.
content: Having owned multiple high end earphones I decided to buy a cheaper one for daily usage. I settled down with this after doing some research. I would say the sound quality is above average. Excellent sound stage with decent noise cancellation. When I first tired them on the voice prompt literally scared me lol. Built quality is also good but the wire length is big for me. I can connect to two devices seamlessly. I feel bass is little overpowered. Bought this for Rs.999 and it exceeds my expectation.

name: Neha Jain
title: Better grip expected with hooks over the ear
content: Product received is as per the description given at time of order placement. Bass is good if used in both ears simultaneously. Voice clarity is good. Good battery life.. Only thing I wished was a better grip . The rubber hooks hardly helps to keep it fixed in my ears and the buds seem to come off frequently even though they are at an angle.i wished if manufacture could have provided over-the-ears hooks as an option

name: Amulya V.
title: Good quality product in an affordable price
content: I just love this headset. I’ve used many other big brands before this. But most of them don’t have noise cancellation and also there used to be some echo. In the boat headset, noise cancellation is really good. There is no echo. Also the price is not high. It is quite affordable. The only thing is that the battery discharged within 6 hrs of usage. For me this is not an issue as I just use it for calls. If your usage doesn’t exceed more than 6 hrs a day, you can totally go for it

name: Viraj hate
title: Very good product
content: I am writing this review after one and half months the battery life is good . Value for money but it was costly i got in sale gor 900 wait for sales of diwali . If u buy this product i suggest if u want for calling and listing songs its good its noise cancellation is also good, if you want to buy onlyfor music listening go for head phone it will give nice experience .

name: Souvik Middya
title: Good at this price range!!
content: I brought this headphone compared to nothing. So previously i didn't have any Bluetooth headset. What i find good about this product is that 1. Its very light weight, very easy to carry while wearing 2. The quality of the chord is great, it can't damage easily 3. The sound quality is awesome and the best part is the noise cancellation which works completely great. Its takes only few minutes to get charged while plays for hours which is very great.. Now after using this for about one month the problem i have found is with the Bluetooth connection, sometime might face problem with lagging while listening.. But this problem you will feel rarely like in a day 4-5 times.. Apart from that, this is a great product to buy.

name: Ankur Bagai Media
title: Value for Money
content: These some of the most worthy BT Headphones in its price.. Pros:. 1. Good Bass. 2. Flexible. 3. Easy to Connect and Control. 4. Decent Battery Life (6-8 hours). Cons:. 1. Loose Ear Grip. 2. A bit too Lightweight. 3. Flimsy. 4. Doesn't have any indciation for battery life

name: Sourav rana
title: A fine product with genuine features.
content: *Writing the review after 1 week of use.. Product is good, the brand #Boat you can trust it. Sound is amazing and #Bass for which i was excited is good enough. May be for some of you bass can be a problem but guys for a price of this plus wireless you can't expect more. Also this product is long lasting. Things i liked about this-. 1. design. 2. Bass. 3. Magnet. 4. It's durability

name: Debosmit Banerjee
title: Service life 1.5 years
content: Well I used it for 1 years 8 months. I bought this in April 2019. The first time one ear stopped working was in October 2019. Since it was within warranty period I had it replaced with a new one. Then again it stopped working 2 days ago and now I cannot get it replaced. Overall it served good and am satisfied with its quality. But it's not sweat resistant actually so wouldn't recommend for a heavy workout session.

name: sumanth ben
title: Bass is on heavy side
content: Bass is on heavy side battery back up is good I get close to 7 hours with half volume the grip on the earphones are really getting good overall I see there should be a bit more balance of treble and bass on the headphones I Brought these on sale for 999 which is awesome price go for it

name: Shahid
title: Very Poor battery life
content: Extremely poor battery life in this price range. Sound quality is very very average. Don’t buy, you will regret. Connectivity is also very bad disconnects randomly.. Worst product form Boat. 👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾. I replaced it once thinking issue is with one particular piece but I was wrong.

name: Madugula josephbabu
title: Satisfied at this price
content: This is my first bluetooth neckband 😊😊😊. And this product fully satisfied me.. The actual price is 1599 but in GREAT INDIAN FESTIVAL I got it at 999.. My overall ratings out of 5. Sound quality at high volume-4.5. Bass-4. Battery backup-4. Fast charging-5. Look and design-5. Bass is punchy not extraa. I think you should wait for GREAT INDIAN FESTIVAL to bought it at 999 because at 1599 this neckband is not value for money and clearly it doesn't satisfies you.. This is my opinion. If you like this review 🤠🤠,drop👍

name: Sandeep
title: Excellent base
content: First things first, If not every one few people are curious at what price did others buy it, like am I paying too much ???? or Am I getting it at low price and book it out!!!! and stuff.. So I got this product at 1,399.00.. This is how I personally felt, so if there is anything wrong ignore it.. Now coming to pros and cons.. Pros. 1 ) Base is extremely good, you don't feel like its screaming into your ear at high volume.. 2) Noise cancellation is pretty good.. 3) Taking calls and stuff is good.. Cons.. 1) Bluetooth is a bit slow, it takes 2 sec to reflect say to pause the Song or go to next one.. 2) It makes that beep sound every time hit vol +/- . Personally I hate that.. Thank you for reading.

name: Soumi S.
title: BAD MIC, made in china, waste of money
content: ∆ Pick up more background noise, people from other side of phone complain about my voice low,and background noise more. Even in room anyone is talking in a low voice, the other person over phone thinking its a crowd.. ∆ Made in China.. Thinking about return, bt there is only option of replacement.. After replacement same problem..finally got return option.I got relieved.

name: C. F
title: Average headset with irritating ringing tone
content: I did not have any special expectations for the headset and it was simply that. An average headset for an affordable price. There is nothing special to write home about.. Cons:. 1. The irritating ringing tone that blasts your ear when someone calls. I feel like pulling it off my ear and just chucking it somewhere.. 2. The battery level indicator is not linear. It stays at 80% most of the time and when you are in the middle of a call, it says battery low and goes off within 5 minutes.. 3. After six months, the right ear bud stopped working. I guess the replacement warranty was for six months.. All in all, I would not recommend this.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Pretty bad to be honest. Can't understand the high ratings
content: Gotta say. The sound quality is garbage. I don't know what the other reviewers are smoking but the sound quality is reaaaly bad. It's muffled and booms and clarity is atrocious. Imagine hearing a waterfall with artificially boosted bass. I have a pair of 700 bucks sennheisers and they're MILES better. I only use these earphones for calls now.

name: @kavi
title: Pathetic connectivity
content: I am not sure whether its original boat Bluetooth... its been only 2 months but I am fleeting connectivity issues or charging issue... not able to understand.. I want to replace it with new one as I am fed of this Bluetooth...

name: Aman Peshin
title: Product Support
content: One side of the Boat 255 stopped working and I have been trying to reach the customer support with no success to claim warranty. I called the nearest warranty center of HSR with no success. I have sent them an email a few days back also and no response. Their online complaint registration form doesn't give the option to enter the pin code and other below details and later when I attach the Invoice and try to send, it says enter details. The warranty is expiring on 28th Sept. Amazon should help to claim a warranty!

name: Lalit Choudhary
title: Waste of Money to purchase this
content: I am trying to use it for calls. But there is too much noise and other person is not getting my voice. So I think waste of money to purchase this. I can connect this device to two platform computer or mobile. But there will be noise while using it. Within a month it's stopped working now. Useless product, Please don't purchase it. It's stopped charging now. You have to disconnect one device then you can take the call.

name: Naga
title: Value for money
content: I am using this headset for more than 1 year. Purchased for ₹1500. Sound quality, Base everything is good for this price.. Charging time: 2 - 3 hours normal charging (Not tried turbo / Fast charging).. Working time: 6 - 7 hours, of music & phone calls.. For music: smooth and clear sound quality. Volume increase and decrease buttons available.. For phone calls: Good, i didn't found anything bad.. Wearing: I am using it for running, Gym, driving (Able to wear inside helmet).. Connectivity: Bluetooth, automatically switch off when device not connected (within 5min)

name: Atul Mittal
title: Good product! Good sound!
content: It's been only one day so I can't rate it 5 star as I need to see how long it will last. From the first feel it seems to be a reasonable product.. I was under the impression that the neck band is made up of the wire itself but it's a semi-soft material which looks ok and doesn't cause discomfort. Buds hold well into the ears.

name: A.K.Meena
title: If battery is not the concern, u can go for it at 999
content: Though sound quality is good (according to it's price). I would suggest u to simply switch off the dolby music in ur phone settings to enjoy the original boat.. My concern is about it's battery life... it's not been a month and it started creating problem. Showing 50 to 60% battery and fall to 10 instantly.. hardly gives 3 hrs irrespective of what volume u r using it. I bought it for 999 and I found it not worth for it's price.

name: Aditya
title: Absolute value for money
content: Bought during the festival sales for 800, 5 Star for pricing and 1 day delivery.. Pros:. 1. Above average sound quality. 2. Bluetooth connectivity is trouble free.. 3. Ergonomics are good. 4. Superior build quality. Cons:. 1. Bluetooth range is low. 2. Noise heard for other person on call. 3. Sound distortion at high volume. My verdict it's an absolute buy if you get it under 1000 Rs deals.

name: Sam
title: Sound is not clear and battery also poor
content: Sound is not clear and battery also poor, customer service is worst i had face.. I'm totally disappointed with boat. They don't send return money instead of they told me the amount is freez on your bank. You go and fill the form then bank they will clear your amount otherwise not. Worst experience with boat rockers 255.

name: Khalid Shaikh
title: Not durable
content: Went for this as I have previously used boat handphones. But this product disappointed me. The headphone tip broke within 1 month of use.. Got this for Rs.900 in the sale.. Pros:. Good sound. Cons:. 1.Bluetooth connectivity issue. If kept in lower jean pocket, sometimes the connectivity drops and its very irritating.. 2. Poor Quality.. 3. The headphone tip easily breaks due to poor design.

name: Supermanian
title: Overall aaudio quality during  the call
content: Pro:. Good for listening to music. Cons:. First thing this product though claimed Indian, is made in China.. Second during audio or video call the person on the other side is not able to hear properly either low volume or breaking voice. Thirdly Battery life is not that great. Next is when the battery is at 20%, it just keep shouting battery is low and very annoying during the call. Next From 20 % charge with in 20 min the headphone switched off during the call

name: Tapas
title: Good product at this price
content: What more do you expect at 899. Even 4000 rs Bluetooth headsets are failing. None of the products have completely positive reviews therefore I decided to go with cheap and best and this one really does the job. Battery backup is not very long but ok. 20 feet of range approx

name: Radz
title: SuperDuperAwesome
content: Value for money . I bought it for 999₹ in lightening deal.. Bass is fantastic feels like home theatre sound.. Sound quality as expected, was looking for something to atleast reach my iphones earphones .. and this is exact what I wanted.. Noise cancellation is superb.. Light weight. Look wise Porsche, rich look.. Easy access. Siri to working with this hps.. Ear bud magnet it very nice.. In love with this product , planning to order 1 more for my sister.

name: jainnk59
title: Boat rockers review 3 months
content: Pros:. +Decent sound quality. +Durable. +Easy to fit in ear. +Noise cancellation. Cons;. -Extremely poor battry life (lasts less than 2 hrs). -Not recommended for people who love to hear original sound effects in music. (I like bass so it was okay for me). 3 star due to poor battery life. Had to recharge very frequently.

name: Amit rai
title: Best headphones no word
content: My best purchase ...very honest review plzzz read all.... 1..First best part of boat rockerz 255 it's sound quality and build quality .... No compare with other Bluetooth headphones like bould curve probass neckband like noise and etc.... 2..boat a papular brand and most trusteble brand in India is also made in India product...by most papular company Harman .... 3..the bass is totally fabulous.... I believe you like very much ... 4 ..I request to all plzzz don't west your money and time for bould noise and other headphones purches ... Go for it........

name: Pravesh Choudhary
title: BAD AFTER SALE SERVICE, HIGHLY  RECOMMENDED DON'T BUY & GO FOR OTHER BRAND WITH SIMILAR PRODUCTS
content: I highly recommend don't buy Boat products, If you are looking for expensive product without any warranty claims requirements than go for it, dont keep any expectation for after sale service, they will niether answer your call or if you visit service center there also you will not get any positive response (Service centre executives are also frustrated because of companies bad after sale service, they are also helpless) as the problem is in roots of this companies management, you can try calling National Customer care number of boat they will not pick up your call - 02249461882, either go for some other brand.

name: nikhil
title: Poor sound quality for video calling
content: Don't know what went wrong with it. Its "boAt". I guess bluetooth technology is not working that properly. There was lot disturbing sound in between. Not at all good for video calling apps like zoom and google meet. The other side people were not able to hear properly.. Had already ordered one and then replaced. But found same problem with this one also... so finally returned.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Headphones is very good but service of boat is very very and very worst.
content: Sound quality is good bass also very good and noice cancellation is very very good. But the problem is service of boat is very very and very bad. I had never seen before as much worst service. Totally Disgusting. I do complain of my boat rockerz 16 days before but till now I don't have any thing. No headphones, no information, no any msg ,no call , nothing. Totally a bad service. If I talk about costumer care service then it's like a cowduck or potty. If you want to talk costumer care then they will never pickup your call or otherwise they say..iss rout ki sabhi line vayast h. That is the service of boat. And this is happening 3rd time with me.

name: Sejal p.
title: Don't buy it!!!
content: The worst product I have ever bought.I bought it thinking it won't give me a chance of complaining but it's one side stopped working after some days and other side also started dysfunctioning. I couldn't return it back here because this earphones stopped working after it's return date mentioned on Amazon. And now I am trying to claim warranty but it's also very frustrating as they aren't providing me any meaningful help for it.I suggest not to buy this product as neither the product is good nor the boat gives good customer service

name: Kindle Customer 1
title: Does not last for more than 3 months
content: This is bad product in the sense that it works for a couple of months and then one headphone stops working and after a few days the other one too stops working. The worst thing is that the company sells this product under replacement warranty of one year, meaning that they will replace the product within one ear, but when you call their helpline no one picks up the phone, the website does not work. Seems like a fraud company with fly by night ethics. I had bought two headsets-- one for myself and one for my brother. Both of them stopped working within 3 months.

name: Sahil Khan
title: Not upto the mark...Treble low..Bass High...Poor Connectivity
content: First impressions were good but after using for about 1 hour..real problems came to my knowledge...Bass is no doubt of decent quality but treble is low...i felt some point that the voice isn't clear..and i am not that fan of bass that i would compromise with the Voice quality (Treble)... Secondly the connectivity is very bad...it claims to be having a range of 10 meters but in my case lost it within 10 meters...and also the Bluetooth isn't provided with the latest 5.0..its still version 4.1..perhaps if it would have came up with the latest Bluetooth version ,the connectivity could have been better..as now all phones supports Bluetooth 5.0..i would suggest in this price range...Nu Republic JAXX 3 is a very good Earphone with great sound quality then this..

name: saket kashyap
title: Worst service i ever get
content: only after using for a month the the product stop working. I opted for warranty option. Even after 20 days when i returned the product to Boat team...did not get info when can i got my earphones back. First they said due to covid its is getting delayed then they said due to technical glitches we could not update when it will be repaired. pathetic experience.

name: HSJ
title: Decent sound but bad battery life
content: They're a decent pair of Bluetooth earphones, but the battery life is bad (not more than 3 hours total) & the sound quality is so-so. The bass is especially muddy.. They fit in the ear & stay in the ear better than I had expected. Bought these for 1500 & they're definitely not worth that price. At ~800-900 I might have given these a 4-star review.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Much recommended
content: I am more of a calling person rather than music one. I carry two phones which keeps on ringing alternatively throughout the day (don't worry i dont work in a call centre 😝). The biggest reason why i opted for a Bluetooth earphone was to protect my phone's from the sweat as i live in a humid area and also to avoid direct exposure to radiations to a certain extent. I did a lot of research but nothing couldn't convince me so i thought of purchasing Bluetooth headset of reconnect (reliance electronics brand) which costed me Rs 1000/-. It is a decent product to start with but will always be in back of your mind as you have to keep adjusting it time and again. Also the battery would last only 4 to 5 hours with my time of calling. Also the other person on call used to complain very often about the poor voice quality. Then i switched to boat rockers and trust me it's all together a different experience with almost similar price. The neck band will ensure its stability and it lasts almost the whole day even after 100 calls a day. And after almost a month of usage, nobody has raised concern about poor audio quality.

name: ruchi
title: Totally wasted
content: I received the product on 25th Dec and then onwards it worked properly for 2-3days, then it started creating issue, it always get disconnected and connected everytime, it's return option is also get closed on 1st.I am so helpless

name: vivek
title: Excellent product
content: Boat is awesome if you like to hear bass's and quality.. I am using one plus 6 and quite satisfied with boat. In case of audio controls. Double tap + button to increase volume & single tap for change next track.. Double tap - button to decrease volume & single tap to previous track.. Double tap o or middle button to dial last call, single tap 2 seconds for Google assistant, single tap immediate to play or pause music, single tap long press to on or off boat rocker or Bluetooth connectivity.. If u charge daily 20 minutes it's enough for long day continues music.. Overall Good product.

name: L K Sahoo
title: I want to return not replacement
content: I want to return the item and take back my money.. It is purely cheating to the customer . Nowhere it is mentioned that only replacement .. There is no return available and only replace .Item is too junk and does not hold any charge.

name: Shinjini
title: Great Sound and Modest Price
content: I got this for Rs. 999 and have been using it for about two weeks. So far I have used it to listen to music on Moto G4 Plus and some other phones, and I've used it to watch movies on my laptop. While the Bluetooth connection to my phone was seamless, it was a little difficult to connect to the laptop.. Sound Quality: 4/5. Bass Quality: 4/5. Noise Cancellation: 4/5. Design: 4/5. Packaging: 5/5. Pros:. 1. Easy to use.. 2. Great sound quality.. Cons:. 1. Wires are a little long.. 2. Simultaneous Bluetooth connection to 2 devices did not work for me.

name: srikanth
title: Not for calls only Music
content: After purchasing i regretted. Bcoz when i was taking calls outdoors the other party could not hear my voice properly as the mic is grabbing more outside noise than my voice. This is one heads-up to the users. If u are the person who takes calls during traffic or outdoors opposite person will literally get irritated.

name: diga deshmukh
title: This headphones for songs listing not recommended for call
content: Good product for song listening not for call it's a actually gym or exercise use headphones not for call peaking I used this product from last 12 days around i noticed some major cons in it when you call another person from this headphones make sure you stay in quite place coz this headphones mic pick each and every sound surrounding from your place so your speaking voice is not that much clear for your call person overall one line review is very nice and high quality headphones for songs listing not for call

name: Dhruv Sharma
title: Value for money awesome bluetooth earphones
content: Like the product completely, no complaints whatsoever. Sound quality, noise reduction, battery life(a few days with moderate use) all great. Prior to that, timely delivery, good packaging etc. Fully satisfied. Recommend to all.

name: Mariyam Khan
title: Recieved a defective product
content: I have ordered two boat rockers, one black for my mom and one red for myself, so the black one was truly awesome, but this red one was different, the sound quality was different, it was low, the earnobes fitting was loose, and then when i tried replacing it, it said i have to courier it myself, there is no pickup, so i m not satisfied with this red one, the other black one i bought is truly amazing. I wish the red one was also like that

name: Sarav M
title: What else can do the job better!
content: After using the product for more than two months, I am posting the review: this is the best budget Bluetooth Wireless Earphone for all my needs: be it the official calls when connected to laptop or smartphone, or for watching movies, this one does the job. Highly recommended from my end.. With Love,. Sarav

name: Sarfaraz
title: Average product - buy only for wireless use.
content: Just another average product from a brand that promises a lot. Meets the purpose of tangle free handling of earphones which otherwise provide better sound quality at 1/3rd the price of bluetooth earphones.. Sound quality - like any other, don't expect too much. Just about clear. Average sound quality at mid volumes.. Bass - Good bass punch. The clarity of the earphones don't compliment the bass well.. I'm not a sound expert !

name: Umesh
title: Worth for the price.
content: Looks but cheap but does the job just fine. Sound quality is good. The ear buds grip is not that great, it keeps falling even with additional support. I baught this for taking calls so cant really comment on bass or music quality.

name: Sowmya
title: Good product but not suitable for ladies
content: I checked the reviews and bought it,it is good, but I missed the point, it doesn't suitable for ladies, it's too big for our ears, so disappointed, that product is good but I can't use it, I kept it for my brother

name: tmf
title: It is a semirigid neck band, not a fully wire type of headphones
content: This is a semi rigid neck band with hanging wires from both ends. This was never mentioned in the description. Was looking for a full wire type earphones which can be conveniently carried in pocket. Long wires hanging down from tip of neck band reaches near ur umbilicus, kind of odd looking. Voice clarity is just ok. Clarity of the music is not exactly reproduced.

name: Prasad Chandanshive
title: Great product...
content: This is an awesome product you can get at this price range...nice bass and you will love it...at max level you can feel little bit distortion but that's not a big deal... and if you talk about about gaming there is very negligible latency and it's like nothing...I was curious about products originality but it seems gunine one...it's my first day with this product and I will update in next 2 weeks about its reliability...I got it in just 999/-

name: Ankit Kumawat
title: Amazing sound quality
content: Must go for this. Lower priced perfect bluetooth earphone. I used it for around 1 year and battery life was stands constantly 4-5 hours and charging was 40-60 mins. No issue with battery and not with sound quality.. A single drawback user feel is its wire length, but it's not that big issue. Just go for it

name: Ashik Biswas
title: Good experience for music lover at this price range
content: Good Headphone for music lover but if you buy it for watching movie then go for another option. Bass is really good which makes your music experience better but you will miss lower tone and mid tone when watching movies. Low vocal and high bass suffer you in movie experience. When we need high vocal and low base at movie. Its high base and instrumental tone suppress the vocal of movie.. Battery backup is good. You can get 6-7 hours battery backup easily and takes 1.5 hours full charge.

name: Karthikeyan M
title: To claim warranty
content: I want to claim warranty..... I ve issue on my wireless bluetooth headset,. It was not working on right side from last night

name: Anand
title: Not worth
content: This is just an ok type product. Faced lots of issues while switching connection between laptop and mobile phone. Used it for few months but not satisfied. Finally got pissed off as it was not connecting while i was taking an important call from office through my laptop. Smashed it to ground and put it to dustbin where it should actually belong.

name: Himanshu Satija
title: Battery drains out in 1.5 hours
content: The battery drains real fast, exhausted in 1.5 hours. Unlike other headphones, it still keeps running even when the earbuds are locked with each other. And there's often this disturbance during calls and I have to switch to earpiece.. Sound quality is decent so alright for listening to music but there's still the battery issue.

name: Deep Varshney
title: Won't last very long
content: Have been using for a year.. Build quality is average... Wont last you very long. The buttons will start to fall off. One ear has stopped working for me.. Was ok while it lasted. I would say not worth the money you would spend

name: Amazon Customer
title: Noisy Microphone
content: 1. Something is really wrong with Bluetooth tech.. The pairing gets interference with wifi signals of other devices like when it’s placed near another phone/ ipad. FYI: I use 2.4/5Ghz dual band router.. 2. The microphone picks only noise more often than voice. It’s annoying for the person on call.. Picks up the noise of fan/ vehicle honking/ breath/ wind etc., but usually NOT the VOICE.

name: Micky
title: Product could be robust !! But not
content: Product is ok ok. Sound is ok.. Quality of wire is questionable !. As i red circle weakest part of the product. Donot know how long it will be durable ?. Possible wire cut or damage in long run since it is always get repetitive bend while placing on neck and removing. However i will try to treat this part very carefully.. But this area could be robust.

name: Upendra Vashishtha
title: Captures a lot of background noises
content: Captures a lot of background noises. the headphone captures a lot of your background noises that you don't even listen from your surroundings. When you're talking on call while using it, it doesn't give you that clear sound of the person but the background sound.. Also, the microphone can't used from the distance, you have to be around the device you're connected to via Bluetooth.

name: Clifford Picardo
title: Good Quality and Price-UPDATE
content: I really like this set. It's better than the one I got from the US. The drivers in this one are very good. I recommend this set.. UPDATE: after using it for 9 months.. 1 side of the earphone has become very low. The one I got from the US is still working very well. I use the 1 from the US more than this one. I will not buy this brand again.

name: RAHUL
title: The Worst Earphones Ever
content: First of all,, This review is about Boat Rockerz 255 Bluetooth earphone. Generally , I don't have the habit of writing product reviews but this s*** earphones made me review this in order to save the other consumers who are planning to buy this CRAP. In my opinion ,,Firstly , An earphone should be comfortable to wear. In this regard,, it makes you to cry in pain even after 5 minutes of usage !! Secondly , it should have a good audio Quality !! It's just okayish when it comes to sound quality, Nothing great to talk about it. Overall, Never buy this earphone even if they give it for free unless if you wanna hurt your ears with this abysmal earphones.

name: M.Satyanarayana, genuine customer
title: Not happy with this product
content: I have been using it since last 5months , recently it has got some problems. Some times not getting charge, sudden discharge and key buttons not working. I am not happy with this product. It has got 1 year warranty, but helpline phones not working and website also not working properly. Any one advise me in this regard.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Certainly not for taking phone calls
content: Overall quality is good, however it is certainly not the best choice to take phone calls. Have been using it for a while now and have noticed that noise cancellation is almost non existent and other end can barely hear even when there is slight noise around, works OK only if you are in absolutely noise free area.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Issue with battery 🔋🔋🔋
content: Bass quality is good but I think little more this is a required the build quality is really very nice metal body but 8 I have one issue regarding battery in starting it give a really very good battery backup but if you charge more than its capacity it will give you less battery backup so do not charge more than 1 hour I am using that headphone from last 6 months now I have to charge that earphone more than two to three times in a day so before buying this earphone please look at more options

name: Meghdeep
title: If u would kindly replace my earphones would be great
content: Its been 8 months since i have baught this boat rockers 255 in the beginning it wos working perfectly fine after three months the battery started to degrade because when it was new its battery used to last for atleast 5 and a half hours atleast but after 3 months it used to last only for three hours and i had to charge it for atleast 2 hours so i started using other wired earphones for a while and now within this lockdown i decided to start using my boat earphones but now all of a sudden its right earpeace is only working and the left one has stopped to work so please kindly help me and replace my earphones.

name: 2015BLR
title: Worth & do go for it when needed.
content: W/L earphone in 1-1.5K price range. Handle carefully for 1st 1 week to understand different feature capability. Had many -ve reviews on Amazon but I still opted for it. Incidentally all is well till now after 1 month use. Little problem in call/audio management but that's not a major issue. Same feature of JBL is on higher price rande (4K) so not bad this one.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not worth the bucks
content: Writing this after 4 months of usage. Not any expert on earphones, just a layman trying to get a VFM Bluetooth headphones with some nice audio quality. No doubt boat rockerzz dissapoints to the core. The built quality is really bad one of the edges is already coming off. The battery caught and the coating started pelling off. The Bluetooth connectivity is also bad. There are gaps in the connectivity even when the phone is in my pocket.. The only saving Grace is the bass in the audio.. Bluetooth connectivity - 2/10. Build quality - 1/10. Audio quality - 6/10. Value for money - not at all

name: Jobin
title: Awesome
content: Very good sound quality. It is perfect for sports and also other purposes.. Very good bass (if bass is not there download app bass booster you will get it). Noise cancelation is good. It is given that battery backup of 6 hours. But after i used it, i came to know that it can give a battery back up of 6 hours and more

name: Rakshita Bawari
title: Not good
content: I have been using this product for 2 months now. First time it got charged in 1½ hours. Second time the red light didn't turn to green even after chargin for 2½ hours. Since then the battery percentage turns100% but the red light never changes to green. Also, the battery percentage decrease with 20%. Example: 100%, 80%, 60%, 40%, 20% and the device starts giving battery low warning at 20% and switches off within 2-3 minutes. Few days back one of the ear support got lose and it came off today. 100% Comfortable but overall product performance is not upto the mark.

name: rohitaksha panda
title: Not worth it
content: Decent for work or causal music listening. But not the best option for running or working out. Lasted only 6 months. Mic gives a lot of noise to the listener. After 6 months of use, it stopped connecting on its own. The automated voice of the speaker went from male baritone to a squeek.

name: PRATYUSH NAYAK
title: Issue with cable.
content: Before using comneted to power supply for full charging bt the cable attached with product that was value less not inserted properly and even not able to charge any device .After using 4-5 days the backup was not so.good as per description & it shuts down when it was 20% of battery .so it's return period was over now I I don't know what to do with the issue .just make sure before delivery to customer all parts are working including the box.

name: Preeyal Gupta
title: Dissatisfied
content: I'm extremely disappointed with this product. I bought it in September 2019. Since then I had to send it back to the company twice because everytime one of the earphones stops working. Both the times the company sent a new product but even then it barely works for 5-6 months and then the same problem is faced. Since it was under a warranty of 1 year the company easily changed it. But now that won't be possible. I just don't get it why a product worth 1500 had to be changed twice in a span of 1.5 years. I do not recommend this product. Dissatisfied

name: S S
title: Good earphone
content: The earphone is pretty good. The grip is excellent. It does not move when you workout. It provides decent sound insulation. The sound quality is pretty good. The battery backup is good. I could play music constantly for around 8 hours before it discharged from full charge. It takes around 1.5 to 2 hours to charge it from 0% to 100%

name: Vir
title: Faulty Item Delivered 2 times
content: Voice was breaking when I used earphone during Jogging. I guess it was having problem with Bluetooth connectivity .If I keep phone near to earphone it was working fine, but during walk or jog if phone is in pocket, voice use to break a lot. So I decided to replace it, but second time as well they delivered earphone with damaged earbud.. It was frustrating. I am not buying it again.. Over all Sound quality is good

name: Hardik Mewada
title: Never buy again this product and never suggest to anyone
content: While I'm connected bluetooth so after 0.30minutes to 0.45minutes automatically disconnect and sometimes sound is very slow music / watching time and calling time opposite person always ask your voice is very slow please speak louder.

name: Antra
title: Product delivered seems a used product!
content: Find attached the photos, the box seal was open and also product was not packed properly. It seems some one has used it. Also the battery was fully discharged which was supposed to be fully charged and new product! Disappointed with the dealer plz do take a strict action on him. Attaching here the photos as proof!

name: VinodBaretto
title: Excellent Product
content: The earphones are sleek and not bulky around the neck. Give a really good sporty look. The sound quality is very nice and not harsh. Good bass and treble balance even when on full volume.. Got this product during the Amazon sale on headphones. had ordered two earphone, one was defective; hence one less star in the overall review. The other one was in great condition. a good deal for the price.

name: iamab77
title: Boat Rocks !
content: Writing after 1 months of rough use .. Only get detached the rubber cap of charging point.. Super compatible with my Samsung Grand 2 , Samsung M20 and Lenovo Lappy.. Light weight.. Super sound quality. Same as JBL as I am JBL freak . Now a days JBL is giving bad cord for headphones... this one is good in 255.. Only problem is the distance frequency is very very low.. I purchased on Rs.999/- on sale.. Better than other products as the round neck is not stiff so can listen while sleep too .. Don't think too much just go for it .. not disappoint you .

name: Shweta T.
title: Read the whole...do not use for gaming lag of 1 sec is found
content: Using it for 3 weeks. Bass is good but could be better. Noise cancellation not upto the mark bit yes on 90 percent volume monst of noise is cancelled. Sound quality is excellent. Battery is good because in one charge i use it for 5 hours or maybe a bit less at 80-90 percent volume which is nice. Gets connected very fast. Do not use for gaming as the sound of footsteps and bullets will come after 1 second(happened with me I have realme 6 with bt v5.0) and no one prefers any wireless headphones for gaming until they are above 2500. Go for wired if you want to play games

name: Amazon Customer
title: THE DEALER HAS NOT PROVIDED A INVOICE , caution , product not durable
content: now my boat rocker is not working .... tried to apply for a warrenty as its well within the warrenty period , but on searching for the invoice i found that it was never delivered to me at all .... without which u cant apply for a replacmet or a repair ..........BE CAREFUL REGARDNG THIS .....Also customer care centers are present only in a hand full of places ......so IT IS A BAD CHOICE IF UR ARE LOOKING FOR A DURABLE PRODUCT ..... It worked for ONLY 11 MONTHS .....that too with minimal use !!!!!!

name: Hari
title: Think before you choose
content: Quality wise OK / Better battery back up is good. But for replacement service is very worst,. If Amazon Team not involved in the support.... I couldn't get my replacement. I would suggest to go with sennheiser headphones. That's good quality headphones with excellent sounds clarity.... And worth of money.

name: Yash N Rao
title: Awesome product, Love With Boat Rockerz 255
content: It is an awesome, I really like it cause the sound quality. And the most important thing is that it won't trouble your ears if you wear it for a long as I tried most of the headphones, wireless Bluetooths most of them troubles me a lot if I put them into or on my ears for a long like 1 to 2 hrs. But this one is really awesome, the bass is superb, it won't fall down from your ears while running... Amazing product. Boat rocker 255 is really rocking as the name..... If I want to rate it so definitely it will be 5/5

name: stenardt
title: Good Value for money
content: Gets 7-8 hours on full charge . It been 2 months since i bought this.. PRO's. Value for money (i bought it for 950 rupees). Bluetooth connectivity is good.. Dedicated button for pause /play/on/off/google assistant (same button different duration of time). another 2 buttons for volume up/down /next/ previous. Creates a vacuum in ear.. Properly fits.. CONs. Hurts ear if you wear it for long time .. Creates audio that is irritating when you put volume to mute.. Charging still done through micro usb port and not type-c.. Build Quality not for workout just wear at a desk.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not a consistent one, worst warranty service
content: Bought 3 and giving review after 5 months. Sound quality. Battery backup is really good. But the product quality is not at all good. And the worst part is that during warranty period, service by them. Worst service. It takes more than a month for a replacement to get. So what will happen is that 6 months it will be with you and 6 months with them. It is cheap, but you will start regretting it, when first time, it stops working, then waiting period will start and will never end

name: Tej
title: Satisfied
content: Superb product. Sound quality is impressive. It cancels out the bad sounds perfectly. Very easy to connect to any device. Compatable for android or smart tv also along with android, apple, windows devices also. Sound quality remains same even after 6-7 years. I would highly recommend this product.

name: Sachin Mishra
title: Awesome product
content: Build quality (5/5). Durability (4/5). Sound quality (5/5). Microphone (4/5). Ear comfort (5/5). This product met my expectations..... Thanks Amazon ❤️

name: Amazon Customer
title: boAt are very good brand
content: If you like bass than buy it superb bass but it's survive in low beats.. Overall it's best item and justify price.. By the way boat after sales service are damn good. If your earphone having any issue you need only log a complaint on website and upload proof of purchase they send courier person to pickup and they replace your earphone with sealed pack new within 10 days.

name: Himanshu
title: Not Good Sound lag, Dont recommend to buy.
content: Sound quality is good, but when I keep the phone in the pocket there is a lag in every 6-10 sec which is not good and make the product among all the available option, got the product seal in open seal condition, Giving 2 star because the sound quality is good and one for the amazon superb service. If I got a good quality then I will update my review about the new one. After replacement Provided the good wireless earphone , but they also lag sometimes,Superb service by Amazon.. I recommend Dont buy this...

name: Ridham
title: Sound quality is disappointing , sound is so muddy and unclear. Wrost for those vocals
content: If you love muddy sound and only want to hear bass ,yes you can waste your precious time and money on this earphones. My old nokia earphones were more clear in terms of sound. It looks like boat just increased the bass and forgot about every other thing.. Watched some movies too and voice of actors was muffling as hell. But anyway i would say order one and check it ur self. Becoz you can return it back and get it back in Amazon pay.

name: Akhi
title: Good for this price range, Best one you get
content: One of fantastic earpiece in this price range, i got it for 899 from Great Indian Sale on Amazon.in. Sound quality is good but not best.. Bass is good.. Bluetooth connectivity is fine as i can use it anywhere in my home.. Battery is good as it gives upto 5 hours playing music or talking. (ONE PROBLEM I DETECTED IS IT WON'T SHOW YOU HOW MUCH BATTERY REMAINING) as when fully charged it shows 100% in phone suddenly after sometime it shows 80% then after sometime it's on 60% thn it can be switched off anytime but exactly it will run for 5 hours.. It gives warning of battery low at 20%. Overall good product for this price range.. It shows that it will give battery backup upto 6 hours but i find it will go upto 8 hours.

name: Karthik
title: 9 months Review
content: I bought this neckband on October 4th..Now right side of the band is not working..It's about to die... 1.Good sound quality..Not to expect too much on this price range.. 2.Worst Noise cancellation.. 3.Heavy bass. 4.Perfect battery life..Im using this for past 9months..From day one the battery life is same.Continous usage for 6 to 7 hrs..Normal usage for a day... At the last Oct or 2019 it's worth for money..Bt now they have realme buds and latest OnePlus bullets..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good for sound quality
content: After 6 months of usage i'ld say it has min 4-5 hrs of continuous battery for 100-0%. But when it comes to noise cancellation that's tricky, i mean noise from your side is made high for other person and you'll be safe from other person's noise. Sad part is its connectivity with two devices does not work as mentioned by the company. There are even rare chances with single devices it irritates with sudden on and off connection during the call.. Overall for a normal usage its better product. i wish if there is any improvement in battery life

name: madhu singh
title: Not value for money
content: Didnt fit my expectations,sound quality is good but battery backup is pathetic never lasted more than half an hour on 100 % charge,moreover the range too isnt good.doesnt work for running as the fitting isnt great .packaging too was pathetic it had dust inside the package.. Stopped working within two weeks,wareanty isnt smooth too,jun 14 se complaint daali hai no response.wasted my money

name: Amit
title: Zero noice cancellation
content: Purchased around 4 months back. Sound quality and Bass is superb. Battery back up is great. No issue in connectivity.. But, I have only one complaint.. its noice cancellation is almost zero. I mean, we can hear the clock ticking sound also if we are talking in a room. And if its noisy background, u can't talk at all.. it amplifies noice sounds rather controlling..

name: namarta s.
title: Not the best but good for the price they come in.
content: I've now used this product for over a month.. Sound quality is good.. Mic is good.. Major problem is during calls, even if a spoon falls near you the other person would hear it as a loud thunder. It catches lot of noise. Sometimes I've to remove earphones and then continue the call.. Fit is little weird. Right side ear plug keeps popping out.

name: Kapil Tiwari
title: Needs to fix connectivity issue...
content: After using 6 months this bluetooth m writing this review,. Pros.. It's cheaper than its competitors. Has 3hrs battery backup for music. For calls it lasts half day on avg.. Cons. Connectivity with xiomi/ Samsung phones is an serious issue, I have xiomi note 6 pro and samsung M30s and Note 10 this device has issue with all devices but it works well with samsung tablets.

name: Shivaprasad A
title: Do not buy this product.
content: Super sound quality. battery life was good around 6h and takes 1.5 h to make it full. really like the product. After 7 months of usage right side of the ear speaker not working,i send it for warranty claim. on July but till date there is no update about the product and services,. Service center is in mumbai so if the product is send for service it will take around 3 months may be more to repair it or replace it.. Think again to purchase or not to purchase,. I suggest you people should purchase the product that the service center is in your home town, Go for other product.. Thank you

name: Vyasa
title: I am using this product for past 1 years
content: 1. Mic stopped working with 3 months. 2. Battery is dead after 9 months of usage. 3. Service center call number is not reachable and not responding for the message. 4, Not sure how we can drop to the service center during the COVD situation.

name: B.P.M. ADITYA
title: Just ok product. Otherthan bass quality nothing great about
content: Bass is extremely good. No doubt. mic clarity is very poor, especially during outside. Mic noise cancelation is not effective. Ear buds are comfort enough and completely conceals the ears so during driving you should use only one side, otherwise you cannot hear the other vehicles horns etc., After usage for some long time of 1hr or so it pains in the ears. Battery back up is 4 to 5hrs hardly. Please be careful that once battery charge comes down to 20%, it switches off...bluetooth connectivity range is very short.

name: tushar salvi
title: I lost trust on boAt product quality
content: I dont lik that Bluetooth connectivity of this product its easily lost the connectivity with in 5 to 6 meter even company claim that 10 meter of connectivity and microphone not good opponent Cannot hear voice properly they telling u need to talk loudly even m loudly yelling opponent can hear voice very low amount rather than normal phone talking microphone is worst otherwise may be this product has problems i want original product with proper replacement and dont want defective product again

name: Prash
title: NOT TO BUY. WASTE OF MONEY
content: I DONT KNOW WHETHER I RECEIVED GENUINE PRODUCT OR NOT. WHENEVER I PUT IT ON, IT SAYS 'WELCOME TO NIRVANA'. NOW I DONT KNOW WHAT IS THE CONNECTION BETWEEN BOAT & NIRVANA. FURTHER, IT DISCONNECTS MOST OF THE TIME WHILE YOU ARE TALKING ON PHONE. THIS IS THE MOST PATHETIC THING. CONNECTIVITY IS VERY BAD. ACTUALLY BLUETOOTH RECEIVER IS ON RIGHT SIDE OF THE EARPHONE & IF YOU PUT YOUR PHONE ON YOUR LEFT SID-E, IT WILL DISCONNECT. VERY BAD EXPERIENCE FOR VERY HIGH PRICE. I HAVE BEEN USING THIS FOR APPROX. 18-20 DAYS. FURTHER, IT TRANSMITS VERY LOW VOICE TO THE PERSON WHO IS TALKING TO YOU ON PHONE. BATTERY BACK UP IS GOOD. WASTE OF MONEY

name: Vidhya
title: Not upto the brand name
content: I like Boat products especially their speakers, I have 2 of them and they have excellent connectivity but these headphones have terrible connectivity. Max range is 8-10m and clear sound only if there is no obstacle in between you and the phone but once there is a wall or anything else there's static sounds

name: vikrant
title: Value for money
content: First, let me mention that I got this product at Rs 999 during sale. The build of the product is average and the magnet holding the two earpieces is average. When it comes to sound quality, these are perfect for listening songs and movies in surround sound. However, the only area that the product lacks is the microphone's performance on a call. You'll often hear the other party complaining that they can't hear you, instead the background noise takes centrestage. So avoid using them for calling in busy, noisy areas, otherwise they work fine in quiet environments. Hope the product price drops to 1000 Rs mark permanently.

name: Jaisu
title: Best to buy in this range!! Honest review
content: All in all this could be the best wireless earphone in this range !!!!. Although it has some pros and con for which boat can overcome. Pros-. ~the sound quality is so soothing. ~ texture of bass is properly splited for both side .. ~ built quality is also good , you can feel the toughness of the product.. ~design and color texture is also fine.. ~. Cons. ~ battery is not uo the mark in one charge i.e within 45min full charge battery the output u can expect is 2 n half hour if u using it continuous or by keeping standby or with a call u can expect 2days battery backup.. ~ the upper layer of the body leaves the material i mean thing poly coating gets automatically removed

name: Anuraag Kumar
title: Nice product. Bad service.
content: As always, boat offers offer the best sound and bass quality and considerable price range.. These was my second purchase and the only complaint is, the bass quality fades over time.. and the costumer service and the warranty claim process is very worst.

name: Sk Julfikar Rahaman
title: Honest review after 2 month continuously using
content: it has extreme bass and a great extent noise cancellation and decent sound clarity.. It has a mindblowing battery which gives 7-8 hrs music playback time . It's mic is also good & you will not be disappointed with the voice quality. But more than putting 2 hrs it feels very uncomfortable to me bcz of its conical buds(can be removed). It's Wires are a bit long which makes it odd in looking.. It's long wires really disappointed me.. Its packaging is bad.. Otherwise it is a very good headphone in this price segment. I really liked it.

name: Jeffrey Shaji
title: Second time I got a fake one
content: I've ordered two products last year and listening to the quality of the headset I ordered one more. However, the second one was duplicate. While connecting, is says till boat rockers (255 was missing). By the way the cover and the headset looks like the replica of the first one which I purchased.. The sound quality and noise cancellation was perfect for the first one😊.

name: Raman Singh
title: Nothing great, average performance in line with the low price
content: Decent voice and connection speed. These are not bose so do not expect a thumping bass or a sharp treble. Noise cancellation is almost non noticable. But ok for the price as i use mainly for office calls and occasional movie/ music

name: vinoth
title: Good one
content: Better sound and quality. Value for money.. Two things which bothers me.. 1: The controller on the head phone is not that great. Feels like you are touching a wood. Not a smooth plastic. Would appreciate a smooth finish.. 2: The description say it supports dual connectivity.. Yes it supports. But there is some issue on handling it. Ex: i connect to my PC and phone.. but when i get a phone call I couldn't answer the call.. And feedback voice for connecting and disconnecting is bit horrible.

name: Ayush
title: Sound error
content: Purchased a month ago for 999 , and when i used it for first time bass was awesome and sound quality was also good but when i watched a video whenever th sound of video reduces earphone automatically start givin tap tap sound and whem volume of video reaches below 20% it didn't gave any sound i actually didn't knew if it was a technical error or something else so i returned it and purchased oneplus bass edition for 2k and believe me they are real beast as compared to these 255 pro.

name: Manish mate
title: (again update) earphone stopped working but got replaced within no time.(color change extra 150 Rs)
content: I was nervous while purchasing this earphone based on all reviews i read. but im so happy that i purchased it.. Its too good. 1) sound is too good.. 2) fits perfectly in ears, as it provide three ear buds with different size.. 3) bass is so good.. 4) EDM music lover will love it.. 5) Can connect two device at a time.. problems :. 1) Bluetooth connectivity problem you may face initially, but if you switch off earphone and mbl bluetooth, and again on it it will work. Once it connects your device you wont face connectivity problem.. Customer service:. 1) Really happy to say that i had issue regarding bluetooth connectivity, after raising complaint i got fast reply from boat people, even though issue was resolved, i was keep getting calls from baot people for issue.. 2) you can replace item within no time, service is too good. ps: i have never written this much big review for any product.

name: DR NaReSh
title: No doubt go for it..100% Worth value.
content: After all trails waxed up with high priced bluetooth devices like (bose),JBL Sony.... As a lost trail I purchased boat ...as my friends r saying it's good but the price was low compare with others including Samsung level 3 ....but my first look ...its cathy and tried with my I phone and android it's great in sound.....at present if it stays like that for 1yr..also I ll b happy ...

name: Mayank Roy
title: Not recommended
content: Not happy with the product at all.. The battery dies within 2 hours. Don't even expect it to last for more than 15 minutes after it hits 40%.. Sound quality is so bad. If you keep walking while having this headphone on there is continuous sound distortion.. Wire is too long.. Also there is no way to skip tracks by double tapping the button.. The magnet is not functional and does not pause or play music.. Oneplus z is a much better option. It also has the functionality to switch between devices.

name: Goutam Kumar Samal
title: Excellent for music not so good for calling..
content: Product is excellent,,,but one problem is mic is not capture the words properly..so for calling it is not so good,you have to speak louder otherwise nothing will hear to recipient.........sound quality is so good,i am enjoying as INOX .......... battery charging very fast and run for 5-6 hr.....with my vivo mobile charger its get charged within 10 min.........so good for music not so good for calling....

name: Charles Lobo
title: Good on pocket friendly budget.
content: Had purchased 02 Rockerz 255 earlier and gifted it to my colleagues, they were impressed, so during the Amazon Sale purchased another 02 and gifted them to my other colleagues, they too were happy with the products, all 04 of them are very satisfied with my choice and now they approach me for any purchases related to electronics.

name: Peterjohnpaul
title: Average product and poor after sale service
content: U really need to vigilant when it comes to boat wireless,. I bought this three months back.. Initial all aspects looks good and it's gradually decreased in value.. Dual Bluetooth won't worked for me. I enquired with my fellow guys who bought this after me. Even they too find difficult in connecting two devices ie lap and mobile.. Later after lot of search, it worked and every time it made me to do the same process to get connected.. The mic is outside below Bluetooth and not inside ie near mouth, so it receives all the outer noise around you and your voice will not audible to the receiver end.. Bass is little low when compared with boat 225 wired headset.. Don't know how much charge utilized and always shows 80% and suddenly shows warning and switched off.. After two months of use, The earpiece wire got disconnected / tore on the right side ie Bluetooth side. When contacted Amazon, they told to register the product inorder to claim warranty. Also they told to look out for near service centre where we can change our product.. But in Chennai, no such stores available the nearest service centre is at Bangalore. The same reported to Amazon again, I was advised to look out of shops in local market area(Richie Street). I have told them that my product was registered in website and I didn't get any confirmation or registration code to activate or claim my warranty.. They asked me to search contact numbers in boat website and proceed further.. Twice I have registered the product and. It's been a month they(boat) have not acknowledge and send registeration code. @Amazon. U really need to look into this and arrange for replacement from your end as the manufacturer is not prompt in the registration process. Better u can arrange for replacement from the seller side which would ease the consumers difficulty

name: ayush
title: This crap stopped working within 6 MONTHS!
content: I have bought this absolute piece of plastic! on sep 2019. which stopped working within 6 months ie.. during march, see don't buy this, no matter whatever sound quality this plastic gives, whats the point if it stops working within such a short period of time. I thought only i am unlucky, i found same thing happened with my friends too! please don't waste your money on this piece of plastic you can get way more better sound quality than this in many other earphones which are not like a plastic toy, that too in similar or little bit higher price. Meanwhile i gave this earphone to my father also and even he is saying that left part of earphone stopped working, trust me guys this plastic works flawlessly during first 6 months or less, after that it sucks!

name: Azimuddin
title: Not something that people rejoicing.
content: After more than two months of usage i am reviewing this product.. It's third month and start creating problem. I mean bluetooth connectivity. Very low. Noice cancelation is also not upto mark.. Sound is good no doubt but lacking tow big things, durability and Bluetooth connectivity.. Noice cancellation not all up to the mark. Can say "chal jayega" type.

name: anjalikajoshi
title: Highly recommended
content: Now, im writing This as a musician.. So you could expect This review to be credible.. First of all, im in love with these earphones. These are one of the best if not the best budget bluetooth earphones in the market.. Sure there are a few flaws, but if you're not a musician/producer (anyone related to the music profession.) You'll not understand. Hell, even a few beginners wouldn't understand.. If you're looking for great sound, a great experience and a great customer service, boat is what you should go with.. However, if you're looking for perfect sound quality for something like music production or mixing, you're not going to get that in this range.

name: Nirmal kumar sarkar
title: Excellent Product
content: I am completely satisfied with is quality of sound, fit & finish.Earbuds are soft, hold in place with soft hook, doesn't come out while running. Base quality & clarity in sound is superb. soft plastic so no chance of tear or breakage.wires are sturdy, wide & flat.. Navy blue colour is excellent. In this price tag this product is awsome.

name: Praveen
title: A must buy @ 999 Rs.
content: I would say at this price (999 Rs.) it's a must buy product.. Pros - 1. Bluetooth connectivity is really good, I kept my phone at bedroom and was at hall and the sound was clear.. 2. Mic and noise cancellation working really fine.. 3. Flexible and durable.. 4. Sweat Proof.. Cons.. The only con is that it's sound quality was damn good in iPhone but in Android it's quite normal like other basic headphones. As I have iPhone 7 and Android phone, I prefer to listen to songs by connecting with iPhone as it is giving good support to this headset.

name: Shubham Kulkarni
title: Good product. Go for it.
content: It's really a good earphone. Amazon provided a great delivery, I got my product just on the next day of ordering it. I bought it for 1099 during the sales and I must say it is the best wireless earphone I have used. The functions, Battery life, audio quality everything is just awesome.. Ione drawback is that, boat is supposed to provide a carrying case with it. It's really risky to put it in the bag or somewhere else. Otherwise it's the best product.

name: hariharan
title: Dont prefer this for I phone
content: This is really good quality product. But I bought this for my I phoneXR. As we know already apple will perform good only with another apple. This has perfect external noise cancellation for the user but the con is this abosrbs external noises too much that disturbs a lot to the other end speaker. For songs this will shout a lot which may create even pain or itching in ears. Battery back up and water resiatnce quality was appreciable.

name: Rajeev
title: Good on for those who loves bass
content: Vocal is not Cristal clear. If u want to listen clear vocal u have to download 3rd party software. And if u use Samsung m series like m10,20 or 30 phone than there is no need to download 3rd party SOFTWARES,. BASS IS REALLY VERY VERY HIGH.. if u are a bass lover and u can compromise little with vocal than it's for you and if u can't compromise with vocal even 10% than I won't suggest to u

name: Rajeev Sharma
title: Good Product
content: Hey I am using this product for last 10 days. Below is my experience.. 1. Sound quality is good with nice base.. 2. Comfortable in wearing and can be weared for long hours.. 3. Battery life is average.. 4. Worst part is bluetooth connectivity, frequent disconnection. Organization must work on this problem.

name: Shantanu Sharma
title: Product is too fragile. It did not last more than a 3 ~ 4 Months
content: The product is fragile. One ear stopped working after 3 ~ 4 months of use. Their support is useless. Raised a ticket and they picked up the product 2 months ago. Website says Replacement was issued and dispatched. BUT THERE IS NO TRACKING NUMBER. NO CLUE WHERE THE HELL REPLACEMENT IS... They don't respond to any mails and they don't respond to any phone calls.

name: Anshul
title: Garbage product boat rockerz 255
content: Biggest mistake to buy such kind of product. Boat products can never be trusted. These products have life equivalent to their warranty period or sometimes much lower than that. If u want to waste your money for a product that has shelf life of 6 months u can go for this stupid product. I purchased it in June last year and its battery life got damaged within 5 months. I replaced the product from the service centre which is quite far from my home and again it got damaged with similar issue within 2 days. Boat should stop making such garbage products. Beware of this trash is you value your money. Either go for a reputed brand which might cost more but have a good shelf life.

name: Sharma
title: Good Product, But !!!
content: I have been using this product for exactly 40 days now, and this is what i have to say :. Good product for the money; But,. 1. Takes too long to connect or disconnect to a device.. 2. The Battery is its biggest con, It never really gives 6 hours of usage. And on top of that, the battery drops from 60% to 20% or less in less than 40 mins... after which it starts interrupting your music stream saying " Battery Low".. And the charge time is more than 2 hours, which is difficul to understand, given that it has a very small battery.. Other than that, the product is fine.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Experience after 1 year of usage
content: I have been using this product for an year now. Let me share my experience:. Pros:. 1. Battery backup was good for 3 months. 2. Comfortable. 3. Bluetooth connectivity is good. Cons:. 1. Right side speaker stopped working after 1 year.. 2. Noise cancellation is very poor. 3. Battery life after 3 months is around 4 hrs. 2 hrs with continuous usage.. 4. Bass and sound quality is average.

name: Lohit Tripathy
title: Good one
content: Not up to the mark.. but not so bad either.. bass is good.. sound quality is okay.. if you use regular basis.. you might not get any trouble but if you want to focus on the beats of music or any sound very closely the it isn't so good at it... Noise Cancellation and bass also not so good.. but it is also okey.. as I said for regular activity it is good but when you want to go inside any sound thoroughly then.. it won't be so helpful..

name: siddhesh
title: Poor After sale service
content: I am writing this review for after sale service, Headphone is outstanding for everything but after 6 month one side is suddenly stopped nd after that I am Continusoly trying to contact from April 2020 to till date to contact BOAT customer care but their phone nd office both are still closed,not getting any support from Boat and not even getting proper reply from Amazon customer care after calling so many times. I thought due to COVID 19 they closed their shop but after july 20 everything started And now My warranty will be expire in September 2020. I don't know whether they help me Or not for this issue😔😔

name: GR
title: Black in place of Neon Green , but its still okay for me.
content: Update:. One side of the earpiece stopped working permanently - 18June2020.. Need to return and ask for replacement.. I received a pure black piece in place of neon green with black and it seems to be slightly defective. Extra ear buds are also not provided as promised.. At times one side of the ear phone isn't working, after head shake it suddenly continues to work.. In terms of sound quality, it is good. Crisp and clear audio. Battery back up is also fine. May be need to continuously use to understand its working efficiency and long life durability.

name: Mahesh
