title: Horrible battery life !!
content: If u think of some bad product's I've got. This is one of the top ones. Got the new one which died a week after the return date passed. Sent it for repair and got the replacement after 4 weeks which worked for less than a week. Sent it back again and got it after 4 weeks which worked a little more this time and lasted for 3-4 weeks and the battery is gone again. The battery doesn't last for more than 30 min no matter what I do. Charged it for a few mins and hours and neither made a difference

name: Priya Chatterjee
title: Slightly disappointed..
content: Got it for Rs.999 at Amazon Day sale. Using it for last 2days. If compared with my old Boat 225 earphone, sound quality is almost same. But the bluetooth connectivity is really disappointed. It's getting disconnected very frequently... Even within 6-7mts. Noice cancellation is just ok. It's very light weight and very much comfortable.

name: Pekkeu
title: EXCELLENT AFTER SALES SERVICE
content: Purchased this on may 2019. Good sound quality and clarity.. One of the speakers stopped working after usage for around 6 months.. Filed a warranty claim against the one year guarantee out of the box. What amazed me was the prompt response and service i received from the customer care/support team at imagine marketing india pvt ltd. after arranging for a pickup on mY product,today on 25th february 2020,i received a replacement unit completely free of cost. Whoever is reading this comment, i highly recommend you to purchase this as the after sales service was way beyond satisfactory.. WELL DONE IMAGINE MARKETING INDA PVT. LTD.

name: hunny
title: not a good product
content: returned it once and got it replaced because it was hanging an not connecting. the replaced one also worked for few days then stopped charging. in both the earphones was having trouble in talking on phone as i could here but my voice was not transmitted on other side. some issue with software i guess cos at times it was ok and at times only one way

name: George
title: Warranty cannot be claimed. It's a scam
content: This product warranty is a scam.. When I mailed I get a auto reply . I checked the website and reached the nearest customer service but they said they won't work on it and gave a number. When I tried the number it was not reachable.. Very disappointed that there is no customer service for product related complaints. Better don't buy this product

name: Sherry
title: good while it lasted....
content: Was good while it lasted.... three months down the line, one side earphones stopped working (no physical damage or misuse)... now I am trying to contact BOAT customer support for a replacement under warranty, but the support page on their website just does not load/exist...! Will update if and when I can get through to them...

name: ANAMITRA GHOSHAL
title: Worth it.
content: Great product. Got it for a price of 999 only.. Range- As mentioned in product description. Sound- Quality is good unless you are a die hard music lover or music creator.. Might hurt your ears on extensive use.. Good for rough use.. Battery life-6hrs(verified). I personally use it for working out, watching movies and listening to songs.. Great value for money .

name: Amazon Customer
title: Amazing Headphones
content: Comfortable fit n good sound. My device stopped charging abt 4 months after purchase. I followed the online instructions to repair / replace the item as it was under warranty. Must say boat has a very impressive online system which is efficient n responsive. The service centre took some time but i have received my earphones back hence the 5 star rating. All electronic items can malfunction but its the after sales service that really determines the serious ones and from this it appears that boat are here for the long run. Good sound, comfortable fit, great after sales what more could one ask for.

name: Prem Harish
title: Worth it!! Maybe.. But...!!? Think about it.
content: Everything about the earphones are really good. But jus that even the best products has the cons to it! So first off...,. The sound Quality it's flawless and buttery smooth... But..! In an immerse content called the "Extra Boost" they've pumped up the Bass alone!? Where's the original bit of the song Ya'll!? 😑 The bass is so dominant that the original bit of the song isn't present.. Secondly.., if your are frequent user of the earphones.. I highly recommend not to go for it. After my extensive usage for about a week I found that the Backup charge in the device is horrible... And the most irritating thing is that it powers off at 20% (What the Heck) that's a true example of a poor Build. The battery doesn't even last for 3-4 Hrs of continuous playing.. But if your a timely user then this device might a perfect fit!

name: Prashant K Srivastava
title: Great for such Price
content: Its the 4th day i am using boAt 255 pro and it is a great pair for such price . It has a good battery life and sound quality and bass is also good but only one this that it do get some statics on terrace if you have a mobile towers near by. And design is little uncomfy if you plan to use it for long hours. Rest all good 👍

name: Lalit Sharma
title: Its a good product, but...
content: I received the product as shown. It was packed real nice. I've been using the product now for past 6 months. The bass is really good. From this product, you can expect a good quality of sound. However the issue lies with the microphone. Many times I have heard from callers that they can hear everything else but my voice. Overall its a good product, but I am a bit disappointed with the microphone.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Average
content: Average product ...... Pros :. - battery life. - noise cancellation. - pretty good sound quality for this price. Cons:. - very irritating earbuds (painful). - wire is long and looks weird on the front not at all stylish

name: Asthik Shet
title: Economy class
content: Economic is what I would say. Not great nor too bad. It's decent with performance and battery life. You can surely go for it if u not a music freak and need sound quality of high standards. A really good product for day to day use. I would say for this price - the justice has been done.

name: Abu Talha
title: Got Broke 2 Times in the span of 6 months
content: Just after 10 days the right side of the earphone stopped working , then the custormer servicec took 20 days for replacing the earphones , which is way too long then they promised .. Again after a few months it broke again , I don't recommend this to anyone .. As long it was working it was good but get's damaged even without any rough use .

name: Pramoda
title: Disappointed with product design
content: Sound quality is great and good bass, but disappointed with product design. Volume up/down tone is played whenever there is a change in audio stream. Example while scrolling Facebook and Instagram videos page, Volume up/down tone is played each time before start of the video. This is very irritating, looks like product design fault. I have observed this on my iPhone 6+, not sure about Android behavior.. Note: this is behavior observed after device volume control is used.

name: Sandip S.
title: Exceptional  after sales service from Boat
content: I am hugely surprised with after sales service from Boat. This earphone was bought about 10 months before and was in warranty. One side of the earphone stopped working about a month back. I reported this issue to Boat customer care. It was pretty seamless experience right from picking up and getting replacement for the earphone. Boat has set great example of after sales service for other local and Asian brands.

name: Abhijeet Nath
title: Lasted only 45 days!!
content: No problem with design and noise cancellation but it lasted only for 45 days. The right side is stopped working. I have observed that boat product don't last long even though there quality of sound is good. It's a complete loss for me. I should have buy jbl.

name: M RamPrasad
title: Good at this price range
content: BoAt rockerz. Very good at reasonable price Bluetooth earphone. Got it at Prime sale at Rs 999/-.. Pros.. Bass is good.. Fits properly inside the ears.. Cons.. Pre configured voice that come while connecting / Disconnecting, or incoming call is not clear. May be bcoz of Male voice. 😜

name: Dharmesh Brahmbhatt
title: Poor connectivity.
content: I am writing this review after replacement headsets. First worked for few days then started playing up. Keeps disconnecting and breaks in between video plaly, audio play regardless online or offline. Today is the first day of replacement piece and it's ditto same, every few minutes keeps saying" You are now connected to boatrockers" and shows 100% battery available??? Amazing how on earth it can stay 100 % even after few hours usage? I am returning this back and would take refund and not replacement this time. It is very annoying exeperince.

name: Moorthy
title: Awesome sound quality...........worth buying it....
content: Hello Guys,. This is Moorthy Shettiyar......After watching en number of videos & reviews I ordered this product yesterday at 10:00pm and today in the afternoon at 12:30pm I got the product.....very fast delivery........keep it up Amazon & team. Now let's talk about the product..... First of all the quality of the product is awesome...... It's superb durable......nice tangle free cable....also I love that magnetic bounding between each other...... Now let's talk about the sound & call quality..... Sound signature is literally superb guys It's beyond to my expectations...I was planning to buy realme buds wireless but I thought let's give it a try & really guys m very much impressed with the sound quality...... For sound signature I would rate 10 /10.. Highs, lows, mids, vocals and bass everything is Crystal clear ....It's worth buying @999/- I strongly recommend to buy this product it won't let u down.... Boat rocks…................

name: Munish Kumar
title: Very disappointed
content: Not happy 2nd time purchased it seems look like duplicate even the connection voice and accessories not original all fake not happy with amazon please take necessary action against suppliers who provide duplicate products very disappointed

name: Sushant Rao
title: Waste of money....go for something else.
content: Sound quality is fine..........bass is super strong......connectivity is poorest of all the wireless earphones or headphones i have ever used .......everytime when i opens my phone while music is playing there is a lost of connection and the sound quality also degrads and also music lags a lot.......whenever battery goes below 20 % it notifies you with it's irritating high pitch sound......doesn't connect properly with my laptop.....you can't change songs from it's buttons.....i am using this from past 2 months all the problems are happening from the very first day.

name: Sagar Ahuja
title: Bluetooh connectivity is horrible.
content: The boat wireless/bluetooth connectivity has a serious issue. I was using boat wired headphones and it worked well for me. But in wireless section boat does not justify its presence.. The wirelss headphons tends to disconnect intermittently after few minutes and ruin the experience. Not worth it guys.

name: Medico95
title: Not very durable
content: The product was okay for 3 months before the Bluetooth stopped working properly. It would get disconnected automatically. Sent the product for replacement but bOAT customer care doesn't answer calls or emails. It has been a month now and I haven't heard from them despite repeated calls and mails. The product is not very durable and you can't count on the warranty.

name: mohan
title: Worst product and much worse service by the manufacturer
content: It stopped working within a month. then I contacted for warranty. It is now 4 months since I have returned it and haven't received yet.. When I filed a complaint with consumer forum, then these people created a ticket for dispatching the product. It is now a week since that ticket was created and not yet received the product.. The service phone number does not work. It take nearly 50 attempts to talk to their support team.. Pathetic product, pathetic service and pathetic system of warranty.

name: Nitin sharma
title: Returned the product once and the replaced one also had issues within 7 days.
content: I did not expect the replaced earphone for the second time also to create problems within 7 days.. The voice while talking to other person was breaking and sometimes not even audible and same while listening to the downloaded songs the voice goes away for few secs and then continues playing. This was irritating. Now it will not even connect to my phone tried with 2 3 mobile phones after unpairing and pairing n no. of times, still it won't recognize.. Very disappointed, i don't know if the problem is with the supplier Appario Retail Private Ltd or boat itself.. Won't recommend this to anyone.

name: Wintech
title: Value for money ¥ must buy
content: great in most aspects( only for music lovers ). bass-9/10. bass is ultimate if u r a bass lover than it's for u.. PUBG player note:-. not recommended for playing games for it has sound lag, which most of this budget earphones give.. If want ear or headphones for gaming than this is not for u.. sound quality-8/10. noise cancellation 7/10. the main part of noise cancellation is that it could cancel most noise like people's voice,traffic etc. but not useful against sharp noises i.e. sound of all same frequency .. bluetooth connectivity-5/10. very poor u an even go even 8m away but description shows 10m.. overall 7.25/10. BUT still great in budget. got this for 999/- in GIF

name: Joy WbCob
title: Average, I am not interested
content: Not good as I thought. Writing this review after using 3months. Noise cancellation is not good. I purchased two headset of boat rockers 255. One of those set partially stopped working. Called amazon customer service. Waiting for replacement.

name: Praveen
title: Don't buy it. It stops working in 6 to 10 months
content: This head phones is so good to use. it has a 6 to 7 hrs of battery life. The music quality is good though. After 9 months. My right ear bud stopped working now it is very uncomfortable to use with one head phones in. The mic is bad too. In conclusion:. Don't buy these headphones unless you have lot of money to spend for product like these. Don't Buy it

name: Sachin Son
title: Rockerz...Truely Rocks..Thumps Up
content: Boat Rockerz... 1. Noice cancellation 4/5. 2. Bluetooth Connectivity 4/5. 3. Battery Backup 5/5. 4. Call Connectivity 4/5. And most important one. 5. Music/Songs clarity..4/5... If you install Bass Booster App and do the settings as done by me then you will get surprised by the sound output.. Hence I advice to those whose main purpose of buying this earphone is to listen music, to install Bass Booster App with the equalizer settings and do the settings according to your needs which will improve sound output to the great extent..Thanks. But that app only supports some of the music players..thankfully Google play is supported by the app..

name: Sibi V.
title: Worst earphone of my life
content: Review after 4 months of usage.. Life of this product is of 3-4 months,its not durable or reliable.. One side becomes non-functional.. The after service is the worst from Boat.. There is no service center and there is no one to respond on calls. You may log a ticket with boat but there won't be any resolution for a month and no one will respond to your query.. If you don't get frustrated with above things and are ready to pay more than 1000 bucks for this.. then God Bless U

name: Spoorthy m.
title: Okay, need to improve..
content: Need to improve: -. *All of sudden it is showing battery down, 80% to 20%. * The design of product need to improve, it is not exactly fitting in the ears... *Overall everything is good... Sound , quality, bass everything is good, I'm giving 5/3 ratting..

name: Yash
title: Awesome apart from BT Range (4.1)
content: Well, initial impressions are good. Got it for around rs 870 applying discount. The Amazon advertisement page shows. BT 4.2, but the seller is selling BT 4.1. Previously was having JBL Infinity Glide 100, well those were having pretty below average sound quality, however the Bluetooth range in those was good (BT 5.0) , so returned them.. These Boat Rokerz have awesome sound quality, however the Bluetooth range (4.1) is not that great but can't complaint more considering the price nd sound quality.. Noise Cancellation remains to be checked. Build quality is superb.. (I got Black nd my frnd got Neon, well Neon colour is looking super awesome. Buy Neon colour if u buy these). Will update after using for few more days.

name: pravardhan
title: Bass lover here. But gets too bassy
content: Issues.. Cinnectivity.. ---------------. The Bluetooth connectivity is not at all good. Just breaks some times. Not at all recommended for gym workout( atleast not for cardio.) Stopped working many times when I had a good amount of sweat.. Sound.. I am a bass lover and always a budget guy. Till now used different kinds of in ear earphones. Senhizer cx 180.. jbl . Panasonic, boat, etc.. all in same range approx. But i still prefer senihizer cx 180 over boat 225. Boat just has too much of base the voice mainly feels submerged. I had to turn off all the equalizers ( music app and mobile ) so that I could get a better voice..however it feels too bass. Atleast not while listening to music but it feels while watch a movie speciallly Hollywood.. Disappointed a bit.. satisfiesld a bit.. but majorly disappointed

name: Rohit Bhat
title: Too Bassy! Mudding down all tones. Even Bass lacks thumping.
content: Cons: 1. Too Bassy! Mudding all tones.. 2. Unable to listen all instruments getting. played due to heavy bass.. 3. Even Bass is not best which lacks clear. thump.. 4. BT connection always requires line of. sight. Poor reception within rooms.. 5. Battery life average.. Pros:. 1. Noise cancellation is great.. 2. Bulit quality is good although plastic.. 3. Call quality seems fine. No complaint received from far end so far. However, Bass comes to picture even for voice.. 4. Bass centric. But don't expect much from bass also.

name: Kishan vaghani
title: warranty periods
content: I bought this item on 18th February 2019 from India but within 2 months it got damaged by not working right side earphone. Now i suggest you to not but this item as it is no trustable for me. And I do not know how to back it as I am in foreign right now

name: Gourav Gupta
title: Overall gud need improvement Specially while connecting
content: I got shipment on time through Amazon. I hv been using this since frm 10 months. I feels gud sound quality, gud bass quality. Bt it lack in noise cancellation. On call other person can clearly hear others long surrounding noise.. Plus in starting its battery backup was upto 5hr. Bt now it reduces day by day. So i hv to charge more.. Also it created problem while connecting with my laptop. Every time i hv to do switch on and off regularly so that i can connect properly, sound lag occurs which is very high negative point for me.

name: Jeremy F
title: Decent product but....
content: Good product. Decent sound, but Little too much of bass that it reduces the brightness of the high frequencies.. Wish it sat flush in your ear but has quite a bit sticking out but that's ok.. Battery life is good.. Easy setup and access with the controls on the side

name: Milind
title: Not a good choice
content: Bass us good, but very poor noise cancellation. Bulky buds causing pain in ears after sometime. Battery life is not good.. Compared it with boult which comes at same price. Sound quality and bass is good compared to it but It is heavier than Boult. You will keep feeling something bulky object fitted in the ear.

name: Sridhar
title: Boat rockerz 255 pro is very good interms of pricing
content: Boat rockerz 255 pro is very good in terms of pricing cause at this price im getting really good sound out which is loud enough for daily usage.. Pros:. >Sound quality and heavy bass. >Pricing. >Control buttons which are handy. >Battery backup. >Most important is Quick charging. >U can connect with more than 1 device i used with my laptop and mobile same time.. Cons:. >I couldn't find any voice assistance button or gesture. >Bass is heavy sometimes its irritating. >Out of 10 times 2 times i have faced issues with connectivity.

name: Syed Rafi
title: Worst product and worst customer service from boat
content: I wnated to rate it zero but the interface don't have that option. Worst product I have purchased. I have replaced the product bec it stopped working and the same problem with the replaced unit. And still the product has not completed 1year. Worst noise cancellation. If you ask the other person on the call what they hear is only external sounds and that to very clearly.. If you call boat customer care they tell ticket id is not valid. What the hell!. You won't be able to contact the customer care executive

name: Sidharth K. Burnwal
title: Go for something else , Spend money more get a good one.
content: After using of 1 months :. 1. Bass is awesome.. 2. Battery is also good.. 3. The design is good but the wire is bit lengthy. It feel a little out of the neck.. 4. The buttons on it are horrible. Sound buttons are good but the middle can do nothing useful. It will pick up the call but u can't disconnect it from there. Also no music forwarding after two click instead it redial the last dialled no. Shitty Configuration.. 5. Also after a long use , i usually get a bit of headache. Its quite often. So , i use it only when i need to other times, i had to off it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Excellent Product
content: Exactly as per description. Super product. Pods fit snugly into the ear and the guide to the inside of the ear for stability. Will remain secure with head movement associated with physical activity. Cord lengths are good enough for big head sizes also. Feature of magnetic connect of the two sides when not being used ensures that the accessory will not fall off when hung around the neck and not being used. Very good sound quality. Noise cancellation is excellent too as even when the pods are in the ear, you can barely hear the person opposite to you talking in their normal voice.

name: Mayank Thakran
title: Disappointed 🙈 by BOAT
content: The output is ok but not that it could have been .There is a problem with clarity as the apple wire earphones have a much better output and clarity then these boat rockers 255.. O bought it in on sept 28, 2019 and today on 13th aug 2020 they have stopped working. So the value for money is 1 star ⭐ out of 5 and rest is average max 2.5 star ⭐ or 3 star but could have been better. Anyways disappointed with boat I guess they hoax about there product a lot but it's not worth it.. Will definately not advice you to go for this one.. Might be cheap as compared to others but not good at all

name: Ajay
title: AVERAGE PRODUCT.
content: I have purchased OnePlus first, that had some issues, then bought Boat Rockerz.. Starting from the package, I wasn't happy it had issues with sound quality, voice recording and all. The build quality too isn't upto the mark.. I tried to return this item, but amazon said they can only replace. I have replaced it. The new one is slightly better. But not what I want to use. So returning the same.

name: SS
title: Average headphone, nothing special
content: It has magnetic earbuds but it does not support turning off when earbuds are joined.. Quality and looks is average.. Lot of voice feedback thats annoying sometimes.. Got connected to mobile and Laptop very easliy.

name: Rohit Jain
title: Utterly Poor range and no auto-connectivity
content: After two months review.. 1) Poor Bluetooth Range: It often gets disconnected due to poor range, you even can't go to your balcony/kitchen.. 2) No auto connectivity and smooth Multi-connectivity: No auto-connectivity when you come back in its short range and you have to switch it on first if you hadn't connected another device with it and, if you had then you have to struggle to connect your device.. 3) Good bass, noice cancellation and sound quality.. Earlier, I was using Boult Probass Audio, it didn't have connectivity issue though but, noise cancellation & audio quality were very poor. I bought this because of the foreign brand but, it has its own different problems.. Seems like there is no bluetooth earphone within Rs1500.

name: arun kumar
title: Poor bluetooth connectivity
content: Positives. 1.medium bass. 2.good battery back up. 3.stylish...can able to hear even in bed(it wont hurt ur ears when u r lying by side). Negatives. 1.very poor bluetooth connectivity.if u keep ur fone in one room and if u walk away to another room with headset,then it will get disconnected... 2.the wires are too long.so while walking it is little bit annoying by swinging.that too it touches the belly. 3.when the battery gets lower,a very annoying sound keeping on repeating(its irritating..my previous headset mivi thunderbeats wont do this). 4.bad noise cancellation...it will clearly absorb all sounds at outer area.so while travelling in bike or in outdoor, opponents cant able to hear ur voice properly

name: Arshad Irfan
title: Very good and satisfied.
content: Using it since 1 year and they are very good for the price Rs.999. No issues so far regarding quality, connectivity and earpieces. Very much satisfactory. Bass is also good, right quantity of what a good music lover would expect.

name: Puneet D.
title: Worst noise cancellation
content: The earphones sound quality is ok, but when used as headphones for calling purpose, the other person keeps on complaining about the sound quality. Checked the same and found noise cancellation of the earphones is very poor.. Very disappointed with the product.

name: Liril Sharma
title: Worth it?!
content: So this Bluetooth earphone is widely bought by people because of course it fits the good budget range . And to be fair its not a bad choice altogether.But come 2/3+months and it shows the real worth .Connection drop no sound cancellation. Abruptly hetting disconnected and the list goes endless. There's no workaround for any of these its like absolute frustrating when you are in dire need of it and it will just not connect or drop .

name: Jojo G.
title: Great Headphones
content: I liked the headphones sound and quality. Bass is also good voice is clear too. But I really felt discomfort while using it, reason is that when its plugged in ear it feels like a vacuum suction inside the ear. otherwise its good. Charging time 2hrs and usage time 4-5hrs playing song.

name: PANKAJ BARMAN
title: Complete waste of money on these bluetooth earphones..go for wired
content: One of earphones not working within two months of use. Sound quality is very poor. Mic is not too good either but better than my PRIMIU APOLLO earphone which I bought later and is completely useless. In fact both Apollo & Boat blutooth earphones are useless.. I am going to throw both earphones in a dustbin and share a video later.. I will try normal wired earphones from now on.

name: Piyush anand
title: "Nice product" & " Great service by boat"
content: Everything is just awesome except the noise cancellation microphone while talking on calls ....it catch surrounding noise more then person's voice................. From here i write it after 1 year of use:- My product get damage after 11 month of use one side Earphone is not working. But nothing worrys me because it has 1 year replacement warranty so i registed complaint on boat website they provide me door to door replacement option however i have to wait for near 25 days and finally i get my new earphone.. I am totally impressed with boat service so i definitely recommend boat product to you all .

name: Black mamba
title: Use and throw
content: Noise cancellation is cognizable to some extent but the sound is not up to the mark along with the bass.i previously ordered boat pro base curve which I reckon was better than this piece in terms of sound and design, yet it was 100 bucks cheaper than this .. Design wise it would definately be cumbersome to manage due to its long chords on top of the entire neck band setup.. Suggestions-no need to mention extra bass if that is not evident while listening.

name: Sarada P.
title: Good sound and battery.
content: Amazing product from boat.. Really loved it.. Pure Bass experience.. Great sound.. 6 hours of Playback time on full charge at 100% sound.. And 8-9 hours of playback time on full charge at 60 % sound.. Boat always good.. Thanks amazon for delivering such a nice product.

name: Aniruddh
title: Good product but bit expensive
content: Battery life is good but not that great, expecting bit more for this price.. Sound quality nicely clear, loud and no distortion at moderate volume.. Durability is good but product looks somewhat delicate so I am not sure it can handle some rough usage.. Wearing comfort is good, connecting process with phone is very easy and fast.

name: HARI OM PRAKASH
title: Not really impressed
content: I have few pros and cons. Don't know what others are reviewing.. Pros:. + Good battery life. + Good bass. + Good sound quality for musics. Cons:. - Bad quality of sound for other on voice call. - voice assistant not working. - while connecting two phones very bad music voice sometimes cutting sounds in-between

name: Utpal k.
title: Awesome piece with minor probs
content: This is a great neckband... Noise always makes awesome products... I bought this neckband and the bass, sound quality, noise cancellation is very good.... But it has 2 cons:. 1) The mic quality is not very good... The other person said my voice to be very cripsy and sometimes distorting. 2) The magnetic powe of the neckband is not strong.... BTW I will definitely suggest someone to buy these neckband...

name: Swatwik
title: Outstanding sound quality. Best buy!
content: I have been using this since 3 days. Liked it, but price (1500) is a bit more. Overall its a good buy. Sound quality is great.. Reviewing after 12 days of use:. Don't believe in charging time of 6 hours as they said. I am literally getting not more than 3hrs. Hence, reduced my rating from 4 to 3.

name: Aman Gupta
title: VFM product
content: Pros:. 1. Impressive bluetooth range even with physical blockers in between. 2. Sound quality is satisfactory. 3. No issue with sweat. 4. Fits well in ear. Cons:. 1. Poor battery life. You need to charge every 2-3 days even with just 1 hour of usage. Long charging duration. 2. Connecting wires a bit longer thus look odd while wearing them in gym

name: dali joseph
title: No extra bass, not worth more than Rs.600-700
content: I bought this product for Rs.1500 but it was not worth it. It is a normal earphone with normal sound quality, i wouldn't say that the quality is bad, but the price is too high for the quality. The product says super deep bass but the bass quality is especially very poor. There isn't any extra bass. The band is super flexible, which is a good thing, but the product is much cheaper looking than seen in the pictures. There are no special lights except for a very tiny, almost invisible blue light . Overall I would be happy to buy this for Rs.600-700 but not more than that.

name: Amazon customer
title: Pathetic customer care service!
content: First of all..i am really disappointed with boat's customer care service..i purchased them on 17th november and on..25th of december the charging port was not working at all...i registered a complaint on the very same day..the product was replaced with an already damaged product...the voice quality was not good while calling...additional voices were heard on call on the other side.... What kind of customer care service is this??. It was such a waste of money... Will never ever purchase any boat product again in futurenor will recommend anyone to purchase it... I have registered a complaint again...eagerly looking forward to boat'service...thankyou..!!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good pair of Bluetooth earphone however not useful for RUNNING. And cannot be Stored in any case.
content: Disclaimer: This is big detailed review.. Bluetooth Earphones are of good quality. Sweat and water-resistant. Charging time is ~40 minutes. Works for 4-5 hours use straight. And can be on standby mode for 6-8 hours. Hence overall covers 10-14 hours usage initially if you are migrating from good pain of wired earphone like jbl cs100si or scheniser CX180 you will feel its sound somewhat different with extra base. However, you can control sound profile using installing Equilizer app from play store.. However, one thing is important this is not that much suitable for runners. When I start running with them its neckband and battery unit starts oscillating over my neck. Earbuds remain fix on ears due to the extensions provided with it however this neckband and battery units are not at all that much stable.. So if you are planning to use these for day to day use then this is great Bluetooth earphone. But if you are trying to pair them while running then this is not at all a suitable match.. In addition, the design is such that after wearing them around neck cables creates a sharp bend near the battery unit which is a matter of concern and can cause Bluetooth Earphones to go bad in short time.. I almost forgot about keys provided on the neckband. These are great, tactile and highly responsive. Google Assistant also works flawlessly with the help of them. Range wise if you are in the same room around 10-12 feets distant from mobile then these earphones works best. After that, if you increase distance further or change room and go to the next room some glitches in sound occurs.. I almost forgot about one thing the storage for these earphones. It is very difficult to store them in any container or box as compared to any other wired earphone which you can wrap and place in any box or pouch. Hence as you cannot wound it you have to always wear them on the neck. No other option, you cannot just slip them in the last pocket of your backpack as this can cause harms to cables. This is almost annoying for me every time.

name: Dr. Vishal Vernekar
title: Good value for the price.
content: Bass is high, ideal for hip hop music, but if u r into instrumentals and sad slow songs you'll feel it a nuisance and noise. Connectivity was good with my OnePlus 5, built quality looks long lasting, light weight but the wire is too long, beats the whole idea of a wireless headset.

name: Aditya Yadav
title: Good for general perpose
content: Good if you are in <₹1500.. sound wuality is not superb but it cant be registered as bad. Is good but not matchable with jbl. Higher frequencies are missing and baas is not enough powerful. Actually it is serving my requirements completely as off watching movies and series. For enthuastic music listeners, this is not recommended but for routine use its is good. Battery life is for whole day with normal calls and 6-8 hour movies. Product looks sturdy and durable. Connects automatically when paired with a device earlier, sometime you have to manipulate in your ear for fitting, ear bud looks cheap though, extra 2 set of earbud are available in the box along with small usb cable

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best for the price of under 1300/-
content: First of all, for 999 it's the best.. So I'm reviewing this as a 13-1500 rs device.. After 3 months of usage-. Soung quality is very good for the price.. Bass is also very good.. Range is 'decent'.. You'll become used to in 2-3 days of usage it's comfortable (it's light as ). Connectivity and usability is also very easy.. Mic will work well most of the time, just ensure it's at the right place.. But one thing I'd say you after 3 months of usage that build quality us 'above average' that's all, especially you have to be very careful with the wires.

name: A
title: Good . But not best
content: Everything is fine with this product. Sound is very clean .. Bass is good . Only issue is its battery life. It gives me mostly 4 hrs on continuous play. Almost in this product range .. you can find oneplus bluetooth earphones and real me earphones where battery life gives you around 12 hrs .I have only battery life issue with this product

name: Ananya
title: Bad product received

I had received it in the most disappointing method one can receive it in a crushed box all bend and torn out.. 2). Product broken:- left earbud of the boat 255 is not working. Charger cable didnt worked properly

name: Jatin T.
title: Betrayed
content: I bought the product as the reviews were good. I even liked it as it is a descent one. It was the price point I thought was little higher Rs 1699 but then I thought that it being a Branded product hence the price could be high.. What I am regretting right now is that I bought it at 1699 and within 2 weeks the price has dropped to 999.. I feel like betrayed.

name: Intruder Arpit

name: Nilesh P.
title: Sound, Built quality was great however Bluetooth connectivity issues
content: Sound & build quality was great. Buttons are well placed and bigger for convenient operations. Bluetooth get disconnected if kept mobile in pant pocket which is irritating while jogging. Needs to resolve this problem as in 2 to 3 feet distance Bluetooth getting disconnected.

name: Shubham Priyadarshi
title: Horrible after sales service
content: Guys, it's an honest review. I bought the earphone in 2019. It was working fine with minor grievances. After 10 months of usage, one of the sides stopped working. I applied for warranty. Boat people took my earphone and never responded. They neither returned my old earphone nor they exchanged it for a new one. Horrible after sales service. Better go for bigger brands, even if it costs a bit more.

I have used 3 wired earphones of this BRAND which sounds good. The music quality is awesome. I purchased this as to use while working out, jogging, listening music while travelling, whats the use of wireless headphone when you have to keep it in the upper pocket always. I don t know i have got a defective piece. I have ordered the replacement of the same. Will review further if this issue is solved. If unsolved than no point of buying this earphones. In the box its given for 10m but shocked to see its gets fluctuated even at less than meter. And of the obstacles walls we can understand, I means putting in jeans and travelling is so much common. @ boat please do reply if you read .

name: Vineeth Ravichandran`
title: Chinese product in Indian garb
content: Had high hopes on this product since news articles had mentioned that boAt is an Indian. brand that is doing well. But only after buying, realised that this was also MADE IN CHINA.. If I really wanted to buy a Chinese product, would have gone for brands like OnePlus.. Sell genuine indian products, not Chinese products masqueraded as Indian.

name: Narasimham Teladevalapalli
title: Worst Built Quality | Poor return response
content: The worst quality earphones i have ever used. I replaced a defective first one, got a more defective second one. The ear piece is seperated from the hub. I think this is the most common defect and because of worst built quality. My return request is just ignored by Amazon. No one came to pick up the item and it was showing "refund would be initiated after successful return of item". So no pick up by them, no refund. Very disappointed for the first time with Amazon. I feel Amazon is best and rely on their products and return policies. But it's not a smooth experience for me.

name: Abhinav R
title: Great buy
content: I have been using this for a year. Great sound quality and audio clarity. Worth the price compared to the competition.. Bought it for 999.. The mic is not perfect and you can expect a poor mic response when battery goes low.

name: P S
title: Not really worth it
content: I used it for 2 days and I'm not really happy with this product. I purchased this to find something good in budget but it came out to be total waste. Guys if you are looking for something good in wireless, try to increase your budget a little bit higher. You will definitely find something good.. The mic is the worst. I'd give it a 1/5. There is zero noise cancellation. The person hearing your voice can barely tolerate it. Do not get this product if you are gonna use it for calling as well. You even have to use voice chat at the time of gaming and it gets really annoying for them.. The feel of product is decent. But the wire is incredibly long, feels weird while wearing it.. I have attached images, i have used an A4 sheet for size reference.. You can't wear it for longer time. The earpiece is huge and bulky. If you wear it more than an hour, it starts paining. It's not really comfortable plus it's made up of metal, it is a bit heavy.. It looses connection often or you hear distortion/breakage of sound when you are traveling. You have to keep your device very close to you otherwise the sounds start breaking. You can't even use it across the room.. It doesn't really have a good bass, the bass is okayish; 3/5. You can play around with equalizer to get a slight bass, other than that, it doesn't really have any bass considering it has 10mm drivers and that "super extra bass".. The battery was fine until it reached 50-60%. The rest drained within 10 minutes of usage. It charges quickly though.. I recieved a small charging cable and 2 pairs of earbuds (image). The packaging was average. It didn't damage the product but the cover was dented a bit, it could have been better with some protection.. Sound: 3/5. Noice cancellation (sound): 4/5. Bass: 2.5/5. Comfort: 2/5. Mic: 1/5. Noice cancellation (mic): 1/5. Product feel: 4/5. Delivery: 4/5. Feel free to ask quarries

name: Umer khan
title: Worst product I have seen ever and not suitable for gym purpose
content: 1) Sound Quality. Sound quality is very bad their no bass it looks like a copy product of boat Samsungs wired handsfree are much batter than this handfrees.. 2) Not suitable for gyming purposes the handfree is only good when you are sitting at one place and using handfree.If you are not stable ate one place hanfree will come out from ears again and again.. 3) worst customer support from Amazon they are making customers fool by giving 10 days return policy after purchasing the product you can not replace or return your product they only show that you can return your product under 10 days but actually you can not.

name: Ajeeth S.
title: Not Efficient

Also, in less than an hour the charge drops to 80% after full charge. But, 60% to 20% stays good between 2 to 3 hours.. All the above stated issues are managed by quick charging tech. But, it annoys that the usage period after charging is not efficient!

title: Works only with in warranty time

Heavy bass lovers may not like this, otherwise within Rs.1000/- with a one year replacement warranty it is a good option.

Sounds great, sound quality is equal to Sony MdR-xb55AP-ExtraBass.

Totally dissapointed, returned back. Not recommend for music lovers at all. Even in call , caller volume is also very low.

name: Amazon Customer

title: Just Awesome, love u boAt Rockerz

name: manoj
title: Good product

Even today the battery condition is good as new. The cons what I feel is 1. Buds and ear holders are not so good. They gets loose and fall. 2. The cap of charger is so delicate. It doesn't lasts longer.. Pros:. 1. Sound is awesome.. 2. Wire quality is great.. 3. Battery is descent.

name: Dhiraj Shokeen
title: Great great product.. simply the best

Go for it without any hesitation and you won't regret your decision!. And ya they stay in your ear n create a sound isolation too... Good for running too!

name: AbhayChandran B S
title: Comes with good durability and comfort
content: I bought this product as a gift for my best friend and she loved it very much. It is very comfy and light. And the sound quality was also pretty much good.. Mainly if you are gamer i would suggest this. I'm a heavy pubg player and all pubg players are familiar with latency issues and when it comes to this one i would say when compared to others boat rockers 255 is better.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for money!! Good for bass lovers!
content: Pros: 1.light weight,. 2.fast pairing for BT,. 3.Comfortable fit,. 4.Thundering bass!! Good for bass lovers.. 5.Google assistant works perfectly.. Cons: 1.No vibration for call alert,hence can miss a call if phone is away.. 2. Due to extreme Bass, sometimes vocals and fine instrument sounds get masked.. 3. At full volumes, bass is very loud which if listened for long time can cause ear and headache.. But there is a solution to the problem, you can install '' Black player'', which has tones of equaliser settings.. So recommend people to use it and obviously go for boat rockerz 255, as it is value for money product!!! 😃

name: harish
title: Worth the money
content: Con(s) : The only con is it has an ugly design....yep ugly....when you are using the product it doesn't look good on you.. Pros:. 1. The sound quality - I feel it's on par with few flagship earphones. Worth at this price range.. 2. Noise cancellation - to some extent does the job, due to to its bud design and due to the rubber tip.. 3. Bluetooth connectivity - am mostly near my phone, so that wasn't a problem for me. Few metres should be fine.. 4. Battery life - playtime got about 6 hours. Standby time is great - lasted many days for me.. 5. Portability - the whole texture is kinda rubberish, so you can fold it and keep it anywhere.. 6. Water resistant - got it wet on the rain once, worked fine.. Thanks

name: Amazon Customer
title: Honest review after 6 month use
content: I purchased this earphone on 29 September 2019. Sound quality is good, also bluetooth connectivity is good. After full charge it will work for maximum 3-4 hrs. But I don't recommend it. Today, on 4 April 2020 one side of earphone stop working. Though it has 1 year warranty period can't claim warranty now due to lockdown period 😕😕. Let's see what happened.

name: Madhumita
title: Great product
content: Really satisfied with this. Sound quality is good. The product is better than mivi .. especially the neck band n compact ear buds. Bluetooth connectivity is good and works recently well with two devices at once. Have my computer n mobile connected.

name: nikhil
title: Good product, customer care/service questionable
content: I've been using it on runs for the last month and haven't had any issues. Lately however, the earphones have stopped charging, the LED doesn't work and the earphones heat up substantially when I try to charge it.. I have tried to register the product and a complaint on the vendor's website but always receive an error. I've tried calling them but the always receive a 'network busy' error. I have emailed them and awaiting a reply.. Overall a really good product but if one can't get the product to work during the warranty period, there's no point in buying it.

name: Surajjt debnath
title: Not satisfied first time at amazon
content: May be received 2nd hand product... there is too much dust inside this box... Surely this is a returned product ... Slightly disappointed with seller

name: Lawrence
title: Conectivity dissapointing, design of earpeace flawed
content: Overall: Decent product, not worth the cost.. Issues below are experience over 1 week of using the product on iPhone 6.. Pros: Sturdy material, flexible behind the neck strap and wire quality durable and tangle free. Good battery life.. Cons: The device does not have good Bluetooth connectivity. If your phone is more that one foot away from you, the sound gets cut off very often. For example, if you have your phone in your handbag/backpack/pocket, you can expect multiple cut offs, especially while moving (walking, using a scooter/motorcycle). If you move further away you need to be in direct sight of the phone for continuous music (if you turn your back to the phone or if there is any obstruction (not even a wall, a bathroom stall door is all it takes) the music gets cut off. Not sure if it is just my piece but this is very frustrating.. The ear pieces have magnets so that it connects around your neck when not in use, however this makes each ear piece heavier, as a result if you are using smaller in-ear buds, they tend to fall out due to the weight of the ear piece. This becomes a hassle while working out, particularly jogging/running.

name: Loki
title: Got it for discounted price 999 at the sale time!
content: Got it for a good discounted price 999!. Earphone looks good and the built quality too for the Boat price bracket.. Sound is good, but not that high as wired boAt BassHeads 225!. Feels not that great fit, as a neck band & need to check on Battery back up.. Boat, Amazon & Appario Retail Private Ltd good job!

name: shiva
title: Good performance at this price
content: hi the sound quality is very good and not truly impressive at this price. The passive noise cancellation has almost no effect since the cushioning of ear plugs into ear would almost suppress all the noise. There are extra earplugs at variable sizes given to us. And other than this there is no other accessories provided.

name: Rahul
title: Nice product and worthable
content: Only to sae battery little bit weak and the finiahing of rubber material is very goid also i using in rain season not at all problme also sweat happens no effect or damage occur to headphones very nice auperb headphone.rest sound of bass and treble sound is awesome i buy from amazon.in thanks amazon . From.chepas headphones better buy this one I recommend to all..

name: Joel SRY
title: Good buy
content: So for the money you pay, this is ok. Easy to use and pair. Pairs to two devices at the same time. The only issue I have is with the battery indicator. Once it touches 40%, you can be sure that it's going to die anytime soon. I use it everyday and it's been running strong till date. One good feature is that it takes literally no time to charge from 0-100% which is very convenient.

name: Sovanjan
title: Don't buy this.
content: This wireless headset stopped working after one month. I used it only in my home, so it was handled properly without any water or other kind of damages. Suddenly one day it stopped working but charging functionality was working perfect. This headset was fully charged still i can't power it on by pressing it's power button. In service centre they told me the internal IC is damaged anyhow so that's why it's not working.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not for audiophiles
content: Its got good bass. but it range for treble or Mid range is lacking.. If You are audiophile.. You will notice it's lacking. Just one day into use.. Did some tests... Yes, it lacks in higher frequencies.. However with equalizer it helps a bit.. Built wise good.. And will last long

name: Vasudev Srivastava
title: Seriously Disappointed
content: I am one those people who love listening to high bass songs all the time.So i decided to buy boAt headphones for their so called superior bass and trust me y'all, j was seriously disappointed. The sound quality is no doubt quite good the the bass had me seriously wanna cry for waste of money(yeah I am a student and saved months for them)...... Even my previous 500rs Mi wired earphones had better bass... Damn you boAt....... 1 star due to high expectations faced by low reality

name: Dipanjan Sinha
title: Don't Buy. All Show, but poor performance.
content: The headphone looked awesome over the internet. It looks grey physically too... But it has the worst performance of any headphones that I have used. First of all, it does not connect properly to phones. It takes a lot of time to get discovered.. Sound quality is ok, but when listening to music, clarity is not there at all. JBL or Skull candy is far far better than this. Even when connected, when I am receiving a call, it is making some robotic sound, hence the voice of the caller is not at all clear. Initially I thought it may be due to low charge or network congestion. But even with a full charge and strong network it does that.. The mouthpiece is also of a very poor quality. People complain that they are unable to hear my voice, when in reality I am literally shouting at this end.. Also the ear buds are uncomfortable.. So all in all, please refrain yourself from buying this crap. Instead go for any other headphones.

name: Dhananjay
title: Worst in terms of Sound Quality. For music go with Sony CI200
content: I ordered 2, one was this 255pro and another was of Sony CI200. In terms of sound quality Sony is far better crisp and Clear. BOat 255pro is better in build quality nuts not meant for music listeners. So if your purpose is enjoying music go with any other brand. In other words Boat is a brand hyped by advertising making use of screen celebrities.

name: Amazon Customer

name: Aneek Sanyal
title: Conquers the competition...
content: Build: Well designed, lightweight and comfortable. The wires are good and not flimsy, wearing comfort is well maintained, better than Mi bluetooth earphones( the main competitor of boAt in the 1499 price category).. Comfort: As mentioned above, these earphones are really comfortable, fits in the ear with no chance of slipping out (unless you're trying desperately and internationally). They're lightweight, so no hazard on that department. Perfect for long hours of music playback.. Sound: The most important aspect of an earphone is the sound clarity, and boAt surely doesn't disappoint here as well. A bit base heavy but the sound is clear, crisp and loud. Good noise cancellation also helps to isolate the music playback. Although, judging from a pure audiophile's point of view, the Mi bluetooth earphones might have a more balanced sound signature, but boAt, being a bit base heavy, is just awesome for hip-hops or Bollywood genres. A music player with a good equalizer (preferably Poweramp for android) is going to elevate the listening experience even more.. Battery: A single charge gives about 6-7 hours of music playback, which is decent enough, and full charge takes roughly about 1-1.5 hours.. Verdict: In a nutshell, boAt Rockerz 255 is worth the price tag and then some. With it's better build quality, comfort, bluetooth range, it packs more punch than it's competition. For the extreme purists, the sound signature might be a bit turn off, but for most people, even for people with good ears, this is going be a great experience.

name: Narendra
title: BoAt is actually Rocking!!
content: BoAt Rockers 255 ! quality headphones.. Best Sound Quality, Given 3 stars for Noise cancellation as it is not up to the mark.. I got this blutooth headphones replaced in 1 week. BoAt ⛵ warrenty service experience is very pleasant as I just post a request for replacement courier guy came to door step, collect the product and get it replaced in 1 week.

name: himanshu prakash
title: Read this before buying
content: I read most of the review's before buying this earphones and i ended up buying this amazing boat rockerzz, the sound clearity is okayish but oh man, the bass, it's amazing and the connectivity is brilliant, i walk from one room to another without taking my phone and it works flawlessly Without any glitch.. The problem in most of the bluetooth earphone is you have to press and hold the power button for almost 3 second to turn it on and the same for turning it off or shuffling between songs which is annoying.. Wire postioning is good but it can be better.. The battery almost lasts for about 3 days if you use it fot 2 to 3 hours a day and the ear hooks are excellent for outdoor activities with this earphone.. After all with my personal experience i can tell everyone that you can but this phone bluetooth earphone if you want good sound clearity, amazing bass, a decent battery life, and comfortable to use.

name: Sourav
title: Honest Review - Average Headset
content: Hi,. This is a average quality headset. But in this price range I would say it is a good buy for sure.. Pros:. 1. Very good battery backup. Last 6-7 hours on a average use.. 2. Build quality is good. Fit perfectly to the ears.. 3. Connects two device at a time. Connects easily.. 4. Less charging time.. 5. Very comfortable to wear.. Cons:. 1. Sound quality is average. Don't expect much. You have to use equaliser otherwise no use.. 2. Call quality is not good. It could be better. 3. Connectivity issue if your mobile device is far from your headaet, even while your mobile device in pocket, sometime you will observe connectivity issue.. Verdict- Well if you are a great music lover and if you are looking for a headset which has great sound quality than this is not a ideal device for you. However, if you want to use this device casually on a day to day basis like join meetings or gym etc than this a most value for money device. Thanks,. Sourav

By end of everything I had to create a return request.. Please do not furnish the customers with the used products. It’s really very annoying to receive the used products despite paying the full charge.

name: Dilip Easwaran
title: Great product but Quality and Support is Pathetic
content: I bought the 255 Pro in August but it went bad on the right ear - this was in 15th Oct less than an month since purchase. I raised a ticket and the it was promptly picked up on 16th Oct 2020. But till now i have no status on this as it was sent to Mumbai. The call centers are not reachable as well. I think i may even have lost the product. So while the product was great, its quality was pretty poor and the Support is almost non-existant.

name: Santosh Thakur
title: Good product in its price range
content: I am using boat rockers Bluetooth earphone or laast 7 months. I forget my old one at home so I bought again rockers 255. All over. Product is good, base quality, sounds cancellation is good the only issue I faced in this model is, when some one call me they complaints that my voice is coming very low although sound is at its max. Otherwise product is good as per the budget range. You can go for it.

name: Khalz
title: Awesome product!
content: Very happy with the product. Been using it for last one month. Pairing in seconds. Sound quality is pretty good. I mostly use it for listening to music from Spotify/ Gaana. It comes with 3 different sizes of plug. I changed to small one which fits well in my ears. The legs are rubbery and very flexible so sits in the ear properly. Go for it!!

name: Salman
title: On bike call receivers purchase this.noise cancellation is available
content: I am fan of mi sportz but there is noice cancellation issue while riding bike front person cant here any thing. Now i purchased. I used boat rokers RS 999 in offer. I suggest to buy bike riders its good call quality.i tested on 50km/hr also the front pserson here clearly. On bike several people want noice cancellation bluetooth head set so buy this one. Battery is around approx 6hr not checked in depth.. On Bike call receiving is easy thanks for boat.

name: A. Katyayani Devi
title: Not satisfied with the product
content: Sound Quality. whomever used boat 225 in-ears headphones can understand better. If you have both 225 nd rockerz 255, you can compare the sound quality at the high volume and the clarity of songs. 225 was far better in that... And the guidelines are there only for how to switch on the Bluetooth and not clear for how to switch it off.. Distance. It was surely dislike for any one, if your mobile was in the next room then it was disconnecting again.. Charging. Draining fast for continues usage, need to charge it more times. And it was not showing clearly indication of charging bar in mobile. Showing it rarely.. Light Indication. It was not clear at all. It is showing a mixed colours.. Mic. Without holding it you can't talk properly. It was a dear distance to use.. And if you continuously keep them in ears it will be paining.. Please never don't buy it from Appario seller. Better to buy from another seller. Even we can't return the product for lifetime..

name: Vengatesh
title: Great for Music listening ; But not for taking calls.
content: Listening to Music: 8/10. The sound quality of the earphones is good. The bass sounds are slightly over boosted; which may annoy some of the listeners. Bass lovers can buy without hesitation.. Connecting Calls: 6/10. The call quality is disappointing. The inbuilt mic is not that great. The other person's voice that we hear during a call is also slightly distorted when compared with the call without Bluetooth earphones.. Over all build quality is good.

name: Ziesha
title: Good product at good deal
content: Its pretty good and clear volume. I haven't used it much to give a precise review but I did love it specially the feature where it names the caller when you receive a call so it makes it easy to answer the call even if your phone is inside the bag.

name: Hariharan Chandrasekaran
title: Best earphone
content: One of the best earphone with good sound balance with Bass and treble. Earbuds and comfortable, it hurts initially, you need to fix it properly on the ears. I was able to take up call without any distortion. The people in the other side were able to listen without any background sound. I haven't checked the battery life. I hope it should provide at least 6 hrs.. This is my second earphone from Boat. Boat is rocking. Listening the music through OnePlus 7 !!

name: Atharva
title: Really a good product. Worth the money only if bought in some sale/dicount.
content: Its a great product. would have beeen better if the charging port was type-C, but its not the case. the micro usb charging port is a bit delicate. Also the ear buds are kindof a bit bigger than the regular wiered earphones, thus long time usage results in pain in the ear. the battery life is good only if u are closer to the decive connected.; if ur connected device is a bit far away (eg-in other room) then the battery drains pritty fast.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good product, could have been better
content: The sound quality is good, but there is some low buzzing noise. It is a good product at an affordable price for calling, playing games, movies, music, and other general-purpose tasks. But if you are a hardcore fan of listening to music, then I don't recommend it

name: Mukul Jauhari
title: Worst Sound and Poor mic
content: Sound quality is very poor no bass at all. Looking good but in terms music experience which is the real purpose of headphone is like street side product which usually available near metro. Honestly I had a not good experience with Boat. So if wants you buy this product for just a show piece or decorate your neck then go ahead.. I initiated this product for Return and Refund.

name: AJ
title: not good sound..Not recommonded
content: Except the looks and battery backup i think nothing is good. Sound is of below average quality...after listening to sony i applied this and i could not fathom why such good ratings..rather try out philips/sony wired earphones guys..could not return as packaging was thrown by maid..😪

name: Akash
title: A generic toy with a brand label
content: Just okay, not as advertised.. Bass: 4/10. Sound: 6/10. Comfy level: 7/10. I thought I’d get a deep pounding bass, but that was not the case. I thought the sound would be crisp and clear, well, it was up to some extent just as you would expect in a generic brand, but not even close to that of JBL’s.. Bottom line: I regret the choice I made.

name: Rahul
title: Unintuitive
content: While the performance itself isn't bad it lacks basic intuitive features like switching off automatically when the buds are magnetically connected like on the Oneplus bullets. This feature goes a long way when you're constantly on calls. The long press to switch off/on is not handy especially since it doesn't have auto switch on/off.. I'd rather shell out a couple hundred bucks more for the OnePlus bullets just for the intuitiveness.

name: Vasanth kumar
title: Good quality only for 2months. Later it is again a waste of money.
content: The quality of the product was overall good but it's been just 2months of use and already one ear has stopped working. If u really don't want to waste money then don't buy this product becoz by 2 to 3 months you'll also face the same problem. And the waranty is just for name sake as u can't get it fixed anyhow. Think before spending so much. If the product works in good condition only for 2 months then u can buy many other brands which are actually cheaper and also good in quality. And even if that product stops working you can buy two of those in the money spent for this product so basically that would last much longer than this.

name: Anand U.
title: Just an average product.
content: Okay so the service was great. But the earphones didn't last, only in 4 and a half months later it's not taking charge. I've tried using different cables and adapters but nothing helped. Sadly due to the lockdown I'm not even able to have it repaired by the service center. The product is extremely unreliable, sound and bass are not TOO good if you're a edm or bass lover. Bluetooth connectivity range is pretty low, the voice gets distorted. Also the build quality, the wires keep hanging in front which is really awkward sometimes. A product like this at a price range of 1.3k is alot.

name: Atul p.
title: Doesn't deserve to be rated.
content: The 1st time when I received the product, it had scratches on it. The product looked tampered. Hence placed a request for a return. The 2nd time when I received the product, it did not work at all. The boat DIST/dealer sent a DOA product. Such an awful QC. I didn't expect as I am already using their other products and had respect for the brand. I doubt whether I will buy any product of this brand in the future.

name: Punit Mehta
title: Superior quality for music
content: Sound and bass quality is superior in price 999 as I bought during festive offers but noise cancellation is not good means not this any neckband I ever used even Samsung level u or u flex bault curve, every single neckband didn't give you noise cancellation whenever you are crowded with few people who were chattering, then the listener will also hear their voice which is more disturbing and that's why you have to put off your neckband for just to talk them for long conversation but if you are almost alone and your place is quite then this is the best neckband and if you want to buy it only for music then go for it it's amazing bass and sound quality will amaze you with it's superior quality sound.

name: Hritik Manchanda
title: Value for money
content: I bought them for around 1200 in sale. Pros :-. Awesome sound quality. Beast battery backup (Boat is lying about 6hrs backup as i have already used them for a movie and 1 hr call and 30-40 songs and overall usage for more than a day and still 60% battery left). Support Buds for earphones do good work for holding on the earphones in ear. Voice and beats are very clear. Call quality is satisfactory. Build quality is superb.. Splash proof. Cons:-. Support earbuds start causing pain in ear for long use but thank god they are removable. Strap around the neck is good but strap goind towards buds is quite thin. Handle with care. Small range as it is 4.1 Bluetooth with less than 10m coverage

name: Sanket Gedam
title: Nice product
content: This is nice product. Using this for 2 months now. Best feature of this product is it gets connected with 2 devices at same time. I use this with my laptop n mobile at same time n this device is intelligent enough to start voice of laptop calls or mobile calls based on call which gets first. Overall battery life last for 8 hrs but fast charging helps as it takes 45 mns only. Overall a nice product

name: ashoke kumar halder
title: Exceptional Sound Quality
content: Best Bluetooth headphones within this range, most importantly it is Indian Brand.. Exceptional sound quality with extreme bass options, light weight, handy, portable, good sleek design.. It has a good battery life of 6-7 hours and it gets full charged within 40 minutes from 0% to 100%.. If you are using bluetooth and wifi on the same time, then the range of wifi becomes less, it is not an issue of the headsets but it is an issue of mobile.. Go for it guys, best ones in this range. NO ISSUES! 😁

name: Nilesh Gore
title: Great experience.
content: It fullfills all requirement of music lover, action movie lovers, those who talk for long and those who listens audio books.. Bass is high, it depends on choice. But it doesnt kill trebel, mid and high tones so listening is wonderful experience.. Connectivity is very fast and battery backyup is 6hrs+ in playtime.. Rest all is good.

name: Amit Jangid
title: Amazing (try to get it under 1000)
content: I use two Bluetooth earphones ( boat and boult).. And both have good sound quality, high bass. Good competition.. But i personally recommend boult wireless earphones on the basis of convenience to use ( coz wires came from behind the neck).. At sound level both are amazing.

name: Rajan....
title: Worst Battery Backup
content: Playing one song at 80% battery terribly drains in just 2 songs. While in drowned in the music, you can hear the Boat Rockers Music Director sayings " Opps Battery Low". Make it beep then playing the most every awkward heard posing american accent. Utterly disappointed. Guys go for JBL. It seems to be Quoted Indian version of Xi Jinping portrayed as made in India.

name: Harshad
title: Honest owner opinion. Replaced twice in 8 months due to the fault in earbuds
content: Honest owner opinion:. Sound quality - 3/5. Sound quality is better than JBL/sony wireless within this price range.. Bluetooth connectivity- 2/5. It takes long time to connect automatically. More often need to connect by clicking on device name.. Same for multiple devices. Does not auto connect to more than 1 device.. Note: within 8 months I have replaced it twice. Over the period headphone's right side has stopped working. Then the left side.. Customer care was not helpful throughout the process. Boat sent me new packed earphones in replacement. In next 3 months same thing happened again. And right side of the earphone stopped working.

name: Qadir Ali Khan
title: After 10 days rough use
content: 10 days after replacement ... Build quality 3/4* (ok quality but not look premium). Sound quality 4/5* (great not deep bass but good enough to enjoy your songs). Battery 3.5/5* (3 to 4 hrs on playback , enough for a normal day use ) (on Standby great backup). Noice cancelation 4/5* (no one can easily disturb you). Durability 3.4/5* (very rough using but didn't found any sign of damage let see how long). Comfortable in 👂 ear with hook 2.5/5* (painful). 3/5* without hook

name: Hardik Choudhary
title: Pathetic product
content: Third class product. Got the first one that had battery issues. Like the battery just lasted for 1-2 hrs. Then placed a replacement order and again got a defective product which was not pairing with any of my apple devices.. First one paired smoothly with iphone and my macbook but had battery issues. Second one has good battery life when connected to android phone but unable to connect to my iphone or macbook. Pathetic product

name: Suraj Amazon Customer
title: Mind boggling product!! 😎
content: I can't get enough of this earphones.. Sound qulity is so clear in highs and lows.. Battery life is more than expected from a bluetooth earphone.. It is showing more than 1 day battery life. And the quality of the material used is so nice... I am happier than expected.. And thank you amazon for fast delivery.

name: Dr RockingNINJA
title: Stopped working after 10 months
content: I am writing this review after 10 months,. After 10 months 1 earpiece is now not working,. Now I can't do anything,no warranty now.... Now I have to buy again another product ... Now. about sound quality is good,bass is good but noise cancellation is not enough and battery is worst and unpredictable.... Now I recommend dont go for it,

name: Prashanth kakkireni
title: Review after one year of usage - Not value for money
content: I am using the product from last one year. initially the product seemed to be good the sound quality, noise cancellation and other things are 6/10. but the quality got deteriorated over time and it stopped working after a year. Boat teams are not responding with the warranty claims. it is not value for money

name: Mohammed
title: Don't Go for it...it's a genuine review
content: I don't know if anyone will read this...but if anyone does...please do not buy this earphones now....it is too outdated + the sound quality is not at all good and neither is the bass quality as mentioned in the title. I buyed it on 30th June 2020 and I'm regretting it as it has Bluetooth 4.1 which is like 2 years old.... My suggestion - go for its pro version rockerz 255 pro...it's ₹500 expensive but worth it...or if your budget doesn't allow you to go that much then go for jbl infinity glide...it has both good vocals and a descent base.... Hope it helps....

name: Sushant Garudkar
title: Detailed review based on my usage experience
content: 1 week and no issue still eligible for replacement. Nice product when I've bought this it came with battery 100% charged. Easily give you upto 5.5 hrs of playback. Bluetooth range is not that good I mean if you always need to go away from your device from where you are playing this earphones then you will find that, range is not that good but if you aren't go away from device like you use it while using laptop or you use it with mobile phone and while listening you keep your phone in pocket or in simple words if you are not going away from it then it is best for you but for people who needs more range then this is not for you. Talking about sound quality nice little bit bass boosted but you will love it. Noise cancellation works fine.

name: siva rama subramanian
title: Worst ever... Returned it in a day
content: Worst product probably ever I have purchased on Amazon, ordered it received a faulty device unable to hear the other person's voice lot of disturbance in the clarity of the tone replaced i, to my dis may even the replaced device is a ditto of the one which I returned,made yet another return and my amount is been refunded....Worst ever boAt speakersi have ever turned out to...... still bass is good to hear songs,But at 1k + it's not only fa hearing songs, it should do it's purpose unfortunately it haven't ......A big thumbs down boAt 255

name: Amazon Customer
title: Recommend in Bluetooth headphones
content: The product is amazing when it comes to sound quality and the material used in the making.. It works decently at it's low pricing but the pannel of buttons on the headphones have stopped responding which as caused the Mic to not work as well.. But still the songs play well with any issues.....

name: Anamika Chaudhary
title: Not for long term, not worth spending rs.1000 just for 9 months of usage
content: If you are looking for a product which would be reliable to you for the long term then this is not a product for you.. It has a year warranty. After 9 months of usage, one earbud stopped working. I raised the complaint to their customer service. I received a replaced product after a month. Then again using for 15 days it does not get switched on and not able to pair to any of my devices.. So if spending 1000 bucks and thinking to use if for a year or more.. This product will more in the service center than with you.

name: Sagar Routh
title: Horrible product
content: Horrible product with mic issues on call. The customer service is even worse. The customet service number is unavailable for last 5 days. There has been no update on the replacement of the headphone. They picked up the product the next day with no replacement or any update on when the product will be replaced. It has been 10 days that I am trying to get in touch with the customer service but the number is either unavailable or the office is closed.. The sound quality is ok but the bluetooth connectivity and on-call mic is not working at all.

name: Oves Jiwani
title: Kept disconnecting in calls
content: A decent wireless headphones. Doing quality and bass was ok. Obviously in this price range it was good. However it didn’t worked for me as the Bluetooth kept disconnecting in all calls and also the other party voice used to sound robotic, it used to be unrecognisable. Hence I had to return the headphones and now looking for some other headphones.

name: Suman Kumar Sharma
title: You can buy it during offers and sale then you will be satisfied
content: This bluetooth is very helpful for me while i changed minimum 4 bluetooth earlier this product but i am really happy this is satisfying product at approx 1000₹ budget if you can buy during sale and offers but if you buy it with 1500-1600 amout then thats not satisfying. Overall this is good yet sometimes i didn't able to connect it fast it makes some takes

name: DocEb91
title: finally found something real good
content: i have special needs. my ears are big. normal headsets won't fit in my ear. over the ear headsets also hurts my ear coz i wear spectacles. if u hav same issues, then Boat Rockerz is the right device u sud buy... thank u Boat Rockerz

name: Solomon  Raj David
title: Good product at this price range
content: Review after 10 days use.. the product is great at this cost .. The packaging from the seller was not good at all.. it seemed like it was a used product but luckily it was not.... Sound Quality is Good. Noise cancellation is above Average. And for bass lovers this is your cup of tea ... Amazing.. Bass.. Thank You Amazon for serving us in this pandemic Situations too...

name: AVIJIT CHATTERJEE
title: AWESOME SOUND...BUT MOST BAKWAS SERVICE OF BOAT... DONT BUY
content: Sound of the headphone is superb, super punchy bass, everything was excellent but after using the product for 5 months one side of the ear is not working. Raise a complain request to Boat and on very next day one pickup executive from Delhivery came and picked up my headphone. From that day I have repeatedly trying to contact with the service centre but nobody attending my call... PURA CHINA KA MAAL HAI BHAI, "AFTER SALE SERVICE" KA KOI GUNJAISH HI NAHI.. I strongly won"t recommend Boat so far service is concern. Rest up to you.... PEACE

name: Faheem akhoon
title: Worst
content: It's flexible but I am little worried about its strength ,sound quality is nice .... But i would recommend ptron buds if u love buds ..... HEY PLEASE DON'T BUY IT , ONLY ONE EAR IS WORKING, IT HASN'T BEEN EVEN A 1 MONTH

name: Ronak Kabra
title: Rockerz rock but customer support poor
content: It's one of the best! I used it around 1.5 years. But recently there is lose contact in wire due to which I don't hear anything from the ear buds. Looks like a easy fix but there are no service centers around. There is just one which is unreachable and also the mail id on boAt website is unreachable. Customer support must be improved but I guess that doesn't bring much revenue for them so that area has been neglected

name: Ravi Shankar
title: Sound quality is nice.
content: Overall a great product. Sound quality is great in mids. Buttons are tactile enough. Altho the charging port is micro USB which could be Type-C, as some products provide it in this price range.
