Wires could be a bit shorter, Also, the cover on the charging port is a bit tricky to open, feels like I would break it if didn't pay attention while opening it but that's just nitpicking.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Mic doesn't work
content: the design, look, sound quality, bass are all fine. but the biggest drawback is when you are on a call or you are recording your voice.. The mic is like a mystery it is able to record even the slightest of noise from the environment but your voice won't be recorded. The other person on the call keeps complaining this that all sorts of voices are audible except for the user.. Even I tested it by recording my voice and I was amazed to see that what it recorded was birds chirping and rainfall but not a single word from my mouth.. 1 star for its hell like irritating mic.

name: Amazon customer
title: Overpriced and not a durable product
content: Purchased in April 19 and after after 6 mths product isn't working. Initially the product performance was good like Bluetooth connectivity and battery life but after 6 mths connection failure is frequent and finally no sound in both the earphones. My view at this point is product is overpriced and not that durable. Let's see what response I will be getting at service center as it's still under warranty.

name: Ashish Sharma
title: Good budget Bluetooth headphones
content: Sound quality is as you expect from this price, bass is heavy which some might like, build is good and looks durable, there’s no noise cancellation for sure and you can’t expect that at this price. Connects easily to any device and you can connect 2 devices simultaneously

name: VJS
title: Good sound with poor quality
content: Product is average.. ear buds clip sizes differ, so not holding on firmly.. slips during vigorous workouts.. Sound quality very good and decent. BUT BATTY LIFE VERY DISAPPOINTING. DISCONNECTS VERY OFTEN AFTER 1 HOUR.. SO NOT A VALUE FOR MONEY

name: Aj
title: One side of the headphones got damaged
content: If you are looking for headphones for short term use, this one looks perfect. But I can assure you that this product won't last more than 6 months. My headphones got it's both sides damaged with in first 4 months of use and I asked for a replacement. Yes, they gave another headphones as replacement and after another 8 months the replaced headphones again got damaged. Since the warranty period is over by 1 month I'm unable to claim the warranty. Think wisely before selecting these sub standard products.

name: shabir a.
title: Pathetic design and performance
content: Cons:. ~ Quality of plastic is cheap for the price.. ~ Cable that goes around the neck is very stiff and uncomfortable to wear.. ~ Ear bud rubber is slippery and even the bud with does not fit properly.. ~ Multifunction buttons provided in the right side tag is hard to press does not provide proper haptic feedback.. ~ Length of the cable is longer than the required size and makes sure that the mic stays away from your mouth so that during calls people can hardly hear you.. ~ -200% noise cancellation, when you are on a call, the receiver can hear the noise of a motorcycle that is 1km away from you. It actually absorbs the noise better than the users voice.. ~ For multifunction keys dedicated to power on/off, toggle previous/next and to enable Google assistant, the time defined for long press is so long that it's frustrating everytime when you want to turn off your device.. Pros:. * Good sound quality. * Voiceover feedback on key press actions are highly intuitive.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Review after 1 year
content: Reviewing it after more than 1 year :. No doubt sound quality at this range is best, but few cons - first noise cancellation is very bad, second battery sucks after 1-2 months of usage, third you cannot use it for more than 2 hours and fourth no matter how much you keep it with care one side no-sound issue will arise within 7-8 months but (don't worry thanks to the replacement policy). Overall ,if you are not going to use earphones to attend calls while travelling, this is the best available wireless earphone at this price range.

name: Shekhar Baviskar
title: This is a SUB Woofer.......wow
content: Wow......i say, just BOOM boom..... Bass......just awesome......DEEP bast is very very good..... I used jbl bt160 which cost 2200rs.... But this is worth buying....at Amazon in just 899rs..... What a sound yaar...paisa vasul..... Battery backup also nice......i recommended for this

name: Venu
title: Value for money
content: The sound quality, noise cancellation, bass,...etc., everything is fine and fair with the price.. If I have to speak about my product, I treated it in such a manner that if it is a living thing it will commit suicide instead of being with me.. The item's rigid assembling and toughness of wires impressed me. Six months back I bought this product, even now it's working cool.. If you're a rough fella I advise you to go with this.The perfect one with a reasonable price.

name: prateek sharma
title: One side of the bluetooth stop working
content: One side of the bluetooth stopped working within a few days from purchase...and the service center takes estimately 20-25 days..so i would suggest you to shift to some other brand...hope this is helpfull to u.

name: Abhishek Tiwari
title: Comfortable ...But Bass not there ...!!
content: I have purchased these headphones for my brother and he is currently using it but when I used these earphones I found that the bass is not that much good it is ok ok for listening songs on the go but if you are expecting something very powerful or something appreciable it is not in that League although it is quite comfortable to wear but you have to compromise the quality of song with the comfort..... that's what I feel.... show my birth date is if you want to have a comfort of wearing light earphones or headphones then it is a good bye but if you wish to have something good for listening to I would not suggest it !!

name: Anuj Kumra
title: Do not Buy any boat product..!!!
content: I am being very honest here, the product might be very decent but the poor quality and durability. within 6 months of usage it stopped working. Raised complaint for the product replacement and its been 2 months but no response from them. I though i was the only one facing such issue m but when i went to their twitter page i saw people waiting for replacement for more than 3- 4 months.You can go and check on their twitter page and see how bad the after sales service is.I Hope Amazon stop selling their product as they are very bad with their services.

name: Wahed
title: Disappointment
content: Well these aren't nearly as nice as it thought they would be using since a week, firstly they aren't even comfortable to wear and even after attaching them to the ear they get loose quite quickly and like I mentioned not comfortable another highly annoying part about this is that once you reach 20% battery you might as well assume it's zero because every 5 seconds you get a prompt, "oops battery low" and well the sound quality the bass and the 'noise cancelation' barely noticeable quite underwhelming sound and bass cheaper headphones have better.

name: apurva b.
title: Not that great
content: I have used Boat before these however have not been that great , battery life is very short .The sound feels okay (i think). Given the price you can go for other earphones . But honestly the battery is something that is a major factor in not liking them as much I did the other Boat earphones . It is sometimes even difficult to connect them to 2 devices at the same time.. In a nut shell , go buy other earphones.

name: Suraj Joshi
title: Battery Indication Is Worst.
content: Writing this review after using 2 weeks.. Overall it's an average product, not too good not too bad.. Battery backup was also not satisfactory but not too bad at the same time. I have only one issue with the battery indication. It was showing 100% then 80% and then directly down to 20% and off. There's no in between. Boat should take a look for this problem.. Sound quality, noise cancelation were above average, Satisfied for this criteria. Bluetooth connectivity is good can be more better.. Overall this is a good product.

name: Parshu
title: Good sound, average battery life.
content: I have used Boult earlier and now this one.. Sound quality is definitely better, however the battery life is on lower side.. continuous use of 4-5 hours will drain it, volume levels are lower too.. Good for listening music and watching videos, performance is not upto mark for voice/video calls .. lacks the clarity.. Nevertheless; for the price, it is its a good buy depending upon your usage patttern.

name: Meet Thakre
title: Just good not a great.
content: No doubt , it's long last till 5.5 hours... And charge very fast in an hour . But the thing is it's inbuilt quality is not so much good. Mine right ear peice got stop working in one and half month only. May be due to problem in my earphone set. But the bass is too high and the treble is quite low it can't be used for daily hearing it's a good for calling but the mic is in left string , so it must as much near to Ur mouth other wise other person next to phone can't hear Ur voice. And remember it's a not good daily . I loved its battery and charging and I would rate 6/10 for music , 8/10 for charging , 9/10 for bass , 10/10 for battery backup , 5/10 for treble , 7/10 for calling , its my review after using it for a quite one and a half month

name: Puneet Arora
title: Poor quality
content: Don't buy this product. Ear hooks are too loose to retain. I lost both and couldn't find new. One side stopped working within 3 months. Returned and waiting for replacement for 2 weeks. Too tough to contact customer care.. Not a good product n service is too poor.

name: varun kumar
title: Worthful among all competitors in the market , even better than from some of high range products
content: Really a good product from boat , I bought it @ 899/- during festivals, it's a quality product having good bass , very good noise cancellation so you will never get complaint about sound missing while talking to someone and simultaneously it has a good bettry back up as well . Totally worth it to buy it from Amazon, beware to buy it from other portals , one of them delivered me a same korain product which is not genuine, so returned it back and then ordered from Amazon.

name: Dinanath Parit
title: Bad experience and zero tolerance
content: After 6 month it is not working. After visiting boat style website and register complain, I received ticket no and pick up number but when trying to track using the link provided no details found. After 1 month I got a person mob no through sms from boat like call him and guide him about your address and handover the item but calling 100 times he didn't received my call at all. No response from boat customer also. Now its been 3 month before complain register, I am writing bad experience which I had with them and swear that no purchase in future from boat. Also informed every freind not to waste money if service is not good.

name: Venkat P.
title: You'll loose the Wingtips
content: Good value for the money but leaves something to be desirrd in terms of audio quality.. The wingtips get loosen over time and end up being lost .. There arnt any wingtips available for spare in the box.. This should have been a deal breaker for me if i had know this before buying

name: WSMathias
title: Won't last more than 6 months.
content: I have been using this over 6 months now.. No change is battery capacity it's still around 5-6 hur on continuous usage.. At 900ma it's takes 40min to fully change.. I have already lost Charing pin cover.. Some Times there is no audio.. Charging cable stoped working in just 15 day's

name: Sushma s.
title: Very worse customer service and cannot claim my warranty.
content: The customer care is worse they ask you to generate ticket and their customer care number is always busy.. The product stopped working after 6 months in around May it's August now I am tired yet my product is not yet repaired.. This is disgusting good luck with your useless customer services.

name: Mrinmoy Deka
title: Could be the best earphone under 1500 but its not
content: Best in ear Bluetooth earphones you can get in this price range. I bought it for 1300 and its been 3 months and it is working very fine, specially best while working or while morning run. Battery is also good almost runs whole day in mid volume.. Only problem is that after 6,7 months it starts to show prblms like left earphone defect, charging prblm n all .. but their replacement policy is good , i got it replaced with new earphones for 3 times .. But there is a problem , after 5 mnths suddenly the left side stopped working and got ut replaced as it was under warranty but the new product that i got also stopped working after 2 mnths .. Not pretty reliable.

name: Shivaprasad Aithal
title: Buy this without hesitation
content: Really cool earphone... But within a year you'll face issue of one side or sometimes both side... As you got warranty you'll get new one... But replacement process also takes long time.... Except this sound quality, bass are really good, noise cancellation is not that good...

name: P mohanty
title: Awesome quality product!!
content: Very clear and crisp sound. Bass is amazing.overall a very nice quality earphone at this price range of 899,somehow the earcord are a bit longer which is a little drawbacks, but anyways we can't do anything because it's a company manufacturing style. Thanks amazon and boat.

name: Afrin
title: Don’t waste ur money on this product
content: I have just bought this Headphones 1 month back for my brother online class , it’s totally waste , I thought it’s affordable and good , one side of headphone is not working and the button removes itself and makes us uncomfortable, plz don’t buy this product by brother is suffering a lot now as becoz of this Headphones. If u want a good quality headphones don’t buy this as it’s affordable , if u want to invest on some good headphones this is not the correct product and u can put some extra money and buy a Nice wireless headphones

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bad Quality
content: It is not coming more than 6 months even after replacing warren also it came another 4 months life. But warren replacement was happened one time happy for that. Overall unhappy with product. Plz improve quality of the product as u know the cost of product is not less. It should meat the customer expectations

name: Suvo Bera
title: When start the offer if you buy
content: I bought the product and use 1 years then I written review. Sound quality is good something problem in flex cable you can try to hurt if you broke the flex cable. When you're using please scary use it is my requirement and the product is so good you can use for your sport.

name: poulomi
title: Boat rocker rocks....
content: Great earphones.. i got it during diwali sale for 1k... And I'm using it since then.. sound and bass is great.. battery life is good too. Play back time is nearly 7hours and charges quite fast too.. looks smart... U can go for it if you want a Bluetooth headphone..

name: Nilesh Shastri
title: Unreliable battery less than 60%. Switches off anytime.
content: Battery performance has nose dived just after a year. It keeps showing 40% battery but switches off. It's become unreliable to use it if battery is less than 60%. Switches off anytime.

name: Arpit Kadu
title: Exelent Value for money
content: It's a very good product.... Just don't wear it in rain because the earphones miggt be water or sweat resistant but battery and chipset is not that much....besides that its a great earphone..you can recive calls handlessly and play pubg without wires comming outta your phone...plus in the gym you can keep you phone aside during workouts and enjoy music ....and you can change songs...volume ... Redial ...pause/play using the buttons given...overall a handsfree experience with superb sound quality and the eargrippers do their jobs as well...

name: NAVEEN TIWARI
title: Superb bass.superb sound quality ..crystal clear
content: I think this is the best in market.i got in 999 rs.so doesn't except many more ..but really awesome sound quality and base..mind blowing..just go for it ..thnq Amazon and thnq boat also..

name: Sidhartha Saikia
title: After using 2 months
content: I am using this from 2 months. Sound quality is great for all types of song. Battery backup is not bad, i charge it once in an alternative day. It may be takes 1 to 1.30 hours to full charge. But I think there are little bit problem in mic, when i am in a busy environment, the opposite person always complaining about the noise. I purchased it on 1300, in this budget it is the best one.

name: anil
title: BOAT is the WORST company. Do not buy their products.
content: Read this before you buy : Every time you connect these earphones to bluetooth, a guy SHOUTS in your ears at the top of his voice "YOU ARE CONNECTED TO BOAT ROCKERS". Boat is the worst company, who is advertising itself daily even after selling the product to customers by shouting into users ears daily. You did not give the ear phones to me for free. Then why do you think it's okay to shout your name in my ears daily a 100 times? REMOVE THE ****ING MESSAGE. BOAT IS THE WORST COMPANY WITH NO ETHICS.

name: Akshat
title: Read before you buy.... 🤠🤠
content: Sound quality-9/10😻. Comfortable-4/10👎👎😒. Build quality-8/10😑🤨😌. Battery-10/10😄😃😀😊😍. Bass-9/10🧐🤠😑😑. It is good under 1000₹. If you ask boat rockerz 255 🆚 255 pro , so my ans. Is 255 pro is the good one....

name: USHAGOWRE
title: Awesome product.
content: Sound quality is very good with good bass. Its works great when comes to noice cancellation. I've tried it at 70km speed on heavy traffic area works great without any signal drops. Shows battery percentage of bluetooth. V.nice product for this price when compared to Sony products as I almost tried all sony product which doesn't support noice cancellation even after investing 6000 on bluetooth.

name: P.M.Giri
title: Very Noisy and BASS is not good, it is almost like LOUD SPEAKER
content: My review after using it for a 20 mins. My ears are paining... Its not BASS actually, its like DJ LOUD SPEAKER... As I'm using of Sony Extra-bass wired headset and Apple, this is nothing compared to them. Just for the sake of Wireless headset, you can ahead. I didn't checked call clarity on it.

name: Abhishek Sharma
title: Just the perfect earphone you need for everyday !!
content: Actually a product worth buying.. I have mostly been a fan of quality products than brand names.. Boat has come up with a product that does just everything it is supposed to do.. I got it for under 1k on one of the sale days and that's why it's even more of a satisfying buy.. my views on this after using my Boat Rockers for almost over a month extensively... 1. Sound is quite good..bass is quite good for regular use (I mostly listen to Psychedelic, Techno and Rock, performs genuinely on all the genres). 2. Lightweight - I have slept wearing it twice, never realised..!!. 3. Good battery life- goes on easily for 6-7 hours with one charge..(mix of usage and standby). 4. Love the color- I have a red and black colour one..looks super classy... 5.noise cancellation is good. Blocks out pretty much all of the ambient sound even in the middle of noisy surroundings... All in all..I am happy I waited a long time to buy a genuine wireless earphone and Boat Rockers made it worth the wait... Cheers team Boat..!!

name: SHIV CHAITAN
title: Best BL earphone
content: I have bought this item in January which is 1.5 month experience about this product.It is one of the best product, very flexible, light weight, comfortable.Its sound quality is very good and battery backup is around 8 hour in rough used. Go for it friends

name: Dr Anirudh
title: Very poor product d9nt buy this.
content: Product is worse don't buy this. Within 4 month it creates problem during call. Sometimes ear plugs are not working properly.. after few months suddenly the sound disappeared.. so I clam in warrenty period but ita about to 1 month. There is not any mail or call comes from boat that your product is dispatch on not... Everything is so poor... I don't recommend anyone for boat... Poor very poor.

name: Himanshu
title: Good Sound Good Bass. Poor noise cancellation.
content: 1. Sound and bass quality is good as compared to the other products (At this price point). 2. Noise cancellation is extremely weak. Even those unbranded cheap wired earphones offer way better noice cancellation.. 3. Device can be used effectively only upto 20% battery mark. After that, the device will start beeping and will automatically shut down shortly. So try not to use the device unless and untill it becomes extremely important after <20% battery level.

name: Rohit
title: Fake product received
content: The seller is give the copy version of boat product amazon please go through this as I had give the photo u can se those are the same model boat 255 pro the yellow is missing key details is has no noice cancelation and also some basic build up quality I want refund for my product immediately and please amazon dont sell us this duplicate product and also ban thos sellers

name: Ronak Singh
title: Best product i have ever seen....
content: I think this is the best product i am buying on Amazon.in really its battery backup its about 2 day of continuing use still 60% battery i have.. only one mistake i noticed that only earbuds i think more efforts can be done on earbuds soo ear gets more comfort other than these i think the value of money of this product is great i am totally satisfied with these product.. And also i noticed that Amazon is trusted site for buying products than other sites thank you Amazon for such deal like these product...lastly ratings. Battery backup - 10/10. Sound clearty -10/10. Noice cancellation - 10/10. Volume- 10/09. Earbuds - 10/07. Other than these i think all off these 10/10 its great product by boat thank you...

name: ashutosh kumar singh
title: Average sound. Not durable.
content: These aren't durable. And I've not taken them for running or support activities. Just average indoor and outdoor use. No matter what you do, this earphone won't survive more than almost an year. You'll need to buy another one next year 100% sound quality is also not so great for what you'd pay for. I would now either pay for better quality earphone which will survive longer or buy cheaper ones, replacing which every year will not cost me as much. Makes no sense to but this earphone

name: Lama
title: Value for money
content: The product is quite decent for the price and is very convenient to use. It's Bluetoothconnectivity is limited to a few meters after which it gets automatically disconnected. It lasts for about 5 to 6 hours but u need to turn off the headphone manually and it is not automatically turned off like the MI headphone when u stick the magnetic headphone together.

name: Vikas A
title: Battery discharge in 2hrs use
content: Sound quality is very good but my concern is BATTERY its getting discharge in 2 hrs.. I'm keep on replacing the product again and again but battery life is the same as mention in all the product.. 4th times going to replace it but I know that product will also be same.. Hoping that product battery will be fine.

name: Gulshan kumar
title: Good but OnePlus is best✌️
content: To my amaze you have too switch off bluetooth to disconnect neckband...yes it's true then why you put magnet in it...and some times it looses connectivity too. Overall it's ok to buy if you have patience more than me😂. Battery backup is awesome by the way..

name: Sohel shaikh
title: After service very bad.... charges are taken
content: After service is worst ......if u claim guarantee they will charge u half the price of products believe me u will regret after using boat service very pathetic service watch YouTube replacement product they will hand over you used products and replacement will take atleat 2 month don't believe me see YouTube videos

name: H S Lad
title: Broken earphones delivered twice
content: This is pathetic approach by Amazon twice delivered broken Bluetooth earphones. If Amazon want to hire cheap Vendors to delivered roadside items to valued customers then it is difficult to survive in the market. I will make sure I will not ordere anything afterwards from amazon.. Always check the dealer Tech fire is not a genuine sellers he sells such kind of damaged articles

name: Prasenjit
title: Not recommended
content: It has been 7 days since I have purchased this earphone. Sound quality is good. But while you are in call the other person cannot hear you clearly. Initially I thought it was due to network issue but while removing the earphone the call was pretty clear. Even I was getting the voice too late. Not recommended for calling purpose. Before this I had used two earphone from boat bassHeads 225 and performance was very good. This time I am very disappointed with the product.

name: Vishal
title: This has inbuilt RJ voice
content: There earphones are good, have good sound quality but when it turn on , connects to anything and when battery is low THIS EARPHONE IS GOING TO SHOUT IN YOUR EARS WITH MAX VOLUME WITH ANNOYING RJ VOICE .. Hope this helps you

name: pallavi bagchi
title: The seller is not gud
content: Jst fed up with the seller..1st they sent the product which only wrked for 2 days efficiently then i exchanged it n the product i received now is having conectivity poblm..it only connects for audio not for calls..3/10 times only it connects for both..

name: Fizanul MohammadYunus Bandi
title: Don't buy this product. Buy that rockerz 255F.
content: I am giving this review after using 5 days.. When i am connecting this bluetooth in laptop and mobile at the same time after few minutes its automatically disconnected from the phone.. While i am putting it on the charging the left part is heating too much.. When i have charged at full time the maximum 5hours playback not more than it.. Its not better than that boat rocckerz 255F.. Range is for this bluetooth is only 3-4Meter not more than it.. West of money. Don't buy this item.

name: Singh ji
title: Quality
content: I have been using it since the last 1 year and I must say that it's a very great product under 1000. But now exactly after 1 year there are some technical issues such as very poor battery backup ☹️ and the sound is also getting a little bit torn but I must its great for workout. I would recommend you to buy it go for it definitely u don't have think twice but take good care of it and use its own usb cable to charge it

name: Ganesh Kumar
title: Not worth it.
content: No this time boat did not satisfied because product quality is just okay okay but the main purpose, sound clarity is really very worst so i will suggest Realme buds is the best one to people who are reading this comment so better go on that.. Thank you guys.

name: shivendra singh
title: Worst experience
content: I was not at all satisfied with the boats premium product.. 1-it was to heavy always feels on running. 2- poor battery life with poor indications. 3-after 20% life auto disconnect and does not get connect again. 4- while running or jogging it's connection get lost. 5-To much sound disturbance.. 6- no use sound cancellation feature.. 7- Audio quality is ok. 8-Call quality is also ok but not clear get broke in between.. Overall only one good thing is sound rest is over priced

name: alpish
title: Nice earphones
content: PROS. material quality is GOOD.. sound quality is great.. Durable Enough.. earpieces are good. Earpieces Fit properly in ears.. The microphone works fine.. Bluetooth connectivity is Good. Connects with both PC and MOBILE very easily.. Voice Acknowledgements are great in this Earphone. ( for switch ON, Switch OFF & Connectivity). There is a small light Indicator on the Earphone that works fine.. We can charge the Earphone through adaptor or USB.. CONS. As it is a Bluetooth Earphone, therefore, it works great within a certain range. Try not to go too far from your Device(Mobile or PC ). While Commuting If the volume is too high, The earphone cancels all the noise around us. This can be dangerous.. Overall this product is great . Whether you are using it for Voice or Video calls or listening to music (soft or high bass) or listening to any video lecture.

name: venkatavamsi krishna.j
title: Ok ok .... compared to others and cost it's ok to buy
content: Wire length is large need to reduce it . And u can't find case to keep it.so Don't forgot to keep box with you.you are able to.listen very small sound.also louder in call l. Some times.while listening songs by keeping phone in pocket and moving sound getting distrurbed. My first one is not able to connect two devices at a time. After exchange I got right one .but still needs some improvements

name: MUKUL JOSHI
title: Good headphone in this range but sound quality not up to mark
content: I have got this for rs.1419/- and for this range for the wireless headphone it is a good deal, sound is ok and comfortable to use, it did not fall from ear, as there is some locking type of thing, which holds the earpiece in it's place, nice product. It may feel this way because i used to airpod from apple.

name: rajat
title: Could be better!
content: Bass and treble are unbalanced, there is much bass compared to treble. Product is good for extra bassheads. Battery backup is good. Build quality is great.. Comparing it with ant audio wave sports 540, ant audio clearly wins, i would suggest u to buy ant audio in the same price segment (If u like balanced music bass=treble) ant audio is a perfect choice.. +Points of boat. Better grip in ear, hooks don't hurt. Turns off automatically when not connected.. Flat wires. + Points of ant audio. Bluetooth 5.0. Bass and treble are perfectly balanced. Battery backup is better than boat (around 1.5 hours extra). Calling quality is great

name: Charles chacko
title: Save up and go for a better option
content: I am not very impressed. I bought a new pair because of the hype people were giving for boat products. Its very much bass focused and that's what you would like about it. My 840rs sony ex 155 does a great job than this. Its Bluetooth latency is too bad and the range is extremely poor. I own a wh 1000 xm3 but its not a comparable product. Even though i am saying compared to its lattency its too bad. And i don't know how durable it is. In my oneplus 7 pro even after turning on dolby its sound is not upto the mark. After these days of use the mic is not working. I am expecting a refund

name: Yadul Mohan
title: Good product
content: Good product but I would have rather gone for an earphone with better battery storage.. Gets charged easily. Gets charge dissipiated easily.. Otherwise good quality product. Convient use.

name: Arun Yadav
title: Good sound quality at a reasonable price
content: The sound is average not that good as compared to JBL and some other great brands. The bass is more but treble is less. If u travel on a bike or cycle and wind is blowing at a higher speed then there is lag in Bluetooth connection. Overall good at the price of 999. If you want great quality sound go for JBL or boult or Bose.

name: Nice NK
title: Zero noise cancellation
content: Zero noise cancellation...other end person can hear background people/noise louder than you and really disturbing to whom you’re speaking with avoid using for calling. Sound quality is not that good, it’s ok ok. Bluetooth connectivity and battery life is good.

name: Tarun Kumar
title: Big no to this product
content: What a waste product. There is no concept of noise cancellation except your voice each n every outsider sound u can hear in this headphone. The main purpose to buy this product is to avoid that helmet m phone fasa k phone pe baat krna but guess what when u use this headphone while driving u can hear only altu faltu sound but not that person voice. Infact it hurts your ears too when your wear helmet over this. Seriously after using 2 to 3 months I am writing this review and it really sucks. I am a boat lover person but this product seriously disappointed me alot.

name: parameswar
title: Great for this price range but slightly could have been better
content: I purchased this headset for 1500 and after using for 2 days,this is what I felt. Pros:. 1. Terrific Noise cancellation. 2. Sweat proof(Justified it's IP rating). 3. Awesome Battery life( More than 7 hrs for me. as I was using medium volume just for a 1.5. hr charge). 4. Premium sound quality while listening to. music. Cons:. 1. Bluetooth Range, (although they mentioned. it to be 10 m), was very less, around 7 m.. 2. Conical buds ( removable). 3. Voice call quality was not as expected

name: Gopal Verma
title: Superb Bass earphone
content: 1. Super Bass even on full volume. 2. Treble is low. 3. Vocals are clear. 4. U may unable to hear more intruments in bass. 5 it is better than boat 255. 6 Original earphone will sound "u plugged into Niravana" if u r not hearing on starting then u r using fake earphone. This is sure.

name: SUCHANA TARAL
title: Charging issue.
content: The packaging, delivery everything is OK. I was happy with the sound quality. Earlier there was a little bit problem to connect it with my Red MI Note 4 mobile phone. But later on I was able to connect it. But within a month the headphone stopped charging.

name: chiranjib pal
title: Teal green colour looks old and faded
content: The packaging was bad, but the product was somehow not damaged, so i have not returned it,. Other than that, sound quality is great, used for like 3 weeks now at gym and no issues, playback time is good,, charging time is low, negligible sound lag while playing freefire, teal green colour looks like a old one, kind of faded, other than that its a great buy

name: Amazon Customer
title: Overall a good budget headphone
content: I purchased it after returning one basic sports bluetooth headphone.(Not sure if I mention the brand) , it would violate Amazon's policies. Overall it is very good , and only rant is sound quality. Sound quality is average. Battery life is good . No significant sound drops. I got it at 999 /- which was a deal to steal.

name: Gourav Singh
title: Bassy Rockerz
content: boAt Rockerz 255, when it comes to your hands you can feel it's wires are a bit stiffer and don't move flexibly. Also the buds' rubber quality is poor.. Base is too much. It almost fades the real music of songs. What you will enjoy is a song full of base but not the real song and music.

name: shikha
title: Worked for just once.. Then stopped working at all
content: It worked wonderfully.. But for once only.. After dat, its not getting charged, though works only when its kept connected to a charger.. N at that time connected device shows dat its 100% charged.. As soon as its disconnected from charger, its switched off.. Is this for wat we buy a Bluetooth wireless headphone.. Pathetic.. Tell me d way I can use it or if I can return it as I hav thrown away d packing

name: Aniruddha Singh Rathod
title: Received fake item
content: I am totally disappointed as I HAVE RECIRVED A FAKE PRODUCT!! i was not working even after charging for more than 1 hour.... Amazon please make sure that the seller is sending the genuine product.... Because the publicity of amazon prime sale you r doing is at very large scale and this is what we are getting in our hands. 😔

name: Vikram Mate
title: Good
content: The sound quality is good, No connectivity issues as well. connects swiftly to phone. One of the major issue is the noise cancellation, often on calls people tell me that there is lot of noise around. this is the major flaw with this.. Unless u are in a quiet place else its good.

name: vidya
title: Value for money
content: I have used this product for a week. First review of this product I must say is good battery life and awesome sound quality. I have used this headphone for making average phone calls and listen music for an hr or 2 per day and battery lasts fir 2 days. Also watch 2 movies continuously by single charge. It also connects with my smart TV.

name: Santosh Balakrishnan
title: Above Average experience at an affordable price
content: Pros:. - Amazing product for a price of 999/- with 1 year warranty. - The bass is better than existing bluetooth earphones in the market. - The sound quality of it is good and accesible for daily runs. - It is splashproof so you can use it anywhere and good for gyms too. Cons:. - Bluetooth 4.2, could have been Bluetooth 5.0!. - Sound quality and noise isolation could have been better. - Takes around 1.5 hrs to charge everytime it powers out. - The fit is not as good as compared to other bluetooth earphones in. the segment but you will get used to it. But overall the performace is above average and battery backup is around 5 hrs at 85% volume and will get you through the day.

name: Akanksha Gaur
title: Extremely poor sound!!!!!
content: This is pethetic, it's doesn't offer any sort of sound fedelity, feels like you are listening from a speaker by hands, trebel is extremely bad and bass sound is muffled, it's only good for calling.. If you are looking something cheap and only for calling, ps Bluetooth connectivity is also below average, frequently disconnects while cycling.

name: itsneharoy
title: Not worth the price
content: Bought this for 1999. I was hoping this would be better than the Chkoko earphones I owned. Build quality is flimsy, but I wasn't expecting any better for the price. The Bluetooth connection was smooth, but the range is that for 10 feet. Expect that to drop significantly if you walk out of the room or if there is a wall in between. Didn't fit into my ear very well and felt uncomfortable.. Was surprised by the distorted sound quality. I am not an audiophile but these earphones don't do justice oo higher volumes and on call mic operations. Would not recommend. Returned.

name: Lakshay BHardwaj
title: Best headset [ BoAt Rockerz 255 ]
content: This is a very good headset. I have purchased it 20 days ago. It can be paired with Mobile, Laptop, etc. It is Bluetooth version 4.0. If we charge it for 10 minutes then it will work for 45 minutes which is great for online classes. While listening music, it's great. Sound Quality, Bass Quality, Noice Cancellation are great.

name: Susheel
title: Waste of money. Do not buy.
content: Not upto the mark. I thought it is one of the best product. But sound quality is average. Battery dies in just 4 to 6 hours. Getting pain in my ears as I wear this while watching movies or listening music. I thought there was some problem with the product I got first so I had to replace this item. But the product I got this earphone second time then I realised it's not just one item but the whole model is bad. In just 1 month it's gone. Not charging and cannot switch on the product.I would rate just 0 star.

name: Sandeep Rasaily
title: Boat sails in every aspect but sinks in what is meant to do.
content: The way this product has swept the market is spectacular.. Pros: No wonder it is a thoughful asset; its built quality is decent, fits in your ears quite well, isn't uncomfortable and it is cheaper than its competitions.. It has a good bluetooth connectivity. The light weight of this earphone makes it comfortable to wear it for long hours.. Cons: The only and the biggest issue with this product is that the mouth piece is placed on the outside and because of which the listener on the other end hears almost everything but the talker. There is way too much noise because if this. It would have been better if the mic was placed in the inside. This way Boat would have been undisputably 'The Best' earphones in the market at this price!

name: Lakshmi
title: My honest review
content: The earphones are great for casual use, I prefer some other earphones for running, training cause the wire is heavy and keeps banging onto my neck it's the worst feeling, the ear hooks are flimsy so it's not having great stability.. Sound-4/5. Quality -4/5. Comfort-3/5. For training-2.5/5

name: Gautam
title: Poor quality
content: When I first bought it, was working fine for 2 or 3 months then one side of the earphone was not working properly it was like some loose connection. So I claimed warranty then I got a new one after about 20 days. It's not even one year now since I got the new one, again I'm facing the same issue. One side is not working and If I hold the right side up then its working. I don't know whether they replaced with the new one or They just fixed the issue and gave me the same earphone back.

name: Mohammed Furqan
title: Best for 1k
content: The bass is the best. I use a equalizer tho. The connectivity is average. Sometimes there ks tooo much latency but if you are a bass fan it will make it up for it.. Very ergonomic. I had received a faulty piece but amazon replaced it as soon as i registered a complaint.. Im satisfied. P.s dont spend more than 1.1k on this.

name: Sham joshi
title: Try something else, don't go for this one
content: I heard that these headphones are good and so I went to buy these, but I won't recommend these to anyone, after I used these for a month.. The sound quality is not up to mark and the main thing is the pitch changes automatically even when phone is locked.. Noise cancellation is good but by other aspects, these headphones are not worth money.

name: Ramakrishna
title: Good Sound Quality. No Lag in sound output.
content: 1) I have been using this since almost a year.. 2) Sound quality is decent.. 3) There is no lag in the sound we hear with the video we watch.. 4) We can hear the sound upto a maximum of about 10 feet without any walls in between the device and the earphones. There is some disturbance in the sound when we are in a different room with walls in between.. 5) I have used this with Samsung Smart TV and an Asus, Lenovo mobile phones.. 6) Takes about an hour to charge.

name: Hrishi
title: One side stopped working
content: One side stopped working after 6 months of use. Got replacement which had the same problem.I will say don't go for cheap products buy another good headphone. Though lows are quite good.Sound quality is good.Not sturdy product.All of the boat product I've used and I've seen people using in headphone range always gives some problems.

name: Chandrasekar
title: Good bass and quality sound...
content: After using about two months iam writing this review.As a hundred rupees earphone user for long time,First time i bought this boAt bluetooth earphone.Initially i had a very big hesitation to buy this earphone because of its price is about 1699.but later Waiting for a month i got this in 'lightening deal' for Rs.999 with including some cashback offers.. Pros: =>Good sound quality,a very good bass,. =>good battery backup(really it plays upto 45mins with10mins charging). =>Fits perfectly to my ears(various sizes of extra buds added). =>light weight. cons: No cons for sound quality,but i feel that Wires are bit lengthy(but i compromised for bass and sound quality). Finally kudukara kaasuku worthu!!

name: Mukesh
title: Doesn't work with 2 devices compare to older version.
content: I have both Rockerz Boat Rockerz and Boat Rockerz 255 Pro. I purchased expecting a new version will be better than older.. But to my surprise, it's not, my main purpose is for dual device connectivity, with mobile and laptop. This new BaAt Rockerz 255 Pro doesn't work and the sound gets distorted when connected with 2 devices.. Would like to mention the older version works much better than new.

name: Baddie
title: A good product overall.
content: Its a great product in the 1000/- segment (bought in offer).. Over 10 pieces bought in my circle.. Comfortable, durable, long battery, fits.. Over all a Good product.. 32 hrs of battery with single device.. With Multiple device around 18 hrs. Litte drop in voice Quality while connected via Skype and microsoft teams

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very easier replacement during warranty period
content: I am writing this review after using 11 months of this device, good sound quality and look wise, within warranty period ,my device found one side not working , I had lodge my complain online , the courier boy picked up this defective piece from home , and within one month I got a new device after replacement...

name: Bijan Chakraborty
title: Pathetic product.... picks up noise of whole world
content: I am using the product for more than one month. Bluetooth connectivity is pretty good, no issue. Battery is fine. Sound quality is just average, nothing special. But the noise cancellation is terrible. You can barely hear properly when you are on a busy road, and the person on the other end would be experiencing the worst voice ever. It picks up and enhances all other external sounds much more than yours.. So guys, please don't go for this product, unless you have enough to waste. You would want to throw it away after a few days, otherwise people would stop talking to you.. I would rate it negative if I could.

name: SRD
title: Not worth buying it
content: Purchased boAt Rockerz 255 Sports ear phones on 29th March2019. Stopped working in 3 days. Had to replace it.. Now it's been 3 months and it stopped working completely.. Very bad product. What's the use, when u pay so much and cannot use it even for a year.

name: Reginald
title: TRUE REVIEW, DO Read, not good for jogging quite good for gym
content: The sound is 90% perfect, loud sound, goood enough bass, comfortable, not for jogging as the band jumps a lot n irritating, if not for jogging can go, calling quite good not bad, not suitable behind wall, but range nearly 10m, charing more then hr, playback 5,6 hrs didn't charge from 3 days, but wait for offers as it gets 999,i purchased in June 2020 at 999

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great headphones for the prıce
content: Overall a great earphones.. Good bass and sound quality, water/ sweat resistant, handy, charge stays for good time, not uneasy on neck.. I do run with this one and is great 👍.. Only con was the grip on the earbuds fell off after some use.

name: Ramya
title: Saviour !
content: I had ordered these earphones just sometime before lockdown and it has been my saviour while attending the long meetings working from home!. Sound quality is excellent and charge is retained for 1-2 days depending on the usage. 100% charging is done in less than 40 min.

name: Milind N.
title: The best earphones
content: They are my second boat earphones i owned.....sound quality is really great.....it's noise cancellation function also works well...it can be connected to two devices simultaneously...but dont why this function is needed......otherwise these are the best ones i had......as mentioned battery lasts upto 6 hrs. when fully charged......not suffering from any issues because of earphones....

name: Vinay N.
title: Efficient but not effective customer service
content: The headset is having a problem while attending the calls, there is lot of disturbing sound and voice becomes robotic. When I complained promptly the product was replace BUT THE PROBLEM REMAINS THE SAME.. Second time I wrote an email requesting a call back when repairing the headset so that I can explain more clearly the issue to enable them to fix it, there was no response to that. Boat please make your service effective, please drop a message or call me to fix the problem

name: Dileep
title: Super quality for cheap price.
content: Overall the working is awesome. But I find a issue that the heavier earpiece will make you discomfort and in pain for using long usage.. Bass awesome. Sound awesome. Bluetooth connectivity excellent. Multi connect works good. Battery backup excellent (with help of power saving option you can get continuous play for 5-6 hrs and if we pause songs then the system goes to power save mode till if resume song.. I recommend it for music lovers.

name: Debanjan Ray
title: VALUE FOR MONEY EARPHONES
content: Guys hold your breath...I have just received the packaging from Amazon and after a couple of minutes I unpacked it and tried this new boat earphone.Believe me guys , well let me begin with the initials first.. 1. Here I would like to give amazon 100percent Mark's for packaging .It was so well packed and well received . Great job amazon. 2. Authenticity of product : I do not have any efficacy on the authentication of this product Guys just at a blink of your eye, you know it's original.. 3. Sound quality: awesome and coming. 4. Noise cancellation : I can't deduct any Mark's here although it does not provide that high end noise cancellations because guys these are not the noise cancellation earphones, pay some extra bucks and get the sony earphones if you want noise cancellation.. .

name: The P1
title: Awesome while it lasted
content: Okay so i am writing the review for my rockerz after 7 months of incessant use. The battery life of this product is top notch while the sound quality is at par.The Bluetooth connectivity is good but the range is pretty modest. I got it for 999 and hence couldn't ve asked for more. That said, as with almost every other earphone, one said of it has malfunctioned exactly after 7 months of use. I was actually expecting it to last a year but nevertheless it's a good product for the economy and value for money segments.

name: Ṭhakur
title: Amazing product in a stealing deal price
content: Overall highly satisfied with this product . Have tried many Bluetooth wireless but for me this is a game changer as I am highly choosy in terms of bass and noice cancellation and lesser prone to show offs .. Must buy for a people whose range is between 1000-3000 .

name: Mahesh Dhakate
title: Call quality is bad wobbling noise can hear properly
content: It's good for music and not good for receiving calls. First few weeks it was working fine but after that when I receive call the voice is wobbling and u can't hear other person properly. Then I have to disconnect the Bluetooth and heart from phone only. Seem waste of money.

name: Saurav Tyagi, advocate
title: Good For Music, Bad For Calling
content: Sound quality is good. Bass quality is good but not for base lovers. While playing songs bluetooth range is v.good but while calling it falls ashort. Noise cancellation in ears is very good but while calling,it catches background noise , and sometimes voice of other person mumbles up, and is not clear.. Verdict- For listening Music. it's a good choice. But for calling... very bad... I am returning this.

name: koushik patra
title: Nice
content: it's very very good product and no doubt about it, and its sound is pretty awesome bass sounds awesome. but you can't feel like a Samsung headphone cause it's too lower end product for sound. but still at the price point Of 1400 ok. but my original concern is that how I am gonna get service this product as I know there is no service centre near about my location so how could I change.???? can you please help me about that

name: Shashank G.
title: Good Quality Headphones
content: I am using these headphones last 3-4 months. It's Nice and Good Headphones. Sound quality is really nice. Build quality is also good. Bluetooth Connectivity is superb. You can use two device at a time. Some mobile devices you can listen music between the calls That's great thing. But when i talk with others on phone calls that time background noise of other callers you can here compared to the person voice you can't hear properly that time. But its happen when you are in rush or crowded area. The noise cancellation can improved by bolt Rocker so it is really superb budget Bluetooth headphone in india.

name: Alisha Paul
title: "Good Bass" & reasonable price
content: Got a good deal of rs 800.. it delivered on time. Build quality is good and sits perfectly on your ears. Good bass & 70% noise cancellation. Voice clarity is good when using for calling.Packaging could have been a little sturdy.Overall good product in this price range. Thanks Amazon & ⛵ 😊

name: Dr. Ishrat
title: Nice buy under 1000
content: I got this for 900 in sale...so its a good buy at this rate.. But i ordered Boult pro bass at same rate on another site coz i wanted to compare both n then decide.. I found out that sound quality is good in both but main problem comes during the call....mic sound problem...the other person complains for for low voice.. I chose Boult one coz that was a bit better than this boat 255....sound,mic,connectivity n all!. Other features are same as mentioned...like magnetic earbuds, nice shaped neckband,tangle free cord, nice battery, etc. However, noise cancellation and bass quality is not so good...its average!

name: BISWAJIT DASH
title: Too high bass makes the music feel trash
content: Honest review if you love bass then it's good but it's not the thumping bass it's literally an unbalanced bass which makes ur head shook. Moreover sound quality deteriorates just coz of this bass and charging speed is normal not a fast charger. And battery capacity is good not that gr8 but acceptable. At the end for a price range of 999 it's a good deal but could have been better if the quality of bass is improved.

name: Vishal
title: Boat is boat
content: Delivered before a day to day that scheduled. thanks Amazon. Product is excellent no words to speak under this budget. Battery still 80% from yesterday night to till today morning 12pm. Got with 100% battery when opened and connected to the phone. Above all got it for just 999/- that too on COD. Love you ❤️ Amazon. Boat is boat no comparison just awesome.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not same like earlier bOAT products
content: Packing is good but I'm getting lot of noise while talking on phone. It's just 24hrs back I used to start the product but I'm not still feeling like this is new one., might be this is the first failure product from bOAT. # Not connecting phone while i kept in My pocket. # Sudden Battery discharging. # Lot of noise while on phone call. # sudden sound got disappear while playing music track. # Specially not feeling comfortable while I using at gym / Running track

name: CollinNDsouza
title: After just a month.. Burnt on charging
content: Sound quality is awesome but today I had kept it on charging & the side on which there is the charging port & other buttons... the headset melted & it's not even working now. Melted on charging... it became so hot that it could not be touched. Posting a photo so that all can see. 1 star coz of poor quality of material & build which melts in a month when just kept for charging

name: Tanveer
title: 6 months
content: I bought boat 255 rockerz in December 2018 and it's got non functional in 6 months flat, then I got it replaced and the replacement also got non functional again in 6 months period. So my experience with this earphone says this is product is good for 6 month only. Buy with care.

name: Rahul
title: I felt waste of money bcz 1 side of earplug has no sound.
content: After just 10 days 1 side of ear phone has no sound, I really felt Rs.1500 has beem wasted on this. Everytime 1 side earplug gets removed while working and I have to plug that back bcz of no sound in the other. Really don't go with this.

name: Ashish Nagpal
title: Best earphones in this range.
content: I ordered this product an year ago and till now I have not faced any issue with this being it battery or sound. The only problem is that when it's on low battery level it won't last long, not even 5 mins and keeps on repeating batter low battery low. Apart from that it's great. 1.25 hrs of charging last 5-6 hours non-stop and 8-9 hours at max on standby.

name: pankaj
title: Warranty claim
content: When I buy this product it shows me 1 year replacement warranty, after using this 7 month one side is not working and I am not able to connect customer service because of lockdown and there is no option for replacement or warranty claim...

name: kamal
title: Best ones in this price range
content: Pros:. 1. Battery backup. 2. noise cancellation. 3. Easy connectivity. 4. Best sound quality at this price. Cons:. 1. if you use this continuously for more than an hour, pain starts around the ear.. 2. Length of the wire is too long.. Overall recommend to buy it

name: Prathamesh Akole
title: Positive Review
content: If you are looking for bluetooth headsets in the given price range Boat Rockerz 255 are the best in the category.Its sound quality along with the noise cancellation give you a good audio experience.The bass quality is top notch.Also to add the customer care service is very quick and easy to access.My headset was replaced with a new one when it malfunctioned from one side. The process of replacement was also quick.

name: CK
title: Good Warranty one year
content: Warranty is the best part.. After few months one side stop working. Since warranty is 1 year, i got it replace in a week or 2, since then I'm using it for more than 6 months. So far so good.. Sound is clear. Ear fitting is comfortable. Battery life is also good as well.. Don't expect good bass sound and noice cancelation.

name: Jasvir Kapoor
title: Best in class Bluetooth earphones
content: My review after using this product.. Honestly this Bluetooth earphones are best at this price range. Sound quality, bass quality is great. Mike is also good. Have separate volume management from android phone's volume, but make it's own volume 2,3 points low from max volume, as max volume comes with a little background noise. Bluetooth range is absolutely 10 meters. Overall great product.. I strongly recommend it.. Go for it

name: Modabbir Alam
title: It's not as good as I expected.
content: There's no Bluetooth connectivity at all, even if you move 2-3 metres it loses the connectivity, and also if you are walking, there's the connectivity problem. There's no noise cancellation, if you are in a busy place, the other end person won't be able to hear you properly. Only good thing about this phone is the sound quality.

name: vishal joshi
title: Try for alternate upgrades is boat
content: I bought this @1500 , product is good by quality but it will work for 6-7 months only. I got a neck wire issue which is unable to resolved. Its also a sweat proof but after daily use I got wire issue. Battery life and sound quality is very much appretiated. No Noise cancelation.

name: Utkrisht chauhan
title: Low battery performance
content: Works well in starting two months. But now after 2 mire months its battery drain more fastly. Can't play music for 6 hours now. It's a good product in this price but honestly I want to say that if you can push your budget then push it and buy a good bluetooth headset. In this range you can't get a proper thing. Instead buying this you should go for wired headset.. Not satisfied by battery performance 😑

name: Cyriac thankachan
title: No earphone in the package  , only buds, a USB connector and a catalogue.
content: I cannot give a genuine feedback on sound quality, noise cancellation and all , because , I order this for 1399 , and I received a package with additional buds , a USB connector and catalogues. This package did not have an earphone in it . So disappointing . I don't know if it's with the seller or manufacturer, it is so strange to see an empty package from Amazon

name: Navneeth
title: Bad product, pls don't buy
content: Bought in February, after 4 months it stopped charging, waranty claim took 1 month to replace, and after getting replacement in 1 month again the replacement product stopped working. Just don't but this....made in china are always like this

name: Nitin
title: Bad Experience with the Service of Amazon and boAt
content: After receiving the headphone it was works fine but after 4 day's it stop working one side, later on I called amazon to return the product they straightway denied the same and said you have order it from the business account and return windows is closed, it has only 3 days return window instead of 10 days in regular accounts. then I contacted manufacturer for the replacement they took the product from me in 2 days after raising the compliant but it took 20 days to get the replace product. it is very very bad. my one month product warranty gone for toss.

name: Milind J.
title: boAt Rockerz wireless headset
content: I am using it now for almost 4 weeks. The product is very good and gives the freedom of handsfree operation especially during workout and driving. The cost to quality is very good. However, it doesn't provide the battery life as claimed by the manufacturers. Also gets disconnected (especially when idle for more than 15-20 minutes). This has been experienced especially while driving.

name: lokesh
title: Waste of money
content: First 30days worked fine, but later on it is not getting charged even if you held the charging for almost a day. It is not, 20% of charging showing. It is not getting properly paired to the PC(laptop). These are few issues I found that for someone might be helpful before buying this product.

name: Sanika Acharekar
title: Highly disappointed
content: I googled it before purchasing this product and really found it amazing.. Today I received my order and was exciting to operate.. After listening half portion of the song I immediately removed it.. The bass quality is so high that my ears started paining and it sounds really pathetic. I didn't like the sound and not even the bass. The sound really bumps into my ear.. But still I didn't loose my hope for this product.. After this I called few people and used this product still there was some issue.. Sometimes people were not audible to me and sometimes I was not audible to them.. So guys please please don't buy this when you're looking for a nice product and if you're spending 1000 that too on wireless earphones.. So highly disappointed.

name: DB
title: Stopped working in 8 months.!!
content: Stopped working in 8 months.!! Right side stopped working. Used without abuse or any water damage. Lot of sound leakage. Its not worth the price. Buy it for less than 1000 when there is a deal. Defenitely not worth the hype.

name: Ankith Ryali
title: An SUV ran over the earphones, but still working!
content: Let me tell you this, I've used Bose, Beats, Sennheiser, Audio technika, JBL, Skullcandy, boAts and many tens of top and mid level brands. But I'm a fan of boAts for their Price - Satisfaction ratio and used many of their products and never was disappointed.. Bought these earphones, I liked the build as soon as I saw them, loved the thumping bass when I tested it with multiple songs, loved the audio clarity too.. And then an amazing thing happened.. I was wearing them and was riding my motorcycle a bit faster and they blew away. An SUV drove over it. I thought I lost the earphones. But when I put the buds in my ear, songs were still playing as loud, as clear as ever.. Button areas were damaged so badly but still, working perfect. I did not find any problem till now. I'm loving it.. Perfect value of money.. *I wish I could have a replacement*

name: Saya
title: Stopped working in 4 months Disappointing
content: In just 4 months the left earphone stopped working and today after 7 months the right earphone too stopped working properly it works only if the cord stays in a particular position. Very disappointing their service center is about 10 kms from my place poorly placed office during this Lockdown period they should have made it easy for customers to reach out

name: hungry_bookworm_
title: Perfect friend for daily use
content: I have been using it for the past 2 months and seemed like a good time to review it now. Firstly, the headphones are very trendy and not at all cumbersome. The magnets behind the earphones help to keep them untangled. The in ear design cancels all noise and keeps the music clean. The music urself is very pleasurable as the bass and treble keeps the perfect balance and gives u an wonderful experience. Connection range is around 100metres and works well with call as well.

name: Bhavesh
title: Happy Experience
content: Bass is awesome... Loud speakers.. excellent connectivity... only disappoints at full volume..little noisy and not so happy experience in full-volume... but overall great product if compare with other brand... simply replacement of JBL products in less price.. you can consider it.. go for..

name: Anand Sagar
title: The best earphones yet !
content: Above expectation, excellent sound quality and the battery life is just incredible, one charge easily lasts you around mote than 5 days with normal uses (only music while traveling) and 6-8 hrs in one go if you using it continuously. The durability is nice and the magnetic feature really comes handy when not in use. Light weight very negligible weight and not noticeable when around neck, but sometimes this may result of loosing it and not suitable for bike ride (if riding at high speed).

name: Amazon Customer
title: below expectations
content: not that great sounding earphone i will recommend that others should invest little bit more and buy the mivi earphones that is obiously better sounding than these pair of earphone ... and there is lot of problem regarding connectivity also when the earphone battery percentage becomes 80% then there is crack in the sound.. and if you expect good vocals then this is a trash only there is bass which also becomes muffled after the battery drops to 80%.. for me this product is absolutely no. But one good thing that i found is that it has a good battery life.

name: Narayana Murthy
title: Bass is bad. frequent disconnections
content: Pros. Sound quality is good.. build quality is good. Cons. Poor bass.. Buds coming out easily. didn't fit into my ears.. Frequent disconnections makes your listening horrible

name: Randhir K.
title: Dual Connectivity Issue
content: I am still not able to use the dual connectivity feature. If I try to connect it with laptop or phone and if it is already connected with one of them it diesn’t let me connect with other device. It looks like doesn’t support dual connectivity.

name: Amarish Srivastava
title: No customer support against warranty claim .
content: After 8 months , one of the earphone stopped working I contacted the manufacturer Boat to repair or replace the the item as it got defect within warranty period . They arranged pickup from courier xpressbees , and and now for the last one month I'm waiting for the item , there is no clue where that has gone .

name: Soumik Halder
title: Just read to know everything on this
content: Awesomeee heaphone with high bass and noice cancellation up to the mark. Totally recomendable to thkse who likes high pitch musics with hard metal sounds. It is in affordable range and is better than any other bluetooth headphones of this price. Boat nirvana is giving this product as the best quality bluetooth headphone in the market with a playback time of 12 hrs.. You can easily take it on a day trip and even its charge will not drop out.

name: M vinu
title: Bad product don't buy...
content: Actually I thought this product is good..that's why I purchased this last week... From starting day only fully I'm disappointed bcz package and delivery is good.. but product quality is not good... It's automatically disconnected while I'm talking in call.. soo much disturbance sounds, and charging capacity also very low. Really it's a rack product bcz this exactly opposite to what they given What they given in features ... This earphone helpfull for only lessening videos and audios. For that also charging capacity is very low... Please help me how can I replace it...

name: Monica
title: Boat Rockers  BT 255
content: One of best BT Earphones at this price range, noise cancellation is really awesome. BT connectivity is good some time when mobile is on pocket lite disconnections for Milli seconds...other than this product is good at this price range, audio sync with video is perfect.....!!! Boat is best at this

name: Abdul Kayum
title: Product is good but not reliable and warranty procedure is just pathetic
content: Product is good but very disappointed with warranty. The product started disturbing within 2 month, then after 4 month one side stopped working. I complained and they started the process of replacement and it takes like 35 days to get the replacement product. I returned the product with box and all accessories but they only gave me the product no box or accessories were there, and product color is also different which I added in this review. So overall er pathetic experience with warranty

name: DD
title: Its amazing
content: Writing this review after using it for 20 days I found it very good in its price range. Good battery backup, good sound quality and I also use it as bluetooth mic for online lectures. So far so good

name: Hefajuddin
title: Frequent disruptions during calls are  disheartening.
content: I like 80% of the Boat Rockers and I dislike 20% about it's sound quality.. Listening to music was fine but during call there were frequent disruptions and disconnections.. I had to frequently on and off Bluetooth and connection to get back to the other person on the line.. It is better to throw away if we have to use it for long calls/talks.. Other features are fine so keeping for listening to music only.. Overall, bad experience.

name: Mohammed
title: Good one
content: I used this neckband for at most 2 weeks , I found when bluetooth and WiFi is ON in phone, the WiFi network is getting dropped. I assume that could be issue on my device, but later found this is happening same on my laptop. I don't know if it was WiFi or neckband issue. So now I can not use neckband, just because WiFi connection get dropped and it impacts my work from home job. I think, software update is needed on chip set. Rest it works fine, upto satisfaction level

name: Sohan Dafadar
title: Review after one month of use.....
content: Review after one month of use...... I am getting a battery backup of 5-6 hours a day.. Bass is too good but still it could have been more beautiful.. It's not good for gaming performance and not for gaming like Pubg.. Oneplus Bulletz and realme buds wireless are much better than bass and sound.. Battery backup is not good, but it's good to have a first charger to quickly charge in an 1 hours.. * Overall it can be bought. Value for money (4.2*)

name: Deepak P.
title: Warranty service pathetic
content: Never buy anything from boat, their after sale service is pathetic. My earphones button stopped functioning one month after purchase. I've reverse shipped it under warranty claim of my product. Its been over a month since I've shipped it. No response and their customer care number also doesn't work, no representative is available at any time. Better spend some bucks and buy good quality earphones whose after sale service is also good.

name: Karthik
title: Horrible first Experience
content: I purchased it on Friday July 26th and got it delivered on 27th .. I started using this product from Saturday.. Used it exactly for a day and it stopped working all of the sudden though battery is 40 percent left.. Tried to charge it but I could see its not charging too... While I was hearing songs, few times I could feel disturbance (Song breakdown) ... Really disappointed with this brand.. Spended 1400 for this and it's not working.. Though Amazon told me to return it and I did the same and they promised menew one, first experience is always the best and it's ruined in my case... I felt like if the replacement item also won't work, I will ask them to refund money and go for samsung level 2 spending 1000 bucks extra. . Sound quality is good but..

name: yasar arafath
title: Not bad...3 🌟 is enough
content: I received after 10 days delivery was awesome im a prime member 🤣 and also delivery person was refused to come and deliver my door steps by the way come to review. Its quite good headphone..... Bass is good. I feel pain in my ear after 30 minutes of hearing. But quality of the headphone is good. Overall not bad

name: Charles
title: Great but can be better overall
content: The only reason I'm giving it a 3 stars is not because I'm disappointed of the sound quality because in this price range I feel it's amazing but the quality of the ear tips is woeful. Its not even been 2 months or so that I am using it and it's already shredding to pieces. In a earphones the sound quality is the most important but you cannot ignore the quality of the ear tips because one is going to wear these for long if required. I cannot keep buying ear tips every now and then. Please improve the quality of the ear tips but great job with the sound quality.

name: sandeep h
title: Product is not usefull if you are hear music ,video ,audio using slow internet while travelling
content: Quality is good but seriously not happy because of below reasons :. 1)When I keep mobile in pant pocket,unable to hear or there is glitch to hear via bluetooth.. 2)When are trying to see video using low speed internet,whenever video buffers and starts to play,I always hear beep sound which is very annoying.. This product is not usefull if you are hear music ,video ,audio using slow internet while on move [in car ,cab etc]

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bad product quality
content: I brought this product in Diwali offer and within 2 days it's found defect. Not connected in the phone after 7-8 times connected. even though very next day not working I checked charging code also connected on charging but not showing charging lights. Again I gave request for replacement with same product. this product supposed to replaced on 30.10.2019 but I didn't not received any replacement. I have vary bad experience with this product as well as Amazon services.... Needs to be more attention on product quality check and customer services..... This is not customer satisfaction..... Till now I didn't not get replacement. 4th Nov still Amazon not taken any action after complaints logs 3 times

name: zabi
title: Complain against the damaged product i got
content: When i have purchased this product it was good and in starting also it was good after than its sound quality its bass quality got weaker day by day amd at present it not working I can't hear the soud from the earphones...it was a very bad experience that i have purchased the product from amazon...i thought amazon dealership provide good quality products to the customer but i was wrong... kindly look to my complain and take your product back please...help me...

name: jil
title: Very good product but after 6 month will stop work
content: Good product with high bass but sound is not that much crisp. But very confortable and charging fast and works around 5 hours and even more than that... After 6 months. Stopped left ear and no service.. they do not pick up and seevice centre is too far.. repaired by own.. as wire damaged.. again after week wire damaged.. Bad quality of wire.. go for wired headphone.

name: Archii
title: Bluetooth Range Connectivity Issue
content: Bluetooth range connectivity major issue.. This is a replaced product for prior sound issue. However facing the range connectivity issue with replaced product. Not happy with Boat Rockerz. This time disappointed. Unfortunately I missed the return date to re-return or re-replacement.

name: Joshua M.
title: A good buy.. Good quality prouct
content: I have been using this product since early feb and it still works like a peach. The sound quality is brilliant. Never experienced a break in the Bluetooth sync. No sound delay while watching videos and the battery life is excellent too.. I just have one complaint, well actually its faced by the people who i talk to over the phone. Whenever I use this product to talk over the phone, they always complain about too much background disturbance. It does not cancel out the background sound of others talking around you. Rather their voices gets amplified and I have to immediately stop using it. I validated this by being on the receiving end and the complains definitely is genuine. I think this is the only issue which restricts it from being the ultimate product.

name: Suhas
title: Not so good
content: Buds are not get fits in ear, also magnet lock feature is not properly works.

name: Reethi
title: Good price,good sound quality, Only build flaws
content: Hi,. Good sound quality at this price range. I am using it just recently and has already noticed that build is not so good, one of the biggest flaws actually. Second problem I faced is that the wire is too long, hence lookwise it looks bit shabby and also it keeps calling from the ear. Here again the earbuds design not so good to add it to the easily falling off from the ear. Who likes it! Apart from this boat always provides satisfactory listening experience at cheaper rates. I would love to see it working even after one year even after so many build flaws, after all if the product is rough and tough at affordable rates, all this flaws can be ignored.. Thanks!

name: Daniel
title: One of My Fav Buy
content: Using it since last 4 months, I love it. I'll recommend it to buy.. Good Bluetooth connectivity. Good Battery Life. Good Sounds. That's why I bought it.. BUT ... The manufacturer should provide extra ear supports and supporting buds.

name: abhishek kumar
title: Value for money
content: I just brought it in last week, and to be very frank,it's really Awesome. Beyond my expectations.. Sound quality is like having your own personal home theatre,too clear and loud enough, you can listen every single bit of music.And coming to battery backup, they said it's 6hrs but it's more than that, for me it's working near about one and more.

name: sanjaygurgaon
title: Very Bad quality Never buy again
content: Very bad quality of the material, initially the product seems to be fine, but after using for 3 months the sound quality detoriate, after 4 to 5 months now the right side ear piece is not working. leaft side is OK , however very low sound. Not able to contact the customer care. no one bothers

name: Satish singh
title: Replaced an order... But not showing anything in tracking... It's disgusting...
content: Got demo piece... No indication while charging... Raised for Replacement a week ago, it was about to come yesterday... When I track, it's not showing anything... Just now I replaced an order once more... Don't know what's gone wrong... I paid money for it. Actually it's a gift to my younger brother.. His bday was on 15 this month... Don't know when amazon get back with my oder which has been replaced... Hopefully bt this week end...my review is -5 stars...Amazon is amazing... Zing zing

name: Vishu
title: Superb quality go for it.
content: This is a very powerful product in sound quality, build quality is superb,super bass sound, battery performance is very good, it gives backup about 6 to 7 hours. Which is superb,finally thank you amazon for safe and fast delivery.

name: Prabha
title: After 1month one side of headset is not working
content: only using for 1 month one side of headset is not working, again I submitted a request at boat site for replacement and it takes 20-30days its waste of time to buy and return the product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good product with good material and good extra bass
content: This product is worth of money and the quality and the material of this product .
