This is made by the best sound quality company which is boAt they have extra Bass with extra quality it is good for doing yoga and while jogging , in sports the distance between your any device with this is very good and it needs a little bit charge in a week in a week , it gives 1 year warranty by the boAt and a very good quality and Amazon is providing us very fast in delivery so thank you

name: Bhaskar Mondal
title: A massive buy at 899/-
content: 1.Base is just awesome 🔥🔥.. 2.Dual pairing features is also there to find out.. 3. Nice noise cancellation

name: Pavit
title: Honest review
content: Ok guys. Sound is 3 out of 5 only bass no serious good sound. Sound is not very high for pubg. The biggest problem is that i ise iphone and it beeps very much while increasing or decreasing volume, changing song playing paise even while dragging it , it feels very bad and it is very annoying . My honest advice is that it should’ve been not priced for more than 1000 rupees

name: Dipti Vanarse
title: Great bass and sound at very affordable prices.
content: The earphones are really awesome bass. I got it at a very low price offer. The sound quality is great and I loved alot. Its way better to buy such kinda product at a very low cost. The noise cancellation feature works perfectly and without any issue. The bass is super duper awesome as well. As boat is usually famous for its bass Quality. Overall product is awesome i loved alot.

name: Subhajit Rom
title: Decent sound
content: The build quality is quiet good. It's flexible and easy to carry. You don't have to bother about it's safety. Now comimg to the sound quality. In this price range it's very good. Base is punchy. Base lover will love it. Other sound quality parameters are also decent. you can fell that. Battery backup is really awesome. Comfortable while using for a very long time. But I deducted one star because. Sometime you can fell it's lagging. While playing pubg or asphalt. I don't know it depends upon handset or it is the problem of boat itself. But I am highly recommending it to buy.. in this price range it's really great.

name: Misbah Sayyed
title: Earphones broke within 2 months inspite of careful usage
content: Very bad product. Seems I received a poor quality one. The earphones one of the bud broke. No sound coming from it now. Even before breaking the sound quality bwas poor. Seema I wasted my money on these. I wish to get a replacement or refund.

name: Brajesh k yadav
title: Good but durability is doubtful
content: Used it for 4 months, sound quality is good, extra bass effect is also good. Decent sound on calls, movie clearance is really good. charging time is 2hr and play time is 7-8hrs continue, on call time 5hrs, stand by time is more than 24hrs.. Connectivity is fast n easy, BT range is good when compare with other brands,. Durability - Can't say about it as for mine, left sided stopped working, cannot clam the warranty as the amazon bill is faded completely no soft copy available.

name: vaibhav singh
title: Nice but need some improvement
content: Received this today and it sounds good but some thing is not good for me that are :. 1. Bluetooth range is not more than 7m. 2. Wire when we wear looks awkward. 3. Sound is not that great but but bad. 4. In my phone it always shows it be fully charged. These are the things but I'll keep this product just because some times i don't feel comfortable using normal earphone and for that times i needed a Bluetooth earphones. Also for wire I've done a modification by just using wire tie which i felt useful for me. Attached a picture of the same

name: rajib mukherjee
title: Mediocre product
content: Overall product is good but somehow it doesn't fit nicely inside my ear. Tried with all sizes of ear tips. Somehow it fits but not recommended for long hours.. Started painting after 1 hour of usage. I only use it for workout purpose. For better sound experience I'd suggest to go for over the ear headphones. Much more comfortable

name: AB Aryavir
title: Awesome sound quality at this price segment
content: Sound quality is awesome in the price segment, you can call boat brand as budget friendly JBL/Sony. Noise cancellation is not so great but works well for the price tag, bass is the best part of the earphone, go for it

name: Ujjawal Bramhe
title: Right ear bud not working
content: I bought this nine months ago because had good reviews till now the earphones were working fine but suddenly in this quarantine it has stopped working the right ear bud is not working I ordered the earphones with one of my friends id and now I am not in contact with the friend also it shows no replacement option I really want to return this product if possible please help me in doing that

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not for regular use
content: I have been using this device for last 6 months. I along with my other 3 friends bought this earphone together. After 6 months none is in working condition.. 1- the micro USB charging port is unreliable. It gets damaged easily.. 2- got problems connecting to phone after 3 months use.. 3. Right side speakers started producing irritating noise.. It works best for 2-3 months. Ifbyou are a regular user kindly avoid this product because it won't last more than 6 months.

name: Arjun Sahani
title: Priced very high, Go for jbl wireless earphone for 2k
content: Bluetooth connectivity is not as expected.. Brought for 990rs and now it's for 2k that's way too much. People are not fool, if they have 2k budget then they'll go for jbl wireless earphone for 2000 rs instead.. I believe review should be with respect to current price only which is 2k...

name: Muneeswaran
title: boAt Rockerz 255 Pro
content: Sound quality is good. Bass is nice. Battery backup more than 5 hours in medium volume. Ear holding fin is hurting my ear size differ from two sides. Charging cable too much tight..plug and unplugging is very complex.. Fast charging good..1 hour charging more than 2 hours playback

name: bineesh
title: Hell with Nirwana
content: I really want to say that I am fed up with boat product and service, after few months careful usage Rockerz become handicapped.. When I went to service center they replaced with a refurbished,dealligned product.. It is a one day job for me to go service center with this traffic. The product worked for few hours till I reach home. When I charged the Rockerz I promise that It can replace my iron box. Finally Rockerz is not getting charged, the faulty product earlier atleast one side it was working fine. Hell with Nirwana.. I see that Overall One Year Replacement Warranty is a JUGAAD.

name: Adwait B.
title: Ideal bye for regular use
content: It was a good buy. But Bluetooth connectivity has an issue. At times i lose connectivity when my phone is in lower pocket. Sound quality is good but not at par with Wired earphones in same price range. Noise cancellation is fairly ok. But wind noise isnt cancelled.

name: abullais gowda
title: Too bad for calling outside bedroom  even in balcony.
content: Overall good. No problem for audio/ video for user. Bad for calls. Mic is more sensitive to background noise than user voice. Hence person on the other end hears too much of background noise more than what is heard from normal phone mic.

name: Uday K
title: Simply Perfect
content: Got a great deal on prime day.. bought this wonderful product. It's simply perfect, sound quality is too good, connects to the phone very easily. Charging lasts throughout the day, with good amount of calls & music too. I would recommend a buy

name: Amazon Customer
title: Excellent Super Bass and and noise cancellation very comfort to wear
content: Excellent sound. excellent noise cancellation. and excellent bass. I would love to buy again for my sister fantastic deal at 999. 😢the only thing I I want that boat Rockers is missing that if headphone is connected then it doesn't vibrate for call just giving a reminder incoming call but overall very much value-for-money very much comfort to wear excellent battery backup

name: arun panwar
title: All good barring one
content: Pros: value for money, light weight, very good charge rate, good fitting. Cons: the ear plug latches have tendency to come out and are very prone to get lost. Once they are lost the ear plugs does not fit into the ear .... I guess they should attach it to the wire somehow ...

name: manish
title: No return policy.. total waste of money.
content: It's too clumsy... Don't buy it as no return policy with this product.. It appears to look like a wired headphone... A total waste of money.... I think the company is also aware that it will not match the competition so the don't have return policy..

name: Priya Gautan
title: worth money
content: amazing earphones. sounds quality realy awesome. little costly when i purchased before offer but value for money. Nd battery life is also too good. i purchesed and after that 6 days without charging it works. somebody is searching for bluetooth earphones for music this the best choice ever according to me. should purchase i m giving 5 star

name: Harshal Shingare
title: if you are confused between new and old version
content: this headphone is really great if you are confused between old and new model then definitely go with this model. this model have super sound and quality bass and its charge less than 1 hour so its plus point of this headphone . i only hate one thing about this headphone is whe i increases volume till the end headphone says "maximum volume"so its very disturbing for me. otherwise headphone is good its worth product

name: Chan
title: Low bass and some google assitant button clicked automatically
content: First thing i bought this 899 in great indian festivals yup damn offer after got my product same excitement with opening box when connect to my phone it show 100% battery i thought it was used product so i have used for few day my friend having same earphone he have more bass when compare to mine then just now i face issue that it automatically open google assistant in for while today i faceing this issue i have placed replacement hope i ll edit after my product get replaced but overall it good sound and it doesnt not fit perfectly then cable lenght is large i ll update in a week see u soon i ll give 3 start once my earphone get replaced i ll give 5 star

name: ashu tiwari
title: Good but not best at price
content: I got a defective unit....... Its not turning one than i tried to connect it to charger and its start working but after removing charger it turned off again.....no sing of any light or anythin......there might a battery issue.....just book a replacement order, than try its sound quality. Edit-i got replacement....new unit is good but some times i feel disturbance when enjoying music

name: Sachin
title: Not for Video or Games
content: Great music. Some lows are missing. Charging time is less. Running time is like 4 hours of call on full charge. (EVEN AFTER 3 MONTHS). So much lag in video and game. So, big NO there from my side.

name: ARUN BYALAL
title: Bang for the buck.
content: For music lovers. Bass music is awesome in this range. I tested with music like la calin for bass (kickass). Melody : juga capablanca ( ok dokay),, O saathi re ( ok dokay). EDM: KAMLESH audio addict ( kickass). Nucleya (aaja). Kickass. It's basically good we go listen to bass and electronic genres. They sure will be a satisfied.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Battery heating problem
content: I bought Boat wireless Bluetooth headset thisNovember 2019 onwards...First used boat Rockez worked good and I saw Battery heating problem in this product.... Except battery heat problem everything is good..... Some days gone...Ie 03.03.2020 Boat Rocket device battery failed...I am already posted review box that pics....Just i used normally 2/3 hours a day in 4 months used Boat Rockez device but now it is failed battery.... I want replacement this device becoz of one year warranty is there...I waiting for. The company how can respond....Giving replacement device

name: Ajinkya
title: Great BT Headphones
content: Very good and comfortable BT headphones. hangs around the neck well. Magnetic earbuds cling to each other firmly. really good backup time. Easily goes upto 4 hours with heavy usage of phone calls, listening to music, etc. Easy to connect to any device. I have tried to connect to 2 devices at same time. My laptop (Win 10) and My mobile (Samsung A51). it does connects but the connection is not always reliable if connected to more than one device at same time.

name: Prashant
title: Good but can be better
content: The product is good. But one change should be there is the call sound, when we are on a call with these, then there is no background noise cancellation, this should be added into that

name: Abhishek Chauhan
title: Good but if you get it around 1000-1100 rupees
content: The base is excellent. Sound is clear. Battery life is good. It usually sells around 1500 rupees but I got it for 1000 rupees at that price it's very very good but if it's around 1500 rupees than I would suggest to go with realme wireless which sells around 1800 and for 300 more you are getting more features and similar sound and better battery and connectivity. But if you can get it for 1000-1100 it's best.

name: Amit Kumar Singh
title: Sound, Bass and durability
content: Well you might be surprised that after giving 4 star in every catogeries why I gave only 3 stars as overall rating, the reasons are I Bought 3 diff boat products, initially all of them were very good but none of then lasted for long So I think company is doing this knowingly so people buy its product again and again,. Lets talk about product. Sound 4/5 balance. Bass 3.8/5. Noise suppression 4/5. Clarity 5/5. Design 3.5/5. But again this products won't last long so buy at your own risks.. 😊😊😊

name: hiren
title: Dont Buy,Poor Quality,Worst Service.
content: Very bad product, i wqs fan of boat till i bought this ear phones, i bought two of these ans within 3 months one sidded stopped working of both earphones. I sent for replacement from official sites and they send me msg after 10 months that some guy from courier company will pick up fauly earphones but no one is coming since 10 days after msg, i am continuously calling that xpressbess guy but he answring like i will come this time and that time but he never comes. Worst product, worst service Dont buy.

name: farhad Choudhury
title: It didn't even last for 3days.
content: It was going exactly so good untill three days.It showed low battery and plugged it in to the charger and since then it is not working.I did not expect this from "AMAZON" neither from "BOAT". The worst part is have misplaced the recieptamd neither do I have the box in which it came... How do I reclaim my headphones.It was excellent the sound quality was very good but the issue which I faved,I never expected this from this company of such high stature.. Amazon please look into this matter

name: Yashu
title: 1* for the sevice, product malfunction very often.
content: Brought it a year ago, had to replace the product after 6 months for ear piece malfunction, now at the end of the 1year the same issue. Not value for money if this the type of product the give, and you need to wait for 15 to 20 days for the replacement to happen as they have to be replaced in Mumbai branch only.

name: Dattatray
title: Value for money..
content: Good product at this price, i got it in sale in 999. Sound quality is good, connectivity is also good, but you will start loosing connectivity when you keep your cellphone in back pocket. It has good bass, vocals can be better. Overall satisfied with the pelroduct.

name: Product Reviewer
title: Good product by Boat
content: The Quality of the product is amazing and this is my first Bluetooth earphone. Completely in love with it, its always on my neck for the complete day and never feels like anything is hanging on your neck. Coming to the battery, it lasts for 4-5 hours on continuous use.. But after few months lost one ear than the other. Now it's dumped. So you have to be a little gentle.

name: V V Renjith
title: Recommend to try this product
content: I've bought this product. For the music lovers it is really 👌. It has good noice cancellation and the mic works great but the only drawback is that the music doesn't stops even though the ear buds are connected with their magents inbuoit in it. Apart from it the bass, noice cancellation, mic and the battery🔋 backup everything is good and it is affordable price.

name: Indu
title: connectivity is poor.value for money
content: after 6 months one ear buds damage. 1.Noise cancellation is good.. 2.connectivity is poor when i call sometimes its sound is broken.bluetooth 4.2 is outdated its not work in havy wireless noise area i prefer blt 5.0. for room is good. 3.Price is value for money i got it ₹899 in bbd.. 4.This price range sound quality is good but not aowsem because i used before boat 220 wired (₹500) its base is better than it.

name: John P.
title: Drop in Quality
content: I purchased this item by seeing one of my colleagues who bought this item last year. Quality was too good. Especially the wires & neckband was strong and sturdy. But now it seems to be very feeble and even the neckband is also not strong. Not just external features but internally the technical part quality has been reduced i think. It disconnects & connects back when i move a little away from my device. I did NOT expected this from Boat. Planning to return and replace this.

name: Tamal Roy
title: Worth it.
content: Wonderful sound quality and bass is okay.. The build quality is really good, because the way I use it, it should have been torn apart, but its still firm and really in perfect condition.. This earphone is easy to use and carry as it feels like you have nothing on your ears. It's really light weight and comfortable.. I highly recommend it

name: Mujib Ahmed
title: Sound quality feels more like a local product doesn't sound like Boat earphones.
content: I have been using Boat wired earphones and bluetooth speakers but boat rockerz doesn't even sound like Boat. A genuine suggestion to those who buying boat rockerz over Mi sports wireless earphones Please don't go with the looks of this product. Sound quality is pathetic it sounds more like some local product. Looks and build quality is fine does the job but but fails to deliver crisp and groovy sound which you would expect from a earphone at this price range. Replaced twice not satisfied. I doubt if this seller is selling genuine product.

name: Spandan
title: The sound is not that great and the battery isn't promising as well
content: I have been using the earphones for a while now. The main demerit is the battery , you have to charge it every now and then as it doesn't give good backup. The sound for bass intensive raps / hip hop tracks is not good. You can hear clear distortions and it isn't pleasant at all. Ironically, the noise cancellation doesn't work in this case. If you want an example , listen to Kendrick Lamar - Loyalty with the earphones and you can feel the clear difference.. The most annoying thing about this is the bluetooth range and connectivity. It disrupts every now and then and the sound keeps tearing until you disconnect and re-pair with your device again.. Overall , a very bad experience .

name: Lakshya
title: Annoying announcement voice & Cracked voice
content: The earphones produce a cracked voice and the announcements are annoying and weirdly phrased. It does not say which device it is connect to, rather says "Connected to Boat Rockerz 255 Pro". That is the worst promt ever!!

name: surendar.bathula
title: useless product don't purchase.
content: worst of product weast of money, i have purchased this hear phones 5 months back now both the speakers not working. i had raised the ticket for the same but no use.. several times i am trying to reach out custumer support not answered.. Finally i realised that purchasing this kind of products weast of money and time spending to order this.

name: Ravikiran
title: Ok the product is good.
content: Boat bluetooth ear phones are good enough in its price segment.. 1. The other person feels we are speaking some far away distance.. 2.the bluetooth some times fails to connect with mobile phone. (For 100 times approximately 10times it fails to connect). Apart from these 2 issues. The product performs well.

name: Mayur
title: Disappointed after 9 months
content: It was working fine till last week but suddenly right-side earpiece stopped working after 9 months of normal use. As it was in warranty I have returned it to the Boat service center and waiting for replacement or repair. I will update my review after the repair or replacement.

name: Pavuluri Christopher
title: Good working only disappointmet
content: since from 2 months i am using this boat rockerzz 255 earphones this gadget has only one problem that is noise cancellation slightly the air going into my ears getting disturbance it should have to improve by boat. Base is simply superb very good base and sound quality is also awesome. This earphones is very good and battery back up is also. only one disappointing that is only noise cancellation so i request boat to improve the quality of earphones

name: Abid Ahamed
title: Awesome product & worth it -Boat lvr
content: Product is worth of cost .... Excellent sound quality meets it's power .. Bluetooth connectivity is easy and fast.. Also easy to use bottons provided.. No problem with mic .. Cable length and neckband are accurate.. Charging and battery life is as good as spec.. Their is a noise when getting messages while playing music.. Charging port's cover/cap is not properly seated.. Just bought on 19th October 2019.

name: Atish Chandrabhan Kamble
title: Product is not working. I called for replacement.
content: Today I received the product. It is worst product because it is not working. Firstly I was read instructions which is mentioned in product manual and fallow that instructions for handling and switching on the product device. The product is working on when it is on charging. As the charger disconnected, headset switched off automatically and not responding as per manual instructions. I called it for replacement. Please, as soon as give me the replacement and this time please check the product first and then dispatch. Thank You!

name: Arun
title: Best under ₹1000.
content: I bought this product for ₹999 in January. They sound really good and are very comfortable. With the right size ear tips, you can wear them for a long time. I used them in gym, while travelling and they performed as expected.. The battery will last 7-8 hrs easily. They charge from 0-100% in 2hrs. I was satisfied with them until I started having some issues recently like the greetings at time of power on/off stopped. The left side stopped working.. But as it was still under warrenty, I raised a ticket on boat site. Hoping to get a positive response.. I'll update their response. I got the replacement 15 days after the complaint.

name: Ax M
title: Sound is good but battery kind of drains
content: Looks cool, Sound quality is good, battery drains very fast but charges fast as well, the ear lobes not very comfortable for long use, bluetooth connectivity is quite fast, the voice the man that talks while connecting and disconnecting is very irritating, connects easily with phone while on calls as well and very clear too

name: Abhrajyoti D.
title: Good at the price range. Only good not the best.
content: First of all amazon should really improve their packaging the box arrived almost in smashed condition. Torn from either sides and my extra earbuds and usb cable were missing. But my rating is not based on that. It's the product. It has great bass but voice clarity and low tones are compromised. May be I am not the right buyer for this product as I don't really listen to high bass songs. Moreover it's a tad uncomfortable to my ear. But at the price range not much to complain. But my product was incomplete thanks to amazon.

name: vidit baxi
title: Little less than an average experience
content: Firstly, I am personally a big fan of boAt products. I think they have a good quality benchmark. However, this one might be a bad quality piece that I would have received. I was just simply not able to connect the set to my Mint OS. I cannot imagine a reason why!. I am hoping that the replacement will sort this out!

name: kartikeya
title: good sound with nice bass
content: these earphones are very good for the sound they produce .connectivity has no issues ,comfortable for long periods of time , sound quality is very good and low frequency bass sounds are good (not super heavy bass) ,good for watching videos and movies , gaming has little lag in sound (due to wireless connection),battery life is fairly good (around 4-5 hrs of non stop usage at full charge at medium volumes) ... sound quality does not deteriorate at full volumes ..... built quality is good , does not feel cheap and flexible neck band ...good deal for =<rs.1500

name: Dinesh
title: Latency!!
content: Bought this product a month ago and this product is steal for the price. But you just shouldn't buy it. The noise cancellation and the audio quality are both great. But there is latency of almost 1 sec! I thought there was a problem with the video I was watching but after disconnecting them the sync was perfect. I tried YouTube and other video platforms and the problem still persists. I don't remember encountering this problem at the beginning but I didn't observe until lately

name: Sigma upadhyay
title: Earbuds are problamatic
content: The earbuds are getting removed themselves every time. It's a rather irritating experience with this product. Sound quality and battery life is pretty good but this thing is really annoying.

name: Praveen
title: Decent product for the price
content: Overall the product is okay for the price.. Sometimes it doesn't connect to the phone automatically even though you have paired it earlier.. Also, the call quality is not that great.. Although, It's good for listening to the music.

name: Vipin Arya
title: Overall good
content: Sound bass is very good feeling like home theater. Battery life is so so. Only 80 and 60% is showing battery life always when i use it 1 day next day it is showing 80% and 3rd day showing 60% after that when battery goes 0% not known. After 60% it can off but not alerting that battery is low.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Realistic Review of these Earphones.
content: To those who doesn't get to know the realistic review about this product.. I've been using it for 2 days and understood the sound quality. And i F-u-kin love these earphones.. Noise Cancellation is very good. You can't hear noises until you try to hear them.. Comfortability. You can't listen for a longer period of time. It will start paining after 20 mins. These were not comfortable until i removed the wings. And i had some old eartips which i am using right now. These are more comfortable to me. And now i can listen to 4 hours straight without paining.. Battery life is excellent. Used for 2 days and battery percentage dropped from 100 to 40%.. Now the Sound Quality.. Mids are average. Won't miss any sound.. Highs (treble or vocals) is not up to the mark. BUT, If you adjust the equaliser settings then you can make it sounds so amazing.. Lows (bass) is SO POWERFUL. Rockerz 255 was only made for the bass lovers i guess. Their only focus was on the bass. These earphones have extra bass.. (i am saying this so many times because it literally has so much bass). The people who are saying that it would have been better if it had more bass are stupid as fun.. I have used some high and mid end earphones like Sony Mdr xb55 with extra bass, Jbl T110 and Oneplus Bullets.. At first when i heard, i thought i made a mistake by purchasing these Earphones but when i equalised it. I made it sounds like some high end earphones. And i am very happy with the purchase now.. You will only like this if you didn't have an high end earphones. But if you have never heard an high end earphones and wants some eargasm then i must say that you should go with the product. You'll be happy with the purchase and dont forget to equalise.

name: Raghavan SK
title: Bluetooth fails to connect sometimes
content: Bought this product couple of months back, was excited for the price I was getting for. But this is a total disaster primarily for 2 reasons:. 1. Once fully charged, this doesn't last for more than 12 hours or so. 2. Bluetooth fails to connect sometimes, even after getting paired previously. I could not even pair this to my Android phone (MI A1). Even sound quality is not so impressie. I suggest buy a wired earphones than this.

name: Manoj Jha
title: Not impressive
content: Not impressed with this, in similar price range better options are available. Was excited after Rockerz 510 was hoping for better performance but highly disappointed. Looks like just below par product

name: Anoop V
title: Average and goods in that budget (999₹)
content: Sound quality is good.. Sometime there is connectivity issue when you keep your phone in your pant. And battery back up is not that good compare to other brands.... If you need anything detials comment me , I will reply. I have bought noise wireless its better than boat rockerz 255 sport edition

name: R. Gurung
title: Don't buy if you want to use it for running
content: I spent money on this product because I wanted good earphones for running. This product highly disappointed me. The ear plugs get loose and will get lost. I don't even know where my right ear plug fell. While using it for running the product didn't firmly hold my ears and thus it became difficult to be used while running.

name: Anbuselvan Martin
title: Light weight and an average quality output
content: Pros:. Lightweight product. Connectivity. Packing. Cons:. Noise cancellation is not there compared to other products. Average audio quality - No bass, treble

name: Nirmal Desai
title: GOOD ONLY FOR SHORT PERIOD OF TIME.
content: Used for 8 months . Good for intial fews months then battery problem surfaces (you cannot use if batt is at 40percent bcz it will become zero in 5-10min from there), then connection problem like voice gets distorted and sometime while listening to music voice lags and gets distorted also range of the Bluetooth decrease drastically and now one side earphone is completely off . If you are buying this product at best it is good for 3-6 months . My usage was simple max around 2 hr per day

name: Srishti
title: Audio output is not good
content: The earphones worked excellent during the first week, but then the audio quality at times was very bad. I could hardly hear the other person speaking, though it was pretty clear when heard through wired earphones.

name: SRIRAM CHAITANYA
title: Boat 225 is much better than this
content: In the matter of Sound Quality, it falls behind Boat 225, however as this is bluetooth model, can be sort of fine. There is no lag at all, and thats very good, tried while playing PUBG, PrimeVideo, Netflix, Youtube. Noise Cancellation is really good, notifications for calls, turn on and turn off. Over all I rate 3.5/5.0

name: Devendra M. Narkhede
title: Good Headphone
content: This is overall good bluetooth headphone.. Pros:. 1. Sound quality is good.. 2. Lightweight.. Cons:. 1. Could not really make it work with 2 devices as indicated. That was the primary reason I bought it.. 2. Battery life is ok ok (may be becasue of the small size).

name: Sharon
title: Good.
content: Sound quality is awesome. Charging doesn't take much time. Doesn't slip out even during a work out. Sweat resistant but do clean with a soft cloth later. Very light. Bluetooth range is optimum. Comes with extra rubber buds to suit your wearing comfort. All in all great product.

name: Shashi
title: good
content: Good Sound (not excellent though). great comfort. but one run in the rain, and the LED indicator dimmed. it took a lot of time to recharge (not sure of future). Battery life is V.average (may be 2 hours maxxx).. Cant run a Marathon for sure...

name: Rajuda
title: Far Below Expectation
content: I was swayed by the numerous reviews, but it is just an average product. If battery charging is fast, its depletion is faster. There is nothing that calls for a higher rating.

name: R.SARAVANAN
title: Smart looking
content: Crystal clear sound and good battery backup. Very much useful while traveling by two-wheeler. You can connect with the phone via BlueTooth, just insert the earbuds, wear your helmet travel without tension. The speech very audible even while traveling. Thanks to boAt Rockerz 255

name: Rk
title: Good product
content: I always buy boat as my primary choice but on a specific day due to some extra offer prize I brought Nu Republic Bluetooth headset and then ordered boat for my brother after 2 weeks. But really guys Nu Republic Jaxx 3 provide provides better sound quality than boat.. In terms of bass and battery, boat is better as always.

name: Gaurav
title: Overpriced. Bass should be tuned to prevent it from actual sound.
content: <first hour review>. Phone call:. Poor voice quality on phone calls. Some bass kills the clarity in voice.. Music:. Inferior sound quality when listening to music.. Podcast:. Average performance. Unnecessary bass is spooling the podcast experience.

name: PARDEEP KUMAR
title: Amazing Bluetooth Product at this price.
content: Hello everyone, this bluetooth earphone is really awesome at this price range. Best thing is that this is flexible so if you sleep using it this with not damaged as Samsung Level.. Bass is really awesome. Noise cancellation is okay and bluetooth connectivity is good.. After using some day I found that battery is works for more that 6 hours. If you work in office and only using for attend call, battery will work for about 12 hours. And almost in every phone if you used it for about 6 hour this may show full or 80% battery but it comes down immediately, this if not a battery, this is a software problem that not show battery falling slowly. This is really nice.

name: Chris Tobit
title: Sound and Mic issues
content: Pro's - Packaging, easy wireless syncing with laptop/android, noise cancellation, battery. Cons - Extremely bloated bass which makes it hard to listen to music to, poor mic which attracts complaint of poor sound quality while using phone/skype. These headphones are useful for sports/workout only. Not for serious music listening or any use which needs use of the mic.

name: Sangeeta Roy
title: Decent output. Poor noise cancellation.
content: The sound quality is decent, but the noise cancellation is horrible. You definitely cannot use it to take calls. Its decent to listen to music and that's all. Battery backup is around 4 hours of continuous music play.

name: Garima sharma
title: Rocks....but packaging was poor
content: Earphone is awesome, quality is superb, sound,bass, connectivity is super good , overall i loved it .. Packaging was so pooorrrr.... Terrible😖, outside box is totally broken, there is no bubble wrapping for this delicate kind of item, this is totally disgusting work done by seller, please improve your packaging....

name: Rahul Leitanthem
title: About Warranty & Servicing
content: I buy this product after 3 month one side is not working so i can this warranty on thier website they approved it i have sent my products to their Servicing company mumbai after that no ones did not respond at me. They didn't pick my call they did not send any mail to me my warranty is also about to end i tried 100 call perday no ones didn't pick my call if they pickup they muted .... So this the worst servicing centre i have ever met. Sorry for my bad english

name: ReAl
title: Avg product or may be even good product for the price.
content: Avg product. Packaging was badly damaged when received, product in working condition. I do not understand why this is so highly rated or has so many ratings may be, they captured the pulse of Indian buyers correctly?

name: Mitali chitnis
title: Pathetic customer care service
content: boat customer care service is pathetic. My Bluetooth earphones stopped working within 3 Months. Replacement issued status is being displayed since 10 days and no updates since then. Won't get back to the customers by promising to do so when they are not able to answer the calls. Have been trying to call them everyday since last week

name: Amazon Customer
title: WORST MIC , SOUND QUALITY .NOT AS EXPECTED , DONT BE  DECIEVED BY ITS TAGS FAKE COMMENTS....
content: Many reviews I read positive but... When I bought & used .. there is no extra bass jus as normal earphones... The worst part is MIC... It takes all the other noises except voice.. as a musician.. I can say it is a normal earphones . There are no clear highs & mids & low... I prefer music lovers to buy Realme some what ok..better than this.. for a decent Bass & Good quality in Stereo HD sounds better for 8D. go for Infinity glide 500 cheap & best..

name: Sanjay Survase
title: Average Sound quality but a sweet deep base that'll make you addicted
content: Sound Quality of 255 is pretty average, falls short on lows but pretty much accepted when you get it for 999/-. Base meanwhile is a different story all together, EDM's just don't sound the same and the deep deep base just sucks you inn.. While it does falls short for crisp sound quality and treble, If you are a EDM person.. these are the best you can get for now.. P.S.: I got it for 999/- hence the acceptable remarks. Definitely not worth it for ₹3.5k get any other wired earphone instead of these if you want better bang for your buck.

name: smrity
title: It's okay
content: My battery life drained to just 45 min working in 1 month usage. Though it might be because I used a higher voltage charger than what was instructed. One thing that I hate absolutely is the the greeting tone when you switch it on or off. The voice is so shrill that it hurts my ear. So that might be irritating if you have sensitive ears.. Moreover sound quality is average. Base is normal, nothing to hype about.

name: Carolin
title: Problem on Zoom, otherwise good
content: These headphone keep disconnecting on Zoom, which makes it impossible to use them for homeoffice. Sadly doesn't fulfill our purpose. If you like it just for free time they are good

name: Rohan Agarwal
title: Best in the price segment
content: I am using it for quite a time now & i have to say it's the best one in this price segment. Sound Quality is outstanding with High Bass, it doesn't get wet even when i sweat a lot by running while wearing it. The noise cancellation could have been a little bit better, when on call the other person keeps telling me that background noises keeps on coming. Battery backup is awesome also, it remained on 100% even after playing videos & songs constantly for 3hrs. To sum it up, i have to say it is the best Bluetooth headset under 1500. You should really go for it.

name: Natasha
title: Overall Good enough.
content: The earphones are good enough for people not looking for something extremely great. Good dound quality and great connectivity. Backup is around 6 hours like mentioned in description. The only thing i found bad which others users have also mentioned is call quality. There is literally zero noise cancellation on call. Other person keeps on complaining that they can hear all the noise around except my voice. Overall.. its a good choice in this budget. Convinient to handle.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Customer service :(
content: Firstly the voice quality of the product is very nice compared to others at this range, however the service from boat side is not right. Mu product was damaged at the 7th day and I initiated the replacement option, the reverse pick up was scheduled however no delivery information is available still. Itz being 3 days now, when you go to boat website the tracking status button does not works on the website and even you cannot reach an representative via call. I don't know if I am gonna receive the product back or not!

name: Anvesh Annu
title: Perfect Buy
content: very nice product, im waiting since long time for the price drop😋😋😋😋. sound quality, bass quality is awesome, music lovers will definately enjoy 100%. Noise cancellation is very perfect, as i talk many calls on ride, and there is no problem for other side for the noise.. perfect buy

name: DENNIS JOSEPH EAPEN
title: Totally disappointed
content: Even when i go through comments about this product. Most of them put negative comments. But then also i had a trust in boat products now this changed everything.. 1).Bluetooth connectivity - sometimes there is a breaking issue eg. When i play a music song break for a millisecond happens for 6-7 times in a single song.. 2).while calling sound from other side is not so clear.. 3).Right side portion of this headset have some sound buffering or scattering issue.. Overall it is waste of money. I got this product for 999. Still im not satisfied with this. I don't know whether they accept my return request or not.

name: Susmit
title: Beware! I got duplicate product.
content: Very bad quality. The teal green colour is not at all as shown. The shown is very freash and good looking. In actual it is very dull. The sound quality was very bad. I think they have shipped me a duplicate product. As a prime member i am totally disappointed. Worst!!!! I have returned it.

name: Bhushan Hareshwar Tandel
title: Useless for jogging
content: It's not good for jogging! Don't buy, if you want to use it for jogging! I wasted my money for this stupid bluetooth earphones! They start falling down again and again when you start running 🏃🏾‍♂️

name: HD
title: product with typical one year warranty lasting period
content: Defective piece was delivered at first where one of the side was not working properly. After getting exchanged with new earphone after 1 year, right side was not working properly and after next 1 month other also got damaged. Overall not a good quality product that can last for a long time. typical one year warranty.(or may be less than that in case of existing defective product)

name: krish
title: Worth for the price!🔥
content: Serves the purpose well! Sound quality is good though not equivalent to JBL wired headset. But still its worth the price! Got for ₹999 with additional 10%off over it.. Disadvantages:. 1)Charge gradually drops from 100%-80% but then shows 80% for a long time though the charge is getting reduced and finally it drops to 60-40-20-0 within 5-10 minutes.. 2)Not suitable while driving in 2-wheeler. (Connection gets dropped often while riding)

name: Sunayana C.
title: Bass Lover
content: The Product is Amazing. Before this one I had Boat Bassheads 225 which also were amazing. I had a great experience with boat so I ordered these and It has great crisp sound and great bass. If you do love bass this product is for you. Don't buy any other brand. Just go with it.. Just one issue is there that it has got really long wire which would get messy sometimes.

name: R P ß
title: Value for Quality of the Headphone but not for the Sound Quality
content: Hi all,. This headphone I have purchased to replace my 'JBL T160 in-Ear Headphones with Mic' headphone with lot of expectations from the Boat. But the sound quality of 'JBL T160 in-Ear Headphones with Mic is much better than the Boat.. But the physical quality of Boat is awesome. If u are looking for the best sound quality please dont go for it and if u are looking for the physical quality, Boat is the best under Rs.1,500/-. Headphone Quality - ****. Sound Quality - **. Base - **. Battery durability - *** (5Hrs). Value for money - ***. Over All I can give THREE STARS for this product

name: R BALAKRISHNAN
title: Product OK / Poor Customer Service
content: The product was good until 10 to 11 months of warranty and then it had worn out. I wrote to the Customer Service / called them but the people who works in their Customer Service does not even value their Customer. I am writing to them for more than 2 months but no single action has been taken as per commitment over the phone. I suggest others to buy some other brand other than boat who might value our money. If boat acts on the same i will update you.

name: Devang
title: Quality Buy - Price worth.
content: This product is fantastic...it's got amazing quality sound and bass, clear and sharp microphone sound delivery, light weight and easy to handle. Voice guidance feature is cool.. 3 months down the line, it's started giving a bit of issues, disturbance issue via Microphone of the headset.. Since it is a 1 year warranty product, in process of contacting for Warranty Support.. I am loving it.. Worth purchasing this headset.

name: Rahul singh
title: more treble  less bass
content: i am using this product from last 2 month and i will telll you about its pros and cons. 💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛. Pros:. 1. Flexible. 2. Less in weight. 3. Battery backup is good about 6 - 7 hrs listen in 60-80% volume. 4. Build quality is also good and also used during exercise. 5. Ear bud support which is very goood i think... 💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛. cons :. 1. Battery backup reduced to 3 -4 hrs when used in full volume. 2. Sound quality is not that good treble is more and bass is less u cna feel that in high volume

name: Nripendra
title: A good product but a bit pricy
content: Pros. ▪︎affordable. ▪︎quality is appreciable. ▪︎good looking. ▪︎quick charge. ▪︎light weight. ▪︎long lasting. ▪︎bass is above average. ▪︎noise cancellation is good. ▪︎sound is crisp and clear. Cons. ▪︎a bit pricy. ▪︎battery backup is 6 hrs, better backups available at same price

name: Prabhu Chennai
title: WORKS WITH ONLY ONE MOBILE. NOT DUAL MOBILE.
content: Call sound is very clear, no issues. Bass is good. Very disappointed bcuz of not connecting 2 devices in same time. I RECOMMEND NOT TO BUY. Better go with Samsung Level U. If u using only one mobile means, just go with it.. UPDATE:. After 1 month of using writing this.. Please guys do not buy this scrap one. I just throwed it into dustbin.. 1. Two devices not connecting in same time.. 2. Very noise while in call, voice breaking, other end person hears a robot voice. 3.Last two days I'm facing charging issue. I need to try 15 to 20 times. PLEASE DON'T BUY IT GUYS.

name: Ravi N
title: Excellent
content: Wonderful quality, connects seamlessly. Superb bass and audio quality, only thing bothering is a slight hissing background noise during movie playback when connected to TV. Otherwise, this is a wonderful product, slightly overpriced I feel though...

name: Kunal Gupta
title: Money's Worth...Go for it...without second thought.
content: One of the best wireless earphones till date. On the single charge works full day for using 5 hours of continuous music playback and talktime of upto 9 hrs in a single day with speed charging. The headphones gets charged in 30 mins for whole day use. Works excellent on my Oneplus 7T Pro and good connectivity for laptops Skype & video call.. Don't give a second thought. Just goo for it. Total money's worth

name: godhuli
title: Poor speaker. Sound is good.
content: Sound quality is good. Speaker is very poor. Voice is not audible. Other surrounding sound is much higher to the person on call. The person on the other end of a call stuggles to hear the voice. It's only good for listening to music not for taking calls.

name: Lokesh
title: Good product
content: Good product. Easy to use. Good sound quality although I use it mainly for audiobooks so bass effect is not a concern to me. Not much of noise cancellation actually but would give good volumes even in noisy areas.. It issue is it starts to become uncomfortable after about an hour of use. My daily usage is close to 2 hours and I've used a lot of in the ear type headphones.. Bottom line. Definitely worth the money.

name: rohit singh
title: Completly waste
content: Writing review after using 2 months of the product. Initially the sound quality was good and the connectivity was also good. But after one month of use connectivity problem started. After two month of use one day it suddenly got turned off and I was not able to turn ON the device. I registered complaint on there website and after 2 weeks they pick up the device and now after 2 week they collected for there pick up service. I will never going to buy there product. Pathetic service. Totally time and money wasting.

name: Eshita Bharti
title: Boat wireless earphone stopped working with 2months
content: A very big dislike to this product as I have bought it seeing the brand of this product but unfortunately it had stopped working so soon I mean not properly two months have been passed and it had stopped working and the return policy have also been cancelled so i would request to kindly exchange my product that is boat company's wireless earphone that costed me 1499 , to either exchange my product or return and cashback me

name: jimit kapadia
title: Spoilt in a week. Replacement got spoilt in a month.
content: Got spoilt in a week. Stopped charging. Got a prompt replacement but that also stopped working. Finally I gave up on BOAT vowing never to purchase bluetooth sports headsets. Personally for me bluetooth sports headsets have never worked. I have tried Sony etc but it is never long lasting.

name: Dhaval S.
title: Ultimate product at such a cheap rate.
content: Awesome product. Works fantastic. Thanks for giving the freebie. Worth the penny.. Pros:. Good battery life. Sounds qlty is awesome.. Easy to pair and disconnect.. Cons:. Nothing so far.. Would recommend to buy this product as its best in this price range.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Boat Rockerz 255 pro 4star/5star
content: Boat Rockerz 255 pro is Great product.. Sound quality is awesome, Battery backup is good 9/10,Fast charging only 45mnt to 1 hour 100%. Bielt Quietly good..... Thanks Amazon sel this product Wright price. And Nice service Amazon.......

name: Kartik
title: No one helping
content: I'm messageing from so many day's no 1helping me for the same of warranty or change the product right one is not working & battery problem also and the main point is on website there's no OPTION AVAILABLE FOR 255 SPORTS WIRELESS guy's 1st check it on website then purchase it bcz of there's so many guy's facing the problems but no one is helping them & one more thing, think before purchasing it see the all Reviews & queries there's no option available 1st buyers see the all Details about it

name: Ragib
title: Very awesome product even after 9 months of usage
content: The product works well even after 9 months of usage. No issues. Battery backup is good and even if it discharges just charge for 5 min and can go for a full movie. Good sound and base quality at this price range. No connectivity issues. Connects to 2 devices simultaneously.

name: Neha Srivastava
title: Surprised with so many positive reviews
content: First time a boat product has disappointed.. Battery lasts for less than a day, although when I use it for not more than an hr a day.. Not comfortable on ears m, sound quality is okay.. Overall okay product. Think before buying

name: Ashish chopra
title: worst customer service
content: The product is fine , it started giving problems after 6 months but the major issue is customer service of boat. That is pathetic they neither reply on mails nor pick calls .people working at service centres they even dont know about their another services not at all helping . Never gonna purchase boat product ever again .

name: danielcharles
title: A very bassy earphones
content: This is a very convenient and easy to use earphones. I had no issues with connectivity or battery as they are both good and reliable. The sound leans heavily on the bass side of things. For bass heads who like loud earphones, this is perfect. For people who want a more neutral sounding earphones, look elsewhere

name: ND
title: Decent Earphones at a decent price
content: Pros:. - Decent sound quality. - Good neck band support to avoid having the earphones plugged into your ears all the time (like airpods or true wireless buds). Cons:. - Connectivity gets broken at times, but the frequency is low.. Overall, I would rate it very good for the price-performance ratio.

name: kashish sapra
title: Durable Design
content: This is my 7th product from 'boat' and i am clearly impressed. Apart from 2 wrong purchases, all the other products have been working really well. The best part about this product specifically is its durability which is much better than other brands at this price. so Go for it.

name: Komal Khandelwal
title: Best Budget Bluetooth Headphones
content: It's been more than 10 months I bought these EARPLUGS and i find them the best at such a reasonable price. They actually have noise cancellation feature not to the top most but good at this price. The battery runs for 6-7 hours long once charged fully. Also good quality sound

name: Zaheer A.
title: Ok but not bad for the budgeted guys go for it or else jbl
content: Mine is green color but color is not darkest as in the photo abd about sound it is ok who listens slow music or melidy songs but for full bass listeners go for costly 1 as jbl or more than 2k rs and battery stanby is good grip is very good snd also no disturbance to side people if u put on max vol. ok thank u if my review helpful plz like mro on box 2999.00 i got o lighting deal for 999.00

name: Kumar
title: Awful Product
content: Actually I ordered through Amazon so,no problems with Amazon but the product is infinite times negative.I already used this product last 6 months onwards it got replaced once because left ear phone was working.Even though they replaced it again behaves like that only now both the ear phones are not working so,when I contacted boat once again they told me that I got replaced once second time wouldn't possible for me to complaint against.Overall,I will tell you to go for some branded products like Skullcandy,Seiheiser,RHA,JBL etc.,don't buy these worst products as they don't told me exact problem what happened with ear phone.

name: Preeti
title: Best deal I purchased 999
content: My 1st Bluetooth purchase from Amazon and like it very much. I was using it but some where I lost it 😔 but I really like it. I did not feel it's has some noise cancellation feature bcoz every time I am facing this issue. If I am talking to someone then I have switche off Bluetooth. But very soon I am going to order another one 😂 bcoz I am a music lover and I found Bluetooth headphones are best for my phone (OnePlus 7t).

name: NeerajNarula
title: Good Sound Performance compared to Wired JBL C200Si and Sennheiser MX 170
content: This Boat Rockerz 255 is my first Purchase of Bluetooth Headphone and I found this better in terms of Sound performance than JBL C200Si and Sennheiser MX 170 which I have been using for quite some time. The Bass is very immersive and Lows / Mid are crystal clear. Treble is controlled and is balanced. This Boat Rockerz 255 beats the JBL & Sennheiser wired headphones that cost around Rs. 800-900. AT Boat Rockerz @ Rs.899/- is a great deal. Must buy, Boat Rocks......

name: ravi
title: Stopped working just after the warranty period and the service centre doesnt have repair facility
content: Stopped working just after the warranty period and the service centre doesn't have repair facility.. Now the only option is to discard the item since no one can repair it. Surprised to see this from such a brand.. Can never buy boat products again.

name: Rahul Ambawale
title: using from 1 year review.
content: I am using this product from last 1 year. I use it daily at least for 3 hrs. the product is as good as newly packed even after one year. After 1 year of usage the battery backup is still more than 7 hours. I used it for 3 days in a single full charge. the awesome build quality makes this perfect one. i will surely recommend this product who is looking for long run in less money. i wish to give more than 5 stars but there is only 5 stars available to rate.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst service from boat and Amazon itself for the very first time
content: Earphone does have very low range connectivity. I don't think so it's noise cancellation have more than 20% capacity. After using it for some days it's speaker gave up and gives some very irritating sound.. When I tried to file a complaint on boat website for this then I saw that the product name is not there. What the heck? Even no call support without submitting the issue on website. I don't how am I suppose to contact submit the warranty claim if the website is not showing their own brand name of the product. Nice boat and Amazon. Keep it up in making customers fool. 😐😐

name: Pradeep M
title: Good Sound; Bad for Running
content: I wanted something to replace my TomTom's bluetooth ear phones (ah, how I miss them). While the sound quality is way better then what I derived from TomTom's original set, but boat Rockerz are heavy, bouncy and needs your attention all the time while running. The heavy arms are probably the reason for delivering the sound quality and longer battery life, but they surely are not for runners.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Boat Rockerzzzz !!
content: Awesome product for the price paid. The battery backup is decent with up to 4 days from full charge (usage of 1 hr per day). Sound quality is too good. Only disadvantage is that the battery percentage shown on mobile is for a long time 80%. And suddenly it drops to 20%. The backup is good but the status shown is not correct.

name: Geeta
title: DONT BUY- not worth the price- useless
content: Worst sound. I bought it 3 weeks back. And it is such a bad product. 1. Does not fit well into ear. 2. Keeps slipping out- extremely bad grip. 3. Sound quality is very very bad. 4. Noise cancellation is cheap. 5. Auto cut even when you are using it.

name: Prasenjit Ghorpade
title: Worst product after one year of use
content: Nice but sometimes it not connect from one device to other it takes more time for transition . I paid for this 2400 rs and now they are selling it very low cost at 999 so I am not worth to buy this product. This earphone are not good don't get it after 1 year it stops working from one ear and after some days it starts working from other one also .it is so annoyed to buy this product and frustrated to buy it at very very high price

name: Aditi Shinde
title: Continuously Hearing weird sound
content: So I bought 2 sets of these headphones on the prime day sale(for 1299/- each).The headphones got connected very easily and I played some songs,the sound quality and base are totally fine but here's the main problem you continously hear a weird noise in the background both when you're playing and when you're not.. So I'm telling you please dont go for the price go for the quality and brand (be It a little bit costlier but you'll get something better)

name: Rajesh D
title: Worst headset i ever bought
content: Boat rockers 255 Sportz headset the sound is really good but what happened with in 2 months right speaker was not audible and the sound was too low and bluetooth connective also not upto the mark. In this it has mentioned it covers about 10mts but even 5mts you could hear the breakage of the voice. So my thing please don't buy and waste your money. Battery standby 6hrs if you continuously hear the video song or playing games. else only audio means 10hrs. But the bass sound is good. If you get the good one instead of defective piece then you can enjoy the nice music.

name: Kamna
title: Worst earplugs ...do not buy
content: I have two products both stopped working in few months ...neither boat gives service nor Amazon ... please refrain to buy this product it's waste of money..my both products still in warranty .Boat doesn't respond and Amazon says boat will give service.

name: Benet Luckose
title: Good aound quality.. But long cable
content: Good sound quality. Crystal clear sound. The product is fit to the ears very exactly. Very good noise cancellation. Easy to commect via BT. Only problem faced ia its long cable when not fitted into ear. The cable is fit when used in the ear otherwise when hanging through the neck, its very longer

name: Vivek Modi
title: Nice & clear sound; great bass and decent price!
content: These are a decent pair of earphones at the given price. I have earlier used the Skullcandy and the JBL earphones and compared them, this is not a disappointment at all.. The sound quality, clarity and bass are quite good. The quality of voice, when using for phone calls, is pretty nice too.. The battery lasts for little more than six hours on continuous use after a single charge.. I would highly recommend these earphones.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Money wasted as only 1 earpiece working within a week of buying.
content: One of the ear sound out put has stopped within a week of buying the product without any physical damage been done.. And since it was a gift to my friend by the time i got to know return window had closed.. Money Wasted, hope i get a replacement for this after review is read by the concerned people.

name: sanjiv vij
title: Battery dead in three months
content: Within three months of purchase of the item, the battery is dead and doesn't recharge at all. Bogus products being sold on Amazon these days. There seem to be no checks and balances in their system.. The product carries a replacement warranty of one year. Wonder whether Amazon will honour it???

name: umesh nagar
title: very good product in this range
content: I purchased this item 2 months back, and it cost me around 250 rupee after cashback. And in this range this is the best wireless earphone.. Battery - around 7 8 hours.. Connectivity - You can connect 2 device at a time (phone and laptop).. bluetooth range- Range is very good I used in 3 bhk flat and its good after moving in other rooms.. Noise Cancellation - tested using the bike and other side there in no noise of the traffic and all.. Quality - Sound and build quality is very good.. Overall very good earphone. Good to go with it in this price range.

name: Ian Fonseca
title: Not Bad for the Price
content: I've been personally using higher quality headphones; so the sound quality of these earphones have felt pretty bad, in comparison. The sound quality for the price though, is pretty good, especially for a set of wireless earphones. There was almost no lag, so, would work with casual video viewing and gaming.

name: Kk
title: COMFORT OF WEARING IT
content: firstly received the product on time and in good condition... now moving to like and dislikes: -. what i like about it:-. 1)its dual colour tone is very attractive .. 2)simple to use .. 3)economical.. 4)Sound quality is good.. dislikes:-. 1)charging display is almost invisible ,you need to actually find out the indicator.. 2)not comfortable for long use.. 3)loss of connectivity while in use.

name: Aditya Dhaipule
title: Best in budget
content: It has been a month since I got these earphones and these are my first own Bluetooth earphones. However, I have tried many other earphones and headphones from different brands from my friends like boat, Samsung, sony, Skullcandy, jaybird, house of marley. I finally settled for this one because it's giving more than it's worth when compared to others. These are cheap in cost and rich in sound. Casual music listeners will enjoy this earphones thoroughly.. I will list some pros and cons that a casual music lover looks for.... Pros :. 1)Deep boosted bass and balanced music at higher volumes...worth for money. 2)Good fit, Light weight and flexible neck band with sweat and water resistant... perfect for workout. 3)Around 6 hours of play time at 80% of full volume and around 1.5 hour for full charge. 4) multi function buttons and different bud sizes. Cons..... 1) little noise at the beginning that fades out as soon as the music starts. 2) disconnection ( lag in music ) due to displacement of device for the first time only. It gets settled after the first time you move it and stays connected with out any further disruption.

name: Musthaqheem
title: Worth of money and quality
content: *I am using this for past 20 days*. 1 battery backup is good enough we get almost 6 to 8 hrs of battery life which depends on ur usage. 2 sound as lik boat never let us down on sound quality bass is always awesome as well as vocal quality also. 3 product quality is good when we wear its not heavy. 4 it is not recommended for pubg never buy if u wanna use if for pubg u will get sound lag

name: Ashutosh Patle
title: And expensive deal
content: Though I didn't buy it in prime day sale I am happy with the product and it's sound quality good bass and clear sound. Nice isolation but battery backup could have been better. Build quality is nice. Overall a nice entry level Bluetooth headphone. After 6 months the charging port is not working

name: Manoj
title: Don't think just buy boat.
content: Call quality is not that good the only problem i face with this product.. I love boat when it come to music the quality is amazing, i used most of evey product from boat speakers, earphones, powerbank, neckband, car chargers. And they impress me every time.

name: Varalakshmi
title: Good product
content: U need to charge continuously. After 15 min charging it will work 1 hr max.. regarding sound and colour is just Superb.. I am bit disappointed in charging capacity only... It's ok product.. The one who wants high Volume they can go for this product.. Overall.. it's okay type..

name: Vivek Nair
title: Replacement policy only for Manufacturing Defect.
content: Product is superb, but after 4 months of normal use right side ear piece stopped working.. I tried to contact Boat Service Centre in Chennai for a replacement, they rejected my request because they can assure replacement warranty only for manufacturing defects. Then why Boat provides such a 1 year replacement warranty.. My device is in the same condition how I received it. No water or moisture contact, No breakage of the body or wire parts.

name: Vijay
title: Average Performance...
content: I bought this product in Aug2020.. The product worked fine for me upto Dec 2020, but now its range and quality both decreased. I can't even able to listen the songs properly with my pocket distance.. there might be possibility that this happen only for my unit.. my suggestion-if you have more budget then go for the better one.

name: भक्ती
title: Worst customer service by boat. Not happy
content: Boat rokerz 255 is truly amazing in terms of sound quality and Bluetooth connectivity.. I ordered the earphones in January 19. It worked really well for 10 months. But one earphone stopped working because of loose connection in the cable from last month. I tried to register the complaint. It showed error. I tried calling the customer care many times. No one picked up the call. Very bad service. Product is under warranty. But no use.

name: Animesh Mahato
title: Buy it ... Nice and durable quality bluetooth earphones
content: Nice decent quality earphones, battery last almost 8-10 hours of usage, quality sound with good base, good bluetooth range, the wires are good (not as thin as others ones) and the collar part is hard... Overall durable...but I found the earbuds a light hard in initial few uses..... One should definately consider buying these bluetooth earphones!

name: Abhinay verma
title: My opinion
content: Output sound is extremely loud and high you can't hear in full high volume... Pros-. 1. Bass is loud and high. 2. Full volume is extremely high. 3. Very light weight.. 4. Fits in ear you can use for long time.. Cons-. 1. Material looks cheap quality(does not matter for me after all sound matters). 2. Battery backup is less and indicator is 100 to 80 to 60 to 20 then off.. Conclusion- you can go for it if you love high volume with extra bass.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bad earphone with sound and battery backup.
content: Below average product. Not happy at all.. Pros : good sound quality. very uncomfortable, silicon buds are not soft. Bought a memory foam bud pair to use it.. Battery life is not ok. Battery is not run as it's brand name .Once give a low battery alarm, dies within 2min. One side is given good and another side give less.. No return possible. Please please please please do not buy any mode.

name: cyril
title: Nice product
content: Boat rockers is a good quality earphone for this price range. Because most of the companies providing the similar earphone at double the price. I got this product at Rs 999 and l am very happy with this product. Having 4-5 hr battery backup and it charge quickly.. When I am listening music it will withstand up to 5 hrs. When I am using for audio call it will withstand nearly 3-3.5 hr. Also I can watch a complete movie with out any doubt.. And I found few disadvantages like, when you are listening music continually for hours during the journey and you keep your mobile inside your bag, then some times the music will suddenly stops and after some time it will become connected.. Also it is a very bass boosted product

name: A²
title: The brand name is enough
content: Its bewn a while using boat products and i am highly satisfied and recommend this.. Quality is crisp and bass is heavy.. Overall it depends on your song preferences and the performance varies accordingly.

name: Siva Praneeth Kumar
title: Excellent Earphones👌
content: Awesome Bass 👌👌, Sound quality is good 👍... Better Noise cancellation, It's water resistant, but not waterproof.. Battery🔋 Backup is Good nearly 6-7 hrs.. Value for Money. Build quality is Nice... Overall Good Headset... Thanks to Amazon for giving me Best price!!

name: Anugrah
title: Best service of boat products , poor battery life , purchase it in sale
content: Only minus point with this product is it's battery life... Hardly 3 to 3.5 hr.. takes long time to fully charge.. I used to charge it twice or thrice in a day.. Best thing is boat service quality.. They will pickup ur product and replace it within 15 days if u having issue with product .. Rest ... purchase it in sale...u will get it in 999 otherwise u have to pay 1499 for same.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Pathetic service
content: Please do not buy this product , my complaint number is 881765, in a month it stopped working, i returned it and when i got the replaced one the ear plugs were not fitted with the product, i raised a request for ear plug i got ear plug which does not go in to the socket. Imagine marketing which took the complaint even the image which i had sent with the email they didn't bother to check the size of the ear plug whether it will fit the device or not. Worst worst service, will never buy boat again n will recommend same to everyone who i meet.

name: Ishan
title: Everything is good save that the earbuds are extremely painful
content: The pity is that everything about these earphones are great, starting from the sound quality, the technology/user-friendliness, and even the instructions. But I don't know which genius came up with the earbud designs. They hurt a lot! Unless you insert them deep in your ears you won't really be able to get them to stay on. Inevitably after about 15 minutes of usage, your ears will ache. Therefore even though its a perfectly fine product in all other ways, its not very usable. A great pity.

name: sangamesh gaded
title: Value for money
content: I love this product, value for money, I have been using so many earphones with different brands, but this product beat them all, very good sound quality at low and mid volume, light weight, easy to wear, comfort to wear for long time, an hour charge give 2 days usage, long connection range. Built quality is also good.. Design can be improved.

name: Nadeem
title: Overall value for money product
content: Sound quality is good. But if you are in outdoor then it becomes noisy and people keep complaining that ambient sound is audible not my voice. Battery backup is okay if you don't use it continuously throughout the day. Bluetooth connectivity is good not the best because if phone is very near then it's okay or else it will create disturbance if you move to next room.

name: RUPAM - BISWANATH
title: BETTER THAN THE BEST :- ITS WORTHY OF THE REMARK :- NEXGEN TRENDSETTER
content: The boAt Rockerz 255, while being lightweight in design pumps out the favourite tunes with powerful HD sound and deep boosted bass.. It can differentiate music from noise.. An exceptional sound experience with articulate audio reproduction with a blend of pitch perfect frequency response.. According to me everything is awesome except one thing :-. The cover of the charging port.. By any means if it tear aparts then I think it's very tough to fix it up again in the same place. Maybe fevikwik can fix it but do not try this.. Hope that moment will never come because it depends on how you use it. Overall product quality is just mesmerizing.

name: Abhimitra Karreddula
title: Very Good
content: very good I am happy. But connectivity issue is there. It shows 2 things 1 is hands free and another is stereo headphones. Stereo headphones doesn't work well sometimes. Bad connection. But sound is good with stereo.

name: Vikram
title: Value for money
content: I m writing this review after 1 month of usage. Product is no doubt a value for money, quality of material is decent, battery life is around 6-8 hours. I mostly use it for office calls n response is absolutely marvelous. Earplug wires r pretty long comparative to other neck bands. Bass is good and overall a must buy in this range.

name: Ritesh Kumar
title: Waste of money, worked for 7 months
content: Writing the review after 7 months use, the product worked fine initially but after 7 months of use it is not working. We don't pay that much amount for only 7 months use of any product. Warranty is still there but I live in small city, where to go and how to claim the warranty.

name: Johnson
title: Nice product... Nice design
content: Everything is ok... And when we travel on bike it come off from our neck that's the drawback and some noise heard when we talk on phone. Connection is good, sound quality is good compared to this boat earphones are much more better.

name: Romantic Rowdy 7
title: worst product
content: we used this product only 4 month, after that one side not working, and i claimed warranty they collect my product immediately 7 month over still i didn't receive the product.. better don't buy this product, because my friend also facing same issue.. i didn't expect this type of service provided by boAt.. Worst service, while we try to call the customer service and believe me we wait 3 hrs to contact the customer servicer but no one listening to our issue.. we have lot to complain about it but this is not a right place.

name: HG
title: Earphone disconnects from bluetooth very frequently.
content: Writing this after 2 months of usage.. Sound quality is good, noise cancellations is kinda ok coz whenever i talk from outside environment, the other person use to complaint about worst background noise.. The main issue is nowadays am facing is earphone disconnects from bluetooth suddenly and often while audio / video is playing. This is so irritating that suddenly if bluetooth disconnect mobile speaker enables which disturb others.

name: Satish
title: Decent product with basic use. Don't expect wonders.
content: My previous wireless headphones from Boat lasted for a year and were of same model. However, the recent purchase I was a bit disappointed. Not only did the built quality seems to have detoriated but also the sound quality is not that great. At high volumes the sounds breaks.. The connectivity is however good. I have not experienced any call drops. However, quality of call has been an issue

name: Subrata Nag
title: Boat Bluetooth device very poor service and product
content: Very bad product. Service is very poor. My device was not charging and great difficulty one support CENTER got it in Basavangudi.. But so pathetic if you have everything they will find something to proof for not giving warranty . Final I had to pay Rs550/- for only not having charger rubber cover on it.lot of customers was unhappy on that day in that CENTER because rude behaviour and not supporting customer. Please do not buy boAT Product and save your money .

name: siddhant
title: Poor After sale  Customer Service
content: Mine stopped working within 4 months.. 1. Good looks.. 2. Good sound quality as well but poor calling experience.. 3. Poor quality as it has stopped working withing 4 months.. 4. Bass is OK.

name: Meena
title: Nice headset
content: After a month of using I'm reviewing this, Yeah it's really a good product. Battery life is also good, Good for listening songs while walking.Satisfied i feel. but if u need to headsets for. singing karaoke, I will not prefer this, otherwise it is awesome...

name: UMA SHANKAR TIWARI
title: Sounds and base quality is excellent
content: In this product a very very Good quality sound and very good bass quality and also best calling quality but build quality is on average because the logo of boat was erased in 1 to 2 weeks. And this product are SUPPORT very fast charging to charge any normal charger.. Charging time of this product is almost 1 hrs fully charged.. it's very fast and also very long time battery life of this product..

name: Basavaraj Mukta
title: Not a bad
content: No doubt it has a great bass and to a great extent noise cancellation and decent sound clarity and mindblowing battery but the following dissapointed me though i tried a lot to adjust.. 1.Bluetooth range not more than 10m. 2. Pain in ear due the conical buds(can be removed). 3. Wires are a bit long which makes it odd in front.. 4. No pouch provided.. 5. Worst part is very low quality and distoring mic. Other person keeps complaining about my voice.

name: Pratik Hundekari
title: Bad experience
content: It will not disconnect when both ear phons are magnetic connect, main important point is when i was called or who called receiver not hear proper during communication voice volume very low we need take mice close mouth.....but i used another bluetooth device there is not problem, so i would request you pls give me good product with my expectation otherwise pls rambus my money, as per cost product is not good

name: Ashwin
title: Bad microphone but good sound quality
content: Except for the microphone which is really bad, it's a good buy if you are primarily buying it fit listening to music or watching videos on your phone.. If your usage is for attending regular calls and telephonic meetings, don't go for it!

name: Aggi lovez
title: Awesome product, highly recommended.
content: mainly I'm really impressed with the built quality and sound, just wow. I have experienced, good but awesome bass and sound delivery.

name: Abhinay
title: Value for money
content: Have been using this for more than 2 months. Sound quality is good but still not the best. Its designed ergonomically. The ear buds are soft and comfortable. The Don't expect battery back up for more than a day. Value for money if the shelf life is more than 2 years

name: Vikal sharma
title: Satisfied with the product.
content: Everything is just perfect except the length of wire, it is quite long that some time it stucks on your office desk while working, it should be slightly short rather than everything is perfect whether it is battery, sound, specially bass evrything is perfect..
