And even got this product in Rs 1,099/- as a lightning deal. So what else i want✌

name: Amazon Customer
title: Zero CVC... Frustrated with the product.
content: I have just ordered this headphone. Sound from the music apps and videos are good but on call it has a constant buzzing sound and CVC is ZERO. I thought to replace it but for some reason I couldn't. But still I felt to review it because I'm completely frustrated right now hearing all kind of complaints from those people whom I talk too through this earphone. It is not worth the price.. Please let me know if this issue comes under manufacturing defect and I still can exchange/return it.

name: Ashutosh
title: Overall good to go for
content: It's actually a good earphones... At legitimate price... Bought for 999. Battery good. Sound good, Good base, Comfert good. What I diskiled is, sound cracks when phone kept in back pocket or swinging hands while walking.

name: arindam bose
title: Stopped working after 20 days.
content: The product stopped working after 20 days of usage. 1st symtom, bluetooth (earphone) is getting disconnected from phone automatically. 2nd symptom the earphone gets power off automatically after around 30 minutes of usage. Final symptom, power is not turning on. Really dissapointed with boAt and Amazon.

name: Balayokesh
title: Affordable headphones
content: I recently purchased this product during the prime day sale for RS 1000. I already had Boat Rockerz 295 and purchased 255.. audio wise its too good !! And regarding noise cancellation its better than 295 along with neck pad which wasn't available in 295.. The main drawback is.... The length of the headphones are long which looks to be awkward and the wires are slimmer than 295. you need to be careful so that the wire doesn't get cut ! If in case you goin to use these headphones during driving 2 wheelers.... It's goin to hurt ur ears as the earpiece is big and will hurt when you wear helmet. I would give 4 out of 5 only because of the above drawbacks !. Boat is reliable even if they are given at less price

name: ASHINT M PAUL
title: Extremely Good product
content: *Sound is very clear, definitely you'll love. enjoying. music.. *Mic is also awesome, with in 10-15 metre. range. there is no disturbance.. *For this price it is worth buying. *Since the earphone is in the ear type, first. time. users may feel little bit discomfort while. initial using. but later you will get used to it.. Good sound quality 8/10. Awesome bass 10/10. Decent battery life 7.5/10. Build and design 9/10. Worth the price 10/10. Overall 9/10

name: SPIDERMAN
title: 3 out of 5
content: I bought the product on 12th August .it was a great product . the sound quality was great the base was good I had little issues with the connectivity but not that much. But now after 6 months one side of the earphone is not working I don't know why but that's really frustrating as the company claims 1 year warranty . In my opinion the design is not that great and the build quality is just 3 out of 5.so if you are planning to buy this please take care of this and do not put it in your bag or something like that as it may get damaged

name: Amazon Customer
title: Guys product seems  good but not supported Redmi Note 7 and  Redmi Note 8
content: Guys, I did quite an investigation and found this product is not working with the latest Redmi phone. I have 2 phone s (Redmi Note 7 and Redmi Note 8) which unable to identify when we ON the Bluetooth, did troubleshooting but it's painful to return the headphone... Saved your time or change your mobile phone

name: Amazon Customer
title: Disappointing
content: I received it yesterday, as I wanted a wireless earphones. Quality of sound is just disappointing, so much of bass, it masks all the finer tunes. I am using Sound magic E10c, which in terms of sound quality way ahead of this product. I purchased it in 1199/- in sale (these sales are just selling gimmick,I knew BoAt is just a branding on chinese stuffs like micromax, they can sell their item only on e plateform, still I thought to give it a try.

name: vignesh
title: Surprised by the audio
content: I was actually in dilemma in buying this or MI. But took a chance. Surprisingly i didn't go wrong. As samsung phones has mild low sound output, even i these mobiles it sounded far excellent. Then i tried with MI, honor and other mobiles. It was outstanding. Bass punched my ears so good. High and mid tones was good but not awesome. Call quality is just fine. Overall best earphone for budgeted. Just go on, u will never get unpleasant.

name: Ranesh Kr Das
title: PLEASE DONT BUY
content: Really very very bitter experience to use it... when i bought it i thought no doubt it will be superb ... but after used its so pathetic to me... coz it hurts my ear for taking only more than 5 min ... & sound like so so.... not so good... now its very hurt coz i purchase this product for rs.1499/- & now its only 999/-. i bought this ghatia product wid more price for rs.500/-... i HATE boat brand....

name: Aditya
title: Cheap headphones not worth even 500.
content: Got it for 999 during a flash sale.. The left earphone stopped working properly within a week. Got it replaced.. Thanks to amazon.. The replacement is even worse. The battery dies down within 2 hrs of usage. And to top it off, the boat support is being handled by idiots who say that battery damage isn't covered under warranty. Even when i mentioned this is a new earphone hardly used for a week, the answer is same.. So just stay away from boat products however lucrative the deal might be.

name: Avinash
title: Style not suitable for workout sessions!
content: The earphone is fine. The wire is way too long which is annoying during worouts. The wire at the neck is way too thick. Seems like wearing a hairband around the neck. I do not like it for that reason. It will just keep shifting from one side to another and will distract you during workouts.. Dound quality is good. However, the bluetooth range is not so good. It starts to disconnectent while moving in the gym from one side another.

name: Richa
title: Good product but stops working very soon
content: This is my third bluetooth int his year. You can call this it's negative feature that they are so fragile.same problem occured everytime.it stopped charging. Or can call this it's positive feature that I come back to buy this everytime as no other bluetooth provides such good mic.

name: VISH29
title: Excellent product from boat
content: Review after 15 days of usage - The Bluetooth connectivity is awesome. Never faced any pairing issues and range is approximately 5 to 8m (from one bedroom to next) after that disconnected.. Sound quality is good, bass is OK.. Not that much in comparison with boat extra bass wired headphones.. Using it during travelling in trains buses.. Nl issues

name: kalidoss
title: Overwhelmed by the boat support
content: I simply love this earphones. Besides, I'm overwhelmed by the support that boat provides. It's been 10 months since I bought this earphones. I have had to claim warranty twice so far and boat replaced the earphones both the times. Yeah, I know that it's bad some defect popped up 2 times but come on, almost all the products are error prone. Boat mitigates this problem by providing extraordinary support. Also, reaching out to boat support was a cakewalk.

name: Girish R. Shrivas
title: Not That Loud But Got Superb Noise Cancellation & Battery Life
content: To be honest, I was expecting a great sound & bass quality just like we get in boAt Bass Superhead 225, but it is just okay.. I liked its amazing battery life and noise cancellation feature. I also feel that it should read out the numbers like 99999..... or the Caller's Name saved in the contacts for an incoming call rather than just 'Incoming call'

name: Anantha Subramanya
title: Excellent Bluetooth Wireless
content: For the price this is the best.. Excellent quality and battery life. On a single charge I can go anywhere between 6-8 Hours based on the usage.. CON: I wish there was a proper carrying case for this.

name: Pramod Navali
title: Ridiculous Bass
content: FOr the price of Rs: 1000, build quality is below par. Bass is too much pumped up. It irritates someone who listens to classical/Jazz. Make sure you have the equalizer adjusted to your needs.

name: Ghanshyam
title: Only  show piece
content: Don't purchase this product , it is only show piece , nothing is there , no bass quality. No vocal , no sound quality , if you are planning to purchase this one its mean you are wasting your hard earning money. If you will think why i am not returning this product because last time i purchased boat 225 that one not working properly so i returned that and in turn they gave a check of duschat bank which is not is my city so conclusion is don't waste money in low product

name: Kumar
title: It's good
content: Fits perfectly.i am using it for more than an hour and is still very comfortable.red colour looks nice.Music sound is pretty good.bass little high.when you play a song you can't hear a thing from your surroundings,though I've not tried it in crowded place.call quality is good.bluetooth range is not upto the mark.priced around 900 during GIS makes it more worthy.Overall i am happy with my purchase.

name: Srijoni
title: Amazing battery and charging!
content: Amazing fast charging. If you're not listening to music all the time, just let it be connected, receive calls when necessary, the battery will last all day.. Amazing and loud sound.. Not much bass.. Not much comfortable in ears, but the band is good.. Overall a very good purchase.

name: Ravi Ranjan
title: Reconsider your decision if you are excited about this product
content: Overall one of the worst product I have come across... This is the replacement product because 1st one was not working properly( voice level in 2nd side was too low). I was hoping that replacement product will be a good one but what?? I called my brother and can not listen to him, he is also not getting my voice. Tried so many calls but result was same.. Extremely disappointed with Amazon service and boAt product first time.. Going to post review on social media(Facebook, Twitter, Instagram etc) and on some websites as well.. A very very disappointing product. Will try to not buy anything from Amazon after this incident.. Goodbye Amazon.in

name: Krystal
title: Best in the range.
content: So I have been using them since 3 months.. Nice built and cancels noise upto good extreme.. Bass is fantastic.. As per some reviews they said that phone calls were not clear enough but I don't have any issue regarding that.. It's pretty much clear and audible.. 3 months down the lane and they're good to go.

name: Rakesh
title: Worst product
content: I had purchased this on 27 jan 2021 and it stopped worked on 13 feb 2021. Light not on after switch on. Worst product ever I had purchased. Don't purchase such product. You will pretend after purchase.

name: H Harsha Vardhan Thippani
title: Pathetic Customer service from BOAT
content: I bought the product by looking at the reviews and it has started giving me trouble after 3 months of usage. I tried contacting customer care for several times but it will never connect. After couple of months... somehow i found a way to return the product and get it replaced. it's been months that i have returned the product but no response from the team. Bonus is, customer care number always busy or never connect. Be sure before you buy

name: Awesome product
title: Good product
content: Excellent product. Sound quality is pretty good, and paired with my phone pretty quickly. Just now trying to connect with second device. Couldn't connect it yesterday.. Amazon delivered the package on time, and packing was also decent.. So overall, product is very good, light weight too. So you hardly feel the weight of it on the neck. Will post after use review in some days.

name: Munish Garg
title: earplugs and mic are not comfortable
content: Earphones are canal types which feels heavy on the ears. You can't keep them fitted inside your ear for long. Mic reception is not good, u have to hold it near mouth to function properly. The plastic quality is below average, the earcanals are also of very low quality material. catches too much dust.

name: Mugdha Desai
title: Disappointing
content: Sound quality and bass are below average. Sound clarity is affected as there is a constant mild disturbance when the earphones are plugged in. The microphone is absolutely useless as the other person can barely hear my voice.. I was actually a fan of the boAt wired headphones, I am extremely disappointed to receive such low quality at such a high price.

name: Zach
title: Not suitable for office calls.
content: I bought it to attend office calls from home, in the current COVID-19 situation.. Turn out that it is only good for music. Noise cancellation is not good for the voice calls when connected through laptop bluetooth.. For regular calls also it is not as efficient, probably this is what you get in 1500.

name: rahul
title: Driver error or what!!
content: Got this product yesterday.I was using 255f since 1 year so no doubt of sound quality I gone for this pro one.But each time when I lock my phone or exit from any app it automatically maximise the volume & Nirvana says “MAXIMUM VOLUME” which feels like bursting my ear drum!! Requested for replacement.May be it’s a manufacturing defect on it’s driver part & so the new one gonna replace will be like the same or what!!!

name: Raj Pandey
title: Noice cancellation/ music quality
content: Noice cancellation is too bad. Excet the caller voice you can here ever single voice.. The bass is too high. You can not play music for long time/high volume if you are music lover then choose another one.. Well rest of things is fine if you use this product for just talk and if you use it into the car or noice free place.

name: Psethi
title: Non-functioning product
content: The product stopped working within 4 months they won't connect to any device I've tried multiple devices and multiple fixes. Now they're absolutely unusable. The same thing happened to my boat rockerz 510. The customer support is hot garbage. The service center never picks up the phone and there is no online RMA procedure 0/10 would never buy from boat again. Don't let the price tag or features fool you it's all gonna break down in the end.

name: Deepanshu Srivastava
title: Not good for talking,poor Bluetooth voice connectivity
content: I am not satisfied with the product. It's earplugs are too subtle and piercing. Bluetooth connectivity also not very good and not suitable for considerable distance. Overall it's ok for listening to songs and watching OTT content but not for talking. Also long usage might cause irritation in ears. Amazon is not returning the product also,only replaceable, for the first time I am not satisfied with Amazon.

name: Kehar Singh
title: Don't buy if you are buying it for make phone calls purpose.
content: This product is good for listening music but when when you make a call. The voice breaks a lot and need to disconnect bluetooth to talk to someone.. Useless product to make phone calls.

name: Asmita
title: Genuinely saying don't purchase this headphones.
content: Previous version is better then this one.. These are the promblems with version 2:-. 1.Takes too much time to connect to phone.. 2.Battery drains too fast.. 3.There is a delay in response whenever we use buttons on headphones.. 4.It disconnects now and then, as this problem is with every wireless boat headphones.

name: Gurvinder
title: Product quality is compromised now
content: I bought this product for the second time. Gifted the first one to someone, it's build quality was awesome. The current product which I ordered is of poor build quality. Headphone wires are of low quality, charging point covers if awful.. Keeping the product with me as it has a 1-year warranty. Let's see how long it lasts.

name: M here 2 buy
title: Not great. But manageable
content: Really not worth the expectations they showcase. Battery runs out quicker than what I'd expect it to stay. Sound quality is not worth its competitors at its range. Calls via bluetooth has a bit of a lag and noise. But overall it is usable if u plan not to use it more than half an hour a day.

name: Amit Juyal
title: Not upto the price value.
content: Good but not best as per it's price value.. Starting phase is good and you will like it. But after sometime say 5 to 6 months it shows signs of defect like one earphone stops working, delays in connecting, late syncing. I have used 2 products of this within 1 year and both showed same defect i.e defect in one earphone after 4 to 5 months. Boats used improve it's quality.. Good earphones but not best rather go for other company I would say.

name: Amazon Customer
title: High sound during start up in Chinese language.
content: The sound quality is very poor. During starting voice from the set is very high that is unbearable. Built quality is also not upto the mark. Hence I am returning this product after 6 days of review.

name: biswajit nayak
title: There's no Post sale service.
content: Don't buy this product.After 8 months one side is not working. But the point is warranty claim service is very poor. I have Lodged complain on 1st august for defect in my boat rockerz 255 wireless Bluetooth earphone. As it was written in the mail to get any response from your side within 48hours.But till now I haven't received any mail regarding warranty claim. This is very sad to know that the well reputed brand is not paying attention to post sale facilities.

name: Sreedhar Dakshinamurthy
title: Wonderful Bluetooth Headset at this Price
content: Wonderful bluetooth headset for this price. Boat as usual rocks. Quality is good. Noise Cancellation may not be so fantastic but works well for calls in crowded places. Comfortable to wear for hours.

name: Donita D.
title: A purchase that is worth it
content: Sound quality is good and the noise is cancelled when playing audio. The bass is stronger than my regular wired earphones. It has magnetic ear pieces so that when it’s down around your neck it stays there. Battery lasts for 9 hours and recharged in 2 hours. Only pause/play, volume up/down buttons are there. Can not shuffle between songs. I don’t why, but it keeps beeping when viewing an image. Other than that, it’s a purchase worth it.

name: Anjali
title: Great Bluetooth headsets.
content: However i haven't used them properly. But one of my friend is using them. Perfect noise cancellation, great bass. Can be used for outdoors, while riding on bike. Mic is very sensitive. I think earbuds are having mic on each of them. Magnetic lock. Couldn't wait for the sale to buy it for 999. I bought it for 1499.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very bad
content: I have used several boAt products but this model is a huge disappointment. Once I returned and even the replacement is having the same issue. The issue is that irritating noise while switching from one track to another. 😡 1000 rupees waste. Not recommended people! Audio quality is 2 in the scale of 1 to 10.

name: BJ
title: Highly recommended
content: Highly recommended. These guys are so best and so professionals. I had my earphones not working so just lodged a service request, they arranged shipment to and fro and just replaced with a new earphones set. I was amazed already but this is epic🔥 Go Team Boat 💪

name: Pinaki Chakraborty
title: Value for Money
content: Build quality average. Plastic build and rubber finished product, not feels cheap.. Considering the price point, sound quality is awesome. Loud, crispy and vibrant. I purchased it in just Rs 999.. Battery backup is also good. 5-6 hrs average usage. BT range 25-30 ft.. Overall value for money product.

name: Aman
title: Just read once and u will get all🤟😎
content: Worth for money.... Connectivity is awesome... U gonna love the base.. its really too much... And most importantly battery life , many reviews says it's exhaust fast but I bet u can't increase the volume above 40% it's more than enough to listen a pleasurable song, and at this rate battery will last more than 6 hours for sure😎🤟🤟 go for it.. and don't forget to register your product for warranty claim.

name: Dhaval butani
title: Connectivity issue while using WIFI and Bluetooth simultaneously.
content: Overall product is good.. But DON'T BUY if you're using wifi as primary source for internet connectivity,as it hinders Bluetooth connectivity while taking WhatsApp calls.i checked the issue on 3 different phones(OnePlus 6t, iPhone 7,op 3t).i have returned product twice but the problem didn't resolve.But on the other side,when your cell phone is connected to your sim card internet connectivity,it works well.

name: SUHAS SHINDE
title: Amazing Product, Highly Recommend
content: Giving the review after 2 month of purchase.. Thanks to Amazon for fast courier.. The product is amazing.. Great voice quality.. best fitting in ear.. Nice quality.. Euff and stuff use.. I am using 2 phones it's useful to connect both of them and receive call from both of the phone.

name: Abhinav
title: Poor quality? I would say so.
content: This was a product suggested by many but with my comprehensive use of over two months I can say it's not a good product. The battery life on this thing is highly inconsistent even when I'm listening to music at same volume( It has happened quite a few times that I charge it to a 100 at night but it doesn't last more than an hour ). The second issue I want to point out is the Bluetooth connectivity. This device connected in a blink for a month or so, but then it used to suddenly disconnect from my device. After a month I started facing issues connecting to the device, sometimes ( even with full battery ) the device was not discoverable. As a whole I would not recommend this pair of wireless earphones.

name: Raj mohapatra
title: Mind blowing and work 100 %batter then other
content: Unreliable earphones with high cost. This earphones are unreliable, i bought it before 15 days meanwhile right side ear buds got cracked automatically and it got divided in two parts, and sound quality is also not that much good but ok, one more thing bass is not good as it is a boat earphones.. Guys,. Also for the proof i have attached pics. Please see and think before buying​ this unreliable product.

name: bhaskar mehra
title: EVERYTHING IS FINE BUT THE PRODUCT DIED FOR NO REASON
content: Its sound very inappropriate to say that but i was very happy with the product evrything the sound the noise cancellation the bluetooth connectivity evrything was fine . any one can go for the same for the reasonable price.. but but but. dont know the reason why its suddenly got dead . 1st time i got replaced the product but waited for somany days 15 - 20 days and get a new one and see again the same issue happened to me . dont know why after proper handling of the product again its dead. so if you are going to buy be prepared

name: Sujith Kumar Thathineni
title: Not having proper battery life...
content: Even though sound and other features are nice, the battery life sucks. It shows 80% in phone, and with in minutes it will be down to 20% and will turned off. Not sure if it is defective product or the model.. Adding to my earlier review, this ear phone is not getting detected in any new devices after it got connected to first phone. Such a pathetic experience, first with battery and now with Bluetooth.

name: Wasim Haidar
title: Amazing Sound Quality but Poor Durability
content: This rating is wholly based on the duration they serve. I mean I don't know what is the problem with boat headphone. I bought two-three headphone of it in one single year. But after a few months their one side stops working. Again and again we had to apply for the replacement which takes a long time if you are applying online and support store as well.

name: Deepak Anand
title: Below Average & a Trap Don't go for it.!!!
content: Over all it is a below average product.. -Very uncomfortable in my ear, painful after 15-20mins only.. -Sound quality is very low and not clear many a time.. - Bass is ZERO.. -As you can see in the picture, it is on charging so frequently.. - and the WORST part is; you are not allowed to return it even you want to replace it Amazon will replace it with the same product, why the hell I'll order the same product again with so many flaws.. Amazon atleast allow me to pick other product.

name: srikanth iyer
title: Don't use when jogging
content: Can't use when jogging. The base keeps flopping and sliding down your neck and tugging at the earphone which disturbs the sound experience. I know that these are not "sport" earphones, but even regular earphones are less of an issue in this, and having Bluetooth earphones that don't suit exercises defeats the purpose of using Bluetooth.

name: Ashu Saify
title: Worth the bucks
content: Packaging was good (thanks to Amazon), sound quality is good. But the amazing part is it's bass which is (to be honest) beyond expectation. I have also taken feedback from my friends while being on call about it's audio quality and noice cancellation, and it's all good, you won't receive any complaint with that. Battery backup will not disappoint you either, it can last upto 2-3 days with a fair usage of 4-5 hours a day. if you are looking for a value for money deal this is the best option to go with.

name: ARCHANA
title: A very good product
content: It's an excellent purchase offering full VFM. The cheaper headphones i used previously used to give me headache after a couple of hours, so was reluctant to try these at first. But have been using Boat Rockerz for a couple of months now and they are really good.. The only problem i faced is the battery % it shows on the cellphone. Like when i start the bluetooth device it would say that it has 80% battery remaining (which couldn't have been the case as the headphones were charged over a week ago and were used for at least 5-6 hours) ... and then after 20 mins the battery is zero.

name: Pratik Datta
title: No doubt it has a great bass , just like it, thnks
content: No doubt it has a great bass and to a great extent noise cancellation and decent sound clarity and mindblowing battery but the following dissapointed me though i tried a lot to adjust.. sound quality 10/10. noise cancellation 10/10. Bass quality 10/10. Overall 10/10. thanks

name: Alok
title: Got issues within 24hrs... Returned
content: Got this product from amazon but replacing it with 24hrs as bluetooth stop working..I had to keep my phone about half hand distance for Bluetooth to connect.. Sound quality and look n feel is awesome..hoping to get a replacement with a defect free product. Got a replaced one and returing that eithin 10 days as bluetooth stoped working

name: Sujit
title: Awesome boat
content: Purchased almost 2 months used it roughly.....as mentioned it is sweat proof.....sometimes the conection breaks when mobile is in pocket but it is nor regular... Good bass and sound quality.....connects to 2 devices no connectivity issues.....battery lasting for almost 10 hours.....happy with the device

name: Deepak
title: I need replacement. Customer Number Provided is Fake. FAKE REPLACEMENT WARRENTY. DONT BUY
content: Its been 4 months. It worked fine, but now there is some problem on left side ear phone. Cant hear anything from there.. Customer Number Provided is Also Fake. Trying to on that from 19th Apr till today cant reach anyone.. Now how do i request for change of headphone??

name: srikanth
title: All good except mic calling should shout
content: Pros-. Good to hear music, battery life is good for me I put 30min charge it lasts 1 to 1and half day with hearing 1hr music, 1hr calls, 3hr movie, bass is superb.. Cons-. Mic is not good for calls its like i should hold it like wired earphone. Magnet feature is good but colour near them gone by using it in just 1week looks odd. Its good to use when we stand but not when we laydown..

name: Anamika Verma
title: Happy Purchasing!
content: Received the package on 7th May.. It's been 4 days since use.. Pros:. •Instant Connectivity (switch it on & it's connected),. •appreciable Noise-cancellation (can cut all bad vibes around you),. •all about Bass <plug into Nirvana>. •6-7 hrs assured Play Time (it's ok if you forget about charging),. •Easy to use (In-line controls on your commands), Comfortable to ears (go on for hours),. •Hardy design & Lighweight.. Cons:. •Range might be a little bit problem.(=<7ft). •Packaging could be a lot better.. .... Anyways! It's all good at 999/- only.. (I mean right now, the price is 1,499/-). Hope my earphone works the same in future too!

name: Vaishant
title: Best Deal
content: A device worth buying.. Sound quality is excellent ( for phone calls actually it depends on network and for music it purely depends on media player with equaliser).. Battery is low for normal usage. (Reviewing after using for 2 days) It came up with 80% battery and after using for 4 hrs, it is showing 40%.

name: Spree
title: Amazing sound quality, perfect noise cancellation
content: Very happy with the sound quality, I am posting this review after using the headset for almost 3 weeks. I am very happy with the battery backup for the headset.. Its ligh weight and foldable. Easy to carry in bag without any fear of damage. There are 2 extra pieces of earbuds of different size to fit your ear.

name: Balram Bose
title: Good, perfect design ergonomically.
content: Quaint connection notification by disembodied Californian hippie. Love the way the wire leads thicken and have enough heft to sit on the neck loosely without danger of falling off.

name: KaustubhUpare
title: Good built quality as well as sound
content: I like the product but some how when i open the parcel its box seal is broken. May be some one return the package and they gave me that broken seal package that i dont like, Thats is why i am giving 3 star otherwise product is good.

name: STrivedi
title: Not efficient for the price
content: Have been using it for a month now, it is not efficient compared to its price, it hangs, it won’t connect sometimes. Not fast and efficient compared to the price charged

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worth buying according to price and quality
content: Good noise, good bass, sound quality, you can go for other product also, higher prices of Bluetooth earphones have a good sound quality and battery backup. I like this one , and according to price its worth.

name: Ashwin
title: Sound quality: Great! Build quality: Not so great.
content: Sound quality is great. The bass is especially very enjoyable. The vocals were not that good but if you like EDM, this neckband is excellent.. The build quality is what made me return these. The material felt like it was very cheap. The ear buds were made of metal and the eartips were also good silicone but I'm talking about the rest of the neckband. The rest of the neckband was made of cheap silicone.

name: Piyush
title: Sleek and worth the money
content: Handy and sleek design is what makes this bluetooth earphone amazing. With good sound quality, and noise cancellation, easy connectivity it has everything that is needed to make it worth the money. Go for it if you need a good blutooth earphone..

name: Gk
title: * MUST BUY  *
content: Very well balanced. Sound is really amazing , build quality is just wow , would last for long. Bass is punchi n sound is well balanced.. Last but not the least, if u looking headset for pubg then blindly go for it, there is actually no sound delay while paying pubg I triedany Bluetooth headphone even costlier but no one manage that which boat 255 did.. Compare to latest Realme bud wireless this one is far better as I have used realme buds wireless.. Trust me, just go for it

name: Sagar
title: Bass addicted fellows just go and buy
content: Amazing product ,. As per in pricing concern ,. ,. Who is addicted to find bass quality sound in music , just go and buy this , this is the perfect for you.. Whenever you listen music every bit of every tone you can listen and feel that sound .. Battery performance:. Battery performance is also good , as per my usage while playing music , calling it's better .. Just go and buy this product.

name: Vishal
title: Piece of Junk.
content: Piece of crap. Intially it was good . After 2 months one side became completely useless and the interesting part is it happened overnight. Complete piece of junk dont buy it if you care for your money . I got it for 899 and here I'm regretting if you're buying it for more than that you will regret more that i did.

name: LPs
title: Battery backup is the majour concern.
content: No doubt about sound quality. Majour concern is battery backup, it won't come 3-4 hrs. Magic stuff is battery level will be showing as 20% and we will get voice alert too but it will get turned off immediately. It's not auggestable for those who are looking for long battery life.

name: abhinav
content: All is good and worth the money. But accessories are not available which is a huge drawback and pushes me to the edge for not recommending it. Ear hooks are not available online and are easily lost. Why not but something with a pattern available over the counter. That's why 2 star, other wise a good buy

name: Abin Sebastian
title: Don't buy
content: It was good quality when i was start using, then audii quality decreased, then i have contacted support and they have informed me they will pickup product.. but they didn't do anything

name: Bhagawatheeshwar I.
title: Not happy with the product as well as return policy.
content: Gives lot of disturbance while driving.. Also the bluetooth range is not good.. Gets paused while listening to music... I want to return this product now but the window is closed. Also the retailer is not supportive.. I ordered 2 by mistake and wanted to return one.. I raised a request on the day I got the delivery. But did not get support from Amazon as well as the retailer.

name: Sandip
title: Not worth it...
content: Not worth it... This was my first purchase from mi, and its not worth all the hype that has been created in the market.. Overall build quality looked cheap, performance was average. The biggest con is connectivity and battery backup.. Go for slightly higher price range and look for a better brand.

name: Amazon customer
title: Fast charging with superb music experience
content: I thought of buying 255 but instead bought 255pro during sale. Got it at 1249. If you can spend extra 300 for 255pro then just go for it. 255 pro has fast charging as oppose to 255f which takes 3.5 hours to full charge .255pro takes around 40-50minutes to charge from 0 to 100. Happy with amazon delivery as well.

name: Amazon customer
title: Value for money at 899 ;)
content: Yet to use long term, but build quality and sound quality is good. Face some loss in connectivity when the band is covered. Good to watch movies and music on the go. Not sure how it well it functions when going for a run or exercising.

name: Archit gupta
title: Amazing Product!
content: Boat products always come onto the expectations! Boat rockerz 255 pass my expectations!...The product finish is very good and the look is of premium earphones...the sound quality is good if u are a bass lover!....also the noise cancellation is pretty good if we compare with other earphones....The fit of these earphones is very good and comfortable and do not hurt your ears even after prolonged use. I have also been out in light rains wearing these and i am quite impressed with its moisture wicking!....also the earphones are very light weight and don't even feel on your neck which is a must condition for Bluetooth earphones!....overall it is the best buy for 999/-.

name: prashant jariwala
title: Poor battery and noise cancellation
content: First impression is good. Sound quality is good. But the grip to hold earphones around your neck is quite light. Sometimes it gets fly away when you are driving. Battery life is good but after using it for 9 days i felt that when the battery is 60% and suddenly it gets down to 20 so fast and recently i was at 60% and suddenly the earphones gets off. After i got replacement, the new product seems to work very nice regarding the battery life but the noise cancellation was damn bad like you can't listen to the music while driving because the noise of the wind is too loud you cant even talk.. and hence i had to return the product..

name: Aarav Dixit
title: Worst Replacement warranty services. Quality is also not so good.
content: Good Product... But very disappointed with quality because just in 15 days one side of it stopped working... & I have tried to complaint but their complaint handling way is too bad... I've returned it 10 days back but I didn't receive any replacement yet.. So I am so disappointed...

name: MusicFeverByAshish
title: Quality issue
content: Did not like the product. Initially there was some issue so i got a replacement. Now its almost 6-7 months and one side earphone is not working. As it comes with 1 years warranty, will try to get it fixed as soon as the lockdown is over.

name: Oswald King
title: Nice but check out others too
content: After using it almost for a month, at times, hearing low battery notification kills me. Initially, I thought 6hrs of play time is enough for me. I will not mind recharging it every evening/night but in reality that does not happen..at least for me. Also, I don't push the earpieces very firmly for 100% noise cancellation. And then, I feel to increase volume and then the expression...uhh..already max :(. Overall, I liked it with above experiences time to time :|

name: ravi
title: Please please don't buy any Boat company products, please don't waste your money.
content: Guys please please don't buy any Boat company products if your product will not working and if you have a warranty then also they will not replace your products.. such a disappointing boat warranty service.. I lose my money because of those worst boat warranty services.. Please don't waste your money and don't trust boat services.

name: Iloveshopping
title: Go for it without a doubt!
content: Awesome product at this price..the sound quality is very nice, noise cancellation is very effective which makes it very useful for those who use it while travelling. The ear support curve is very comfortable, you can use it for hours without having any pain in the nearby area. Overall good product, stand very high amonst his peers.

name: Sac_kumar
title: Good gadget but not best
content: So after using it for more then 20 days I am writing this review ,first of all this gadget is cool in looking and working also ,. but it will not work as per the specified effective range to operate, i have paired it with asus zenfone laser 3 and few other devices ,facing the same problem.. Talking about the battery backup ,it is awesome ,charging time is very fast and long lasting .. The best part of this is that ,it is very comfortable to wear without any hassle or if you are a music lover that prefer to hear music most of the time than you can go with it, but you can check other option as well in the same price range .

name: mahir dalvani
title: Not worth it
content: No matter how many time you'll use this product , at the end of the year this will automatically stop working and you'll have to replace it and than after the replacement again the same problem will, either it will not charge properly or else left side of the earphones will stop working. These two are the major issues which Boat should solve .. I've seen the same issues in many boat users

name: Sheetal mittal
title: Poor quality
content: I will never suggest anyone to buy this product it has a very poor quality.. and the saddest thing is company gives extremely poor services..they don't even pick up call they don't even resolve your query.. don't even reply to your emails..service centres are sometimes open and sometimes close so even if the product is in one year warranty it is of no use it's a wastage of money to spend on this product.. HIGHLY UNSATISFIED..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Pathetic Headphones and Worst Customer Service
content: I had raised a ticket for a pair of headphones that were not working.. I was promised a pickup of the product as soon as lockdown opens but looks like they just passed time till my one year of warranty expired in July 2020.. I have to try to call them but stupid chatbot doesn't solve the purpose.. Any new ticket that I file is just closed without any proper reply.. I will post this review on Amazon.in also.

name: vishal
title: Hyped product , really well marketed
content: bluetooth connectivity distance is merely 3-4 metres, finishing of the product is decent and satisfactory. Not too comfortable in the ear. Plugging in the charging cable is not so smooth, you have to press really hard but you need to be careful too as you might ruin the socket. Noise cancellation level is really low and is a irritating for the person on the receivers end. Good product if you want to use it in places with less external noise and just want to listen to music and don want to spend a lot on a bluetooth earphone set.

name: Aswin
title: Not as expected. Using indoor is ok
content: The charging percentage is not showing clearly. Always it shows 80 % and suddenly drops to battery low. Microphone is very far away from the mouth and is in opposite direction. So that the surrounding noise is clearly heard than our voice to the other end person. Long time using tends to bring you ear pain as it is not ergonomically designed it gives us pain because of the ear buds. The wire width is larger than it appears on the photo and is not comfortable while run or working out. And the main disadvantage is it completely didn't allow outside noise while using hence it is not recommended during driving

name: Sameer
title: POOR, DISAPPOINTED
content: Sound Quality is Average. Noise cancellation is good but in my device there was Noise coming from the INSIDE. Bass quality is good. VERY uncomfortable. Also excessively large. Would highly prefer INFINITY (JBL) N150. Or Realme Wireless Buds( Bit expensive). If you are looking only for gymwear, prefer BOAT ROCKERZ 261

name: Amazonz Customerz
title: Good one though could have been better
content: Good to opt for if you want a low range bluetooth earphones with long lasting battery life. Sound Quality is good though not as good as other models of Boats earphones. There's little bass. Bluetooth connectivity is impressive. And battery lasts for almost a day of normal usage and 5-6 hours of heavy usage. Only drawback is its very poor noise cancellation. You can't use it to talk on calls. Person on other side will hear all other surrounding sounds except your voice.

name: hard gorakhia
title: Just review others who has already bought this product.
content: There are no issues at all of sound quality, noise cancellation and bass quality. But yeah it sometimes causes noises to interrupt the earphones due to which when we hear sounds, the bass gets changed. Also, there are some connectivity issues and the connectivity gets automatically cancelled due to malfunction. Positive points include long battery backup, sufficient distance for connectivity, etc..

name: Harmanpreet Singh
title: Got Used Product..
content: Ordered new not refurbished but i got used one... Noticed opening impressions on both top and bottom side openings of the packing box... white powder like dust on both eartips, can be seen from outside of the box.. not even opened the box yet.. I'll post my review after listening to it.

name: bijay
title: no bass, only stereo, earpainful sound quality, 3.5 hr battery,
content: its more of a stereo kind of headset.. no bass and battery backup is only 3.5 to 4 hr of continuous usage.. also, the battery Direct drops to 0 from 20% and switches off within 1 minute showing a low battery.. also the discount is highly shown inflated.. boat website themselves sell for 999, and amazon ka great indian festive sale price is 899.. i bought a oneplus headset lateron , lot better than this

name: yasin
title: awesome product
content: i bought itfor 999,I purchased it second time, gifted first one to brother. This is really good.. Sound quality is really good.. You can connect 2 devices at a time.I connect laptop and mobile both.when listening music on Lappy, if u get a call, it switches to mobile,this switch between device is not good but again in this price its awesome.. Battery stand by is 36 hours for me, and i have used it contiguously for 8 hours in one go. So Battery life is pretty awesome.. Comfortable on ear.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Overall well built. Easy connectivity. Light weight only led indicator needs to be visible
content: 4sep Amazing product very very useful while taking calls as there great connectivity and 10 meter usage is actually true very Happy with the product.. Happy with this product but the only challenge is that the led indicator is not visible clearly i think boat needs to work on that portion also it's very light weight easy connectivity having a good experience so far.

name: Joseph
title: Poor Warranty claiming.
content: Don’t buy this product. Sound and base quality is very bad. Product become faulty within 2-3 months itself. I registered a ticket with them. Delivery partner collected the product from my home. Thereafter no reply. Tried customer care number, updated in ticket there is no update from boat. I strongly recommend for not to buy this product who lives in Kerala especially. Because there is no service centre available for Boat

name: Vishesh Gupta
title: amazing
content: don't think too much, just go with it. 7 people i know have this including me and no complaints. the fit is good and the quality is also good. Charge time is 2-3 hours and you can use up to 6-7 hours. Boat is a trusted brand, just go with it

name: Jesan
title: Not a Commuters earphone at all
content: this product is not at all a commuters product marketed as a sports earphone this earphone lags when walking and phone in pant pocket that doesnt means i hold my phone in my hand everytime amd walk or keep it near my stomach side so the connection is not interaputed i bought boat rockerzz 255 then replaced it the one was also performing the same so i came to a conclusion this is not a commuters earphone.

name: Abhilasha
title: Rubbish
content: Rubbish , money waste, no noise cancellation, i purchased it keeping in mind abt so many positive reviews... i was so sure abt getting it but after a week or so, it started giving trouble.. 200rs mi earplugs are far faaaar better thn this. I wasted my money, you dont do it!! Dont go by the reviews, i am shocked how it got too many p+ reviews

name: Sundar Prasath
title: Works only for call and media
content: I'm writing this after using for 3 months. I mainly bought it for running and cycling to avoid wired earphones. Sound quality is great and you get what you have expected in aspects of sound. But, it works only for calls and media. There are plenty of other app like maps, etc., with voice navigator. If you are using it when driving with maps, it doesn't work. If you are going to listen just music, its good to go.

name: Meghna
title: Had issues with Bluetooth for both original and replacement order
content: Issue remains same with replacement order.. Bluetooth gets connected and disconnected within 1 sec. Could not even listen to songs or could call to check mic.. Some issue with the blue tooth

name: R V Badiger
title: Average
content: • Bluetooth 4.1 not that much effective, you can buy v5.0 . It will stop working when any obstacle under 10 meter. Not good when you are working and moving. Sound will stuck.. • bass is average. • It has only 5to6 hr play back. Not for people who use earphones 24×7 but boat rockers have more play back time.. • built quality not comfortable as compared to boat rockers 235v2. Poor looking and irritating.. • Boat rockers 235v2 may be good compared to 255.

name: Vijay kumar
title: Music lovers read this!! Before buying.
content: I used it for the past 10 days.. It is really good for watching movies and for phone calls. I love it for that.!. It's really bad for music. Not only this all other Bluetooth earphones in this range. I tried leaf sport 2, leaf collar 2(sounds similar to this one).. jbl 110bt (hate it can't tolerate its sound quality for 10 sec).. Now i am buying a wired for my music love and gaming lag in bt earphones.. If movies and phone calls are ur priority go for it best in this range alternate would be leaf collar 2. If music is ur love then try staying with wired ones though it seems old fashion.. Honestly guys even 500 rupees wired earphones are better then bt 2k headphones. Even mi basic sounds better while listening music 🎶.

name: Sam
title: Not worth the price
content: Massive compromise on sound quality for bluetooth connectivity. Also not that snappy of a connection as their over the ear counterpart Boat Rockerz.. The punchy bass of Sennheiser CX 180 is way better than this.

name: cartroad
title: diconnects automatically... choppy sound
content: I'll keep it brief. Don't buy this item unless you are ok with choppy interrupted music. Also, the ergonomics suck big time.. I hope amazon filters my review and you find this useful in avoiding your purchase. I decided to return the item within minutes of using it (and I'm usually quite patient). So you can now take a call.. Good luck... God Bless

name: Kunal
title: Worth buying compared to other bluetooth headphones
content: good quality light weight . Long battery backup. So far I have used this for more than 20 days, I have not faced any battery issues. If you use only to answer the call then u will get 8hrs approx backup and music backup may vary as per ur usage. Very good sound quality. This is my second Bluetooth headset

name: Harmit Patel
title: Best earphone if bought under 1500
content: I used this product for like 6 months. In between one side of its earphone stopped working but boat team is too responsive as they replaced this product with new one. Sound quality is good but if you want better quality would recommend for other product. Battery life is best even using for so much of time. But facing difficulties as there always some kind of issue happening again and again. Other then its fine if it is bought under sale.

name: Kajalupraity
title: AMAZING PRODUCT  ♡-I LOVE IT-♡
content: AMAZING earphones I love it sound quality bass quality everything thing is amazing. battery backup is also good ut take only 2 hrs. n 7 or 8 hrs. but mine is run for 2 3 days 😂because I don't use n the look🔥i ordered real green this one is lit🔥. NOTE:- if the battery is below the 60% u can only use it of the calls.. for listening music ,playing games etc. your battery should be more the 60%.. GO FOR IT NICE PRODUCT IN rs.1600/-

name: Purushotham B.
title: Value for money
content: It is good value for money. Connects very well and no issues. But sound quality is not that great to listen music. It does not comes close to samsung earphones. But sound quality for speaking is good.. If music is your priority, go for other earphone, else buy this.

name: Hariom S.
title: Read this review before buy
content: Sound quality good compare to price.. Best for zoom office meetings.. Connectivity also good but can be improve. I found difficulty with buds its little bit annoying when u plugged in the ear.. Cannot hold for long. Overall good product

name: Samir
title: Awesome bass and sound
content: I just received 255. Sound nd bass awesome. Bluetooth range 10 mtrs.. Bill is not complete.Bill half-torn: If there is a problem in it, then there will be no problem in replacing it?. If it is kept in a mobile room, then its range is 10-12 feet when you go out.If the mobile is kept out and we are out: its range is 30 ft.. Received 4 earbuds.. call ke time bat krne pr srrrr srrr ki awaj aa rhi h.. Aaj to mujhe Mila hai.ise kuch time use krne ke baad hi kuch or bta skuga.abhi tk to ye mstttt h. It's my third boat product. 1st boat car charger. 2nd boat headphone. Nd 3rd rockerz 255.

name: Ramesh
title: my review after 2 month usage
content: Hello i am ramesh. i am using these bluetooth for 2 months.. pros. 1.sound quality superb.. 2.bass is excellent.. 3.Best budget earphones. 4. charging is good. For full charge it will take 1.5 hours . It lasts for one 7 hours if we use continuously. cons. wires are large given it would be nice if wires are small. It is not good for running as well since there is shaking in wires, it feels little bit discomfort while running or jogging. It is the only con i have noticed.

name: Niranjan Dhongade
title: Good sound quality
content: The product is worth the money. It has a nice feel in-ear. It can connect to two devices at the same time. Overall very good. The five star is for their customer service as I received replacement without any hiccups.

name: umang shah
title: Waste of money on purchase of this product
content: You are not able to hear Sound from One side of the product after 2-3 months of purchase. Waste of money

name: Tanmay Srivastava
title: These are good but could have been better.
content: Too much bass and therefore less treble on default settings.. However the same could be adjusted from (external) phones/ laptops equalizer.. Looks good and sporty. The red colour of the wire connecting the buds is soothing and looks good to the eye but the red colour on the actual buds is kind of metallic red which is okish.. Takes too long to charge from zero to full, couple hours actually. The battery lasts 5-6 hours which which is okay.

name: Adnan m.
title: cheap and best
content: got this wireless once when the wire once were destroyed ...... the product design is amazing the quality is good better than expected fits perfectly and the battery back up comes up to around 12 hours with full use ....so i would recommend this as you can charge and use it at the same time rather than putting it in the box and waiting till it gets recharged

name: Aryan Dinkar
title: Poor Product even Poor Customer Care
content: Don't buy this product as it is a total waste of money. Also it's cheaply made such that it will stop working in a year and don't even considering asking them about warranty coz they never listen. I HAVE MAILED BOAT ROCKERZ as well in hopes of claiming the warranty but they won't reply. And on the top of that there is absolutely no way to reach them, not on Amazon as well.

name: jeshy f.
title: Bluetooth stopped connecting with any device within 10 days
content: The product was working fine for 10 days. After that it stopped connecting to any device. Tried charging for a full day, but it was still not connecting.. Boat customer service was superb. They came and took the device immediately within 24 hours of regsietring the compalint. It took them 14 days to fix the complaint and they have send it back. Need to check after recieving.

name: Kalahasthy Siva Shankar
title: So nice and budget friendly
content: Actually I used it almost for 3 months where I feel it's better Time to review. Battery back is awesome as mentioned. Bass is super. Sound quality is good. Noise cancellation is good. It's also can be wearable when jogging or at the time of exercise there is no tension of falling from ears which I feel so better. For these reasons I'm so satisfied with the product and cost. I bought it for Rs 1500/-

name: Saraswat Sharma
title: Not at all worth buying
content: This device is just too poor as it won't even last long. One side Gets damaged too fast and easily whereas within the next fortnight the other side also develops faulty issues which look like this device has been planned or programmed to get damaged one side after another within a very few months after its usage. Complete waste of money and very poorly created tech. Try spending on some other device rather than this piece of garbage.

name: Manish khichar
title: Bass and its range is very good it is stay connected upto 10 to 11 meters
content: I think in this price point . boAt rockerz 255 is one of the best bluetooth earphones in India. I bought it in only 979 rs. Bass is good and voice is also loud . so overall this is a good product from boAt . And thankss amazon for giving me this awesome product only within three days . I am happy with this delivery undoubtedly . If your budget is under 1000 you will go for it . Thank u

name: MTM
title: Awesome
content: Excellent product. I got it in lightning deal for 899. Worth at that price. Even it is worth to buy at 999. Sound quality is awesome. Bass is too good. Bluetooth connectivity is fast and no issue. I connected it to 2 devices simultaneously.

name: Drgjsurg
title: Never buy
content: Bought 2 sets after seeing reviews here...1.stopped working within 1 week,the next one stopped working in around 1.5 months...worst purchase from amazon. Gave 1 star bcos i couldn't find a lesser rating

name: Himanshu Kumar
title: 2 days thought about boat rockerz 255 Bluetooth earphones
content: I really did expected something good from this earphones. The sound quality is neutral, Bluetooth range is not so good(maybe 6 meters at home, 9 meters outdoors) and latency is observable(when you notice that is(^o^), battery life is decent as it is new (will write once it's a few months old) and please don't fall for the 2 device connecting at same time. It's so poorly engineered that if u connect to 2 device after 5 mins of work (:-P) it flickers and sometimes disconnects. The build looks promising but the ear hook is specifically made for people with long ears ( it hurts my ears during prolonged use).

name: Shiva kumar
title: Stopped working in 6 months. Poor noise cancellation and durability
content: Writing this review after using it for 11 months. Noise cancelling is very poor. One can hear whats os happening around more clearly. Durabilty is strong disadvantage. It is stopped working in less 6 months. Only 1 ear phone is working after 6 months. Overall waste of money for 6 month usage

name: shashidhar
title: Not a good buy
content: Not a good product at all. Mic don’t work well picks up entire surround noise . Battery life is sick hardly gives 3-4 hrs of play time.. I opted for a exchange of the product, it didn’t get delivered at all. After following up on exchange for a week. Amazon customer service says that it is damaged in transit after the repeated followup, the replacement was still in cargo yard and none delivered it and updated as they wanted.

name: Amol J.
title: Not worth for money
content: The earbuds are not at all good , in quality as well as it will not fit in your ear properly.. Battery life is good and sound quality is below average.. There are better options available in the market in terms of technology and value for money.. I bought it just because Indian company making a product and and the in the add display it was appearing quality product.. I bought this product @1999 INR , and after week i saw someone is selling it @1499 INR .. But I'm not a kind of buyer to return the product just for money difference.

name: vishal khamkar
title: Very very good n cool product......
content: First of all thank you for selling good products.. I ordered this product for gift purpose, but received in damage condition (charging section cover was damaged, charging kit not avaliable within box).. Same we replace this, next day i received this replacement with good condition,. sound quality Amazing......🆒. look wise 💯% cool.. battery back also good🔋4.5 to 5 hours. Value of money....🙏

name: Amazon Customer
title: Background Noise cancellation not good
content: Got the earphones 3 days back. As with other boAt earphones the sound quality including bass is really good, but the background noise cancellation is not good. When i am talking on phone, the quality of sound heard by the person on the other side is not good with lot of background noise from my side, which doesnot happen with wired earphones or talking without earphones. Battery backup till now is good. No other issues.

name: Shyam
title: Please replace my product.
content: Very bad Bluetooth please don't by this type of product..boat is very bad company. After 3 month battery got bloated , getting charging issue and battery will drain after 2 hr . please don't by. service centers not accepting this product they clearly refused to take this product and I already mailed to company for replace but I haven't get any reply from company.

name: Shubham Deshpande
content: Everything thing is the best ... Sound quality ,bass, micro phone etc etc ... But the main problem is that after using 6/7 months left side of bud stopped working and the exact same thing happened with my sisters earphones , thats why I have decided to write review ... When we pay 1500 we expect at least we can use the same for a year and the problem is warranty they provide is only for only 6 months ... So take decision accordingly 🤣. Otherwise these were one of the best earphones I have ... Something I still use my old earphones and the right bud is giving his 100%🤣🤣

name: Arvind Kadam
title: *Product quality dropped drastically. Very much disappointed*
content: *Product quality dropped drastically. Very much disappointed*. Product quality is very poor.. The curve near the neck is very straight and not as mentioned in the picture online. The quality of income and outgoing voice calls is pathetic. This isy third order and experience of last two same products was awesome but nowadays they dropped the quality drastically. When we plug in the welcome sound now says "you now connected to boAt rockerz" while on my earlier devices it clearly says "you now connected to boAt rockerz 255" somewhat it looks duplicate product.

name: Rohit
title: Read all review
content: If you but this only for bass boosted sound,. Then thus is a good choice.. But all-over that's not a Worth of money.. Why???👇👇. -Built quality is very poor.. -so lenthy wires.. -connectivity issues on very short range.. -mic quality is very poor.. -all over you should spend 500 more and buy a JBL or any other bot.

name: VAIBHAV
title: Best wireless headsets
content: The headset is awesome. sound quality of headset is good and bass is also good . noise cancellation is great but when i connect with two devices simultaneously i notice a little problems. battery backup is 5 to 7 on full charge. it has also fast charging (20min = 4 hours) support but i recommend use after full charge(it take 1:45 hours) for better battery life. overall the product is good!

name: sravanthi
title: Not setting in ears
content: Sound quality is good, but it is not setting in ears, always falling down, I have tried to cancel the product but Amazon has replaced me with another one. What's the use in replacement, when it is not setting in ears. U should have given an option to choose headset of another company. I'm dissatisfied with this. If you have any possibility at least please allow me to cancel this and buy earphones of another company

name: Krishna prasad
title: Awesome product, usb rubber cover got damged.
content: Sound from this product is awesome. It has a good buit quality, but when we came to the usb charging port cover it came to tear by regular use. My usb cover starts tearing off from it (may be it was due to my rough usage). Anyway they are claiming it as sports headset,though sport usages will not be a calm one so i noted it here. Otherwise it is good.

name: Rishab Sharma
title: Great for outdoors & indoors, but not for calls.
content: Noise cancellation herein refers to outside noise being cancelled to the one who's hearing. While being on a call, if you try to speak something, your voice would be 20% & the outside voice would be 80%. Solution to this is taking the mic close to your mouth as you speak.. Otherwise, sound quality is 10/10.

name: Dipesh Kumar prajapati
title: I suggest you buy it good quality
content: I really love it sound's quality I'm using it since 2 week. and I'm facing an issue on call. • with my device. Infinix hot 8 call audio not coming. • another device Samsung galaxy s 20 ultra. No problem found.. I'm really disappointed why it's going on with me. I purchased it for using with infinix hot 8. 😦😦😦😦

name: Chanderpal Singh Rathore
title: Full review after long use
content: Worst earphones Ever bought.. 1. So much noise to another person if using for call. 2. Pain in ear so can't use for long. 3. Connectivity is too poor even cell in pocket and getting drops.. 4. Overall don't go for it if you love comfort.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Dont buy this cheap trash
content: I bought this on 24/04/2019... Ones side of it stopped working since 28th June... I requested for replacement... They picked up my product on 4th July... Till now (06/08/2019) I didnt get repalced product.... They have customer care no. vch they never lift.. In 100 attempts they answered my call only once... and asked about ticket no. I provided my complaint token no....Then they siad due to technical problem status is not showing...then they cut my call without any further information... I lost Rs. 1700... I urge everyone dont buy this kind of trash from such kind of cheaters...

name: Amit Usakoyal
title: Poor quality product
content: Poor quality product though the sound is good but the product quality is very bad. Poor durability. Last year I had purchased this product and after 6 month left ear speaker has stopped working and after 3 month right side also stopped. Providing 1 year warranty and thia product does not work even for 1 year

name: Wasim Khan
title: Low price. connect appx 3-4 meters but sound quality degraded in 4 months.
content: HI Have purchased in Dec2019. the quality is like normal headphone with batter back upto 3-6hrs (depends calls/musics) but now after 5 months the sound output is 10% (not able to hear). submitted request under warranty. and secondly on boatrockerz warranty request the this model is not listed to submit the claim.. hope they will support....

name: SIVASURIYAN ALAGARSAMY
title: Awesome
content: Make sure your device volume is below 10%,before you connect to this sh* ,if not it blown up your👂.bass,bass,bass,bass,bass. Go for it. Good noise isolation. Before I'm using boat rockerz400. Little bit lack of treble compare to boat rockerz400. But bass is same.

name: kishan
title: Average quality
content: - connecting the device is very tedious, sometimes it won't connect until you power off and power on again.. - static noise plays whenever any sound is played.. - poor noise cancellation mic, the other person can't hear you properly.

name: Srinu potluri
title: Don’t buy for iPhone 6
content: Bluetooth range is very low when compare with my Samsung Mono headset...I used for iPhone 6 but it’s not compatible with that in distance..it’s work for me within the room only. But other Mivi bluetooth earphones workin well...I feel it’s waste of money for IPhone 6 users...bcoz I used it only on iphone6

name: Vv
title: Another awesome creation by Boat!
content: Its a brilliant earphone! The audio is crisp, clear with thumping bass. Fits well in the neck and gets connected in a sec too. The Neon color adds some style to it. It came in a nice box with accessories and manuals. Boat never disappoints!

name: Harsh Vardhan Sharma
title: Not so good
content: The sound quality is good. But the biggest problem is when u r on phone call it catches background voice on over side.

name: Sameer MI Ahmed
title: Great User Experience
content: Quality is great, the cord is longer than normal and headphones have held up for months of hard use at gym, running etc. with no damage whatsoever. Sound is warm and full, the highs are not annoying and the bass isn't overemphasized which allows you to listen to them over extended periods of time. Probably the best sounding pair of in ear headphones I've ever owned

name: vinoth
title: No bass, no precision, loud sound
content: I bought this product so that it is mainly for good base and sound quality but it is not satisfied when I am going for ....... I was using boult loop in ear deep bass comparison below.. 1. Bolt has better bass effect and sound precision which boat does not... 2. Bass quality is low and zero only treble is high and loud sound.. 3. Nothing for ₹1000 when it has been compared to others in this prize range.

name: Anushka hazra
title: Honest review 🌚
content: It's a good purchase! ❤. I have purchased boat 225 and it is going good till now and 2 years have passed of purchasing that product... I also have purchased boat rockerz 400 and it's also running good till now and it has been 2.5 yrs now!. So i am expecting this kind of durability from this 😋.. And my expectation has been matched with this! 😊. And this ocean blue colour is superb❤💫

name: HarishChandMaurya
title: Original range 4 meter. Hook type design in buds cause pain in ear musles.
content: This earphone is good in sound & bass.. But problem with this earphone is thier range is. Very very very low I try this approx after 2.5 to 3 meter thier sound quality get cancelling.. And after 4 meter Bluetooth disconnected from phone.. 2nd problem is due thier hook type design in buds after 1hour using earphone Continously cause pain in ear muscles, so i need to take 10 minutes break from buds.

name: Dhruv
title: Above avg product
content: It is above average product, little uncomfortable also to plug in ears due to its design. But it does it’s job. Am using it to watch TV using fire stick.

name: Sandip
title: Please don't buy
content: These wireless earphones have a FAULTY DESIGN. I felt uncomfortable after using them for just 2 minutes. I have used many different brands in the past, but never have I ever encountered such a faulty In-Ear design.. Sound & Noise cancellation is good, and being a good brand I hope that it lasts longer.. But its faulty design stops me from using it.. Please go for higher priced earphones and not this one.

name: Charles Vijay
title: Seems I received refurbished one, The quality of sound and the parts are not as in the original
content: The original boat-rockers 255 I have experienced from my friend was good. But the received item I received is different from the original. The USB charging port cover is not fixing properly and it has a sharp projection than makes discomfort while wearing. But the original one has a sap fit design and has no projection after insertions. I have uploaded 2 photos of the received item and the original for your ready reference. The sound quality also not as good as in the original. I request for a replacement providing a good one.

name: Raghunathsingh
title: When you supply the product available service centre.
content: I bought product from Amazon use 20 day after 20 day bluetooth auto disconnected from my Mobile more try but not connected then call Amazon customer care and say product replacement time over so we have could not change contact boat rockers care then contact boat rockers care no service center available in sri nagar very bad product waste my money.

name: Vishkha Shinde
title: Nice
content: Nice product from boat I am using this for a year but its sound quality is good after 1 year also. It worth buying. Its cable is slightly bend after a year and charging cover is broken but it doesn't affect sound quality. I have seen it's playback time is decreased by 1.5 hrs but still it's good deal to buy this

name: alvina
title: Best
content: I love it great sound quality and colour is amazing 👍. I was quite skeptical to buy it before because I never purchased electronic stuff online but after I recieved the product every penny was worth it

name: Sarang Kimmatkar
title: Got quick replacement of product by "Boat"
content: After use of 1 month I faced problem, but after contacting to "Boat", got quick replacement of product without any hustle. Thanks to pickup and drop warranty replacement proviflded by "Boat".

name: Satyam
title: Very bad, disappointed
content: Not good. One side earpiece stop working. Claimed warranty but it again stop working. Very bad. Disappointing quality. And after warranty the noise cancellation stop working another person on call always complaint about background noise. Go for any other brand

name: Pooja
title: Good sound quality & noise cancellation.
content: I'm writing this review after using the earphones for certain days. The sound quality is really good, you are able to hear the music & every details of it very clearly. Also it is of great use while on call, the sound is very clear. Noise cancellation of the earphones is fairly good. Overall a good product.

name: srikanth
title: Sound quality is very good and its connectivity is good but the spares as a problem
content: Issue with this product is we do not get an extra ear support. As these are only given 2 of them and are very tent to loos them as there are not so thigh fix to the head phones. Even the same is not available to buy as an option to buy as a spares

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worth every rupee
content: It's very comfortable in the ear. The sound quality is good..but the bass is pretty good. Ideal for jogging.but sometimes the band my get in the way. When you are wearing it on your neck it is super long and doesn't look that great. The magnets are fine, not super strong but not bad at all.the best part is the ear support which helps a lot cuz generally they never stay in my ear but now it never falls.

name: Mohamed Jamal
title: I give 5 star.
content: I give 5 star rating because the sound quality is so Cristal clear and the bass is extraordinary. The battery backup is suberb. The neck band is light weight, so you won't feel and the magnetic lock is so useful, so it won't drop from your neck. You have 1 year warranty so no need to worry expect physicall damage.. My personal experience my headset not working one side after 8 month usage. I got replacement under warranty within 15 days. So customer service is also good.

name: Akriti 07
title: Price justified with some minor glitches
content: The headphones are justified for the price that they are available. I am using these since 15 days now and haven't noticed any major drawback, except that the Bluetooth keeps disconnecting if you are using it while on bike. Some modulations are noticed then. Also, after connecting to a laptop if tried to connect to the cellphone it does not auto connect. Otherwise and sound quality is good for a normal usage. Battery life is also decent around 4-5 hours of constant use.

name: sanket s.
title: Be Careful of Seller Sendin A Used Product.
content: Ive been a boat rockerz fan for past few yrs now. This was my third boat rockerz. But was disappointed totally when i opened the delivery box. The item seal was already open. When i removed the headphone i saw it full of dirt and was turned brown wid this i knew it was a used one. Third there were no extra earbuds included and boat never does it. I recommend dis headphone but if d seal is broken return it directly

name: Sri
title: Bad Product
content: After reading many positive reviews i bought it. Within 2 Months of use i started getting connectivity issues when song is playing suddenly it will get disconnect. I Checked with other phones and Laptop found out headset is the problem claimed warranty. They will provide you a phone number but it wnt work everything is in email though it took 15 days to get my replaced product which i got now i was happy that i got replaced but it didnt last for 10 min too i felt too bad when my replaced product stopped working in 2nd song itself worst worst worst product. Who will give faulty product for replacement better go for some other option waste of money ......

name: Lakshman Selva
title: Quality of the sound is really awesome. But the company also must look at it's build quality.
content: Well i used boat products before they are good as they were before.. pros - base is good , water resistant ( here doscription says IPx4 but my earphone box says IPx5, and that is even better , you should update your product description. ) , Magnet lock , design .. Con - cable is a bit long. As it has control box both side and a little hard cable at back, the remaining cable shouldn't be this long.. Above all its a good product. Recommend to all the people who wants to buy a cheap but best wireless earphone.. 5 people found this helpful

name: aadit
title: Mediocre, avoid buying these.
content: Headphones have servere connectivity issues I use the Redmi note 4, the rockerz start having disturbance and voice starts breaking as soon as I keep my phone inside the pocket. Returned the product once 2nd one also had the same issue.. Way of keeping them on the neck with magnet is great.. The noise cancellation is pretty good but at the same time is dangerous, it blocks out traffic noise totally.. Audio is average, artificial bass dominates everything. Audio quality lacks basic details.. Call quality was decent till the time there was no Bluetooth connection issues.. Switched to tagg inferno, audio quality is much much better, connectivity problems are close to absent.

name: Gupta Devatha
title: Good for music
content: product is good as music lovers but for calling purpose not that much good. connectivity rang is not good.company saying battery backup is 6h but not more then 4h

name: Hassan
title: Good quality product
content: Valo head phone kharap na akta good quality product .bt amr j ta experience,,,, ai headphone a majhe majhe amr theke onno loker ba garir horn ba music sound besi sunte Pai jar stathe Ami kotha boli.... Abr Ami jokhn jore bike chalai ba bus a kothai jai tokhn jar stathe kotha boli majhe majhe bole Ami kno sound I sunte pacchina hawa r amr kotha thik thak sunte Pai . A ki a?? Mukher kache mic. nia kotha Bolte hoi aktu dure thakle kotha sunte pacchina tai bole.. To bolbo ai problem ta Jodi thik kora jeto to aktu update kora jeto jate all Time j kotha bolbe tar kotha tai sudhu Sona jabe onno karo kotha ba sound Sona jabena. Tahole valo hoto

name: Anil
title: Please don't buy
content: Earphones stopped working in just 2 months and there's no way to contact Manufacturer for claiming warranty. You'll have a number where you'll speak with IVR automated call and it will send you an url which will throw you an error while raising compliant. The same thing applies to email support as well. They will send that URL in email reply. I've sent multiple emails till now, still not received any reply from them. BOAT is worst manufacturer and weird support. This is happening for the 2nd time for me

name: Real Reviews
title: Waste of money
content: Writing reveiw after 3 months of use. 1.Battery back up is not good ( hardly works for 2-3 hrs). 2.Price is high. 3.volume buttons will change the audio or video. 4.not comfortable on ears as well as on neck

name: Apurv P.
title: Right side of the earphone not working
content: The rigt side of the earphone just does not give any sound output . Suddenly the right side stopped working and even after multiple restarts it just does not work . Everything happening on the 22nd day of delivery (now i can't retrurn) and the usage has been for not more than 10 days for 2-3 hours each . Horrible product and a complete waste of money .

name: Himanshu
title: 6 Months report - Battery issue
content: I purchased these earphones on 6 February 2019. It worked great until now. I used it regularly and it gave me 8-10 hours of battery life.
