Since the last 3-4 days, I am facing the charging issue. It is getting discharged only after 30-45 minutes of playing even though I charge it for more than 1 hour.. Update: I reported a complaint with Boat and got a replacement product after around 15 days. The new products stopped charging after around 15 days. Very unreliable and disappointing. I have sent them an email regarding this and still waiting to hear.

name: Purnima Mishra
title: Defective peice
content: I can't believe that amazon is selling such defective products.. I trust boat for its product quality and have been using boat earphones since 3 years.. This is the first time i have received such product. One of the earpeice is not working... And even the battery backup is worst.. It's battery drained from 80% to 0% in just 30 min... I requested a return and then even the return was cancelled ... don't know why..

name: Pralay Haldar
title: Had to return it the very next day
content: I had to return the product the very next day I got it, as it didn't pair with any of my devices. It was frustrating tbh. I would order a similar boat product soon as I have been using boat Stone speaker and earphones for the last 3-4 years and the quality of the products is brilliant as always. Hope to get functional earphones this time around. *Fingers crossed*

name: Neelam Tripathi
title: Average quality
content: This is neither good nor bad type product. Ok ok kind of bluetooth headset.. Sound: Good. Bluetooth: poor. Battery: Good backup but battery level indicator is poor. It's shows 80% but goes shutdown all of the suden.

name: S K
title: Worth
content: Good one to buy at this cost.. When the battery level is ~20%, Bluetooth connectivity becomes issue. But, battery lasts long and so I faced this issue only twice in past 4 months of usage.. Bass is reasonable.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good buy
content: We're using this product for a month now. It's really good. I was using Samsung level U but the wire snapped. This one is pocket friendly, flexible and worth buying. I went by Amazon choice and for the first month I'm really happy. Hopefully it works like this for a long time.

name: RohanH5
title: 🔥🔥Best Blutooth Earphone at this Price Range🔥🔥👍
content: Literally best blutooth earphone under this price range i got this for 999 only. The sound quality was awsom, Base is too good, pairing with mobile is also very easy, call quality is also very nice & works upto 30 feets from smartphone noice cancellation is ok, the earlock is also soft and can be removable. In my openion just go for it if you are getting it under 1000👍🔥🔥

name: Mitul
title: Got duplicate product in replacement.
content: Firstly i ordered this product and sound quality was pretty good.. But because of some issues (sound disturbance) I replaced this product and in replacement i think i've got duplicate product.. I just applied to return this product.. 1)Shipping box is damaged. 2)product is damaged too (button for lower the volume is always pressed) (clearly visible in image). 3) sound quality is too poor.

name: Amazon Customer
title: A Dissappointed long time Amazon customer.
content: The earphone's rubber hooks fall of easily.. Bluetooth stops connecting sometimes when I connect my phone and keep it in my pant pocket.. Right side speaker has stopped working completely.. The one star is also due to Amazon's service. My product is within the one year warranty period. However, to claim this warranty, I have to submit the Invoice which is not visible when I try to access it through the Amazon app, website or messages.. Wehn I click on 'view/print invoice', I get a message that says it is rush hour and traffic is piling up. Plz try again later..

name: Vish
title: Value for money !!!
content: Packaging was good. This is my second bluetooth eargear purchase. First was many years ago and was always reluctant to buy them again, but this one proves to be best buy. Sound quality is upto the mark for the price paid. It was actually more than what i have expected. Thanks Amazon for getting this product. Thanks again.

name: Pritam M.
title: Good product for below Rs. 1000
content: I am using this headphone for last 1 month. Really a good product in this price range. I have got this in 1000 rs in a sale. This headphone has good build quality and good quality sound. Only one problem is the mic. That dont have good range.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Product is good but after sales service is pathetic
content: the sound signature and product quality is above par in this price range, though the cable length is bit long. but if there is any issue and product is to be serviced during warranty period, then its a really different story altogether.. its been more than a month and i am yet to receive my serviced/replaced unit and i dont have any way to get any further update to my ticket and my unit. its strange that the customer care number and support email ids are there, but those are not monitored well it seems.

name: Omkar
title: Good but expensive.
content: The quality of the product is good. But I’m buying this product in May 2020’and at this point the product feels a little to expensive for 1500 bucks. If they could lower the price to 1k , so that the product justifies the price and the competition going around.

name: Chadan behera
title: Wow Aswome
content: I useing this earphones along 3 month.i could except this kind of profomance. No lack No issue face during useing.Sound quality is awsome but vocal sound nedded improve.Bass is outstanding and clear is awsome.Noise cancellation is good but needed more imrove. Overall it is the best neckband for beginners. I must satisfy with this earphone and i gave a gift to my friend. 😍😍😍😍

name: Amazon Customer
title: Product at its best and quality.
content: Bought it at 899.. Sound quality is good.. More focus is on Bass. You will feel bass.. It is best at this cheap prize.. Bluetooth connection is good. Wire is long so that allow to use while any activity.. For those who wants good product at its best prize can buy.

name: Richa Diwakar
title: Excellent but producing them in india would have been better
content: Using this headphone for the past 15 days. Sound, Noise cancellations, battery life, and build quality is OK. As they are designed and marketed by an Indian company which produces other models of these headphones in india they should consider shifting the manufacturing altogether back to India from china. This will certainly improve the image of the brand as they will stand out from other Chinese built products.

name: Delson D
title: For this price I think its good not the best
content: Sound quality is good but lacks noise cancellation. I have used it before too, faced issue in Bluetooth connectivity after sometime while connecting to new device. So overall i will rate it 3.5 out of 5

name: Himanshu Ghanekar
title: Not worth spending 1500  - Pathetic Customer Service
content: Hi,. Bought this product some time back. Worked normally for 3 months, and then suddenly stopped charging.. Raised a complaint against the product for a replacement as it was still under warranty, boat guys picked up the shipment for return but never provided the replacement item.. Pathetic Customer service. I have been trying to call them for a week now. Contact number is either switched off or they are on leave.

name: Falah
title: Good Product But Malfunctioning after 1 or 2 months
content: It was a nice product. Good Sound Quality and all. but Started malfunctioning when calling. Sounds from d caller get distorted and cant understand at all.. It still working good in otherwise like Audio Video playing from phone... I hav just registered a compalint in d support site (Tocket No : 421323). Hope it will get resolved soon and I can make it a 5 star then... Update : Product got replaced and new one works up to expectations.. thanks for the support..

name: Amar
title: Very good product
content: Sound quality is awesome however noise cancellation needs some work. Blietooth connectivity is also seamless. Battery life is good. Using since last 15 days now. No fuss about carying your phone around when you are moving 20-25 feed

name: Monika Patel
title: Abruptly stopped working
content: This is the 3rd time I have purchased this. The earlier 2 are working fine, that were purchased many months back. However, the 3rd one has stopped charging within 3 weeks of the purchase and now I am unable to find any option for return/refund/replacement.

name: Ashish Patel
title: Overall Good
content: Pros - Its Great product with great Sound Quality, Bluetooth Connectivity.. Cons - Noise cancellation is worst, Other person on call get every single sound of surrounding except the person who is speaking :),. And After use of 6-7 month Sided earphone then is complained and get it replaced but again after use of 3-4 months same issue reoccurred. So you can assume your earphone has got life until it has warranty.

name: Amazon Customer
title: one side not working
content: i am ordered 29 September 2019,still know a day (22-05-2020) its working proper,but today its one side not working,. my frnd also buy this same product but that boat also after 4 month not working one side. and no customer care service provide for that product. one year warranty are fake commitment,. dont buy this product,i am suggested for realme headset working and looking so good.. but anyway amazon side good support

name: Madhur Tripathi
title: Battery Life issue
content: Using this headphones from 5-6 days and found below issues.. 1. Battery life is too poor, while using it shows 100% battery but while using battery drained out in 15-20 minutes. 2. Automatically disconnection of headphone while connected with phone.. 3. Ears are paining while using the headphones 1 hour or so.. 4. Battery discharge very quickly.. 5. While plugin to charge when its 0%, it started showing 100% charged in 15 minutes, that's a CRAP.. I have now returned the product back to the seller and call for a replacement. So, its better to be move towards SONY, JBL or Sennheiser Headphones.

name: Vishal E
title: No noise cancellation at all.. only good for hearing songs
content: The bluetooth is really good for listening music. To use it for calling, you have to be in an isolated place so that the other person can hear you clearly. If you are in a public place or even at home it will capture all other sounds very loudly but not yours. Only buy if you are going to use it for listening to music. It will not disappoint you there. It has good bass, treble and vocals.

name: Parth Bavishi
title: Must have..!!
content: Lives up to the expectation. Good finishing.. Sporty look. Great sound & bass. Choose the music mode from your phone if it's available. Volume & play/pause button work great. Long press volume up/down buttons to change songs. Middle button picks/hangs up calls... Great deal..!!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Within 5 months one ear phone stopped working
content: I bought it on 27th january and by June its cap of charging point is gone and one ear phone is not working, no sound.. Sound quality is not so good, no noise cancellation.... Not worthy of its price.... Very upset with it

name: Sindhu
title: Don't buy this boat wireless earphone!!!!
content: Very worst earphone. I bought it on September 2019 and it got repaired during March 2020. Due to the lockdown I cannot repair my earphone. But it was still under warranty. I tried to contact boat customer care many times. But no response from them. I got frustated and threw the earphone into the garbage. My money is wasted and it is a very worst product. Don't buy this earphone. It is not a quality product and poor customer service from them.

name: Rahul Patel
title: Value for Money wireless earphone
content: Superb quality wireless earphone ever used, best sound quality to listen music,voice calling and noise cancellation is also perfact.Fits perfact in ear and suoerb battery life for fullday use.The only one thing i didn't like is loose rubber support, it can be lost easly at anywher.

name: Jayana Shah
title: Connects 2 devices simultaneously. Not a great feature
content: Sound quality is great. Noise cancellation also works. Bass quality is not that great. The earphone connects with 2 devices at a time. Which is a blessing and a curse. If you disconnect one device another device also gets disconnected automatically. Which is quite irritating.

name: mangesh thakare
title: Don't waste your money on this cheap and useless company
content: Don't buy this product if you're using it on daily purpose, After few months headphones automatically stop working, They will replace your product no doubt about it but it happened with me twice and they give replacement two times but there service is very poor, If call customer service center no person will pick up the call , Rarely they give response to you and i got 2 time fault in my headphones and i am regretting now , Go for another headphones this one are useless

name: Amazon Customer
title: Review after 6 months usage.
content: Writing the review after using it for six months.. The earphones was good till 4 months but the battery life has deteriorated considerably. It goes from 60% to 20% suddenly. Apart from battery life the fit is also not suitable for long usage,it hurts the ears.. Only upside is the BASS. Sound quality is medium,nothing great. Its easy to pair and not bad range.. I would recommend the wired boats rather than this.

name: Rohit C.
title: Excellent product
content: Great sound quality. I have one Plus 8T and rather than buying ctype headphones 🎧, bluetooth headset is a way better choice, yes it's costly but Worth the price.. highly recommended

name: Amazon Customer
title: Too much Bass, makes the ear ache
content: Too much bass. Not good when listening to low frequency voice. I have to turn it max to hear. Uncomfortable. Ear starts to ache because of the fit.battery backup poor upto 4hours of use then turns off

name: manish mandot
title: Reliable - great product at great price
content: I bought it for 999,I purchased it second time, gifted to my colleague. This is really good.. Sound quality is really good.. You can connect 2 devices at a time. I connect laptop and mobile both. when listening muaic on Lappy, if u get a call, it switches to mobile,this switch between device is not good but again in this price its awesome.. Battery stand by is 36 hours for me, and i have used it continuously for 8 hours in one go. So Battery life is pretty awesome.. Comfortable on ear.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor durability.
content: After using 6 months suddenly one side of the ear is not working. I claimed the warranty, they issued new product. That product also suddenly one side not working after 5 months. Then again I raised warranty claim, they send the another new product. Now its working for more thaan 6 montha, donno when it will goes to non-working.

name: Santhanam
title: Solves the purpose
content: Sound quality is good, but sometimes there is a crackling noise and also there is a extra air noise from mic while riding bikes, even when not in use.

name: Arjun Kalamane
title: My expectations of BOAT sank
content: Expectations hurt.. Ive used mi wireless Bluetooth headsets with super bass.. Jbl and sony. While nothing so far was of the sony level this boat is way below regular standards.. Bass is not upto the mark or almost absent.. To top it off within 48 hours post delivery the left side stopped working 🤷‍♂️ hope the replacement is worth the wait.

name: ramesh
title: Worst product damaged in just few days
content: With in fewdays of use, disconnecting automatically. And not working properly...waste of money...if we submit issue to the boat they're simply sending service center number...worst experience will never purchase boat

name: WhatFoodieEats
title: Handy and easy to use
content: It has a great bass and to a great extent noise cancellation and decent sound clarity but the following things disappoints me. 1.Bluetooth range not more than 10m. 2.Wires are a bit long which makes it odd in front.. 3.The battery gets emptied quickly compared with its peers.

name: Prasun Dey
title: Worst warranty services ever
content: Worst warranty service provider ever...after 4months of use left side speaker is not working. I claimed for replacement , they pick up my product bt after that there was no update. It is one month from the pick up date still not solve my issue. I search on Google and found very bad review against the company. There are many people who does not get their replacement till 3 months. Also their customer care contact no. Is not working. I am too much disappointed with their services.. Sound is good...bass also gd..best feature is connected with two devices at the same time.

name: Nikhil Agrawal
title: Highly NOT RECOMMEND!!!
content: People having Sony or other good earphones experience, don't go for it. You will not like it at all.. I am personally a Sony user, but after a long time I wanted to other brand. This is where I went wrong.. Honestly, people who don't have Sony experience can like(mentioning 'CAN') this earphone. But for those who love Sony sound, don't go for it.

title: Value for money!!!
content: The best part of this WBH is, it gives a clear and a deep bass with a clear and ample output of treble. Built quality at the par. And Seriously it is for rigorous workout. And i bought for 999₹,which is totally worth(Value for money).. But a bluetooth range is a bit less which can be neglected in such a budgeted price range..(100-200 zada lele bhai bus bluetooth range badha de)!!!!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Calling has become an issue, nobody can hear a word I say
content: For music it's ok, but when it comes to calling, this product is beyond disappointing.. My caller's are not able to hear my voice(though I can still hear them).. Battery life is ok.. But my purpose to buy a wireless bluetooth hasn't been fulfilled.. So overall ---- 👎

name: sapna borwankar
title: Noise cancellation should be outgoing too!
content: It's great in every way -- except -- the person who I'm talking to can hear all my background noises more than my own voice. Noise cancellation is good for incoming -- I hardly hear sounds when listening to music - but background sounds are not cancelled out, which is a huge minus.

name: Bishnu Mahali
title: Below Average Sound Quality And Build But Good Enough At This Price
content: Bass is low. The LED is almost invisible which is irritating as you have to look for it know if it's on/off/in pairing mode etc.. Fitting is average and the material seems to be too cheap.

name: Abins Ali
title: Really suprised me
content: I didnt expect this much from boat.. I got this for 1499. Sound quality is good and the Bass is deep( great). Fits so perfectly. Buttons are very reliable. Battety is good ( only used for 2 days). Its very worthy on this budget.... Honest review

name: phFactor
title: Overall value for money
content: The product works as mentioned in the description.. Just been using for about 2-3 hours and battery still shows 100% on my phone.. Clarity of sound and bass levels are good.

name: akash koul
title: Ok for walking or general use...
content: This is only for walking, runners will have problems keeping this thing inside their ear. Okiesh base, notes really burst at highs, lows are ok, ok for a purchase if u are planning for general use or for walking purposes... runners stay away

name: Krishna muarthy
title: Not at all satisfied with service and product
content: Product function buttons are not working... service of Amazon is also not reached my expectation. Returned the product stating the issue again got the product after 3 days with same defect... They got benefited by getting the feedback from my side.. and me roaming here and there for collecting the product, returning the product and eagerly waiting for unworthy piece...if they are not allowed till the place mentioned in the address...they should tell beforehand...

name: sumerof69
title: Good headphone on a budget
content: Have been using for a month in gym and day to day whatsapp calls. Works well if you are charging on a laptop. Dont plag directly mobile chargers as most of the headphones are not able to handle the power.. Quality is just OK, but will do the job.

name: Shikha Kosta
title: Pathetic customer care service
content: I had order one of these earphones that stopped functioning within 5 months. I asked for a replacement since it was within warranty period. They delivered similar product that wasn't working either. Tried calling customer care but they are not taking call since then. Only once did the call connect to a female in customer care cell, the last literally cut the call as I started explaining it to her. Didn't expect such a pathetic service at your end. Would not recommend it to anyone.

name: Mohammed
title: Worth it...
content: Got it within 24 hours from the time of Order. Great product, great sound.. As I purchased it for usage during bike riding, while riding little difficult to maintain the voice calls, because like other earphones, mic can't be placed near your mouth and opposite person will hear very low voice and other vehicle sound will be heard too high.. The strap has to be placed near the neck which is bit far from the mouth to reach out the voice.. Rest everything is wonderful and fine.. Go for it.

name: amol
title: Good product at this price point
content: Good product overall. I am a bass lover so I would not rate this product good.. rest all things like charging ,comfortable , call clarity is very good at this price point.

name: Ketan Kadam
title: Discounted are Definately referbished products
content: All the discounted headphones are referbished. I bought two and both after few months started having issues in one or both ear piece. When opened, the inside of both are having different types of packing and wire length had already given that hint.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Battery problem within few months. But great replacement service by Boat
content: Battery problem within few months. The earphones got heated whenever i plug them for charging & after few days faced quick battery drain issue as well.. Am giving 4 stars because of their replacement policy. They provide 1 year warranty period. So I raised a complaint in Boat website with the purchase invoice. They picked up my product, reviewed and replaced with a new one within 10 days. If it is a genuine fault, they are providing us with a new one, if it comes under warranty period

name: Evonne
title: Worth it purchase
content: Boat has a pretty good sound quality and bass. This is great for travelling, gym etc as it does not fall out and has a neck support. The color is a little dim not as vibrant as in the picture, thats a small disappointment for me. Sound quality is good and makes it worth the spend.

name: Virendra Singh
title: मत खरीदना
content: Do not purchase. इससे अच्छा तो आप ₹300 वाला लोकल खरीद लो। सबसे वाहियात, सबसे घटिया है। बात करते करते automatic off हो जाता है।. इरिटेट करने वाला आवाज चालू हो जाता है और जब तक बैटरी खत्म नही होगी, बजता ही रहता है switch off भी नहीं होता।

name: Anju
title: Bluetooth doesn't pair easily
content: It's a Brand but it's bluetooth doesn't pair easily... Bought 3 days earlier... bluetooth doesn't shows bluetooth is not discoverable...... Pairs to one divice and doesn't pair easily to another until clicked upon forget boat rockers ..... Trying to use it one more day and will return if problem persist

name: ABHIJEET G.
title: Best best !!!!!! Bhai leloooo akhee band karke
content: One of the best earphones I ever had, actually it's building quality is quite satisfactory, close your eyes and bye it, outstanding battery backup , bass quality is outstanding , of course u can dissolve urself in world of music for quite a time, ignoring bak bak of ur gf ( if live in ) , also I use it mainly for workout ( gf jaisi kismat kaha bhai ) and u can sweat as much as u want as its water resistant which makes it unique. Go ahead.!

name: ABHIJEET G.
title: Best best !!!!!! Bhai leloooo akhee band karke
content: One of the best earphones I ever had, actually it's building quality is quite satisfactory, close your eyes and bye it, outstanding battery backup , bass quality is outstanding , of course u can dissolve urself in world of music for quite a time, ignoring bak bak of ur gf ( if live in ) , also I use it mainly for workout ( gf jaisi kismat kaha bhai ) and u can sweat as much as u want as its water resistant which makes it unique. Go ahead.!

name: Shan
title: Poor battery backup and cheap sound
content: Sound quality is not up to the mark as claimed by boat. I have mi earphones but they have much better sound in the same range. Also battery backup is vry poor. It can only run upto 3 hours after full charging while watching movie. This is not acceptable.

name: Anurag
title: Worth it
content: Best wireless ear phones at this price bracket.. Will give you 3.5 hours of on time.. 15 minutes of charge will give you atleast 1 hour.. Sound is normal don't expect much at this price bracket.. All functionally working as they have mentioned. Except below. Don't try to connect with multiple devices otherwise this will surely hang or doing some strange behavior.

name: Surya P.
title: One of the worst earphones ever used....
content: This is not a product worth buying used for 2 days now returning.... While playing music there is some disturbance in between(like sssssssssss)... Sometimes buttons don't work and while playing pubg mic doesn't work... Mic quality is poor.... Fit is not good... While driving it started to get away in air... Sound quality is very poor while playing something on low volume... Sometimes feels noisy.... All in all only noise cancellation is good ...... Otherwise it is not worth buying never go for it.... Never.....

name: Ram
title: Duplicate or first copy
content: Be aware getting duplicate product even from amazon.. Getting boat rockerz 255 today.. But seems like seller sold me a duplicate of frist copy cheap product not original one. The length of wire to neck bend to ear buds is uneven and symintrical with right earbud to left earbud. Even sound quality is too low.. I don't believe that amazon delivered me duplicate product.

name: Prabhakar
title: awesome
content: after buying a headset from one of the big brand...and boat was a releiver...big brand product disappointed a lot. Boay has great quality with a reasonable price.. once charged, it will go for long time...

name: Rajeev Dandu.
title: Good battery backup. Can connect to both mobile and laptop/firestick.
content: Been using for few months now.. Pros: Battery is good. Can connect to both mobile and laptop/firestick without any issues.. Can use while jogging, doing exercises without any issues. Charges faster.. Cons: Signals might be unclear for distances greater than 15 feet.

name: sruthila
title: Not worth the price.
content: I purchased this headphone 2 months before.. It was functioning good but now left side of the headphone is not working.. They say the product is for one year warranty from the date of purchase. But there is no response when i made a complaint.. It's not worth the price. I prefered this headphone looking at the brand, but Im completely not satisfied with the product.

name: Bhupesh Singh Thakur
title: Decent buds
content: It's a good product for the price but if you are expecting to amazing sound quality then it's not for you it's a decent package but mid and lows are lacking bass is power full sound is clear backup is good and that's it! I personally am fan of Sennheiser but this is way more cheaper then that so decide for yourself and yeah it's better that jbl in this price range...

name: Richa Verma
title: No mic. Still this product appeared in search for bluetooth headphone and mic
content: I wanted a bluetooth product for headphone and mic both. And this product appeared in the search as well. So I ordered it. Now I get to know that this does not have mic. My purpose of online session doesn't solve with this. I raised a return request but no response. Thus writing this in review.

name: DOLLY
title: Average
content: Sound is not the best when compared to other brands. Clarity is not good. When compared with the price of the product its not worth buying it. You can go for other brands with the same price.

name: AYAN BISWAS
title: Impressive Headphn in this Price.
content: 1.Sound Quality:-. Bass is enough to enjoy music. But lack of clearity .It is better than BaultAudio wireless. But in this price it is aswme.. 4.8/5. 2. Noise cancellation:-. Good and premium quality ears buds. If you use it long time, the sporty style of extensions can feel some pain in ear.. 3.8/5. 3. Bluetooth Connectivity:-. As per description, it maintains 3M distance.. 4.8/5. 4. Water resistant:-. Don't use during rainy season. It is water resistant not pure waterproof.. 4/5

name: Swaraj Sarkar
title: A one Boat Rockerz
content: I bought it just like that without much idea or research about the product. However, it was a surprisingly amazing performance by it that all my family members asked me to get it for them. This is my third boat rockerz and I feel this is second to none in its price category. Kudos to the production line and design.

name: gaurvi
title: Cheap Quality Earphones Stopped Working within 10 days
content: Horrible experience. The earphones stopped working within 10 days. Plus you have to go to the service center for any replacement which is so far that it is not worth it. This is the second time this is happening, even three months back I bought Boat wired earphones and they stopped working within two months. 10/10 WON'T recommend this brand.

name: Anandh
title: Good model but little uncomfortable to hold the earholes.
content: The product is good in technical aspects however while holding it in ears is little difficult. I would have asked for replacement if I didn't cut the barcode sticker on the same.. Thanks. Anandh

name: Amazon Customer
title: Cannot be compared with professional audio companies
content: Bass and sound quality isnt that great. This product doesnt work after 4-5 months but am happy to buy another as within warranty you get a brand new product delivered at your doorstep.

name: PARVEEN
title: Sound quality is awesome.
content: Sound quality is awesome...very comfortable to use...battery life is also good enough...easy connectivity...battery percentage can be seen on mobile screen thats the thing i liked the most ... overall its a great product from boat....go for it...

name: Sachin
title: Perfect!!
content: I bought this for 999 during prime day sale.. want to bug another one but not getting with the same price.. although waiting for it to come down.. if y are thinking to take a Bluetooth headset here it is.. worth more than the money paid for..

name: Harish Athreyas
title: Boat rockers ... Painful in a manner 😅
content: The sound quality of the product is top class and the noise cancellation too. But the 👂 ear hurts once we give it a proper fix inside for a day or two.. Just a small suggestion, if u are buying the product just to sit and home or work and to listen to songs ...hmm look into some other product as long usages hurt the outer ear parts for some time . I don't know if it hurts in the beginning just because the product is new and isn't that much expanding.

name: Ashish
title: Value for money. Best sound quality at this price.
content: Best deal if you are getting it under 1500. They are easy to use and sound quality is exceptionally good, which is least expected at this price. The built is such that they don't easily fit in any carry case especially not in the one which is mentioned in bought together catagory. The battery time is great but the info regarding the percentage battery left can be deceptive as displayed. One moment it displayes 60 % and next moment it's exhausted. But the backup is great . Can be listned for more than 4 hours when connected

name: Rahul kumar
title: Difficult to use for long time
content: Having pain when in use for more than 1 hour..... No doubt it has a great bass and to a great extent noise cancellation and decent sound clarity and mindblowing battery but the following dissapointed me though i tried a lot to adjust.. 1.Bluetooth range not more than 10m. 2. Pain in ear due the conical buds(can be removed). 3. Wires are a bit long which makes it odd in front.. 4. No pouch provided.. 5. Worst part is very low quality and distoring mic. Other person keeps complaining about my voice.

name: rohit
title: Worth it...
content: Nice product. Packaging was worst. When i received its messed up in plastic packet, but its working. No tracking available till i get the product.. Amazon should improve these things.. Otherwise boat is nice brqnd value for money. I got it for ₹999 in sale. Worth it.

name: Durga Prasad
title: Almost fine in all aspects except fitting over neck while riding two wheelers
content: I am totally satisfied with the sound quality, durability, noise cancellation mic and finally battery was awesome but as a bike rider I am not going to suggest this one as it doesn't fitting to our neck when we ride two wheeler.. When we r driving the band behind the neck is going back for air which is totally uncomfortable for user and pilon on the bike.. For my Samsung galaxy MAX through this bluetooth headphones i can't use Google assistant as I not supporting for my device, I am not sure this problem is for everyone or not

name: Praveen
title: Type A point
content: The neck band is good but the yellow wire(cable) is very poor ,it always bends,if it was a round cable type wire like 1+buds it would be better..... And the battery backup is 6 hrs. And they should have given type C ,but they gave type A .... Good quality in the sound.... Can go for it in this price...

name: Shree Prasad Thapliyal
title: Very bad experience
content: Right side ear bud stopped working , and when claiming warranty then it was unable to process ,also customer care no is not valid . Very bad experience with this product , as mentioned above it's comes with 1 year replacement warranty, but don't get tempted that's all lie

name: Chirag Lalan
title: Do not buy. Worst product. Stopped working 2nd time.
content: Do not buy. Worst product. Stopped working for the second time.. Ordered it on 15th July, product was delivered on 16th.. One side of the earbud stopped working in first week of Oct 2019. Got it replaced from the company. For users information, company allows ine time replacement warranty.. Now since the product I use is already replaced earlier, the product is out of warranty.. Rs.999 I spent on this product is a complete loss to me.

name: krupa
title: Worth buying at this price !!
content: Too good to have it in such price.. although it's too early to comment on every specs since I have bought this only 4 days back.. Till now no issue found and having gr8 experience. Sound quality superb, battery still not reached to half though have listened to music more than 5 hrs til now. Only problem is you will experience little ear pain if you put on the ear bud continuously more then an hrs time.

name: Pavan
title: Not so great
content: I did not like the sound of the device too much (bass is not too much as the other reviews claim). Mine had problems connecting to multiple devices, I had to switch it off and then switch it on everytime I want some it to connect to multiple devices. Battery backup is only about 5 hours

name: Shorya sharma
title: Bass was not so good , not for pubg
content: I like design, bass is not so good, what they told us , it is average, sounds was good not awesome and battery backup is not more than 5hr , NOT FOR PUBG PLAYERS, BECAUSE enemy foot print is coming late which is not good for attacking purpose, you will definitely confuse while open the door or by hitting by enemy bullet , they , and it is so expensive in Amazon, if you want to bus the same product go for snapdeal, where you need to pay 777₹ just half .

name: Chandrashekhar
title: Overall Ok product. Bass quality is not good as I expected.
content: Bass quality: You've to be at full volume or one level below to experience the bass effect which I really don't like to maintain.. Range: Good range of Bluetooth connectivity. Sometimes I experience distortions in sound (Songs) quality even when my phone is in pocket.. Battery: Very good battery backup. Usage: You may feel it a little bulky to use. Earphones holds well in ears with good convenience

name: sachith menon
title: The product does not delivers as per the Brand value.
content: The clarity while talking is not good, if you are outside it will be very difficult to listen. The sound quality is good only while listening to music. The LED light indication is not at all visible in the daylight. It's connectivity or pairing is poor. The looks of the product is very ordinary. This product does not looks like it is for 900/- after discount. The product does not meet up to its brand value.

name: Milind Singh
title: Just okay
content: Cons:. 1. No vibration on call.. 2. 6-7 hrs battery drain in not use but connected state.. 3. Wires are longer than it looks, so they are hanging around while in use.. 4. Inear support is useless.. Pros:. 1. Bought for 999 which just okay.. 2. Sound is okay.. Would suggest Samsung Level U for 2000.

name: Ankit Awasthi
title: Great product
content: The product is light and of great quality. The only bad thing about the product is that the long presses are too long almost 5 sec long. And when it turns on or off, it takes its time to announce 'youve tuned into boatrockers, you've tuned into Nirvana's and 'adios amego' while a blip would have done the job.. May be I am not as hip as the current generation.. Otherwise a great product and at a great price. I gifted one to my friend too.

name: D.Rohit
title: Big No For Long term.
content: I bought two of these headphones. Both went faulty within 6months.. However as they were in warranty period. Got replacement easily. Wouldn't recommend for long term.. External noise cancellation is great if you are listening songs. However if you are on call, the other end person gets heavy background noise.

name: Mukund Ranganathan
title: Great for the price.
content: Best in class for the price range. Fits perfectly. Pairing is so easy, has worked for 5+ hours for me in 1 charge. Sound quality is best for this price...can't ask for more. Build is sturdy.

name: Arindam Sinha
title: There are better options
content: Good but keeps disconnecting sometimes when the phone is in my pocket. Also option to navigate through the songs is limited. Also not sure if the product delivered was a 2nd hand one judging by the package condition. I think better to buy from shop after inspection of seal and every thing.

name: Rohit khopkar
title: This boat will sink soon
content: Pathetic never ever ever buy boat earphones they are really pathetic and I guess the companies Head of sales department must look after the faulty pathetic earphones high on price low on performance. People who want to buy boat don't buy it you are just wasting ur hard earned money

name: Sankalp Gawande
title: Try some other seller/ Or avail warranty
content: Don't buy this from this seller, not durable at all, the condition is really bad just after a month. Edit: Seems like I figured out late, but this product comes with 1 year manufacturer's warranty and so I got a replaced piece just yesterday and it's in great condition. It took 25 days to replace the piece since I filed the complaint, but considering the lockdown restrictions, I think they did a good work. Happy with it! Hope this turns up better than the earlier piece I got...

name: nikhil ranjan
title: Overll at 1099 of price range u will go for it
content: I bought it for Rs 1099 for this price range i thik this is good blutooth earphone.sound quality is good ,base also good but at maximum sound base is quite more than vocal ie unbalanced.Blutooth connectivity is not so good, if u put the phone in back pocket then voice getting disconnected.overall at this price range my experience is good after 2days of use.Battery backup also impressive.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Only for music, call quality is extremely poor
content: If you are a music fanatic then this product is surely meant for you. But you cannot expect to hear the other person when you call and vice versa. So call wise it's a waste.. Only good for listening to music.

name: Mohd Amaan Hasan
title: Nice bluetooth earphones .
content: This earphones are way too good as though of bluetooth devices. Sound latency is also not seen during usage , had a good experience while gaming, bass is good, and overall the sound quality is very good keeping price in mind, the only negative I found in it is the short battery it can be a bit more.

name: abisai
title: wireless boat headphones but problem
content: best product within rs 1000, battery back up over 6 hrs after full charge, extra bass headphone with good audio.. But problem started after 3 months use. Volume up/down button not working. Send to service centre. Waiting for response after 15 days of dispatch..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bluetooth connectivity is an issue
content: First I'll talk about pros. Sound quality is decent for the price if you can get it in 1000rs on sale otherwise better options are available.. Noice cancellation is pretty good. Battery life is pretty decent as well. Cons. I find Bluetooth connectivity poor I don't know if it is the problem with my device. Cause when I walk wearing this and having phone in my pocket there are lot of glitches in connection which I found pretty annoying

name: Vijesh
title: Rating -3.5, Good product for  Rs 999.
content: Overall Product rating is average but good at this price point (999).. Packing is very bad. It seems like a second hand product as the pack is almost damaged but no issues for the headset.. Sound quality is average. I can give a 3.5 rating for the sound quality. Built quality is good but the long wire is annoying. Design is not as good as other products in this price range.. Bluetooth connectivity seems fine. I didn't have any issues yet.. Overall I can give a 3.5 rating.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Painful to ears
content: Sound quality of the product is very good , Paring takes 30 seconds, amazingly easy . The biggest problem is in the zest to increase the bass , manufacturer has increased the overall diameter of the speaker , this when covered with rubber gloves is tight to ears and start to hurt after 20 , 30 minutes of usage . I felt the design to fit in on all types of ears is not universal , could have been of better design , i could not use them after 20 min due to an uneasy feeling and pain

name: Jithin George
title: Very happy;-)
content: Very good fit & finish. Excellent base. Multiple Bluetooth devices pair simultaneously. Best value for your money.. I know it’s too much to ask for the price but if wireless charging was also included, this device would be the best of the best.

name: Anand C S
title: Just like a Rs.3 pen. Use and throw material
content: It may be tempted by seeing this product, because of price and everyone around you is buying this product. I also bought the same due to the same reason. Frankly speaking, this is a good product (just like any BOAT), but the problem is it won't even last a year. I bought this on 27th August 2019, but just afer 3 months and 10 days, one of my ear buds lost audio; and it's now useless. About it's bluetooth connectivity, you can get good quality about 3-4m only not more than that.

name: Neha
title: Waste of Money
content: Sound quality is good but mic is very poor. Other person cannot hear me properly.. After 4 months of usage one side stopped working. Their customer care is also poor. They say they have option to register online complain but they keep on sending me address to their service center which is like 20 km in Bangalore.

name: Naitik Vyas
title: Right Side Speaker Not working
content: I had bought this product just a few months back and the sound quality and material quality is good but in just few months Right side of speaker completely not working which made me so bad impression about the boat rockers as it has become totally waste product for me as I can not use it anymore, I would request to boat compny to please replace the product or else give me the refund for the product.

name: sunilkumar.nayaka
title: Best wireless headphone
content: I like the build quality of this product and the battery life is awesome and while doing workout comfortness is good but I felt sound quality is not upto the mark while comparing out boat with wire headsets like 225 only thing is the Boss is not that much good other than that awesome awesome product I got a good deal

name: Priyanka
title: Working good
content: Buy it without any doubt, guys believe me I wrote it after the use of 3months ,,it gives u wings when u keep it... One thing is happened with me this feels me very bad that ear Bud's holding rubber cap is loosed due to which i loose it...so plz tell me how to buy the accessories of boat rockerz...I also attach second pic which show clearly right ear holding rubber missing😞

name: AVINASG
title: Need a service from boat rockers, but not good service so we are hope less now
content: I give 1 star only because there is no option for 0 star,. I purchased Boat rockers from amazon, and it came with 1 year warranty, I have warranty card, amazon order number bill, and this wireless earphone is not functioning now, in just 2 month its stop working, so i want to claim my warranty card but when I drop a mail to boat rockers email id, there is no response, I call on phone number given on that warranty card, which is not a correct number, j drop msg to website, no assistance,. I felt cheated.... So guys don't trust Boat rockers 255 products....

name: Abhijit Wanjari
title: Good product at price range
content: Overall it is a good product. Connectivity is good. Battery life is also good as mentioned in the details of the product.. Con are sound is not that great. Battery level indication is not indicated properly. Most of the time it's between 100-80% n suddenly drops to 20% and then low battery. Voice calls are good but it picks ambiance noise very loudly. At the price range it is a good product.

name: Mohit Singhal
title: Need to improve the quality of Product for rough and tough use.
content: I am using the ear phone while I am driving, so i am facing various issues in handling and listening. Below are the issue i am facing while using it :. 1. Background noise cancellation is not upto the mark. 2. Earbuds are heavy, it hurts after continues usages of 50+ minutes. 3. Battery backup is 4.5 hours instead of 6 hours as mentioned in their catalog. 4. battery charging time is too high, around 100-110 min.

name: joy
title: Need to improve battery backup
content: Product do not last long on a single charge. Max duration after one charge is 100 minutes.. Sometime it gives you 4 hours backup.. In terms of quality, yes it is a nice good quality build product as we can expected from boat.. The charging percentage decreases in multiple of 20 (eg: 100, 80 , 40,) after 40 it start beeping to indicate to plugin the power source.. In this price rage you can't get any better then this product.

name: Jaymin Arya
title: Received with missing attachments and tempered box.
content: I have ordered this for 3 times. Only once I have received good one. Other two times I have received with open box and missing attachments. Once I returned also and ordered new one but again I have received with tempered box.

name: Bhuvneshwari Oberoi
title: Wonderful.. Don't think just buy it
content: Best sound quality, noise cancelation and looks.. Just amazing and superb.. Must buy.. 👌 Worth the price..

name: Swapnil Dabir
title: Return Boat Bluetooth earphones
content: Dear Team,. I would like to tell you that the product is not working properly. Its hardly been 2 months and i am facing a lot of problem with the product. It has already stopped working .. I would like to please send me an alternate piece and please call me on 9096151107 on an urgent basis.. I am tired of contacting your customer care as i am not getting a proper response.. I hope by writing this atleast someone will contact me.. Thanks. Regards,. Swapnil Dabir. 9096151107

name: Anubhav baser
title: GOOD PRODUCT AT AFFORDABLE PRICE. 💯
content: Nice product. The neckband which I received first worked one day and then it stopped working. I requested for replacement and their response is too good. Got the replaced piece the next day of the replacement request. Good service. Must try this one. If u have a budget of 2K + then go for boat rockers 275. At this range BOAT ROCKERS 255 IS THE BEST.. Thank u BOAT for such a great product👍✌. 🔥💕💯

name: Akshay Sharma A S
title: Good could have been best
content: A good Bluetooth headset from Boat, which could have been made better. Noise cancelation,connectivity is good, but sound is not that good, low frequency base is good, but other music has lesser clarity( mostly due to Bluetooth connectivity). If you have a wired headphones, please think once before buying, if you want a wireless one, then please go ahead and buy it

name: Malaika
title: Product is good
content: Boat's ear phone are awesome ......Superb sound quality. Great bass. It is of neckband design & comfortable to wear. And in just half an hour it gets charged .. Gift to my daughter.....and she is very happy .. But the packaging was bad . Old packing and was also torn. Not of Amazon standard .. Dealer should be made aware of it...

name: शिवोहम
title: Overpriced but best sound quality in this price
content: I am surprised by negative reviews but I am extremely happy about the build quality, design and sound quality.. Of course I am just using it for 1 day now. I will update again if needed. I hope I won't have to!. Note: I bought it for 1999 and in 2 days the price dropped by 500. Now they are selling it for 1499. :-(

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good but poor battery functionality
content: Audio quality is good. Voice is clear. But the main issue is with battery.. For my case battery shows 40% balance. As soon as I connect it for music battery % drop to 20% within 5 sec. And within next 45 sec device get off.

name: SURYA
title: Good for price but warranty rules worst
content: Only thing I dint like Is warranty doesn't cover ordinary wear and tear... So logically if you use it one weak u will have scratches on the earphones then u r not elegibke for warranty.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good in pice and view but with in a week quality becomes week day by day
content: With in a week this what happened the plastic started peeal off and the BT stranth also weeaken up getting click and glitch sound and auto disconnect and reconnect. Has no option. Need to use or visit service center. Dear team share the service center number and near by address

name: achal
title: Good sweat resistant earphone
content: the product came without any manual or extra buds as promised. the box was tampered. packing was not tampered. I feel it's a defective old piece sent to me by seller. its mic is not working.. Update after item was replaced.. Very loud and clear headphone. Even mic has very good reception.. Sweatproof, good for outdoors and running.

name: Abhinav Verma
title: Loved it..!!
content: Super dooper sound.Worth every penny.Noise cancellation is just wow.Wear it & forget the world.U will feel the every beat .At this price it's a lottery.

name: avinash
content: Nice product..... I am using this product from 5 months and during this 5 months no problem I have seen.. Realy good product but bass quality is low in this boat rockers 255 otherwise sound quality is good.. Battery backup is also good 1day for continue use and 3 day for only calling.

name: Vikas
title: become useless after 3 months of use
content: Now they have become use less for me as they can't fit in ears without ear buds supporter.. (Shared current earphone photo without supporters). Product Noise, Build Quality everything is good except its round abouts (made to fit in ears) which you may lose very easily... as they get out of earphones easily when not in use. (Thing is you have to take extra care while carrying or when not in use)

name: Ashutosh gupta
title: Great product in this price range.  Wort buying ..
content: I m giving my review after using one month.. This is simply Awesome product... * Built quality is very good.. * Clear sound and heavy bass amazing. sound quality and no sound disturb noise.. * Battery life is superb more than 24hrs with use of songs and games.. * Super fast connection with the mobile.. Overall great product. Recommended to all who want to buy Bluetooth headset. And please ignore negative reviews because it is a very good product in this price range.

name: Bhavesh Kansara
title: Not worth buying.
content: Sound is not at all balanced. Bass is too loud... All other frequencies are being dominated. Bass is loud but doesn't have quality. Not worth spending 1500/-. Built quality is also decent.. I have to tweak Equalizer a lot to get a balance of all frequencies. That's not all... Equalizer need to be changed each time for different types of songs. I am not at all happy to buy this. Wastee of money. I could have added some more amount and should have bought some good brand.

name: Karthik :)
title: Replacement provided!
content: The only brand which directly replaced my device for free in the warranty period. You can use it however you want, and not to worry it 1year. I have never experienced replacement with a new device will make me happier. I would suggest it to everybody. Eyesclose pick.😊thanks boat

name: vaishnav
title: Please prove boat
content: Boat I believe in your potential please improve.. The bass seems to come suddenly compressing the mids and highs, basically overpowering the actual song. So not enjoyable headphones despite I used equilizer to reduce bass.

name: H. Singh
title: Decent vfm
content: Purely from an audiophile perspective, these headphones aren’t great. However if you are looking for decent sound on a budget, these are brilliant, bass is good, treble is a bit on the lower side, the fit in the ears is a compromise

name: Gopinath
title: don't buy waste of money and time
content: All are good only it will work for 3 mnths from the date of purchase after 3rd month one side will not work... Please if any one is Interest o buy this don't waste your money my humble request they will give less price but it worth of only 2 months. Customer care also worst all are giving very fake hope on the replacement... Pls don't buy this product

name: Faizal
title: For loud music lovers
content: High bass and very loud. These pair of Bluetooth headset is great with dual connectivity... We can connect two Bluetooth at a time... Kudos. With these earphone you cannot be disturbed with outer sounds while enjoying music. Finally my words are terrific purchase

name: Sreejish N.
title: Ear piece stopped working, It doesn't have good treble, Not for vocals
content: If you are a constant user then don't buy this product as it built quality is not so good within 7 months my headphone's one ear piece stopped working due to loose connection. The bass is good and the treble and highs are not so good enough it's not good for vocals. It can get pretty loud tho...! I have also experience while kept in my pocket the audio gets cut not often but sometimes but its good for calling And I also experience one problem with this that while playing PUBG the mic was not working at all that was weird i try alot of thing but it didn't activated it's mic ;-(. Noise cancellation is good blue connectivity is ok but regret now after buying this headset as its one ear piece stop working!

name: soumen nath
title: Not good for distances above 4/5 mtrs.
content: It's almost perfect for me.. However, note that its not ok if you intend to use it while jogging or running. While jogging it keeps cutting off, and gives lots of noise. This was not indicated in the specifications.. Moreover, if you move 4/5 mtrs away from the phone, the sound will stop. This was not mentioned in the specifications.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst customer service & Don't rely on warranty
content: After your product start facing issue in warranty then it is worst servicer. Toll free no not working. When u fill complaint form they say invoice no is not vaild. I will suggest every body do not purchase this product. Boat rockerz successful work only for six months. It's under warranty. But boat customer service make ur life hell if u face issue.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Nice Bluetooth earphones
content: I have been using wired earphones from Boat earlier so when I decided to get Bluetooth earphones my obvious choice was Boat. The earphones are worth the money and the sound quality is good but I still feel they are not as good as the wired ones.

name: Dinesh
title: Bad Quality
content: The quality of product is very poor . One side earphone stoped working with in 4 to 5 month. The product was within waranty and changed but again with in two months again one earphone stoped working.

name: Subodh S. Bhatkar
title: Honest review -DONT BUY..Worst Product by Renowned Boat
content: This is my 4th pair of earphones from boat and first of this model. My experience is this: either one of the earbuds stopped working or they both stopped working completely, right after warranty period was over. Boat must maintain the quality of product else this boat will take no time to sink. Already bought pair of earphones from Sony and quite happy with audio quality and durability. Bye Bye boat.

name: ABHISHEK RANJAN SONI
title: BoAt ... rocking sound but less comfort and mic capability
content: Writing after use of 10 months.... Sound quality 8/10. Bulid 8.5/10. Comfort 7/10. Battery 6/10. Looks 8/10. Mic 7.5/10. Durability 8/10. Overall a very satisfying product under ₹1k

name: Amazon Customer
title: Boat 1k -5month max worth or not. One side earphone issue
content: Guys no doubt product is good but one side of earphone is not working. I buy 2 boat earphone yet but both of them one side is not working after 4-5 month. I am paying around 1k for this product totally disappointment by boat. Better go for other products. Similar things happen with my friends also. Dnt go with review, product is good but if u spend 1k then atlist it can work 1year. Boat product life time is 6month. Very disappointment buy products.

name: kashish nigam
title: Bluetooth connectivity issues...
content: Everything is good...but what if the earphones are not connecting to phone easily....even you can't off the Bluetooth of the headset... If u disconnected with the phone and pressed it power button once than you have to wait for it to automatically off the Bluetooth than start it again and reconnect it...Worst thing it is... If you are ok with this then buy it...

name: Rohan Kumar
title: Not a good Product
content: Not a good Product, audio stops automatically sometimes while playing audio/video.. Bluetooth connectivity is not good either... Advertisement says it can be used while workout. But truth is - a little movement is enough for affecting audio quality... Sound Quality is also minimal.. Disappointed with the product... waste of money.

name: Pravin
title: Return and replace my product
content: Dear Sir/ madam,. I want to return my order , your return policy is 7 days but after 2 days i notice bluetooth not charging , i called on customer care but not received proper response so please return my order and replace new product,. after 2days i called 10 more times but not receive response so tooday i massage you. please replace my new product, i cant charge my Boat Bluetooth.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Please fix my problem
content: The sound quality is gud product is nice but it has some connectivity issues ...like it's not showing in my tablet which I use the most for my online classes n even I sometimes get confused with on /off prblm as it doesn't show properly whether it is on or off ....Light doesn't blinks properly sometimes red then blue idk what it means bcoz in the manual the instructions are not properly mentioned .......🙄🙄🤷please fix my problem related to tablet

name: Shishir Choudhary
title: Great product, solid build 👌🏼
content: Great service by Amazon. Fast delivery as always.. Build quality is awesome.. Bass is GOOD.. It is not that loud with full volume.. Overall great product. Go for it guys.. Using this one with iPhone & Samsung, works great.

name: Anonymous singh
title: Nothing goes good with this prodect
content: Too many errors at the same time, connectivity problem including not connecting to my other devices,sometimes when connected to my device it only sends commands like Play pause to device and sound not coming from earphone. In terms of sound quality it's good for beat clearance but not for good base.. Worse battery backup.It says 6 hrs. Average battery backup but 2 days old earphone have 4-5 hrs of backup.. Giving a star only for sound quality nothing is good in this other than sound quality.

name: Saikumar Martha
title: product stops working after 2 to 3 months and the warranty services provided are very poor.
content: the warranty and service provided are very poor. the product worked fine for 2 to 3 months and stopped working there after. i have raised the complaint and returned the product , it has been more than a month and i have written a lot of mails to them but they barely respond. i finally got a response from the team stating that the product will be delivered with in 5 to 7 days but the product is not yet dispatched even after 12 days.

name: Anupam S.
title: Great Sound Quality
content: The best part about this headphone is its sound quality, immersive and deep, way better than some of the more famous brands in this price range.. However, there are no other major features in the headphone, and it is a bit clunky (not user friendly) to use and the blue tooth connection is a bit iffy.. But if you just want to pay for the sound quality and not the frills, then this is an exceptionally good headphone

name: Shaik Saleemuddin
title: Beast
content: This Bluetooth earphone is just a beast ! It has amazing bass ! Sound quality is just mind blowing ! This product is value for money ! Suggeste you to buy these if you are looking for amazing earphones under rs 2500 . These earphones have a very good range and provide a usage time of 7 hrs on a charge of 45 to 60 mins .

name: RAM SANKAR
title: Value for money.
content: This headphone is working in good condition and average noise cancellation is present. The sound, bass quality also average. Expected more in this product, but not worthy.

name: Sambhav
title: Value for money
content: Got this product in amazon sale. The product is awesome with. sound quality 4.5/5,. build quality 5/5. Noise cancellation 4/5.. Buy this product if you want to buy a good earphone with tight budget. I have used Jamaica (house of marley), philips, panasonic, before this product. As I have compare this product it's good buy for its price range.

name: Debraj Bardhan
title: So attractive Bluetooth headset with flexible deign and Immersive sound
content: Crispy and Immersive sound with top class built quality.. you will be fan of this bluetooth headset... Very nice design and flexible too for daily usage. After one charge it can last upto 3 days with 80% sound level and proper stand-by use.. I can surely tell you to go for it, value for money product from boat.

name: Rajeev
title: Good as expected
content: Sound is better than most of the other brands out there (In same price range). Bass is fine and noise cancellation is pretty good. Mic is not upto the mark as sometimes other side can't hear my voice. Overall it's a value for money deal.

name: Abhinandita
title: Good but could have been better.
content: I was happy with the product in the beginning. But then later it had pairing issues with my device. Also one side of the earphone has stopped working even before completing an year. I wasn't expecting this from such a good brand. I guess if you're paying this much price you expect the product to last more . Altogether a good buy. I would give it 4 star.

name: shantanu
title: Good Product, as long as it lasts. (4 months for me)
content: I bought this product in Jan 2019, and now in May 2019 one of its earpieces has stopped working. The earphones performed well while they were working. The sound quality was good, and connection with the phone remained solid throughout. Full chsrgey took around 2-3 hours and it lasted for 6-7 hours on an average.. The mic is a little weak, I had to often repeat what I said as the voice wasn't clear sometimes on the other end.. I used them extensively for jogs and gym and they performed admirably, never getting out of the ear midway and the coiled around the neck pretty comfortably.. Just expected them to last more than just 4 months.

name: Kalyan Kumar Adak
title: Boat Rockerz 255 wireless bluetooth headset
content: BoatRockerz 255 wireless bluetooth headset has an amazing sound quality with a great effect of bass and it perfectly fitted in my neck and the buds in my ear.But one problem is it charged up very fast but it don't give the actual 5H of playback time as it is promised. Otherwise, it is overall a good product.

name: Shesh nath Goswami
title: Overall good product.
content: Overall best product by boat, but there is no any carry bag and things required so if any body assume that they are going to give you complete package then you may be wrong. They are not going to give you complete package.. Note:- it disconnect several times while using it.

name: Bala
title: Nice quality and service...
content: After 8 months my headset not working and I have registered a complaint in boat website...they took it and replaced with new one... But the time taken is more than one month...may be due to corona... what ever I got new one...thank you boat.

name: Parul Sawan
title: And this price range this is a best product
content: Very nice and best product in this price . After using from 6 month it's good in performance . Sound quality is 10/10 .. After using 10 month my earphone one side is not working properly. But Thanks to boat rockerz team they replaced the product with new one. In this lockdown time . Thank You .

name: The Sassh Thing
title: Don't think so much just buy it 🔥💥
content: It cost me like ₹1200 but I think its really worth to buy it in this price.. 5⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐for quality ☺. It connects 2 devices simultaneously at a time.✔. Fast charging ✔. Noise ✔. Audio✔. Water resistant✔. Everything is best.💯. I will recommend you guys to buy it now without any doubt.. .. .. Please ignore my cat in the background😅😂

name: Tanisha Farswan
title: I love the headsets
content: I received my order today packiging could have been better, but Sound quality is good noise cancellation is also proper and also I love the bass quality as I love heavy bass songs so I like the product and also it is good for those who are into gyming and fitness, one can wear it while running too. I got it of rs899 by lightning deal and I think it was worth buying this product.

name: Manish Patel
title: Sensitive mic
content: Build and sound quality is Good not very good,. you cannot talk with this headphone as it has very sensitive mic or no noise cancellation for mic !. so you can hear lots of noise when pickup your phone calls. i have to disconnect my bluetooth from my mobile and than pickup my calls manually.. So please go for some good brands like Sony,..

name: Prince
title: Good headphones
content: Sound quality is good. It is loud enough to be used while traveling or running.. Once you lose the rubber bushes which keeps the earbuds in place, they'lll keep falling down from your ears even while walking.

name: Vishal
title: NOT THE PRODUCT TO GO FOR.
content: Works for only 2 months.. I bought is in the end of June 2020 and last week it stopped working. Approx 1300 rs for 2 month usage is waste of money.. Also when it was working very frequently it starts giving frequency noise while you are talking.. Instead buy cheaper earphones 1 for 3 months. This is NOT worth the money.

name: Tehzeeb Collections
title: Biggest Demerit & Merit!!
content: Almost on every call when connected to my phone the connection breaks and I need to change the mode of call to headset and then reselect Bluetooth to regain connectivity.. Most of them due to this the call gets disconnected due to no response in that phase of non connectivity.. That's a demerit.. Now the good Part, it has wonderful battery backup, good noise cancellation and good sound quality.

name: Sunil
title: Best in this price range
content: Purchased it in freedom sale. For the price (999), it's really worth it. My sister is using it for indoor calls, music, movies and online classes. Battery also lasts long.. Pretty happy with it.

name: Lazy Warrior
title: Manufacturing defect...
content: Sound quality is good, but not recommended for long time continuous usage..... Disconnected frequently after 3 to 4 hrs of continuous use...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Stopped charging after 15 days...MUCH DISAPPOINTED
content: Sound quality is good but noise cancellation is very bad, so much disturbance when u r on call and MAIN FAULT is it's NOT CHARGING after 15 days. I am not able to do replace also as replace time is over..very much DISAPPOINTED. Please let me know how to replace it ASAP

name: shyam
title: Best
content: Have been using these for an year now.Except for noise cancellation, bass , clarity everything is good.Durabality of these are very great.have been using this atleast for 10 hrs a day.

name: kHUSHI mishra
title: Worst product
content: Very worst product kachara real. Cannot hear voice but only can hear sound. When the call comes the mobile rings. When I play games the game starts. When I do shopping it open the sites. It is the worst product ever experienced. Don't give me good percentage in school. I am failed in every class test and every exam. It doesn't give me iphone1928. (When ever it comes). Worst please don't take it and give the amount to me and I will have some money. And. You whoever is reading it *********really

name: Tushar patil
title: not a good quality earphone
content: pls dont bay this ....earphone having problem ...i purchese 4 earphone same essue is comming one side is not working ...after some time both r not working .... 2 earphone i replace under waranty but same problem comming in both earphone afer 42 days now warany end waste of money.

name: Mandar
title: Great headsets with good sound quality
content: +. Great battery life. Good sound quality. No need to listen at 85+ volume level since sou d isolaiis good. -. Don't fit perfectly in ear. sometimes and are falling off multiple times in case of going over bad roads. Overall value for money, go ahead and buy !

name: Jyotsna shigvan
title: Replacement product
content: The product should not work properly...they have some technical issues so without any delay I want replacement but amazon customer service provider are refuse to accept that replacement not ready to solve my problems .it makes me more disappointed. And my product is under warranty so as a customer I kindly request you please replace my product boAt RockerZ 255.

name: Ketul Patel
title: Charging problem and does seems worth spending..
content: Ita got problem within a year and replaced. And again stopped working within 5 months but by then it was out of warranty. .... Same issue charging ptoblem twice.... Amd if you dont have near by service center.. you wont get proper reply to your query.

name: Sourabh Pednekar
title: Best bluetooth earphone at this price(810 after offers)
content: Pros. 1.The bass is good but it loses on CLARITY.... 2.Light weight...convenient to use. 3. Battery life is adequate 5-6hrs on normal usage on 60-70% volume. 4. Price....at 810 after all the offers... it's the best BEST bluetooth earphone at this price.. Cons. 1. Bluetooth connectivity is not that great....as I move from one room to another. 2. Quality of the sound is not that great....volume is little low... even at the highest... but if you need only bass from your phone.... then Its ok...

name: Shashank
title: Worst no value of money
content: Starting it was good working but after 4 month it is loosing it's quality.. First left early sounds off the after 1 month second one.. No value of money. No service center in the town.. City like lucknow to resolve the problem

name: Aashmi G.
title: It's good at everything like bass,noise cancellation and sound quality!
content: I would give it 3 stars!! It's been better till I saw the LED blinking for hours!! It's been blinking for two days! And I can't connect it to the mobile!I don't even know it's turned on or off.. But everything is awesome,the sound quality and the mic too!! But a little bit disappointed because of this problem as I just bought it a month ago!! Think twice before buying this product!!

name: Jeet bhanushali
title: Saste me mast😎
content: This is really good.. Sound quality is really good.. You can connect 2 devices at a time.I connect laptop and mobile both.when listening music on Lappy, if u get a call, it switches to mobile,this switch between device is not good but again in this price its awesome.. Battery stand by is 36 hours for me, and i have used it continously for 8 hours in one go. So Battery life is pretty awesome.. Comfortable on ear.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not worth for money
content: The head phones are good at the beginning, but after 10 days use started seeing some disturbance. Charging lasts maximum of 3-4 hrs. More over this is only replaceable, no return from this seller. Please make sure you select products which can be replaced

name: MALLIKARJUN
title: Please don't buy boat products its lifetime is below one year
content: Please don't buy boat product. you will get repair in below one year damn sure. Even if you try for warranty replacement it will takes at least 2 to 4 months approximately for replacement. customer care guys will never connect your call(if you have any doubt try to connect) and never reply to emails.. Noise cancellation n Bluetooth was not up to the mark.. As per my personal experience I'm suggesting you guys go for a product which have good customer support and quality products.

name: deva
title: Too long
content: Sound is not that great... Wires are too long, feels awkward to use it outside ( other than workouts) due to long wires, especially the red one that i bought. Tried to return it but only replace option was available. So replaced it by asking for a different color.. But again received red colored one. But after getting replacement there was a retut option.. So returning it.. Only suted for work outs.. If u wants it for professional use like in office or Clients place, don't buy this one

name: Sneha Kale
title: Disappointed
content: Battery life is OK... Sound quality is not good for the price... There is only bass in sound... Trouble, vocals are not clear... I found one thing more that Bluetooth connectivity... After connect the Bluetooth to your mobile after 3-4 minutes it keep saying that your earphones are connecting which is really irritating. There is no noise cancellation at all.

name: tarun
title: 😊 With the purchase. 👍
content: Sound quality is very good more than expected from a 1499 earbuds. After a long time enjoyed music. Bass is ultimate. Call quality is very good indoors. Didn't test it outdoors yet. I watched lots of best bluetooth devices video reviews and this one is listed in top 3. Hence considered buying it and it has turned out to be a good decision. Happy with it. Will test it more and update. Hope it will give a good battery life. 110 mah should last long

name: Anish Uday Tatke
title: Please buy if you want budget headsets.
content: Amazing Product. I never thought I could trust electronics products online but here I am standing corrected. These headsets are really durable, comfortable and exactly what I needed. They fix up good in your ears and thus can be used while running or workout. The battery capacity is unbelievably great.

name: Siddharth Chhajer
title: Sound is good, battery issues
content: Everything is good but need charging all the time, battery life is not great.Maybe it is a product defect but my experience with battery is not good

name: lovely
title: Don't waste ur money
content: Don't buy these type of products seriously. Recently I bought this boat rockerz bluetooth headphones it had worked very nice for 1 week only afterwards a lot of disturbance while talking in a phone for that i need to replace it. Again I got these disturbance problem so i decided better to return the product and don't waste of my time and my money. That's y I suggest to you my dear friends don't waste ur money don't buy these products

name: Shaik Subhan Ali
title: Definitely buy this product for better experience
content: I was exchanged this product becacuse i got duplicate product with missing items and i got this product was original boat product with all items and packing was great sound cancellation was pretty good bluetooth connectivity was up to 10m and the product is awesome

name: rajkumar
title: 40 percent good and 60 percent bad
content: Hi all,. Im a regular customer of Amazon and like to do shopping in Amazon all the time but this time I was little dissapointed with this product " Boat Rickerz". Pros:Good price. Best build quality. Extreme Noise Cancellation. Good connectivity. Cons:. Major con and very crusial one... Other side caller receiving all the sounds clearly except my voice. Its irritating me lot.. If calling is not a major problem for you ,must buy item.

name: Dnyaneshwar
title: Just Pick this product
content: Awesome Product. Totally satisfied with this product boAt rockerz 255 pro. Simply recommend this product to those want to purchase a good headset within reasonable price range.

name: Harsh Patel
title: Out of the world.
content: What an amazing Bluetooth wireless earphone. I riding my bike with 100km/h but noise cancellation is just amazing sounds clearly hear in that speed and neck band also fabulous in that speed neck band not flow in wind. Bass quality is like I am hearing it in my boat Bluetooth headphone. Boat you are just amazing. Battery life is also good. I love it.

name: Nothing
title: Low product life eclipses sound quality
content: After 9 months of use, battery discharges instantly when taken off charge, making product unusable. Tried to register complaint, as product was within warranty period. Number does not work, website has no proper channel for accepting replacement requests. Seems it's kept deliberately that way. And mine is not an isolated case.. Good sound quality and build at this price, but guess it all comes at the cost of longevity. Definitely not worth it if you are looking for earphones that last more than a year.

name: yogesh kumar
title: Stopped working after 3 months
content: This product stopped working. But when I put it on charging it is working fine, seems issue with the battery . I purchased it by seeing the review but now i regret buying it. I have sony earphones which is working perfectly even after 2.5 years. I will Never use boat again

name: Vinay narayan
