title: Boat bass & sound good quality product
content: The Bluetooth wireless headset boat is good bass & good quality & I order on 11.08.2020 the courier pick the item & today 17.08.2020 deliver to me I am happy for this purchase but the seller pack the item not too good I open the package the box is damaged so please note for this I extremely happy for this purchase boat headphone bass is soo good so likely product thank you amazon

name: harshal
title: Good to have with...cons defined
content: Good to have this,. Cons:. 1.ear bud sometimes irritating. 2.supporting ear rubber is only 1 piece and can be ditatched easily. 3.battery backup is not good..when it will shouts last 80 percent battery remains means we only left 20 mins or so.... 4 .magnet is not that strong as it should be

name: S.Doraiswamy
title: Worst battery life
content: Awful product. Battery sucks big time. Worked only few days. Even charging for couple of hours. Battery stay for 5 min. Pathetic. Sound quality is good.

name: Shubhro
title: Problems only after few months use.
content: Loses power within 3-4hr.. Loses charge without use within a day.. LED indicators are not turning off.. People can hear my voice when in call using headphone.. Very sad with these boat head phones. Did not expect this from boat.

name: Deep.U
title: A budget Earphone and Good enough
content: Bought them for 999 INR. These are good but main problem is Pain in ears after wearing them long enough to watch movie.. if you just listen to music these are ok.

name: Sreenath R.
title: Average sound quality, okay for the price
content: I was hoping for great BASS which is not easily found in most low to medium budget headphones, but disappointed with it :-( Sound clarity is excellent, but output is so sharp & piercing that it could damage your hearing if you do NOT remember to reduce the volume by at least 2 points before plugging in! Over all, it is okay for the price but I already have an over-the-ear Bluetooth headset from boAt that I love and hence expected similar sound quality.

name: Sunish K Abraham
title: Good for short time use. Stopped working after 4 months.
content: Works just fine if you are in same room. Bluetooth not great and sounds like robot voice if you go 10 foot away or next room from mobile phone. I order black color, received a blue one, but that's fine. Headphone worked fine just for 3-4 months. Now complete waste of money. I will try 1 year replacement warrantee. Will come back and let you know if I get a replacement as promised by seller. Bottom line, think twice before you purchase this product.

name: Nafees raja
title: Want to return the product
content: I want to return this product at the earliest & shall apply for some alter alternative brand. Too much echo is coming whether let be phone calls or zoom calls, or Concall. Want to return the product, I had recieved feedback from the receiver end, that he is not able to hear my voice clearly and echoing every time and the voice also not clear

name: Anjum
title: Survived not even a year... Disappointed but boAt services are really good, got replacement 😊
content: Bluetooth range is very limited, stopped working within a year, m really disappointed, wasted my money. 2 extra stars for boAt services, got replacement after claiming warranty.

name: Sanjib
title: Noisy if you go to a distance.
content: Very bad. Once I go to a bit distance on the other room, it starts making too much noise and even after to a close position still it continues to making the sound. And hence everytime need to disconnect the call and retry again.

name: Farhat Shaikh
title: Awesome sound
content: Good product but the only problem i am facing is the buds pops out of my ear, i guess its a bit big for my ear. Sound quality is really nice and meets my satisfaction.

name: Priya
title: Unhappy, didn't meet expectations
content: A couple of people I know have the same earphones and have absolutely no problem, but my earphones are not that great. When connected to the bluetooth, it randomly gets disconnected and sometimes it stays connected and the video keeps playing but the audio is not at all playing. Happened multiple times. Really unhappy with the performance of these earphones, I had expected a lot since I heard good reviews but never met the expectation.

name: Karnan
title: Best Quality
content: The sound quality of this product is very good but the coverage area of the signal is not I expected. If your phone is in one room and your headset is in another room then the signal is somewhat losses. Noise cancellation is very good.

name: deep
title: Review after one month of usage
content: Comprehensive review:-. 1. Noise cancellation is just pathetic, it does not work in rush area.. 2. Connection breakage problem is common and I am facing the same after using this in two devices.. 3. Pathetic customer service

name: Sachin
title: Best Awesome
content: Best product you will get in this price range .Battery backup is very good. You could not get better Noise Cancellation in this price. Sound is awesome. Only bad thing about this ear phone is it does not fit in your ear properly .

name: Joanna T.
title: High Value for the Price
content: Good sound quality, not 100% sound cancellation which is really good. the little bent rubber pieces help hold them neatly in please when I am exercising or moving around. Mic works fine except for my online language course. It is not recognized and I do not understand how to adjust it to find the mic. Any help?

name: Sanjay Samanta
title: Good..  but noise cancellation is very bad..
content: Headphone is really very good.. sound quality alsovery good.. if u speak very softly then also its hearable.. but noise cancellation is very bad.. it's catch sound from 15-20 feet distance..

name: Abhay
title: Durability 💩💩💩
content: 1 month - awesome. 2 month - left earphone stopped working. 3 month - right earphone stopped working. just after that.. .refer the pics uploaded.. Boat is known for it's durability. Because I have a wired boat earphone too.. But this one was a worthless, hopless and junk product.. But yes Bluetooth is still working absolutely fine (not the earphones).

name: Ajay
title: Defective piece received
content: Got defective piece. Voice during call was cracking. Buzzing noise continuously.. Dont purchase if you want to use for voice call.. I think seller is sending all the rejected pieces by customers.

name: Payel Mukherjee
title: Outstanding
content: Generally Bluetooth headphones sound quality will not good. But "boat" smash everything. It's exceptionally good. Build quality is awesome. No words about sound quality. User friendly. Comfortable in ear. I'm very satisfied about this product. 👌

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor product poor service
content: The product quality is so bad that it gave up with in 8 months . It doesn’t turn on inspite of full charge. Cheap Chinese product sold at very high price . Warranty services are also very poor and not efficient as against the tall claims .Nobody answers the call inspite of registering the complaint. Waiting for the replacement from last 12 days. I don’t know whether it will happen or not. Have decided not to buy or recommend any more boAt products henceforth.

name: mady
title: Honest review from music producer
content: Review as below in rating. First of all its A Bass Boosted Earphone.not natural sound. Built quality 4 /5......wires too thin....... Sound quality 4/5......It Has Lots Of Bass frequency...... Bluetooth Connectivity 5/5... Cover more area without jerk. Battary 5/5. Pros... nice Bluetooth in this price range. Cons..... earphones wire too long hanging on neck it should be lil short as compare to other earphnes. This review by using 2/3 days..dnt knw abt long term..

name: punith
title: Sound quality not that great. Functionaly good
content: The sound quality takes a big hit. I play have a lot that requires me to listen to audio ques, and I enjoy listening to music. Both of them were affected by the use of these. Also the ear plugs were slightly large and the rubber stiff enough to hurt my ears after continuous use

name: peaky_blinder
title: review after 5 months usage.
content: this should have come with a disclaimer-you will never look like Jaqueline Fernandez that you find in the manual coming along with this product. What I meant is not the cosmetic beauty of hers. The wire has to be twisted before you plug into the ear or it sticks out giving you an embarassing look in the public. This I learnt after several months into buying the product. Jaqueline was lucky enough to have somebody help her with the twisting part. On other accounts,. Sound Clarity - 4/5. Noise cancellation - 2/5. Gym compatibility(sweat, chaos) - 5/5

name: zakhir
title: Worst product ever from Amazon.
content: In just 3 months it one side stopped working. Gave it to boat company under warranty in the month of May and till now this month September i have not received my product and they customer care service never ever responds to call nor emails. They have a system which doesn't let your call connect. Don't buy this cheap product you will be in a loss. This a third class company. Better go for something better.

name: kamesh
title: Need to replace with good product
content: I'm not satisfied with this product.. when compared to wired headset it is not good.. Already I replaced this item once. This is the second item, here also I'm getting noise during call and disconnection while watching movies and not getting any alert during low battery. My friend using this same product, I have used his headset but didn't find any problems and also getting beep sounds while battery is going down.. Request you to replace with good product ASAP..

name: Sachin
title: Worst product for calling purpose
content: Please don't buy this product if you are using it for calling purpose, voice gets distorted and YOU CAN'T RETURN THIS PRODUCT ONCE YOU RECEIVE BUT ONLY REPLACE PRODUCT " Before purchasing please think twice, don't fall under trap by cost. If you using this earphone for listening music then it's a good for this price range but not at all for calling purpose..

name: Dr AAK
title: Review after 2 years
content: Bought 2 of these headsets in October 2018, one was replaced thrice and the other one twice. Now both are dead.!! The sound quality and Boats warranty policy is great, but the product won't last unfortunately. Lost the money spent on it.

name: Shivanshu Tripathi
title: Average Product
content: Iam writing this review after 3months yrrr....It's a good product for Listening Music due to its good base quality and clearity but worst for Calling because of its 0 level of noise cancellation...... You can't believe that if a dog bark at a distance of 500mtr. The person who is on a call with you, can easily listen the barking sound.... Overall product is average....

name: Gch
title: Good and durable
content: Using for 6 months. Good battery life of 8 hrs. Sound quality is fine. Can be connected to two devices at a time. The buttons for forward and previous tracks doesn't work properly. If you are getting it for below 1500, go for it. Overall it's good.

name: Yogesh
title: Great product with good quality sound.
content: Great company and good product. Bluetooth connectivity is good and very responsive. I am using it with two devices simultaneously, Laptop and mobile. Build quality is also good and have a good battery backup.

name: Ashish Kashyap
title: Appreciate this product for excellent features and quality..
content: Super bass with excellent and clear sound quality... Battery backup is awesome and also contain fast charging features that is make this product too good on this budget... Noise cancelation performance is also better.... Thank you boat for providing this product with bunch of excellent features on normal budget

name: Swapnil Jagdish KOTWAL
title: Best Bluetooth headphones ever.....
content: Best Bluetooth headphones ever.....!!. Excellent sound quality. Love Bass.. Battery life is decent full charge on 50 to 60% volume you can used upto 6hr.. After use of 9 month my headphones not working, I raised query on Boat site.. Then I got replacement new once with-in 21 days, Also good service from Boat...!!

name: Hrushikesh
title: Good ,but Replacement takes time
content: Product received did not work after 2-3 days of usage, the earphones weren't starting even after charging, the charging light wasn't glowing as well. So Now sent a replacement request and its probably replacement date is "5Nov to 1 December" which is Shocking.

name: Komal Prasad
title: Go for it!!!!!
content: Awesome battery life really is awesome continuously u can use this for 8 hours at least 😍. Now bass quality is 9/10. Mids 8/10. Highs 10/10!!!. Charging is not that fast but it is medium. It is very good do'nt take the cheap version of it spend a ₹100 more on this it will surely be worth it so now just go for it, I bought it for ₹1100

name: aishwarya patare
title: A good deal for 999
content: A review on 10 days usage. If you are buying this product under 1000 then it's a great product. Not worth if the price is more. So buy it in a sale deal. Bass is good but not great, if you are a bass lover then don't buy. Battery back is pretty decent. Mic is ok. People on the other side get to hear you but not so loud.

name: monishankar c
title: A good choice for an year , not worthy after that
content: Updated after 1 yr of usage 10.09.2020 :-. It's stopped working after 4 months. I have contacted boat team they fixed (took around 15 days).. Now after 1 yr the right side stopped working , unfortunately the warranty is over , so I have to stop using this. I think it's good for a year. Removing 1 star.. This one is awesome. Connects quickly. Keep working for long hours.

name: Nitesh
title: best Budget earphone with Known brand....
content: Got for 899 during sale..... for that price its best... Can connect upto two devices...... sound and range is good..... only down side is battery backup is 4-5 hrs only.... & charging time is 2hrs-2.30hrs...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Do not buy...go with oneplus
content: Totally worst product...i bought on 28 dec 2020 ..nd now 7th feb almost aftr 1month it is not working ...most of the times(9out of 10) not charging....sometimes auto disconnected ...functn buttons also not working ...

name: NVS Raj
title: Left side of the speaker stopped working
content: I bought this in October and have been using it sparingly. now the Left side speaker is not working. submitting a warranty claim and will see what their response is. certainly would not recommend to others.

name: Deepak Singh Yadav
title: Worst product, don't purchase.
content: After using for 6 months, i faced multiple problems:. 1. Sometimes while running, it will stop playing in between.. 2. From right earphone works fine, in left earphone voice volume became too low.. 3. Initial 6 months it was working fine.. 4. Battery backup, once fully charged, it can be used 7-8 hours only.

name: Amazon Customer
title: not happy with product
content: Look wise its good. Sound also ok. Buttons are strong ... Battery is biggest problem .. keep recharge it on daily basis .. that too i use it only for watching movies .. hardly 3 to 4 hrs per day. Next problem it keeps falling from ears ..

name: Nyaneshwar Jadhav
title: Great product by Boat
content: Amazing product by Boat supeb sound quality, more than average product quality feel of the product is good has a rubbish Matt texture. But the wire length is very long and that disturbs alot. Connectivity of the device is also good but hope on the newer version Boat uses Bluetooth 5.0

name: Kaushik D.
title: No replacement if headphones stop working after 2 weeks.
content: I ordered these headphones, they went well for the first 2 weeks after which I got them replaced, the replacement piece was even more faultier. There is no way of checking the headphones, and Amazon does not guarantee replacement even if the product is originally in the warranty time slab.. It seems like these type of headphones are programmed to stop working after sometime.

name: Shubham Shukla
title: HAZARDOUS FOR HEALTH - DON'T BUY IT !!
content: I have received this headphone. Honest feedback - Don't buy it. Reason being - It causes headache because of the magnet used in it. From the morning I have used it thrice, after 15-20 minutes of usage my head starts to pain and when I keep it aside my head becomes normal. I am going to consumer forum to complaint and Lodge a FIR against boat as this earphone is hazardous for health and it's quiet evident. Won't take much to prove them guilt. Please don't buy it, for your health it's hazardous.

name: Ashish r.
title: My experience was bad with product
content: One earpiece stop working with in 4 month. I replace the product but another product was worse with imbalance in sound. Didn’t expect this from the brand

name: Vishal
title: Value for money product if u ignore some flaws.
content: Brought this earphones for 900 during amazon sale. Great value for money. Fits the budget with average sound quality, only issue is with the ear buds it starts to hurt your ears after long use. Great battery life goes on for 4-5 hours as mention by BOAT. Far better than other bluetooth earphones. Bluetooth connectivity is also good with no disconnecting isssues.

name: Rhs
title: Worst earphone, waste of money
content: The wire torm out in 3 months. 1 ear bud was working even that also stopped now.. False off from hear and neck. wire is too long. buds are not mold firmly to wire. Dont buy any boat product. Cheap quality

name: Hrishikesh Suryawanshi
title: Perfect go for bass lovers in cheap price
content: The sound quality is very good. Especially this piece is for bass lovers because it gives a massive bass boost by default. It's a perfect go for edm lovers. Just one thing about this earphones is the wire is a little long but that's not a big issue i think. But overall this piece is very good concerned to it's comfortability and sound quality. I'm satisfied with the product

name: Rummy
title: Microphone can be placed under the chin
content: Worth for price. Good wireless headphone for mobile usage .. Not sure about music.. Microphone should have been on the left side of neck holder so that people on riding two wheeler can adjust it with left hand in india. Microphone can part can extended little bit so that it can be positioned under the chin to send a clear audio to other end.

name: Shakti Sarkar
title: Potent product for purchase
content: Sound quality is good... One problem that I found is the band is little weaker/flexible while biking it flies with the gust of wind.... Otherwise everything about it I liked very much...

name: Chetan G
title: Excellent product - Good for calling and conference calls.
content: I was looking for bluetooth earphones for daily conference calls and MsTeam calls and use on both on mobile and laptop and this is perfect. Meets all requirements and for the price - this is fantastic. Crystal clear sound. Simultaneous connects with both laptop and mobile. Extremely satisfied!!

name: SajidSmart
title: Technical Values Should Improve More
content: See Guys This Product is Awesome. No Change in this one . But after few Days oly it started Irritating me like hell . Issues like not getting paired , continuously being in On Position , Even Now while Im writing this Review Same Prolem Persists . im fedup of this Product , Feeling like to throw this Somewhere. One Time Properly Working Cannot Change Entire Usage Review

name: Chrys R
title: Terrible quality
content: The sound quality is acceptable from such a cheap pair but there is no proper noise cancellation. But the worst part is that the left earpiece has completely stopped working within 3 months!!. Theres 1 year warranty but no one responded to my request.. Dont waste money on it.

name: Priyank
title: Mic doesnot work properly during calls/meetings
content: Mic stopped working properly after 15 days of purchase, when on call, people are unable to hear your voice. You need to keep shouting and remain very very very close to the bluetooth device. I mainly purchased it for meetings so purpose is failed.

name: Punati vinod Chowdary
title: Genuine feedback
content: To be Genuine ... product is ok...we can njoy songs but if you want have a call with this bluetooth you feel very uncomfortable as receiver is unable to here your voice if your are in traffic...you can talk only when your in a closed door.... Overall is ok for 999/-

name: Nidhi Pandey
title: Poor microphone quality
content: There is some problem with the mic of this headphone.... whenever i'll call someone then people tell me that i'm not audible to them. Its really very disappointing. After paying a huge sum of money i did not expected this quality of mic.

name: Wrangler
title: Bang for your bucks
content: This is the top notch wireless Bluetooth earphone that I have used under 1K the sound quality is astonishing and not like anything I have used before, since I have used so many high end headphones I was surprised to see the sound reproduction and the amount of Bass I was getting from speakers.. "definitely recommend & definitely go for it if you want something like BIG-Bang for your bucks"

name: Varun gupta
title: Worst battery
content: I don't know about you guys, but I am really dissatisfied with the earphones I received. The biggest issue is of battery backup. I charge it 100% percent to get it drained out automatically without even connecting with my device in about 6 hours only. About noise cancellation it's not up to mark. Battery issue is biggest issue please do something about it.

name: Ramkumar Epuri
title: Earphones are not working and got replaced with new product
content: After 45 days my Earphones are stopped working.. I have registered my complaint in boat website, with my invoice. After that, xpress bees agent came and take the my earphones after 15days i.e., 20th Nov'19 they sent a replacement product and now it's working fine without any issues. Thank you boat team for the replacement...

name: Manas Kumar Bedi
title: Except battery nothing is good here
content: Quality is not good at all. Feels pin in air after long use. But battery backup is good.. Those who looking for a comfortable headphones , it's not for them.

name: RABIN DUTTA
title: Absolute delicacy for soft music lovers.
content: It's a very good neckband. Music is soft and bass is decent. Great for listening music for long hours. Calls are very clear. Battery back up is mind blowing. Build quality is great and it fits in my neck smoothly. Though plastic made, it's sturdy and light weight. Overall it's a great choice. Go for it.

name: Jeevitha.g
title: Vera level product from boat
content: Vera level product from boat.sound quality is super cool.Noise cancellation wrks perfect and bass is asusal proves its boat🤩 one and only thing i think weird is altert voice it could have been a female voice😅 other voice its all cools and superb

name: Navitha Saju
title: Noise cancellation & battery good. Sound quality not so good.
content: The sound has more of bass and very little treble effect. If you like to listen to your music with slightly higher setting of treble, you will be disappointed. Battery is very good and so is noise cancellation. It's quite big and sturdy though, will not go unnoticed.

name: Hari M.
title: Excellent quality, despite the low price!
content: Decent bass (when ear pods are properly positioned / seated, as is the case with any in-ear headphones), good bluetooth connectivity, affordable price. Been using for about 2 months now, and all is well.

name: Ruchika
title: Not charging after 15 -20 days of use
content: Bought in July 2019, hardly used for 15 -20 days. Stopped charging and when tried with a different charger charged hoti 40 percent in an hour but on usage became 20 percent with 5 min of use. After that turns super hot when I connect to charger. Total waste of money.

name: Raj
title: Must buy for a Bass lover, That too pocket friendly.
content: Nice earphone with super bass, good build quality with rich music experience. Thanks Amazon for quick delivery and amazing product. Will definitely recommend it.

name: YOGESH MINA
title: Bluetooth connectivity issues
content: Sound, noise cancellation, and bass quality all are best ... But problem in Bluetooth connectivity. As per my experience of 1 month. It's sound comes 1 or 2 seconds late than device. And due to online classes it is automatically switch off and also sometimes sound coming stops automatically. Rest is good product for songs and all things

name: Dnyaneshwar Shinde
title: Please solve my issue asap...
content: Dear Sir/Madam,. I have purchase boAt Rockerz 255 Sports Wireless Headset with Super Extra Bass dated 13 Oct 2019 but last 3 months my left side earphone not working since last 2 month i m trying to reach you but I cant Reach you .. I Request you please solve problem asap.. Your fast action will be appreciate for me.... Dnyaneshwar Shinde. 7755979677/9970019564.

name: Jeywanth
title: Disappointed
content: I was eager to experience the sound. But the product itself didn't turn ON. Its been 12 days i raised my defective complaint. But no response from technical team yet. Not even charging up. It was total upset. Model name BS1500

name: Rajesh Sivasankaran
title: Cool Product
content: Don't have much range. Fit well and i have got it with discounted price and that was awesome. Having average backup as per the the product description. For a normal user like me it is superb. For extra base, back up, design go for a different one.

name: ISMAIL KHALEEL
title: Awesome product.
content: Boat rockerz 255 pro Bluetooth wireless headset is very good and speed charging also works really well, only issue is with charging cable which comes along with it, the cable is not good apart from that, boat bluetooth wireless headset is very good awesome product.

name: Vasundhara Sharma
title: Waste of money (overpriced)
content: Pro: As a earphone they are really great. Great great noise cancellation and sound.. Con: I bought these in october 2019 and in April 2020 they stopped working. I mean I did not spend ₹900 to use them for 6 months. Even ₹50 fake earphones has longer lifeline.

name: haran babu
title: low sound very bad product dont buy this
content: very low sound coming even in 100% volume, very bad product ear buds are also big

name: Tanuja
title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED FOR LONG USAGE AND WORKOUTS
content: First and foremost the sound quality is great . Secondly, this earphone is great for working out and long usage (like 6 to 8 hours) . You will experience no pain in your ears until or unless you put the earbuds too deep in your ears .I highly recommend this for an average earphone user because they are just great for a price of 900.

name: Shivani
title: Look for something better
content: Sound quality is very bad and signal reception is very low. If I keep my phone in my trousers pocket while wearing headset, it usually doesn't work. I have to keep mobile in hand to listen to a song without frequent hiccups. The performance is worst during calls, i dont understand the problem but i receive weird disturbance while someone is speaking at other end. Its very frustrating to switch back to earpiece mode and listen again

name: Faique Shakil
title: Good Earphone not Great
content: The music is good.. But, there is one problem the buzzing sound is coming fromm left ear bud, when music stops. It comes for 4-6 seconds and then stops. the sound is like if a CD is running in the CD-Drive. Please, tell me if that is okay?

name: ATTULNNAIK
title: boat rockerz doesn't rock
content: I WAS ALREADY USING boat rockerz 255 before buying this item, but its not of that quality, it doesn't say boat rockerz 255 after pairing, sound is to loud like an ordinary earphone, no voice cancellation feature in place, moreover what is hands free mic I did not receive it, I was looking for surround sound as described in your 'MORE DETAILS' it's disappointing to say the list

name: Ronak
title: Disappointed with the product
content: Disappointed with the Experience. The selling point for me was the battery life and the sound system which was expected to be good. But it’s really disappointing. I tried to give these away to another guy for free who returned it to me for free. And I can’t even return this product! I can only get replacement! The vendor is really really looking to off-load these products. PEOPLE! PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS

name: Gaurav Padawe
title: Worst !
content: Got this free with Huawei Y9 2019, claimimg that they are 3000 INR earphones. The sound quality is worst with Huawei Y9, Zenfone 3, MI devices. Not even worth 3000 INR but works good with lenovo devices.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Boat shows it's true colours
content: I purchased this in June 2019. As expected, the headphones worked fine for a year and now the same old problem has cropped up. One of the earpieces does not work. It was working fine and I charged it. And just like that, it stopped working. I had faced a similar kind of issue with the Boat wired headset as well.. But this headset worked pretty well, till it lasted.. My request to Boat is to improve on their quality.

name: Vintoo Kaul
title: Faulty ear buds
content: I had to gift this to my son.. Very disappointing to see the quality as the right ear buds has no sound.. It’s a faulty piece. I need a urgent replacement.. I was given a Retailers contact details but my mail bounced back and when i try calling the number, it says" we are closed today" . How come Saturday i got the same reply and today being a working day and monday, again the voice mail says " we are closed today"... there is something wrong somewhere.... I need a help on priority as this kind of attitude is not accepted.....

name: Sai Kiran
title: not working after 6 months
content: the sound quality and noise cancellation are good but right earpiece stopped working after 6 months. the product is still under warranty but unable to claim it because they have removed the product from their support site. so better buy this with less life expectancy.

name: rohit shukla
title: True Review
content: I bought this i stead of 255 because of fast charging, I have Sony, JBL and Boat, Boats sound quality and bass is nice. Its fast charging is like 10 mins charge and it works 30-40 mins easily

name: Sunil sharda
title: Low quality Bluetooth wireless headfon of Boat
content: Not very gud product...it gets disconnected from bluetooth automatically n whn its charging get exhausted thn also it shows 80% battery remaining all the time..which is very confusing..several time its pairing also disconnected at any point of time

name: IshMak
title: Overall Value for money product
content: Sound quality and noise cancellation is decent. Bluetooth connectivity is quick. Range is also very good.. Updated review... Battery life is very less. Worked only for 2 days in full charge.

name: Sandeep
title: Bluetooth connectivity Drops
content: I had used Boat earlier also. Now after a year, I bought it again. The same problem continues. The Bluetooth connectivity is not good. Connection drops on the first day of usage itself. Initially, I thought some prob with my phone. But no, it's happening with other devices also. The sound quality is good but connectivity and durability should be improved.

name: Elu
title: No dual connection
content: This one is the best bluetooth earphones you can get at this price range. However I'm disappointed that it states on website as dual pairing but it does not. Can someone from boat check the same.

name: Priyanshu Sharma
title: Some noise in the background.
content: There's a light hush noise in the background when the earphones are on and detecting sound. You can notice this sound for some time when the earphones are not returning any sound. Noise Cancellation is good, Bass is good, sound is good, built quality is good, comfort depends on your ear type.. If you are an average user who just needs earphones, you can go for it, but it can't be your best option in any case.

name: Ganesh Jadhav
title: Good quality product......From BoAt
content: Boat team thank u. this is awesome headphones bass and vocals are fabulous......... No sound bounse in high bass boosted song on 70% volume. Calling And battery backup is quite good...... Well done BoAt Yeam.....Thank u

name: Yogesh Dhawde
title: A famous brand with overpriced and chip built quality product but sound is good product
content: Pros - sound quality is good and bass to. Cons - overpriced. Built quality is worst. Charging slot is too tight you might broke it if you try to unplug the wire. Wire is hanging on your face and neck higher chances of braking wire. Bluetooth range is not up to the mark. Battery indicator will always there to full you.. The real price should be 600-700

name: rk Thevar
title: Average
content: + Decent quality, average sound, light weight and good battery life last full day mostly & charges fast.. - too bassy & muddy vocals, low BL range, average mic, in-ear peice not comfy enough for long hour listening.. = For 1k it is ok for commute listening and answering call.

name: Jitendra
title: Good for gym purpose
content: Using this from 2-3 months. All is good apart from battery discharge. It 100% for 5 hours and then in one hour it will 0%. I don't think its a big deal and this issue is there when I bought it.. As per its design it can be use in gym with different exercises for that I have to set it above my ears sometime and sometime opposite of it.. I won't recommend for long hours uses. It will cause pain in ears.

name: Manish Mishra
title: Nice headphone from boAt
content: Nice product from boAt. Pros : sound quality, battery life, easy to use and carry, fast connectivity to ur devices.. Cons : after using for an hour or more it pains in ur ear,so u need to take it off for some time .. Conclusion: value for money. boAt needs to look into this issue.. U may go for it 👍🏻

name: Puneet Aseri
title: Very good
content: I play PUBG with it. Gives very free hand to control and no lag.. Music quality is good.. Can run almost 3-4 hours continuously.. Cons:. Sometimes difficult to connect. Multiple times needs to restart it.

name: Sarath
title: Not the best but better.
content: Good quality sound, noise cancelling is better but not the best. The length of the headphones is little too much (With respect to my beady size) . Battery back up is not good (up to 1 and half days backup is what I am getting)

name: WHR
title: 1 side Sound not work properly and then Off
content: I have purchased this Product but 1 side sound is not work properly and after 1 month 1 side sound is totally off and I am also compliant Regarding this and generate the complaint I'd but company not resolve my issue.... so I really disappoint to this Product

name: Arun Veer
title: Eco problem during call
content: This is my replacement order and facing same issue. Other person can't here my voice properly during the call via Bluetooth. They can only here background disturbance even i sit in room. Eco problem! Deciding to return and order some other brand. This is only good for music.

name: Mansi
title: Good
content: I had purchased that to gift that to someone..... Overall the earphones are good.... But I had returned that because I want to purchase the airpodes of same brand.... Sound quality is OK....

name: Vivek VK
title: Worst ever product i bought from AMAZON
content: Worst BT Earphone in 1.6K range. After 3-4 months it started Bluetooth connectivity issues. During 4th month left side earphone stopped working. It was understandable that sometimes electronics malfunction so i raised service request to boat service desk and they asked to ship back the earphone for repair. Now its been almost 3 weeks with no feedback nothing and no reply on mail. Customer care number is used to fool customers as no one will reply even if you are on HOLD for 30mins.

name: dipak gavit
title: Good quality product and Worst quality after sales service...
content: Everything is good about quality, but after-sales service is Worst and after 11 months of use, no audio in the right-side speaker. the company replaced the product with new ones, but it's like a dummy(cheap), bad audio quality, don't buy it.

name: SDT
title: Very Good!!!
content: Great battery and good audio quality. I love it. This is goes with me to office, shop, market everywhere.. - Good connectivity.. - Good audio quality of bass and treble.. - Good look. - Great comfort in wearing for several hours.. - Good battery.

name: Rajeev
title: Too loud. Music isn't clear.
content: I bought the earphones around 15 days ago so it's too early to say about longevity but what I have observed is that the sound quality is not good. Its too loud and hurts the ear and you don't get to notice the low notes of music clearly. One of my friends has Mi Bluetooth earphones and they have much greater clarity.

name: Ramesh Karmar
title: The Bluetooth headset is ok.
content: The Quality of music you listen is OK. If you are looking for a cheapest and good bluetooth headset with mic for receiving calls and listening music this might be the one. The battery life is also good. Look wise is stylish, I have the red one. If you want to hear only music and need a cheaper one I will recommend go for a wired one Sennheiser CX 180. There are many others if you have money to spend ;-) .

name: Maneesh
title: Stopped working within 5 months with normal usage of 2-3 hours per day.
content: Sound quality is good but the quality of product is pathetic. It stopped working within 5 months first right side stopped working and after few weeks left side stopped working too. I tried to claim warrenty but no reply and no one is attending the call. They don't even bother about their customer. very unsatisfied by the service and customer support.

name: sarwar hayat
title: Review after a month
content: Pros:. Competitive rate.. Cons:. 1. Way too background noise.. 2. Fake battery back. (Drops to 80% to 20% in an hour.). 3. Hard Earbuds. Ear starts paining after 2+ hours. 4. Lot of connection bugs. Disconnects automatically after incoming call.. Suggestion: Do not buy.

name: Vayujeet
title: Choose BOULT over BOAT. This is waste.
content: Worst Bluetooth earphones ever. Go for BOULT anytime. Bluetooth connectivity fails even when you go 5 feet away from your cell. I remember using my Boult earphones from bedroom till hall without any problem. Sound breaks even when ur cell is in ur jeans back pocket. Worst battery backup..Boult kills boat here as well. I bet you will get a feeling or using wire earphones..bcz dts d max range it can perform average.. Do not buy and then regret.

name: Saswat
title: Bang for buck, but.....
content: Got it at 900/- at a sale and it's a bang for the price. The Bluetooth connectivity is quite good and connects properly everytime. The range is around 10 metres and the sound distorts if you are in another room. The sound quality is okayish.. Neither too loud, nor too low. The disappointment is that the bass is flat. Don't know whether this defect is only on my device or for the entire range. Battery backup is around 4-5 hours. But will drain your phone's battery really fast. It's a really good deal for the price, but it is not that great!. Hit Like of this helped you.. Happy buying! ☺️

name: Ritwik Gogoi
title: Pros and cons
content: Considering the price point and the brand the product is superbly amazing. I bought it at Rs 1200 and till now I am not facing any problem except the microphone that is not that good and sometimes when I travel in a two wheeler there is a Bluetooth lag ( rarely ) . The noise cancellation pretty good but you can't wear this earphone for too long as I had faced headache after 1-2 hrs of use (depends on the individual)

name: Meghana Mohanraj
title: DO NOT GO FOR THIS.
content: Do NOT go for this. Bought it thinking about the company and it's supposedly nice features. First 4 months, Everything was fine. Noice cancellation was good. But the 5th month, without any warning the right side stopped working. Morning it was fine. Evening spoilt. It was exactly in the Same place where I had kept it. No wire cut. Nothing. Just like that. Paying so much we expect it to be durable for atleast an year. But 4 months??! It's absurd. I do not recommend this to anyone. Waste of money. Nonsense

name: Steven paul
title: Value for 💰
content: Using it since one year. Support is good. Music quality is good. Battery is good. I had bought it when it's value was 999. Total value for money. Will give it 5/5

name: Kmh
title: Read reviews before buying this brand headphones.
content: 1.Initial 3 months product was good.. 2.Then experienced issues with bluetooth connectivity.. 3.Within 1 year, there was no sound on 1 side of the headphone.. 4. Customer care was pathetic. Somehow they seemed to have ensured my calls crossed 1 year warranty period.

name: srivathsav
title: Bluetooth headphones
content: I bought this product in Jan-2019. At first I would like to say about sound quality. The sound quality is good, and its valued for the price. As the time passes I faced few connecting issues. The main problem is with the quality of ear phones. After 9 months of purchase I faced a issue that one of my earphone isn't working. As my product is still under warranty, got it repaired. Then again after 9 month's I faced the same issue. So lost trust in Boat earphone as the product itself can run for nine months and their service will help in running another 9 months. So I would say that if u wanna use it for an yr then go for it. Else take your decision

name: VISHAL B.
title: Fake-Duplicate  Product Received
content: I am sorry to this Amazon.in and Boat Company. I found your product which is defective and fake.I purchased Boat Bluetooth Rockers earphones on 21st Jan 2020 and by this month it's just not working the charging slot isnt working.Later, I took the earphone to workstation the person told these is fake and duplicate one. Which is just sold at 250 rs out. Dear buyers check the review and please don't buy the product they sending you the defective and the fake ones.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good product and Worst customer sevice
content: My boat Rockerz 255 initially work really well without any issue, but after 6 months one by one issue was raised.. Till today also my headphones is under warranty, I tried to contact to boat Rockerz customer Team, they seems always busy or not receiving call.. I sent mail also but no response it's really bad customer service I would say.. Boat team your product was great but your service is one of the worst.

name: Vasanthkumar H G
title: Headache Rockerz Bluetooth sucks
content: No at all good quality i think there are two much radiation 4days used but got all 4 days lest side head ache, Previously i used sony wc200 Bluetooth it was really super i dint face any issue but this Bluetooth really not good from BoAT. I have used earlier BoAT earphones were it was very good but in Bluetooth side it's not good please don't buy anyone

name: Aneesh Kumar
title: E
content: One side stopped working after 7 months. Then got it replaced and it again stopped working after 6 months. I would have given 5 stars if they would have atleast worked for a year. Sound quality is amazing. They can be used for gaming also. There is no lag in audio while playing games.

name: @avinash_pk_1
title: Worked well for 1 year
content: Perfectly worked well for exactly for 1 year later battery issues started and Now it isn't turning on but for 1 year 100% guaranteed product, i have used it very roughly so.... Satisfied

name: Amazon Customer
title: Boat product is just fake
content: Do not buy as it has defect issue it's right earphones stop working it's waste of money it stopped working right after 6 months of use it was still under warranty so I did ask for service of the earphones to boat service center they simply ignore your complaints. Even though u are still under warranty boat company refuse to provide service to you

name: Faizan SF
title: Admirable Wireless Earphones
content: Worth spending money. Don't even waste a second, go for it. Sound Quality is Superb. Bass is simply awesome. Got more than I expected. Really good product Boat. Thank you so much 😀(30-September-2019). Editing this comment today on 4-June-2020.. These Earphones are still THE ROCKERZ. No defect till date. Bass is still awesome with perfect sound quality and I didn't encounter any connectivity issues yet. Battery life is good as was expected.. If planning to buy one, you cannot ignore after reading this review.

name: Sai Krishna
title: Good, but will be out of use very easily.
content: I have bought this recently and And after a month of use, the charging pin in the earphones got broke, and I am be able to charge it anymore. A fault with the manufacturing.. Bluetooth connectivity is super fast, you don't get to choose, some times glitchy.. Sound quality is good but can be better.. Noise Cancellation - okok. But about the Charging, it lasts not so long.. Not recommended.

name: Krunal Gediya
title: Awesome | Cheap | Long Lasting
content: Pros:. 1. Superb sound quality considering that it's a wireless earphones. 2. Comfortable to wear. 3. Bass quality is also nice. 4. Battery backup is very good. 5. Noice cancellation is pretty good too. Cons:. 1. Sometimes Bluetooth connectivity fluctuates and it disconnects/reconnects automatically. 2. Cannot wear while Jogging unless you find a way to stick them to one place. While running it tends to bounce off and eventually drops off from your ears

name: Anil Prajapati
title: Quantity is number one priority.
content: Great sound quality and bass was purely classic with this price it is great product from great brand.. Durability look good let's see in long term i gifted this to someone so i can't tell you about battery life but i tried this once for its condition and I'm in love with this I'll buy for myself too

name: arjun
title: 😊😊😊😊😊Nice product 😊😊😊😊😊
content: It's very good Product and happy to share my feed back on this form.. I will circulate all my contacts to buy this.. Amazon thank you for good product selling 😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊😊

name: Devendra chouhan
title: Service is very bad..need not buy boat product..
content: I have purchased boat rockerz 255 . After 6 months it one side stop working I have registered complain on boat website and earphone reached to service centre .one and half month have completed till now I had not recieved my earphone and I have call and mailed to boat but they are not giving reliable reply... Product is really good but service is very bad .

name: Madhavi Sikarwar
title: Can't be use regularly.!
content: Best earphones for high sound and high bass lovers but not so comfortable for whom they like peaceful sound.. Even, not good for ears sometimes it causes headache due to high sound even at minimum volume.. Otherwise battery backup is good about 6-7 hours continuously by 50 minutes charging approx

name: Sufi
title: BASS , SOUND QUALITY , BATTERY BACKUP
content: I purchased this product for bass and yes it delivered , In these range this is the best buy BASS , SOUND QUALITY , BATTERY BACKUP everything is good BASS is Superb , SOUND QUALITY is clear while calling also , BATTERY BACKUP is 8 hours if u continuously uses it if not then can last more than 1 Day.. All in all in this range this is the best to buy

name: Shivam Jain
title: Worst after sale service
content: The main reason for this negative review is their after sale service. After few months of use, one of the side stopped working. I registered a compalin on their portal anf got the ticket number also. It has already passed more than 3 months when I filed the complain, but haven't got any response from the boat support. I ttied calling their customer care multiple time, but no one receives the call. Very bad after sale service.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very bad product, not value for money.
content: The product has one major problem that it gets disconnected automatically number of times and then gets connected automatically which is very disturbing. I regret to buy this product but the return window is closed otherwise I would have returned this product. I've got two headphones of boat but I have now decided not to buy boat headphones ever again in future. The magnet is very weak, even battery is not good.

name: Ankur raj
title: Average product in it's range
content: Within the range of 1k,this one is good..! But on comparing it with mivi thunderbeat,I would go for mivi.. Cons :. you can't carry it in your pocket. It feels something is hanging to your neck. Not satisfied with the base. Bluetooth range is somehow okay. Pros:. Noise canceling is good. Sound is ok. Battery lasting: fabulous. Conclusion: average product

name: Y
title: Good enough
content: The bass booms, its good for casual listening.. The bluetooth disconnects every 30 minutes-ish when you're on call. But that could be a problem with my phone.. Overall, I'm happy with this product.

name: Sneha
title: Ear Bud
content: The big issue is ear buds always fall. Noise cancellation is very low. Sound quality is good. I have already replaced once as it had got damaged in 2months only . Big issue for me ear bud it always fall and we won't get it extra also in market . The length of the band could be still small so it can be stable to our neck.

name: Omar Mirza
title: All good but battery guage inaccurate i believe...
content: Battery showing in mobile is not accurate.. drops very quickly from 60 % to 20% almost in 15-20mins and get off... otherwise everything is fine.. its product defect or all have same problem....? But overall backup is good.. just percentage showing in mobile is not accurate...

name: Tushar
title: good product
content: after using it for more than 5 months, the main issue i face is that battery is not sufficient for whole day of continuous use. also it works great indoors, but in train or in noisy place, noise cancellation is next to nothing.

name: SUKESH
title: Doesn't fit in the ears
content: The noice cancellation of this earphone is above all the earphones in this range. But for me it was not useful. Well..even after it comes with ear support..it doesn't fit my ear..comes out of the year as i make some movement... Thus not meant for me..

name: Mitesh Dhandhukiya
title: Perfect Product to use
content: 1.Connectivity and Comfortably both are great. It is to maintain and light weight. It is easy to keep with us whole day and no chance to lost it. After 5 months of use I realized that it is one of the best Product for my ears.. 2.The battery life is awesome. I used to Charge every 3 days. Sound quality is very good of this product. no headache after using continuously 3 hours for meeting or lectures.

name: SWATI GARG
title: Worst earphones with the worst after sales service.
content: The headphones keep disconnecting every 3-4 minutes. There's a problem with connection.. I've charged them full, I've changed my phone, but still the problem is there.. Service is the worst, I've written them a mail describing my problem and avail the warranty but no response. If anyone knows please let me know how can I return these or avail the warranty.

name: DHIRENDRA CHAUDHARY
title: MADE IN INDIA product with nice battery back up
content: very solid reason to buy this is it's MADE IN INDIA.. second look and sound quality is very good.

name: Ankit Tiwari
title: Best in class product
content: The bass and treble is well balanced and is very good in comfort using since 1 yr no problem faced yet but the little problem is that battery is not much long lasting it may last 3_5 hrs barely , and voice clearity is awesome and the band has soft touch must use product

name: Sanyami Kothari
title: Don't go for it!
content: Product is good with its purpose but I'm very disappointed with its functioning. My left earphone has stopped working within 6 months. I'm trying to get it replaced and no one is there to receive my call on the other side, wow! I paid 1400 for this service!. Same case was with my friend's earphone. One side of it isn't working and no one is there to replace it despite the product is in the warranty.. Majorly disappointed with Boat!

name: Dinesh Kumar
title: Nice sound, good bass
content: Very good sound quality. Bass is good. Battery backup is awesome at this price range. Wire is little long. Overall very good in the price range of one thousand.

name: Nishad
title: Okay
content: Good product but the sound quality is average. You can make out the difference in the sound that you hear. Overall good product but would prefer a product with better sound. We should get an option to test the sound quality and then buy

name: Latha
title: A Better Choice Under 1K👍👍 !!
content: Straight to the point.... Bass - No problem.... Sound - Decent sound...Vocals no problem...Treble somewhat.... Mic - Ok/Average. Comfort - So much Better than 225(wired), which was soooo uncomfortable. Build quality - Good but definitely not for rough use.... Charging - came with 100%...Charging port is somewhat tight...Rubber opening make you tensed.... Overall a Decent/Good product but only under 1K price !! So look for Deals👍

name: Amazon Customer
title: Disappointed
content: It's working great at start but using it for 1 year this isn't working at all...it seems like it doesn't worth the penny... If I had spend money then I would have expected it to work as long as possible but it isn't.

name: Santosh Anumalla
title: Worst product
content: Worst product & waste of money, unlucky that I checked the product after completion of return date and now have to bare the loss of Rs.1700/-, as can hear the sound from one side head set only, did not expected this from AMAZON.. Won't recommend anyone for this product and AMAZON.. Extremely worst as I bought it to gift my spouce on account of our 1st Anniversary.. Worst product and the dealer.

name: Kunal Lokhande
title: Good earphones for bass lovers.
content: Good headphones for base lovers, though the mids and lows could have been better.. After around 10 month had issue with Bluetooth range and one side earphone stoped working. Under warranty got it replace but the replace process was very slow taking about 22 days.

name: The buyer
title: Not good not bad
content: I gor first unit. I that sound was good but battery life was just 2 hours.. Now i got this replaces unit and sound quality is not good as first unit. Battey is also not that good. As per my experience the difference are in units itself. Same product has different sound and battery quality .

name: ROHIT PATIL
title: boAt Rokerz 255 sports
content: This was my first Bluetooth earphones and mark my words my experience with these were awsome .the built design is so comfortable which give you a very good feel, and talking about the battery backup it's so amazing as compared to other brands ,the design of earbuds are soo good which fits perfectly in ears and u can be assured of its fitting it will not fall even if you went running with it, and the Bluetooth gets connet to mobile or any other device very easily.

name: Ravi R.
title: not working after 4 months of ussge
content: product is gud but it dnt show the exact battry lyf left on ur earphn,if u"ll charge 10 mints it will show 80% but within 10 mints of use the battry will drain.. so need improvement in dis area.. after 4 months of usage its not at all working,tell me wat to do

name: Narender Kumar
title: A value for Money product
content: Product is very good and worth for money.. Sound quality is very good.. Bettery is also fine.. Build quality is great.. I would like to say thanks to amazone for fastest delivery.. But the product packing seal was opened.. Seller service is not up to marks.

name: Kapil Mandloi
title: Not a good choice- retured
content: There will be continuous humming voice in background which will be irritating while pausing/playing sound.. Not suitable for calling.mic is not that good quality.. one more demerit is that rubber strap on earphone. that is just sticked with glue which gets off in 3 days only.. Though purchased for only rs.955/- even returned for bad quality

name: Muleva Paresh
title: Sound Quality ❤
content: Very good product you must go without hesitation.. Using after 3 months. Pros:. 1.Sound quality with good bass. 2.Classy build quality and look. 3.battery is good around 5 hours. Cons:. 1.After using 1 hour , it will give pain in ears (but it is ok). 2.Not a good option for gym or sports activites

name: Yaseer Mazumder
title: Should go for it
content: The products was upto my expectations it did well in all terms the battery life was also good but the only thing was the charging time it was so frustrating to charge it till 100 after all when the battery goes under 50 the charge runs out very quickly but overall the products is very good I got more than 6hrs of battery life everytime I charged upto 100 in simple words around 9 to 10 hrs

name: Shivam Gupta
title: Great earphones!
content: The sound quality is fine, the bass is also okay. They are very light, so if you use them while running or working out you don't even feel them. The battery life is also good. Most importantly if you work out or run then you don't have to constantly worry about the wire being pulled. So for ₹999 these are a good catch.

name: Jignesh Bhalsod
title: average sound, battery drains quickly, stop functioning after shorter duration.
content: nothing so great about the headset, too pricey based on the performance of this product. proce should be around 500 for this kind of quality, should have bought other less known brand than this. start giving me sign of poor battery and sound quality just after my return window was closed.. Edit - not only battery issue after usage of mere 6 months both side speakers stop working only working when twisting and trying to bend the cable , cheapest quality of bluetooth i have ever had. not recommending to anyone.

name: Dinesh
title: Good product -worst customer service by BOAT dealer
content: After 6month of usage one of the side not working, when checked on website this is common problem and worst part customer service is not good they do not pick call. It's better not to buy-people can save their precious time.

name: Abhishek S.
title: Stopped working
content: Stopped working after 1 week usage, not durable and battery back up is not up to mark. no response from customer service centre. very disappointed

name: B
title: Nice and value for money
content: Good noise cancellation, very good sound. Good battery life. WOrth it, a mjst to have.. However, it cannot connect to multiple devices (e.g. ipad and iphone ) simultaneously like plantronics.

name: ANKIT HASMUKHBHAI MISTRY
title: Performance is not good, I'm dissatisfied with this boat earphone
content: My earphone is not not working properly, sound quality is not clear some time it not connected with my phone bluetooth device and on phone call micro phone not working properly so that in voice is not listed other person on call, it's not working good , as per prise earphone performance is not so good. I want to my refund back or replace me with new one. I'm not satified with your product , its west of my money....

name: Ayush sharma
title: These boat rockerz are average. Don't expect much from them.
content: Hey guys,. Boat rockerz 255. I expected much from it. Sound is okay I think. It's loud bass is clear but the welcome sound and all those things are very average. Overall experience is not that great as it should be. You'll feel like you are using some local product. If you have experienced some good earphones or headphones earlier. You'll not like them for sure.. Thank you

name: AmazonCustomer
title: Battery life ☹️
content: It takes about an hour or so to charge the battery to be 100% , however just about 80% and 5 minutes later the headphones is switched off. Rest all is ok but if the battery ain't good what's the point in buying this no matter what the discount. Disappointed. Plus there is on exchange only and no returns

name: Bharath K
title: Not reliable
content: The headphones feel fragile and won't fit around the neck properly. The headphones stopped working after 2 months, it doesn't charge. It's dead. I was using JBL wireless headphones, it's been almost a year it works like a charm.

name: arul
title: Can buy without a doubt
content: Worth for a 1000rs far better than Boult and noise. Battery will come for 1 day for regular users ,sound quality is good but not excellent , causing pain after wearing helmet for 20 minutes but it's the same in all headsets

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not worth of 1500/- battery always discharged.
content: I will not work after 4 months of continuous use. Battery always discharged. You use it once and battery all over. Bought it if 1500/- what a cheat.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor quality of the product
content: Waste of money . Within two months the left side of earpiece isn't working . Inspite of the fact that there is one year warranty , when u raise a complaint there is no reply to ticket generated . Tried calling many times to the costumer care but no reply . Never expected this low quality from boat Bluetooth earphones . Poor quality of product and bad customer service .

name: DJ
title: Good bass, best for music. Refrain making calls, intermediate battery life
content: The bass is amazing. It's good for listening to music. Fit may vary, I have issues with left ear fit. The mic does not cancel background noise, it's a nightmare for person on other side of the call. The battery life is short.

name: Arnab
title: Review
content: Pros:. - fast and easy connectivity. - sound quality is good. - bass is good. Very good product if you want to just listen tousic or movies... Cons:. - Pathetic noise cancellation. Even the slightest nearby sound is AMPLIFIED. - Battery life is very very poor. - Charging time high.. Worst product if uiu want to use it for calls.

name: Madhur Tiwari
title: Important Review Information
content: Good Wireless Earphones but if you buy for playing games like pubg mobile pls don't buy any wireless earphones go to wired earphones they gives you better experience. The sound quality is excellent and noise cancellation is working properly on crowded places. Noise cancellation is work only when the phone is near. Bluetooth connectivity is excellent. Go for it it's worthy..

name: saumendra mohapatra
title: Worst headset
content: If your money is precious to you then never ever buy this earphone for god's sake.. Sound quality is very poor and battery performance is worst and whenever I m listen to music or watching video it is buffering and the voice is cutting down on repeated basis.. My honest review to this is not to buy ever

name: Aravind
title: Insane value for money
content: I have used a couple of budget wireless earphones in my life and this is by far the best one. The sound quality is just too good for the price. Noise cancellation is just average. The sound stage is definitely on the base heavy side but not too basey. There isn't much loss in sound quality when increasing the volume. On the whole this is a really good earphone and a amazing deal. I recommend this to anyone trying to but their first pair of wireless earphones.

name: Neeraj
title: Was disappointed at first few days, but now more than happy now
content: writing after using it for more than 4 months.. At first lil disappointed due toh connectivity issue, many times it gets disturbance I believe could be bcos of frequency overlapping. But I want to talk about today's experience I am traveling for around 8 hrs now its incredibly working awsm, no battery issues, no connectivity issues, still 60% battery remains. I think its bcos of short distance range.. Earlier I used to take it everywhere hung up on my neck and it everytimes it took time to reconnect. So all in all happy with it now.

name: Narayan
title: Not suitable for calling. Only for music.
content: For calling sometimes there is no sound of caller, but when disconnect the Bluetooth then I can hear the caller on phone. So pathetic. This is only for music not for calling.

name: Digvijay singh chundawat
title: Bass quality is very poor sound clarity is ok ok. Better great charging fast not for music 🎶
content: I have doubt it's real are duplicate because sound quality is very poor very .. its number one selling brand but sound quality bass quality is very poor even in hip hop song. Majja ni aaya ...

name: PM
title: Poor connectivity during call.
content: Poor connectivity, even distance is less than 2ft. Voice break in call and sometimes in music. Tridled with few different phones to make sure no compatibility issue, but all time connectivity issue. For this high price, not upto mark. Box packing was used. Seems like supplier keep rotating faulty used item.

name: Vinod Nair
title: Complaint raised on the issue not responding..
content: I bought this product . In 3 months time one side of the ear piece is not working..they told there is a warranty for that either it will be repaired or it will be changed... I have raised a request one week back till now no one came to take the product from me.. when I called customer care of Boss services they kept my call in hold and after 15 min they told that they get back to me ...till now no one called ... I think all these warranty story are just for sake...they are not really cared for solving the issue ..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Lag in audio when watching movies with VLC (slightly lagging)
content: Sound quality is 3.8/5. Bass is good 4/5. Call clarity bad 2.5/5. Bluetooth range is 5 to 5.5 meters. Sound distorted when you move to the next room.. boAt Bassheads 242 Wired Headset is better in every way.. And most importantly there is a slight lag in video and audio.... If you watch movies you will a lag.. which is why I am returning it.

name: NK
title: Headache headphones with ear pain
content: This is not upto the mark... not value for money... 1599Rs is too much for its quality, because it gives headache in 30min of use, and it gives ear pain, not at all user friendly very rough headphones with so much of discomfortness, worth for 1000rs not worth for 1599rs, if u gonna use for more than 1 hr a day... don't buy this product. Very disappointed...

name: Mayank
title: Just amazing audio quality
content: The audio quality is just amazing!! Powerful bass and crystal clear audio. I haven't tested the battery's capacity though....but it took me around 1 hour to bring down the battery from 100% to about 85% at 70% of volume. So it seems the battery can easily last for 5 hours. Overall, it is an amazing earphone at this price range with excellent audio quality and noise cancellation.

name: santosh
title: Product is ok
content: I ordered this product on lightening deal. I got at 999. Product is good but used low quality plastic used in neckband after used 2 days left side wire loose from neckband attachment. Left this afterall product is good.. *Sound clear, Bass also deep.. *Bluetooth connectivity range disturb after. 2 meter distance.. *Battery is good. After 10 mins charging u can use for 1 hrs.

name: Shripad Shukre
title: Lost functionality within two months
content: The device has stopped proper functioning within 2 months. There is sudden disconnection of Bluetooth connectivity...Requesting Amazon to discontinue the product on quality grounds. Not suggested for anyone to purchase

name: Shivam
title: worst customer service
content: I gave them one star because after 2-3 month ,one side ear piece stop working. I returned it as it was in warranty claim but they never returned me back. I called customer care not less than 50 time's but they never responded .Highly disappointed the way they treat their customers.

name: Dhruv dixit
title: Only Return
content: Same issue I am facing again after replacment..why the battery backup is too poor , if I compare with local U&I product the battery backup was really nice but with this device not feeling good even the noice cancellation also not working properly.. don't like these things with good name . ..as it's not good want to return this product kindly suggest me with good one.. Thanks

name: Nagesh.R
title: Battery issue
content: I bought a second pair of these after using the 1st pair for 6 months, before it conked off... Now the second one is also damaged. Works when plugged in so I am guessing there is a battery issue. Very sensitive ... If you keep it plugged in for more than 5 min after full charge, the battery gets damaged... Very disappointed

name: Kalyan Reddy
title: It's an ok product for that price
content: It's not at all good for gaming. I don't suggest it for gaming. Sound quality is better but not best. But the battery life very good. And there is some disturbance while we are in traffic. I think it is not that much perfect when youare in traffic or on roads.The next day i return this product

name: Rahul Mehta
title: Good to Go...
content: Amazing product and the sound quality is the best. Talking about it's Mic, then if you are on a call, it becomes too noisy for a person who have called you. I disconnect it when I have to attend calls because noice cancellation is not that good. Overall the product is great and Bluetooth connectivity is great. Gets connected quickly.

name: Urvi soni
title: Okay okay
content: Mine got damaged after a year. Very dissapointing. The music was alright. Bluetooth is also okay-okay. It's more like if you have a small budget and need these, you can try but if you have a decent budget, other options must be explored.

name: Pranav Bats
title: Best earphone of range as it says "U HV PLUGGED INTO NIRVANA"
content: Bass was almost good, atleast way better then wireless earphones of same range. Design is good magnet provided realy makes it feel great. Sound quality is good, clear sound, mic works perfect, no problem faced, amazed that it could actually connect with my phone and lappy together and swithched to phone auto when there was a call, battery life is pretty awesome, got almost 8-9 with first use, problem was that nither my oneplus 6t nor my lappy could show the ryt battery level. Got at 1400 so a pretty awesome deal.

name: Avadhoot Desai
title: Great sound. Using these for about 2 years now still in good condition.
content: Great sound. Using these for about 2 years now still in good condition. No problems whatsoever. Sometimes have to pair It manually. Even all this time later I still get about 6 to 7 hours of battery backup. Can easily get away with it on a single charge for a whole day.

name: ojasvi
title: Good.
content: I bought this product almost a year ago, and has been working well since then. But now there are a few issues i am facing when i increase the volume. I don't think earphones should have a life so small. But if it fits your budget, then go for it.

name: Vikas Tiwari
title: Try it first.
content: I waste a lot money to find some good quality in famous brands, but I found this product in good price. It's sounds effect is good, battery backup is very good overall i can say value of money.. Thank you.

name: Amazon User
title: Buy cautiously
content: I bought this product a month ago and it worked fine for two weeks. Later I found there is a lot of disturbance when I used them. First I thought it was my network which was bad but it's the earphones only. I tested them multiple times and found there is almost 10% disturbance.. Realme earphones are much better than these. Try and go for them.

name: Bhumika Vijay Kherde
title: A good option for gifting. Value for money
content: Gifted this to my fiancee. A good option for gifting your man who is sasta, majboot, tikaau and likes to listen to songs in full blast. This good experience may however be backed by him shouting out misheard lyrics out in public, but that's his default setting which is amplified by a good product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Developed charging issues after 6months
content: I purchased this like eight months ago. The ear phone is just unbearable now...it starts showing blue light the after 5 minutes of charging indicating that charge is complete but it can be used to play music for only 15 to 20 minutes after charging. Neither can I charge it nor can I use it. I don't know what to do. I am checking for warranty options now don't know how much of help can I expect.

name: Imtiyaz Jilani
title: Audio Latency
content: While playing game there is 1 second delay in the audio.. Latency of 1 second while playing game

name: Swetha
title: Good to buy for this range, but no noise cancellation
content: Adding review after 4 months after I brought it. Headphone is good for music listener also good connectivity, good to buy at this range. No much of issue if you dont bother abt noise cancellation. There is no noise cancellation, during call person at the other side hear other background voice than our voice. There is no noise cancellation during call recording there is so much disturbance.

name: Amit Kumar
title: Don't recommend during this pandemic
content: My earphone stopped working after 6 months. I registered complaint with boat support. They took the earphone and didn't send the replacement items. I tried to contact them through mail but they are not responding. I sent more than 15 mails as reminder. But, my bad. I tried to contact them through call, but they never lift the call.. During this pandemic, don't go for boat.. Worst customer care services I ever seen.. Thanks!

name: Nikita
title: Very good
content: This is the best quality earphones with great noise cancellation technique and very good sound quality. It's only drawback is it's great noise cancellation technique itself because I bought it for using while driving as I get too many calls, but while driving I'm not able to listen to the sound of other vehicle or horn. But in all its really good unless you're driving.

name: Jasmine
title: First tym using wireless earphone
content: Sound quality s gud. I bought tis mainly to talk and it meet my expectations. Super bass and loved to hear songs in it.. Bluetooth connectivity s super its easy to connect with voice notification and also with gud signal i can talk in hall with my mob in room.. Noise cancellation s not available in it.. Only drawback i felt as it is small earbud it doesnt fit my ears well i have adjust it often as it falls other than tat i like tis boat rockerzz earphone much.

name: Pradeep
title: If you are a bass lover, this is not recommended
content: Based upon reviews purchased this headset during the sale for 1K. The question is "Did it live up to my expectations? I would rather say no. Previously I've been using Samsung very old first model headset, where sound quality would be clear but would have a low base. That's the reason why it lasted long. But this one (boat) has a pretty good noise cancellation, decent bass but not like mentioned by majority of reviews. And 1 major issue is while driving, connection goes off turns on at times which is quite irritating.

name: Sarang Kelkar
title: Satisfactory
content: So far so good for 2 days. Let's C how long the performance will remain consistent.. Easy bluetooth connectivity.. Bought it at Rs. 1300 which I feel little high, should have been upto Rs. 1000.

name: Zimmy
title: Suddenly stops working
content: The problem is that after use for 2 days on charging it shows 100% and 80% always. The point is that it doesn't shows 20% charge even it is so, on its place it shows 80% . This was the main problem. Another problem was that while on a workout suddenly the earphones stopped working even though it had battery.also one side of earphone was not working when I ordered it for second time

name: AyeBee
title: Comfy, entry level piece
content: Comfortable to wear and extremely simple to set up. Got a funky feel to the brand. I feel the sound has a higher bass tone, which can’t be adjusted. Battery life while on calls should be better. That said, this set is really growing on me and worth the price (1.8k)

name: Sakshi roy
title: It's Bluetooth connectivity has become very poor aNd also  when it is on no Green light appears.
content: My rocekrz 225 pro earphones stopped working in around 1 months. I contacted boAt customer service and they told me to visit the nearest service center which was far away from my place.It's Bluetooth connectivity has become poor. Nd when I switched it on there is no Apperance of green light. When I tried to connect my device it failed. I am really very worried for this device. I want to replace it.

name: Gnaneshwar
title: I prefer music lovers to buy this product.
content: Sound quality is wonderful and pichi perfect HD quality, I prefer music lovers to buy this because I searched good Bluetooth earphones for 2weeks in Amazon I saw this product reviews and ratings I thought that before buying with average expectations and after using this I loved this product very much.. Noise cancellation is perfect.. While using if we go to long distance it will disconnect automatically and when going near to mobile it automatically connect to the mobile device in fraction of seconds.

name: Naveen Raj
title: Great product
content: Great product from BoAt. I already purchased a boat wired earphone and I bought this because of the experience from the wired one. I've been using for almost 5 months, no issues and it works great till now. Another great product from BoAt. Very happy with this product. And also good packing from Amazon.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not good for calls
content: It works fine for music however when used for calls either via mobile or Skype calls via PC, the voice breaks a lot. This is not a network issue as while the call is still on if you switch from Bluetooth to phone the call works fine.. so it's definitely the Bluetooth

name: Chandan Kumar
title: For music lovers
content: I loved the product as it is very comfortable in your ear. Good for those who love to listen music while working out.. Sound quality is good. Excellent noise cancellation. Loved the bass. However, the right ear plug has got a defect within 2weeks.. Cannot submit complaint as Boats website doesn't work.

name: Naveen kumar gill
title: Not much impressive
content: Sound is good... Extra bass is really extra(more then necessary)...so it is a little bad.... But worse things are. 1)mic quality and position are too bad. 2)ear speakers are too heavy and design is somewhat that do not fit to each and everyone. 3)there is nothing like noise cancellation...its just noise isolation. 4) length of cords is too much..... Overall review👇. Boat produces better wired earphones then these

name: Amogh R.
title: The buds never fit and keep slipping out while excersizing
content: The quality of sound and the noise cancellation is really good. However, the buds just don't stick in your ears. None of the sizes match your ears. I've tried it with many friends and it slips out of their ears. It's good for stationary stuff, but use it for running or any movement based excercise and it's definitely going to keep slipping out.

name: Atul
title: Good mixture of bass with clear crisp sound
content: I have tried few other wireless earphones but beats coming from this one is great. It gives a good balanced sound and it is so comfortable that it can be used for long duration.
