Battery life is also good, battery is easily giving 5 6 hrs of backup. I only found one thing that can be better that it takes a while to charge the battery completely, 1.5/2 hrs for charging.. I have Boats wireless speaker also and that piece is also nice.. Go for it.

name: Mayank Gupta
title: Best budget Bluetooth headset.
content: Sound quality is okayish but best for price range.. Noise cancellation is good.. Causes pain in ear after long use of more than 3-4 hours. So not that comfortable.. Good for listening music while workout, fits tightly in the ear.. Bass is good but treble, mids and low's of the music are muffled.. Battery life proves to be of 4-6 hours.. and 2-3 hours during call.

name: Adolene1
title: Good sound quality and battery performance at affordable price
content: Good battery life, excellent sound quality at affordable price is the hallmark of BOAT. Only issue i face is the headset battery indicator is not accurate and u will have to form your own judgement as to when the headphone needs to be recharged. Overall good purchase, i have already recommended same to 4 other people who now are also happy with BOAT.

name: Mahesh B.
title: Highly recommended for multitask
content: Recommended by my friend avinash as he is using from past 3 months. Now using it from last 2 month happy , satisfied , saving time. By doing simultaneous work by hand as well as by phone

name: Durgesh
title: Just go for it, (255 pro version)
content: Best for outdoor/indoor usage (atleast for me it's outdoor) , I am no music expert but sound quality is great , no lag, it's very hard to hear someone while using this and can connect two devices at once. 6-8 hrs battery life in my case( after using approx 4 months), 20 min charge for 4 hrs playback, sweat & water resistant .

name: Srinivasa Rao T
title: Bluetooth earphones in budget.
content: Got this for Rs.990 in sale, i purchased these phones fro my jog after my LG earphones stops working, it's serves the purpose for the price...but not satisfied with music quality. But can't complain due to the budget. You must spend 2500 bucks for music quality. Not a bad product also not great.

name: advait pandey
title: Budget friendly with sound quality upto mark
content: First of all its a boat product therefore sound quality is top notch then coming to design it is cool as well as tough guy with flexibilty at its highest level. But after few months of use ear fits may become lose or i think i havent cleaned my year for long

name: Shivani
title: Overall very good 👍
content: Good noise cancellation..and sound.....one draw baw is that the music does not stop if you remove from ear and stick to the magnetic buds like one plus buds. But sound quality better than OnePlus Z earphones.

name: Uday reddy
title: The product is absolutely Value for Money.
content: I am very happy with the headphones. The product is very robust and comes in an attractive package. Bluetooth connectivity is seamless. The reception of phone calls is really good, with good audio quality. Music reproduction is excellent, with good bass. Overall I am very satisfied and its a complete VFM product for me.

name: Pudhi
title: Use and throw Headphone
content: A nice little head phone, but only when it works. Within a month it stopped working. The warranty process is convoluted. Have to raise ticket online and wait for the company to arrange a pickup. It's been 30 days since rising warranty claim and nobody is on site to pick it up. No physical service center either that you could drop it in. At the end of day, you end up using it while it works and throw it when it stops working.

name: Puti imsong
title: A decent Bluetooth earpiece
content: This Bluetooth earpiece is great performing better than expectation. Battery backup is also great. Sound quality is great too. The ear buds fits well. The only problem I have is with the time it takes to turn off while holding down power button and the voice over when turning on and off.

name: Somenath Ghose
title: Stay away from this product
content: Worst product I have ever bought on Amazon. Very surprised to see this tagged as "Amazon's Choice" - lost confidence on the method used by Amazon to recommed a product.. The product is so bass heavy that the actual sound is lost. If you love quality of sound just stay away from this product.

name: shijo
title: Very much disappointed ..
content: Very poor quality.. good for listening music only. To make calls it's utter waste... The mike captures all noise around even 5-8 meters away.. so the other person on call can't hear anything clearly... Very much disappointed..

name: Sonu chaudhary
title: Worst Mic
content: Worst Mic ever.. I have used many earphones and headphones earlier but this one is the worst when it comes to mic.. You won't be able to listen to the other person on call. Lot of noise it creates and they will be listening more of our surroundings.. Don't go for it.. But if you are stupid enough and only looking for a earphone which will serve your purpose of just listening music then go for it and make fool of yourself.

name: robin garg
title: Voice lagging during pubg
content: The problem i am facing is with connectivity and its voice lagging during any games especially pubg....there is vooce lagging all the time and you can't play pubg wearing these....also time to time while Playing video signal lags and there is some hummingbsound for 20-30 seconds

name: saurav singh
title: Ahh! damn this extreme bass with this nominal price had fired the music soul within me.
content: Overall the product is perfectly fine from bass, terrible, noise cancellation, battery everything is up to mark. Boat is providing the best ever music quality and it's for sure a product that can be purchased with close eyes.. Cons. **Amazon packing is worst, I have got the product with open sealed, I was thinking about the return but though product was running alright I changed my mind to keep it so.. **No casing, sometimes it became hard to keep them apart from wearing.

name: AKN
title: Okay but needs lot of improvement . Value for money
content: Noise cancellation is okay.. Pros. 1. Good connectivity and voice clarity. 2. Easy to handle. Cons. 1. Charging point very small. 2. Wires may bend and get damaged. 3. Magnet not effective and does not pause music when attached. 4. Battery shows 100%, 80%, 20% and then straight off.. I think it will work maximum one year if we handle with care. I purchased for 999/-. Wait for this price and buy. Worth only this

name: VAIBHAV SIWACH
title: Not connecting to two devices simultaneously
content: It says it can connect to two devices, but, it does not. You have to disconnect from first to connect to second. And then it takes too much time/tries to connect to the second one. It also lags if u connect it to laptop and watch Netflix, if you jump 10 minutes ahead, the voice quality deteriorates heavily.Sound quality is okayish. Got it at 999, still returned it.

name: Saikat Adhikari
title: Decent bass effect but submerged vocals.
content: The product built quality is okays, not as good as Realme Bluetooth earbuds, & sound quality is also average. It has good bass effect but the vocals are submerged due to bass. It doesn't have Cristal clear sound like Sennheiser cx 180 or cx 213. I am returning the product as I am not enjoying listening music on it. Amazon service is great product got delivered within 2 days.

name: Nitesh karn prime
title: manually setup while incoming
content: when we call some one so bluetooth is stable connected but whenever we recevd call from another person the connectivity is auto setup over phone bluetooth is disable automaticlly, so we had to setup manually fucntion. not good for bikers, and car drivers.

name: Danish Hassan
title: Sound quality
content: Sound quality is good but when u r in very busy area like in railway station airport the Bluetooth gets disconnected.....😑. U have to connect it again and again or music gets stop overall it's good for ur daily purpose like if u are a college student it's best for u...👍 One more thing i want to mention that for calling purpose it's not so good...coz noise cancelation is very poor....

name: Swapnil raaz
title: Best choice in this range
content: It was delivered yesterday to me and I'm writing this review after 1 day use and trust me i purchased many things but I'm writting review of product first time because it impressed me lot. The sound quality is really awesome and battery is pretty good backup and noise cancellation is also good but the best part of this product is range according to quality is nothing.. If you are confusing to buy in compare to same range or under 2k then be practical this one is going to be best choice for you. I got this in 1200 on time of sale. Thanqu

name: Shrinath
title: One side earbud will not work after a couple of months
content: I purchased it, and within eight months, one side earbuds stopped working. I returned it and got a new one. Now within five months, one side earbud stopped working. My warranty is over now.. It's better to think of another product.

name: Shubham Jaiswal
title: Normal Earphones with Bluetooth Range Issues and Battery Drain issues
content: Hello People,. Earphones provides good sound and bass. Although it not worth to have Bluetooth earphone with battery drain issues and Bluetooth range is 1-2m.. I find earphone giving issues and glitches in connections in calls and sound after 2 meters.. Also Battery is below average with 2-3 hours max capacity.. Best of all is Amazon does not provide return on this product, only exchange option is availble.. Think twice before buying this product.

name: Sri.
title: Good ...and superb customer service
content: I hardly give product review but guys its superb..specially after using d product fr 4months suddenly oneday d bluetooth stoped pairing with any device...wrote a mail to cstomer service nd within 25days got today a new device..and so go fr it ..as many expendive devices doesnt give such nice service ....

name: Deepak Wankhade
title: Please Don't buy this product.. Waist of money.
content: Only use 1.5 months use battery life 2 Hours charge only 5min backup only standby mode without music. just call only 4/6 min working. Really faltu product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Mind Blowing Earphones of Decade....Love U Boat
content: Guys its Awssummmee......believe......u will experience High quality sound with superbbb Bass......i purchased 1plus earphones worth of Rs: 2000,its complete waste of money then i purchased this..... product is fantabulous......i think this product gonna be best of all time.

name: Tarun Goyal
title: Bad sound quality
content: Bluetooth connectivity was nice but sound quality is the only reason why I didn't liked these and had to return. I don't know what's wrong with the sound quality it just a pain to my head even if I am using them for just minimal calls.

name: Shashank Shekher
title: Great sound amd battery.
content: Great earphone in sound and built quality but not that good in range. Sound quality is great, even earphone is balanced and stays back in your neck. Battery is also good as I've never counted on timer but yes more than 6 hrs. Earphone can run whole day or single charge. Butto s are good and all functional as told.. Mic is too sensitive even small pin drop in room feels like loud sound to person on other side of call.. I found only range and mic sensitivity issue, even sometimes sound lags when device is in your hand or pocket.. I returned it on these 2 factors only, rest are good.

name: Reddy
title: Not a good product
content: Best part it charges in 40 mins but stays up to 6 hrs. Noise cancellation is average. After using for 5 months it gets struck in the middle when listening to music. And charging is the same. There is much difference in the sound which is bad and gets reduced. I don't recommend this product even its price is low.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Boss Bluetooth headset
content: Hi All. Looking for a blue tooth headset with a decent price of Rs.1000/- no doubt please go ahead in Boat Bluetooth headset.. Overall product quality is good and bass is excellent.. I have 3 boat products 1. Ear Pod 2. Bluetooth Headset 3. Boat bass thump headset. All of them gives more clarity in terms of sound & bass.. Happy listening to music in Boat.

name: Devesh kumar pawar
title: China product
content: Although boat is an Indian company and I went for it basis the indian name, However the product i received is made in china.. Regret to purchase this

name: Prakash Mayane
title: Worst service  by amazon
content: After 5 months left side of bluetooth is not working and as mentioned it is having warrenty of 1 year so contacted customer service for help to replace the product Didnt get any help from them .The reply from them was to contact manufacturer this is overall Amazon's responsibilty to resolve all this issue .It is not customers responsibilty to contact manufacturer for this issues.Dissatisfied with Amazon service. I will never recommend Amazon.

name: Chaithanya Kumar VR
title: Good sound quality, however not durable.
content: I enjoyed this product all this while till now, from last week one one side is not working. I purchased it 10 months ago, unable to visit service centre due to lock down. Hopefully they will honour 1 year replacement warranty.

name: Amrit
title: Happy with it
content: As expected, a good product from Boat. Worth buying. Not the best but the sound quality is good and build quality is good too. If you are getting it in Rs.1299 or below just go for it without any second thought.

name: N.Sekhar Varma
title: Excellent
content: If you are music lover it is very convenient and excellent choice. The operation quality and price are reasonable. The battery back up is good. Clarity is calling..... Are v. Good

name: Knight Rider
title: best in price
content: using this product since one month,great sound quality,good build quality,. also flexible,battery backup is also good.. Only one thing i didnt like is bluetooth range..its not the best..but good... Overall the earphones are great at this price.you will not regret after buying this.

name: Raja
title: Waiting for boat to release updated version
content: Great deal at 999 actually it's a steal at that price point i only wish they will release the next version with better features. Wishlist. *I wish the earphones will stop playing as soon as the magnet's are connected like one plus and will autoplay as soon as disconnect tgis is the only feature i wish it had. *Type-C usb charging. *Improved battery. *Improved sound quality

name: Gyan
title: Best below 1500/
content: Got this for 1099/ . Would say..the quality is good. Not Great. Best in budget.. If one is looking for work from home earsets. Mic quality is clear and no issues on the other end.. If your budget is under 2k. This is the One. If you can exceed 2500...go for One+

name: Shridhar Jetty
title: Budget Friendly
content: Not so great sound quality. Poor sound clarity, bass is okay, loudness is good.. If you can afford more, then this one is not recommended. Check if you can afford sennheiser brand.

name: Priya
title: Don't buy. Very poor quality.
content: I bought these earphones few months back. The sound quality was good but the earphones were damaged within 6 months. Both the sides are not working. The 1 year warranty seems like a scam as even after registering a complaint no boat executive gets back. On calling customer service the calls remain unconnected and there is no follow up from them. Please don't buy as earphones have no longevity and getting through customer service is a pain.

name: Muthes
title: Good but with one and only problem along
content: The Headset is so good to hear the songs and videos , you don't have a feel latency in this headset , but there is only one problem with this headset noise cancellation while speaking phone calls failed to cancel the environment noises than your voice so receiver didn't hear your voices than the environment noises

name: Sai Siddharth
title: Think once or twice before buying it
content: This product is a total waste of money. I bought it for 1500 rs on Aug 24 2019.it worked fine for 3 months and then one side of the earphone stopped working. I claimed warranty and the product was replaced with an old product which lasted only for 2 months. Now this has happened for the fourth time and each time i send it for a replacement it takes a month to get replaced.

name: Sourav Samajpati
title: Best under ₹1,000
content: Considering the price tag of ₹999, definitely this is the best one. Also, the after sales service of Boat is reliable althou it takes nearly 40 days but it's okay I guess.. Coming to the audio section, we get a balanced output. Bass is neither high nor low but average. Vocals are not that clear but fine.

name: Arrun Tiwari
title: Best in this range! 👌
content: This wireless earphone is good product. You can't say it's the best...But yeah I got it in 999 and it's best in this range. If you're looking a headphone ideal for bollywood music, it's good to go. But if you love sufi, ghazals, semi - classical genre, you'll be little disappointed! But what would you expect under 1000 bucks!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Within 2 months 25 days Device stopped working
content: Unable to switch on the device even after charged for 3 hours. Not able to use. When the charging is on the blue light is blinking, tried multiple times to charge it and use but in vain. Bought it on 1 st August 19but within 3 months the device is not working. Thinking that I made a wrong decision by Busying bOAT device , unfortunately advised some of my colleagues who bought it last week. Waste of money.

name: Sanjay das
title: Completely worthless , pathetic product
content: Worst product used as of now.Bluetooth acts weirdly while put in pocket.Unable to hear while call/reset requires every hour if used more.Videos got mute after call.And most importantly warranty is miserable.Got a faulty replaced product after month of tracking and mailing.

name: Ankit
title: a better product in this price range
content: sound quality is good but not as the Boat Wired Earphones provide yet better than Boult BT Earphones (i replace boult with this boat product), bass is good but not clear, worst part is that tiny charging Jack cover. its too tiny and weak that i have lost it in just 4-5 days. battery backup is ok it gave me 5-6 hours backup. another worst part is sometimes you can't take a call because it goes blank on call.. product quality is good.. overall.

name: MaknojiaSadruddin
title: BOAT ROCKS!!!
content: It is awesome at high!!. Lows and Mids not clear at low volume. But at high you will be "Only in your own World" +++. Gets connected automatically once paired. Fits well, good while running or gym.. Best purchase below 1000. One more thing that pushed me to buy this apart from price is ONE YEAR REPLACEMENT WARRANTY. Wow!! What else can you ask for 1k? Go for it, if you're aiming to buy Neckband below 1250/-

name: P.V.NARASIMHARAO
title: Worst Product
content: This is the worst product, received from seller. I am expecting some decent products here. The quality of the product is really bad. They stop working after 10 days. Where you can't even replace or return the product. Finally you will end up with a useless product.. Please don't buy this .

name: Sumit Jha
title: Really great earphones at such price
content: I got it for 1000 which is great getting this earphones at this price is really great .. sound quality is also good , base is really good here , the quality of sound is also good. battery life: it last long for like 5-6 days for 1-2 hours per day usage .

name: SSS
title: Good Product
content: I have been using for a few months now. It has a battery life of 4/5 hrs.. Good Bluetooth connectivity, sound quality.. The instrument is not tough for rough use. But if used carefully looks like it will last.. Good buy

name: Amazon Customer
title: DON'T EVEN THINK TO BUY
content: Very very poor quality.. Even poorer the service. Earphone got damaged just within 6 months and not able to get the service also. I have put earphones on replacement but even after two months there is no sign of replaced product. They picked up the damaged product in just 7 days but when it comes for replacement it takes ages.. Highly recommended NOT TO BUY.

name: Saiyan
title: Ok for music,  0 for calling
content: Ok for 900 something bucks, music is ok wired earphones in the same range definitely better. Noise cancellation during calls is horrible, the person at the other end hears ambient noise more than your voice.

name: Madhumita
title: Not for cardio
content: overall the sound and everything is great but I wouldn't recommend it for any sort of hard workouts if that's your main purpose! and these are definitely not for running! I brought these especially for working out and running didn't serve the purpose for me! If you are looking for wireless earphones just for the purpose of running and workout Id strongly recommend not to buy any neckband sort wireless earphones!. ps: their sound is the amazing and best companion for travelling and also the battery is totally amazing!!

name: Nehal kumar
title: One of the best wireless earphone
content: Go for it.......very good ear phone in low price and specially for bass lovers but it regular price is 1500rs but i bought it in 899rs in festival offer.blutooth conevtivity is very fast and sound quality was awesome and noise cancellation is average.it comes with 1 year warranty. I got replaced my old damage earphone into new one within 15 days depending on area pincode.

name: Zainab
title: Good but not best.
content: If I will talk about its build quality than it is bad. They got damaged in just 6 months. Sound quality is really nice.. Good bass and I was able to listen backgroud other instruments.. Bluetooth range is not so good.. Call quality is not good. I had to speak little loud so that person on other side could hear me.

name: Sameer
title: Stopped working. Exchanged item too didn't work.
content: Please be careful. This one stopped working in a few months. I exchanged it with BOAT on their official website. I did receive another one. But it stopped working exactly after one week. This is very disappointing.

name: Karan Sharma
title: Good but not best
content: This product is fine but noise cancellation is very poor on this device.. Sound: Bass is good vocals are not impressive.. Bluetooth connectivity is perfect.. Earbuds are not comfortable at all. I’ve already Lost my two buds. 🙁. It gets remove automatic. Need to pay attention on this everytime, otherwise you can also lost the earbuds like me.

name: bhuvanesh prabhukhanolkar
title: Best value for money in this price segment
content: First of all boat is an Indian company. And they are offering really good quality products. My experience with Bluetooth headset is too good. Plus in case you are quite unsure about your needs then they are also providing easy replacement and return policy which is another plus point according to me for recommending this product.

name: Arya Ravi
title: Excellent Bluetooth Earphones below 1500...
content: 1sf of all, I have to thank to Amazon..for the delivery. The product delivered the next day of order.. Coming to the Product...I'm writing this review after using 1 week.. excellent product for it's price point... Sound quality is awesome..Best Bluetooth under 1500 rs...But the only problem is that.. battery Lasts 6 hrs continuous music play... which is enough..

name: JENEESH PIOUS
title: Good sound but Poor battery quality
content: I have bought 2 of this headsets recently.. sound very good for the price.. one headset is still working fine, the other one's bettery life drastically reduced, infact it's really a damaged battery.. i don't recommend this product because of the poor quality checks

name: Dinesh Singh Shekhawat
title: Pathetic customer support and service team
content: Poor customer service, bad quality of product, product will stop fucntioning after few months and when you will send this for replacement their customer service and support team will never send a replacement. You will see your case closed and they will keep the product with them... It's a total waste of money and time.. better go for any other brand who are providing better customer support and better quality of product.

name: Atish Agrawal
title: Best budget bluetooth earphones
content: It is one of the best Bluetooth based wireless earphones currently available in the market. The battery backup usually lasts up to 8 hours of continuous music listening. Since it is in-ear design, hence noise cancellation is good, however, it lacks active noise cancellation, which I am sure is not present in any product of a similar cost.. Overall, it is a must buy and good to have.

name: Saptarshi
title: Nice noise cancellation for the price with magnetic eartips!!
content: Pros:. Nice Noise cancellation for a bt at the price. Magnetic eartips. Call quality is good with noise calculation. Nice bass for a bt headset at the price. Pretty convenient while commuting because it's a bt headset. Cons:. If u r thinking about playing Pubg on it, then forget it. It's mic doesn't work with Pubg and voice is very low.. Not the best sound quality at 1500 because it's a Bluetooth headset. Ok battery life. Wires slightly longer than what's convenient

name: Venky
title: DONT BUY CHECK MY REVIEW
content: PROS-. I GOT FOR JUDT 1K ON SALE. BASS IS GOOD. FOR PRICE OVERALL SOUND QUALITY IS DECENT. CON-. AT FRIST BATTERY LIFE IS GOOD AFTER USING FOR FEW WEEKS BATTERY LIFE STARTED DRAINING. IT AS SEVERAL CONNECTIVITY ISSUES SOMETIMES IT DISCONNECTS AUTOMATICALLY. AT MAX VOLUME SOUND WILL START DISTRACTING. COMES WITH LONG WIRES WHICH LOOKS WEIRD. DONT BUY THESE WIRELESS EARPHONE MORE THAN 1K

name: Dasta
title: Not happy with product i recieved
content: This review i am writing after using for 3months.. 1.If i am away about 4feets also bluetooth is not clear.. 2.It's good sound. 3.charnging if it reach 80% it's Directly get down to zero.I am not happy with this

name: Ankur Arora
title: Not for athletes
content: Good quality sound, but very heavy module that hangs on your neck. Cannot use it while working out as it keeps bouncing on your neck and shoulders and has also fallen down once.. Other than that it's good value to the quality of sound

name: Hussain A.
title: Best product from boat.
content: I purchase this product 999 rupees in big billion days sales. I received defected piece with not working mic. But amazon replace my product in 7 days. Now new piece working very fine.. Sound and base Quality is good. Battery backup is around 8 hours.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Low microphone voice pick up
content: The microphone is not picking my voice as good as wired earphones. I am unable to do voice and video recording with good audio quality like i do with normal wired earphones

name: Bhawna Bisht
title: Boat rockers really rocks.
content: Sound quality is excellent. Mic is sensitive but with excellent noise cancellation, if you speak to someone while walking on road noise cancellation did excellent job. I'm using it for about 90 days and i'm satisfied with this earphones.. Bass is good not excellent.. Battery backup is excellent it will run 1 and half day with full charging🤩. Go for this product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Service after product issue was worst
content: It was dead after 4 months, it mentioned like it is water resistant, but when I went with dead headphones, they said water went inside so warranty won't cover. Service centre was worst, it is not boat service centre, boat tied up with Micromax which is worst service centre ever I faced. Not interested to give best service to customers.

name: Evon Rao
title: Product problem
content: Dear Amazon Team,. Please note I had booked a Boat Rockerz Bluetooth earphones from Amazon, it received in intact condition and was working fine, but now it is not working at all.. When you plug in the charger the LED is working and earphones are working & as soon as the charger is removed the earphones stop working. Requesting you to kindly replace these earphones at the earliest. Awb: 221921225468. Regards,

name: jatingupta
title: Bad customer services
content: Please remain cautious before buying this headphone set because in my case, the left earpiece has stopped working in under 3 months of my purchase. There is no support from boat either. No responses and pick and drop facilities make all hopes dilute. Really disappointed in boAt's customer service.. #shame #boatisnotgood #badexperience

name: Vaishali Awasthi
title: Best Buy under this price! Won't Be disappointed!
content: Love love loved the headphones... Best buy under the price range! Super strong and compatible... Great Bluetooth range... Gets a bit messed up around metals like iron.. very happy with the quality and fit.. gifted one to my sister as well aftr using it myself for around 6 months! Thumbs up !

name: Abhishek Anand
title: A Great Deal !
content: Pros:. 1.Easy to wear, Fits well in ears. 2.Noise cancellation is good.. 3.Sound Quality is better.. 4.Battery life is great.. 5.Available at reasonable price.. Cons:. 1.Bass could have been better. 2.Look is not so good as wire is bit long in front.

name: Rayaan
title: Try it yourself.
content: Just keeping my phone in my pocket resulted in lose of Bluetooth connectivity.. Maybe only my earphones had that defect.. others may not have to face it. Buy the product, us it for 2-3 days. If good keep it or else there's a return option in Amazon.. I've returned it though.

name: S.RAHMAN KHAN
title: Don't buy this
content: This is a stupid product, I feel they have cheated by sending fake copy product, it worked only for 2 weeks, and now the sound is unclear and very low, I'm unable replace now, service centre is in Mumbai, how can I go from chennai to Mumbai?? Instead buy some good brand like Samsung level u, amazon pls tell how to use the warranty and repair or replace it

name: Mona Gupta
title: Don't buy it
content: I ordered 3 but none of them were working properly, one is not charging, other one is not connecting and 3rd one is also not working. And now since return window is closed, I'm not even able to return it. It was a gift to freind and this product put me in very embarrassing situation before friends.

name: Neha thakur
title: sound quality us best
content: Well i likee this earphn very much. go for it❤️ sound quality base and everything is goood. its comfortable and the charge lasts till 2 or 1 and half days. I was looking for a nice headphns with good base and sound quality. thanks amazon. i got this on discounted price. quality and shipping was also kinda goood.

name: rajat kirola
title: poor product with overpriced price.
content: no noise cancellation! people on the other end are always complaining of background sounds and noises.it's very embarassing to buy a 1400 rs earphone and then ppl complainig of background noises.

name: Nikhil
title: Short life of that earphone.not for daily usage.
content: Product is very good, good sound quality specially bass,battery life is also ok but not very good..but this is not for daily basis use,i used till 2 months but the wire of that earphone got problem,it became onesided earphone...i used it for my workout and travell and it got problem in wire..so its not for daily basis work.life is very less of that earphone...if u are going to purchase that so think more according to ur usage...otherwise product is quality is very good but not have long life..

name: Rylan Menezes
title: Bluetooth Connectivity Failed
content: The bluetooth stops connection in between, like dosent even connect in 10m rang, it's Amazon's choice of product when ordered, I put my trust in Amazon and that's not how they deliver products without checking their durability. Can't even replace the item. It been xact 15 days I have purchased it. Never had a complain from Amazon till date, this is the first and also cannot connect to their customer service.

name: Vigneshwar Pasupathi
title: Best Bass earphones.
content: Best headphone for this price range mids, bass and treble are at good tuning. Bass is a bit Punching which is nice for bass heads. There is no big lag in time but found a little lag in gaming audio. Neckband is extremely light weight can't feel it like wearing and flexible too.

name: Sarim Zaidi
title: Misleading fake picture!
content: The picture gives an impression that it is all soft wire but one half of it is ugly hard plastic. Unrealistic picture! Wasted my money. I could have put another 300 rs and bought a JBL wireless earphone that's all soft wire!

name: Siddharth
title: Worth it
content: Sound quality: a bit disturbance in sound when you go beyond 5 metres from your Bluetooth source.. Bass: no words. It's boombastic. Noise cancellation : it's actually more than enough I wonder if somebody bang into a tree while running. It's that level of noise isolation. I thing price must be 1200 because 1500 is a bit expensive in this range because better earphones are available in this price range +- 200 .. Buy it it's worth ,atleast worth than 4000 cost earphones .. Jai hind vandematram

name: Amazon Customer
title: Huge Disappointment do not look at it also
content: I have experienced good sound quality but having issues with its charging and battery life. Charging indicator is not working and battery life from 60% to 0% it gets over in 15 min. I am surprised with this product. Had high expectations from it as many have purchased it. Now I feel I should have purchased Sony or real me product. As it’s only 2 months that I have used this product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good buy
content: Great product. Have been using it from past 1 year.. Good sound quality, great battery life, awesome bass effects.. Cons:. It gave me ear pain over prolonged usage.. The rubber cover over the micro USB port breaks down after multiple uses.

name: Karthik
title: Very small battery and disconnects when not in use
content: I have been using samsung Level U for any years and this dissappointed me as battery back is so weak, cannot even use for 2 days with normal usage. It disconnects when not in use, again bit of a disconfort as you have to pair turn on and connect when you receive a call.

name: Pratik Gurav
title: Defective Product , Worst sound quality , connectivity issue
content: Pathetic Sound Quality, most important is this people are selling manufacturing defects on online ,i just received it today when i checked the same day left ear piece is not working at all , first it took 3 hours to get connected ...worst Product. Please DONT buy BOAT products

name: EM
title: Low quality
content: My first impression after unboxing - Low quality product, wires are extraordinary long, ear buds are not at all ergonomically designed, Does not get fit into ears and itself pop out of the ears. After all this experience didn,t feel like checking out sound quality. Company is playing smart not offering return option. Now have to live with this low quality product.

name: Puneet
title: Bad.....very bad.....worst......
content: Only a month gone its gets disconnect automatically. Now switched off no light no response, dnt know what to do. I promise i will never buy electronics item through any online portal. This is second time i lost my hard earn money. First time boat eardopes rs 3000 wasted within 6 mnths ut was stop working. Now boat rokerz 255 i must sat worst brand ever i have used so far.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Just awesome sound quality, battery backup and notice cancelation
content: I just wanted to buy a good Bluetooth earphones in my budget.. And boat 255 is exactly that what I need.. The sound quality and nocie cancellation is awesome, really it's too good, company says with 10 mnt chrg it can play upto 45.but in my case the time was 85 mnt with 65% volume.. And with 65% volume you can enjoy 7to8 hours music... Mujhe lagta hai boat ki is headset ki age isi budget mai or koi takkar dene ke liye hai e nehi.. Dude just go for it👍👍

name: Naresh Desai
title: Useless
content: Just loud noise. Not even near to JBL. Bluetooth looses connection if kept In pocket while walking. Cannot be flawless connected to BT while jogging. Useless

name: Sridharan S
title: Boat is the trusted brand to go. Absolutely Value of money
content: Im a kind of headset freak, was already having bunch of wired headsets and few wireless as well. I must say that by 2k u wont get any better product than this.. In all perspective be it as bttery capacity, sound clarity, when taking calls I believe it out performs all the other BT earphones atleast in 2k budgeted earphones.. Have a collection of BOAT branded earphones & wireless speakers, from that experience i can honestly say that BOAT never disappoints u.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good but not the best
content: The product is good.. Sound is almost acceptable at the price. Good bass though. Noise cancellation is decent. The eartips are not that comfortable for long time use. Battery last about 3 days as per my usage of daily 3-4 hours of use. Built quality and design is good. Love the magnet concept, helps to keep the earphones in place. They could have added the pause feature if possible. If you get a good deal go for it

name: EJAJ AHAMED
title: Works as expected. Read for yourself.
content: The sound lag is much less and noise cancellation is great. I never had any issues with Bluetooth connectivity as I keep my phone in my hand or pocket when using it.. It doesn't hurt your ears if you wear it properly. The only problem I can see is the battery back up system. It has low battery capacity and after giving you the warning of low battery it hardly gives you 10 mins. So that's the only problem I face. So for me it's a good choice.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst product don't buy at all
content: My suggestion if company give you a product at free of cost kindly perfer any other company product as these product required servicing on every two month.. On 21st sep i was again register complaint it's Stop working and these is my thrid time where register complaint.. I feel company should learn from any other brand how Bluetooth earphone made and work for longtime.. In this duration I hardly used for two month remaining six month i was registered complaint and getting replacement.

name: indrajit
title: Disappointed
content: I am disappointed with this, I am using airdopes 441 but this earphones battery do not last even a day..... I can't return also now as its month old.

name: Shashank
title: Fine for the price range
content: Some cons-. 1) The bass is way to heavy, if your device doesn't cone with any inbuilt equalizer to tone down the base a bit you might wanna stay away as the overall base is way to overpowering.. 2) The Bluetooth connectivity is somewhere along the bad side, the connection sometime gets weakened while carrying the phone in trouser pockets.. Still somehow for the price range these earphones do pretty much what is needed.

name: Ninja
title: Sound quality a little disappointing
content: Sound is okay average quality clearity, bass is good,. Durable and battery also good. If you want better sound quality go for boult process lot better or even boat triple drivers

name: Mrudul
title: Not Happy with the product
content: Overall performance is below average.. It takes time to connect with Bluetooth. And when you finally connect it , there is some airy sounds come (I don't know if it's the problem with just my earphones or it happens with everyone).. Sound quality is okay.. There is not much noice cancellation.. Bass quality is just like 255

name: RAFIK SACHORA
title: Rate wise. Good for level u option
content: Good. Product. In Battery. Backeup sound n look charging indicator. Droback. Ear. Pain n. Ear. Comfort not Good. Like Ear. Phone or samsung level U

name: Jishin John
title: Awesome product
content: The music experience was in next level

name: Jankit
title: it's all about spec but I don't understand when I will get my refund ......
content: noise cancellation was worst. while listening music connectivity was good but when I use for call after 15 min next person cannot hear our voice not at all.. bass is great but it direct impacts on ear drum.. Actually I need Bluetooth earphone for call but that purpose was not solving so I returned it .. I have return earphone on 4feb 2020 till today I didn't receive my refund . what is this Amazon doing ... when I will get my refund???

name: Yellapragadajagadeesh Chandrabose
title: Waste of money
content: Waste product. Don't by anyone because it was failed product and within 5 months it cause damage and and there is no warranty at all and the company is cheating us I was wexed with this product

name: sandeep
title: Good sound quality but not perfect for attending calls
content: Nice product. Sound quality is good.. The only problem which i faced is the receiver keeps complaining of low voice when on call.. Good for listening songs and watching videos.. But for attending calls i didn't find it that good

name: Drj
title: Wastage of Money
content: I have bought 2 headphones. Both became defunct within 3 months. Boat gave replaced one within warranty period. However, it also failed within 2-3 months . Failure is power failure. It doesn't charge.. Regarding other, boat didn't respond to complain. My advice, not to waste your valuable money in this product.

name: Abhishek Jaiswal
title: Like@999
content: Nice headphones but not totally noise cancellation.base is gud.battery stands. arround 8-9 hr.overall it is gud deal @999 ,bcz a gud color earphone is arround @2500-@3000 like sony, Skullcandy,and JBL brands...battery is equally works so I think it is great deal in this price section

name: Archana Seshadri
title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
content: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS ITEM. I purchased 3 of these for my bf, my brother & myself..After 1 year of usage all 3 of them stopped functioning on one side which is ridiculous n unacceptable.. Total waste of money.

name: Saurabh vyas
title: Overall ok roduct
content: Ok product. After 100 it got to 80 and then 60% and then completly gone.. Software seems to be not acurate otherwise sond, noise and Bluetooth is ok. Overall ok to have in this range.

name: PANKAJ BAGORA
title: One side issue,  bluetooth issue and no noise cancellation
content: I have bought 3 Boat Rockers 255 in last 1 year and in exactly 6-7 months one side of earphone stopped working in all 3 earphones. After complaints Boat team replace the product but such issue is not expected from Boat..... Also Bluetooth connection takes 25 minutes with every new device.. No noise cancellation at all, person other side on call will be able to listen a fan noise too....

name: Srihari
title: Very happy with the purchase.
content: Amazing headphones, got them at a steal price of 1100. Worth every rupee, the quality is immediately noticeable. I tried mivi thunderbeats and infinity from Harman before buying this. Not satisfied with their design.

name: PUSHPA SAHU
title: Worst earphones ever
content: Don't buy this product. This is the worst thing ever I had buy. If you claim for the warranty you will wait more than 15 days and it will definitely give some issues within 3 months.. I have 2 boat rocker and both of them gave problem so don't buy this product.. If you want so you can take realme, JBL or one plus earphone. I am not giving promotions and all I am telling you the fact.

name: Chaitanya D
title: Failure product,later replaced the product on 28th november at service centre
content: On 24th sep the product was delivered and on 28th oct the right side earphone stopped working....even my two other friends bought for them.the same issue... No physical damage happened but it stopped working..i recommend not to buy this peoduct.... This product is a failure. Almost most of them have same issue. On 28th nov visited service center, they replaced the product and gave a new working product....

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor battery
content: I have been using this for over a month now, and find that, the power drains out real fast. The complete charge takes anywhere between 1.5 to 2 hours and , lasts for only, 4-5 hours. Today just on a 5 minute charge, it showed 80% charged!, Really??. While sound quality, noise cancellation is just about ok, the power back up required to make use of these features, is way too poor, and most of the time you will find the headphones switched off dead as a duck!

name: chellavignesh
title: This is beyond my expectations.
content: More than what I expected. I always brought high end earphones and lately understood that high-end earphones are not worth the price.Hence I went for this budget one (1100 rs).Its really awesome .It’s quality is equal to the high end earphones I had.Never expected such a excellent sound output.There is a good balance between Bass and Treble.Lightweight and raging red colour addsup to the euphoria it creates. Unmatchable sound quality for this price and comfortable wear.

name: Ginish pahwa
title: Do not buy! I repeat "DO NOT BUY"
content: Worst headset ever bought. 100% battery doesn't even last for 4 hrs. And that sucks. Sound and bass is good. But not at all satisfied with battery backup wastage of money.

name: PranS
title: Fairly decent, could be better.
content: I have been experiencing range issues that whenever I put the phone in my pocket the music goes off. Bass feels too loud sometimes and suppresses the higher frequency sound but it's not very deep. But I guess it's okay at this price.

name: unnikrishnan madhavan
title: Totally disappointed with only replacement policy!!!
content: The length of the wire is too long and it's quite inconvenient while it's not plugged into the ears! And there is no return.yiu have to live with what you have got.thwre is only replacement with the same model of same brand allowed.thats unfortunate.Iam totally disappointed.how can I predict the feel of the wire length before ordering and tried testing it once?!

name: Ranjeet
title: Bad quality Bluetooth connectivity
content: I am not sure why this product has so high rating as this product is below average quality. While in call, this headphone is not clearly audible and makes noise, disturbance to person on call.. I contacted Amazon 2 weeks ago and even customer rep said voice was distorted, so requested for return as this product as it not working properly. I have not heard anything from this company or amazon

name: Ramesh
title: Not nice compared to previous version
content: Everything is fine but compare to previous model this makes noise as soon as I unlock the phone....Even if don't play anything

name: Subhadeep Sen
title: Apart from top quality sound, everything else is fine.
content: Looks great, great build, light weight. Very long wires, Sound quality is moderate not up to the mark. Low Bass. Mic and calling functions are great. Boat is a trustworthy brand. Very very overpriced. Connectivity is good, easy to connect and use.

name: Shailesh A. Patil
title: Not good. Dead within 3 months.
content: These headphones got dead within three months. And too many complaints regarding this product. Gets disconnected frequently. Not satisfied with the product. Also they is no warranty and no service. Amazon is well trusted that’s why I purchased. Not At all recommended.

name: Kristin George
title: It's a decent product at that price tag
content: It's my first day of use and the product is overall good as expected but just one dissapointing thing is the Bluetooth connectivity it cuts off in between which is not pleasing when your listening to songs otherwise the sound clarity and bass is no doubt quality and up to the mark just the connectivity factor is something which bothers me let's hope it gets better in days...

name: sakthi
title: Perfect and strong build but sound quality isn't enough
content: Perfect and strong build but sound quality isn't enough.. The metal was too strong.. It is Water resistant #tested. Even after I've met an accident its still working perfectly.. But the earpiece was too big and it may cause pain in the ears.. Doesn't fit while sleeping or wearing a helmet.. Sound quality was much better..!!. A bit noisy. But everything else is perfect..!!

name: Prajod Aramkallu
title: Good product..... but
content: I bought this product. I am using samsung galaxy A30. The headphone is connected. Sound quality is excellent but is often disconnected automatically. When the screen is locked and unlocked, a small sound is heard. replacement order given. The boat was purchased because of its trust in the product and Amazon. We believe the replacement product is good.

name: Viney
title: Highly Recommended
content: This is the 4th product of boat I have bought and this is as good as the previously bought headphones.. In this price range these are far better than any other brand.. Pros.. Battery backup is very good.. Bass is excellent.. Sweat proof.. Very good build quality.. Cons.. Packaging can be more better.

name: ravi pualasa
title: Worthy product
content: A very good product in bluetooth headsets segment. Amazing sound quality, good balance of the weight.. The bluetooth is good and can stay connected for a distance about 10 meters without wall, 3 meters with wall obstruction.

name: Divya
title: Totally disappointed
content: Totally disappointed with this product on amazon..... No proper bluetooth connection... No noise cancellation.... No battery backup...when my battery goes to 80, it doesn't work....only i can use this bluettoth from 100% to 80 %. Since i lost my amazon packing cover, i couldn't exchange /return as well even though i have return duration.....☹️

name: Venkateswarlu
title: stopped working left side after 6 months
content: Sound quality great.. wireless pairing instant.. Charging easily lasts a day.. charging time takes around 2 hours.. Stopped working after 6 months,one side only working now.Not good,Boat.. mic quality is average,depends on situation,can listen the conversation of a person sitting beside the caller in a bus,with extra detail.

name: Shruti
title: Not expected from a brand as renowned as Boat!!
content: The product got dysfunctional after a few days of purchase. Registered a complaint regarding the same and they opened a ticket for me. The ticket took a lot of days to resolve and finally they sent me a replacement. However, the replacement has a major defect associated with it's charging port. The original boat USB does not fit into the port rendering the earphones as good as dysfunctional. Highly disappointed with the product and the service.

name: Adarsh
title: The product could be much better at this price
content: The product is good, but I did not like the product packing. The box looked very low quality. Apart from that the sound quality is good. Noise cancellation is average but the mike on the earphone is very bad. The mike catches all the disturbance which is nearby apart from your voice which makes the other person on the call not able to hear anything.

name: dk
title: Decent for the price
content: noise cancellation is bad. mic captures all sounds, so while u are travelling it is difficult to converse.. sound is good, but battery life is poor. runs max 3-4 hours on full charge.

name: Mohan Saginala
title: quality and price are directly proportional
content: forget about bass. don’t expect bass from in ear type that too at this price. if anyone sells good bass at this price, you have to expect the ear damage 🤭

name: Tahirr Bash
title: PATHETIC PRODUCT,Worthless>>
content: I have purchased this product recently and after limited use or just after 2th or 5th use i tried charging the headphones and it is not charging tried to write to customer case as the product is in warranty have failed to hear or didn't got any response regarding the same today i am writing this review after exculpating the issue 15 days ago still haven't received any revert

name: Veera
title: Wrost product
content: Hi friends, I'm writing this review after 4 months of using this product, intially it has good sound and bass was awesome but this head phones life was not good with in 4 months my right side of the speaker stopped working and left side of the speaker works with less sound and the quality of the product is very cheap. I would like to suggest you not to purchase this product.

name: Akshay Sagare
title: Best Bluetooth Headphones in this budget but comfort could have been better..!!
content: I would just say best Bluetooth headphones in this budget. I got it for around 1300 but you can get this around 999 in sales. Sound quality is good, battery life is decent, comfort is not that good because of bulkier earpieces, mainly if you loves to watch or listen while going to sleep it gets uncomfortable. If you can bare with this drawback then these are good pair of headphones. Just go for it.

name: Ankit Lathigara
title: Worth buying in this price range rather than Chinese one
content: Taking price of the product is at Par.. 1) Sound quality is perfect.. 2) Bass quality is at Par.. 3) Noise cancellation perfect for a rider. 4) Taking calls are good, sometimes you hear wired sound disturbance but only in some calls of far end mic issues. 5) Taking price of the product worth buying either then Chinese one.

name: Monica
title: Worst product and Worst service
content: Worst product ,its not working after 4 months,me and my other 3 friends brought this all faced the same issue even after having the warrenty they are not replacing and boat customer service is waste they will not pick the or respond to the customer

name: Sanjeev gupta
title: Bad bluetooth connectivity
content: I dont know what the problem is but the bluetooth connectivity on the neckband is just worse than ever. It keeps creating cracking sound in stereo mode all the time means i cant use it in stereo mode and then i issued a replacement from boat after 2 - 3 months and that product is also bad and i know that there is no problem in my pc.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Product that is worth of cost.
content: Received it timely as promised by Amazon. I am writing this review after using for months. Good sound quality with better effects. Bluetooth reception, very rarely you will get glitches that too during moving in the bikes. Very good feedback from the keys, good build quality, very easy to handle, suitable for workouts, cycling and jogging etc., Totally, it is worth of cost.

name: Alok Kumar
title: Good product
content: Battery backup is average.. You cannot connect it during charging.. Charging time is very less.. There is no way to listen it in low battery, every two to three seconds, voice comes up to notify you the battery status.. But overall a good product, 3.4/5 stars.

name: Raghutej
title: Worth of buying 4.5 out 5
content: Bluetooth connectivity 5 out 5. SOUNDS quality;. Vocals 4 out 5. Bass 5 out 5. Instruments sounds 5 out 5. Battery;. Battery stand by time awesome more than 1 week. Battery Performance 5 hr to 8hr. Charging time 2hr. Build quality is excellent and waterproof. Worth of buying product 4.5 out 5

name: Shahajamal Home
title: Microphone is not working many time, Calling time Microphone Sound is low .
content: Good but calling time many problems face ..noise cancelling is not working many time .and many time is microphone is not working. call karke baat karne somoy dosre phone par baat sonai toh deti hai lekin sound bohot kom hota hai ...isla microphone ka problem hga sayed nahi toh microphone quality ascha nahi hai. Warranty card and Where warranty my product

name: rishabh jain
title: Background noise cancellation doesn't exist
content: Background noise cancellation doesn't exist in this peace, while on call other person cam clearly hear everything in background even a dog barking outside your home 😂, even background is to loud, sometimes other person is not able to hear my voice bcoz of background noise. Except everything works great it's been 6 months since i started using it. Thankyou.

name: vandana sehgal
title: Useless product
content: I like the product but if u go for this much expensive Bluetooth headphones and within six months one of the earpiece got bekar so it's seems useless for me... I don't wanna give it more than 2 star, bought for my husband as a birthday gift but within six months, he has to again buy another earphones so go for sasta 50rs product but not for this one

name: Priya Rajan
title: Recommended
content: Comfortable to use. Everytime connecting to Bluetooth is easy. Noise cancellation is much better than many other Bluetooth headphones out in the market. Battery charge lasts a long time.

name: Robin Singh
title: Worth Money⛤⛤⛤⛤⛤
content: The packing was nicely done by amazon but there is a need of good quatlity wraping from boat's team, it could have been more better for the customer who is spending 1500 INR.On the whole it is a good stuff and surely you will love it,one more thing is that the bass is amazing⛤⛤⛤⛤⛤

name: Reddi Surya Prakash
title: Nice
content: This product is my 3rd one. One was not working. I booked 2nd time it was worked 8 months properly then one side not working. I raised a query. Boat life style support website gives a ticket number. It was till pending now. I ordered 3rd one now 🤣🙏.

name: anand
title: Good Product but without proper after sale service by authorized service center
content: The BOAT Rockerz are awesome with its features but unexpectedly it stopped working within 15 days. I took it to authorized service center to get it fixed or replaced and I had a bad experience. They charged me 200 Rs. for replacement.. Otherwise, the earphones are awesome. Inspite of the wire being slightly lengthy.

name: Sandeep
title: Constant shity rumble crackling sound when playing like its 1894
content: Constant rumble crackling sound when playing like its 1894, buy the product if you want feel like you are in the history and enjoy the music with vynl cracks this is the perfect product.. if the replace doesnt comes good then I have wasted my 1099.. This was my first boat product and thanks boat, you suck.

name: AK
title: Worst Service by Boat
content: Product worked good for 8 months and then the left ear piece stopped working. Registered a complaint, the took the faulty product and it's been more than a month now I m still waiting for a replacement. Their phone is always unreachable. Ticket status shows Replacement approved since last 6 days but no update. Worst service. Do not buy this product.

name: Kavvipriya
title: budget friendly
content: been an year since bought this, Good sound quality, mild on ears still "A worsest ever" when compared to normal head phones when it comes to noise cancellation. If a dog barks on even 500meters apart, my friend on phone could hear it so clear but i have to shout inorder for my frnd on call to hear my voice.

name: Varun Barla
title: Great quality sound and comfort
content: The earphones certainly delivered more than expected. The bass and beats are the highlights. Go for it if you’re looking for budget Bluetooth earphones. They are comfortable with good quality sound.

name: Mathen Cherian
title: Low life span
content: Bought this set end of October 19, it is majorly malfunctioning with many drops in connectivity. For this price, the performance and life is very poor. There is no redress possible for online purchases so its money wasted. I would recommend go for another model/ brand. This is a let down. Sound quality and sound blocking features were very good but if product has such a short life then it is a major pain. look for better products.

name: Sugandh vashisth
title: FAKE SELLERS!
content: The first time I purchased it, the charging cable and manual was not there. I got it replaced, just today I got my replacement. The charging cable is still not there. Even after mentioning the details while replacing product, I guess no one has reviewed the comments and got the replacement done.. At least a customer deserves genuine product. I needed to gift this to someone.

name: Sanjiv
title: One of speaker stopped working
content: I am using this headphone rarely and even though less usage, one of the speakers is not working. I am not satisfied with the quality of the headphone.. I bought this considering my other Boat headphones which were great. But with this headphone problem, I might think before buying again Boat headphones.

name: Sachin
title: Better for Rough use
content: Its a good quality one. But don’t expect much noise cancelling feature (I would say nothing for noise cancelling) sound quality is good and the major advantage is its good for rough use. It will not get damaged easily. I am using this from last 3 months.. After using this I bought one rocker 275. That have better sound quality but too delicate. This model is good for bike riders and rough using. This will not get much moisture wicking but the ear cushion is not much good for longer user. I am about change that now

name: Pradip
title: Bad in noise cancellation while on call
content: Generally i don't write any review but this it's necessary to write the review of this product. Headphone having noise issue for your call listener as they hear all the noise around you in very loud volume and unable to understand what you are talking on call. This headphone is goo for music and not for call.. I hope my review helps other to choice the correct headphone for user.

name: Soumyakant Pradhan
title: Left earpiece stops working
content: I am facing problems with mine one...i dont know why bt the left earpeice stops working automatically sometimes...i jst ordered for replacement...bt now m afraid...d if d replacemt product works d same way....den my 1500 rupees will be a loss...if any of you face the same...please let me know

name: Manoj bapurao jawalkar
title: Nice nice very very nice
content: Very very nice prodakt I love it the sound is the best of no.1

name: Md Javed Khan
title: Right bud stopped working for the second time abruptly.
content: At the time I bought it in February this year, I gave it 5 stars because of its sound and style. But now I am changing it to 2 stars. Right Bud of this earphone stopped working suddenly 2 months back now even though I used it very carefully, I thought there would have been some mistake from my side. I got a replacement which took almost a month. Still no bad review from my side. But the Same Right bud stopped working again now even though I am using it carefully. So, decision to change my review.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not for deep bass lovers
content: Overall good product for a person who is not into deep bass it's got a quite beat but not sufficient to pump u up. It has sufficient low latency to play normal games even on pc. Call quality is also good not bad. Thumbs up for the fast charging. Bad thing is it disconnects some times during call or suddenly some one calls u when ur on another call

name: verma sushil
title: Overall good at discount price
content: Quality is good when play music but when it comes to calling it is ok ok.battry back up is good but buttons feels cheap. Over all ok in 799/- in sale.. Only buy durring sale other wise you should go for another option. One more thing that no vibration for calling so you have to all time put it in your ear.

name: Binuz
title: Disappointed
content: After using for two months, not felt good with the purchase. I have an Ant product brought 2 year back gives better experience.

name: Himanshu
title: Total wastage of money poor sound and NO RETURN POLICY
content: Total wastage of money. Sound 0/10. Quality 0/10. Material 0/10. Not comfortable size also is too long for neck and earphones are not adjustable. And the worst part is you can not return the item once you purchased it you will be trapped total money gone to trash

name: Sudarshan Ghalgir
title: One Side Stopped Working, it may be defective piece, But Sound Quality is Very Much Good
content: I bought these earphones one month ago and today it's one side Stopped working, overall headphones are best at this price, sound quality is also very good, bass is very high which is very good, but it's built in quality is somewhat low. As I said it's one side Stopped Working. But I claimed warranty and boat is now replacing me these earphones, hope the replacement should not also stop working

name: Rahul Subhash Chaudhari
title: Effective sound quality
content: Using from. Past 6 months. Won't found any default in product. I got delivery on time. Very effective sound quality. Charge for 1 hour and it will work for 6 to 8 hours a day. I used to charge daily as I am travelling daily in local train for job so I require daily. Go. For it. Good product to have in your bag.

name: Charu arora
title: Waste of money
content: Useless... Just started giving Bluetooth connectivity issues in a month of usage. Waste of money!!! The product was collected by the boat people it reached the service center but no one picks up the phone even if u call continuously. No one reply to the mails. Now I don't know where the headset is and what are they upto as it's been more than 4days that it reached the service center. Pathetic n horrible customer care and useless company.dont know hw r they surviving.

name: Kindle Customer
title: Defective product
content: It has stop working after 3 months of purchase Worst Customer Service provided by boat company. Will Stop buying their product and will suggest friends & relatives to not buy Boat Products. I have called them several times and has not been responded either through mail or phone call. Once again I will say worst product ever.

name: Anant
title: Bluetooth coverage is very poor.
content: I purchased from primeday offer of 999.. 1. The charging point cover will break in few days.. 2. Noise cancellation is very poor.. 3. The Bluetooth coverage is max 10feet and after that signal lost.. 4. Will connect to single device at a time. Boat's claims is false for 2 device.. 5. Sound quality is very good for watching movie.. 6. The device worth in between 500 to 700 range rather 1200 or 1500 rupees.

name: omkar
title: Like Bass and sound quality
content: I really like this boat rokerz 255 pro. sound was super. heavy Bass make for bass lovers . battery life is good continuously listing music get 6 to 7 hours playback depending on your music volume.. design and build quality nice looks like stylish. comfortable fiting.

name: VIJAY
title: Very pathetic product with more oathetic service
content: Very pathetic quality of product. I bought it in february and and it developed problems in 2months only. No sound in both the speakers, very much disappointed. Now when I want to claim the warranty, there is no link to place my claim. When i tried it from web, they registered the complain but asking me to come to thier service center. Pathetic. Plaese dont buy this product otherwise you wil feel cheated.

name: Arjun sharma
title: Mic not workong
content: During vedio calls mic not working properly and call will be disconnected and this problem is very common in this product

name: Meenakshi
title: Colour not same as shown in picture
content: I ordered teal green colour earphone.. In real, the colour is not same as shown in picture.. I didn't like the colour I received but as there is no return policy i had to keep it.

name: Sayali Rathi
title: Fake product
content: I got a fake product. It isn't working at all. I visited to the service center and I got to know that this is a duplicate product and not original headphone. They provided service denial letter to send to Amazon service center. I will not suggest to buy from this buyer.

name: Raj jaiswal
title: Earphone is perfect ....
content: I liked the earphone .... It's perfect for my ears ... It's cancels the surrounding noise .. ... The price is perfect for this product. .. Sound and bass quality is fantastic ...... The earphone is lightweight .. we can carry wherever we want ... ... Loved it..... it's an awesome. . product .....

name: Amazon customer
title: Overall good product...Value for Money!
content: Nice product value for money. Noise cancellation isn't that great, but considering the price, it's okay. Music quality and connectivity to phone is good. Overall nice product. Recommended if you are looking at something in this price range.

name: Suraj Phapale
title: Good buy
content: Review after 3 months of use:. Batter backup- good. Sound quality- good. Bass - good. I use this for ofc calls and it lasts more than 8 hours after fully charged.

name: sunny sehrawat
title: Worst Quality by the seller dont buy this
content: it will work fine only for few days after that . product will stop responding to connect with bluetooth and when you will complain they will say your mobile have the problem and i am using iphone XS ,,. and it is so cheap quality . i think its from chinese worst cheap quality they are selling (beware of Corona). also see the picture . how worst this is.

name: Yuvrajsinh Vala
title: Please do not buy
content: Please do not buy this product. Please go for any other product. Battery last for 1 hour maximum. (100% to 20% in 1 hour). Sound quality is okay (not even good). Worst part is the size of the belt is longer than needed and look like cheap product. Very bad. I don't how this product get 3.9 rating.

name: Clement Fernandes
title: Superb product
content: Good product. Long lasting battery and value for money. This is my second set which I purchased. I will recommend this product.

name: Varun
title: Good Product
content: The product is really good & comfortable. Amazon service is always the best. Got the product within a few hours from ordering it. Sound quality is amazing, bought Boat for the first time and feels great listening to music with it.

name: Rahul Ganatra
title: product dead in less than 6 months
content: since last 2 days post charging blue light keeps on. it doesnt go of even when you turn the product off. also in last 1 day it has stopped charging and turning on. it is now dead. tried resetting etc.

name: MD zeeshan alam
title: Important thing to know
content: Basically product is awesome .but don't buy this product in 1500.just put this product in cart and wait to price low.when any offer come and price till 999 ,then buy it .it is good in this price . although it is good product . important note your first check boat service center in your city before buying if it get damaged within one year you can go to boat service center and then your product maybe replace ya correct on that's place .best of luck.

name: Aiswarya
title: Ok type product
content: I brought this during sale @999. Can say worth the money with few flaws ofcourse.. Connecting it to 2 device shows issue. Sometimes connectivity is not stable.. Battery life is considerably good.. Sound quality is also good.

name: Suchanda Biswas from Kolkata, West Bengal, India
title: excellent
content: i loved it most. a must buy. now a days it is selling like hot cake. all are using it and its really worth of buying and usage.

name: Srivatsa
title: Worth the money..
content: The overall performance is worth the money... But what i wanted more was the buttons for the next song or to go back to the previous song.... Noise cancellation is good and every other mode of performance is good... Battery backup is great...... Perfect product in all ways for the money spent....

name: Jay Shah
title: Best in the category (Comparison with MI basic wireless earphones)
content: I purchased two wireless earphones simultaneously, Boat RockerZ 255 and MI basic wireless earphones. After using both for a week, I found that:. 1. Boat RockerZ 255 is comparatively higher on bass and sound quality.. 2. MI has a better battery longevity.. 3. Boat RockerZ has a more sturdy built.. 4. MI is easier and much lighter to move around with.. I use either as per my need.

name: Harsh Pathak
title: Poor noise cancellation
content: The product is on mark with the quality on this price but the one thing which completely disgrgards all this is the notice cancellation.. The recipient always complaints about how the background noise is much louder than my own voice.. Also for you to be clear on the other side you have to be loud enough to attract unnecessary attention which makes a mess many times.

name: Hari p.
title: Product is awesome... Package is worst
content: I couldn't apply for warranty......Product is good.... Wit awesome sound quality..... The sound quality is above expectations.... But.... The packing is damaged..... I don't know y...... The package is damaged worstly... Kindly look upon the package.... Plss

name: Sidha
title: Good for Bass
content: Bluetooth feature is having some issue. Its getting disconnected in between. Been using it now for 11 months. Works fine. Do not come out frequently during work out. Bass of music is the specialty of the product is what i felt.

name: CELLULAR REPAIR D.R
title: 👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎 garbage do not order👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎
content: 😵🤫💩💩💩💩💩💩💩👿👿. ************do not order do not order do not order garbage garbage garbage garbage garbage garbage Absolute garbage got them one of them doesn't even work the left side only the right side works and it cuts in and out and by the time I got it it was past the return eligibility. Do not order do not order do not order do not order

name: Kaushik💖
title: Good quality
content: It's okay kind of product, bass and sound quality is okay. Product is good but concern . How product price vary every day . One day 899 and other day 999 with same vendor apprio which is Amazon's subsidiary. What kind of joke Amazon is cracking.

name: Sanjay  Chamel
title: Great pair😂😁
content: I am a gym person.. Sweat no issue.. It's just that while skipping it tends to. Go here and there and same is the issue with bench press.. Though headphones are well built but tend to move here and there if u workout rigrously.. Sound- just for bass lovers. Noise cancellation- all most okay but not good as Sennheiser. Moisture you won't find any issues. Should you buy it?. Yes at this price range. Your getting best of every feature so it doesn't hurt much

name: Ajay Khare-Khot
title: Disappointed
content: Sound quality is good but there's lot of disturbance while playing music. Sounds like music is buffering due to slow internet connection even though I am playing tracks which are saved in my phone. When they are saying it's has Qualcomm technology for better connectivity then I don't expect this.. Another issue is battery drains too fast. If I charge fully in the morning then I need to charge in the afternoon coz it's switched off.. I have given the 2 stars for the sound quality only otherwise it's not much worth.

name: Dinesh
title: Poor Bluetooth Range.
content: If only this the Bluetooth range was little better this would have been an excellent product.. I use thus headphone while running. When I kept my phone on zipped pocket on the back of my track I would often loose connectivity. I had to keep my phone either on my hand or front pocket which was quite inconvenient. I returned the first one but still same problem withbthe second one.. I also wish they’d provide a case for safekeeping.

name: Sarita
title: Not recommended
content: Well, when u listening to the music it's good. However when u r on a call, the noise from my side keeps disturbing the other person on the line. It catches noise a lot.. Disappointed plus there was not refund option for this item on Amazon which caused me money loss on this stupid product.

name: Alhad
title: Amazon looted
content: It has a great sound quality. It is durable. At first I did not receive the item.. But then a replacement was delivered.. Edit : It stopped working after 20 days of purchase... The product doesn't charge now.. F***ing waste of money.

name: User
title: Work up boAt..!!!!
content: Worst product i have ever bought guess what started giving issues right after the replacement duration is over and ofently best reviews were withing 2-3 days this review is after 15 days of usage. This buletooth earphones gets disconnected automatically after every 2 mins (with one plus 6t & Honor holly 3) i would recommend not to buy this product there's various different Bluetooth earphones which you can look for at this price range based on my personal experience i do not suggest it to any one.

name: Srinivas Lalam
title: Ok but not satisfied
content: Not satisfied as specified sound and bass is ok for using as I’m using Sony Bluetooth headset comparing to that it’s good. But as Specified not compatible with Siri and google voice assistant. Although having better performance inside the helmet while driving it will be better to use. Don’t encourage this type of products for better

name: bhashu
title: Only bass is good
content: This product has a good bass but noise cancellation is really horrible. U can literally hear the slightest of the surrounding better than the person u r speaking to. Also in a years time it stops working properly. Mine stopped working in 10months time though i always kept it in very careful and ideal way.

name: Mohit Bajaj
title: Facing a Bug
content: Overall The Product is best at a price below 1000 RS.. The ear supporters slide on the surface of earphones which make it comfortable (so it could fit in every ear) but annoying at the same time(earphone feels loose and get out of ear).. Sometimes when you connect it after any pre connected device the volume doesn't vary to maximum as I need to reconnect it.. (It could be a case with my phone only(Lenovo K8 Note) but worth to mention the fact.

name: Murtaza R.
title: Not a great experience
content: It is not better than Boat rockerz 255.. Pro has some extra bass for music lovers and fast charging.. Person next to me could hear everything I was listening, that is not good. I don’t want others to know what I am listening or whom I am talking. Mic isn’t that great either. I had to keep my mouth really close to mic for proper conversation.

name: shahina
title: Boat rockerz... just rocking it ✌️✌️✌️
content: Really loved the product.. the Bluetooth connectivity is just too good.. it easily connects with any android or iOS devices.. sound quality is a different level.. feels like you are in a theatre.the pricing is so reasonable. Having such a quality at such a price is something we don’t get easily.customer service is also very good. I had some issues with my device , I called the customer service and their service is was very fast.

name: Vishal
title: Disappointed with Product delivered with having Battery Issue
content: Got this product immediately next day delivery but Product is not up to the mark.. I don't think so its genuine one, gives battery issue. After getting switched off have charged 15 mints and it shows 100% charged and after 10 mints it shows 80%. I have played only half an hour for 2 days and it gets switched off. Very disappointed

name: Satyam Jha
title: Needs improvement
content: It's noise cancellation, bluetooth connectivity and sound quality is good but it has lots of issue with battery. It's battery after charge will go from 60 to 0 within few minutes

name: Surendra
title: Value for money
content: After six months I have writting review excellence build quality nice sound with bass itcan survive in accidental rain battery backup is 6 hrs max but small minor it takes almost 90 min for charging over all good it can connect multiple devices that good thing superb product
