name: VISHAL
title: Worth
content: I bought this back band in 999. Over all this neck band is good in all aspects . Sound is good. But I miss some functionalities which other brands give for eg tracks changing buttons , auto disconnect on when both ear piece magnetised with each other.

name: Krishna vishwakarma bhadke
title: Buy but be careful
content: after 5 month one side of my earphones is not working so I sent that piece back for replacement originally it was neon colour but after replacement I I received complete black piece. The piece has keys on its left side and battery on right (faulty manufacturing). Overall sound quality noise cancellation is gr8

name: ALLWYN JAISON
title: Fragile, not durable or long lasting
content: Bought it in Oct 2019, used it regularly for just over 2 months before the cable broke, expected better durability from Boat brand, disappointing.. Sound quality and battery backup is good, connectivity is quick and range is also good enough considering the price range of the device.. Overall disappointed with the product.

name: Akshay M.
title: Product is not working even after replacement
content: This product is really "Backwas". I have replaced the product one time and even after getting new one safe problem occurred. Headphone neither switching on nor connecting to the phone. Replacement window already deemed. Company should not shell this type of product.... Or make the product with more concentration with good workers.

name: Kapil Mehra
title: Within one month the product is dead.
content: T'he product is not as per my expectations, it got disconnect automatically in between (though it has enough battery life) and you have to establish the connection again. Sometimes it work and sometimes it don't. In just 38 days the the product has lost its life and now is completely dead.

name: ashish rath
title: Great one at this price range
content: At this price range i think this one of the finest headset available in market at present. Easily runs for 5-6houra in single charge. Voice call quality is nice. Music quality is satisfactory. Bass level is not that great but it can be adjusted using equaliser so its a great piece. Go for it. Its deserves value for money tag definitely.

name: Prasanth Kumar
title: Good Product
content: An outstanding product.. The sound quality is outstanding and the connection procedure with mobile device is too simple.

name: Abhishek
title: Not that good
content: It's just okay product....not satisfied with performance....Bluetooth range is very less...around 3meters....sound n mic quality is good...but volume is less

name: Bhaskarjya
title: Review
content: Depends upon on your luck. I am lucky enough to get genuine product.. Once u plug it into your ears u cant hear anything in the outside environment without even playing the song .. Ratings:. Bass- 10/10. Treble-9/10. Noise cancellation -10/10. Design - 9/10

name: Amazon Customer
title: bad product
content: one side of the year phone was damaged within a year. It all happened when i have not been using it for long period. And when I tried to contact the call centre nobody pickup the phone (during lockdown). seriously i haven’t received any message email or any call to tell me what to do. now warranty period is over and it is now a trash for me.

name: Uddeshya
title: In Budget Earphone
content: I bought these earphones a week ago everything is all good. The sound quality is superb. The only thing I faced bad was sometimes the connection is poor i,e sound comes breaking and then you have to reconnect it. Battery life is good it charges fast and builds quality is also okay.. The only recommendation is at its price is high, you can buy others too with more features.

name: Sahil Lad
title: One side stopped working,Mic issue and Bluetooth range problem
content: It's sound n noise cancellation is good , Battery Backup is good too. But after using for 1-2 month it one side shut down suddenly n also the caller in front can't hear your voice it's mic is below average. Also I faced Bluetooth range problem when I connect it to my phone and keep my phone in my pocket it just disconnect..... I have place a replacement. So let's see

name: Parag Ghosh
title: Bad product
content: First of all, there are alot of connectivity issues. Battery backup is reliable but the sound is a bit crackling on high notes. The bluetooth connection seems to be wobbling on putting my phone in my jeans pocket. Worst product at 1.6k

name: Ayush
title: Battery life is excellent
content: This is the headphone which i was looking for i charge it just for 20mins and it runs 4hrs continously i really like its build quality its very durable and is also provided with google assistant which makes it easier to use and finally the sound quality is dope i bet u cant get a headphone like this at this price dont think a lot just buy it😊

name: Sangu Sandeep Varma
title: boAt Rockerz 255 Sports Wireless Headset review
content: Likes -. lite weight. Very comfortable wearing. Bass is good enough. Noise cancellation haven't tested yet but I believe it will be good based on the feedback heard from my friends who are using it since a long time. Dislikes -. Completely made of plastic 😔. Wire should have been thicker. Bass should have been balanced the default settings is over base

name: Jay panchal
title: Total waste of money
content: First of all received used box without charging cable and user manual and Bluetooth is also not working nd amazon send me defective item the ear piece supports same for both ear shown in picture amazon this time very disappointing me.. dont by this total waste of money...

name: Somnath
title: Best at its price
content: Bought it at ₹999 during sale.. Probably the best at its price, boAt never upsets you with their product.. After full charge continuous music can be played for 7-7.5 hours.. Been 4months and no issues, just a great product.. Edit :. Been more than a year now, and still works great. Probably the coolest bluetooth earphone at this price range !

name: santy kr
title: Worst product
content: Worst product. First Time I bought this boat company product and I trap.. This product is working with laptop so I made a replacement request but after 2 days this is also not working with laptop.. Quality standards are poor in Boat.Now I am looking for refund.

name: G.N.Kishor Kumar
title: Good
content: Sound quality, moisture wicking are very great. Noise cancelation is good. But I observed switching off before battery is even more than 20%. Build quality and performance are good. And very comfort to use.

name: Ajit M.
title: Sounds good but not reliable!
content: Bass and the audio quality is really comparable to big brands. However, durability is a concern. The first pair I had had some issues with right earphones. The replacement had issues of voice breakage. Sooner or later, the boat sinks... I went for JBL Endurance Run BT.

name: NKS
title: Good sound quality but low  battery life.
content: I bought it for 999. Sound quality is really good and good grip on-ear. the battery life is approx 2 hour. Earphones quality is good with strong magnetic lock... Straps is good quality and the earphones wires are too good... Buttons quality is good.. overall a good earphone in under 1000.

name: Namanjyot singh
title: Worst product and worst service ever
content: It stopped working. And when i complained for return they took earphones but do not replaced and dont give back.Before one year it will stop working. And warranty is useless besause they will pick up ur earphone but will not return. Worst service worst product

name: jitesh haldipur
title: Good product.
content: Overall a good bluetooth earphone. Sound is good. A little more treeble sound could have added a star to the product. Still a better choice to go for and enjoy. Expectations were more but not unhappy too.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good bass. Distance 10mtr definitely not.
content: Writing this review after one month usage.. Product is meant for people who prefer good bass. Sound quality starts dropping once u move away from object let it be like 4-5 meters too initial it was better. As it takes into consideration your body deflection ,and sound of a person talking is like he is in water.. battery life is good.sound quality is better as i grabbed it for discount at 1200/₹.. Actually would give 3.5 🌟

name: Dharmendra Singh Rawat
title: Best in Budget
content: Sound quality is quite good when listening music in bass and also in high and lows. Build quality shuld be more better. Fast charging is marvelous it gives 100% charging in 10 minutes when your device is 50% charged. Battery could be better means it could be with capacity 10-12 hours. इस मूल्य में इससे अच्छा कोई और कंपनी नहीं दे सकती।।

name: Amitava Dutta
title: Defective product
content: It is one of the worst product that I purchased ever. The product has been damaged within few days. After lodging a complaint for its replacement, the item has been replaced after one month. Again within few days the same defect occurs. The sound output of the right portion is totally off.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Go for it if you want a basic wireless ear phone.
content: Basic wireless headset with mic. Sound quality is average. Had expected good bass as its from boat.. but was disappointed with the bass as well as the sound quality which sounded artificial. Batter backup is good and also the make quality is good. A 3 star product.

name: minesh thaker
title: Awesome for the price range
content: It has truly surpassed my expectation. The design and build quality is amazing. Bluetooth range is amazing. it can be simultaneously connected with two devices and it connects really fast. Battery lasts almost 6-7 hrs with medium volume. Sound quality is great for the price range I would say. You must not expect the quality of same priced wired earphone but that being said, this one is not too far behind. I absolutely loved this earphone. I got it for ₹999 which makes it a must buy at this price.

name: Gaurav Aggarwal
title: Buy only if you need it for one year or less. It'll be dead in that time.
content: Dead in less than one year! Not charging - no response - like it's customer service. Although sound quality and bluetooth connectivity is good enough, it's of no use if it stops working in less than a year. The company reared its head in the last few years though aggressive marketing push. but it could not create products which meets good standards. The customer service is not responsive at all.

name: Abhinab Das
title: Depends , not all products are bad but some products company default
content: After 2 months of use , its right side is not working, i hope boat will exchange it. Check it ,if its less audible then other of your earphones ( any brand , may be wired or wireless ) return it

name: Satyendra Ramnadh
title: Need refund
content: One of the 2 I bought is not functioning. I need refund for this. I would like to return it.. I know boat has good reviews. But one the product is not functioning. Bluetooth connection and battery life are poor. I'm not getting battery life even for 1hour.. Kindly please help me. I don't want this product. It's been only 20days I brought

name: Ashutosh Singh
title: WORST SERVICE WHILE CLAIMING WARRANTY
content: Boat customer service is worst . My earphone is not charging and i call on customer care of boat but they didnt pick up my call then i mail on their given email address but one of email address doesnt work and from second one i didnt get any response . I dont know how to contact with them and claim my warranty . BIG BRAND WITH WORST SERVICE

name: Aditya
title: COULDN'T GET BETTER EARPHONES IN 999!!!
content: *The noise cancellation and sound quality is perfect. It has deep immersive base.. *The build quality is outstanding along with the neck band.. *Decent Battery life. I couldn't get a better in-ear bluetooth headsets since I got it for Rs.999 in a sale. THE PACKING COULD BE IMPROVED THINKING THAT IT IS A 1.5K WORTH HEADSET!!

name: karan mohan thakur
title: Defective piece...easily and convenient refund provided by amazon
content: Sound quality and everything is great at the price point.. Just I received a defective pieces.but Amazon refunded me and the service provided by Amazon was quick and convenient.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very very bad warranty policy
content: Very poor quality of this product also pathetic condition on warranty service.. After 5 month its not working one side, I send Mumbai office for Replace through Currier 26th June but today is 18th July after 23 days I got a mail from Concerne it's receive at seller point .. I don't know after replacement the product I got or not

name: Gutti Pavan
title: Superb
content: First of all thanks to Amazon for fast delivery.. Well I got today this headsets it's a amazing sound and bass is good in low sound but when u increasefull sound the bass sound very blurs blurs sounds comming. We can't listen properly.. And bluetooth connectivity is good above radius 8mtrs.. Finnaly I am satisfied vt this product

name: Vivek Paradkar
title: Bad performance
content: Poor quality. No noise cancellation. Poor quality of bass and sound. Low quality and high price. Over all bad performance

name: Vicky
title: Dont miss the product with that price..start buying..
content: 1st impression bulit quality,sound quality godd..when compare to budget bluetooths,noise cancellation will be extreme it doesnt hear any noise...bass quality will bee veryy veryy high..its not good..that much bass quality for audio....finally ata this price itsss too tooo best product to buy..👌👌👌👌👌👌👌👌

name: Mac Donald Lyngdoh
title: No regrets
content: This is my first time using a wireless earphone and I tell you I'm impressed with Boat. From the super bass to the controls and battery, worth every penny. Just one downside, I think the indicator is not very much visible and sometimes have to strain to see if the charging is full or not.

name: Saasha
title: Being a PRO DJ - Go for it ! 🎧
content: 1st of all.. Good delivery after 4 days by amazon.. Sound quality is superb. 👌🏻. Bassline is mind blowing without distortion.. Highs are mid average... Mids are ok.. VOLUME level is low.. I have to tweak to almost 95% for clarity... WHY there is a SOUND DELAY when playing Games and VIDEOS ?. As a Pro DJ good BT earphones in this price compared to jbl .. Con's: no pouch provided . cable is quite tangling.. MUST BUY for BASS lovers.

name: Hanumant
title: God bass and sound bad mic and battery
content: All very nice but not good for talking in call. Mic quality not good other person complaint to low sound.. Pro. Nice bass. Nice sound quality. Easy cinnectivty. Cons. Mic quality. Battery

name: Sumit Dixit
title: Let me tell you very frank...
content: Let me tell you very frank bass is quite good not great, connectivity is worst, battery is average, expectations is high for my side as per brand but its response totally fail , disappointed me.last but not the least when i open the parcel seal is open and box packaging in parcel is damage.

name: Arun Srinivasan
title: WORST PRODUCT
content: Worst Product I have ever come across.. Within 10 days of usage, I know it's a short time. However, after using it continuously, I would strongly recommend NOT to go with this product. They are churning number in volumes for mass market and manufacture lowest quality earphone.. Last night, I have kept for charge for whole night and it could charge only upto 40% and within next 5 mins the battery got completely drained.

name: Jupiter
title: Buy if you like "cool" but not quality
content: Earphone sound quality - 2.5/5 (Much worse than a cheap wired earphone). Microphone quality - 1/5 (Sound keeps breaking and no noise cancellation). Coolness factor - 5/5 (Nice looking and wireless)

name: Kiran pandula
title: Average product with unnecessary buildup .. charging Port came out
content: Ok ok product..there is nothing great in this earphones.. I don't know why this product got this much hype and positive reviews.. this is one is not even water proof.. it got wet in rain and damaged.. I got replacement..this replacement product after 10 months of usage charging port got breakdown and it came out ...

name: Abhishek kundu
title: Value for money product
content: Decent product with Fast charging facility.. Sound quality good.. Bass little bit higher side.. Battery backup up to 5.30h. Noise cancellation good

name: Athon Chawang
title: Worse product is
content: I recently ordered this product before Christmas I just used it for 2 days ... now it’s no longer working anymore I spent Rs1300 just to listens songs for two days wonderful . now they are not ready to replaced either just keep talking about return window ... comon. I didn’t aspected this from Amazon.. I will never order stuff again in future from amazon m done. I guess I should delete my account now if they didn’t value me as their customer.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Outstanding prroduct😘..really loved it.!!
content: Awesome product within 2000 range ...bass is excellent...noise cancellation is nice..dolby sound experienced...if u have vr box and this earphone then u will feel like heaven u can listen each n every beat clearly with powerfull bass beats and sound clearity...i will give 10 out of 5 stars..because product is excellent...!!go for it...!!!thanks a lot to amazon services...😍👍

name: Shanthiny
title: Received used product
content: The product I received was a used one. The sound quality s very bad.. I had to keep the maximum sound in both my mobile and Bluetooth device. When plugged into hears and wearing helmet it gives a mild pain.. Waste of money...

name: Amazon Customer Arun Jain
title: In my opinion, is not value for money. Ready to spent more but needs quality
content: The sound quality is not satisfactory, you need to focus more to have clarity in communication, Bass is much below from my expectations. Noise cancellation dose not work specially while moving or traveling in public transport.

name: Pinark patel
title: Gud Product, Great Price
content: ITs a gud product, if you manage to get it at a very gud price, i did during the Diwali sale, the sound is gud and the features are gud also..Recommended.

name: Piyush
title: Boat Rockerz-Detailed Review
content: Connectivity- Disrupted many a times even if ur phone is in ur pocket and then the music starts lagging. Sound - If your connection is not affected, it has a very good sound. Mic- Okay for silent enviornments. But dare you not to use it in noisy enviornment or you'll be damned. Looks- It's sleek nd light weight and looks cool and stylish at this price. Finaly you can definitely go for it if you can get a deal under 1000rs.

name: gaurav
title: Cheap quality Chinese product
content: Extremely cheap quality Chinese product. It didn't work for even 10 days. I had bought Tagg inferno two years back which had better sound quality than this and once it stopped working during the warranty period, they promptly replaced it. These guys keep on directing to some stores nearby which I am finding it difficult to visit during this period.

name: Raman
title: Can be better sound quality and backup
content: I expected beter sound quality from boat which is 1st interms of sales but it is quite average and battery backup is 5 hours and charging time is 3 hours which is not suitable for regular users.

name: nagaraju
title: OK OK ear phones
content: I have bought it 4months back. All of a sudden it stopped working. It could connect to the device but no output...neither media nor calls. Even I could not hear the switching on voice. Now I checking for return policy

name: Aishwarya Kher
title: Amazing product
content: This is a good buy at a discounted price. Noise cancellation is awesome and you might have to struggle a bit to adjust it in the ear. Dont use for a long time because it starts paining. The design of the ear plug needs some improvement to allow longer usage.

name: Rishijain_2021
title: Good Product Boat Rockerz
content: Hello Everyone,. I am very thankful to Boat company to make Good Quality Bluetooth headphones in a medium Prices. This product is very awesome and easily compatible and a good look and wear. I also thank Amazon company for delivering inaccurate time. I am thanking Boat and Amazon Company to Provide me a Good and Medium Price.. Thank you,. Rishi Jain

name: sri sel
title: Worth the money
content: A good product for a cheap price. If your looking for a cheap Bluetooth earphones with a decent sound quality go for it. The comfort of also good. Overall worth the money

name: kaushik
title: Don't Buy [ people will not hear you ]
content: for listning audio is good.. But taking call from this headset is pathetic.. people won't be able to hear you.. [ break of voice]

name: vamsikrishna P
title: Wonderful blue-tooth ear phones
content: Excellent product.. Easy to connect to different devices.. Charging lasts long.. Quick charging.. You can use this while jogging/playing, fits nicely around the neck.. Definitely recommend this for... Also seller delivered quickly...

name: vikram singh
title: Nice Product Value for money
content: I am using it since last year I must say worth buying it. I have bought it for @ 999. Easy to carry, I personally use it in the gym during the workout and all the time when I travel from home to office.

name: Sayak
title: Quality product
content: Overall good product...Base and sound quality is awesome. Noise cancellation is okay...You can increase the base by exchanging the medium ear buds with larger ear buds which comes along with the package...Earpanels consists of magnets behind them which is pretty good... Highly satisfied with this product...Would recommend others to buy it...But the problem with the package was that I ordered for neon colour and I got black colour. ..I don't know why...

name: Shubham Meher
title: Decent headphones at 899
content: Sound not good i have been using cx180 and bassheads 225 recently u cant compare them with this,still noise cancellation is cool,(do not wear while travelling).. Battery gives 10+ hrs continue usage,. For me the earbuds hurt a bit after using of long hours.. Overall still a good deal.

name: Neha Fernandes
title: Good for 6-9 months. Beware of aftersales and service
content: Ease of use: 5/5. Lightweight: 5/5. Charging time: 5/5. Active Run time: 4/5 (ave. 10 hrs useage/day). Bluetooth set up: 5/5. Silicone buds: 3/5 (needed to buy additional buds from a hygiene perspective). Unfortunately, since the left-side speaker stopped working. And since it's out of warranty, not sure if I should exchange or buy a new product.

name: Manu
title: Nothing great to talk
content: Good one but not good for music lovers. Noise cancellation is bad, sounds flat without much bass but crisp sound. Build quality is good.

name: Krishnendu Das
title: A little more expected
content: I have got it at 899 on Great Indian Sale.For this price segment it is undoubtedly good.But the vocals and trebles should be more impressive.

name: Anjali
title: Pathetic service by Amazon
content: Within 4 months one side of earphone stop working . .and when I contacted customer care of Amazon they provided me wrong no of boat customer care . .and called them several times but they were pathetic on call. Some time put my call on hold and one person was so pathetic that he was singing on call speaking very slowly . .I asked him to atlest give call to some one else but he denied said do what ever you can do we can not help .

name: Anuj Gupta
title: Not a good product at this price
content: It's okk .in this price segment it is costly. Battery backup not upto 4 hrs. When battery become 20% , it's switch off automatically. sometimes Other side people not got clear voice they complaint about it.

name: Sunil Kumar
title: Read this before buying
content: The sound quality was fine but not worth the price. Most of the time, the noise cancellation didn't work and the worst part is that they broke within a year. I bought two earphones (one black and the other red) both were working fine one night and stopped working the next morning. Kinda makes you question the build quality. If you're looking for value for money than these are not for you.

name: Goutam Shah
title: No Noise Cancelation!
content: It doesn't support noise cancelation. The person on the other end will hear the surrounding's noise more than yours and in a closed cabin, it will echo. Not recommended for calls. But for hearing songs, a great product!

name: D. francis
title: Good product,please connect to customer support group
content: Value for money,but it's not working now. Give details to return the same because here we don't have service centre. help me to return the product .Please connect me to customer care,their call centre number is always busy I am not able to connect them I want to return my boat wireless earphone model boat rockers 255. Now it is not working Purchased on 30 Sep.2019 with 1 year warranty

name: Buyer
title: Not up to the mark. Audio breaks even with 2 feet distance
content: Sound quality when listening to songs : Good when listening to songs. Covers good distance.. Sound quality on phone calls : Completely dissatisfied. Does not cover even one meter. Sound breaks when on call. Noise cancellation : Not great. Ok Ok. Overall not satisfied.

name: Agathian D
title: Boat customer service at its peak
content: Had no issues with the item for almost 9 months.. When I did run into problem, Boat arranged for a return pickup and replaced the item within 10 days - ALL FREE OF COST.. Love it..

name: Bishnu Dev Patra
title: Customer service is Great.
content: Too much bass. Due to the extra bass vocals and some instrumental separations are affected.. For a bass lover its the choice.. I personally dont love too much bass.. But boAt service is top notch. Love boAts customer service.

name: Ashish Saxena
title: Awesome product
content: The headset are awesome, bass is good, sound is very clear. Connects to mobile, laptop, tab and TV instantly. Value for money and a must buy if someone is looking for budget headsets.

name: Madhuri
title: My opinion
content: This was basically something that I really loved to have on my ears since many days so this product is very satisfying to me.. Every product has a flaw so you can find them in others' reviews. Personally, I loved it. The sound, the model, the look, the charging facility, everything is nice. You can go for it. Keep it safe for it to last longer.

name: Asif ali
title: PERFECT WORKING
content: PROS HERE. 1,GREAT SOUND QUALITY. 2,BLUETOOTH PAIRING IS FAST. 3,PERFECT FIT. 4,BETTER ACOUSTIC. 5,GOOD DESIGN. 6,HIGHLY HD SOUND. CONS. 1,PRICE IS LITTLE HIGH. OVERALL PERFORMANCE IS GREAT.. GOOD HEADSET.. GO FOR IT.

name: Indian
title: One side ear piece is not working. Returning it
content: Bought it for 999 rs in Jan mid, 2020 deal. Going to return it. One side of ear piece is not at all working. Seems the seller is selling only defective items in the deal. Very bad

name: Lohith
title: good product in a damaged box
content: the product is good but i am disappointed by the packaging the box of product looks damaged luckily the product is working what if it didn't than i would be denied refund or replacement blaming the damaged on me the movement i looked at the box i was scared hopeing that the product was working properly

name: sachin
title: one side headphone is stopped working after 4 months and voice quality is not good
content: I have used boats product earlier so I have ordered this bass quality is just ok ok as compared to wired version, battery. will last for 4 hours and take 1 hrs to charge. if you are looking for whatsapp call then don't go for it.. quality over call is not good voice is very low

name: manpreet kaur
title: Good but could be better so read before you buy
content: I expected more from it. Sound is not so clear at high volume. Noise cancellation while listening to music in public was like so poor, totally zero. I liked my samsung wired earphones better than this with its sound quality and noise cancellation way better.

name: Ashish sharma
title: Amazon stolen the correct item
content: Do not order it .I have rcvd wrong item which is cheap 100 rs handsfree(Wired). Either vendor shipped it incorrectly or delivery boy stolen it but Great thing is Amazon says that they can not do any thing in this and as per them they shipped correct item and disconnected the call. Now i have left with that cheap earphone instead what i had ordered and paid for.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Nice and Value for money earphones
content: Value for money. I got it for 1.5k the sound quality is decent...with mid level bass and treble...good for playing games...answering calls...and occasional music..but the Bluetooth range gets affected if we move away more than 8-9 feet.

name: GHANIWALE
title: Okk, not bad
content: Sound is good, call vibration missing, Magnet is just for binding 2 earphones, not more than that.. As per general awareness, once magnet disconnect, call or play should be connected, but not works.

name: Rajesh Kumar
title: Price Worthy and Best of the Best Product to Grab
content: It's Simply an Amazing Product for the Music Lovers who can enjoy the best quality of songs in travelling, gym workouts, or for mood change.. Loving it so much and i haved owned it at a reasonable price on Diwali sale. 200 % worthy You can go or choose for this 250 BOAT Sports Wifi Bluetooth headphones.. I can rate 100% sure for anyone who would like to purchase it or can gift for someone who love music

name: Ajeej
title: Bad service
content: Dear all. Whoever wants to buy boat , before buying pls think on that service part. because they sell products very easily but very pethetic service they were providing they take more than one month one of my frnd got his product after 2 and half month from service center. Pls think once if productsl get defective then very irritative to get back as soon

name: Siddharth
title: Very good. 8 on 10
content: I'd rate it 8 on 10. The sound is too bassy but u just need to tweak it in ur phone's equalizer and its good to go. I'd say its much better for watching movies than music. For the price its a major go!

name: Hanish
title: #worst brand boat
content: Worst quality product. Even worst is the warranty service by the brand. They not at all replying for the queries related to warranty. Don't buy these product. They stopped working after 6 months only.

name: Piyalee Das
title: waste of money
content: within a month of purchase, the headphone melted while charging using it's own charging cable. unable to reach amazon or boat customer service. bad product. do not buy.

name: Aadityajadhav
title: Good after sales service
content: Writing this after 7 months of use first when i got it i didn't like it as it was very bass heavy headphone but after their burning period they were good Af but in last month got some problem with connectivity and battery charging so I made a complaint on their site and pick up was initiated by boat and now after 15 -20 days I recived a new replacement unit happy with their after sales service * THANK YOU BOAT

name: Jack B
title: Stopped working after one year.
content: Led stopped working just after 4 months. Bluetooth stopped working after one year . Will never recommend or buy boat products . Fooling people in the name of make a in India.

name: Satish Y
title: Nice product with best audio quality
content: I like the BoAt products as quality is as expected in that reasonable price range. Audio quality is great.. Pros:. Quality of output.. Base is satisfactory.. Battery is above average.. Cons:. No cons observed but vibration alert on calls should be added in this model.

name: Rahul
title: Please get me refund or replacement  of my order
content: Please get me refund or replacement of my order. Just open to check my ordered piece, but it is not getting charge neither getting connected to my device. Although charged for about 30min but still problem not resolved. On top of all odds, charging wire also already having issue. Not getting plugged At all.. Very much disappointed, However the look and feel is really great and very satisfying.. I have placed request for returning the item

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great for the buck
content: Based on usage so far I have very few complaints. The buttons that are programmed for volume, can't be programmed for media changer. And that there is no caller id in the earphones, but apart from these I love the product. Yes the sound quality or noise cancellation is not as great as airpods or high end earphones, which is obvious given the cost of the product. But for the price, the product is great.

name: Shubham Garg
title: Loved it.
content: The value for money is amazing. The sound quality is at par with Sony earphones worth 3K although it breaks a bit at higher volume. The battery backup is decent. I use it everyday in office and elsewhere and one charge is enough for a full day. The build quality is decent for the price, the charging point lid is very flimsy and could be improved with a better one.. All in all these earphone are worth the money.

name: Lav
title: Seller is the worst. Seller cheated me with faulty product and I could find out after a month
content: Worst product delivered by Amazon, it's been just a month and my product became faulty. There is no sound from one ear piece and amazon kept return or refund for only 10 days. Worst. We buy a product by paying a huge money and they provide us faulty product which wont work after 1 or 2 months.

name: Boopathi R.
title: Sweating/itching in ear's - not good
content: I can give only 1 star , though technically sound quality / battery is good. All of my family members felt sweating/itching in the ear's after few mins of call / video's. And no return also , only replacement , so no chance of recovering your valuable money. I bought at 1300 rs , which I felt got wasted. :( :( :(

name: manish s
title: Good product and quality too.
content: Product and audio quality is excellent. But concern is everytime you have to power On and Off which is time consuming and sometimes person forgets to power off which is something drain of battery.. Also, there is nothing to do with magnet as of now. Even if you keep magnet in contact no action performed.(no power off).

name: Shanaya Ingle
title: Good
content: Good quality let's see hw many days it will work. Bt it doesn't fit n stay in my ears 😕 sound quality is good bt after connecting these to my ohn my normal hdphns r not connecting dn't knw wht hpnd

name: Vishal
title: Just worth its price.
content: Creates problem if you are talk & put your phone in pant pockets. Other than that, sound quality is great for it's cost. Battery life is decent, but withers down though with time.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor Battery
content: Sound Quality is good, product quality is good, but disappointed with the battery. With 60%-70% volume, it hardly works for 3 hours, this is very bad considering the brand.

name: Ani wasnik
title: It's only for sound n music lovers not for pubg or gaming
content: The sound quality is awsm considering the price range.. Bass is superb.. Battery backup is awsm.. Call quality is up to the mark.. Bt only thing i dont like in this earphone is sound delay in pubg.(if it is possible so plz fix it in next model). Ovell all its value for money only for music lovers. Plz don't buy it for pubg or gaming.

name: SHIRAZ
title: Complaint regarding boat earphone 255 pro
content: Worst product ever. I have buy this product on 9 th august 2020 and today is 8th September.. Now, This is not taking charging. Worst battery backup even local devices can give a battery backup of 7-8 days. Above of all, I am searching here and there for service (under guarantee).. I have called amazon service centre too but as usual i have got wrong number.

name: Vidyanaidu
title: Samsung mobile not supporting
content: Boat company is awesome bt it's not support properly to Samsung mobile volume is very low and i connected to other mobile also then was working fine bt with Samsung not working properly so Samsung people don't buy it

name: Tushar Chawla
title: Total Value for Money.
content: No wireless earphone better than this one in this. Price range.. Its Affordable,easy to use while driving,sound quality also good.. The best thing is its very much durable.. I’m using is since 5-6 months and is working fine.. No other wireless earphone has worked this long for me.. Total value for money. Go buy it.

name: Hari G.
title: Not much satisfied
content: It has an electronic sound and its doesn't give the clarity of sound when we play it on our phone speaker. It's a bit old and some sort of sound is heard when not playing the music. It doesn't provide you a good quality . And to buy now, You may go for new boat products or one plus bullets. Don't buy these old products. Mi basic earphones are far better than this product

name: anubhav
title: Great product for price...
content: Excellent for the price..... much more of what i expected for the price...... Sound is good, quality is good... I would recommend buying it.... The only concern is i was not able to register the item on boat website for warranty.. Also in was not given choice of colour.... red that i recieved is also goog lookin....

name: Dheeraj R.
title: Very poor service and product quality
content: Product stopped working within 4 months and I returned it for repair/replacement, It’s almost a that they collected the product for repair and I’m still waiting for them for any update about the product, it took almost 15 days to reach their service center and now it’s almost 15 days and it is still in their service center.... very poor service from boat.... the product didn’t even serve for 4months and the replacement or repair of the product is taking too long... Even no boat customer desk numbers work....

name: Srivatsan
title: Careful. Good Boy.
content: You may get a defective product. Locate the nearest service center. Keep your bill with you. Keep the original packaging with you. They will replace it at the drop of a hat.

name: Anukrati Rajoria
title: Not comfortable at all and doesn't work properly.
content: I used this earphone for 1 day and found that the people from other hand could not hear my voice.. I can hear their voice but my voice was not audible.. might be there is an issue with its mic.. it's battery is worst.. it works for 1 hour and then I have to charge it again.. it's not comfortable at all. I'm want my money back for this item as it feels like I wasted ₹1500

name: Ranajeet Paul
title: Bass!!
content: I like the whole package(build quality, packaging, earbuds ,light weight, super comfy) the battery is good..it's all comes to the sound quality....for a Rs1200-1500 earphone it's too low....it's all bass...nothing but bass...nobody wants that much bass..used loads of other earphones..sound is too bassy...otherwise descent product

name: kartik
title: Okay at this range
content: Like:. Looks. Sound quality. Ease of connect.. Dislike:. No carry box provided. Poor packaging. Wires are lengthy. *Today i got the product but the box was broken and the product seems to be used one.

name: Amazonuser
title: All Okay except the Locking mechanism
content: Fine earphones except the locking mechanism is little loose. Lost one ears lock. Tough it works fine but one lock is missing so that at times feels little odd.

name: Ritesh Singh
title: Go for it but no for calling purpose
content: I am using this product from last 4 month and got 1 replacement as well. This device is my second headphone.. What is best -. Battery life - 8 to 10 hrs. Durability - if you will use without folding wire this is great.. Sound - Amazing.. Pairing - you can keep pair with 2 devices like I continually use with cell phone and my Fire tv stick. What is bad - No noise cancellation so its bad when you will call someone as they will keep listen noise from your side whether your Tv volume is at 2 or 3

name: Ranjit
title: Good product from boat
content: I purchased a year ago after 3-4 months it started malfunctioning one side was not working then I contacted the service centre then they asked to send the defective product to their service centre and they sent me a new ear phone with in a week. The service was also good.

name: Nishikant Gore
title: Fake advertising be aware
content: Fake advertising.. Friends I have bought this product in January and it was nice but then when I sent it for replacement they send back a complete replica which looks same but cheap quality.. Apparently in the name of big discount they are giving out cheap and low quality products as my. brother have bought one in this month.. Weight and dimensions are completely different than before also says as baot rockerz only instead of boat rockerz 255.

name: Arunkumar
title: Worth every penny
content: I have been using is over 1.5 years.. it's stunning.. sound quality is amazing and is super durable. I like the band's quality. Never had any connectivity issues. Even battery lasts reasonably. It was a happy purchase!! May be one thing to call out is that during jogging it doesn't stay upright. Needs a bit holding off.

name: Chirag
title: Didn't like bass and battery life of this earphones
content: Price is best.. Worst battery life.. Four years back, I purchased Nokia wireless earphone, which had option save battery when not working, but Boat don't have that yet in this earphones.. If you are using apple earphones, then you'll not like bass of this Boat earphones.

name: Supreet Kaur
title: Loves the product.
content: Very gud earphones. With gud sound quality and noise cancellation. I gifted these earphones to someone and he just loves these headphones.If you are looking for good Bluetooth earphones in this price range,you can go for this. Very good product.worth buying.

name: Ashish
title: The product malfunctions fast
content: It has been few weeks since I purchased and the left side ear phone has completely stopped working. Not expected for a product worth ₹1500. It has now become useless for me. Don't know what to do.

name: Mahipat kulkarni
title: Good sound but ear buds are fragile
content: Product worked good for 5 months and then the right ear bud stopped working...so better to avoid it...even after handling with care the ear bud is very fragile. Pathetic experience with boat customer care..they work in BC age..no response from them to replace the damaged ear bud.

name: Rakesh Soni
title: Pathetic Product
content: Hi Team,. Its not even 1 Year i bought this product and i have been facing challenges for sound quality from past 6 months. The time i bought the product was of INR 1500 which is far more high than current prices and services are very pathetic. Request you to kindly change the product as i trust Amazon a lot for its services.

name: Deepak Solanki
title: Great, Could have been better for Noise Cancellation
content: Sound Quality is great, noise cancellation should have improved cause excpet my own voice my caller's hear others noise, bluetooth connectivity - sometimes it takes times to connect and also while playing a songs it disturbs with some terrific sounds like connectivity issues I have checked same with my other phone but same sounds and disturbance but not all the time hardly once or twice in a day.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Must Buy, Awesome Product....
content: Pros:. 1. Good sound Quality with great base.. 2. Can feel music, great hearing experience.. 3. Great battery life, lasts for almost 6 hrs. charging speed is quite good, takes 2-3 hrs to fully charged.. 4. Light weight, ear fit is good.. 5. Noise cancelled is awesome.. Cons:. 1. Durability would be concern, needed to be handled with care.. 2. It's water resistant not waterproof. 3. Wires seems to free fall n stretch, it would suggest to tie it with neckband to avoid the same.

name: Deepali
title: Average product
content: Nice product... but a bit high price.It could have much better sound quality at this price. I have always loved "Boat", it is one of the best product of boat but could be better. Sound quality is average... not upto the mark. I was expecting it to be more clear. with better base n treble.

name: Karthick
title: Very useful and quality based good and worthable price.
content: I always love boat earphones.. Especially this model is most of my family members using. That's why I always preferred to buy this one. And, Thanks for this price drop It was very comforting for buy easily. Thanks u for quick delivery also..Loely...

name: JAMAL
title: Worth for money
content: Really a wonderful product. Sound clarity is so good. Perfectly fits for ears and long distance Bluetooth connectivity. So good and best one...

name: Naveen
title: Issue with second phone connection
content: Overall it’s a good headset if you connect to one phone, but if you would like to use it for your second phone, then it has a bug it seems, it keep announcing your connection status with other phone, it’s very irritating, especially while your in calls

name: Samrat Saha
title: Good product, better service.
content: This is the best Bluetooth Earphone at this price. Plus you'll get 2 years Warranty. So can't complain.. Battery life is not that impressive though, so keep that in mind before buying it.

name: Shailendra Ahir
title: Only one problem otherwise perfect for music lover
content: Cool earphone It can cover 3 to 5 meeter range and earbuds are good take the shape of inner ear but earplugs which are fitted in ear have loosed and sometimes come out from buds so I have to very carefull about it. If it missed then it wouldn't get replacement and your earphone will go in trash This is only problem with it otherwise sound quality,look,fitting in any type ear and bass are awesome..... Have a Good.......:-)

name: Malovika Das
title: Worth for the Price
content: First i have got a defected piece which was working fine for a week and then left earphone stopped working, then aftet raising this to the boAt, they have replaced it with new one. Overall the product is nice as per the price. Noise cancellation is good and the sound also. If you are planning to spend 1K on a headphones this is good option.

name: Akshaansh Singh
title: Don't buy the retailer is distributing duplicate earphones.
content: Worst bluetooth earphone ever bought in my life the bluetooth mic got broke in 10 days it didn't worked after 1 week when I thought to get it to the repair shop and the earphones also broke and when get to the repair shop he said that baAt is a nice company but the retailer have got you the duplicate one . Its literally a money waste thing I should recommend you to not buy it.

name: Nawaz Attar
title: Value for money
content: Ill give you honest review about this earphone. Excellent performance. Battery life very good. You can use whole day. I ordered 3 at a time from myntra at 900rs. That's was a very amazing offer on it. 2 connection works perfectly. But sometimess it gets auto disconnect but again it gets connected. But this is a case of one of my earphone, not with every earphone. I have all three colours. I'llI recommend you to buy this, as at this price you will not find any better earphone. Overall value for money.

name: Medasari
title: Quality gets deteriorated in a couple of months
content: This is after 5months, I'm writing after buying this product.. While talking through a phone call, there will be heavy voice disturbance, and you need to swith from bluetooth mode to normal mode and talk normally.. So I don't prefer/recommend this product.. Battery also not much good

name: muzahid
title: Connecting Issue
content: After connected its running very well but when I receive call bluetooth not woking I have tried more time but cant found the issue.. I replaced the product but now I am getting the connecting issue this headphones is not connecting to any device

name: Deepak
title: Manipulative image
content: Everything is good about the earphone like noise cancellation, bass and sound quality but i would like to say that there is discrepancy while showing the product image. The one which i got is totally different from what is shown in the picture. Please do not show such manipulative image after making changes in it like highlight and colour diversion.

name: lakshay rai
title: DO NOT THINK TWICE.... JUST BUY...
content: Close your eyes(skeptic eyes)... Scroll the page to buy now.... And check out..... Simple..... Has a battery back up of more than 8 hours if your use is judicious.... I have not chrged it ever since I bought it and this is after 2 days of purchase....

name: Atul
title: BoAt at its BeSt
content: I bought it under Sale at Rs. 899.00. And at this price is superb considering sound and built quality.. I choose this because I already have 2 boAt's wired earphones and they provide amazing quality at competitive price and best after sales serive.

name: kamal
title: 3rd class Service center
content: This product is 2 time service in a year but service center resend to customer after 2 months.so boat service center is very third class service center.

name: Adnan Memon
title: A must buy product but only in amazon sale
content: Arrived early. Quality is good. Bass is too good only thing is the ear buds hurt not very good. Nd when you are out travelling the opp person can hear the background more then your vooce thats the biggest problem

name: Prakash Thakur
title: Don't think just buy it
content: My first priority for buying this product is comfort level 5/5 I have slept so many times wearing this earphones. This earphones have best fitting 5/5. It's Noice cancellation is very impressive 4.5/5 I am a hosteler so when I go to mess or noisy area I usually use this earphones. Sound quality is good not best at this price 4/5. Bass is good for me not for others because it doesn't have heavy loud bass. Quality is very good. Range is okk , upto 10m distance

name: atyant
title: Will stop working adter a 45 days
content: I bought this because the earlier one same model which i owned, stopped working after about 2 months (right side sound gone and then fully gone), and now same happened to this piece in just 45 days.

name: kanjav oza
title: Like Bass? Take it. I bet on you'll like.
content: I have been using this for last 3 years. I love it so much that can't help liking any other brand's bluetooth earplugs.... Bass : 10000/100. Amazing built quality. Yes, i have used it roughly and it flies off my neck while riding a motorcycle. But it's ignored. Worth buying.. Thanks boat.

name: Rohit Hairstylist
title: Bluetooth headset issue one side not working
content: Actually I ordered this Bluetooth headset on September 11, 2019 .. And it was working good but on Jan 23 or 25 my Bluetooth headset which I ordered from Amazon headsets one side is not working an while buying the I saw there was a warranty of one year .. An the issue is one side of Bluetooth headset is not working I kindly request plz make a check on this.

name: Prakash
title: Buy it . Nice product . But check the charging port after brought it.
content: With this amazing price of 899 it's really a nice product. With all good features. Must buy it. But after buying use it and check if it is charging nor not . So that you can return it within the Free replacement date. I got a damaged product with charging port not functioning . So do check this . Otherwise is recommended to buy.

name: MITHRA
title: If you take calls from this headset I don't recommend you to buy this
content: Sound quality is not crystal clear...On high volume it's very bad...The microphone is very bad actually that doesn't have noise cancellation...when ever I take a call when there is little disturbance...They other person is not able to listen my voice but he's able to listen all the disturbances.I literally hate this.even I replaced but the same problem that means this product is not well built

name: Harish G
title: Only working in 2 Months No service centre in Chennai Tamilnadu
content: Last July 7 I purchased boat 255 Bluetooth headset Rd.1499/- starting 2months working asome sound effects after purchased 3 months left side speaker not working I am totally upset .No service centre in Chennai, I searched in Google showing in amps skywalk Chennai there is No Response. service centre only available in Mumbai Howcan possible in Replacement

name: Chris Gayle
title: Not happy
content: Hi Team,. I have bought bluetooth headset “boat rockerzs 255 pro “ which I have got has a issue for one ear piece and also the quality is not Upto the mark so want to cancel this order

name: atul deshwal
title: Worst experience of my life to buy them
content: Please dont buy them they shows that 1 yr of replacent warranty but they a big lier. Even now its almost 30 days but i dont get my rockrzz back but a single mesaage recieved from them is we will repaired and send back to me. They are cheap but not durable its only 3 months but charging issues connection issues. Plzz. Plzzz. Plzzzzz. Dont buy rockrzzz

name: Harikrishna
title: WORST PRODUCT ...  I have never seen
content: Very Bad and worst performance. It works only 4-6 months after that 100 % Pakka fail.... After that no communication of customer care service... No response... Waste of money..... Please choose another brand... Except BOAT

name: Abhinav Singh
title: WOOOHOOOOO JUST A WOW PRODUCT
content: - good battery backup with minimum of 10 hrs. - for boat bass is really good. - value for money. - best in sound class. No CONS as such but for charging it takes around 1hrs 30min

name: vikas
title: Worst product and service too
content: Second time I brought the headphone but it’s pathetic one ..complete disaster. I need to go to service station to change the same ,there is no online pick up done .. I got replacement but the issues for this one is the same.. I need genuine product and 100%replacement with ok quality .. I rate this product 0.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Too good headphones!!! just a bit shaky on receiving call when two devices are connected.
content: Go for the headphones blindly if you are getting it below 1500. Such a awesome sound quality. Had been using it for almost 6 months and they are awesome I tell you. Best part it is not like most of the bass earphones who sound is not bearable. Just a con, when connected to two devices, say you are listening to music from computer and suddenly receive a call from phone then the voice is bit shaky. Also the range is too good for a earphone like this. Best one from Boats!!!!

name: Avinash Patel
title: Buy at your own risk..
content: Writting this review after one month of use. Initially it was very good. Battery life was awesome. But suddenly for few weeks i did not use it and now if i check it back its not Working.. When i keep it in charging then only its switching on. If i remove the charging it is dead.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Disconnecting in every few minutes
content: Used few days and found that sometimes device is disconnecting very frequently or every minute. Range is another issue, can't cross another wall. Sound quality is not up to mark due to bass I think.

name: Giridharan
title: I am a BASE lover.. Boat rockerz u rock it... 👍👍👍
content: One day delivery with free shipping (very fast delvry) thx amazon, i bought this model 2nd time, love it.. Worth product for 999rp... Base lovers go ahead... I am also base lover... Connectivity good, feel comfortable and stylish.. Boat rockerz thx for such a gud headset... 👍👍👍🙏🙏🙏

name: KanakAmazon Customer
title: Impressive product
content: Value for money. Very impressive product. Sound quality and microphone response is too good. The range of bluetooth connectivity is too good.

name: priyanka Musle
title: boat is fraud company dont buy boat product
content: Not working after 3months (neon). customer service is the worst. They pick up product for exchange/ repair but don't give back any response. worst my product also is gone and money too.. they pick up my product from April start but still, I have not received any replacement. And amazon also not doing any action on it. worst product n "fraud company Boat".

name: phani
title: Not worth
content: 1. Takes more than 30-45 mins for full charging. 2. You can use it for about 3 hours with full charge. But goes from 60% charge to 0 in 10 mins. You cant listen to music/calls once the charge falls below 40% as it keeps saying less charging every 10 secs. Utter crap.. 3. Noise cancellation is also not very effective.. You can buy better products at this price. Not worth the money.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Cannot rely on durability..It's worst
content: Battery life is good . I don't know suddenly it started to fully charged but when tried to power on its not working. It's only 1 month I hardly used it and it's gone no use now . Totally waste of money . I recommend not to buy

name: Varsha
title: Not very satisfied
content: The main reason I needed this product was for my morning work out. But it’s not at all comfortable while running. Another downside to this was the sound quality which isn’t consistently good

name: Supratim Bhattacharjee
title: Product experience is not good.....
content: Bluetooth connectivity is really bad. It losts connection so many times even when i am holding my phone in my hand which is connected to this device..... Some times songs r lagging because of the connection problem and it cuts few seconds of the lyrics while playing a song because of the connectivity problem.... Sound quality is likeable if you are a bass lovers..... Noise cancellation is not that good.....

name: Kuriakose K Joseph
title: Great sound quality
content: This is the best earphone that I have bought. The earbuds fits snugly and if you don't like the size of the preinstalled ones they give extra earbuds to match your size. It has great sound quality, great bass and the magnetic lock keeps the earphones secure on your neck when not in use. The neck band is also very comfortable.

name: VINOTH VARADHARAJU
title: Low bass! Don't expect too! Bass lover stay away!!
content: Worst ever experience! The bass is too low! At full volume i feel more wanted and while traveling is too bad! Bass is too low! If i set minimum volume i can't hear clearly! This problem came even after replacement! I think this model itself have low bass! So finally j returned it! Suggest me some branded headphones under 1k..😒

name: Annapoorna
title: Value for money, but battery lasts only 4hrs
content: Battery backup is poor. Full charge dosent even last for 6hrs. Rest everything is excellent (sound, volume control etc)

name: Seshadri
title: A not bad product. There are other options too.
content: I have been using this earphones for about 7 months.. The left ear piece has stopped working already.. Till it worked, the sound and performance is all adequate for you in the price range.. The bluetooth works fine, but not good while travelling.. The wires annoy you most of the times.. Now I must say, there are better products out there in the market. You could consider this a least resort.

name: Vikram
title: Pretty Good
content: Hi, It's good , Sound clarity is good, no connectivity issues , For calling is also ok ! , I just bought today, for 989 rs. , will edit the review after 2 months use , let's see how it is...

name: Vineet Kumar
title: Good product.
content: Product is good. But I found it a bit discomforting while long hours. The ears would start to pain if you use it with the ear loops. Sound quality is good and bass too. Clarity could have been a bit better and notice cancellation is okay okay type.

name: Amazon Customer DN
title: SUPERB BASS LIKE JBL
content: SUPERB BASS, JUST LIKE JBL. IF COMPANY PROVIDE POWER ON OFF TONE ONLY INSTEAD OF MALE VOICE IT COULD BE BETTER. BATTERY BACKUP OK TYPE.

name: Vikas Tholar
title: Poor Quality product
content: noise cancellation", "bluetooth connectivity". Even with full battery in between calls it looses bluetooth connection and again it gets connected. Its really not good product. Hope Boat will look into it and arrange replacement

name: Hitesh Malsekar
title: Good sound quality & nice battery
content: Connectivity is not good, can connect two phones at a time but seems to loose connectivity every now and then.. battery life is good it last almost for a day.. sound quality is nice and loud.

name: ashish
title: Good in 1100 Rs price
content: Good earphone. I think bettery is running less time compare to describe. But it is depend on at how much volume u r listening.. It is running to 8-10 hours. After 1st experienced.

name: sumit
title: Worst. 2 hr battery, 5 feet range.
content: Most poor earphone ever.. It will discharge in 2 hours of usage. Poor range of just 5 feet. Audio will break even from one corner of room to other.. Pathetic device should be taken off the sell list.

name: Askdon
title: Quality doesn't justify price! "OK"
content: Previously had a rockerz 255(₹999) and it seems to have better sound quality than my new rockerz 255 (₹1299). What used to be great! Is not even good coz of the price and present quality. A wee bit disappointed

name: BIKASH D J SAIKIA
title: Good..
content: The product is good for the price i paid 999.. but i have a doubt whether its an original boat earphones.. cuz the brand mark is nowhere engraved.just printed on the band.. and its a long than expected... And Guys the battery backup is just 2-2.5hrs

name: Gautam
title: i received a duplicate product
content: I think i got a wrong product because day by day its ink is disappearing day by day and it been a month I m using it I m very disappointed with this product I have seen this kind of product and their BOAT ink is still visible with bright white colour and they have bought around 3 to 4 month ago I want an action against this thing and I hope you will understand my situation because RS1000 is the money I have spent on this thing .

name: Aakash
title: Reasonable product for 999
content: I was right in budget and wanted to buy earphones while I saw this with good reviews... So decided to buy it... I can say that this is really good but I feel battery life isn't good .. max to max 5-6 hours ... Else everything is good

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best but could be more better
content: Liked the product but sound could be more better. Design is good as compared to other device. The only prblem I found with this product is the rubber ear fittings, chances are more that u can lost it as it automatically gets loosen. Company should give extra pair of fitting same as ear buds.

name: Vivek Shukla
title: Pathetic Sound Quality and Poor fitting headphones
content: Looks something else, company claims something else and the product is absolutely something else. It's pathetic. Fit-wise. Sound quality wise. Poor poor product. I mean, you price tag your product 3000Rs. Then give a flat discount of 50%. It is all only making a fool out of customers. You better give a product for 3000Rs only but give a satisfactory product. Have some ethics guys.

name: kishore
title: Battery problem
content: From the day I started using it since then it doesn’t stays longer about battery it shows 100% when it connected then after 30 mins it showing battery low n gets off from connection, I think this product which i received is fake r have battery problems since its out of 10 days exchange, I cannot claim nor return the product,if there is any chance of getting exchanged r money Bck or else replace it with other 1

name: Sharanabasava kashan
title: Suddenly switched off battery.  Don't trust this product.  Noy came charging properly..
content: Very bad product. Immediately charges gone. Not showing battery charging. Suddenly switched off. It's wasted product. Only name is big brand but use this product. Don't trust any one this product. Dont buying this product..

name: nishanth
title: WASTE PRODUCT..LOW QUALITY
content: any body dont buy this.. extremely waste product..in 9 months both side speakers got defective...unluckily after one year only able to claim bcz dont know how to claim it,, and got rejected due to sale date.... they now it was a serial complaint fo their product and not ready to resolve it... bad customer service also

name: Amazon Customer
title: It's not working after few days.
content: This is the worst product which I purchased it was not working and wasn't connecting to any device bcoz red and blue both light used to blink.. I raised a complaint and they took for replacement and said replacement done and sent the same product by doing neat polish .after replacement also not working trying to reach boad customer care but no response.. don't by this product..

name: Amresh Kumar
title: This will work only for one year
content: Writing this review after using for one year. I bought two piece and one was worked till 11 months and another till one year, and after that one side stopped working in both the earphone. Customer service are also not responding.

name: Simly Chatterjee
title: Very good....
content: I m purchsng dis product fr secnd time. Dis is a awsm product, fr travelling prpose. Those r mad of music, they might gt some negative points. Packng can be much bettr compr to the price. This headph is hlpfull fr gymng n running... For me I am very satisfied...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good Headset with few flaws
content: The frequency of the Bluetooth us not that good. There is blur noise when we talk without our mobile near. It mentioned as 10m was the limit but I don't think it was 10m radius. Although talking in mobile looks good compared to call in laptop. Weight less and looks classy. I bought it for 1400. Yeah better buy for 1000-1200

name: Sid
title: Picks up surrounding noise
content: It's difficult to use this for a phone call if standing in a noisy place. The headphone picks up all the noise from the surroundings and the recepient of the phone call is unable to hear anything you say.

name: prabhash arabain
title: False commitment of warranty.
content: Warranty service is really pathetic. Lodged complain almost one month before. They picked up defective item but still didn't receive good one as my product is under warranty. Multiple times I had communicated through mail but no response. No one is available at customer care desk. Completely waste product and wrong commitment. They are using warranty word only to sell product.

name: NJ
title: Not satisfied with the product
content: This product didn't meet my expectations. Malfunctioning is the normal course of thing with this product & the worst part is their customer care redressal system. It worked properly for at least 15 days. In one word, have wasted my money & time. Have thrown this product & ordered a different one from different company.

name: AntonyT
title: Product Quality Review
content: Pros. 1. Product is durable during workouts and changing weather conditions. 2. Has demonstrated good battery backup. Cons. 1. Treble, bass and other tunnings doesn't take any effect on this product. Overall : The money paid would be of value if you're focus is same as the above pros and also should be in a position to compromise the music quality/feel to some extent.

name: Gokulnath
title: Wost product. Please don't buy
content: Very much disappointed with the performance and color of the product.. The color shown in pictures is totally different from what I received.. Performance wise very worat in battery backup... It drains so quick even in standby... Call quality is okay, not great

name: Milind
title: Good for listening audio video, but just ok for calls
content: Sound quality while playing media,audio and video is great. But while using call receiving and calling voice didnot delivered clearly to opposite party. I bought 4-5 headsets but 2 of that has the problem like this.

name: Riyaz Usman
title: Poor build quality. Pathetic after sales service.
content: Product stopped working after 2 months. And they sent a broken piece as replacement when warranty was claimed. Phone's unreachable. No response to email, and further complaints where declined.

name: Badal
title: The wort quality earphones.
content: The product sent was broken and damaged . It had already been used before it was sent to us by amazon. These were the worst headphones. In just 2 mins i saw that they were broken after i recieved the parcel. Horrible quality earphones. Even the logo was removed and the earphones has scratches all over it .

name: Yaseen.M.Mulla
title: Quality product and standard.
content: No words with Boat! With rocking sound it always rocks.. n happy with its sound quality, but little bit needs to work on battery durability. Except all is RO KS. Thank u Amazon..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sound quality is nice but product quality is poor
content: Dear Boat,. Ear plug broken within 2 months.... request you to plz let me know the replacement policy...

name: mbvaja
title: dual connectivity
content: amazing quality.pure bass and maintain sound. noice cancelation.battery backup is osm.and main thing in this product is dual connectivity. its bluetooth 4.0 connectivity i give 10/10.

name: khushboo singh
title: Very good product
content: It is very good bluetooth earphones at this price. The sound is very good. Once u plug it in, you cannont hear the outside noises. Though, there is an issue that there is no noise cancellation on calls. Otherwise it is very good.

name: SIVA MYKEL
title: Bad product that ever expect from a BOAT brand
content: After using 1 month I am giving a review its worst facing problems 1 side of ear phone not hearing and 2nd side also going to lost hearing. Sound quality of Boat is nice but its got inner damage within 1 month. Not expecting from this boat. Trying to replace the product and I had uploaded the original invoice of amazon but saying an invalid invoice by boat.

name: Mrityunjay Pandey
title: Not satisfactory
content: Build quality, Connectivity range and most of all batter backup is very poor. Returned it and bought realme ear buds for 500 more but 12hrs backup and better build design.

name: Kinjal Jethwa
title: Boat Rockers
content: The quality of the product is really good, its value for money,its very comfortable to use. I loved the magnet, the Battery life is also good the charging is fast. Am happy with the product fuillfulls my requirements.

name: aniket ranjan
title: many issues
content: Cons:1. gets out of ears.. 2. Range is the biggest issue. If you are walking and keep the mobile in your pants pocket then it sucks.. Battery back up not that much good. even can say not that bad..3 hrs max on songs and over the call below that.. 3.if you are planning to buy to use it while travelling on bike. then its not for you.. Pros. only one: Sound is awsm

name: Mayank yadav
title: Not satisfied
content: I boughy two of these headphones. At first it worked excellently. Then after 8-9 month of use. One of the bud of both the earphones stopped working. And i dont know why. This is ridiculous. Not satisfied with the product. It will stop working in the warranty oeriods itself. And in this time of lockdown u wont be able yo claim warranty. And get ur headphonea repaired

name: Prashant Jha
title: Bass Monster ❤️❤️
content: Amazing product. My opinions after 1 month of use. Bass-10/10. Treble-9/10. Noise Cancellation-9/10. Built quality-10/10. Looks-9/10. Sound quality-10/10. Value for money-11/10. Go blindly, this is the best Bluetooth earphones at this price. I bought it in 999rs also get additional 200 cash back as amazon pay balance.. Great service by Amazon and boat, i got my order within 6 hrs through prime now app.

name: Shailesh Gankar
title: Excellent product from Boat
content: Nothing to dislike about this product, it is my thrid purchase for the model No 255.. Worth the price & Boat products are to the mark. My next boat product's are lined up.

title: It keeps getting disconnected when in standby mode
content: It ear phone dont seem to be some comfortable but that could be a very personal experience.. After connecting the ear phones, if not used it simply disconnects. which is annoying to reconnect before picking up the call

name: Naveen.S
title: Best bass headset under 1500
content: Got for RS.999 on sale. Sound quality is awesome. Best part I like other than sound is battery charges quickly, then the buttons are separate so we need not search and press like struggling with single button in realme Bluetooth. Under 1500 this boat headset is the best.

name: Amazon Customer
title: send originally sealed pack at first
content: everybody wants a quality and sealed packed product. i received this product with re taped pack. i ignore it and open and use. it has some problem sound stop intermittently. i observe that in offer amazon send minor defective product at first. please send properly sealed pack please.. i give request for replacement and receive the new but i request please send properly sealed pack at first.. product is good.

name: Sahil Vasudev
title: Review after month of use
content: It is very good to use this earphone but it has some issues like:. 1. It come out from ear while walking also.. 2. Battery life is not that longer as expected.. 3. The wires are too long, looks weird when not in use.

name: Rajat
title: Received packed empty box and got replaced without any problem.
content: Using it since last one month I purchased it for Rs 949.. When I purchased it I received a good packaging but inner box was tempered and earphone was missing. So I contacted customer care and they sent another without any hassle.. Now Coming to product: I am using this same product for last one month and performance is good . Runs for 6hr continuosly when charged fully.. Voice clarity is moderate. Over all value for money.

name: SHALOM S.
title: Great Wireless Headphones!!!
content: I was waiting for a few days before writing this.. 1. Amazing sound quality for the price point. Good bass output without muddying the rest of the frequency. Descent mids and highs.. 2. Really good passive noise cancellation. Couldn't even hear people talking next to me.. 3. Good Bluetooth connection. Was able to step out of the room and still managed to maintain a descent connection through 2 walls.

name: Faiz S.
title: Horrible product
content: Absolutely horrible product. It is so heavy my ears has started aching badly. It's not up to the mark at all. I raised a request so you all can take this product and refund my money. I don't need a replacement. Please come and collect it.

name: Ketan
title: Its a Happiness box
content: Value for money product.. Nice built quality.. Sound is awesome, bass is also too good.. My battery lasts around 3-4 hours on loud sound on a full charge. Durable product. Go can definitely go for it 👍🏻

name: ALLAN RALPH
title: Check the genuinity
content: Just unboxed the Boat rockers 255. I am in love with the audio output.. Its simply amazing. Just a bit sceptical about the genuinity. Not sure if i have received a new unit .. the area where the wires connect to the earpiece seem like it was stuck for the 2nd time.. Please notice in the image how well the area where wire meets earpiece near the green arrow looks well but the one near orange arrow is not... There is a white ring around it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Whats app call
content: Cannot receive whats app call using button on the head set. Alternatively whats app call can be accepted on handset then it automatically works on headset.. Other wise its a pretty decent buy for 999,00. Bass/base sound is more when on music or movies suppressing other music or vocal content. Bass lovers would love it.

name: G V Subbaraju Penumetcha
title: Working fine, no issues
content: The quality of product is good. Ear bugs are also comfortable to wear and sound is nice. Working well with my MacBook, two other phones with no issues. It connects to one device only at a time.

name: prashant
title: Battery do not last longer  then 5-7 hours on continuous use
content: Average product for Average use.. Build quality is cheaper, sound quality is acceptable given the price range. Battery donot last more then 5-7 hours on continuous use. Good for casual use, cannot be used for longer stretch.

name: Shrabasti Dasmahapatra
title: Buying this headphone is worth it
content: Sound quality is just awesome and the most important thing is it is comfortable in your ears if you put it for hours. Battery stand by is too good, I can use it for almost 1 and a half day after charging once. If you are searching for a good and durable headphone just go for it.

name: Husain Saify bhopal
title: Bad product bad service bad Amazon service
content: Product is defective, lose connection problem. I will raise the refund request but no one come to collect it. Second time i raised the return request no one come to collect the defect product. This is the service given by Amazon !

name: Bua
title: Cool product
content: After using this for more than one month, it can be said that, the product is simply fabulous. But battery downs rapidly after use, sometimes from 80% to 20%. Though it lasts for sufficient times. I got it for 999/- , so for me it is perfect in this price range.

name: prrashi
title: One of the headphones stopped functioning in less than 6 months of purchase.
content: I bought boat bluetooth in the first week of August 2019 and have been using it from then. Quality of the sound and connectivity were awesome. BUT by end of December 2019, right headphone stopped delivering the sound. I had to use only one headphone from past one month.. Mentioned was one year replacement warranty. Hoping to get a replacement as soon as possible.

name: Harish
title: Good not Great
content: You can take this as a bluetooth version of boat wired 220/225 headsets.Sound and bass is great but not clear in few situations.Noise cancellation was worst to the core voices of people 10m away from you is clearly captured and irritates you to the core, don't know whether it is a product issue which i received.I missed to notice with in the return duration otherwise would of replaced it.Now i need to reach support team for replacement.

name: Aditya Ranjan
title: Worthy of the Price
content: worthy of Investment as it serves a nice audio output, negates the noise perfectly. Battery life is good as well (I'm not a heavy user so 5-7 hours is exceptionally good for me, otherwise depends on one's uses). However, it lags very frequently if connected to two mobiles at a time and you put it on hold for some time as well as you are getting continuous notifications on one or both the phones.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good Product for this cost. Mic quality is average.
content: Good sound Quality product for this price. Battery is good as it comes for 6hrs of usage. My only concern is mic quality is not as expected as more surrounding noise is captured when speaking. Other than this it's money worthy.

name: Sundara
title: boat Bluetooth headset
content: Don't buy bass effect is useless plus no noise reduction. boat wired one cheaper than this price is having good bass. Amazon never test any product for the quality with their tech team. Only doing a courier job. Don't waste money with this product.

name: JG SHARMA
title: NOT recommended
content: Used for 4 month's.. just calling purpose...
