When it connect, it says "you are now connected to rockers 255 pro" and it keep disconnecting n reconnecting.. everytime it says this sentence :(. Also if u keep it very near then audio shakes .. I am using my old with wore eat phones that's better 😅

name: Namram Mahesh
title: Bluetooth connectivity and battery backup
content: Bluetooth connection stability this device connects instantly but while jogging work out or on the moving condition sometimes there is audio delay interruption which is unpredictable sometimes. If I'm using it with the phone in front of me it's awesome but if you want to enjoy music on the move or jogging etc this device will dissappoint you.. The battery% fluctuated.. It means at the time connection battery level was 50/60% after using it for 15/20 min in medium volume the battery gets down ivr response battery low and indicator goes totally red.

name: Sonika Jagtap
title: Damaged product and box. Accessories and warranty card missing
content: Purchased on 14/02/2021. Got this product in damaged product box. There was NOTHING in the box apart from earphones. Cable missing, warranty card missing, extra ear muffs missing. The earphones themselves also feel damaged as the sound is like maxed out auditorium music. It's not at all clear. RETURNING IT RIGHT AWAY

name: somesh
title: Good headphones. Bluetooth connection is interfering with other Bluetooth and wifi connections
content: Excellent headphones for sound.. Major hindrance in multitasking ( hence reducing 2 stars ). It's connection interferes with other Bluetooth or WiFi connection or casting causing problems.

name: vyankatesh a.
title: All good except call quality...
content: First things first. Headphone is very good.... Connenctivity is awesome.... Connects two devices simultaneously... If u r watching on one device and u receive a call on another then movie will get paused automatically.... The only complaint is call quality... I had received Almost 15 calls on the day when i used it for first time.. and almost all of them asked me to remove my headphones... Bcoz they couldn't listen my voice properly..... So consider this before.. overall ok..

name: Govinda Verma
title: On call receiver at other end will hear noise.. so quality is not up to mark
content: On call receiver at other end will hear noise.. it's very poor quality of this headphone. Lightweight good for music, but not for calls

name: Amazon Customer
title: Stopped working within 12 days of Purchase
content: Hi, I bought this on 5th Feb and it stopped working on 16 Feb 2019. I am chasing people to at least get the item replaced but not sure if they will help on this. On 16th Morning, it neither switches on nor it charges when trying to charge.. Very bad to see 2000 rs going in vain.. Mohit

name: mukesh joshi
title: Great for the price
content: This is my 2nd purchase and it works as advertise. For the price this is best what one can get. Good bass, don't ask for low as it's just a decent wireless sport earphones. good fit, has some extra pair ear buds.

name: Akhil
title: Good product, avg battery, annoying audio messages
content: Audio quality is excellent. But battery back up is average. Charges quickly. The audio messages while connecting and disconnecting are annoying. A simple beep would have been better.

name: Sandy chauhan
title: Worth of the price
content: It's worth of the price, everything is good. But i am having issue when i connect these to my MI 55 Inch tv, automatically wifi disconnecting everytime. When i am not using earphone with tv it works fine. I think there is a comatibility issue

name: sm
title: Amazing sound quality
content: The best sound I've had on any earphones. Totally beats Apple, Skull Candy, and other earphones. The colour and design is beautiful and slinging the earphones around your neck is easy. Bluetooth connection works great. Overall and amazing product. No complaints.

name: Juned.M
title: Dissatisfied product
content: I raised a request to return this earphones in just two days after purchase. I use OnePlus 6T while play pubg squad members can't hear my voice clearly, the rubber which is giving with earphones is not that soft quality, ears will start burning after 30 to 40 minutes of usage. I don't recommend it

name: Eman Kalyan Saha
title: Value for money
content: Thank you Amazon for getting my order delivered before expected date. The headphone is awesome for music but outside call quality is not good compared to indoor call quality as there is no active noise cancellation.

name: Bhargavi Cheripally
title: NOT BAD !!
content: I brought this a month back and it is working fine, but battery backup is not good. I only got 6hrs of playback. While my previous realme earbuds are too great, it had MORE then12 hrs of playback and sound quality is also good. I recommend REALME BUDS... If ur running with low budget but need a good earbuds then go for boat rockers!!

name: Vikas Gupta
title: Decent product
content: Sound quality and bass quality is good. It has a passive noise cancellation, not active. The ear phones fits snuggly in the ear, however they sometimes cause a feeling of ear blockage or pressure.. Bluetooth connectivity is good. Range about 10-12 feets.. Mic quality is not good and one has to repeat multiple times to make other person understand.. Overall its a good product, in this price range for active gym goers.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Charging port not working
content: The Charging port is not working after just 2-3 months. Even the product was under warranty still BOAT haven't provided me with a replacement after so many regular complaint with Amazon and BOAT even after the ticket is registered and then now the warranty period also expires.. Really disappointed with the service facilities.

name: Amazon Customer
title: OK. Not great.
content: First irritating thing is the message that we get when we turn it ON or when it is connected to a device. I hate that voice. we cannot mute it and we have to bear it. Battery backup is also not great. Sound quality is good.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Awesome wireless earphone
content: Value for money, noise cancellation that you can expect from an earphone, awesome audio quality, weigh less, good bluetooth connectivity, trendy and stylish. Battery charging is good and lasts promised amount of time.

name: AKSHAY POOJARI
title: Battery or hardware issue !
content: After using for 2 days when the battery got fully drained i kept it on chargin.. Now it doesnt turns on after chargin is disconnected.but it turns on and off while connected to charging.. Bad piece of hardware which couldnt stand for even 2 days.. Not a good experience for sure.. If others are facing the same donot buy!

name: vijai
title: Worth for the money
content: Worth for the money, Battery is great 5 to 6 hours, and good sound quality for this price. The best part is if you charge the headphones for just 15 to 20 mins after the battery drains out you can use it for another 1 to 2 hours.

name: B A Rayker
title: not a must buy
content: not as expected. plastic is very cheap and buttons are ugly. sound quality is also not that great, even battery life is also very limited

name: Rahul Malhari
title: Worst Product with Worst Service
content: I would not even give 1 star to this product.. Within 2 months it had battery issues and even after replacement its not working properly.(One side not working). On top of that these people won't respond to your call or call you back and don't even respond your mails.. Worst product with worst service

name: Mradul
title: Not upto the expectation
content: It was good at the begening but after using it for 15 days, the sound quality is not that good as expected and and feeling quite distubence in voice.. During the call, sound quality is very poor.. I would suggest choose different brand.

name: Adarsh Mishra
title: Go for it, you won't regret it.
content: Pros:. Best at this price, got this at 999/-. Bass is very powerful. Range is also good (around 5 mtrs). Supports Google Assistant. Sound quality is super rich. Cons:. Packaging was not good box was crushed from one side but still ear phones were safe. It will take time to get comfortable with as they only provided 3 size buds. Also there's no fitting clip in the box. Will update more after extensive use.

name: Ashish Chawda
title: Overall good but bluetooth connectivity has a issue
content: Overall it's a 'good' earphone but sometimes it doesn't connect easily with your phone you need to press the button multiple times you even might have to turn it off to connect it to your phone.. Noise cancellation bad in case of wind noise. If there's a strong breeze and you're wearing this earphone you can hear the sound of wind amplified.. But that doesn't happen often so it's okay with noise cancellation.

name: Almas
title: 6 months used... Good product - Worth the price
content: Excellent Battery backup - lasts around entire day for general, non continuous use.. Good sound quality.... Edit: After 7 months, one side not working. Raised complaint on boat website, awaiting response.

name: Vishal khatri
title: Big time cheaters
content: Twice the product after a months use started showing problem..1st time a replacement was provided, but 2nd time they took the product but refused to replace the product..money lost and no one even responding on emails or customer care number..worst customer service..STAY AWAY... rather buy a known brand like Sony, Bose, who shall care of their reputation

name: B Saldo
title: Great product, Value for money
content: Great product. good base. Good sound quality.. Works well even if you're sitting in a different room from the phone which is connected.. I usually use these to listen to movies and watch shows.. Wouldn't be suitable to exercise as the plugs keep coming out.

name: Nimmi
title: Max volume came down in 3 days
content: I tested these on full volume on day one. It was too loud but crystal clear which met my expectations. But on day 3 that mox volume came down to a moderate level. I did read about the same in one ef the reviews but didn't expect it to happen so soon. Sounds and build quality is good

name: harinadh
title: Voice is  verey lesss
content: This is the product i received from amazon. Really disappointed of Me. I think These product is swimmed in Hyderabad floods Because it is fully bathed not working any Bit

name: Abhay chavda
title: I never again buy any device of this company.
content: Sound quality is good but don't buy this product because of battery life is not up to 6 hr.some time 100% charge over in 4 to 5 hr houre.and last 10% charge is very irritable because deviced robot is again and again inform you battery is low battery is low so last 10% charge is not useful plz don't buy this device.

name: Jayitra G.
title: Good product, must buy.
content: I bought this today, it's sound quality is awesome but bass is not so deep which I expected. In bass out of 10 I give it 7 . But sound quality is too good. Must buy. Not highly recommended for bass lovers.Battery backup is also very good. Durability , ipx technology are also very good. Impressive product from boat. Buy this.🙂👍👍🙂

name: Hemanta Nayak
title: Not That much Good
content: Yaa,product quality is not that much Good,it was showing the Bluetooth range is approximately 10metre but in my case it is working well within a range of 3/4 metre,if I go beyond this range the music/Calling quality is very bad.I don't know why the company like Boat having this much poor music Quality,But is doesn't satisfy value for money.Thank you..😟😟😟😟

name: Hachiko
content: Great product and nice sounds quality . Only cancels noise when on high volume. But now I have useing from August is now it Nov but the one side of my earphones isn't working where as other is working 😭

name: Prashant
title: Pathetic or no noise cancelling in phone calls
content: Bought this earphones few days back. Average sound quality and very pathetic in noise cancellation. Noise beyond few meters catch like they are within few inches of mic. Don’t buy if you are looking for noise cancelling earphones. Bluetooth connection hampers even if you put mobile in left pocket.

name: Raj
title: Descent product with good quality sound..
content: Did not like the product packaging at all!! The box inside the package wrapping was really in a bad condition.. Apart from that, liked the super fast delivery, ordered it yesterday and received it today early morning, the sound quality was also good.

name: NAGARJUNA
title: Product is Not bad one but service is disgusting
content: Basically I'm a fan of boAt, I'm using boat heads to rockerz, now I'm disappointed with the Boat rockerz 255pro, with in one month after buying i have noticed right earphone is giving less sound compared to left of, which causing imbalanced sound 😭😭 even i have raised complaint against it, but still i they didn't responded.

name: sofia akhtar
title: A good purchase if bass is not priority
content: Its a very good product for bluetooth.the only thing is the bass is not as same as of boat wired headphones.i had actually used wired ones and i fell in love with bass and then i bought this one expecting the same quality but comparatively its less . Overall the product is good

name: Amazon Customer
title: Excellent..
content: Using it for 3 months. good battery, lasts for 3-4 hours for continuous usage. easy to charge. with limited usage only for calls battery lasts for 2-3 days.

name: M.SABAREESH
title: GOOD TO USE !!!!
content: I brought it on nov 2019 i am still using it , it has wonderful powerbacked sound and music. but recently i had issue in hearing ,sometimes it has hd sound and sometimes it changes to auto quality but to be frank i am using it daily for past 6 - 9 months it has good quality although china made or orgin

name: Pannu
title: Utter disappointment
content: It's not a joke. It's just a scrap product . Don't know whether I received is a duplicate piece. Because I own boat rockers 600, which is a seamless product from boat. But this purchase irritated me alot and finally I returned it.

name: Sarvesh Dubey
title: Nice product
content: Sound quality, noise cancellation and base quality is satisfactory. Battery is good, Only battery backup fall down suddenly after some hour use, battery indicator shows 70-80 percent. I think it is software problem.

name: sanju c.
title: Good sound quality
content: Received in a unsatisfying packaging which seemed like a duplicate product. Still not sure about it's originality. However, sound quality is good and battery backup is also pretty good.. Quality wise it is fine considering the period I have used it. Can't comment upon the durability etc as of now.

name: Mich
title: Boat product support rocks .
content: Value for Money .. Infact i availaled hassle free warranty after 10 months use . Device's one side stopped working after 10 months of rigorous use for music for workout and long calls .. BOAT Customer care issued new replacment product after receiving defective product via courier.

name: Ardhendu Bhooshan
title: Great product 💥💥💥
content: Its been 14 days since I bought this product. To be honest this is the best headphones I have used so far. I'm really really satisfied with the product. There is good noise cancelation, bass and a great sound experience. And it has built-in volume control. It is just the perfect headphones and I have no fear recommending this product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Average product
content: It's noise cancellation isn't very effective. U need to speak loudly for other party to hear your voice. Also, battery goes straight from 100 to 80% and theb to 60% in no time. After this just gives 3-4 warning within 5minutes of play and it'll go off. 60% battery means, it should hold at least for 30-40 mins but it doesn't. Good in terms of bass and sound quality. Overall it's an average product with lots of advertisement and marketing.

name: dp
title: Don't buy.
content: Within 6 months of my purchase the head phone stopped working.i wrote to the customer care .after 15 days they asked me to return the product.then immediately i returned the product for replacement.after that did not respond at all.they are not responding to mail and phone calls.pathetic customer care.dont go for the product.

name: Swati
title: Good not best!
content: Good one but not best one. Sound quality could have been better for sure! But its nice and comfortable enough to put it in ears! You can go for them!

name: Riddhi
title: Noise Cancellation amazing but Loose Ear Grip.
content: Noise Cancellation is amazing. But a little loose to fit in the ears. Grip is less , falls down from ears. Bass is awesome. And got Extra pair of Ear Plugs as well. Good product. Been a month using it and still works awesome. The wires are amazing so won't be damaged soon.

name: Tanmoy sinha
title: Should buy at this price range, good bass, battery, & average Bluetooth range
content: Received the package on time.. The headphones package is basic.. No case which is little disappointing.. 1.Sound quality is awesome,bass is really nice, sounds is loud.. 2. Call quality is also nice.. 3. Bluetooth range is not so good.. 4. Battery life is awesome. It last for atleast 6hours of music.. 5. Durability is also nice, as it is also water resistant so a big plus point.. A must buy budget headphones at this price range.. So a big 5*

name: Arun Raj
title: Poor Microphone. Not suitable for attending calls.
content: Microphone of the product is very poor and noise cancelation doesn't work properly.. Other side of the caller is unable to understand what we are talking. There's no control to adjust the microphone settings or anything. Overall a poor product.

name: N!RM@L
title: good product
content: It was my first wireless headset. sound quality is very good. ear bud is little bigger which is not comfortable when wearing helmets over this.

name: Chaitali K
title: Quality not as expected
content: Pathetic quality

name: Rohith patil
title: Good or Bad
content: Second day review (Good and Bad). I have bought this but I have some problems... 1) when the phone calls come it will be slow receiving. 2)And it is air pressure problem also. 3) It is best but not much more better than pro 225F. 4) And If phone well kept 10 meters it well performers well struck the song

name: William Satish
title: Headset issue
content: Within six months one side of headset didn't work. Never expected this.

name: Ragesh
title: Good wireless bluetooth headset by boat.... Thanku
content: Good sound quality, very long battery life(6/8hours continous) , waterproof material.. Easy and comfort to wear, travel... Problems wire length needs little more small. Bluetooth connectivity average 10m.

name: Akshay K
title: Awesome Bluetooth Earphones
content: These set of earphones are the best ones available in market at such a competitive price. Go for it guys!!! Have been using it since more than a year now and have gifted it to my family members.

name: shivam
title: Dissapointed on diwali
content: Worked like for 5 mins then it stopped. Light is not blinking, no lights at all . Tried to charge it but that also didn’t workout too.. packaging was terrible and the box was also damaged. They are supposed to send these items in a box but all they had was a bag of plastic without any bubble wrap. The seal looked like someone has opened it. Huge disappointment on the occasion of diwali. 😑

name: Charls Disouza
title: Product not working after 15 day's
content: Dear Vendor,. Last 15 day's it's working superb but today it's not working. Blue light continuasly on. Didn't switch off. Also i got one error when i using this product as bluetooth range is too less.. I didn't return this product due to return policy expired. Kindly suggest. Thanks and Regards,. Charls Disouza. 9850199941

name: Harjeet thakur
title: Read it first !!
content: The only thing I don't like about this neckband is that they sounds very loud when u turn them on while plugged in ur ears 😖😖nd u cannot turn their volume up or down they r still at their max vol nd one more thing that they missed is that it doesn't show any vibration while incoming call🙁 bt over all sound quality is best in this range

name: V07
title: One side of earphone is not working(Also another quality seems very very bad)
content: One side of earphone is not working, Also another quality seems very very bad,. No Noise cancellation, sound & bass quality is also very bad, Magnetic lock is very loose,. Compare with another same earphone seem very much difference earphone code seems missing,. This earphones seems duplicate with all the aspect.

name: Rajashri Jadhav
title: Disappointed!!! Very poor battery life.
content: I have purchased these earphones after reading all positives responses. But I had issue with battery life. The battery life is very poor. When I connected bluetooth, that time battery shown as 80%. After 20 mins it got disconnected due to low battery. And this happened every day. So within 3 days I returned it. I am regular & prime member of the Amazon. So, I am not expecting this type of product from Amazon.

name: Shima Raha
title: Wireless Earphone
content: Liked the look and sound quality. Does not fall out of your ears during exercise. Got it for ₹999/- from the Prime Sale with ₹199/- cashback.

name: Rafi kollam
title: Headset wire Got wear and tear due to curled packaging by boAt.overall the best in class.
content: BoAt packaging is worst. The headset wire got wear and tear ,and bend due to rough packaging.You can clearly hear the sounds of instruments during music but human voice is not clear... It is better if the makers avoid beep sound during volume adjustment..... The headset wire starting from the end of neck band can be avoided...better if it comes out little bit away from the tips..like in the Boult headset... overall it's okay

name: Yuvraj yadav
title: Amazing Product!!!
content: The quality of the band is pretty good!!!. The sound quality is also good and gets really loud....and the bass is also great... It is really very comfortable to wear and doesn't slip easily...!!. I think it is totally worth the price for this product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: boatrockers pro 225
content: its an average product, magnet is poor quality, other person doesn't get the sound proper, a big no for this product, i had earlier bought boatrockers , was too good , expected same here but no, yes 1 thing is good it charges very fast compared the earlier ones

name: Subham Borah
title: Sound quality not remarkable but build quality excellent
content: Not great sound quality. The bass is over amplified. But its a comfy fit and does an excellent job in cancelling out external noise. Some of the JBL headphones in the same range will provide you with better clarity of sound, wherein the mids are well highlighted along with the bass. But if you like fo listen to music with heavy bass, then these are definitely a better pick. Boat makes quality products for the given price.

name: Prince kumar
title: Good in this price range
content: Best in this price range. Bass is very good. Sound quality and build quality are also good. You can go for it if you are looking for a Bluetooth neckband under 1500. It's very comfortable. Extra eartips are also given for comfort according to your size. The only thing that I found bad is its not USB type-C. Otherwise it's magnificent

name: Shrine
title: Don’t buy
content: I bought it 6 months back..till now it worked properly but the battery capacity is low..from this week onwards connection is very weak and the sound is not Audible due to weak connection

name: Bidyut
title: Worth its value
content: The pair very good for talking which is my prime concern, light warm music, casual gaming also was in stack. So its doesn't disappoint me either on those aspect well. The big question is battary back, which I can say in between 3 4 hours if continuous use. Its fully loaded under a 1I price, true value for money.

name: Aditya Lalhal
title: Best in this price range.
content: Sound quality and noise cancellation is good. Bass quality is also ok ok not that much i mean when compared with the headphones but still it has good bass quality. Magnets provided are little weak. Overall performance is quit good. battery life about is 5-6 hours for now as it is new. And charging is quite fast

name: AKSHAY
title: Nahhh
content: Sound quality is not that good as compare to wire. Short range some time base did not come at all some connections problems

name: Shaizaad Shaikh
title: Average product, not as good as advertised
content: I used this product for 15 days, had issues with bluetooth connectivity, had to keep on restarting the product to connect to multiple devices. Battery works like around 5-6 hrs max, charges quickly though{using fast charger}. Mic is not stable, has a lot of noises for the other person to hear you. Sound quality is good.

name: Raj Savani
title: Perfect for music and daily use. Its a great product by boAt.
content: I would like to recommend this product under 1500/-,i bought this in 1200/-. You will not regret if you buy for 1500/-, sound quality is awesome the bass is perfect. Battery backup is said for 6 hours but you can use 10-12 hours for calls and some time of music or movie too.. I use to listen the music for 45-50 min and a YouTube for 3-4 hours a day. It long last from 8am to 8pm sometime you need to charge it for 10-15 mins it longs last for an hour or more.

name: Sanjay
title: Product usage
content: Worst product every purchase, don't recommend to purchase. It stopped working within a month!!!. I don't understand why the company is selling such a low-quality product. Zero durability and service centers are distant!!! I need to travel more than 1 hr to get it to change and even I don't know if it will be done so

name: Book_Lover
title: Don't buy it
content: Worst product.. Not easy to handle. Length of wire is soooo long.. someone can easily snatch it.. quality of buds is very low.. Go for syska or other product. boAt is worst.. and it is made in china... I came to know it after reading every line carefully. They Print Mumbai address in bold.. which is only "marketed by"..

name: Ganesh Vairavan
title: Worst Product and Service.Don't Buy it.
content: I just bought this earphone 4 months back.One side of my earphone is not working now.I have already registered a complaint about this so many times in boat Service team but it was not resolved still now. The service is worst in boat. So please don't buy it.They told me they replace the product within 2 weeks but they didn't do anything. Don't Prefer this Boat at all...Very worst one I have ever seen.

name: Rajkumar Kar
title: Average made in China product
content: 1-Packaging was horrible.. seems like have sent me a product used and returned by someone.. 2-Sound quality is good if not excellent.. 3-noise cancelation is also good. 4- bluetooth range is around 8 meter max although it uses bluetooth 5.0 technology.. Stop importing products from China and make in India.

name: Dr. Nitin Deepak
title: Excellent headset
content: BoAt rockers is excellent audio headset at this price. Fortunately I purchased this on offer @899/-.. Bluetooth connectivity upto 5-6 mtr works good.. Battery backup is also excellent as per specification.

name: Keerthi
title: Waste of money
content: It's waste of money. You can't use this for running or driving. Signal often gets disrupted. Worst bluetooth headset on this price range. Go for any other brands.

name: Varghese
title: Average product; Too hyped
content: An average product or NOT worth for Rs.999/-. The maker doesn't know how to fix the control of bass and treble. However, my son enjoying it; because his favourite teacher owns the same.

name: Mike
title: Gud one buy it if u have this price budget not higher
content: Lets see noise cancelation is not actually great sound quality is okay. Battery power is also 3 star gud mic not actually high so other person might complain ones or so. But in this price its kinda gud

name: Somashekar
title: I Like it.
content: First impressions with one day usage.. Pros :--. 1. Extra Bass.. 2. Battery (got around 8 hours from out of the box without charging even once). 3. Good connection.. 4. Comfortable.. Cons :--. 1. Build quality.. 2. Wires are little bit long.. Go for it if you are looking at Bluetooth Earphones under 1.5k. I got it for 1,299/- rupees.

name: Abubakar
title: not even close to satisfactory
content: Not satisfactory at all.. Highly disappointed.. The earphones have very short wires and therefore keep falling off.. Havent had a good experience with Boat.. Not planning to buy ever again.

name: aniket patil
title: Harmful for ears.
content: Bought at 1000 RS. Ears get warmer within few minutes. Harmful for ears . Rather use wired or costly wireless headphones. Don't go for cheap wireless options and prevent ur ears from getting damaged.

name: Arun Malik
title: Earbuds design is disappointing
content: Overall good sound and a very good base, but the biggest issue is the buds support. If you remove these silicon support arch buds this earphone is nothing. Without these support the earplugs slipping out which is very disappointing for me.

name: Shridhar Kulkarni
title: Not suitable for online meetings/Poor performance with laptop
content: Performance not good when connected to PC. Microphone as well as sound quality is not good when it is used for online meeting puposes..If u just want it for listening music then go for it. But do not buy if u expect more than this.

name: Riya Mondal
title: If you buy like me In Rs 1199/- then it's best.
content: Yup I like this. But packet was damaged or maybe someone open the packet. I want to make a review and unblocking video for my YouTube channel. For my pointer view this was not good. (Packet damaged or open)

name: Samyak Nitnaware
title: Perfect For BassHeads!!
content: Bass is Unbeatable(9.5/10). It is almost comparable to Flagship Headsets. Noise Cancellation is Good(7/10). Bluetooth Connectivity is Little bit slow if you are connecting new Device for the first time but once connected it auto connects Very quickly.. Overall a better package. (8.5/10). Under 2000 Rs. Budget must go for it!

name: Ravindra
title: Painfull to wear
content: Sound quality is decent for the price range it comes but not comfortable to wear for long time after 10-15 minutes your ear will feel pain i have other companies wire ear phone they are very comfortable so i can wear them 2-3 hour continually but customer service is good

name: hari
title: AWESOME PRODUCT.. GO FOR IT
content: IM USING SINCE LAST YEAR SEP.. STILL WORKS VERY FINE.. AND ALL THINGS IS GOOD EVEN WE CAN SAY AWESOME.. BEST ONE 5/5 RATING FOR ALL EXCEPT NOISE CANCELLATION.. YA WE CANT EXCEPT SUPER NOSIE CANCELLATION BCOZ THIS IS FOR 1000 BUCKS...

name: Manish raj singh
title: Not good for gaming
content: Excellent headphone for calls and music. But if you are gamer, you will face issue of sound. As it is bluetooth device, you will get sound delay by .5 sec. Like when i play pubg using this headphone, I get sound delay. So sometimes its difficult to spot any enemy in close range. No issue with headphone, it is because of bluetooth connectivity. And you gonna face this issue in every bluetooth headset. So go for wired if gaming your priority.

name: Luwangcha
title: Sound is bassy.
content: Sound quality is good. Really on bass side. If you want stereo clarity not baasy then it's not for you. Little disappoint on the charger wire which doesn't work . Giving 4 star for the charging cable.

name: Kuzoto Nienuh
title: Honest opinion
content: Honest opinion. Sound 9/10. Battery 9/10. Bass 8/10. Built 8/10. However, there is one issue.. Whenever you turn on the Hotspot for data sharing or others, it fluctuates the sound (call, music, games, etc).. Worth buying.

name: Sandesh Umate
title: A good Earphone in this Price.
content: Earphone quality is good with a strong magnetic lock. The straps are of good quality and the earphone wires are too good. Buttons' quality is good. The sound is full of punchy bass and balanced treble and has to surround effect. Good fitting to the ears. Likewise perfect. Worth price for Money. Thank you for reading. Cheers!!!

name: Santosh D.
title: Not happy.. keeps dropping bluetooth, small range
content: Writing after Using this item for close to a year and off late now its started to drop the bluetooth connectivity with other party complaining on low to no voice. Also range is just about 10 feet or so.

name: Ashima Sathya
title: Stopped working after six month.
content: Everything was fine:- sound quality, noise cancellation etc for about six months.. It stopped working from one side after six month only and after a few days from both the sides.. During the lockdown period in April 2020 it has stopped working so can't exchange them right now. I have to wait.

name: Rajnish
title: Satisfied
content: No complaint. Good noise cancellation. Battery back up is also good till now. Fast charging too. Purchasing in deal is better otherwise costly.

name: AKASH
title: Good bass, suppressed high pitch, low Bluetooth connectivity.
content: Got this product at 999 in sale. Pros.. 1) neon colour is very good. 2) u can charge this once every two days.. 3) sound is good, bass is more punched.. Cons.. 1) the product box was damaged so replaced it.. 2) packaging was not good, Amazon disappointed me this time.. 3) if u have a high end phone than Bluetooth connectivity is good or else it may lag or latency will be there.

name: Sandeep
title: Connectivity issue.
content: There is connectivity issue while i am using this headphones every 2 to 3 minutes it was disconnected and reconnected automatically.. Sound quality,noise cancellation,bass quality is very imperassive but unfortunately due to connectivity issue. I am returning this product to amazon.

name: Manudeep
title: Poor sound quality.
content: Sound coming off these seem imbalanced. The vocals seem to be in the background and the instruments in the foreground. Also can't run or jog wearing these as the part with the buttons keep hitting your collar bone.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bad Product ; avoid it
content: The blue tooth link keeps breaking. Replacement was given which was worse than the one sent earlier and was obviously a used one

name: Akshay soni
title: Excellent product only Beeping sound while listening songs.
content: I am facing an issue with this set, a beeping sound can be heard while listening songs which is irritating. And the headset is different from the one which me and my 34 friends ordered it before. Must be an upgrade but the beeping sound is really irritating. Rest i am a big fan of Boat. Please help me with this. It was a gift for my dad.

name: Sreenath
title: Customer service is not good. Won't get replies to mails as well as won't attend our phone calls too
content: With the 1 year warranty card we got, there is nothing to do with it. Mails won't get replies and they won't attend our phone calls too. There is issue with the headset. One side of the headset is not working now and it's just the 3rd month.

name: Chayan Gandhi
title: Great for music, not for calling!
content: Reviewing the product after several months of use.. Amazing set of earphones in this price range. Gives you 100% noise cancelation with powerful base and long lasting battery backup (lasts upto 8hrs of continuous usage).. Great option for music lovers.. Not worth for calling purposes, as the background noise is more than your own voise to the caller on the other side, It's very annoying.

name: Satwik Srivastava
title: Sound Quality
content: Some times sond lags. Bass is good but could be better. It gives u premium feel. Very light weight,You have to handle with care. battery life is also good. NOTE: If you are purchasing it for playing PUBG mobile then dont purchase any of bluetooth earphones go for wired ones.You can see some videos to know more about PUBG gameplay with bluetooth earphone. At last posting some pics do check it out.😊🙏🙏🙏

name: NITIN AGGARWAL
title: Mic not gud
content: Mic not fit perfectly during voice call other person not listen your voice perfectly very disturbing voice.. So if you buy this headphones on for music enjoy buy this for calls don't buy this.. 1099 for music okay

name: Jhasaketan Sahu
title: cheap build quality
content: Got it from prime day sale at 999. The sound quality is great. It have 10 mm driver. I can compare with product like Sony 75ap which have 12 mm driver. One thing I don't like the build quality. Using cheap plastic. The boat package quality also poor. You can't even know if the earphone used before. There should be a particular boat brand seal on the package box. Best for bass lovers. Overally the product is best in this price segment.

name: Kanishth
title: Not for bass lovers at all
content: As a bass lover i would like to say it is weak..They say it has super extra bass i say it doesnt even have good bass trust me bass is not good at all im a bass lover. Vocals are ok mic distorts. Voice is ok. Seriously if u love bass buy nu republic jaxx 3 instead of these they are far better for bass lovers plus vocals are also better i have used jaxx 3 also.

name: Hitul
title: Not satisfied fully
content: The product is only good for listening music, not meant for phone calls, there is lot of noise to the other person. Voice quality is very slow and poor to the other person over the call. cannot be used for phone calls at all. i feel it is over price for a single use of listening music or watching videos, better products are available in the market at much cheaper prices. i guess the prices is double its selling price on amazon.

name: Appu
title: Average product
content: Guys product feature are good but services related with warranty is worst. My product got some complaints and claimed for warranty, its almost one month, there is no feedback from their side. So dont buy this product if you consider warranty and services but product features like sound, bass, connectivity are good though.

name: Ajay Dev
title: Awesome piece
content: Product looks good awesome sound quality.. nice product for the price and its my second BOAT earphones ... Its really good and i prefer this for who love to listen music ..BOAT is Great

name: Tejas MEhta
title: One of the best wireless earphones
content: Very good sound quality. Works great with my iPhone as well as android phone. Easy to connect and good battery life.

name: Ankit K.
title: Bad quality mic but good sound
content: Perfect sound quality and really good bass.. No lag while playing pubg. Pubg mobile sound experience was unreal Only problem with this earphones is mic. Bad quality mic. It's only good for listening music.

name: AVANTI
title: Amazing quality ...best bass....long battery life
content: Very much satisfied with the amazing sound with rich bass.. Very good battery backup.. Battery last for almost 10 to 12 hrs which is more than they claim for 8 hrs.. Got it in 999. This is my second earphones ..Now I got it in 1399. But very much satisfied with the bass and battery life.. Want to purchase again if I get it in that price again.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Short life, Heavy buds and Limited connectivity.
content: This earphone is a classic example of discomfort in all the senses. Firstly, the plugs are substantially heavy and also bear a bad design which makes it painful to wear while sleeping on one side. Secondly, like any other cheap earphones, this one also suffers from the common problem of one plug going dumb in a short span of time. The cherry on the top is that it cannot be connected to Ipad.

name: Shivkumar k.
title: Very bad battry exprience.
content: Battry backup very bogas.start 100% after 80% after 60% than 40% and 0%.. 60% to 0% take time 15 minitus only.

name: Snehasish Das
title: Good Bluetooth headphones for average price
content: It's sturdy, sound quality is good, sound levels are also good, the mic is decent enough too for phonecalls. The only thing I dislike is that it's not very flexible. It will not fit in your jeans pocket.

name: I.A.Shabeer Ahmed
title: Budget Earphone
content: Overall experience has been good at this price range. I have been using it for more than 8 months and performance is consistent. Only thing battery back up has reduced.

name: Sim
title: Nice product
content: Nice product

name: Abhisek Mandal
title: Not "Tikao" type
content: Don't buy any boat product. Sound quality good but not "tikao" type. You'll face problem shortly. Bought it on October 2019. Defected within 5 months (charging issue). Replaced as it was within warranty period. The new item became damaged after 8 months, now connectivity issue: not connecting to any mobile .

name: anushree bhattachrya
title: Quality
content: Great product.. easy to use. The best part is you can easily run , jog , talk on the phn wearing this .Sound quality is good aswell. Value for money i must say. If you are looking for a decent looking headphone go for it. 👍

name: Prithvi Sinha
title: Bluetooth Fail
content: Extremely disappointed.. I could not connect the earphones to any of my devices - laptop, ipad, mobile - nothing. So I have no idea of its sound or bass or durability. It seems Boat has increased their expenditure on marketing and have compromised quality.

name: Anuradha G.
title: Not long lasting
content: Purchased it on 26 oct 2019 as a gift to my husband But the product failed to satisfy our needs as it stopped working within three months of use Warranty should be specified so that we can get solutions

name: Saurabh Gautam
title: Good product
content: Rated it 4 stars only because of one reason. While being on a call at a noisy place, the person on the other side experiences a lot of noise. Similarly, while recording sound, it catches a lot of noise from the environment.. Otherwise very convenient because of being wireless.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Satisfactory
content: Bought this product for ₹1099 and the product is living upto the expectation. The sound is fair and the bass quality is pretty good. Does the job and well Boat has a reputation to carry forth.. Thank you for the super fast dilivery and hopefully the experience will remain smooth.

name: Anonymous Reviewer
title: Rating 3 due to poor battery backup and earbuds quality
content: Pros:. 1.Best bass quality and noise cancellation in the segment.. 3. Good built quality.. Cons:. 1. Ear buds are not comfortable like boat - 100 wired earphones.. 2. Battery backup not so good.

name: Bharathi
title: A broken Boat
content: Returned the product as it is not upto what i expected. Too much bass i like bass but its not a quality bass. You will definitely need a equalizer if you are like me. Sound quality is not at all good.

name: Rahul Bhardwaj
title: you get pain if you use it more than an hour
content: you get pain if you use it for more than an hour and if you remove that plastic holding buds which is removable then it keeps getting fall down and not comfortable if you are buying it for running of gyming.. Better go for ptron which is cheaper and same in quality and much more comfortable in use

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not durable.
content: Bought the product and after finding the sound quality better, recommended the same to my friends. But after few months found the product is not durable and would stop working after 4-5 months. Addition to this, the Customer Care Services are third class. No pick and drop services. No prompt solutions.

name: Jitender Singh
title: Great experience in low price
content: The earphones are awesome. Sound is great. No one complained me about my voice on call. So, mic is great as well. 2 devices are getting connected easily. Battery backup is good. Overall a value to money paid deal.

name: kuldip telang
title: Wow impressed much
content: Very well made product. I would rate it 10 on 10.. The earphones are designed in such a way, that u can use them while running and cycling as well and WOW!!! They dont come off the ear.. I am very impresses and would definitely recommend this product to everyone.

name: rahul goswami
title: Overall good product apart from connectivity issue
content: Love the the sound quality and noise cancellation. Even the full charging lasts quite long in playback. But the main drawback i see in this particular product is the connectivity, it tends to pair with multiple devices at same time. I have used two Boat bluetooth speakers in the past but never faced such issue of multiple connectivity.

name: Roma Jain
title: Not worth 999 rs
content: The product do not comes with item box case which i got when i purchased it from other e commerce site.... The discount was good but the sound quality is poor. Overall not a gokd deal for 1k price.

name: Senthilkumar
title: USELESS EARPHONES
content: AMAZON IS USELESS, KNOW I PURCHASE FROM FLIPKART, THEY ARE MORE BETTER IN THIS REGARD, THIS PRODUCT IS NOT WORKING I NEED A REPLACEMENT, I PURCHASED THIS ITEM AND IT WORKED FOR ONLY TWO DAYS, I SENT FOR WARRANTY AND THEY REPLACED ME WITH OTHER USED EARPHONE , BUT AGAIN THE EARPHONE IS NOT CHARGING ,. REALLY USELESS PRODUCT, A

name: Amritha Renganath
title: Horrible product
content: Horrible product. I think it is defective. I was waiting, thinking i am using it wrong but there is always a slight disturbance in the audio when i connect to a zoom or google meet call. I've stopped using it. If it can be returned, I would request you to contact me. Waste of money.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Read full review
content: I am writing this review after using it for 2 months, Sound quality is good, not comfortable in ears, headphones are very lightweight that you couldn't wear this while driving at 60kmph, batry last for one day when fully charged, couldn't change the songs from control keys

name: Aniket Kalaskar
title: Works well in beginning & slowly starts showing it's poor performance
content: When I purchased this product, It was working great.. But slowly it started degrading its performance.. Battery issue, No noise cancellation, cannot connect Bluetooth immediately.. Good for 1-month use and not value for money.. I would recommend buying an Rs. 300 products 4 times and use it at least for 4 months.. Poor than expected.

name: Abhinav pandey
title: Buy this only on sale..otherwise go for another company
content: Sound quality is average. Bass is below average... horrible experience using this. After 2hrs of usage ears starting paining... Bluetooth range is around 5ft only after that it fluctuate. Noise cancelling is good. Wires are bit longer so it looks ridiculous. and on using this earphone on above medium level of volume it lasts for around 3 hrs only... Overall please don't buy it go for other options with lighter weights of earphones.

name: SUKUMAR GORAI
title: Awesome earphone i just love it😍😍
content: Awesome product and bass is also good.I am happy to use this product before buying this product I'm using wired earphone but when I'm buying this product my overall experience is good.But their is a problem connect problem, Sometimes disconnect automatically when i was calling in too much time.But overall is good at this price.

name: richa
title: Don't buy, very poor battery
content: Don't buy.. In less than 2 months, the battery has given up. It doeebt work if not wired to the charger.. While it says longer usage battery, use time is only 2 hours. Which is not sufficient for office or personal use.. Very poor product and i am unable to claim warranty

name: ajithkrisss
title: Stopped working after 6 Months
content: I have purched Boat Rockers bluetooth headset on July 2019, looks good in build quality, but it stops working now. There is physical tampering or crushing . three days before leftside Ear phone stopped and today right side also stopped working. I have used very carefully this headphone. Really disappointed. Not recommending to anyone.

name: Devipriya
title: Best @999rs
content: Got these@999rs.Noise cancellation is not as expected.and few days of usage the grippers with ear pieces broken. length is good and magnetic lock of both ear pieces is helpful for holding these around our neck while driving.

name: Imran
title: If you're buying this only for calling then definitely it's a wrong buy.
content: All other features are good except the Bluetooth connectivity. The Bluetooth connectivity is very poor and the range of the bluetooth is not at all good, you will understand this when you make a call. Leave your phone while talking and walk for some distance the voice will start breaking and the person who is on a call will not be able to hear you.. If you're buying this only for calling then definitely it's a wrong buy.

name: DIVYA SONI
title: I like it
content: I think the product is cool, but i need to suggest you people that while driving i cant hear proper voice and also the opposite person have trouble for the voice....so i dnt like that apart from it its a good product by boat

name: Vijay
title: Waste of money
content: Everything was going well for 7-8 months after that right side is stopped working. It found this problem very common. My friends are also struggling with the same problem. I won't recommend this for long time. I found waste of my money.

name: Durgam Vamshi
title: Writing review after 6 months of use
content: Writing review after using it for 6 months. Everything is good but now I facing charging issue with it. So to calim the warranty I registered a complaint on April 20 2020 but till up to date no response from them .I called to the customer number and mailed to there site so many times but response form them. So guys please don't buy this by seeing one year warranty

name: YogiB
title: High Bass rest everything is low
content: High bass, low mids and trebble is not that gr8, overall I am not satisfied with the product quality.. My samaung wired earphones worth 450/- produce much balance sound & way better than Boat rocker 255

name: Amazon Customer
title: It doesn’t work for a long time
content: These earphones have good sound and good bass to it but it breaks very easily. I’m hoping I can get a refund or a new pair. It worked well for few months but all of a sudden the left ear piece stopped working. This has happened to my friends also so I’m not the only one facing this problem.. Hope I can get a new one because I suffering with any earphones.. Thank you

name: Amazon Customer
title: Nice bluetooth in ear headphones for the price.
content: I have been using this product for two months now, no complain whatsoever, it has quick charge and the bass is pretty good too. If you are looking for headphones under the roof of 1500, you can go for it. I like the various colour options they have and the built quality is also decent. In an all, best low budget bluetooth headhphone.

name: Bharat indoria
title: Go for it without a doubt.
content: I think the best sound, I have JBL too but these are way better.. Going to order the 3rd one now. Gifted the other two.. Slight problem with bluetooth connectivity over wifi. But with data it's really good and very good battery life.

name: Atul Kamat
title: Scrambled Audio if Wi-Fi is active
content: All good as-far-as u are not on Wi-Fi.. If u are on Wi-Fi, u won't be able to hear a thing, scrambled voice.. Something wrong, tried it with 2 to 3 sets all same.. Other than this issue - all well.

name: Mathew Easow Jacob
title: Stopped working after 3 months
content: It was initially performing good, but eventually after 3 months it has been identified with issues like one side earphone not working sometime , bluetooth connection issues etc. Then it totally stopped working, by advice is to go for good and reliable product rather getting attracted to boAt discounts.

name: Mustafa
title: Worst packaging, average sound quality but good noise cancellation @999
content: cons:. 1. packaging wasn't good.. 2. average sound bass.. 3. Not good for old songs( you will get 'chan chan' sound). Pros:. Stylish, Strong, nice noise cancellation, good battery life, Calling mic.. Boatz brand. I will give 3/5 Rating.. You can expect more @999/-

name: Aishwarya
title: Not worth the description and money.
content: Very disappointed. The battery hardly stays for an hour, noise cancelation next to no, bass effect is barely there, it says It is sweat resistant but the ear buds slip off with a liitle sweat also, overall not happy with what the product promised vs delivered.

name: Madhav
title: Disappointed
content: Whenever I conference calls it does not connect with the other calls, if I use a wired earphones I am able to conference, i need a replacement. Once its replaced and fixed Ill change the overall reviews.

name: Bonny X.
title: Sound Quality, Build, Functions
content: sound quality: heavy bass, the vocals and instrumentals are a little drowned out by this. But I prefer heavy bass for workouts.. build: build is pretty good and flexible. it has a frame which goes around the neck, this can be kind of annoying when running or jumping, but i just tuck it underneath my shirt. the eartips havent fallen out yet, they are a great fit.. function: just a reminder that to change tracks u have to hold down volume up and down keys, double tapping middle button actually calls the previous person you called.

name: Himanshu dwivedi
title: Best in the budget.
content: The sound quality for a bt earplugs on this budget is quite decent. If you get it less than ₹1500 then you should go for this. Best product in this budget.. If you are a bass lover then you gonna love this. Also for calling and stuff it has got a mic which i quite good and gives a decent output to the callers even if you are driving.

name: Rithanathith
title: PROBLEM WITH THIS BLUETOOTH BOAT HEADPHONE
content: The only problem with this headphone is that, on switching different apps on mobile, it is not able to auto-configure fastly.Sometimes, sound comes via the speaker on switching app suddenly (for eg: from Spotify to youtube). It takes time to configure the audio via Bluetooth on switching apps on the mobile

name: Kumarbti
title: Awesome product
content: I didn't expected too much at this price range but I ordered it.. But Sound quality is awesome .. Bass is also superb.. battery life is also good. I have used for 4 hours approximately but not charged once.. Very easy to use.. Easily connects to my mi phone and ipad.. Go for it.. And at last, packaging and transport is good reached before time

name: Ritesh K
title: Average Bluetooth ear phones, justify the price of 1K.
content: Average Bluetooth ear phones, justify the price of 1K. If you are looking for convenience and freedom for tangling wire, certainly you can go for it. If you want great sound quality certainly this is not the one.

name: $ubham
title: Honest Review for those who have decided "Jo bhi ho jaye yahi earphone lena hai"
content: The product is super but it is not robust. The earphones does not last long. I bought it on Sep 2018 and replaced it since one earpiece was not working within 4 months of purchase. The customer support is excellent but it takes 20 days time for the overall process. Again after 9 months of puchase, one piece is again not working. Sound quality is awesome. One cons is there that while calling, the other person recieves the sound too loudly any it irritates the receiver.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bad -Don't Buy -Cheating on warranty -Product mal functioned after 3 months of Purchase.
content: Product is malfunctioning after 3 months and after sending back to warranty there is no response from the seller . No Response-Not Picking up Phone and No Mail reply after sending back to Warranty claim .

name: Madhur
title: Mike Stopped Working With In 20 days of Purchase
content: I purchased it on 12th october and received on 16th october sound quality is good but today is 5th november and suddenly i found mike is not working no issues with sound quality or Bluetooth connectivity but mike is not working now they are showing 1 year replacement warranty i would like to replace my boat rockerz 255 please help me what to do please contact me

name: vishal haria
title: Do not purchase it in sale
content: The product which I got is a low quality product I fu as it's been used and they give away it in sale as. If I use it for 2 hrs continuesly the battery drains off after charging it full. I guess this needs to be corrected. And the name on the hearphones has started coming out. Using it from 5 days. Shame on you boat. If possible I would like to give it back and get it refunded.

name: Anwar
title: Excellent product, no lag must buy
content: It's been a month now I am using this earphone. Since day one I am getting almost 10hours of playtime in full charge and there is no lagging in sound too. The bass is good enough. There is no connection loss at all.. worth a buy

name: Arulkumar
title: Sound quality and good bass but very disappointed with battery
content: Battery life is very poor it takes around 1.5 to 2hrs to charge but battery backup gives only 3-4hrs. Sound quality is good and bass ok .. If you having a budget of 2k then Better go for New Realme wireless earbuds having fast charge and long battery life backup upto more than 12hrs in a single charge .. Realme sound quality is awesome and great bass with 11.2mm driver.

name: kapil
title: Amazon Give duplicate product
content: Amazon seller tech fire give me wrong product. I don't understand. I face some issues in my earphone then I will go to service center for claim warranty. N I'm shocked service center declared this product is duplicate. I contact to Amazon n face too much difficulty to replace the item

name: Isha Nag
title: Good earphones, but got faulty in less than 2 months
content: We bought it on 16th July and got it delivered by 18th July. Was easy to set up. I have constant use of headphones in my work and have used multiple bluetooth headphones. But 21st August, one of the earbud stopped working and now both sides have stopped working. Expected it to work for at least one year. Also no place to return the item. What do you expect me to do with a 1000rs non-working headphones? I hope amazon/ the seller / the company replace the item.

name: ashish reddy
title: Superb
content: It is worth for the money. Completely satisfied by it's functionality.. The battery life durability is super. Fast charging 👌. Bass is also good

name: Sarika S
title: Good quality earphones
content: It connects well and battery durability is also good. after charging for 2-3 hours, it can work upto 5-6 hours straight.. Sound quality and connectivity is also good.

name: Govind b.
title: Good sound quality with poor noise cancellation
content: Got for 999.. value for money product, after using 2 months👍. But 1 year passed and as my friend said usually this earphone are not working after 1yr. Many of my friend faced same problem. First it's one side was not working and now whole. Also the noise cancellation is not good.. and worst thing is that they are useless after 1yr. No use of warranty.

name: Rashmi Sharma
title: Dont buy it and also not from amazon. They dont fulfill promises they make..
content: Very bad experience. I bought it from amazon. I got box opened and in torn & damged position. Headphone was also in bad condition like second hand and it was not working. Not in a working condition. It was not like shown in image. Waste of money, pay hard earned money also and be back of them for the same. Very bad, dont go for it.

name: kamal krishna sahoo
title: After unbox
content: After unboxing got two extra different sizes rubber buds.one USB cable with precharged headphone.Thought it will be cylindrical shape wire but it is flat shaped wire towards ear.. After using it continuously for aprox 4hrs it giving me quality sound. Satisfied with delivery and product got it Rs1099/-

name: Namrata
title: Advice : NOT TO BUY : Stopped working.Poor Bluetooth coverage.
content: Pros: Excellent sound quality for this price.. I would have not returned it, if it had continued to work well.. Cons : Stopped working 15 days from the date of purchase. Also, my phone had to be almost near the headphone for it to work well.

name: kanha
title: Quality par excellence.
content: Its an awesome product. Hats off to boat for set the bar high for its products. The bass is punchy. The vocals are really good and the background music of the other instruments is heard properly in this device. Does not lag is any sort of game be it Pubg or COD. The connectivity is fast. Thanx to amazon.

name: Arun
title: Not durable, average sound quality
content: Sound quality is not so good and not so bad, I'd say average. Bass is good but not so strong with treble. But the main problem is the durability. In 3 months, battery started draining in an just an hour long usage and also phone calls stopped working. This is the second time I'm having a terrible experience with BOAT earphones, earlier with a different model. I'm really starting to think if they're worth it because of this durability concerns.

name: Baba
title: Its a 0 star product
content: It does not reduces surrounding noise.i bought 3 sets and all get defects with in a year. The quality is very low in this price. Bought for 999. Amazon should keep a eye on customer reviews whether the seller is selling right or cheating.

name: shahana mirza
title: Not comfortable to Ears
content: Bass and all is good.. sound ok not exceptional but lets talk about the comfort.. its not comfortable to ears it feels soo hard and heavy moreover you need to charge it. You need to charge it for an hour.. Battery doesnt stay more than 9 hours.. I would say there are better options for the same amount.

name: Faraz Qureshi
title: Value for money
content: Hey Guys,. I bought boAt Rockerz 255 Sports Bluetooth Wireless Earphone & I am completely satisfied with this product. Its really awesome and I am loving this Earphone easy to connect with awesome sound quality. If connected on call it works well and reduce the noise I mean noise cancellation works well. The person I was speaking to cannot identify I was using Earphone. Its value for money.

name: Suresh
title: Watch out before you buy
content: The ear bud is so broad that it is not fixing in my ear holes.i changed the buds also but still it is not working ..and the problem is that they have a replacement not a return ..so doesn't work for me

name: Aashish Mali
title: Not very good, but yeah for this price range these are apt
content: It's a good earphone if your range is around 1.5k . Battery is not very good but fine. Sound is also fine.. If you can increase your budget a little then go for Tagg Inferno..they are the best earphones available in the market under 2.5k.

name: Ritesh Jaiswal
title: Battery life
content: Sound quality is just awesome at thi price range.... Noise cancellation is not too good but it cancel maximum noise.... One demrit is that the battery life u can't rely on the battery indicator its shows that ur battery is 80% and in next half an hour it sudden fall at 20% or 30% nd after 5 minute it will switch off..... Overall at this price range it is awesome earphone...u can buy without any kind of doubt in ur mind..🙏🙏

name: Bittu
title: Sound quality
content: I'm writing review using after 2months... This product quality is really good and color was unique and elegant and getting suprb base without noice and it's noice reduction.. Bit concerned for me like large cable if they design by reducing to small it would be really awesome

name: Mayank Mittal
title: Great Buy, Won't Regret the purchase
content: I personally was sceptical about buying a Bluetooth earphone within this range and style. But they turned out to be fine. They have great connectivity and works fine when attending a call. Noise can be improved a little bit but at this range, the noise performance, feel of the product, style and small things such as earplug magnets are a great experience all together.

name: Priyanka Joshi
title: Best battery backup😍
content: I'm using this earphones from last 5 days, I have not charged them till now......Ofcourse I'm not using them continuously.....but I'm using it regularly while jogging & exercise......still it's going so well.........And sound quality is also good as well........I'm very happy with this product.......must buy.....🥳🤩

name: Sonal
title: Terrific purchase
content: Sound quality -5/5. Bass-5/5. Connectivity-5/5(depends on your device). Noise cancelling-4/5. Silicon clip and build quality 4/5. Can be used for fast running and gym.. Battery backup-5.5 hours at 100% volume but believe me 85% volume is more than enough. Overall best at 999. Atleast better than realms buds.

name: Shubham
title: Product in this range of price is quite impressive especially Navy Blue Colour
content: 1.Overall Sound quality is pretty awesome but. when it comes to base it is 4/5.. 2.Due to the fast charging it's being very useful. to make product durable.. 3.Battery life gives upto 6 hrs a accurately when. u r watching or playing game.. 4.Sound Quality during call is pretty awesome.. Navy blue colour is way best than others.

name: Dhananjay Bhugaonkar
title: Best at 999 value for money
content: Amazing product got it on sale at 999 rs affordable at this price point sound quality is good battery backup 3.5-4hours depend on volume. Else wire quality aur improve ho sakti thi to acha hota else is everything is good

name: Ravi Chandar
title: A worthwhile purchase
content: The sound quality is good not too tinny. However it is not very good for running as it slaps against the neck. The magnetic earpods are nice so they don't fly around.

name: CP S.
title: Highly not recommended
content: Worst quality have been using for 9 months and it is the 4th times one of the side stopped working and very costly . Not recommended .very costly as compared to the quality

name: YNM
title: Replacement guaranteed
content: Excellent service I purchased them in January 2019 and in June 2019 both headphones stopped working...I contacted the boat service center and as it was in1 year replacement warranty...to my surprise after a procedure within 10 days I got new pair of headphones replaced delivered to my door step... awesome service

name: Nirmit patel
title: Colour issue.
content: The product is really good,But the product has started loosing its colour shade.. Its just been a month and my colour is completely vanished.. YOU HAVE TO WORK ON THE COLOUR BOAT!

name: Abram
title: Just ok.
content: Once paired it difficult to pair to other devices.. And during call the other end gets a lot of noise.. It's an ok earphone.. It's useful for rough use while travelling in trains ,which are so spacious, in India.. I switched to a wired earphone for work use. Sony mdt xb 55. It had defect when delivered. And it was later replaced.

name: Febin_Review
title: Bad Experience
content: I had been using this device around 3 months..it was nice in first experience..but slowly it started disconnecting automatically..so I applied for a replacement.. they replaced me the better one in look only...My problem is it is disconnecting frequently automatically..Bluetooth is a major problem I think...So, My request is to buy any wired earphone than wireless....because, it is costly but has no performance quality...

name: GOUR MODAK
title: Good product
content: boAt - comfortable enough when used while in upright position. These are VERY UNCOMFORTABLE when you use them while resting on couch or bed for watching movies or so. Has very long earphone head.

name: Ram
title: Above average headset (poor battery)
content: In terms of sound quality, it is neither great nor bad. But what is really disappointing is how quickly the battery discharges. I use it primarily for office calls and it barely lasts for 3 to 4 hours.

name: RAVI A
title: first copy received in 2019 sale
content: I purchased boat rockersz 255 during 2018 and that impressed me the design and sound quality. I brought one more during this 2019 sale for 899 Rs. but there is a big difference in both the products. First of all when it connects it should say "You are connected to Boat Rockersz 255" but 2019 sale product skipping " 255". looks like it is first copy.

name: Tanaya Roy Chowdhury
title: Over all nice
content: Nice product. Sound quality good, battery back up good, key functional easy, connectivity with mobile process also easy. All functionality are user friendly.. But I think, only two things need to little bit improve, which are sound quality and battery backup.. On 1st day after full charged, battery backup given approx10hrs.

name: Supragya
title: Best in range.
content: Pros:-. 1. Easy to carry on neck feel really comfortable.. 2. Connectivity is simple.. 3. Bass and sound clarity is awesome.. 4. Backup was also overwhelming.. 5. Bluilt quality is also good.. Cons:-. 1. Connectivity range is little low.

name: Aradhana
title: Please read before buying
content: I want to write this review becoz I feel people buy on review basis. In my opinion this a fantastic option in cheaper range as I am a yoga trainer and trains online . When I lost my boat Airdrops I go for cheaper option and when I find this and use it I find it super great. ✨✨✨🔥🔥🔥

name: Arvind
title: Satisfies one's need at an affordable price..!!
content: It's damn good.....i must agree that this is one of the best Bluetooth headsets in the market today..!. Decent Bass. Decent Sound quality. Decent looks. And Decent Battery life. But little bit expensive for such Decent Performance. But if u manage to get it for ₹999 in any sale then. Simple replace all Decent with Awesome in above lines......😅😅

name: S.praveen sakthi
title: just buy boat rockerz 225 pro
content: I got product for 1100 rupee i think so it is more than worth of money nice bass quality nice packing i just happy with charging if i charge for 10 mins i can use upto 2 hrs. i love this product. thank you. yours faithfully. amazon prime customer

name: Aditya Moghe
title: Good but not very good!!
content: Overall Good!. One earplug stopped working after 5 months.. Voice sometimes not clearly audible to the person on other side on phone call!

name: Anurag
title: Battery indicator level
content: It is a problem with battery indicator.Battery indicator on mobile shows 100% or 80% only. Even if the battery is 50% or even less it still reflects 80% and so on. So it does not reflect the exact batterylevel. After 3months of use both the side earphones not working. First one side goes down and then second day other side

name: Dinesh Duraisamy
title: Value for money
content: One of a best at this price. All day companion. Recharging quick. Set automatically to stand-by mode after 5seconds of not using. Worth buying it.

name: Zubeen Sir
title: Worst product completely
content: Noice cancellation is not there. On call only background sound is hearing and not the persons voice. So much of distortion in voice to the opponent on call. And treble is more than base. Treble and base balance is not there. I brought it with full expectations to gift it but disappointed very badly. You can not make phone call if you are in outside. Worst product seriously. : (

name: Rachel
title: Bad... One side is not working
content: I am writing this after 7 month approximately ( bought on may 7 2019 and writing reviews on 1st December 2019).... And Sad to tell that one side is not working... This is really bad... Though the headset are good ... These are only for 6 months... Only buy this product if you are ok for 6 months... Not recommended for long term purpose... Please do not buy if you use it extremely...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very poor Quality
content: It is a like a product been purchased from palika bazar. Works inside the bazar and stops once we are out from there.. The device was working properly till yesterday. Yesterday ie 12.10.2019 was the last date to return the device in case of any issues.. Device has properly maintained its class till the return date and lost its breadth once return dates ended.. Great job 👍

name: KRISHNA
title: Good Product Good Service Good Battery Life
content: Product is Too Good. And Service Center Of Product Cell Care Center In Pimpri Pune Maharashtra is also good. I got Hassel free replacement of product while I was face problem related mic in my product

name: Drdee
title: Value for money.
content: Does the job quite good.. Bought it in the sale at 899/-. Value for money. Pretty good deal getting a Bluetooth headphones at this price especially of a good company.

name: AmitM
title: Defective product when delivered
content: I saw such review for the same product by one reviewer.....who complained that their ear piece was broken when delivered. Still I ignored and put based the same product...after opening the packet, when I configured Bluetooth with my phone, I found that in one ear, there was no sound...interestingly, I find that one wire is already broken....I don't understand that what is the meaning of that seal of the packet which guarantees the authenticity of the headphone

name: Must use the service
title: Overall it's a good product
content: Sound quality is good .. noise cancellation preety well and bass quality ok.. battery life is also good to use for 3 to 4 continues hour..and it's get quick charge also

name: Vishnu das K.V
title: The worst body quality and after service!!!!
content: The quality of sound was good but the quality of the built was poor . The charging port has-been moved away and it was found rusted ..I bought it on July and it's still under warranty.But the Boat costumer care people din't even picking the phone .I complained in their web site.But no acknowledgement from their side...What should I do??

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best one to use, too handy and nice quality!
content: I purchased boAt Rockerz 255 and boAt Rockerz 261 Sports Wireless Earphones in offer.. I found this 255 more useful and handy in comparison.. Sound quality wise, 261 is better but still its not way too much better than 255.. I really hesitate use 261 as it's heavier and larger rubber part and the rest.. Overall, I would suggest you to buy boAt 255 if you need talk often on phone calls or even want to listen to music.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst customer service of boat.
content: Quality is good, but if you will face any issue in earphones then no one will respond from Amazon or Boat, your 100 mails will go in vein. I have written many times to the boat customer service but they never replied to any mail and their contact no. Never works.

name: DIVYA
title: Malfunction within no time
content: Though the sound quality of earphones is really good initially. One of the buds stopped functioning after 12 days depriving me of even a replacement. Though my key strokes could be heard, music couldnt be played in one of the earplugs. They are very handy and comfortable in design too. But a reapir within no time is disappointing.

name: Alpesh Patoliya
title: Average product
content: Average sound quality, You can't hear details because they have more bass so you miss the details, battery backup is very less approx 6 hours at 60% volume which is not good at this price.

name: Jash
title: Good Product That Could Be Better
content: Nose cancellation is not really upto the mark. Bluetooth connectivity is pretty ok. The sound however is simply fab! You'll surely love it if you're a bass lover!. Overall it's a good product though.

name: Snehasish Chatterjee
title: Life ends after warranty ends
content: The product is good.. But its life is exactly of 1 year.. I bought 2 of these earphones and both of them stopped working just after the end of warranty period.. I tried to contact the management of boat but they didn't bother to reply

name: Shreyans
title: Good sound, mediocre mic & one earpiece stopped working within 6 months of purchase.
content: Sound quality is good, noise cancellation is also reliable. The mic has issues, the other person on call always complains about my low volume & in most cases more background noise. After 6 months the right ear piece stopped working.

name: Nitesh Vaghela
title: Color mismatch.
content: The colour shown in the image while purchasing is totally different from the one we have received, I have a doubt now if the product is original or fake.. You can clearly see the difference within the photos which is displayed while purchasing and the one which is received.

name: Amrutha jithesh
title: Good
content: Noice cancellation is for our ear not for the mic.remaining all good in quality especially fast charging and battery superb. But the charging cable of mine stop working after 2 month. But we can adjust with other cables then also it will get charged fast. Overall good purchase.

name: Praveen
title: You're not going to have an enjoyable experience if you really like your music
content: The product really messes up the treble. Notes sounds very muffled and some high pitched beats are audible with only very little intensity. The bass is great though, you'll hear very energetic beat drops. The overall music output is still really substandard.

name: anisa
title: Worst experience
content: I would like to return this product but tegy haven't left the option as well boat headphones are good but I think I have a got a defect piece it won't last even for half an hour Amazon India kindly help me with this

name: Piyush
title: Sound quality is  not as expected  battery backup is good , good for calling only
content: you can use this for calls quite efficient and easy to use no issue with sound and noice cancellation is quite good. quick charging is there. cons:. if you are a music lover this product is not for you

name: Mike Romeo
title: All good.. But not the battery backup
content: Changing my feedback post usage of 10 months in which 3 months ar lockdown...precisely its rarely used , mow the bluetooth is not able to connect with any device.. Now what to do ??

name: ujwal
title: Stops working when kept at certain angles.
content: Worst product that i have ever come across, suddenly stops playing while driving bike or during workout at gym when the position changes, its the worst feeling ever.. Quality wise the product is ok, but because of the problem it gets annoying. it happened from the day 1 , and after less then 2 months it escalated still. i am going for a new one now.

name: SS
title: Not Durable. Lasts only till warantty period
content: Not a durable product. Even after very less usage the product lasted only for 1 year. Initially one side stopped working and after a few days the other one too went dead. After spending extra bucks for a comparitively premium product , it should have definitely lasted longer. Since it is not repairable, the product and the money goes in the bin.

name: Abhiroop Chakraborty
title: Boat Rocks!
content: An absolute winner given the price bracket.. I'm also in love with Boat as a company. I ran into a problem with audio in one of the ears during the warranty period and raised a compain on their website. The product was picked, repaired and sent back to me all within 15 days. And no questions were asked.

name: Kusum Moray
title: Worth ur money
content: Sound quality is great. So is noise cancellation. Its comfortable. The fit in the ears is good too. Doesn't come off while running or speed walking. Would recommend.

name: Chandan
title: Comfy and penny's worth
