content: Likes: quality,comfortable,money worth,doesn't come off while working out. Dislikes: slips off the ear when sweating (like doing cardio),charge lasts for 4-5 hours on continuous use. Overall good buy,using it for 8 months tho

name: Umesh
title: Not value for money
content: Not value for money, sound quality not upto the mark, even 100 ruppes earphone do better than this sound quality. Battery life is not that good, and startup and battery low instruction sound are irritating. Next person not able to head you because microphone is cheap quality

name: smriti sharma
title: Sturdy and durable.
content: Pretty sturdy for the price. But the funny part is almost 12 people at my work place have the same product and hence we all can't leave it anywhere even for a second .. Because it will be lost or exchanged 😁 which also tells us about the economy and quality, that the product provides.. The power button is a bit slow. Rest all seems pretty fine. It's the best thing at this price. It's very handy and durable at the same time.

name: Srikant
title: Quality not worth it
content: Quality is not upto the mark. Instead you can just go with JBL wireless. It is just 300 rupees more than boat or you can opt for JBL wired which is just 800 bucks and way more worth than boat. Too much noise in the background. It even got replaced once but no use. Now they have only replace option and no refunds. Waste product. Don't even like it. It's just fallen in my drawer everyday and I don't feel like using it at all. DO NOT EVER BUY BOAT IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR QUALITY.

name: Alok Singh
title: Overall the headphone are good except for the built in voice audio is irritating
content: Overall the headphone is good.. But the headphone has this built-in loud male voice audio that plays every time you turn off/on, connect/disconnect bluetooth, min/max volume.

name: Vaishanavi Pandey
title: Awful experience
content: Initially it's very good bt stop working very early in 3 months only. And also I am. Not able to register my product to boat when I bought it

name: Samir S.
title: Workout with free hands...
content: Sound Quality- Awesome with great listening experience especially when you're working out.. Noise cancellation- Fine, but could've been better.. Moisture Wicking- Good enough to keep it unaffected.. Charging Chord- Too small, may be made so because it's compatible with any charger and they just had to keep a dummy.. Overall nice & useful as it clings to you through your workout session.

name: U Jaya Lakshmi
title: Product is not working
content: I have this product on 8th august 2019. It was an excellent product. But now it is not working. There is one year warranty on the product. But as I am trying to contact the amazon it is saying that due to covid only essential services are available. I want to return the product as it is still in warranty period.

name: prashant
title: Wast of money
content: Pros:. 1.Warranty services are worst.. 2. Mic problem is very often. While calling other person will b unable to here you. Rubbish BTEF for calling.. 3. Bluetooth range is just one meter. I measured it.. 4. Low charge every time.. Pros: good bass.

name: Sara
title: good but disconnects in between
content: it is good headset but in between disconnects from phone eventhough it is nearby and then connects after a while, it is quite annoying when it repeatedly happens without a reason

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sound quality is not good
content: Sound quality is very bad. Not sure if I received faulty one. 'power ON' message had disturbance and hence returning this product.

name: #SJ
title: After a week of use
content: Good product, awesome battery,best bass, colour of headphones are slightly dark than what is showing in pictures.Box is slightly old and has some scratches but the inner product is cool. Go for it.

name: Sirisha
title: Waste product 👎from seller (Appario Retail Private Ltd)
content: Waste product, Its always says battery low.. website says 6 hours playback time but hardly it plays one hour.. , i haven't seen full 2 hours movie even charging after charging 100% ... I don't recommend to buy this product particularly from seller(Appario Retail Private Ltd)

name: Manish Agarwal
title: Great sound, good treble, good bass
content: This is one of those Bluetooth earphones whose bass i liked. I have tried boult audio, jbl earphones but in this price range, boat beats both of them.. The sound quality is awesome, treble is also good. Bass is also good but i expected better bass, but as i said it's worth the price. Of the few other brands price of which are <=2000, this beats them all in every aspect. Built quality is premium.

name: Srinu Nugula
title: Cheap quality..
content: It's not even 9 months the charging came out and I have warranty but when i tried to call no Answer... Amazon should responsible for this... Bcos we Trust Amazon and buy products... but if we get this kind of quality less products.... Amazon brand value will be vanished... I need replacement of

name: Nilesh Singh
title: Neckband length is a problem
content: Voice while talking over phone gets clipped and sometimes I need to reconnect to get the sound. It's only around a month and I have started getting a smell of a bad buy. The neckband is so large that the earbuds come out due to the heaviness of the band. I don't know if the designers had a big heart planning for the length.

name: santosh
title: Good sound
content: Best in class bass and clear sound. Only drawback is charging of 6 hrs which is quite less compared to others in this price range. Apart from that product is awesome

name: Sharmila Devi
title: Bad one
content: As a sports scientist and fitness trainer, I have started Started my online training sessions so I got my blutethooth earphones in the beginning I was happy with this but after a month suddenly it stopped working and I dont know what's the reason also... feeling veryyy bad about that... please help me with tis

name: Devashish R.
title: Basic quality, moderate playback time, it will breakdown easily, poor warranty service
content: Okayish sound quality. Mic transfers noise during voice call. Trust me 5 hours playback is too low. Mic started malfunctioning after 4 months but then it started working fine. Again, there was no sound from the left earpiece. So I claimed my warranty and it is around 1 month since I handed over the earphone.

name: SUNIL KUMAR
title: Much hyped just good
content: Pros. Sound clarity. Bass. Battery backup. Cons. Noise cancellation is bad. It picks more noise then normal earphones.

name: Adhish Pai Kane
title: Not upto the mark product
content: Can Amazon help me in replacing this product..? Since it was mentioned that this above product has a free "One Year Replacement"...! From past many days the left speaker is not working..So Kindly if you guys mention such kind of genuine policies kindly get back to my genuine issue regarding the same Boat rockers 225

name: AMIT MISHRA
title: Don't buy for calling
content: I suggest don't buy if you are looking for calling purpose as there is no noise cancellation in that the other side will not able to listen if some one speak loudly at back or if you are on road. Rest for listening music it's good .

name: Amit Kumar
title: As always MIC is the Issue
content: Product is overall good, with only one issue that I have observed in the boat product, that mic is not that strong. You have to keep juggling your mic, so that other person can hear you. The mic captures more noise from outside and I guess it doesn't do noise cancellation properly at all. I do not have a choice to return it after 2 months of use.

name: sourav kumar
title: Nice product
content: Before buy this I was really concerned because on youtube people said that the material isn't good and wires r thin but now after using it for a while I can say it's really good no problem with the material and headphones won't look good if wires were anymore thicker great sound quality as always and decent connectivity 🔋 life is about 5 to 6 hours

name: pragya tiwari
title: Great product..true value for money
content: Sound quality is really good and initially, battery backup counts for 5-6 hrs.. fits well in ear but noice cancellation is just ok ok type..overall it's a must buy purchase at BBD price of 899/-

name: Duha Khan
title: Awesome
content: Sound quality didn't disappoint at all, battery life is also quite good enough. It's easy to carry and handle it's quite sturdy no worries of it breaking in half or anything. The rubber pointers on the headphones itself do come out when using rigorously but all together a great purchase

name: Rahul D.
title: worst experience of warranty with this product.
content: I sent the product to Boat Service center Mumbai for a warranty replacement, they took completely 2 months for sending the replacement unit from 30 august 2019 to 31 october , when i opened the replacement unit package , WTF it was a used unit dirty , fully destroyed unit , unable to pair with my phone . Only takes charge .... BOAt cheated me in a drastic way , and my 1499 rupees are gone to hell........

name: Customer
title: Charging port Damaged
content: Bought it on 26 Nov, 19 performance was good except battery backup, at 80% charge it used to switch off but still manged with it, now i have got issue with charging port, it got broken and for warranty claim, service center contact number is not working /switched off, Email ID provided in details of product is not working, so helpless now with this issue.

name: meet Vaghasiya
title: Thank you for this Extraordinary product, wonderful experience by using boat rockerz
content: As always all products of BOAT is amazing, in this boat rockerz all functions working in best condition, super sound quality with bass, also 100% charging complete within 1.5 hours and more then 6 hours of running time, so I'm strongly recommend this product.. Also quickly delivered this product.

name: Ravindrasinh Rajput
title: Not good,dont buy Once replaced then also same problem
content: Not satisfied with product at this price,sond is good, once replaced then Also same problem,, Once conected then again auto connect and disconnect also maximum volume this all notification via voice comes between 20-30 seconds its too irritating.

name: Navdha Sharma
title: manufacturing quality not upto the mark
content: The product should be made more durable its just a month i been using it and its body is broken(charging slot cover ) and as it comes under pyhsical damage they are even not gonna repair it .. i paid a handfull amount of money for a showpiece i guess cause now that earphones are resting in my wardrobe

name: Subodh
title: After sales service ZERO
content: After sale service zero..No given on Amazon site 022 3014 7239 is in valid...The soft ear buds & two clone which holds on ears fail off.. other wise the performance is ok ..

title: In 999 it is best product
content: I purchased this product in 999. In this price it is the best neckband. If you want to buy don't hesitate just buy it. Battery quality is also good

name: Narendra
title: Ok buy for basic use.
content: Ok buy for the price and basic use case - bluetooth connectivity to phone while driving.. Not so comfortable to wear and noise cancellation is just marketing for this product, doesn't work.

name: Avishkar R Shirsat
title: nice product ...but stopped working
content: I purchased a Boat Rockerz wireless headphones from amazon , the quality was so good …. but after one week its one ear piece stopped working.. and now there is no refund or replace options available on amazon .. As there is 1 year warranty on this product…. So, I request to replace this product as early as possible.....

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for money.
content: If the usage is excessive don't buy it coz after a certain period, itching starts n feels uncomfortable in your ears, But if u r going to use while driving or just for calls then it's recommended, the sound is crisp n clear mic works perfectly fine in excessive clatter, the battery is also long lasting.

name: shubham rao
title: aver all you should buy this at this rate
content: very nice product I am reviewing this product after using it for 2 or 3 months , sound quality is good battery life is of stander level including fast charging, built quality is also good , very light weight , flexible too. Bluetooth connectivity is not that much good as I was expecting for (some times I found issue to connect it from other rooms) OVER ALL BEST PRODUCT AT THIS PRICE SEGMENT.

name: Naveen
title: Warranty
content: One ear set not working and product within warranty pls arrange to replace

name: mahesh lokhande
title: Please check product quality Before selling the any item
content: Don't Waste money on this product. It's very cheap quality, 1st think is used provide then I was cancelled then delivery boy asked me it's u r old product so I couldn't returned this product and also didn't get any support from provider.. I suggest don't buy this product

name: Saurav
title: Disappointed,never expectd from boat.
content: Overall worst product from boat,poor connectivity,it get interrupted 5-6times in a 7min songs and keep repeating that same irritating voice-you are now connected to boat rokerz 255,. Battery backup is good. Bass is so so. I suggest, choose any other product instead of wasting in it.

name: Dr.Ankit Sharma
title: Best product in its segment
content: You get the best value wireless headphones for the price you pay.Best in its segment.I am already using Apple’s 2nd generation airpods and when i used this headphone,it is no ways lesser than the airpods keeping mind the price of airpods.Its bass quality is much higher and overall good product under ₹1500.

name: Annie Joyce John
title: Worst
content: Don't go for this.. good quality.. but charge stood only for one month . After a month charge never stands... After which we can't even return the product as one month cool off period ends .

name: Anand Dodiya
title: Good Headphones worth buying.
content: I have used it for 1 day and no complaints till now. Build quality is good. Very light weight. Sound quality is good. It has super extra bass so those who don't like extra bass have to think on it before buying. Battery life is also good 5hour 35 minutes. Saw 2 movies in a day along with attending calls. Charging time is approx 2 hours. One of the good features I like that when you connect to android phone it shows headphone's battery icon next to bluetooth icon. That battery icon show how much charge is left.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bluetooth not working
content: Very bad. Sound quality was good. But Bluetooth disconnected after 3-4 minutes of listening . Then it no longer appears in bluetooth devices. Tried both on mobile and laptop but no solution. Hope its just one faulty piece. Ordered replacement in 4 days.

name: Imteyaz ahmed Ansari
title: Worst battery
content: Over all the product is nice but battery backup is horrible it hardly last for 3 hours while playing game... I bought this to play pubg but unfortunately i am not able to enjoy it... I wish to return it.. Dont buy ds as after 6 months of ussage the sound quality and volume lowers. Sound cancellation dsnt work at all

name: RACHA RAMESH
title: POOR SOUND QUALITY_MUST BE AVOIDED
content: very cheap quality material within 3 months earphones are not working and customer support is avoiding customers..very poor support ..VERY POOR SOUND QUALITY..NOT AT ALL SATISFIED.There are Bluetooth wireless earphones available within range of Rs 200-300 with good sound quality than these earphones.

name: Siddhesh Bhikole
title: Not Worth It
content: Sound quality is poor. bass feels completely absent. too much noise in music. treble is terrible. Bluetooth glitches during transit. Batttery life is great. overall not good product. you can use it for calling or watching movies but terrible choice for music. Don't buy this if you listen music all the time. Speakers are poor quality will give you headache after 10 15 minutes.

name: ;h m garg
title: VERY VERY POOR SERVICES 😞😔
content: Quality is good but u should not expect good service from boat. Worst services, Within warrenty I requested for repairs or replacement, picked up very early by courier but from last 3 months no reply, worst

name: Rituraj B.
title: Decent enough
content: Have been using for 2 months now. Getting used to the slight discomfort in ear while wearing it. There is a bit delay in sound while playing games. Not that it will effect your gameplay, still noticeable. Decent enough for me.

name: Ashishpal Singh
title: Pathetic customer service by boat and Amazon for this product
content: Changing the rating to 1 star, it ran ok until it died. Company seems to be shur, not respnding on emails for warranty claim as battery died before 1 year. Amazon seems to be of no help in this and keep on screwing the customer with nothing but ' thankyou for ur patience and understanding' line in the script. Amazon seems to be passing time and not helping at all.. dont buy these or you will be screwed too ..

name: Chenna Reddy
title: Worst earphone
content: Worst wireless earphone ever i bought. It got freed after 5 days. Function buttons are not working. The product stopped working right after the post return eligible date.. Product not getting paired, not getting switchedoff. Don't know what to do.

name: Smita
title: Suggestion
content: Sound quality is good. Noise cancellation should be improved little more. Bluetooth connectivity is good bt some times it cracks the music rhythm. Still Same i would say, Now a days the bluetooth is getting Disconnecting again and again in certain Frequency. and the Grip of Ear rubbers should be firm - It slips down quickly

name: Manoj
title: Kudos for the product ....go for it..... :)
content: After using it for 2 weeks i felt like it's time to write a review about the product..... Pros:. sound quality is decent. Battery life is around 5 to 5:30 hours. Bass and noise cancellation are cool...so you can enjoy your music in all modes of traveling as well.... Cons:. So far I have found only one that is wire length is a bit more.. If they can provide adjustable wire length that should be fine.

name: Kautuk
title: Tempered packing
content: It's seemed supplier had unboxed it before because selaed was opened. 2 major issues. 1) within 4 m it starts to disconnect. 2) when connect to mobile battery shows 100% after while it's show less. It's seemed supplier has placed used /faulted earphone

name: Balaji
title: boat rockerz 255 headset one side speaker not working
content: The enclosed boat rockerz 255 Bluetooth headset which I purchased on ( Amazon ) october-17,2019 Is one side speaker not working properly.as it is still covered by the original manufacturer warranty.i requested that u repair or replace it. My sales invoice & warranty number are enclosed.please ship the repaired or replaced iteam to me at the address on this letterhead .. Thank you for your prompt attention ...

name: Nikhil Shriman
title: Boat Customer Service S*cks!
content: Product quality is cheap. I got my product replaced twice, one time from Amazon and Second Twice from Boat. The Second time, the product started showing problems from the very Day I received the product. I have again asked for a replacement. There is no response from Boat, it's more than a month now. Talking about product deliverable, Sound quality is ok. But considering other options available at that price point, it's below average mark.

name: Vishal M.
title: boAt Rockerz 255
content: boAt Rockerz 255, expected more as boat is better company , somehow this is not what I expected...but in this price range not much options.

name: Navneeth
title: A fairly decent product for the price!
content: The build quality is not the best you can find.. Audio is quite good but I often face audio stuttering issues. The mic is bad.. Summary:. Audio quality : 3/5. Mic : 2/5. Bluetooth connectivity : 2/5. Noise cancelation : 3/5. The problem I am facing might be limited to this particular piece . I have requested for a return.

name: Druva S S
title: Beauty to use & great full to have nice service from the boat
content: Extradinary service by the BOAT company. I have been using this for an year now.. I claimed warranty 2 times and they provided me good service.. My friend bought BOLT and it's service is so poor he was not satisfied. Every object will gain defect one or the other day service makes difference. You can claim warrent if it has some problems but it should not be damaged Physically

name: Farhan
title: WORST SERVICE BY BOAT
content: Bought it a year ago, used for 5 months and one side stopped working raised a complaint to boat team didn't get any response, but received a torn empty box as so called "replacement unit". The service is worst and dont expect any response or help from boat company. Buy at your own risk dont expect it to be fixed if it stops working.

name: KPS
title: Awesome earphonen with awesome after sale service!
content: My boat rockerz stopped working after about 11 months. I registered a complaint and the company arranged a pickup of the non-working earphones and replaced it without any charges. I have not experienced such great service ever in India. Absolutely great experience! Love my boat rockerz!

name: Sankalp Kini Agarwal
title: Worth it
content: Worth it.. The earphones are comfortable to use.. Noise cancelling effect is good.. Sound quality is excellent.. Battery will last the entire day.. Using it for more than a year now.No issues.

name: Nishant K.
title: Not suitable for iphones.
content: This product is not good and compatible with iphones. Sound quality is very low, on call sound is worst and phone battery is draining like anything. Twice ordered (using return option) but both the sets were same issue. I do not recommend this product for iphone. For other phone may test and try.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Battery drain and bad customers  support  service center
content: Wrost product. Within 10 days noticed defected. Battery draining very fast. And only one service centre in chennai that too worst customers service. Till now no response from them. Amazon pls look on to ur selling partners product quality and its customer service

name: Fenny mundra
title: Superb experience 🙌💴
content: Sound quality is superb i never found such sound quality before in any ear phones. It properly cancels out the noise as I cannot hear Any sound disturbance and due to this feature i enjoy my dance sessions with listening music with these boat rockerz 🙌👌🏻✨ And with no doubt Bass quality is superb. 👌🏻

name: Siddharth Kanchi
title: Best budget wireless earphones
content: Bought Boats Rockerz 255 recently and its upto mark. Works flawlessly with my OnePlus 3T. Sound quality is surprisingly good with good amount of bass and treble. Also battery backup is good.Highly recommended!

name: Rana
title: Connectivity issues and not adjustable.
content: Firstly j love boat products, I have many boat devices at my home and all are good service is good.. But this is not a value for money device. They can't be adjust in ears properly by changing buds also. Connectivity of this device is worst

name: FK
title: Pain In The Ears
content: Does what its made for but causes pain in the ears if used for little longer than even half an hour. I tried changing the plugs on ears but that does not solve the issue since the inner part of earpiece is super hard

name: Murali Krishna Konduri
title: Not suggesting
content: After 3 successful returns, again Amazon delivered this product with defect. The left earphone is generating less sound than the other one. I got this product at 999rs and delivered within 2 days. As the earphones are with bass so don't use it for long time.

name: Aakash Naskar
title: Value for money 💰
content: Just wow but since sound quality is ok ok type . I think realmi budds have the better sound system but wait!🤔just wait for a second I forget to tell you something . Oh I got it 🤣 it's bass quality ... Wow just fab dude . I must have to say that others head set can't give you this type of bass quality. So u have to try it 🎧

name: Rahul
title: Very good product.
content: Excellent sound and bass quality. Noise cancellation is good at higher volume. Happy with the product. Definitely recommended if you are into jogging/cycling.

name: Pruthav Abhyankar
title: Total noise cancellation, good bass, kinda water resistant.
content: It does work in heavy rains...upto 6-8 hours of battery life with moderate call timings. Auto shut off.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best product at lesser price.
content: I purchased this item in 999/- which is enough for this item. I am happy. But i ll never give 1 rupee extra for this item on 999. This suffice my requirement in 999. Thanks.

name: Aditi Chatterjee
title: Gym buddy
content: I like the overall sound quality of the product, just that you have to push to buttons for a few good seconds to power on or off or change to a next track. And that's not too comfy when you're on a treadmill

name: Anurag Pal
title: My review
content: Sound quality and Bass is good ..but i will rate it 8/10 in battery because battery drains out too quickly ,its like. 100% to 80%- in 1½ hours. 80%to 60%-in 1 hour. 60%to 40% -in 30 min. 40% to 20% -in 15min. 20% to zero- in 2min. Bluetooth connectivity- Quite good 8/10. Looks-9/10. Call quality-7/10 Not too clear. Bass-10/10. Comfort-9/10. Overall-8/10

name: open to all
title: The best in thia price.
content: The extra bass put into these earphones are the best. I have most of every brands wireless earphones but the base boat gives is the best of all. Wire quality is slight less but those who care more about sound quality and base shouldnt bother. Range is little less than other but overall is good matte build.

name: Navaneeth H P
title: Bad experience
content: Really not as expected. This is very bad option for calls, the opposite person always have issue with the clarity of voice. It is not at all audible to others in call. Even battery is very average. Just not happy with product which I had huge expectation. Built quality is below average.

name: Rohini
title: Quality
content: The product was not bad.. Sound Quality :- Poor. Noise cancellation :- Good. Bass :- Good

name: Amazon Customer
title: A 5-Star Rating for a 5-Star product. 🌟
content: Great product, though you clearly feel that the manufacturer really work hard on bass factor.A good product with a great battery backup & outstandingly surprising sound quality. Go for it with this bumper price.. A 5-Star Rating for a 5-Star product. 🌟

name: Inder
title: Not worthy ...
content: The product is not worth buying as per the price. Their are many other brand products available in the market with better sound quality and and that with a lesser price. The sound quality is also not good. Theirs a defect for the Bluetooth range. The only pro that I found was the battery life, which lasts approx 5-6 hours after full charge on continuous play.

name: Naguveer Prakash
title: Excellent
content: Deadpool versus excellent the best quality the voice clarity, the 10 percentage of battery itself the iPhone will be turned off

name: SagarJ39
title: Good one
content: Sound quality is much good than expected. But the neck band is flexible and ear buds are little bit heavy that's why it falls down again and again from ears. And neckband don't have vibrator.

name: Amey
title: My Order and Received Item is not matching
content: My Order was not for Neckbank in Ear Headphone. But what I Received was NeckBand Headset.. Picture shown in Image is different and what they deliver is different.. Even this Neck band is also not flexible it's just like you are having U-Shaped sturdy pipe is on your Neck.. Mike is not near your mouth as it's attached to neckband, so you can't use these headphones for communication.

name: Shivam
title: Perfect budget Bluetooth headphones
content: I bought it at 899/- and as always Amazon was too good with it's 2 day delivery. By far the best budget Bluetooth headphones.. Good sound especially bass.. Ergonomically perfect.. Cons according to me only 6-7 hrs battery life , Bluetooth connectivity is pulsating sometimes happens rarely but it does,. Overall worth the money 👌👌👌

name: roshan
title: Worth for discounted prize
content: Worth at this prize.. connectivity is moderate some time get connectivity issue. Interm of charging .. it's not managed effectively. For me coming 12 hr standby mode without on call ..I recommend they should improve this

name: Ziyan
title: Totally disappointed by not working and warranty issue
content: Within 4 months both the speaker got not working and I went to reclaim the warranty issue .They said warranty is not coming fpr whole product.. It very bad by paying 2.5 k for this bad headphones

name: Omkar Hegade
title: For BASSHEADS only!!
content: I'm writing this review after 4hours of usage. I've used 2 boat products boat 225 and boat 900 before buying this one. And boat has impressed me with this one too. Im a basshead so people who like bass can blindy go for it according to me this is the best in the segment. Call quality is average. Battery life is good👍

name: Manoj
title: Battery drains quickly even after full charge
content: Best headphones in this range . Close your eyes & buy if your seeing in range of 1k ! Battery backup is not that to the mark.. Orelse One plus ka earphone is quite good for 2k range with better battery backup

name: Sanjukta
title: Check the reviews before you buy any product
content: First of all the product quality was very low and secondly the colour which I have ordered was not the colour and they gave me blue colour..Can't write the review that time because I was out of the city but one of the worst products.. Never expected that reputed and a brand like Amazon will have this kind of service..

title: Nice one
content: Same as shown in the image... Although it's sound is little less compared to wired earphones. But nice one... A must buy

name: Sagar Mhaisne
content: Go for it. Good during bike riding. One time. full charge will last for 3 days, in my case.. This does it work.. But Boat need to make more smart Bluetooth earphones.

name: Amandeep Singh
title: Not Working
content: It has stopped working after 3 months. Please exchange this. I bought this because of the branch image of Boat in market. But its not like I was thinking. Please exchange my headphones. I am totally dissatisfied.. I have used the product very Gently. But still its giving problem. One of my friend told me that you can buy blue tooth headphones in 250 then why you are investing huge. I told him that this is BOAT. But I was wrong.

name: Kindle Customer
title: Boat rockers 255f pro
content: The product is awesome but battery life depends on your usage according to me I only charge it once and I will use them for 8-10. hours , cvc is 4.8/5,bass 5/5,fast charging 5/5, battery life 4.8/5 overall result is the product is awesome and it affordable too. price you will get it 1300rs-1600rs

name: John Nelson
title: Worth for the Price
content: Merits:-. 1. Been using it for last 5 month. The earphone's sound and the bass is mindblowing.. 2. Once if u fix the earphone into the ear you can't hear anything from outside even without playing songs.. 3. About the charging, they have mentioned 6hrs standby but it will be upto 7 to 9 hrs also if you are using it continually.. 4. Sweat proof is also awesome, Very flexible, weightless.. Demerit:-. 1. Ear buds are not perfectly fit but u can enjoy enjoy the music.

name: Shashank
title: Yes you can buy this ! Made for BASS
content: Yes you can buy this Made for Bass. Clarity is good. Bluetooth connection is good,Volume is good, fitting is also good,light weight,comfy,easy 2 days battery life on a single charge

name: Pushpendar singh shekhawat
title: Noise Problem
content: Ordered it few months back. I like the product but after 3,4 months when am on call the other person some time other person faces listening my voice clearly and it also catch other sounds alot . So am disappointed because spending 1500 on a brand product and then facing such issue is highly disappointed .

name: Priyanka
title: SIMPLY GO FOR IT
content: Best packaging and also original product day before yesterday i purchased charged for more than an hour bcz its new prdct..its 3rd day today still battery showing as 60% 👏👏☺️

name: Siddhant Mishra
title: Rather buy Sony C200 than this one
content: A sheer disappointment when it comes to connectivity and battery backup. At this price I don’t expect the sound quality to be that of Bose but oh boy, it’s a shame. The Sony C200 gives much better sound quality and battery back up than this piece of junk.

name: SSV
title: Recommend to remove from catalog
content: Worst sound quality. No Noise cancelation. Ear buds are not comfort. Not recommended to any one. Wonder how come Amazon is allowing to trade such a useless products?. Even Boat Bluetooth devices are known for quality- but this particular product is shocking 😐 and unbelievable

name: Rahul
title: Before buying must know
content: It like a rubber band of the bluetooth and today I buy it and battery is awesome but I useling from long time when I call or when I get call im not able to earing of voice in call then I switch off and on the bluetooth then it able to earing voice in call plz check and buy and other it is awesome

name: Nitin Kumar
title: Good sound, better than level u.
content: Earphones are good, bass is very high, you have to adjust the bass with equalizer if your phone supports. Else keep volume at 70% , sound quality is much better than Samsung level u.. I received a package which was replaced as the seal on the box was open. Didn't expected Amazon will do this.

name: HarisH
title: After using this for 8 months I'm writing this review.
content: This will become junk after using it for 3 months - will start giving trouble in connectivity, visibility (discovering/pairing issue).. Did warranty claim also but no use, repeating the same.

name: kartheek jonnalagadda
title: Don't buy
content: Please don't buy this product(in fact any boat product ). after-sales service is pathetic customer care number never connects they put on hold they never give proper answers.

name: Omi
title: No Mute option but product is good
content: Don’t buy if you want mute option.. all is good but without mute option I can’t use this for daily purpose .. I can’t even return it,. But yes it’s good product no doubt. It would have been good if I would have got returned and got another boat one or other brands

name: kush
title: Didn't work long
content: Initiallially when it arrived it was working fine but after some time you have to charge it every 15-20 mins and when I continue using it completely stops working. Its a waste of money if you are thinking to buy something for the long term. No return policy that's very bad as unable to return as well

name: Dhruv Kansara
title: Wrost product supplier
content: Worthless product distorted sound, nice basss, fatela avaj, battery life was good at starting but after some days you need to recharge battery regular, when battery percentage was 60% or below it's behave like 0% and you need to recharge it, also sounds not good the coming from that little hole is like totally distorted.

name: Naveenkumar M Hanchinamani
title: Not suites for calls on travel!!!
content: Noise cancelation is very poor.. Recipient not able to listen anything while traveling!!!. And battery backup is not as they claim.. Just for calls it lasts for 2-3hrs max!!!. Don't ask about standby time.... Standby time is also very poor.. Not satisfied with this product.... Not recommended!!!

name: Mustafa
title: Very good
content: The bass is very good, that is the thing i disliked about the product. I want something that focuses more on the vocals and i wanted something with less bass. The quality of the product is good, looks premium. Fits well in the ear and everything. Battery seems very good,. I am satisfied with the product

name: Amazon Customer
title: Average Product
content: This an average product. Sound quality is good, only for music & videos. But not so good for calling purpose. Mic is not good. After 2 to 3 minutes conversation sound started broken and mic stop working. It is started from 1 to 1.5 month of purchase. This product is not for calling purpose. Even for the 5 minutes calling.

name: PRF
title: Nice
content: I had purchased for my wife but ear plugs are big for her now i am using due to its sound quality is very good n i can connect to my tv to watch online movies n series on prime n netflix

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very good.
content: Value for money product. Before purchasing this item, I used to think that Bluetooth earphones are not good. But this earphone change my mind. The design and sound quality of this headset is awesome. And battery life is also good. If you need such device, then go for it. I purchased it for ₹1400, but can get it at 1000 in Sale.

name: Sankar
title: One side only can hear after 6 days
content: After 6 days it's only one side is hearing other side is not working , I bought from Bangalore for my friend and sent to his place Tamilnadu. Now return policy is 10 days tomorrow is last date don't know what to do. Totally disappointed

name: Kumar Saharsh
title: Best in class product
content: 1. The earbuds are super comfortable( i had it plugged for 8 straight hours and didn't feel any discomfort). 2. Charge is amazing.lasts almost 8 hours.. 3. Charges in 1:30 hours.. 4. Durable. 5. Mic is way better than boat basshead 225. 6. connected device should be near the earphones.

name: vishal
title: Awesome
content: I can say 1 thing , just blindly buy this product. I buyed during the offers and I got this at very less price 999. The bass n sound is simply awesome. Don't waste more money on other headsets .it's the very best headset and you will love it .

name: Deepak panwar
title: Good product but quality should be improve
content: Quality of this product under 1400 se good but some time it's just stop working and again startng workng after some time I don't know what's the problem other wise battery is good 6 hour of play back ..

name: Dhumketu
title: Nic sound
content: Gys sounds is very good ,can choose it blindly,bass very good in Bluetooth system,if damage after receiving or before receiving that others matter,but sound is too good.but sure register after receiving online.

name: SAMPATH
title: Bass quality
content: Major asset is the bass quality and noise cancellation, good one under 1000 but may be we have to look up for the battery life as of now single charge I'm able to use it for 3 days

name: K.P
title: GOOD PRODUCT AS PER PRICE
content: Sound quality is good. Bass Quality is upto mark with price and passive noise cancellation is quite good. Been 3 months using going smoothly. 40 - 50 min charge goes straight 8 to 10 hrs, if 2 devices are connected it drops to 4 to 6 hr

name: Prasad Palampalli
title: Distortion in between calls
content: Voice is breaking in between calls and battery life is also not good as expected. But You can go for it if you are buying for music & also comfortable to wear. Better think about the battery life once before going for it. As per my overall experience I will give 4.2 rating.

name: Arnie
title: Regret buying this.
content: Writing a review after using for 2 weeks, pl don't buy this for voice calls. Not good at all. Huge background noise. It is not noise cancelling, it's a noise amplifying headphone.. Took for calls, the other party cannot listen to your voice , only the background sounds are audible. Big regret. Worst sound quality.

name: b m jani
title: Poor Power back up in 1400 cost range
content: I rise replacement of the product coz of power back up it works only 6 hour with call and 2 hour music... Let's see after replacement..... Coz there is no return option also... It's really not good

name: tarun
title: Money wastage
content: Bluetooth is very easy to connect but the noise cancellation is very bad.. Also after 10 days the sound quality decreased... I am not sure if anyone else is facing the same problem.. But i am facing it.. Now i am not able to hear any sound from one of its ear bud and from the other one it is very low..

name: Verified customer
title: Just wow product... excellent buying
content: This is the best bluetooth earphones I have purchased ever. Best bass, though a crispness in the sound is required but still I like it very much. Bluetooth connectivity is also too quick and stable.

name: Ruthvik  Ashok
title: Product turns off automatically
content: This product just got disconnected from my phone many times then many times it switched off automatically. Product not up to the mark as described by the seller.. Boat do fix this issue on your headphone boat rockerz 255.

name: vennela
title: Worthless
content: Waste of money for 1500, I would suggest to add extra 300 for realme Bluetooth or extra 500 for one plus bullets. Sound quality not good. Bass not good. If you're a boat user from the start then you might not get the difference but when you use products like realme or one plus then definitely you'll feel the difference in quality.

name: Amazon Customer
title: No use for calling purpose
content: Not for calling purpose....the opposite end caller will hear only your surrounding noises clearer than your voice....so it's a pure 100% for music... crystal clear sound quality....just go for it if you use it only to listen music.

name: Rahul Nair
title: Boat Rockers Rock indeed!!
content: Super bass at an affordable price point. Boat Products have always been on their top when it comes to the materials they use in making their products outstanding with regards to it's built quality,the texture the finishing. All in all superb product at this price point

name: Lovish Jain
title: Not durable at all.
content: The sound quality and noise cancellation is good but the product is not durable at all. I have it for around three months and have replaced it twice. And now the third piece is also not working properly. Issue is after playing for some time the voice starts getting delayed. Then I disconnect and connect again.. Update after using for an year:. It stopped working. I would not recommend this.

name: Mayur
title: Worth review
content: Standard issue with any kind of bluetooth device hanging around neck.. It must be resolved around all such bluetooth headset.. Apart from that sound quality is 6 on 5 it's perfectly best.. Connectivity is good.. Only issue is strap it has lost it shape due to regular usage

name: JAGGATH
title: Battery is worst
content: The battery doesn't last long😤.. After 3 months you can't connect to Bluetooth properly.. Battery is so disappointing 😞. If you go more than 35 feet away,the sound breaks.. My advice is to buy a new edition 🙂

name: Shabnam b.
title: Those who are looking for balanced sound.. Stay Away!
content: Sound is not balanced its heavy on the bassier side.. if you already had an expensive earphones like that of sennheiser's then go for this one only when you're looking for more bass because highs are not that well defined you'll need an equalizer to adjust. Overall for a basshead like me it's good.. battery backup is also great.. build quality is ok type. For 999 it's steal.

name: Ankit N.
title: Poor quality of wire
content: The wire of one side broke internally just after 5 months. Quality of material is really very poor. I'll not recommend this to others.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not happy at all
content: Does not feel comfortable on the ears at all. They keep falling out. Return facility is also not available. Sound quality is not that good either.

name: Prasannasmart
title: Value for money
content: Best earphones I like it... Sound quality is nice . But bass is low... Everything good for this price... And this is value for money... I got small problem for my product... I hope .. replacement product will be good ...

name: Rishabh D.
title: Not worth the price
content: Got it for 899 still i wouldn't say its worth it.. It doesn't fit well in your ears. Keeps falling. The lock isnt that good.. The microphone isnt very effective it dampens your voice.. Since the voice cancellations is not good it becomes a task taking calls on this when you are on road

name: Samir Shaikh
title: Loved it, paisa vasul - becoming BoAt fan
content: Loved this product, key reasons for me are superb sound quality, calling quality, Google assistant, music controls and long lasting battery (80% battery after 5 days of moderate use - I haven't charged this for the first time while writing this review).. I didn't like long wire and lack of magmatic music pause feature.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor customer service stop working after 1 month
content: Not worthy at all. I purchased coz of brand name only but after one month it stop working. I contacted to boat customer care but they are least bother to contact back. Poor customer service. They will suggest you to contact to boat customer service banch but its too far from where you actually stay.

name: Rafeeq Memon
title: Needs improvement
content: Sound quality is not good as i was expecting.. Overall good product but connectivity as also can be improved, I'll suggest you to buy if you're going to use it withing 5-6 meter area. Good for calling and all.. Overall good you can purchase if you want and you don't like the product like me you can return it within 15 days..!. Thank You...!

name: Vivek
title: Don't buy
content: Don't waste Ur money for that. I bought it in July 2019 after few months it's one side stopped working then I replaced it by company in feb2020. After few months it's again stopped working.this time I complained to company then company received product for replacement but didn't replaced I am still waiting for my replacement product since 1 month.

name: Binu C.
title: Value for money
content: charging cable USB C was damaged on receipt. Tend to get a bit uncomfortable in ears, after prolonged usage. Execellent battery life.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Extremely poor built quality and pathetic support team
content: Built quality of this product is very poor. The wire regularly gets detached from microphone box.. After use of few months only one side speaker stopped working.. Boat does not have pick up and drop facility for device after they get damaged.. My advice is to avoid this product and go for some superior brand

name: Faizan
title: causing pain in ears with buzzing sound
content: most important it is causing buzzing sound like a spark which caused PAIN IN EARS... and still continuing. mobile phone and bluetooth compatiblity .....not connecting properly. packing and colour is good. delivery good. sound quality has noise ...buzzing sound

name: Amit Kundu
title: Boat rockerz only not boat rockerz 255
content: It is not boat rockerz 255 because during connectivity it is connected by boat rockerz only. After connecting I heard you are connected with boat rockerz only...not boat rockerz 255. 255 not heard by boat bluetooth.

name: Yogendra Baghel
title: Boat product are getting short on quality.
content: Never recommend this product to anyone.. Previously used boat product which are more on quality but now they are just focusing on marketing.. I suggest boat should work on quality of product and not paying on advertisement to celeb.

name: Merolin L
title: Amazon customer care not response for warranty claim
content: Like : sound is nice. Dislike : product life span is very less around 7months only. now i ask warranty claim not support by amazon team also.. Warranty card present to company means they doesn't accept it also they replies get ticket from amazon after that only we check its own Boat rockerz 255 product. but amazon customer care is not support to me.

name: Nirvan Shivaji Tupe
title: Don't buy. Your ears will pain. I  regret it
content: Everything else is great but the major issue with this earphone is its very hard for ears and your ears will start paining within 30 mins of usage and i also tried all 3 earbuds which come from company but still the same issue. Also there's no refund policy from Boat only replacement will be given. So don't buy as I'm regretting my decision.

name: Maestro
title: Poor product and poor after sales service
content: Overall poor product. It didn't charged from day 1. It was as useless for me. Now the company has taken back the product in the name of warranty and is not giving me back my original product. Their so called phone number does not work. So if you are looking for after sales service dont go for it. It's a total harrasmsment. I would give 0/5. Poor service and poor product as well.

name: Mayank Maurya
title: Bass boosted
content: Sound quality is superb unexpected bass in 10mm driver. Noise cancellation is also superb. Again bass quality is excellent with bass boosted. Before buying this product I'm very confused between boat 255F and realme buds wireless but when I received this I was so happy after music listening 🎧

name: Sai m.
title: Budget bluetooth earphones for great experience.
content: Excellent quality and unique performance long battery life with less weight and durable elasticity, creates comfort to wear and as coming to sound great but not excellent as bass is heaveir then sound also to be same compared to it.

name: Syril Thomas
title: Audio oscillations during phone calls.
content: Build quality poor. Battery Ok. If phone call comes while watching videos oscillations are heard and sound becomes inaudible and fluctuating. You will have to disconnect and reconnect to get clear audio again. Using since 15 days.

name: Sona kumari
title: Just Go for it.
content: I got to know about this bluetooth earphones from a friend and got recommended by him. So its been 20 days since using and I could say that it is actually really good

name: Ratnadeep Paithankar
title: Good to go with this product. Quality and built is awesome.
content: It is as same as shown in picture. I am happy with same product. I received product which was faulty. But after reporting same amazon got it exchanged withing 3 days.

name: Dakshata Yashwantrao
title: Like this product
content: Boat rockerz 255 pro is really amazing headphones, battery life is so good, it's fully charge in only 30 minutes and you can use more than 8-9 hrs with non-stop music, calls etc. Amazon packing is not that good, i disappointed with the packing course there no safety guard around headphones.

name: Saurabh Tripathi
title: Mic issue
content: The incoming voice is clear but outgoing voice call is completely inaudible on phone voice calls. On watsapp it's audible from.both sides. I have replaced it once on Amazon thinking that there might me some product malfunctioning but same problem occurs in replaced product too.

name: SURAJCH
title: Awesome headphones quality
content: Nice headphone and battery backup is arount 6 to 7 hrs. But 1 droback this headphone ... Vibration alert call , msg not available..in this device.. Please improve it

name: ARUNA
title: Worst Product
content: Not even fit for one star rating... for few days it works well,then the problem start... Some time it doesn't connect to mobil even if I next to mobile... Sound nd bass qualities are worst.... Volume button issue is there.

name: lawrence dason
title: connectivity problem after a month..
content: After a month use it started having connectivity problems... and it got worse day by by day... try something else for this price..

name: Jaideep sharma
title: No noise cancellation, bluetooth connectivity is very limited
content: Bluetooth range is very limited. Literally no noise cancellation people on other side are always complaining about background noise. Volume in particular is very good also battery backup is good but no noise cancellation is hurting

name: pankaj chauhan
title: so overall it's an average product.
content: Strong bt support, nice sound, fast charging, nice look, light weight. its connectivity is quite good. I have uploaded two photos, one is when I used few days after purchased and second is after five months of used.

name: Ambuj K.
title: Can be Compared to Bose
content: I sometimes think that, has Boat made it accidentally or what. :D How come such deep bass in this price tag. I have Bose Free Soundsport, I sometimes feel that this one has deeper bass than Bose. But yes ofcourse Bose is Bose, in terms of sound clarity. 20times higher price. But still these two are comparable. Good work Boat.

name: Kalpana J
title: Best economic product
content: I found this product to be the best when compared with other Bluetooth earphones make of different companies and type before buying. All the features - sound and bass qualities in addition to voice cancellation are superb. I even recommend to my friends and relatives. Its economical with high performance, henc, why to buy costly item when this has all features.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not likeable
content: Didn’t find it up to mark. It gets disconnected repeatedly. Even ear buds are not comfortable. There was no return option so... although sound quality is good, but interruption is so annoying

name: Thomas CS
title: Excellent product with great quality and amazing customer service
content: Excellent product with great quality and amazing customer service. After 8months I had technical issue with the product, dropped a complaint to the boat customer service, their response was amazing, they fixed it within a month with free of charge since it's covered under warranty. They didn't even charge for courrier. So far the service and product quality I would give 4.5.

name: ashray
title: Worth for 1299rs not more than that
content: I got this earphone for 949 RS. It is worth for price. Sound quality is very good and bass is also very much high. And design and color is also very attractive. it is little bit uncomfortable for running. Because of very long size its bounced while running.. Good for gym and crossfit workout. You can buy upto 1299 RS.

name: Shovan Singh
title: Best all the time
content: The best head phone I ever had.Nice shape as well as the quality of this product is awesome.Sound quality top class, bass quality 1st class.Go and try it.

name: Amrites
title: Worst experience
content: I haven't used it for a month and already mic and LED indicator for charging are not working. I looked for nearby service center to repair / exchange as it is still under warranty but no luck, the nearest boat service center is 300 km away. Word of caution, check for service center near near you before buying.

name: G Biswas
title: Nice product
content: Everything is okay for me only problem is its ear buds. It's very painful when I use it in my resting time due to its design. Otherwise its bass is awesome. Sound quality is good

name: Balaji Balu
title: Waste product Don't buy this product
content: Waste product don't buy this product and don't waste your time and money for buying this product, with in 1 month repaired. Giving 1 rating also waste

name: Sachin J.
title: Good for calls but not for music
content: I think this one of the best wireless headphone at this price range, my calling experience was fantastic, other person could hear my voice very clear... but i feel the music quality is not at par hence i had to return the product. I would wish BOAT can improve the music quality.... Battery back is also very good...

name: Aster
title: Good for Music but not for calls
content: Works well. Nice Batter Backup, Audio Quality n base. Best for listening music but not for attending calls. Noise cancellation does not work. The call recipient will hear a lot of noises and even the distant voices so loud n clear as if they directly fed from like. Not at all for talking over phone. You can only use it for listening music.

name: Moin
title: Waste product
content: The quality of the product is very bad.. 2 months later after buying the product one if speaker stopped functioning.. Bluetooth connectivity is also poor while you are riding your bike.. Please don't buy this product instead prefer the mivi ones they are far away better.. boAt ven won't clear your Warranty even if it is warranty period.. Buy mivi thunderbeats which I am using currently.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Product is good but design should change
content: I ordered another product "Boult Audio ProBass Curve" along with this.. boAt Rockerz 255 Product is good but Design should change similar to Boult Audio ProBass Curve.. Auto-off is not available with this if we are not working for a longtime .

name: Vyoma
title: Good sound with less durability
content: The sound quality of the earphone is good. The base and the noise cancellation is commentable. But I am not Satisfied with the products durability, just usage of 6 months and one side of it is not working. I really am a BOAT fan, but this product didn't survive as per it's name and money. You will find better earphones in same price range or you may have to Shell out a little bit more. Overall rating is just above average for this earphones just because of the durability.

name: Mahesh
title: Post sales support is pathetic
content: Post sales support is pathetic, I brought this product on 1st October. Now i am facing the power on problem, this speaker don't power on though i have fully charged. It is switching on while charging. I am trying to submit the support request in Boat's website. while submitting the page says one or the other error and not taking further.. I am totally disappointed with Boat's support.

name: Vidur Dewan
title: Stopped working the second day
content: Got it in the prime day sale. Thought it would be a good purchase, Stopped working the second day only. They were only working when connected to the charging cable, quite ironic for bluetooth wireless earphones.. Focuses more on bass. The band is very weak but it was worth the price. Disappointed as they stopped working only

name: Satish Kumar
title: Just OK
content: Working fine. Individual has to adjust its rubber fins as per their comfort. Batery backup is not as per expectations. When fully charged, its will show 100%, later on it will show 80% but after some more use it directly surrenders for low battery

name: Viraj p.
title: Good one👍
content: Good product, I baught it for my dad but personally used it for 3-4 days excessively and caught no issues in sound quality, call connectivity, range or anything else, a good headphones.

name: manoj wankhade
title: Don't purchase
content: Product quality not good.

name: Manohar AL
title: Pathetic customer service
content: The earphone is average, with in 3 months my earphone can't power on. Customer service is pathetic. When u make warranty claim. Item pickup guys never come to ur house. Bunch of idiots.. Don't go for it.

name: shirleyann
title: Delicate charging point(rubber cover)
content: No doubt the sound quality is good, I bought two.of them.but one spoiled in just about 13 days and the other in about two months, not worth the price.The opening for the charging point is kind of attached to the.charging point and once my outside rubber broke the bluetooth gave way , the charging point also shook up (moved) and is not charging,.

name: Siddharth
title: Great product, great service, worth buying
content: Quality is very good in this price range. Bass is superb. I mostly use it for workouts. It does the job well. I face problem about noise cancellation as the other person on phone always complaints about unnecessary sounds from the sorroundings when I take a call outdoor. Service delivery from boat is amazing and satisfactory. They replaced my headphones after 3 months as one of the buds started sounding low.

name: Arijeet Saha
title: A Must Buy if you're getting it at Rs.899
content: I got this on 30th sep 2019 for Rs.899 the black colour verient the build quality is ok interms of price. call quality is really good if your device is in close range the sound quality is where I'm not fully satisfied the bass is ok but the vocals and instrument sounds are not that clear it feels like the base is suppressing the vocals and other instruments sounds.. But I have to say for the price of Rs.899 it's acceptable.

name: shilpajaishankar
title: Not satisfied with the product !!
content: Initially thought it was good and bought later on realized that my boat earphones is creating problem like auto disconnecting. And even if it's connected it's showing disconnected ..few times i have faced audio issues . it's not even 6 months that i have bought the earphones and facing all these issues

name: Ranga SAIKRISHNA
title: Value for money
content: Battery life is good.. Sound quality is good.. There is no additional sound cancellation feature for this product like senhizer, Bose..etc.. But its value for the money.. Bass is good at this price range.

name: Kumar sanu
title: Too long wire
content: The earphone is OK, OK. Sound and bases are good.. but the worst thing is the wires are too long, as compared to other brands.. it feels like a semi wired earphone. And it keeps hanging when we are not using it. Otherwise it's very good.

name: Sushant Kumar Dubey
title: My boat rockerz 255 sports is dead in 15 odd days
content: The sound quality was good but my rockerz lasted for just about 15 odd days. Suddenly it started getting charged and not responding. I am in a different city now. Not sure how the product warranty is going to help me

name: mainak ghoshhajra
title: Be careful. Its not the BOAT headphone you want to buy
content: The product starts giving metallic sound after one week. . Too much interference in GSM band where mobile network coverage is not very strong.. I am not able to use regularly this issue.

name: Rahul P.
title: A very good product
content: Sound Quality : The sound quality is very good... Good baas... At higher volume the bass tends to overpower the vocals but at this price point the audio quality is very good.. Battery life : takes around two hours to charge completely. I do not use it continuesly but it can give you around 6 hours of music playback and talk time included.. Durability : around the neck design allows the earphone to be used freely... making it tangled free... durability of the wire is also very good.

name: Shivi
title: Replacement Warranty not honoured
content: Earphone stopped working after 3 months. Service center people refused to entertain warranty claim as it was purchased online and not in any shop. Avoid!

name: Cherian, P
title: Good for audio and video, horrible for calls.
content: The audio quality is good when it comes to songs or videos. The only problem is with phonecalls, the audioand mic degrades quite horribly and I almost always need to turn off the connection and use other means.. This was a major inconvenience over the lockdown period when you needed to have meetings over the phone.

name: Madhu
title: Just ok not so great
content: Overall 4*. Not reached my expectations. Boss quality not too great. Buld quality also not so good I orderd total 3 all are different colour. Just k k product @ this price range. I got it for rs 1170/-. If u are redy to pay more than this price go for realme or oneplus z

name: Amazon Customer
title: Decent build quality and sound
content: The product has decent build quality which makes it durable. However the cable is too long which makes it look a little weird hanging around your ears. Battery drains quickly. Sound is amazing, perhaps the USP of the product. Not good for bike riders as wearing a helmet gives pain in the ears.

name: K.M
title: Worth the money
content: One of the best products in the 1000 price range. Good battery life, sound quality is awesome and very effective noise cancelation. The only issue is with Bluetooth. Doesn't have a good enough range. Sound starts cutting off after only 1.5 meters of distance from phone/laptop.

name: Abhishek Kumar
title: Nice headphone
content: Good headphone, decent sound quality, good to look but had been better if the neck portion would have been foldable/flexible wire, so that it could have been wrapped and kept in a pouch

name: ninad sathe
title: Honest review.
content: It is good earphone , that gives you good quality sound, bass and notice cancelation.. I got it in 899 and I think it is worth buying.. Range is not too much, not longer than 10m. I have dought. about its battary back up.. Now you can buy from other sides too at same cost.

name: SUNDARAVADIVELU
title: Battery is little drawback
content: Battery life is ok only 60 to 70 percentage.. within two days to three days it's getting drain.. but anyway charging time is not too much.. just in a hour or less than a hour it gets charged.. sound quality is awesome.. wireless option is so free feeling when compared with wired headset.. thanks

name: Vaishnavi
title: Faulty product delivered
content: Faulty earphones delivered twice, even after a replacement. The other item sent to me was faulty too. Charging suddenly drops from 80% to 0 within 5 minutes. There was no refund option available after the replacement. 999 wasted

name: Deepa
title: Same error right earpiece sound is low when compared to left one.
content: Same error right earpiece sound is low when compared to left one. I think most of the reviews post this only. Boat have to equalize the sound delivery properly to the each earpiece

name: Biplab
title: Waste of money
content: Waste of money, it doesn't fit in my ear, battery doesn't last half an hour also,.. very low quality products ...I never uses at all now it's complete waste

name: Sushant Kumar Jha
title: Not worth it.
content: The bluetooth connection is not very stable. The sound quality is below par with no noise cancellation at all. I understand that at this price tag, you can't expect much, but the least you expect from an earphone is a good sound quality.

name: Nishant
title: Stops working in about  2 months consistently.
content: Stopped working 4th time in 10 months now. 3 times i have sent it for replacement. Takes an average 20 days to come back after replacement by boat. And now boat has discontinued pickup and replace from doorstep service for this model, so inspite of the product being in warranty period i cannot use the service . If u want a product that will last a maximum 3 months then do go for it .

name: Pranjal Rastogi
title: great earphones
content: Sound quality is awesome. one gets a perfect blend of treble and bass. The battery backup is also adequate. Overall at this price point, it's the best.No other earphones are in competition at this price point.And Thanks to Amazon for its speedy delivery under this pandemic condition

name: Amazon Customer
title: Wondrous
content: 100%good quality.Keeps boat s standard.Wonderful sound experience.When watching a movie it provides theater like surroundings. Waterproof. Fantastic battery life. Within one hour it will be fully charged. ANY one can buy this product. Its is good quality fine product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: It Was An Defect Peace
content: This item which I bought is a defected piece. It works well for me for the first one week later it's not working as expected. Even as per the product description the product is not giving that much charging also. So It's a dummy piece. I didn't expect this kind of worst product from the AMAZON. AS PER MY CONCERN NOW I DON"T DRUST AMAZON any more.

name: SANJOY
title: Worth of buying
content: I liked the brand as it serves the product as exactly as it describes in the package.. Besides it is easy to use and provides complete nirvana as the brand claims to be. Buy this product, specially when you get any deal or offer when the price will be around 999/-.

name: Aditya Sharma Espada
title: bad for gym
content: Its hard to do bench press wearing these earphones. also the wire is too long.. edit :. one side not working so I sent it for replacement. it's been 2 months and no word from them.

name: SS_all
title: Great headphones
content: Excellent product in terms of usability, easy pairing, lightweight and great noise cancellation. Longer battery standby time is also very helpful. Sound quality is nice, all tones are equally heard, no distortions.

name: Saurabh
title: Sounds really good but durability ???
content: This product comes with best in class sound quality. The bass that it delivers is just prefect. But on the other side the product does not lasts long. The one I purchased had a problem in the left earphone in 10 months. Good thing it was in warranty of one year. But what if it happened in the 13th month. 🤞🤞 It's good but is often interrogated on durability. Choose wisely.

name: Bisu
title: Good Quality at Price Range
content: Bought two for me and my wife. We are happy with its performance. Charge lasts long enough for a day. Sound quality is good. This headset does not do much noise cancellation.

name: Sandeep Kumar
title: Not durable, facing issue after few days of use.
content: After 10 days of use, voice gets low on left side earphone. Company should atleast make a durable product that can be long lasting. Just after few days, i have to go to service centre. Pathetic experience.

name: rohith kk
title: Excellent product at a great price
content: This is simply brilliant. Sound quality is excellent. Noise cancellation is really good. It really blocks out the surrounding noise very well.. Worth the money? Definitely yes. Two thumbs up for this product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sound/mic quality is not good
content: Sound quality is not good. Sometime facing connectivity issue. Mic is not good. I am also using boat wired earphones but mic quality is good but in this item mic quality is very very bad.

name: Lucky
title: Don't Waste Your Money
content: Even its price is less but it has worst sound quality.. Thanks to Amazon for returning it otherwise my money would waste.

name: Sakshi
title: Very disappointed by earphones and BoAt
content: It worked great for 1 month, but after that right side of earphone stopped working. As it have 1 year warranty, I informed customer care, but they didn't even acknowledge my request. Very very dispointed from a reputed company like boat. If you don't want give warranty don't mention it. Not gonna buy again from boat.

name: Shikha Asthana
title: Bad choice. Money waste
content: I will not recommend this product. It has very poor battery life. When on call, voice keeps breaking & sometimes gives strange noise. Bluetooth range is also poor.. It has been 2 months since i am using this product & it has started to show its true colors, even when it's charged it keeps disconnecting from my phone.. Not at all satisfied.. I would suggest to go for a better brand.

name: Sanup
title: Good but....
content: Good product so far. got this product yesterday. I have given a 5 star rating on this, but there are somd demerits also.. 1. Length is the main disadvantage of this product. It seems odd... 2. The size of ear buds might be a major problem. It might be painfull in future.... Update when i find more problems...

name: Upendar
title: Compare to JBL in this price Boat rockz. Super and I recommend it
content: Sound quality is good, Bass is excellent, noise cancellation is little bit poor, if u charge 1hr , no need to charge 24hrs even I talk more than 80+ calls, music play time I don't know.. I dont have time to listen music ,Compare to JBL in this price Boat rockz. Super and I recommend it.

name: Rahul Patil
title: Not Genuine\Tampered Product
content: I have received a tampered product ,single pair of additional earplugs , there was no cover on the charging point of the headphone ,the finishing on the body was not like a genuine headphone , returned request has been sent .thanks to Amazon

name: Parameswararao
title: I bought it for 999, very good product
content: Writing review after 9 months of usage. dont buy these headset go for mi sport. these are getting problema very frequently. one side not working. But i like the boat service. they are replacing the product. and one more annoying thing is it will take about 20-25 days to replace product. my head set got dameged for 2 times and replaced it. too bad quality. coming to sound quality,base, and battery its unbeatable for any other company.

name: Golu
title: Nice earphones
content: Everything is good at this price range, just one thing I didn't like was the length of the wire, boat should provide more long wires for the earphones as it hangs on your ear and neck, rest everything is very good, happy with the product😀🙂one more thing is the quality of calling is not so nice, you can't hear voices clearly...

name: LINTO C P
title: DEFECTIVE PRODUCT
content: No Battery back up even after full charging. No light indicator for full charge or no charge. It's working only if the device is connected to a charging port. No proper return policy. There is no option to replace the item with another brand, so i am forced to return it and compromise with the same brand which is no near my expectation. Go for a better brand.

name: Dinesh Madne
title: Pretty cool product with only one drawback.
content: Pretty good product. Clear sound.. Only complain I have is every time you turn it on it announces "hello, power on. you are now connected to boat rockers". Consider this announcement when you are halfway through in an important call and are connecting to Bluetooth now. Not that other parties hear the announcement but you don't hear anything from call while the announcement is on.

name: Jampana parvathi
title: Good product in that price range better then realme
content: Good sound quality and battery backup is around 7hrs. Quality of product is awesome. But connectivity to late

name: Amit
title: Average product
content: If you ask about sound part. Just Awesome! Bass and vocals both on point and clear. Simple and classy look. If you talk about connectivity , it SUCKS !! Every time there is some distortion due to connectivity and keep getting disconnected. There is some issue with battery also. One time it will show 100% then 80% then off... Sometimes it comes till 60% then off..

name: Sayan Das
title: In 899 best wireless headphone, vocal is very low thats the problem.
content: I bought it in 899 only. In 899 you will get this kind of product which is really great. The bass is really high,you can't hear all the instrument because of this. Otherwise it is a great wireless headset.. Boat is really good in mid range market love it😍🤗

name: Paras Upadhyay
title: BEST AND LIT
content: Please go for it. Worth every penny. I enjoy my every workout.. Thanks to the boat rockerz. And also pairing is and so is functioning. Will update after using more time. And yeah the wire is a bit long.. Appreciated if it had been a bit short

name: Debaditya Sen
title: Budget Bluetooth Headphone
content: Boat Rockerz has a great range of products and this has not disappointed. Sound quality is good. Battery life is average but one of the main problems is the buds drop off accidentally after some time and it is very dificult to find replacement or spares.

name: SGPR
title: Very good!
content: We have been using this for several months now. Flexible, easy to use, and has good sound quality.

name: apurv
title: If you require it for calls then dont buy!!!
content: The product is good in terms of music quality, base, treble everything is sorted but a huge drawback is. THAT THE PERSON ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE CALL WILL HERE ALL THE SURROUNDING VOICES CLEARLY & TOO LOUDLY EXCEPT YOUR OWN VOICE.

name: Pritesh kumar
title: This is very very bad products due to right side speaker not functional
content: This very very bad item, frist time purchase this item and has sudanly returned due to right side speker is not functional. Then after again received above item by me but again few days facing this problem means right side speaker automatically stopped and not run....so this is bad product

name: VIGNESHWAR BALKI
title: Amazing Worthy Long Battery Headphone
content: Boat is very nice product in This budget..! Amazing Sound clarity . Also 10hours of Playing and 150 hours standby charge. With 110mah... Bass 10/10. Vocal-Treble9/10. Battery 10/10 ... I prefer black because of rich look... And Volume and Track keys... Nice.. Great Boat team.. I got for 899 in offer Thanks Amazon..

name: Pramod k laxman
title: Warranty claim
content: The sound quality etcs are awesome but after 7 months my right side earphone stopped working.guess wat I claimed my warranty,zero charges were applied and I got a new product from company. Great service form boat. guys no loss for your money

name: prateek advani
title: TORN OACKAGE WITH EAR WAX ON BUDS. DAMAGED PIECE
content: Recieved a damaged and a used piece from Amazon. Pathetically disappointed with this. Already it was difficult working from hime now have to wait longer just to get a replacement. The package was TORN, EAR WAX WAS ON THE BUDS LITERALLY FELT LIKE PUKING. specially when there is a pandemic going on.

name: Omkar Mangesh Gotavade
title: Received fake used boat product with ear wax in it 🤢🤮🤮
content: I ordered boat 255 pro in 1099 rs in offer but, I Received fake third class used boat product in that earphone speaker has some ear dirty wax🤮🤮🤢 omg worest experienced from amaozn no accessories in that box only that fake product 0 rating to the gross product 🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮

name: Amazon Customer
title: Disapointed
content: Got same brand earpods that works amazing but this product is just a waste of money. One month and in left ear u cant hear anything if volume is low...

name: devansh sadhotra
title: Thumbs up for sound , double thumbs down for battery
content: I reduced two stars from my average, because of its battery life , it lasts for 4-5 hours . Worst part is , at one moment it shows you battery 80% and other moment its keeps on repeating , "oops , battery low " thats the most irrigating part .

name: DVM
title: Not recommend to buy this product
content: On my personal experience with this product is not good . It worked good for few days and all of sudden issues are coming like sound goes off and all of sudden again start , Now a days the sound is not clear.. All together not recommend to buy this product

name: Abhirup Ganguly
title: One of my favorite gadget
content: Original,exact colour matched,nice bluetooth connectivity,noise cancellation is very good,super grip with ear even when you are running or doing exercise,easy operations.Sound quality is also up to the mark at this budget level.I just loved it.

name: prashant vaibhav dixit
title: Value for money. Best in its price segment!
content: I bought this in amazon sell with sbi card in 900 rs. First, the bass of sound is very good.noise cancellation is good. All other features like buildup quality, ear fitting, etc are above average. Not bed but don't compare with costly one. Finally one line- good one batter then all other brands up-to 2000-3000. Value for money if you buy up-to 1000-1100.

name: Rishabhraj Pahare
title: Packing was worst. Earphone are good. Worst microphone ever
content: If you guys looking for playing pubg.. Buy it now. Only if your phone has Bluetooth 5.0. Than only it will not lag in gaming. And earphone are good in sound. Package delivery was worst. With any protection cover or carton..

name: Pushpam Kumar
title: Battery backup is not good. Bass is not at all there, you will feel some treble nothing else.
