content: The worst audio product I have bought untill now.. Even on 20% battery left, it starts giving out battery low sound। The battery life is really bad of this product। It runs out quickly and you need to charge it. I'll recommend people to avoid buying this.

name: Dipti
title: Okay product.
content: The product is good but the bass isn't upto mark plus it's not working now. It's just been1.5 months and one side of the earphone isn't working all of sudden. Since warranty period expired couldn't do anything.

name: nelson
title: Not sure
content: You can use atleast for three months.. which will follows by damage of one side ear piece usually the right side which happens in two of what I bought and another of my friend. Battery no doubt it's great. Can't connect to two mobiles or devices.

name: Mayank Goyal
title: Rockers rock!
content: Pros:. 1. The sound quality is great. 2. Bluetooth is awesome. The range is great on it. 3. The battery life is ok. But can be improved. Cons:. 1. The calling sucks. The people on the other end either doesn't hear us, or there's too much disturbance.

name: Chittranjan D.
title: Poor bluetooth connectivity, best noise creation, do never buy
content: 1st we can't keep our phone in even trousers pocket or it will lose bluetooth connectivity..too poor bluetooth connectivity.... 2nd instead of having noise cancellation feature its having noise creating features..whenever we talk through this earphone another person will listen all other sounds except your voice..I have experienced it and putting request for return...it's not at all useful.

name: Dar
title: Good sound quality and durability . for music lovers perfect thing to buy under budget.
content: Like the sound quality ,and durability of the product, should have been better if the design of the earbuds were like of that of iphone earbuds, once inserted in ears you will not be able to hear outside sound.

name: BILAL
title: Good for the price
content: Sound quality-Good. Battery life-Good,gvs 5-6hrs back up. Battery left percentage doesn't works well,at the 5th-6th hours when battery is totally about to drain, percentage indicator still shows at 40%

name: nikhil Choure
title: boat rocketzz are the beast.. amazing
content: fantastic one , what a sound quality,so good. battry almost 6 hours as promised.. My nokia c2 -03 is so old for it ,but its playing it quite well.... recommended, worth price, nothing better than this in this much price

name: Nirbhay Jadhav
title: Boat Rockerz Details...🤙🏻❤️
content: Boat Rockerz 255 Is Amazing.. Sound Quality Is Best.. Value For Money.. Powerfull Bass.. Design Is Best And Black Colour Is Best.. Very Comfortable And I Use Continue 7hr.. Battery Life Better But Over All I Use This Earphone in 60% Volume So Battey Life Are 9hr Easy On.. But One Problem 10mm Connection This Are Problem But Anyway Is A Best Wireless Earphone Neckband.

name: Shaik afroz
title: Not charging sound quality not good
content: Waste bluetooth I hate it...not charging and sound is not correct....if Im connecting to my mobile sound quality is slow once I switch off and switch on its geeting...but twicely I have switch on it charging fort is not good...waste boat bluetooth I hate it.not even 1 month I purchased it

name: Milan Abraham
title: Best product at this cost in terms of sound quality and bass. But not so handy in usage
content: The sound quality is awesome. Noise cancellation is also good.. Battery time is about 6hrs. But there is a rapid jump from 60% to 0%.. The main drawback is that it is not handy. The neck band is plastic like material so that it cannot be carryed is pocket. Carrying them in bag is difficult.

name: Purvang Pandya
title: Great Quality in the given budget
content: IF you are bass and Treble lover, these wireless earphones are for you. I bought this for Rs 1499/-. I m using it with an Iphone and i enjoyed the output.. Positive part: Great Design, Good output for given budget, Noise cancellation is good too.. Negative Part: I experienced Bluetooth connection disturbances wile exercising, U need to use equalizer settings if u do not love Bass and treble.. Overall it is a good product....

name: Muneer
title: Collapsed...worked well for only 4 months
content: I had purchased this on May 2019.. now it's October.. collapsed.. even though it has no noise cancellation on phone calls and big disturbance on calls, it had performed well for other like listening musics and others till last month. Then problems comes..first voice breaking during calls then voice breaking on listening music too..now right ear piece is not working at all..

name: Ratna
title: Quality is poor
content: Quality is ver poor. Within days voice from one speaker is gone ....same has happened with earlier one also . Sound is good but oy for few months .Inside bluetooth connectivity is good but if u walk outside ...connectivity is not that good . If u keep ur mobile at ur pant pockets .

name: Arindam Mukherjee
title: Received 2nd Hand Headset from Amazon
content: I had to struggle with this device...recently bought it for my one plus 7T handset...the quality and the make of the device is average with not very soothing sound output. I got it replaced but the replaced device was a 2nd hand product given to me as a replacement from Amazon. Got surprised and upset with the customer service approach from Amazon.

name: Tarun Kumar
title: Good but hav problem during calling
content: Item was great in all perspective but it was not compatible with my pocco x2 as during calls my voice doesn't reach other side clearly it was very low that I hav to speak very loudly to let other side understand what I m saying

name: Sreedhara SG
title: Nice but could be better
content: Enjoying the device since once month. Ear buds can be of better quality. While inserting make noise. Blue tooth connectivity voice messages are irritating and are lengthy.

name: Akhildas
title: Recommended
content: Really a great product at this price. I am writing this review after one month usage. It's sound quality is awesome. The meterial is also very good. Both batery backup and charging time is good. It's really a nice product for daily usage.

name: sunil m k
title: Need customer support
content: Left side of the ear phone is not working now and now the return gate is also closed, o don't see any option for service of this product, this is worst experience with amezon they simply take money from us for prime membership and cheat us like this, btw this is the first thing I bought after primememberahip

name: Alakesh b.
title: Awesome 👍🏼👍🏼
content: Much better than my other pair (boAt Rockers 400). And these are a lot less bulky too. Connectivity is easy and battery life is good for the price. Google assistant works too. 👍🏼👍🏼

name: Shahul
title: battery backup was not good
content: sound was good nd battery backup worst becoz sometimes it suddenly over the charge and it will automatically switched off if we continuesly use headache will coming due to ear buds

name: Jugnu
title: Value for money under 900
content: I using this from 3 months,. Battery is good 6 hours backups.. Sound Quality is Very Good.. Comfortable with 👂 is good after using someday.. Noise cancellation is not working.

name: Kunaal Goswami
title: Superb must buy
content: One of the best product I have used so fart at this range what is providing a very quality and this product is just it's fantastic fantabulously fantastic..... Must bye

name: Jithin M. Thomas
title: Old, used , damaged item received
content: I got the item I ordered, but I got an old product. It is full dust, the cover on the charging port is not visible, I got the packet is broken because the round seal broke and there was another glue on the outside. And the left side of this headset is not working also.

name: harsha
title: Nice at begging but it became worse after useage of 4 months
content: While iam doing jogging or workout at out door it was keep on strucking or suddenly stops. After useage of 4 months while I was on a call suddenly it was disconnected and not able to call through earphones I had to switched to ear mode. Iam not satisfied with this product

name: Kamal
title: No Suggestible
content: After exchanging same problem still there.. Some kind of disturbing coming while listing music or on call.. In this price i m using cheap product.

name: Master
title: ROBOT VOICE DURING A CALL. DONT BUY
content: Poor quality, don't buy. This product is coming with lot os noise distortion during a call. You can hear a robotic voice of other person.. The replacement product is also having a same issues. Dont buy.

name: prasanth
title: The product was damaged within 4 months
content: The sound quality is great, cheers for that. BT is fine as well.. But the build quality is low.. The C type charging pin got detached from the headset board and I was not able to charge it after that. It was a disaster. I had to buy another product within 4 months. Low quality built.

name: Tapas Paira
title: Good product at this price but interference with wifi
content: The product is good.. Only issue, it has interference while attending calls , the mobile wifi access fails to work.. Same issue while attending audio conference from laptop.

name: Akansha Joshi
title: Not working properly
content: i have ordered this earphone on 29th September 2019. after using it for 8 months my earphones not working properly. so the life of the earphones is about 8-10 months only. disappointed with the product.

name: Lokesh Darne
title: Best value for money Bluetooth earphones
content: The best Bluetooth earphones in this price range. I get almost a day and half of listening to music and several calls as I moderately use it along the day. Fit is awesome. Sound quality good. Bass best in the range. Battery best in the range. Bluetooth connectivity fast AF range is weak though. I bought in a sale for 999₹

name: Amit Yadav
title: One side speaker stop working
content: Vary bad , one side stop working within 2 month only and my return window is closed. Is that product is under warranty? Needs to check . Disappointed

name: prince bajaj
title: Right side earpiece is having 0 sound
content: Overall product is good, but one earpiece is having no sound now, this is the main problem, not expected from boat such quality problem. Please change the headphones and give me another one as there is product issue within 2 months

name: bala a.
title: Expected a Better Product from Boat.
content: It's been more than a month, the sound quality has turned worse from best. . Sound quality is worst when i tried to increase the Bass. . While on calls, it's Bluetooth connectivity is low. I had used Boat earphones in the past . Wired earphones are the best in terms of sound quality . But this one . I am sorry . May be I ll have to buy a new bluetooth earphones soon

name: Ram Durgesh
title: Everything is cool.. but for just 6 months :(
content: I would have given it a full star rating provided it hadn't troubled me at least for an year. I'm really surprised how do all boat headphones work only for 6 months? It's better to spend on any other local bluetooth headphones that are available at sub 400 bucks :(

name: Amazon Customer
title: its good but......
content: Sound is awsm. But problem is you cant use inside helmet+ connectivity(range) is an issue. if you keep the phone in your pant then almost no sound. battery backup very low. 1 out of two stopped working after 6 months.

name: Hiren t.
title: Don’t buy this toy
content: Bass quality is poor. Sound quality is not good. Battery back up not good. This is good for calling and watching movies and series... My opinion: don’t buy this:). There only replace option , non returnable , non refundable product

name: Madhur Garg
title: Good quality earphone, best to be max ROI
content: Been using these for the last month now, I am satisfied with the sound quality, even the battery life is good. I had read only good reviews about it and I must say, not faced even a single problem till now. Would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a decent quality earphone with an optimized price point.

name: Amazon Customer
title: product is good, Packaging was worst and not safety.
content: I ordered this earphone which i received was good, I ordered one more for my friend, that one packaging was worst earphone also damaged. I replaced same one again package was very bad and not safe, light scratches on the product. Its really a good and worth earphone, send it with good package.

name: Gowtham
title: Dont come for popularity only.
content: I already have boat 510. It is just amazing in sound. Bass, durable and battery 🔋 life too.. So that i went for boat 255.. But it is too bad in battery life. Sound nd bass quality is also not upto the level of boat 510.. I just totally disappointed with this boat 255.. Just go for another. Dont come to it for its popularity. Cosider zook and Boult products in this price range.

name: Shweta J M
title: One of the best wireless earphones in this price range
content: Writing this reveiew after using it for close to 2years. No complaints till now performance wise. Only thing need to be improved is the design of the in ear support piece, it keeps comin off. So deducting one star. One of the best wireless earphones that I have used in this price range.

name: kavi
title: worth the penny
content: Purchased in the month of Dec and it is still good. 1. Sound quality is awesome. 2. This s treat for music lovers.. 3. If u r driving also, you can wear this headset, no distortions, clear music.... 4. Long lasting Battery life. 5. U can attend calls, call to the recently dialled in numbers and if you have enabled, unlock Google assistant features from mobile, you can directly call to contacts

name: Abhishek Kumar
title: Good but not better than Realme Earbuds
content: Boat rockerz is good in sound quality, connectivity. But when it comes in comparision with realme earbuds, then the boat lacks behind. In Realme earbuds if bods earbuds are connected with magnet then the audio stops and it saves the battery of the earbud. But when the earbuds of boat are connected with magnet the sound does'nt stops.

name: neha kumari
title: Defected product be replaced imdtly
content: I m a prime customer of Amazon but such like of defected product has been delivered to me which is not appreciable. Request look into tha matter and arrange to replace with authentic product immediately.

name: Anshu A.
title: It covers all the sounds in the surrounding and ends up into disturbance in the call for other
content: Mike sensor should be improved, the person we are talking with can listen to every single noise so clear be it traffic , water, horn so badly loud and this makes it impossible for him/her to listen to what I am saying.. And Bluetooth range is also not ok till next room I can't go without phone

name: E. T
title: It Saved the day for me...🤗
content: Good quality...strong build quality. It fell down on a train platform accidentally and got stomped on by kolkata crowd. I had lost all hope of over getting it back in single piece, surprisingly it took no damage except two little scratches. I am writing this review after this incident.

name: Bikash kumar sethy
title: Bas Sound Quality Good But sometimes over phone voice very low  opponent couldn't here my voice
content: Product is Really Good sound quality also good but somthing while playing music voice automatically Cracking for 1/2 minutes i don't know why it's happening sometimes instead i disconnect bluetooth i and reconnect it then it worked well... BoAt Should fix this issue.

name: Koustav
title: Sound okay but connectivity issues;
content: Started malfunction after a three months.. Getting disconnected frequently which makes it useless, soon to take place in e-waste garbage!

name: Rahul Bhairat
title: Not as expected
content: I expecting better than old boat 255 bt this pro version is not so good as boat 255. So i suggest that old boat 255 is best than 255 pro.

name: Chandan Gupta
title: Connected & Disconnected frequently so worthless

name: Jaganathan
title: I strongly recommend this for music lovers especially bass lovers
content: Good headset. Value for money. Bass and music lovers best choise. 2 mobile connection with the heatsdset at the same time is really a great option.. After 9 months of use, oneside speaker was not worked. I registered a compliant in boat website. Immediately they pickup and replaced new one. Really it's awesome customer service. More than value for money. I strongly recommend this one. Love it

name: Arpit Garg
title: Great sound but not a 5 star product.
content: Battery back up is the only problem, and these does not vibrate when your phone rings, so if your phone is on silent/vibration and you have not plugged in the earpiece, you will not know your phone is ringing. So ultimately these need to be in your ears all the time, which is a pain.

name: Ajo
title: A ok product.. suggested for daily use
content: Well it’s good product for this price.. Sound clarity is good.. but not that great when compared to few others.. Battery back up : I was able to use it continuesly for 5 to 6 hrs.. You have products with even more battery back up... but for the price.. it’s worth for daily use.

name: Kamal
title: battery backup was not so good
content: Product was ok but not so good only bass was good.after use of 5 days I found that the earphone voice was not working in some apps & earbuds is in bad condition, battery backup was not good.i can used only 3 hr in my fully charged wireless bluetooth.

name: Arvind
title: Good for the money
content: Hi guys....the product is good. Gives a battery backup of around 5 to 6hrs and takes nearly 1hr to 1hr 30mins. You can use it while working out in the gym. The sweat doesnt affect the device.. There are some issues with the product. You can hear some disturbance many times. Bluetooth connectivity range is around 5metres only.. Overall a nice product at this price range. You can go for it if you are in a tight budget and also want a branded product.

name: Abhay bhadauria
title: Best in segment
content: Best investment I have done in wireless earphone till now. It offers great bass with noise cancellation, pairing with phone is way too easy. Battery backup is also good . If you are lover of edm and heavy bass music then this is for you go for it

name: durga prasad
title: Worst product deliveryed
content: I am not expected from this product.I have been used this from 2 weeks , now. Changing issue as reflected .I am trying to change not working .There is no chance of return option for this product because as per return policy only 10 daystimeline. .Coluld please help about this issue.

name: Maya Nair
title: Doesn't fit in properly
content: I don't have any particular negative reviews on this, except the fact that it doesn't fit into the ears properly, at first, it kept falling off and even now, occasionally I have to press it to make it fit in there. Everything else is up to the mark.

name: vivek gupta
title: Bad product
content: Battery life not good. Also if battery going 60% then one beep sound comming repeadly in every 10 second and after 15 minute bluetooth going shut off ..I would recommend don't buy this product

name: Abhinov Singh
title: Recommend product

name: S@5m
title: Too good
content: I m writing this after using for 10 months ,. One of the best earphones available . You can buy this without giving a thought.

name: Arvind Soni
title: Worst product

name: Sathish c
title: Boat 255 one side is not functioning.
content: With in few months one side of head set is not working. I am not able to find service centre in chennai and in online centre green and black model is also not displayed for selection.

name: Suraj
title: Go for it guys... 😍 It's given u verryyyyy good sound 🔊 quality...
content: I don't expect that the boat will gave me like wonderful product i really appreciated those who use other brands in low price range plzz go on boat it gives u a amazing sound 🔊 quality. although I'm using this approx 1 month ago.. & i don't face any any problem so... Trust me guys go on this product... U will 😍 love it...

name: priya2reply
title: Good for the price!
content: For the price these are good, the sound quality is decent, not awesome noise cancellation, but at this price this is one of the best in Bluetooth. The battery life even after using it for 3 months is very good, i keep them on the whole day and recharge them at night.

name: Rajkumar Madanalli
title: Cheap quality product 😭😭😭

name: Rajesh Pawar

name: Tribikram Pati
title: Highly recommended

name: Shivlal Yadav

I sent mail to imagine marketing id but no response. It seems that they have only faulty product. Also replaced product in warranty is used one. Worst product don't buy it.

name: Barkha Bhatia
title: Big Scam And chinese  product

name: Avinash patil
title: Excellent product by boat
content: Amazon and boat has a great quality products.. 1. Sound quality 5/5. 2. Noise cancellation 4/5. 3. Bass quality 5/5. 4. Battery backup 4/5. Boat headphones has great quality and a trusted company with customer support,. Battery will we around 5 hours for continuous usage.

name: prajpkb
title: Received faulty product
content: The product looked fine when I opened it. But it didn't sound well. Sound was leaking multiple times. I used it while jogging and I couldn't hear a single song perfectly. Disappointed.

name: Raj Kumar
title: Worthy 🔥🔥🔥❤️
content: I have mi Bluetooth earphone compare to that it's really awesome bass & noise cancellation perfectly work🔥🔥🔥 value for money I buy this product 999 RS ... Go for it guys ❤️😎

title: Not bad but need to improve
content: This boat rockrez 255 wireless Bluetooth headset bought from Amazon but it doesn't work with two device at a time when connecting a laptop it rejecte mobile when connecting mobile it doesn't support laptop this is very bad and aslo when a incoming call receive ringtone sound coming out from the phone not from boat rockrez it's taking to much irrigation when hearing from the boat rockrez ear paining few minutes other wise not bad at all

name: A.R.Mohan Raj
title: Excellent product

name: RISHI
title: Sure...
content: Good one guys... Go for it. Haven't used much. Bt 1st impression is good, especially bass quality.. Value for money

name: Vijayalakshmi.L
title: Worst!!
content: Don't ever buy this product!! I bought two of them in which one was defective I returned and replaced that with a new one.. The new one also has the same issue. Boty of them after two days it is not working properly.. I am unable to get refund also. They are providing only return and exchange option!! My kind request please don't order it!!!!!

name: bhiku
title: One bud stopped working after 3 months

While it has good sound quality, it is really fragile. I kept this in my office bag for my daily office travel ; used mostly while in commute. After 3 months one bud stopped working.

name: Vinny
title: Used and damaged product.
content: 1. Used product. Very dirty. Scraches every where.. 2. Colour mismatch. Black instead of Navy Blue.. 3. Ear buds damged.

name: Chirag Chauhan
title: Good earphone in range of 1100

name: Sushmit
title: Bad
content: Its not good as Its been only 5-6 months.. and the right earphone is not working now.. Can someone guide from where i can go for replacement or so?. I'm fed up now.

name: ROHIT PANDE
title: Good sound bad microphone.

name: AB
title: Value for Money

name: Gaurav Joshi

So, its not worth the Premium Price paid.

name: Selva
title: Very poor quality

name: Gaurav
title: Not at all satisfied

Becomes irritating many times, had to be removed due to bad sound between telephone conversations.. 4. doesn't fit good to the ears, it starts paining after a while.. I don't know why this is so popular product, its just useless. Money wasted.

name: RajarajanJayavelu
title: Mind blowing purchase👛💰👐
content: Excellent quality product 👍. Mind blowing battery🔋 backup. Every penny is worth 👌. Thanks for providing this type of extraordinary product 🤝

name: Sagnik Mazumder
title: Value for Money
content: A very good product. Very lightweight as expected. You can't feel anything you wearing. Sound is very good. Crystal clear sound. Noise cancellation is good. And bass quality is awesome. I am highly recommending this product. At this price best sound quality.

name: avinash
title: after two three months one side was not working, my opinion not prefer this product
content: Actually all are good but the product after two three months one side was not working that is the main issue. I claim my warranty they send new product but again two three months got same problem(one side not working). i replaced three times after warranty i don't know how to claim, so what iam telling i think all products have same issue so i'm telling u don't buy this product.

name: mohammed
title: Unable to claim the warranty. Worst customer service and product too
content: My Head phone of left side is not working. I am able to listen from right head set. There is no proper contact number of Boat to get the replacement. This product has one year warranty.. @ Amazon. You should never sell the product when there is no response from the vendor for the replacement. I have emailed but no response. I will go to consumer complaint soon and I file a case

name: HIMANSHU SINGHANIA
title: Awesome Headset.
content: I bought it again for my friend.. This headset is very good at this price. Awesome bass and noise cancelation. It looks so sexy. This is a cheap and best wireless headset. I loved it ❤️.. Go for it blindly.

name: Vaishnavi Gawade
title: Perfect sound balance
content: Perfect balance of bass and treble at this price range. One of my earbuds did stop working after about 5 months, which was expected with the amount of use that I've gotten out of these, but were easily fixed (if you know where the fixing needs to be) and of course if it's within warranty you're all set.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Awesome Product
content: Wonderful Bluetooth Earphones for the price, the sound quality is equivalent to my wired LG earphones and the fitting is good too(my wired boat earphones used to easily slip out of my ears) and for the durability will have to test for at least a month, for now they look good

name: Ankit Shrivastava
title: The other side person will not listen you properly during the call, you have to lift up the mic.
content: During the call, the other side people will not hear you properly you have to lift the mic and hold it till the time you're speaking. also there is no direct contact between PH and headphone so you can't play the FM. Rest is all gud. Sound quality is better.

name: FRANCIS RODRIGUES
title: Joy of Bluetooth
content: Fast connectivity.. Noise free sound.. Well fitting & comfy ear plugs.. Quality of sound good but BASE tends to be stronger.. 9 / 10 score

name: Akanksha Singh
title: Good deal.
content: Pretty good deal in what price I bought it for. Won’t its something very best, but for daily and rough uses it’s good to use.

name: B.S.GIRISH.
title: Third class product.
content: This product is just opened now. Totally used one. Cheated... No Charging cable, Earphone missing a grip,only one pair spare earbuds. Totally waste. Avoiding is better.

name: ashutosh pandit
title: Poor battery, okay sound quality , sound is not punchy , it's muffed.

name: sarath
title: Turns off automatically ,complaint after two months of use
content: After two months of use, I am reviewing this. It automatically powers out and not able to switch on. Have to long press the power button inorder to switch on but automatically powers out when i retrive my hand.Please help me sort it out.

name: CatchCoupons
title: Nice but facing some problem
content: Everything is fine , just found 2 problems,. 1) mic is not too sensitive, sometimes i have to put mic near my face.. 2) After using around 1 month, the battery is draining very fast.. Maybe its a problem. Trying to contact customer care, hope they will listen to me.

name: Arun Kumar Singh
title: Do Not Buy Boat products from Amazon.
content: Bought Boat Rockerz 255 bluetooth headset. Product stopped working withinn 8 month of purchase. Boat rejected my claim for replacement /refund citing incomplete invoice detail provided by Amazon. I will never buy Boat Products from Amazon

name: Ankur agarwal
title: Connectivity problem
content: I purchased the product for 999 and I don't find it that useful as the sound doesn't come even when the phone is in the pocket. What is the use of Bluetooth headphones when Bluetooth doesn't even work properly.. Need a lot of improvement only keeping high rates doesn't make a product good. But when the phone is in hands it works properly so I particularly don't find it that useful.. Overall a below average product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Pathetic customer care service
content: Started malfunctioning from the next week of purchase. I have not expected quality so much poor. Also, it has been 15 days after sending it to the service center but there is no any update. Also if you try for customer care it will not connect. Please requested not to buy. Waiting for the repaired product.

name: SV W
title: Pefect product
content: Using it for One Plus 7T Pro.. Its compatible and no sound lag while using. Battery back up is also good. If you are looking some bluetooth in ear headphones under 2K INR, go for it.. best budget and quality.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor Quality Headphones
content: The product is faulty and has started giving me problems in the 3rd month itself.. The Bluetooth gets disconnected automatically and there are freequent disruptions while trying to use the head phone on voice call.. Overall very bad experience and I would not recomment anyone to buy this prodcut.

name: Kriti
title: Facts
content: This product is highly disappointing. Please do not order this. They show some other pictures to us and in reality there's something else. Walk out and take from retail shops they are way more better even if they charge more. But they don't give us fake product like this. Highly disappointed. Never expected this from boat or Amazon.

name: MILAD MEHMOOD ZARGAR
title: Not good for calling
content: I would give full marks to the sound and bass quality. But the earphones struggle with the calling services. Sometimes the caller does hear the voice and there is lot of delay and that is really annoying and irritating. Unsatisfied while using the earphones while calling and won't recommend for that

name: Deepthi
title: Sound quality isNot as expected
content: Sound quality not as expected. Used boat wired ear phones earlier. Compared to that it is not effective. Old piece having issue with left side after using 1 year. But I preferred boat again because of quality,but disappointed with wireless piece.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good Bluetooth earphones
content: I bought them for Rs1490, but if u can wait, u can buy them during sale, at that Time u can get them at Rs 900 to 1000 only. But itis good value for money. It is the first Bluetooth earthphones I have bought. It's sound quality is great.. Noise cancellation is good, not completely cancels but nice, sometimes I use them just to lower the outside noise.

name: Ashish
title: Excellent Service from BoAt
content: BoAt is very trusted brand. I received genuine product but after 7-8 months of usage one side of earphone stopped working and I raised a ticket for the same within 7 days the defective earphones were replaced by BoAt. You can trust on this product it is good🙂👍

name: Bhavesh Sheta
title: Don't buy this product
content: This product is cheap but not of good quality.. Noise cancellation is poor,. Connectivity is also pathetic,. Switching between devices is just awful.. Last battery is not so durable.. Material is also as per the price.

name: Abhishek Ray
title: Good VFM!
content: Got it during Great Indian Festival sale. It is absolutely value for money. Have been using wired headphones all through...so these provide me real ease of use. Connectivity is good.I don't use them much for calls though but for music it is great. It is best for bass heads. I am not sure of using the same on 2 devices at se.time as have never used this feature. Thanks AZ Prime for promt delivery!!

name: Arjun
title: Good but not happy
content: The sound quality is good, stays firmly on the ear and battery life is decent. But, the turning on and off and battery low notification with voice is very annoying. The battery notification that appears on the phone jumps in large increments and is unreliable. Also this is unusable while running or riding as the audio gets distorted a bit under shaky situations which is I guess is the biggest flaw.

name: Abhigyan kumar
title: It's a decent product
content: When you buy this product and use it for 2 to 3 weeks the overall bass,sound quality is good but when you use it for 2-3 months the sound quality gets badder and badder and its only 6 hours playback so that you have to charge it regularly and when compared to other bt earphones this is not good one

name: Bellam prabhu
title: Failure on battery life indicate on mobile
content: It showing battery ℅ backup different on mobile, it shows full charging 100℅ then we playback songs or videos up to 2 hr then it shows 80℅ after 1hr also shows 80℅ then suddenly shows 60℅ after 30 min shows 40% and few minutes shows 20℅ after 5 minutes shutdown earphones. It failed for showing percentage of battery life...

name: Aaditya C.
title: Think before buy
content: Okiesh pro duct at price of 1k.. Major problem is its sound quality is too much terrific. Bass is boosted with use of software configuration which reduces the quality of sound. Only usable for calling . If you are music lover you can't hear for more than 1-2 songs .. Amazon return service is best.returned product in 2 days.. Buy Mivi thunder bits instead .. it have better quality...

name: Lavanya
title: great product but too long neckband wires.
content: The product is great at this rate(999/-).. Bass is awesome.. Quite good noise cancellation.. Battery backup is fab.. But the wires connected to neckband are quite too long, it keeps floating left-to-right while walking(if u haven't plugged into ears & it's simply hanging by ur neck) and makes ur walk uncomfortable/weird.. Still u can go for it. Company made no compromises on quality.

name: Sivaram.R
title: Backup time only 2.5 hours
content: Product is just ok. Drawbacks: 1. Back up for only 2.5 hours only. Tested even it was just bought. Now after 3 months of usage coming to 2.15 hrs approximately. 2. The neck piece of the set is so thick and the length of wire is long then the need ,which overall looks not handy and flexible.

name: sahibjot
title: The best in this price range
content: I go to gym wearing these earphones. Sound quality is good and they didn't stop working after a rough use in gym. Sweat and weight, they have gone through it all and still working. Adding this review after two months of use.

name: sanyukta
title: Poor poor poor product 😢
content: It has a loud sound, that's it... No bass no trebble nor noise cancellation... Wires are unnecessarily long for a Bluetooth headphones... Useless item that can't be return... I desperately want to return the item as I don't want to keep it.. I bought it yesterday.... Better option is SONY WC100

name: Anuja
title: Not happy worst Bluetooth device

It was properly working at the beggining but now when I am in a call its frequently disconnecting so for that I need to restart the device again.. Similarly when I am listening to music.. Its disconnecting again and again. This is very irritating. So expensive things are not even working for 1 month. Dissapointed.

name: Varun Deva
title: Good Product.. worked 1 year..
content: Awesome Product. Used 1 Year 2 months.. Now stopped working.... Bluetooth connects and fine. Both the side not hearing any sound. Buttons are working fine.. 1 year worked with no problems.

name: Pavan
title: Don't buy 😂

If you're looking for a device with longer run time then this isn't the right one. Though it's cheap and offers great quality in the beginning , it won't last longer than a year.

name: Prachi
title: Not expected such bad product from Boat
content: Pls don't buy this product. Within one month of purchase it's mic stopped working. Since product was in warranty, on taking it to service center they replaced the product, but the issue is recurring even in replaced product immediately after replacement.

name: Manoj Kushwaha
title: Nice product
content: Pros:-. 1. Sound quality exellent.. 2. Battery backup good 7 to 8 hours but it's intial days.. 3. stylish and light to wear on neck.. 4. I got it at 999 rs only. Cons:-. 1. previous and next buttons are missing, which are even available in Chinese scraps. 2. Mic not working good, have to speak louder or repeat.

name: Shreedatta Patil
title: Best earphone with mic
content: Best earphone with mic nice sound quality, noise cancellation best other people notice that you talk on mobile or earphone....most important hands free if your long time talker or working in office then this is best option to do multitasking.. Around my 5 friends using same product no issues 2 earphones are 6 months+ old no complaints.

name: Bubesh Kumar
title: BADLY DESIGNED ..NOT RECOMMENDED

name: Shital Kumar Lohani
title: Its a so so kind
content: Liked it, but not up to the mark, while you are on call, the other guy will hear lots of noise, which will in turn make you to connect to the phone again instead of boat device.

name: Ankit Maurya
title: Only for music, not very comfortable for calls.
content: Soud Quality is Ok ok. Bluetooth connectivity for single device is good.. Cons -. Connectivity with devices has problem sometimes.. Noise cancellation is worst.. I get robotic like voices when I am close to metal body even though my phone and earphones are just 1 feet away.. Same happens if on call when connected to two devices.

name: Datania Sachin Kumar Dashrath bhai
title: Kindly Change My Boat Rockerz Bluetooth Headphones
content: Not A Bad As I Expected My Boat Rockerz Bluetooth Charging Pot Are Not Working Red Light Is Not Showing, Many Time I'll Try It, Even I'll Change Different USB For Charging, But Almost Finished, Show I Want My Products Change Or Replace and Better Give Me Another New Boat Rockerz Bluetooth That's It, Amazon Online Service, Always Support Them Customers, Your Faithfully, Sachin...

name: vishal
title: Good sound quality bt low product quality
content: Noise cancellation is zero. Call recipient always complaints that lots of background noise at my end whenever I use this earphones. I am using OnePlus 6t which has best noise cancellation feature.. Today, post 19 days of purchase, charging nt happening, led not turning red or blue, heating up in a minute while charging.. I don't know where to complaint and get this replaced.

name: Abhishek Hegde
title: right ear piece stopped working after 6 months
content: when i first received the buttons were very very hard, even if i press also it was not taking, and then had to return it and got an exchange, and now after 6 months, the right part stopped working suddenly

name: NikuNj Totala
title: Go for it if you need true bluetooth earphones.
content: NOT BAD.. BEST BLUETOOTH EARPHONES IN THIS PRICE SEGMENT.. NOISE CALCELLATION IS EFFECTIVE TO A EXTENT. SOUND QUALITY IS GREAT.. BATTERY LIFE IS AWSOME. LAST UPTO 6HRS IN NORMAL DAILY USAGE.. WHAT I EXPECT IS A COLLAR CLIP AT THE BACK SO THAT WHEN YOU ARE ON BIKE WEARING A T SHIRT IT WIIL NOT SLIP OF FROM NECK.. BAKI TO SAB THIK HAI.

name: ANOOP VM
title: Over smartness of microphone is useless.
content: noise isolation is good. But when we are in call or recording something, microphone catches even very small sounds from the surroundings. This will be very bad experience for the user at other end. I think this over smartness of microphone is useless. Otherwise this will be a very nice product in this price range.

name: Aryaman Utekar
title: Sound Quality good but bad product Quality
content: Bass is best. Noise cancellation is enough. Battery backup is also enough.. But quality of this product is not that good.. Within 6 months, one side of my earphone stopped working and after few days even the other one stopped. Custom support expects us to go at the nearest office for claiming warranty.

name: Prasanna
title: Worst service, don't believe in warranty and reliability
content: Mic not working in two months and then power on issue later, sent for warranty but more than 120 days still no warranty replacement provided and not giving any feedback. Keep on following them but not responding my ticket : 1186969

name: SAJITH A
title: Excellent product from boat.
content: Very good boostup crisp sound with a decent bass.Time consuming for Bluetooth connecting with devices in some time. And seems to be a decent battery backup headset. Currently this headset is using in every online meetings. I am writing this review after using 4 months.

name: sunny kumar
title: smart buy
content: The product as a buyer i am fully satisfied .. and if u ask me whether to take or not i will say go for it .. at this price i can say its the best you can get ... the sound quality is quite good .. Bluetooth connectivity is best part of it you can hear around whole house so you don't need to take phone while you're in home .. and noise cancellation is moderate .. overall excellent product

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good! (°  °)
content: Sound is not that good. If you are a bass lover don't buy this but. if you are mainly going to buy for online classes calls ect it's okay. Excellent product for calls, workout

name: Sagar anasune
title: go for it..🔥💯
content: Simply go for it with no 2nd thought. It's value for the money ...Sound is clear and loudness is enough even in crowded areas. Phone calls are good and no irregularities in voice reception. Overall satisfied with this product from BOAT 😀

name: Mohit Singh Samra
title: Worst after 5 month and they don't giving warranty
content: 🖕🖕Worst products I purchased boat rockerz 255 active black after 5 it get defective... When I applied warranty for it then didn't reply my mail, call, and registered for pickup they said dilvery is not available at your area and no services centre available under 50 km.. they don't reply.. then what I do...😤😤🥺🥺 please help me.. anyone 😤🥺🥺😤

name: Gaurav Shah
title: Excellent though short lived.
content: Somehow, the life of the earbuds is very less. While the company immediately exchanges the product, you have to take the pain of going to the service centre and do the formalities. Wouldn't want such additional stress.

name: Kunal Jain
title: Worst service
content: It was good device, but charging point broken after 10 months , tried contacting boat no response on warrent tried calling them sent couple of mails no response did not expect this at all

name: Sameer Khan
title: Not good for calling

name: Amazon Customer
title: No Noise Cancellation
content: No Noise cancellation makes it difficult to talk on call mic capturing too much of background noise, speaker is good

name: V E S RAMARAO
title: Best product in this Budget at 1500/-
content: The sound quality, bass and in-built mic are awesome. But the only reason I gave 4 stars is because I was not satisfied with the packing service by Amazon. The product could have suffered damage in the way. So I advice to take care of the packing quality.. Hope this review helps you. Have a Nice Day!!!!

name: Madhura S Hegde
title: Need replacement
content: We had booked 3 pieces of boat Bluetooth devices 2 red and 1 black. Box which had black device was damaged and bar code label wasn't found. But found those in the red devices. We worried about whether the black was original or not. We have opted for the replacement and kindly replace with the new black one,if not we are ready to approach Consumer Court. Please replace the product as soon as possible.

name: Mac
title: Great Product
content: As expected makes life easy with two BT pairings with a single device, Voice clarity is good but Noice cancellation is not as expected. Otherwise Great product for its cost & better then competition

name: Rohit
title: Base rockerz
content: I have been using it for past few days, sound quality and call quality is good. Sound is highly emphasized on base, so base lovers will love it. The only problem I give 3 stars is that there is a connectivity issue. When we play some videos or music the audio comes out from the speaker even though the earphones are connected to it. That's the biggest flaw. Otherwise it's a great product at this price point.

name: Ankit grewal
title: Valu for money
content: The quality is ok as this price but i ll suggest spend more and buy one good one m not that happy with bass and noise cancellation

name: Abhijeet Nayak
title: You can try
content: Quality not upto mark but the sound is better than the Realme buds.. The power buds when magnetic locked should have shut down the power of the earphone. Moreover the battery backup is upto 5 to 6 hours on continous run.

name: suraj
title: Good sound quality..Worst connectivity range..
content: This product has the good sound quality...but if you're looking forward to use this product in gym,then this is the worst because of the range. You can't even go 4 to 6 feet away from your mobile.. Even though this is a Bluetooth headphones but still while working out you will have to keep your phone in your pocket...

name: Manoj Ambi
title: Very bad  product Big disappointment.very bad customer Service
content: Very very very bad it's been only 3 months and it's one earphone is not working . One year warranty is useless no service centre service is there for help only waste of money. Let me tell you that don't buy this. Yes it's true that it's the best product you can get for the price (I doubt that) but definitely it's not the best product YOU should buy.. Big disappointment..... 0

name: Swati Thakur
title: Great for the bass lovers!
content: Only recommended for people who like the base a little too loud and enjoy the pop and rock as the sound in this category plays a dominant role and not the audio. You can’t really enjoy soft music on this.

name: Puspesh jha
title: overpriced
content: Sound/voice breaks when you use it while brisk walking , running ...also voice/sound breaks when you keep your mobile in backpocket . Good to use when you use it at still position .. Should come with aux point & cable so that can be used while it discharges

name: AKS
title: No product support
content: Pathetic product. Charging port broke within 2 weeks of use. Customer care didn't reply to email. No one picks up the phone. Don't go against your common sense to buy a product that comes without any support system.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Headphone is not working
content: I have purchased two wireless ear phones in the month of August 2019.one is working fine but the second is not working at all. This product is under one year warranty. Please help to replace this product asap

name: Techtric
title: Good n quality product
content: The product is good and battery remains for 6-8 hours if u use continue.... I've problem is only with voice breaking... Sometimes u will heard breaked sound... Adding this review after 4 months

name: Santhosh
title: Audio does not switch automatically between calls
content: The audio does not switch automatically between calls, when try to switch manually also it takes speaker as default, having bad experience

name: Pawan
title: Stopped working within 6 months
content: I was super excited to get these headphones but it stopped working today after almost 6 months. There right ear piece has stopped giving output.. Don't waste your money and time on this.

name: Bhavani Pradhan
title: Good earphones at this range!!
content: Sound is good, Noise cancellation is good, some very rare time the other side of person is unable to hear my voice which may b due to my mobile network not sure. One thing designwise i wanna mention here which i little feel uncomfortable is the size of the earpiece which bulges out so much tat when wearing Helmet it gves a lot of pressure inside the ears from the helmet and it becomes air tight 😐 If Boat can make it little sleak or small in size!!

name: Yuvraj
title: Low quality
content: Ear locks are easily fail out,funnest thing is its not available in market if you lost this ear lock.. i lost one of my earlocks.. tried to search online, local makets shops. No one is having this.

name: Amazon Customer
title: After 7 months of use Happy to become a Boat family
content: After 7 months of use i am happy with the headset. but when the right side ear piece was not working i have raised a complaint to boat site and they have replace the entire headset. It takes 3 weeks for the process. But they have replaced the entire product.

name: Shubhajit
title: Worth it.....
content: Pros-. 1) very good bass in this price range.. 2) Mic is working perfectly well.. 3) Easy to carry due to less weight.. 4) Easy to use in gym.. Cons-. 1) Battery life is less than 6 hrs.. 2) Wire length is given more.

name: Archana
title: Good bass and clarity
content: Overall good product in terms of sound quality and bass. Though the cords a bit too long, keeps on dangling , could have been a little more less in length for more stability.

name: Rupankar Mahanta
title: Good buy
content: Good quality headphone. You will feel that your money is not wasted. Buying a headphone without hearing is tough. I went with boAt name, and was not disappointed.

name: Salil
title: Really liked it
content: Overall this product is excellent. The quality of sound and earbuds are awesome. Really liked it. Only reason for not giving 1 more star is that sometimes it have disturbance in connectivity. I think this is some bluetooth issue. But that happens rarely. I'll still recommend this product.

name: Gomji
title: A decent headphone to buy
content: Well till now I had used it very roughly , the sound qualiy is good bass quality is also the same which u get through regular boat headphones noise cancellation is good overall the pro model is better than what I bought the normal one

name: Pushpendra choudhary
title: Fake boat
content: Fake product, don't purchase it.. Connectivity issues are always there and no customer service provider from boat will help you or replace the product... Worst service, worst product.. All money wasted in ads. By Bollywood celebrities no money invested in customer services... Fake boat products and services.

name: Nilesh Parit
title: Less value for money
content: I had ordered this before 1 month. After using this I realized that its sound is little less so I need to play the music on higher volumes. Its sound quality is good but sound volume is less . Bass quality is also not satisfactory.. My previous earphone JBL C100si was much much better than this.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sounds nice
content: It connects effortlessly via bluetooth... The response is also good unless you're playing pubg there's a second delay in response... Other than pubg the sound response is good..

name: Prerana
title: Not happy, need replacement or refund.
content: This is happening second time to me on buying Boat 255 rockerzz..earphones stop working at any given point of time randomly,gets disconnected from the phone, even battery life is shortened..

name: MOHAMMED SHABAAZ KHAN
title: Not poor but good
content: I bought this wireless headset in great Indian festival ok for 899 but u can go for Boult good in sound quality 800 only. Boat is also good. The choice is yours.

name: Thanos
title: True value for money
content: This is 2nd time in a row i purchased the same product in 3 years, first i bought this 2years back but that got damaged due to my fault so again i came to search for any other good one i can't find any other perfect products like this in this price, so again i purchase the same product

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very very Bad Battery life
content: Battery life sucks 😑.. Works only for 1.30 hours after full charge. Update:. Even after full charge works for only 15 mins. Send product for exchange and it has been more than 20 days. But didn't get any reply from boats team.. Worst service they don't reply to emails or phone calls.. This is my ticket no.519897. Hate it never buying boat products 😡

name: Dondapati Rajesh Chowdary
title: Average
content: Just bass Is good other that it was worse. It lacks of instrument separation & when we kept the phone in pant pocket song will breaks(it will play like a loose connection in the wire). If you are in outdoor and taking calls you had to put mic near your mouth otherwise outdoor sounds will be heard by another person instead of our voice.

name: Santosh
title: Average product
content: This is a average product . you will get better sound, battery life and small footprint on Artis BE301 with in same price range. I have purchased both of them and quite enjoying using Artis 301.

name: Arun Mozhi
title: Not Much As Expected..
content: Not an disappointing product, but i expected more after reading previous reviews of this headphone ,. Good sound quality and bass, good battery backup .. But connectivity was not as good , it's randomly disconnecting and connecting.. Bluetooth range could be better.

name: Surya kamatchi
title: MARVELLOUS 🤩
content: 1. First of all the built quality is marvellous..... 2. Wire is strong and has the best color for our choice. 3. Noice cancelling is great has it works for me. 4. They also provide additional buds in three different sizes. 5. They have one year warrenty.... These are all in my opinion so the decision is yours...🙂✌

name: Sonali Singh
title: NOPE! These blutooth earphones keep SWITCHING off when I'm in the middle of using them !!
content: What's the point if the earphones keep SWITCHING OFF ON THEIR OWN WHILST ONE IS USING THEM???!!!

name: HABIBUR RAHAMAN SEIKH
title: Could be better
content: Battery life disappoint you it's only 3-4 hours in full sound, sound is very clear and bass is awesome, at the price it's a fabulous product, if you want it for riding then its not for you.

name: Nikhil S
title: USELESS PRODUCT. NOT WORTH THE MONEY AT ALL.
content: Not worth the price I paid. I bought it looking at the reviews. But I believe it's useless.. Sound quality is very poor. It's deep and not clear.. No noice cancellation happens. The plug support are so very low quality that my ears started to pain because of its hardness and non flexibility.. The string is too long which hangs out upto your tummy.. Useless product. Do not buy it based in reviews.

name: Anu
title: NOT DURABLE
content: I used this product for about 3 months. It was very good. However. after that it used to get disconnected frequently and also could not retain the power for long. Now with 6 months this is not in an usable condition.. Please do not buy this product and get duped.

name: Sourav Hazra
title: Bang for the buck
content: One of the best budget Bluetooth headset. It has a decent amount of bass, a bit lacking in volume. The passive noise cancellation is great. The product is definitely worth it's price. The delivery was fast too.

name: Rahul Singh
title: Overall ok but...
content: Sounds quality is very nice...it has a good bass and the build quality is also nice considering it's price but the range of connection is very poor... Even if it is very close to the device the music gets cut a little which is annoying sometimes. Edit: I exchanged the one I received with a new boat rockerz 255 and this one has no issues. The one I received earlier was defective...Changed my rating from 3 stars to 5 stars😃😃

name: Sunil
title: If u got budget than go for other products.
content: In 999 its a good deal in this price range.. Fits good in ear .. But voice breaks down in middle some time. Battery backup around 4 hrs .. I used infinity they have better voice quality n good battery backup.

name: Swapnil Singh
title: Budget friendly
content: I guess this is the best bluetooth earphones you can get in this range. Only after service of boat is very poor. Otherwise all good.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Super band, but very less area coverage
content: The headphones are pretty good, but the distance it covers is very less. As soon we move out the area immediately it disconects and when we reaches back to attend a call, we will have to reconnect it again or attend the call without headphones.

name: Vishal
title: Does not connect 2 devices simultaneously and mic quality is poor.
content: Does not connect to 2 devices. Once it is paired with one device can't pair with any other device. Mic doesn't work properly. The other person can hear but with very low volume. Also when on call people can hear the background noise louder than the person on call.

name: bhavya sharma
title: Very Good
content: Good headphones at such price as I purchased it during offer I got it for 999 only... Using since one month .. it's a very good headphones and worth the money..

name: Achyuth
title: DO NOT BUY THUS PRODUCT
content: I am not really happy. I bought 2 earphones and both are defective. Amazon and boAt both are unable to help and solve the problem. Worst service from Amazon never expected this kind of service from Amazon. Please do not buy this product. Products are defective when you buy during "Sale on Amazon". I give zero rating for the service and product bought on Amazon

name: Dharmendra Singh
title: Not sure if duplicate product was delivered
content: Product was having battery issue from the beginning and used to have unusual sound disturbance even when battery was more than 40% charged. Earphone used to get heated a lot while charging but I ignored this problem and continued to use the earphone. Now the product is melted due to overheating. Lost ₹1500 . Pathetic

name: Arunima Mishra
title: Product review
content: I bought this product three months ago, and until now I'm satisfied with the performance. It's battery life is amazing, one single full charge can last upto days if your use is average hours per day.. Sound quality is good bass is little on the low side. It has water and sweat resistance, makes it very easy for me during exercise, without the fear of damage to my product.. It comes at an optimal range, buying it is win-win.

name: Rohit Nigam
title: Too much bass, but rest is fine.
content: I'm not too much of an audiophile but I do look for proper instrument separation, clear vocals and a good bass.. The bass is really overpowering. If you're into that, then great but I honestly hate it for that.. However, battery life is great! And seems pretty durable. Fitting is good, with 3 bud size options. Pairs easily.

name: Shraddha
title: Worst seller and product
content: dont buy it.. i have purchased this in may 2019. i was getting an issue in left speaker in september2019. i have submitted for replacement. it will take one month to come back. again now i am facing an issue with button like i am not able to pick up the call if i press the middle button then it is getting disconnected. so again i am putting for replacement. dont buy from this seller.

name: Dinesh A
title: #FraudBoat.
content: Boat is fraud company. Some headphone works perfectly but there many defective products. If you claim for warranty they will get the product and they won't return it. There are lot of complaints like this in Facebook and Twitter. Don't buy anything from boat.

name: Bp
title: Good Headphone
content: Headsets are good as i am using them from past 3-4 months The only problem is that you have to keep phone in your hand always as when i even go to other room it get disconnected

name: Sanjay Kumar Dasmohapatra
title: A must for all 2 wheeler drivers to take calls and listen music on the go
content: Excellent product with good sound quality, voice quality, call is clear with air noise cancellation while driving. Blue tooth connectivity is flawless. Easy to use.

name: samiran manna
title: Buy a light weight headphone
content: Please read it before you buying. 1. Sound quality is good but not loud enough. 2. Battery is good. 3. Bluetooth connectivity is good. 4. Wire is too long. But the main part, it is a headphone and you should put it on your ear, but believe me after using 10 min you feel pain in ear, frequently it fall from ear, it is not light weight so it irritating your ear and head. So please buy a light weight headphone to do the main job.

name: a.venkata sreekanth
title: Value for money
content: Just opened it tested with 8d audio and it did well and tested noice cancelation and bass quality with the help of some of the youtbe videos it passed all of them successfully overall nice product worth for what you pay its just my first day working well

name: Kiran Kumar
title: Nice Product
content: I have been using rough and tough from past 2 days. Surprised with the battery back up. I used it with my iPhone 6S and macbook pro. Had issues connecting with macbook pro, but eventually thanks to Google. Bluetooth connectivity is a little bit of concern. But overall a thumbs up for the money i have put it on.

name: knm
title: Average sound, good battery backup.
content: Overall build quality is good. Sound quality of earlier purchase 6 months back is much better. In this item, the Bass is good , but boomy and treble is less prominent. Battery backup is excellent. Overall sound quality is average.

name: Mihir
title: Go for it
content: Under 1000 best deal ever. Just go for it . Worth a penny. But above 1000 you can go with infinity glide 120. Not much difference but best deal.. Bass :4.5/5. Clarity:5/5. Call quality 4.5/5. Comfort :4/5 because of heavy earbuds(metal). Metal buds , flat cable so. Durability:5/5

name: Hardik
title: In 999 rs
content: This is best bluetooth earphone product in 999-1100 rs Category. Awesome sound quality.But not Comfortable while running. It's ok While doing exercise in gym.. Charging Time- 1 hr. Battery backup-More than 6.30 hrs at 60% volume. Belive me 60 % volume is more then enough.

name: abhishek singh
title: Don't buy. Worst product
content: I am writing the product review after i got replaced. This product sound quality, bass is nice. But its range is worst. Sometimes it gets disconnected from device, its battery performance is pathetic. I strongly reccomend not to buy this product.

name: Anu
title: Value for money
content: Got this for rs 999. Such a steal! Although battery life should’ve been designed for more than 6 hours, I got no other reason to complain. The red colour looks really good. Go for it.

name: Satyam Kumar
title: Review of Boat wireless earphones 255
content: Bass is so good and sound quality is awesome.. Mic is working properly and captures sound very clearly.. Highly recommended. I bought it in 999. Best wireless earphone in this price range.

name: Nihar
title: Dont blindly believe online reviewers..
content: I was Totally confused since youtube reviews says that it has overpowering bass. But its just right amount... Mids and lows are decent to just keep the volum at 50 to 60% and everything works like a charm... Overall satisfied with this purchase..👌

name: Arpit Mongia
title: Great sound, great battery, bad noise cancellation.
content: Great sound, great battery backup but zero noise cancellation. Very useful during calls mic is so clear, the other person does not know that am on an earphone. If noise cancellation was there it would have been the best Bluetooth headphones. No doubt in that.

name: subhash
title: Very bad product duplicate
content: This product are duplicate cheating to coustomer please don't buy this product mic is very poor quality if you calling some one this time external voice loudly hearing iam suggest to Amazon this seller to blacklisted so iam late for returning the product

name: Nam
title: Stupid battery
content: Built quality is fine.. Comfortable to use.. But the there is prob with the batterey.. It shows 100% for a long time and then suddendly drops to 60% and after that in no time it's dead.. So sometimes its frustrating

name: Avani Masuria
title: Average deal
content: Overall its a good deal in the price given. I think the noise cancellation could have been better.Also if you use continuously battery doesn't last more than 4 hours. At times it becomes irritating as despite having headphones you wait until you go back and charge it. Did not help in long travelling hours. Keep a wired headphones with you if don't want to be bored when the battery goes off.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Average
content: Quality of the product is fine at this price range. However, it automatically disconnects from phone during calls if you get another call waiting. This is disgusting.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Nice product with great sound quality
content: I have purchased this product 2 months ago now after using i can say this nice product in this range...sound quality is good, just need to improve battery life bit more,once you charge you will get 2-3 hrs maximum backup.. You can add only one device at a time although there are other Bluetooth headphones comes with dual connection.. There is no magnet or any kind of knot so you have to be very careful every time when you are not using

name: Rudhr Sharma
title: Awesome battery Life
content: This neckband is so amazing and it's battery life is so good that I had brought it yesterday and haven't charged for 1 day and a half and it's battery life is still 40%.i know you would not believe me but this is the truth. It's worth!

name: mohan durga sathish
title: Excellent
content: Got this for 999 during a sale. Comparatively a better product at this price segment. Lasts more than 6 hours. The build quality is good. Can pair devices at once (you cannot listen to both,but you can swap when you get a call). Worth the price.... 👍

name: Batraj Naveen Kumar
title: Bad service by boat team😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠
content: Earphones are good. But it had a problem after 6 months and I returned the product as it is in the warranty period on 30th September,2019(when navrathri started). It has been 2 weeks but my product reached Mumbai service center from then the product has not replaced and now Diwali is coming and my earphones are not coming.......☹️. Very pathetic response from boat team.

name: AG
title: Excellent earphone . Charging wire too short
content: Great earphones! Best one according to price IMO Excellent bass noise cancellation and Charging is quick and playback is long. Deserves 5 Stars. But! The charging wire is very short it is barely 4-5 inches long so keep that in mind spare ear plugs something also given . 4 stars

name: Pragya s.
title: I like it
content: Very nice product i like it. They are working in proper condition till now. I am giving very late review but working properly right now

name: Arkadipta Das
title: not good not bad
content: Overall its a good headset.. but it have some major drawbacks.. as a music lover i felt that the bass is good enough but the other things are a bit low. and while playing pubg and using voice chat it automatically reduces the surrounding sounds and i can't hear footsteps and gunshots clearly.. so i think these two are a major problem.

name: vips kumar
title: Worth the price
content: The product is highly light weight, suitable for joggers & gymnasium freaks. Also since it is Sweat proof & water proof makes it highly compatible with the above mentioned users. The bass is terrific. The noise cancellation is up to the mark. Supports Google Assistant with a one second press of the power key.. Got it for 1499 just a little over 24 hours of order.. 'v'

name: Sangpal Zamare
title: Claim Warranty
content: Hi i have purchased boAt Rockerz 255 Sports Wireless Headset Bluetooth on 23-Oct-2019 within 11 months the left earpiece has stopped working. my product is covered under warranty.so kindly replace the product on address -pratham society building No.'O' 2nd floor flat no 202 talegoan dhamdhere pune -412208.

name: Prashant
title: Excellent Product
content: Loved the product....Excellent sound quality, impeccable battery backup and extremely comfortable in usage....In short a big surprise for a minuscule price.....Got it for INR.999.00/- with additional bank offer of 10%....

name: mohd Shariq
title: Bad call quality, average sound and good quality material
content: Bad call quality with a lot of background noise which makes the person on the other end impossible to hear you. In terms of listening if fine, sound quality is average. the best thing about them is it's very convenient to carry and battery life. Buttons and overall product raw material quality is good.

name: Mohit Patel
title: Good
content: Sound quality awesome and has Super Bass... But suddenly one day after 3months one stopped working and I couldn't not get the service center in Delhi... So I not able to use it properly

name: Pragun
title: Awesome buy
content: Must be one of the best products in the price range. No issues, good build, n does not hurt ur ears even if u wear for a longtime. Good sound quality.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Better luck next time
content: Sound quality is great, everything is fine... The only problem is the durability.... It struggles to last more than 2 months, its nt only with me.... I have 3 of my frnds having the same issue... Adding on top of it, the warranty and replacement is a time gulping process... I have been following up with the team just to get an uodate on my ticket,. Beware of it..

name: Parth Parmar
title: Worth 4.3 star
content: I have been using d product for a week V Good call quality , too heavy bass , can be corrected through equaliser of music player if u don't like too much bass like me. One side of wire gets visible due to its outer layer doesn't fit the plastic perfectly .. i have used celotape to cover an fix it .

name: Raman Rajpoot
title: Please Don't Buy this product consider any other
content: Review after 12 days uses.. Very Poor Battery performance. Bass is average. Song Next & Previous Function is NA. Please don't buy consider any other best.

name: Sahanur
title: Just go for it
content: I dont know why people complaining for bass.. Actually it has a very rich bass, (this kind of bass is not available in wired earphones of BOAT, REALME, SYSKA, ORAIMO, PHILLIPS, SAMSUNG or others). Just go for it. U will love Rockerz255.

name: harish Chander Sharma
title: Call sound is disturbance
content: I was purchased this items 10th of Oct. 2020. But "noise cancellation" and "bass quality"call sound is not clear every time disturbance . Then today I am requesting for replacement request. I hope new items is god. Because boat is best brand company . If lot of issue so customer do not belive this brand

name: Amazon Customer
title: You buy for your own purposes.
content: M disappointed with boat company. No Bass at all.... I m PubG player so i have to play in high volume. But it is blow my ear.. Amazon delivery is excellent.

name: Vithal.B
title: Excellent Product Go For It..
content: Boat 255 it was awesome product this product regular price is 1,499 but Republic Day shopping I got only 999..... Superb and Wonderful Experience thank u Amazon.....

name: Suhas
title: Gives you exactly what you've paid for.
content: Sound quality is a strict meh; there's loads of bass but it's the boomy bad quality bass. There also seems to be some static from Bluetooth at times. But serves just about all of my purpose for 999rs. And yes, battery life is fantastic.

name: VipZ
title: A good buy for gym goers
content: I bought them in a lightening deal from Amazon.at1000 bucks they are worthy. Bass is the main highlight of the BT earphones.. Battery life is satisfactory, Build quality is sturdy.. I am satisfied with the product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for money
content: This product is good. Excellent noise cancellation, bluetooth connectivity. Sound quality differs a bit from the oringinal earphones that you get along with phone but i believe it's with all the headsets that you purchase. Battery life is good. Light weight and handy. Look wise also very attractive. You can invest in this product.

name: Kartik Gupta
title: Looks good but not worth the money
content: Do not buy this product. It stopped working after 2 months. Filed complaint, nothing happened. Called the customer support number, always busy and never connected to any executive. After sales service are the worst you'll ever see. Better buy from local shops instead. Atleast you can get it replaced.

name: Sivasabari
title: Good product go for it
content: Good Bluetooth earphones. Connectivity and sound clarity is very good. I got it for 1099 also 10% discount so it's really a good deal. Happy with the product.

name: VIPUL HINGU
title: Not Connect with Desktop PC
content: Not Connect with Desktop PC on Zoom, Webex, Google meet, Microsoft Teams etc App.. 2 Mic in this. So Zoom, Webex, Google meet, Microsoft Teams etc confuse for selecting which mic have use for it.. So do not buy for this purpose. Buy it only you use for Mobile/Tablet. It not use for Desktop PC bluetooth connection.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor bluetooth connectivity
content: Sound and everything is fine but battery backip is poor and bluetooth connectivity is also bad... Im not satisfied... these two thing are very important.. See if i put my phone in pocket than i can't talk, voice gets break.. its a big challenge to hold phone in hand evertime when you are on call..

name: A Chandra Sheker Rao
title: Value for money
content: Item is as it is like in picture. The base is high. It is not fitting in years comfortable. It coming out. Sound quality is ok but not too good. It is not pausing on contact of both ends of ear phones.

name: Shashank
title: Mic Not Working
content: Good sound quality. Bass quality is not that great. But now after 10 days of the mic is not working. Its pathetic I can not return it after 7 days

name: Aneesh R.
title: Battery backup issues
content: Sound quality is ok.... Battery backup is not so good and battery indicator is inaccurate. It will show 80% now and after ten mins it will go off saying battery low

name: Naina s.
title: Excellent
content: This is my firt product from boat...... It's is good for workout as it remains fixed in ear even while you run it doesn't fall off your ears (it has a secure fit) and the bass is very good it noise cancelling is good. So go for boAt rockerz 255 pro

name: shweta
title: Not original product
content: Not original Product. aftr 2 months its stop working.boat service center denied to give service as its duplicate product.Amazon customer care also denied to help as its not their responsibility after 8 days of purches.Such bad experience with this product and seller Payal.

name: Mehul Mehta
title: Amazing Sound Quality
content: I've been looking for this product. It's amazing. All the highs & low notes are clear & Audible.. Bass is amazing. I didn't expected this good in a Bluetooth Earphone.. Build quality is too good & soft.. Only the wire is little bit long.. Don't think. Go for it

name: Ronak t.
title: While cal issue And now stoped working
content: I m heaving issue while talking to the phone sometimes Other person cant hear u properly .i have claim a warranty in which product has reached today 2 nd octomber and dispatch at 25 th september i dnt know wat boat service is doing.i m waiting for the product hopefully .. Please dont buy it untill you live where near by boat service centre is available .

name: Ayush Praveen
title: A quality peice of bluetooth earphones, battery life is a minor issue.
content: I am really contented with the headphones, really good sound quality, noise cancellation and bass. Use it for my workouts and it doesn't feel uncomfortable to use while sweating out badly. Battery life is a minor issue. I use it for about 4-5 hours a day and I have to charge it maximum after a day and a half and sometimes after a single day also. A little dissatisfied with the battery life.

name: Padmohan19
title: Not charging, it has been just a month since it is bought
content: It has been one month since I purchased this product. Now it is not charging. It shows battery charging but the moment I remove the charging plug it is not working.. Tried to reach out to the support number but that seems to an incorrect number. Also the support website is not working. NOT sure what to do now.

name: Vipul
title: Humming sound but sound quality is good enough
content: 1) You will notice a humming sound when connected to Bluetooth and music is not playing..the humming sound is there even if the music is playing but not noticible because of the music itself. 2) The sound quality and bass is good

name: bragdishwaran.u
title: resonable cost, high quality , good endurance
content: After trying multiple wired headphones , I bougth the boat rockerz headphone.. I have used them for jogging 3 to 4 times a week. I charge probably once a week.. Battery has a really comfortable charge.. Quality - 4 out of 5. Bass ids good. Comfort -4 out of 5 . depending on the size you can get the right fit.

name: SWASTIK
title: Connectivity issues
content: Difficult to connect multiple device . I don't expect it from boat always popup some voices whenever you turnon the device & turned off .voice quality also not acceptable....in my point of view i hd used this product its too much price feels like 500rs headset ......amazon can i return this now.

name: Ambrish
title: Good but not value for money
content: I did not find any noise cancellation...i can hear some external sounds when playing games..bass is comparatively good .not excellent

name: Santhosh Samuel
title: Good product
content: The product is good if you can get it under Rs.1000. The cable quality is a bit disappointing. The comfort in ear is also not that good. But the sound quality is decent. I love it

name: pradeep
title: Review after 12days of use
content: The product worked well for some 10days and the return window got over then it started giving issues, see audio packets drop and some audio fluctuations. Bought in sale, so mighg be a damaged piece. And packing is bad. Overall expected a great long term product but the sound quality is bad

name: Abhijit Shetty
title: Not recommended for gym or jog
content: Not so comfort, not recommend it for jogging / gym. Falls off from ears if you jump or work out in different positions.. Sound quality is average not much to boast about, noise cancellation comes in when volume raised to Max. can't feel all the beats, if there is even a bit of disturbance around.

name: Sanchit R.
title: Great earphones
content: Great quality earphones with good ear supports that dont let them fall off. Bluetooth connection so good that it catches signal even from two walls behind it. Sound quality is great and constantly giving 6 + hours of play time. Go for them , best for this price

name: Er.Ravikant Dubey
title: Mind blowing.
content: It’s really awesome. It’s more than expectation in this price. Very cheap rate & I suggest personally you can buy it. You won’t feel wrong with your decision.

name: KRISHNAN GOMATHI NAYAGAM
title: Headset
content: Easy to use and connected easily. One touch button is very useful. Sound quality is good. Good noise cancellation, fit it in ears. I have referred to my friends.

name: Anand k Yadav
title: Good.
