content: After so much research bought this product.. Satisfied with the battery back up.. Charging speed is also good .. Sound quality is ok not so much loud.. Noise cancellation is satisfactory.. Easy to pair with device.

name: Safal digarse
title: Good product
content: Its sound is good, earbuds are very comfortable even wearing it for long time.. Connectivity is superfast as soon as you switch on device and switch on the mobile's bluetooth if it is paired earlier it immediately connects to it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Useless product
content: I want to return this product (as its is not useful and a bad quality stuff) , but seller has only provided a replacement option, which is not good. I am feeling cheated.

name: Suresh
title: Service is not at all good
content: one of the worst product I had never used don't buy this product it's a scrap product from boat and I'm fully upset about this product this is an replacement one again I was facing same problem and the first earphones which I received got damage which connects and disconnects automatically for every 5-10 seconds... So I kept replacement again I was facing with same problem which connects and disconnects automatically

name: Vinay
title: Not suitable to use it with helmet on
content: Difficult to use it while driving with helmet...... The earpiece of the headphones are really big, it comes out of the ears... When you use full helmet the headphones gets pressed inside your ears.... When the headphones gets pressed inside you ears the voice will babe very low, it will be very painful while removing it.... Nose cancellation is very less... External nose is more than my voice..

name: Anjana singh
title: Bad product
content: Product was good but after just 4 months it started jittering in the left earpiece and after one month in the right. a bad side for boat i got two boat rockerz 255 in 12 months and both of them showed same results.you can buy realme or mi earphones .both earphones will give you a good experience on the prices they are available

name: MADHUR PRABHAT KAUSHIK
title: Good earphone at this price range
content: Writing review after more than one year. Woked fine in the first year but now voice not coming in the right side earphone. Managing with the left side earphone. Easy to connect bluetooth.

name: Laukik Bajpai
title: Perfect Sound, Sturdy. Bad Mic.
content: Have been using it daily for 6 months now. It's very easy to use, excellent music quality, very sturdy for daily and rough use. Only Con - Mic quality is below average, the person on the other end hears the noise around you more yours. Else, recommended.

name: Amazon Customer
title: An outstanding pair of wireless earphones - at a cheap price.
content: This product's sound quality is impressive. The tagline speaks for itself - immersive stereo sound is truly what one gets. It charges quickly, and lasts for a long time (5 - 6 hours of use). I also own an Audio Technica M50x, but now it rarely sees use due to these quite marvellous earphones. Note that these headphones costed north of ₹9,000, while these earphones were a fraction of that price. Good job, boAt.

name: Nithiya Subramaniam
title: Good but not Best
content: After seeing so many positive reviews i have placed order of this earphones. Its a good one but failed to perform as good as my old sony mdr150.

name: Gopinath Subramani
title: This one really rocks
content: One of the best in-ear phone that I have ever used it so far.. This one rely rocks... Amazing sound quality and one of the lightest ear phone suits very well for most of the sports activities...

name: Nilutpal Bose
title: Worst customer service, worst product I have ever experienced
content: It Got damaged within a month. None of buttons are working.. Such a poor product from boat never Exwpected. And when it comes in term of replacement which never happens. Following up with customer care of boat from last 10 days with no response.

name: Danish fahim
title: Worst product under 1500rs
content: Bad product ... Doesn't fit to ears properly and you can't put it for even half an hour. It hurts . Also it has too much weight , takes time to connect to bluetooth and difficulty in on &off . And most important the battery backup is 4hrs though it says 6hrs . Don't buy this ... Waste of money ,not worth for 1500 .

name: Amazon Customer
title: It rock's
content: Fine quality with good sound bass. I object with noise cancellation. Opposite person can hear surrounding noise more clearly thn we can actually hear. It's distraction for opposite person if speak in noise.

name: Samir S
title: Value for money.
content: I have purchased four of these. Good connectivity, good battery life and superb call quality. Souch quality is okay. If your requirement is mostly calls and sometimes songs/movies. Its perfect.

name: amyaaba
title: It's as average as it can be.
content: Sound quality is very average. Battery backup is alright and about durability, one ear has already stopped working just after 6 months of use. I purchased Amazon prime subscription just to avail the little extra discount it had for prime members during August, 2019. Very disappointed.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Opened seal + Unreliable bluetooth
content: I wasn't able to connect with Me note 4 and Note 8 pro.. After multiple attempts, it connected to Note 4. But it worth the hassle since the box seal was broken before it arrived.

name: Mahesh Desu
title: Real waste of Money. Stopped working within 6 months.
content: Earphones stopped working within in 6 months of purchasing. Service center in Hyderabad is not responding or picking my calls. There is only one service center in Hyderabad, which is in Uppal. So please refrain from buying this earphones as BoAt is not committed to customer services after sales.

name: HITESH THURUTHY
title: 4 out of 5
content: The Rubber/Silicon ear protectors and buts are little uncomfortable. Over all it's a good purchase.

name: Ravi g.
title: Stopped working in 4 months
content: I bought 1 piece last year The sound was over all good so I ordered the another one in January. Bt now the last year's earphone's left side is not working and the January's earphone neither powering on nor charging. So I Hv given 1star.

name: Suma
title: Battery back up too low
content: Good product , took in Amazon sale, sound quality was too good ,can enjoy nyc music...I took for listening classes it was good but battery is drying fast..

name: Mukund
title: Terrible battery life
content: Terrible battery life! Lasts not more than a handful of hours. Though the sound quality is good.. In comparison the sony one I bought as a replacement gives enough backup to be charged once in 2 days.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for money for music lovers with excellent output
content: I was under confusion about the brand "boat" as most of us are habituated with Sony -senhiser-jbl etc.I gave a tried and very happy about the sound output you can go for it without hesitation.Super bass and treble as like senhiser.Small part need to check from boat company that is charging point of ear phone can be redesigned.

name: Anasua Abhijit Banerjee
title: Value for money...loving it
content: Used another devise but this one is realky fast charged...good sound quality..noice control more or less ok and easy to carry anywhere i want...in any bag or keep it on my neck for the whole day.

name: Vignesh Sethuraman
title: Worth the buy
content: Very decent quality and build is very light can't say 'the best' but still its a better competitor for this price range and sound, pretty much happy with the experience extended bass effect and to say in simple " ITS A WOW"

name: Aslam Siddiqui
title: Not bad if you get it in ₹899
content: There are indeed some pro's & con's. Pro's :- Sound Clarity , Good Bass & good battery life.. .. .. Con's :- Not comfortable for long usage , Not so comfortable around neck while riding. light weight!

name: Machhindra Aher
title: Surrounding issue
content: In 2 months surrounding issue...1 side is totally damaged..And not working...Want to replace...Plzz help

name: Ravishek Kumar
title: Awesome 👏✊👍
content: Cons:. 1.Price should be less a little bit!!. 2.And it should be a little bit more comfortable also ,because my ear started paining after listening music continuously!!. Btw the product was awesome!. I'm using it continuously from 3-4 days and really its 😎 cool.. And the most awesome feature is google assistant feature!!

name: afan khan
title: Worst headphones ever seen. Don't waste your money.
content: Sound Quality Zero.. Not compatible with Whtsapp n Messanger calling.. Lots of voice disterbance during call.... I bought this product considering previous reviews, but it is not worth.. I'm really disappointed.. I m not gonna buy any electronic products from AMAZON after this....!

name: Kirthivasan
title: Good one. Can improve battery life.
content: I always buy boat when it comes to earphones. This is my first time using wireless. The sound quality is great. The only problem is the battery life. It hardly lasts for two days( which is why I’ve given 4 stars). Other than that, it’s a nice one 👍🏽

name: Hari.k.n
title: Disappointed
content: For listening music it's good but not for calling because opposite person is complaining frequently for Distorted voice..

name: Garima
title: Best product best price
content: I am loving the product. It's totally a worthy product in such a best price. It's gets fully charged in 1.5 hrs and as it's new it is currently working for 8 hrs. I can connect my mobile and laptop both at the same time.

name: Xceptlife
title: Cool product😎
content: A great help for me for recording videos and online classes. Soud quality is just great.

name: Prabodha Mangual
title: My product not working properly
content: I purchase this product just before 15 days but now it's connecting to device but audio not audible properly. I think I lost my 1400 rupees by purchasing this product Showing issue like audio lacking. I am trying re-collect another product of this but return date is out. So what to do with this product now. Please inform me.

name: Shweta Chauhan
title: Wastage of money.. kindly read this..
content: I don't know what to say about this product...first i ordered it ,then on second day it stopped working then i returned it and placed order for second time this time earphones worked for 20 days then again it stopped working ...my worst product from online shopping till date

name: ANANT AGGARWAL
title: I got it for 900 rupees
content: The best wireless earphones in this price. I get it for only 900 rupees. The sound quality is amazing and the noise cancellation is also very good. Only the problems I get sometimes is in the bluetooth connection. It doesn't show it when u pair it with new phone.. Although this is very good earphones. Battery backup is also very good.. Must buy product

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sound quality same as Boat 225 Wired earphones which is amazing
content: Amazing bass at that price range. Play with equalizer and you can milk the most out of this earphones. However, one small drawback with this earphones is that when the earbuds is inserted firmly, it tends to kind of air lock the ear which is necessary for Noise cancellation but not so good for your ears.

name: Abhisek Ku. Suna
title: Important
content: After Somedays of use , it's one bud is get damaged and not working .. It is not only my earphone's problem , But all the people in my circle are using it faced same problem 😡. If you are going to purchase it , make it clear that ,. You will have from only one bud after Somedays of use ..🙏🏻

name: vivek
title: After 1 weeks use
content: Just good, always facing problem while connecting to other devices like laptop or other phones of Bluetooth version 4.2. Too long wire, not much comfortable.. Battery percentage of earphone also showing wrong in phone. It shuts without notification of low battery in phone.. Notification language for power on, power off or battery low is also not clear in earphone. DISAPPOINTING

name: Supratik D.
title: Good product. Could have been better
content: Okayish product. Good sound with bass, but if you are on normal call it will catch a lot of background noise around you. For example, if there is a TV playing in another room, it will catch that sound too and the other person in your call will get lot of disturbances. Other than this, it's a good product.

name: RONAK P.
title: Sound and build quality is good but rang is too low
content: Sound quality is satisfied. Build quality is also satisfied. Bass and loudness is too good.but the bluetooth rang is to low. I put mobile in my pocket and and cycling than also the disturbance in song is their.

name: Geeta Bisht
title: Superb
content: I am satisfied with this product. It has a good range, even if I go far away like to another room I can still get the music

name: Amazon Customer
title: Fake or real
content: I have notice today and campare with the other boat headphone of the my friend. There are few differences from official site. 1- the node which connect wire and solid part is not plane. 2 - boat tag on headphone is in oposite direction. So i have an doubt is it a real one or fake.. I have ordered it on sale

name: ananth
title: Cheap quality product
content: Durability : Left ear phone has stopped working !!. This is within 25 days of buying the product. Suggest not to buy this product .

name: Inchara
title: Not durable
content: It is a great product but what I have a problem with is the durability. I have been using for about 8 months when I started facing problems with the battery. It claims to last for 6 hours when it used to barely last for an hour. And now it hardly lasts for 10 minutes.

name: Gouri K
title: Dissatisfied with the performance
content: Bought these earphones in November 2020 and within a month the right earplug started giving an issue of really low volume. Really disappointed. The return window has shut and now I am stuck with these malfunctioning earphones. :(

name: Apurv
title: Automatically disconnects after 30 minutes of use.
content: The product seemed good initially (including the design, weight balance, sound quality etc). However, within 15 days of use, it has started behaving funny as it gets disconnected after 30 minutes of use (even when mobile is in my pocket). So, I can't trust this Bluetooth earphone while taking official calls.

name: SHAIZAN NISAR JAIGADKAR
title: Failed both Speakers After 5months
content: Boat is a brand which satisfies its customer need with economy rate....within 5 months Both speakers are dead and cant register my complaint as its not in official complaint Product list......feeling Worst After Investing a huge amount.

name: Nanda
title: Good for the price
content: At this price point a good bluetooth headset. Yet to test noise cancellation in meetings. But in normal calls from home is fine

name: Rahul
title: 4 star product, Good product
content: Although good product. After 1 week I could understand the battery life. Value for money 💰. It's mostly suitable for riding purpose or phone calling

name: Amazon Customer
title: Be wise, those who prefer it for intense workouts, better don't go for it
content: Used it for hardly 5 months during my workout session, it stopped working suddenly with a real paining sound, they clearly mentioned that it is meant for intense workout, but it is actually not even sweat resistant which leads to the internal short circuit, not even the led is not glowing.

name: HIRANMOY
title: best deal , must buy if you find for Bluetooth neckband
content: best quality , good sound, must buy. After all BoAt service is also good if any problems happened with in 1 year then they repair or replace the product .

name: Koushik
title: Full range sound is not present. Only Bass and low miss.
content: The audio quality is really very poor. Only bass and low mids are present. No highs. I don't know whether it was faulty piece or it just sounds like that only! Returned it.

name: Samina kamboj
title: Bluetooth connects and disconnects automatically.
content: The earphones connect and disconnect automatically while on phone call. Evertime it speaks you are connected to boat... You are disconnected to boat..... Allthough battery was above 50% and it keeps on connecting and disconnecting Bluetooth.. Ordered a replacement of it. Hope it works.

name: Manowar Hussain
title: Beware of Duplicate earphone being sold by this seller.
content: Beware.... Seller is selling dublicate earphone that looks very similar to original one.... I returned my earphone immediately on next day....

name: ashish
title: Worst product
content: I purchased it on 30 January and within one month it is not working properly.. Voice is coming very low from the earphones... Moreover I didn't get warranty card from amazon sellers Not received any support from amazon so strong no to purchase this product ....

name: Kunal Jain
title: Worst Product. In the name of Festival Dhamaka defect products is being sold.
content: Product's battery performance is worst. Seriously regretting for opting replacement. From 100% it comes to 60% within 1 hour and from 60% it comes directly to 20% in 20 minutes and then it comes to 0% within 7 minutes. In short it just works for only 90 minutes.. Amazon is requested to stern action on such happenings. Ultimately it's Amazon's name which is getting degraded.

name: Vijaya
title: Ear buds breakable, No two devices connectivity, No FM radio.
content: Ear buds are slippery, Not a good design. Speaker assembly is easily breakable while adjusting them to one's ears. Not working for connecting two devices in one go, even though tech specifications mentioned as ,capable to connect two devices at one time. No FM radio. Too bad to miss this feature .

name: Mahendra Sawant
title: Worst Product. Dont Buy.
content: Guys, Usually Boat Products are fine but thus particular earphone juat sucks and irritated me lot especially dont go on its bluetooth connectivity version. I bought looking bluetooth vesion. But its frequently automatic get disconnected inspite of enough battery. Overpiced. Dont buy it.

name: kshitijajadhav
title: Not recommended
content: Left side of the headphones volume coming is very less. Not giving a complete bass experience. The product is not recommended as Bluetooth support is low the phone needs to be in nearest range itself. I picked up from amazon coz I didnt expected a duplicate product like wht I hv gt.

name: Mayur Ramdham
title: Good
content: Overall performance is best but bass sound is quit lower than wired headstones or boat rockerz 400. If you are going for enjoying DJ bass and hd sound then go for boat rockerz 400..

name: Slim shady
title: Product is good but the seller is not.
content: I received product with damaged accesories.. As i have to travel tomo i cant even return it. fortunately headphones are working.. UpdatE: One side stopped working after 7 months

name: Vrushan
title: True review. After use
content: True review- sound quality is not that much good,but it is ok. Build quality could be more durable.overall build quality is not good or everyday use. User will always expect the build quality for daily use but I don't think it's good battery is amazing.comfort is amazing.

name: pranav
title: Lack of bass....
content: Instant of spending 11k for airpots....i buy this one.....at this price it's look good.....lack of bass....last for 4-5 hr......for me at this price u can't get better than this

name: amol
title: Average
content: Very heavy for ears.. after 40 days it stopped working Metallic speakers makes heavy... Not comfortable while running... But some light products... U can't returned it make huming sound

name: VIJAY SHRIVASTAVA
title: Nice product
content: Product is very good but given charging cable is defective so using mobile charging cable, Bluetooth connectivity is good but anything like your hand comes between headphone and mobile, you may feel some disturbance in connection

name: Anantha krishnan
title: Loving it.. Worth for money
content: I'm really love it... Bass lovers pls go for it.. Now I'm really a fan of boat headphones... Lite weight.. Battery life is good it's giving continues play back of 6-7 hrs.. Perfect fit... If u guys looking for a Bluetooth headphones under 1500 just go for it... Really worth it..

name: Manoj sangwan
title: Good all-rounder.
content: Beat BT earphones go for it best sound and best noise cancellation. Good for students and music wow. Great battery life upto 7 hrs with 75% volume. Good remote control can take calls and and change the tracks. Good for calling also. Good mic I love it.

name: Chetan jadhav
title: Mic and battery problem
content: Battery problem. It shows 80 pecent and after using some time the battery get low and the device switch off. Another problem, After using for around one and half hour mic gives disturbance problem one can not simply understand what i am saying they hear noise in the background the problem is in the device. I want replacement

name: Praveen kumar v
title: Good buy at this price range.
content: I got it yesterday,used it for mrng walk,quality is good,very comfortable to wear,call quality is good but not great,Base and vocals are clean and neat,noise cancellation is good enough,but what i found was there is lot of disturbance and noise while playing music online,sometimes i felt like it is getting disconnected for a fractiin of second, then playing again,thats d only thing i found in cons, but overall a very good buy in the price range.

name: Anand Gupta
title: Worst Customer Service
content: I bought this product a few months back. It stopped working. To find out how to claim warranty it took me a week cuz there is only 5 to 8 service center they have throughout the country and when I finally found it out then they took the product now it is been more than 20 days no reply from them. I have been trying to reach their customer care number which always says we are not working today.

name: Suhas Jogale
title: Quality product in offer price of ₹899
content: Thanks for Amazon for fast delivery and packing.. I have purchased of Rs. 899/- only. Music sound quality is too good.. Voice calling lovers not so good.. Sometimes disconnecting automatically.. Quality product.

name: abhijeet
title: Don't buy this product...WASTE OF MONEY, POOR SERVICE from service center
content: Guys don't buy this product i had purchased this headphone it works properly only for 7 months after that one side of headphone doesn't not working..company provide 1 year warranty but there service is VERY POOR i lodged complaint for several times but no reply from service center....

name: Kapil Sharma
title: Superb Sound Quality
content: Nice product, amazing sound quality, you'll absolutely love them if you are a bass lover, easy to use, rigid fit so you'll be perfectly fine while your running or exercising, and definitely sweat proof. Also the battery is nice but the only reason why I gave it a 4 and not a 5 is because the battery drains way too quickly after it hits a 60% mark.

name: HarshithNGR
title: Crap for 1000rs , Fragile
content: Worst earphones i ever used. I sent them twice to garage for repair with in a month ,. left earpiece stopped working after one month of use and i sent to Mumbai for repair after 20 days i received repaired product and again after 20 days it stopped working , oh crap , dont buy its not rugged , two of my friends suffering from same problemz

name: Nilesh p.
title: Best headphone in the market
content: Hello friend I have buy this product it would be happen 1 week for me when I buy this product It unbelieveable his bass quality is awesome it playing like a 2d sound you can hear the background music clearly about the noice cancellation so it kk so I don't know in the future it will work better or not but yes u can buy it by closing your eyes

name: AB
title: Very Poor Noise Cancellation
content: Pros:. Easy to use. Good quality material used. Cons. Noise Cancellation is very poor. The person on the other side of the call will hear person speaking next to you in a public place, rather than you. I'm extremely upset with this and hence would like to return it.. Ps: Doesnt make sense to save few bucks and buy a sub standard product, instead opt for some other brand

name: Anil
title: Sound Quality not So good. Customer care is wrost.
content: Sound quality is not so great compare to other products available in the market with same price. Upon that it's not lasted even for 6 months and ask for replacement as it is under warranty but no response from the company.

name: Rajiv Gulati
title: Good value for money product
content: Nice product at a price of 999. Sound quality and noise cancellation is good. Only problem I have noticed is that whenever it goes out of my Mobile's range, even for 2 seconds, it doesn't get connected automatically and I have to connect it manually again. Rest all looks ok.. I am using it for 3 days now and battery life, call quality etc is satisfactory.. Can't comment on durability at this stage.

name: Thomas B.
title: An excellent product with reasonable price.
content: An excellent product. Sound quality is excellent. Rest noise cancellation and moisture wicking I have not tried. Overall an amazing product with very reasonable price.

name: LN
title: If it costs 700-800 it's worth buying
content: Bass and sound is good but it doesn't look like good in noise cancellation because calling doesn't feel good in rush. But i must say battery backup is more than 6 hrs for just 1.5 hrs of charging. And one more thing it stops working within one year that can be repaired due to its one year warranty.

name: Azhar M
title: One of the better Bluetooth earphones out there.
content: Considering how phone's are omitting headphone jacks. This is a great buy. From fit to sound to wearing it for longer periods of time, all goes well. Battery lasts for half a day with moderate usage.

name: Dheeraj Dman
title: Noise cancellation op
content: This is just amazing if i talk about noise cancellation. I used it when people were nagging around and i didn't feel anything accept silence. Sound is amazing, bass is good. Overall 4 star. I'd give 5 star of baas was damn crazy

name: Prajwal Y.
title: Worst product😡
content: This earphones is worst thing you can get.. It just works awesome for few days but after a month my earphone's right speaker are not working.... Not worth of money... And customer service is also worse. They will not care about you.. Please don't buy it.

name: Chaithrareddy
title: Worst
content: Very bad experience...nt even one month completed...it's stopped working...how can v trust Amazon.. seriously worst experience...I do no hw ppl r trusting...I want my headset to be replaced...I paid 1.5k nt even worked 6months.... kindly respond for my review

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good but Stopped working & Returned, No response from BoAt
content: The product quality & Sound quality is good. but it stopped working after 5 days of usage, Bluetooth is not working properly, its getting disturbance while listening to the music. if you keep phone in pocket its gets disconnected.. I've dropped complaint and returned my product. its almost 15 days completed no response from BoAt. worst experience.

name: Manish adlak
title: Quality is not good.
content: after paying(999/-) amount also Product look like made with plastic material... Mute feature is missing in headset... Amazon is not providing return option so I could return and opt for better one.. Sound and Mic quality is just OKOK...

name: Ashwani Anand
title: Waste of money
content: I am really surprised how can people can suggest this product. The sound quality is so poor that you can't even listen a song. The sounds quality matches with old music system with no bass and vocal clarity. There is absolutely no bass and sounds like I am in sitting in auto and listening to the music played in the same.. I can't be priced more than 200-300. A third grade product.

name: Yoonus Mohammad
title: Nice One.
content: Quality product and long lasting one. Yet if you listen for a long time, your ears will ache.. Previously I used LG genuine product and that was better.

name: Manoj Gakhar
title: Worth buying - good product
content: The product is amazing....with good price.... Sound Quality is superb...rest depends on the quality of sound tracks... Bass is acceptable.. neither high nor very low.... Satisfying... 👌👌. Cozy and compact...ear buds are very comfortable..

name: amank
title: Super duper bass
content: This is awesome product..super extra bass..i cant listen music more than 60% volume..i am happy with is..but there is issue little bit, there is a little bit sound delay issue when i play PUBG.. but not too.much..just 0.3mlsec.. If you will play game daily then you will forget about this issue..not big issue..overall its great

name: Sushant Bankar
title: Worst product..
content: Don't buy it.. it works only max 5-6 months then you have to visit service center to replace it.. it has only one service center in mumbai in goregaon that to in worst area it's not a genuine seller... better look for other option...

name: Aditya
title: Only for music not for calls
content: Sound quality is good for loud bass lovers.. Good for listening to music. But not good for attending calls, the voice through microphone is very low, the person you are speaking with will get to hear a very low voice.. Battery Backup is good. Look wise its okay

name: Siladitya Sikder
title: One side not working after 5 months .
content: Decent wireless earphones but after use of 5 months one side of the item stops working . And when goes through the boats complaint section of this product max of the people were complaining about the same issue. Though they have pick up and drop facilities depends on your city but they didn't did that in my situation .. So buy carefully ... Thanks .

name: G.RAM M.
title: Good sound quality and range..  Wires seem very thin... not sure how long they would last
content: Good sound quality and good range coverage and charges quite fast.. However, the write is thin.. Need to see how long they would last.

name: Ankit
title: Best in price range
content: As I get these for jus Rs. 999, the sound quality is great for me in this price range with wireless connectivity.. It gives me more then 6 hours of battery backup on every full charge ( got discharged in between 6-7.5 hours depending on my usage).. I m happy that I bought it. 😊

name: Rupesh Kumar Mistry
title: Valuable of money 💲
content: Love it nd the bulid nd sound quality is far better than than the other valuables bluetooh earphones. .... I already won a Bluetooth of bose nd the comparison of bose nd boat where same sound feedback . .... Nd i used this continued from the day i charged it nd its long lasted max to max 4 days . ...

name: rajshekar s patil
title: Ok it’s good!
content: Reliable!! Sound ok! But battery back up is about 3 hours after full battery charge !!! Ear plugs struggle to move in to ear ! And charge slot is major set back for this earsets! But as per budget is its ok ! But take care of the ear plugs don’t allow your ear wax move into those it’s very hard to clean then !!!!

name: Suraj Patra
title: Good product and durable product
content: Nice product from boat..nicely packed and the sound quality is really good and more crystal clear..anyone wants a good wireless Bluetooth earphone can go for it..I will give thumps up to it..really nice product from boat..

name: kiran bombai
title: STOPPED WIRKING
content: It stopped working in just unde two months, totally waste of money..I really trusted boat instead of all other competitive brands.. but my trust broken...

name: Sourabh Desai
title: Worth
content: One of the best budget headphones after House of Marley and best budget Bluetooth headphones in the market right now.. If you are a bass lover then this is a good one, but you have to keep low hopes for other voice notes. Clarity is good enough. In rare cases, the mic provides low gain so other parties cannot hear you properly. Good to go with.. Cheers.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Quality is good, but they slip from ears
content: They slip from my ears all the time , not comfortable. They don’t stay they fall down .

name: trusted customer
title: Life of only some months
content: Best in price segment, me n my 4 frnds purchased this earphones, every one is facing problem now. Its one side earphone stopped working within some months only.. Compared to my Samsung 400rs wired earphones which I purchased 3 yrs ago, still working fine.

name: shally
title: Love these bluetooth earphones
content: Best bluetooth device i have ever used... sound quality is amazing and it won't hurt your ears as its earbuds are very soft and comfortable.

name: PRASHANT
title: Best in Class
content: Everything is good , the only cons is the range... Although it gives a good range of about 10 meters but a single wall will break it's sound even if one is 2 meter away.. Sound is great ( good bass ). Qualcomm chipset in 999 what else you need... Sweat water resistant ( didn't tried it yet ). Boat brand.... And mic quality is very good but not excellent. Bought it for INR 999.

name: Naveen
title: Stopped working in just 2 months
content: Stopped working in just 2 months of usage. I use them in gym and they have stopped working. Now i cant even get them returned or changed from Amazon due to Amazon 10 day policy. I have to contact boat customer service. If u are a casual user then these are for u but for regular usage while workout i guess these are not made for that.

name: Anonymouse
title: Good for the price.
content: Good for the price. Battery life indicator is incorrect. Doesn't auto connect most of the times after switching on. But sound quality is good. Comfortable to wear.

name: abhijit sawwalakhe
title: Boat 255 sports
content: At this price range best Bluetooth earphones I m very confusing between mi sport, boat 261 n boult curve bt I m finally choose boat sport 255 at amazing deal offer at RS only 999@ and the packing also good n baas quality is awesome depend on your music player sound quality superb and battery back up also good 6 hours minimum depending on your use I m giving my rating for this Bluetooth earphones 5 out 4.8

name: Akshay
title: 1 side of earphone stopped working!!
content: Within 10 month of usage, right side of earphone stopped working...there is also loose connection in the wire and some annoying noise is produced at certain occasions. I've contacted the customer care. Hope this problem will be solved quickly and all the maintenance will be covered under 1 year warranty offer.

name: Gajpal
title: Easy to use headphones
content: Very good headphones at this price, and simple to use with iPhone. The ear plugs remain in place while running. Only issue is I couldn’t find option to connect to multiple devices.

name: Angad singh
title: WASTE OF MONEY
content: VERY POOR QUALITY PRODUCT . I have purchased this product from Amazon and it's one side earphone stop working within 2 months after 3-4 day both sides are not working then i claim warranty . after warranty product give me glitches and sound quality is pathetic DON'T BUY THIS PRODUCT .

name: Ashish
title: Lacking voice clarity due to a constant humming noise.
content: Not sure if this is a manufacturing defect but on calls there is a constant humming noise which makes it irritating on both sides during conversation.

name: Naveen
title: Average device. Not so worth for the money
content: Average device. Backup drains so fast. The extra rubber clips in the ear pods make it difficult to use quickly while attending calls when the device isn't in neck already. The default sounds while connecting the device to phone is overriding the conversation.

name: rohit bhor
title: Use material delivery
content: This product use I think because sell was already damage and I saw in side wire strip not proper in parcel so I was not open sell and use this product . This second replacement product so amozon broken my trust so I want refund

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great Earphones
content: Great earphones. Recommended anytime. Only thing I didn't like is the length of the wire is long, because of which it felt little irritating if you are wearing it during running. Leaving this aside, it is best in class earphones. Very strong built.

name: Namita
title: Very nice except Bluetooth range
content: Everything is good about the product. The only drawback is bluetooth starts losing connection after 5 meters. You can't hear anything. Rest everything is well.

name: RAMGOPAL POGARU
title: Good product worth Rs.999
content: Good product worth Rs.999. It has all the features I was looking for. Sound quality was good. The grip of ear buds was excellent. The appearance was good. But it takes time to pair with phone. After pairing, it takes more time to pair with a new phone.. I am totally satisfied with the product.. Thank you.

name: Shivdutt !
title: Boat Rockers 255 review  by Shiv
content: Delevery within 2days for prime memeber.. Amazing product for 1K , good bass and sound clearlity 👍. Battery back up is aprox 5-6hr which is as per specifications aswell.. Will update further on battery & sound quality after usage for a month.

name: Harish kumar
title: Do not buy.. no warranty.. stopped working in 3 months.
content: Don't buy it. Within 3 months right ear phone stopped working. And there is no option of calling customer care or claiming for warranty. Don't waste your money..

name: Ashish
title: Good product
content: Price keeps fluctuating online. Too much variation in price on weekly basis. That's the only thing not good abt.it. otherwise a good product.

name: Anurag Dua
title: Amazing VFM product!
content: It’s worth value for money!! One of the best neckband Bluetooth headsets. I have bought 2 pcs so far of the same model in 2 colors.. The sound quality is superb, the battery life is impressive and bass quality is also very good.. A must recommended product.

name: Kowsiky Bandyopadhyay
title: Not bass but full satisfaction
content: Doing great work battery backup is awesome in this range. The bass is not that good but sound quality is totally satisfying also 1 year warranty is available. Charges only in 2 hours and lasts long. I like this one very much

name: Imran Khan
title: Over all good product.
content: First of all, I got the product delivered with in just 10hr. Excellent service by Amazon.. Coming to the product functionality,. Sound wise good. Bass can be bit better and noise cancelation is also good.

name: Sachiin Awasthi
title: Happy singh lovers buy it.
content: Too much bass but treble and mids lost.. If yo want to listen all drum beats go for it if you want to listen little loader bass with all blues. Don't go for that.

name: Kanishk
title: Not worth buying.
content: This product is not at all worth buying.. It's a waste of money.. Sound quality is pathetic.. Build quality is like cheap earphone.. Battery backup very bad.. Bluetooth connectivity is the worst thing in this product.

name: Pratik bhosale
content: I've been using senheiser headphones for 5 years. And after that my friend suggested boat rockerzz 255 pro. This headphone has more sound quality and noise cancellation than senheiser.. It's a budget heaphone with excellent sound and bass quality

name: Aditya
title: Fake Product Being Sold by Appario Retail. Beware.
content: I got this product 6 months ago and now it has stopped working. When I took it to Srinivas Telecom whose one of the replacement partners of Boat in Bangalore, they told me it’s a fake product. The product on the right is fake and the left one is the original one.

name: Krunalk
title: Awesome Product From boAt, Fastest delivery From Amazon
content: Its the product i was looking for the long time, after long research i ordered this here on amazon. the fastest every delivery i got. what quality product from boAt, this the second prodct after boAt stone. fanatastic prodct. Buy with eyes closed. Nomber 1

name: Karthika
title: Disappointed! Stay alert
content: I am having issues during call.. I found little weird sound when am in normal call.. Battery life is approx 7-8 hours. Bass quality is good. Noise cancelation is not up to mark. The earbuds aren't most comfortable but shouldn't be any pain while using. Quality wise they're good.

name: Mukund
title: Worst product and cheated (Never buy)
content: Worst product ever seen. I bought it during Amazon sale. I dont understand how amazon is promoting this poor and worst quality during sale. With in two days, TV stopped working and we suffering now with customer care and service.. There is no proper service. Definitely i planned to fill a case in consumer customer very soon.. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT

name: Ashish
title: Superb quality Indian product
content: This is good and Made in India I bought it for my office purpose where I can hear conference calls on laptop or on mobile and it works very well however it works on only one device at a time.

name: sabarick
title: Ok for casual listening
content: It's not fitting in my ear. Sound quality nowhere near sony or seinheiser.. Bluetooth connectivity is excellent.. Overall ok for casual listening

name: Parikshit Roy
title: Excellent Product
content: Absolute Rock Star! No problem in paring with any phones, tried with iphone,samsung and pixel2. Work flawlessly. Great sound and bass effect. Great noise cancellation. Overall a 5 star product.

name: Abinash sahoo
title: Good headphone at pocket friendly price.
content: Product is good at pocket friendly price. As per the product is concerned the sound quality is good and bass is average. So excellent for daily use with standby power and 7 to 8 hrs of playback power. And great design. Overall a good experience for me. Water repellent features enable us to carry on with mild Mumbai rains.

name: sunil yathati
title: Bad experience with Amazon, and boat headphone
content: 1) Very bad packaging. 2) Ordered new boat255 but delivery very old. 3) one of the ear peace was missed. 4) Glue marks on the product. 5) Ear buds was dusty. 6) It is not a sealed product. 7) Don't purchase this cheap boat headphones

name: KCG
title: Above Average
content: I have heard better sounding headsets and was honestly a bit disappointed for the quantity of sound. The mids and lows are not up to the mark. It's good for voice only application.

name: Vinod chaudhary
title: Good sound and very quality  products
content: Very good sound quality and noice cancellation i was confusing to select good bluetooth headset so i decided this one , because it was Amazon recommended product so i trusted Amazon choice and it was right decision thanks Amazon

name: Ashwin N
title: GREAT SOUND BUT POOR MIC QUALITY...
content: Nice sound quality.. Don't expect heavy bass as the boat provided with their wired headsets.. Decent battery backup. Takes 2 hrs for charging.. Disappointed with the mic's performance.... Its not the noise cancellation. Its noise boosting 😁 person at the earpiece end can hear the noise better than our voice.. Review after one month heavy usage...

name: Dolly Singh
title: Average.
content: I purchased this for audio n video calls for office. While using this sometime voice is not clear and if we disconnect then your voice will not be heard completely by the end person. We have reconnect the call again in order to be audible by others.. Also battery backup is less. Rest is ok.

name: Rahul
title: not durable
content: Honest review-bought in month of june used it 15-20 times and now it is silent ,only one earphones is working . Do not buy this product total waste of money . Life of the product is not more than 3-4 months. Totally disappointed

name: BishtRIDER
title: Not for iPhone users
content: Great work in android phone.. but not working good in iPhone..if you plan to buy for iPhone don’t buy.. some sound it’s come again again..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bad noise cancellation when you speak but good when you listen.
content: The mic actually perform really bad. Like really bad. Noise cancellation mic is not present at all. Noise cancelation while listening is pretty good though. Sound quality is ok for the offered price . Just got it today, handling carefully , will keep updating.

name: Praveen Kumar
title: Boat you are fantafabulastic
content: First of all boat never disappointed me, I'm the customer since 2 years. Sound quality is awesome, noice cancellation is too good, and about bass which is really mean to me you made it rocking. Thank you so much

name: Harshdeep Singh
title: Bluetooth connectivity
content: best use within 0-15 m range, beyond you might face a voice drop in between. overall a good product. But not prefered for long time usage, because you might face pain in ear's i am not sure either it's because of built or material they provide. Will recomended for base lovers.

name: Anonymous
title: Bad battery life
content: Worst product, not more than 7 hrs of battery backup... If you travel buy the product with wire not this one, this is just waste of money unless tgis gives 15 hours of backup.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good product. Comfortable and durable.
content: I purchased these last year and they lasted all year round without so much as a glitch. The pairing was seamless and the sound quality was good. I damaged these in an accident recently. I'm sure they would have lasted much longer, otherwise! Really gonna miss these.

name: Nirav shastri
title: Not satisfied
content: Worse quality and even worse battery life requesting amazon to di not promote this item. Rather you should go for some running item instead off boat.

name: Muthukrishnan
title: Amazing service from Amazon and good product
content: Aesthetically good and same performance wise...very much sufficient for an average phone and music user...good product at this affordable price..special thanks to Amazon for a great deal..

name: Sethukarasu
title: Earslip and the buds
content: It's been 4 months since I have purchased it, and the ear slip clip keeps slipping out of the headphone. Now i have lost both the ear slip. Can't get a replacement.. anybody has a clue where to get it. I didn't find in amazon.

name: Nizam Km
title: Value for Money
content: Superb bass and noise cancellation. I connected to 2 phones at a time, it’s an amazing bluetooth feature. Very comfort to handle and can easily track switches. The only issue is the built quality! It can be more better I think.

name: Ajith
title: Stopped working and no support from Boat.
content: It stopped charging after 6 months and registered in boat website for replacement. U will get a mail for pickup, but after that nothing will happen. Don't buy any boat brands.

name: Henry
title: The best!!
content: If you're here looking to buy this product, there's no need to wait any further. Go ahead, it is the best. Everything is great. I have tried all other Bluetooth and this is the best in the price range.. Bass is on point!!!. It is comfortable and easily compatible. Totally satisfied!

name: subha kar
title: Sound quality is awesome... Bt Mic was damaged..
content: Bought this headphone on 3rd oct,19..... Sound quality was awesome.. no complaint regarding the sound quality... Bt the headphone which I received tht was damaged.... Mic wasn't working at all.... Really unhappy... U jst ruined my mood.... It was my brthday gift man....

name: DHRUBA CHAKRABORTY
title: Awesome Product Quality
content: Awesome Quality Sound. Awesome Quality Product Quality. If u a songs lover with havy bass users then Go and Buy This Product. This Product Definitely Satisfied You.

name: Mita balat
title: Love the sound of this product..
content: Totally good product in this price.. I bought it in rs.899 in sale. After using 5 days I wrote this review.... All-around it is a good product.. but it's not totally fit in to my 👂... So I feel little pain after using longer... Buy all over it's good product 🤠

name: Vimal
title: After use..review
content: Product built quality is good. The battery shows on 100%, 80%, low. This might be bcoz software issue. Sound is very high with bass and most of the time it hurts the ear due to high bass not for a long time use to listen the music.

name: Dushyanth
title: Extremely heavy bass
content: It is very heavy on the bass.. like really heavy. The bass definitely overpowers the mids and the lows. But after 30 mins, you will get used to it. But for this price, it's bang for the buck!

name: sanjay lad
title: Defective product
content: I have received a defective product which has not worked since i bought it ... now i cant even exchange it...please check the product before selling....

name: akshay
title: Dont waste your money here
content: In a matter of 4 months after order this 1300 something product stopped taking charge and i have no idea how. Very be blutooth connectivity keeps giving the buffers you don't expect , sound quality is okkish.,! Overall Dont waste your money here.

name: Anvar Vellai
title: Good.. but built quality could have been better!
content: May be a 3.5 kind of product. No complaints with sound quality or the comfort. Rockerz rock there.. Built quality looks a bit cheaper. The ear plugs cords are lengthy.. makes them wierd-looking.. Battery life deserves may be 4 or 4.5. it's that good actually.

name: Manoj Ahir
title: Honest review
content: My friend bought this product from shop at rupee 1400 but I got from Amazon in 999 rs..... product quality is very good in this price range ....... volume is low in comparison of other cheap earphones but quality of sound is very good .......

name: Gaurav Pawar
title: Just buy it - best wireless headphones from boat
content: One of the best headphones. Sound quality and bass is very good. Range is also very good. Last easy through a day almost 6-7 hrs of continuous use. Quality product from Bost

name: Kashak Jambhulkar
title: Worthless
content: There is no noise cancelation, sound quality is fine but Bluetooth connectivity is for name sake! It gets disconnected after each minute! Can't use it for calling too, cannot talk because of poor connectivity! Both the sides stop working in few days! Very disappointed and worthless!

name: Ankaj Goyal
title: Stopped working after 6 months of use
content: It has a warranty of 1 year but not a single number of boat customer care is reachable , either it is switched off or not reachable . The left part stopped working after using for 5 months and now I am not even sure whether they would replace it as I cannot connect to their pathetic customer care service

name: Rahul Pandey
title: NOT FOR STUDENTS
content: No doubt it has gr8 sound quality and super bass. Bt the quality is very down, it is totally not a durable item.. My right earpiece stopped working within a month,. And my left side earpiece stopped after 2 months.. ITS WASTE OF MONEY.. I'm a student and I cannot afford buying earphones after every 3-4 months.

name: alen
title: One of the worst headphones under this price
content: Dont buy this crap. The other person can hear the noise clearly thats happening outside even if it is very small. Bass not good as expected. Bad sounds occur sometimes through the headset.i had been using Boult Curve headset but the performance that iut gives is much better than u expect .really dissatisfied and dissappointed

name: JATIN PATEL
title: System not working for reschedule return request
content: Actually Right side ear pod is not working. There is no any sound and that’s why I want to return the product. When your amazon person came yesterday for return pick up the product my home was locked and return request canceled and I got sms to re schedule the return but it does not worked. So need help.. Waiting forcyour further assistance.. Thanks

name: Amit
title: i lost my temper on this product
content: This a bad experience was with the products, my earphone went bed after 4th month, it's be warranty period, but no updates on when applied warranty period for reserving or replacement this item, it's so harrasment and never be trusted after this incident on warrenty period..

name: David
title: Good
content: this product has some issues, connectivity with mobile some times not working and talking in between some disturbance occurred major issue and some tick tick sounds coming and 255pro compare to 255 sports, 255 sports better then 255pro, don't buy guys

name: Mathew Arockiadoss
title: Good not  Best
content: In price point of view its goood, sound quality is not up to tha mark,, average mic quality, battery backup 5 hours continuous user, for moderate use it comes 3 days for me,, charging time 2.30 hours to full.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good sound and bass.... But zero for noise cancelation
content: Overall good sound quality.... Delivered on time... Received Good product in good condition.... I bought it for 899.. But zero to noise cancelation... My family complaining that they hear more sounds in background clearly than my voice

name: Paritosh Agrwal
title: Faults in the product
content: Everything is great about the product, however when I use it for meetings on MS Teams or Skype, I do not hear the audio through the earphones. Instead I hear the audio from the laptop speakers. Once or twice I could hear it from the earphones.

name: VASUDEVA R.
title: Failed neck band design and shape of the ear buds
content: The neck band is having no grip at all.. it's simply coming on to my shoulder very often. It needs to improve its neck band design. Also the buds are not fitting properly in the ear. Overall I was not happy with the product. But iam not going to return it..

name: Asief Mohammed
title: Stopped working in 3 weeks (right ear)
content: Stopped working in 3 weeks.

name: Ruman.Sayed
title: Disappointed
content: Stil one year also hasn't passed for the purchase my right ear piece isn't working... truly disappointed with the quality of the product didn't expect this from a brand like BOAT!!!!

name: Neetu
title: Mic is worst
content: Mic quality is very bad. I replaced it and got new piece but Mic problem was same. Person at other end of the call had complained about low volume or no sound. Sound quality is good. Pls don't buy if you are looking for good Mic

name: Juhi
title: Worst service and quality
content: After seeing the review i bought this earphones but after some time one speaker stop working because of lockdown i m unable to go to store so a droped a mail to them but i didn't received any revert from them really very worst service and worst product totally waste of money i suggest not to buy this product..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for money
content: Very good value for money. Sound quality and quality of the price is very good for the price we pay. Noise cancellation is also good... Bass is little too high..still ok for the price

name: khushboo varma
title: Very good must buy
content: These have a very good sound quality and the battery backup is legit,battery life is good like you don't even have to charge them for the first time it's all ready charged to 💯% battery value for money it works very good

name: amankhan
title: Average
content: Its good but not very good battery backup is nice and calling experience is fine

name: K SUDHINDRA BHARADWAJ
title: Overall ok.. Ear hooks quality is bad
content: Everything is good the only problem is the Ear Hooks loosen up after few months and you'll loose them when you go out.. Disgustingly there are no extra hooks with package... without the Hook the earphone can't stand in the ear.

name: Syam kumar
title: Conectiones
content: I bought this product on sept2019...since from yesterday suddenly it is not working ,both the ear connections were not working...before it seems better..now I came to know that ,it's wroster than any .how can the any damaged like this not even in the span of 9 months...waste of money ...even my friends headset also not working with is bought by the same day .....

name: Bhaskar B.
title: Value for money
content: The sound quality has been more than what I expected. Overall an excellent product at an attractive price tag.

name: aashishsainik
title: Very poor Bluetooth connectivity
content: Very poor Bluetooth connectivity!. Works fine but it has very poor Bluetooth connectivity even when the phone is in my pocket it keeps disconnecting.

name: Ashmit
title: Headphone stop working completely
content: This headphones stop functioning completely from last 10-14 days ...neither it gets on nor it is getting charge....i dnt knw whts wrng wth it.....i need a new headphone in return...as it is in its waranty period

name: Vivek Suryavanshi
title: Price wise good
content: Price wise it is very good. I watched the movie on pc and used this headphones after 2hrs ears started pain. Ergonomics needs to be enhanced like AKG in the ear headphones.

name: Dhananjay Patil
title: Not for calling usage
content: Issue with Bluetooth connectivity. It does not transfer call easily to Bluetooth. Sometimes no proper voice on call. One of the worst products if you are using for calling.

name: Sundarabalaji
title: Most disappointment with boat.. for this product 🥵🥵🥵🥵
content: I was using from july 2020 ,2 months working fine ,but from last 1week its get struck while listening song and all.today it's not working at all.. charging lights starts blinking blue and red.... I could not able to refund also..if anyone knows please help me out

name: prateek garg
title: Poor quality buttons, stopped charging
content: Poor quality buttons. They stopped working within 4 months. Not able to press the power button hence not able to operate it. It has stopped charging even. The quality is poor to be used for long term. It was bad purchase and there is very bad service from company's side.

name: Sanjay Singh
title: Good earphone, but not for Running
content: Its a good earphone on this price. I have bought this for running purpose it do not meet my expectation it slips from my ears while running. Otherwise good earphone.

name: Alokparna
title: Awesome product
content: Loved the device. Was waitingfor it to buy since a long time. Spent three months without a headphone due to lockdown. Now it feels like heaven to listen to songs through it.

name: Navratan Gupta
title: Not good
content: Not good.. Sound quality- 2/5. Noise cancellation - 1/5. Bass - 1/5. Comfort in ear - 2/5. Connectivity - 3/5

name: shivam negi
title: Warranty claims sucks
content: It has been 3 months using the product and what I find out is that one of the ear piece speaker stopped working and when I tried to contact customer service the number was invalid. So I request everyone to not buy this filthy product.

name: VIRENDER
title: Bad
content: A very bad product, i ordered it on 22/10/20, had to replace it due to connectivity issue now after 18 days, one side of earphone stopped working, never purchase a boat product, this is absolutely waste of money

name: Prasanth Pillai
title: Could have been better
content: I bought this for my friend. When he called me using the headset, his sound was not clear. Later I asked him about it. He told me that the sound quality of the earphones is good but the mic is not good.

name: Snehankit k.
title: Osm products
content: Overall best Indian company product best sound quality and osm bass but earbuds are so hard and uncomfortable for long uses but price wise it is best product i will recommends you to change the buds and try any soft bud sound quality will become more good and bass also increases

name: Prashanth V.
title: Worst Earphones
content: Please don't buy this product.... One of the worst Bluetooth Earphones I bought in Amazon 😣.. After 1 month the wires became loose and shows some connectivity error..... While playing pubg there is 1 second latency

name: Devdatta Deshpande
title: Starts giving problem after few months of use
content: Battery issue started after few months, sometimes is does not work and after few months stopped working at all, useless product, don't buy at all!!

name: shirish
title: Avarage
content: Not proper voice came when call comes. Neckless length is not proper hence we not communicate properly. Neckless fitting not properly for that lot of disturbance came.

name: vamshi
title: Don't buy this earphones
content: After 6 months using bort was not connecting to Bluetooth don't buy this earphones

name: nishant singh
title: Don't
content: Everything is good but durability sucks and that means the product is really waste.. I have it since 2 months and one on side has already stopped working.. I wouldn't buy it again and you shouldn't buy it now

name: Happy User
title: A nice product
content: I have one plus. N I think it is best to use Bluetooth earphones when u have the earphones and charger socket as one. I am happy with the product. I would like to recommend this product.

name: DHARA
title: suck a good quality in reasonable price.
content: quality is good including sound bass and all just one problem i have phase is after one month of using idk how bluetooth of phone got disconnect somehow because of this.

name: Adarsh Kale
title: Quite good. Considerable for this price range.
content: Sound quality is not bad, but not as expected (compared to wired boat earphones).. The battery life is considerably good, its as mentioned (6hrs+). I found little lag in sound of around half a second(~300 to 400ms), while watching a movie which made me to give 3 stars.. The product physical quality is appreciable, good quality of thick wiring is used.

name: Aneesh MR
title: Good experience at moderate price

What I didn't like. 1.Too much on the bass side. Sound is not balanced.. 2. Once you plug it you are disconnected from your surroundings. Not a pleasant experience.

name: Nomi
title: Stopped working after just 60 days of use
content: Stopped working after just 60 days of use. One on the right side is not working anymore. Customer support don't reply to mails.

name: S.M

name: Mukesh Kumar Barkhania

name: Milo

Speaker will go back and from ears during jogging. Battery average 2.5 Hours Max. I will recommend Samsung Level U instead of this.

name: vasista

name: Parin Kansagara

name: Rajoo Alugu
title: !!! Not worth the PRICE at all !!!
content: The sound quality is not as described on the product specifications.. I would not say not worth the price - Value for Money NO!!!

name: Shivam Verma
title: Worst customer service of Boat

PATHETIC CUSTOMER SERVICE OF boat, earphones stopped working and now they have taken my earphones and not responding to my calls and mails since a month... don't trust boat for customer service..

name: Sandeep
title: Dont buy if u want longlife earphones

name: Mrinal Gautam
title: Boat rockerz

name: PrabhuJee Sharma

name: IamJai

name: Nitesh
title: Value for money

name: Shivam tewari  💕

And main thing is it is not connecting itself to my PC I have tried a lot..but these are not good... Such a bad thing by amazon India .... I have never expected this thing from amazon.... Please don't buy these stufs from amazon..... So bad...😔😭

name: Aditya
title: Don't buy: from a long term user

name: Manish
title: Distorted sound
content: While using the headphone the sound becomes very distorted very frequently. Earlier I thought it could be an issue with my phone but even after changing the phone the issue remains same. It's an OK quality product not a good quality one.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Customer service is worst

name: Swagatika sahoo
title: Service issue
content: I ve a very bad experience regarding this product. After 1 month of buying sound quality be among very poor infact it's not audible in one side. And after raising complain the service centre agent collected the bluetooth,but its already 20 days left, I m neither able to connect their customer care nor able to tracking my bluetooth service complain by the tracking I'd given to me

name: Muzzy
title: Used product delivered

name: spanyda
title: Good product

name: chirag
title: Disappointed

Expected a good experience with boat but so disappointed. On top of that it doesn't provide any return policy.

name: Shruti
title: Boat customer service is very poor. One earplug not working.
content: The right earplug has stopped functioning within months of buying it. My product is covered under warranty but Extremely poor customer service. The numbers or email ID's provided by boat are extremely unhelpful. If you register a complaint it only gives you certain contact numbers which are not reachable.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Pathetic Headphone
content: Just 1 week the headphones run smoothly but don't buy for noise cancellation, the person will struggle to listn your voice and after 2 weeks, I'm unable to make a call and unable to hear or talk using this cheap boat headphone!! I resuwest you not to go for it! Plz

name: anoop
title: Bad mic and low battery life

name: Prabhakar K.
title: Good one. Check before buy

name: Yash
title: After 6 months still perform the same
content: Written review after 6 months use .. Really great deal and product. Still same battery backup , voice quality and sound quality.. Value for money product.

name: Ravi Pandey
title: Boat Rockerz
content: I have used this 3-4 hours only. Sound quality is impressive. Bass is superb. The Irritating thing is it beeps when you scroll feeds or pages in Iphone.. Quality is nice. In the Box: Earphone, Charging Cable, Extra Buds, Warranty Card, and User Manual.

name: Archana
title: Don't buy any product from "Boat"
content: I have purchased this product on 12 September 2019.. But just in two months both earphones are not-working. I tried for replacement from it's site they are more worse ever as I got irritated with their reply that my invoice of complaints is not correct.

name: sarita s.
title: About it
content: Not good quality

name: abhishek
title: value for money if you buy near 899 not more than this

name: K C JOSHI
title: Average

name: Abid Khursheed
title: Great sound and battery backup and very flexible but Noise cancellation is a must .

name: Dhaval Balsara

name: Gayathri
title: Good quality

name: suneesh
title: Charging issue

name: sathish
title: Best price to buy 899 .....

name: Sreejith Nair

name: akshat
title: FAKE BOAT PRODUCTS, DONT BUY!!!!!!!

name: Jeeva Israel

I changed it with small bud, it's sounds great and clear.

name: Arun
title: Very disappointing

name: Nisarg Patel

The angle of ear tip makes extremely comfortable and with best noise and the secondary holder on top cancels every external noise and makes it perfect for sports.I’ve used it for Gyming,badminton,table tennis and for movies and web series.. And Working of Siri is superb and does every task I have given to Siri through earphone.

name: Anurag Srivastava
title: Don't buy this product. Worst earphone I had used.

I got new earphone from boat .. After 2 month I could not be able to charge my earphone ...both ear buds have problem I could not be able to hear sound clearly .. Don't buy it .. I have worst experience with boat.

name: Rohan koli
title: Not Bad

Not found any issue in noise cancellation. I would say its budget earphone with better build & sound quality. Expecting higher version of bluetooth.

name: Chayachitrakar
title: Average headphones

Connectivity issues are - sometimes the headset disconnects and connects back even when call or music is playing.. This is very annoying. If the purpsoe is more towards listening to music, serves the purpose.

name: Gourav Chakraborty
title: Wastage of money

name: Deepu

name: Pawan

name: Amazon Customer

name: Vicky

Bake sab thik hai boat earphones quality best 👍👍🤙

name: Sachin
title: Worst service of boAt

I've made a replacement complaint but I didn't receive my replaced product since a month. The customer care number doesn't work. They are not replying on mail also. Work experience ever.

name: Manan

name: samuel
title: Awesome buy

name: Akhilesh Khanduri

name: Praveen kajla

name: Koteswararao  Kommineni

name: k.Vineeth Yadav

name: Amazon Customer

name: Gadget Master

Initially it worked as expected but after two months of normal use, it's earbuds and hooks went off. Then suddenly its left side earpiece stopped working. I used this one with care as mentioned in manual and used for only two hours a day every day and two. Very very disappointed. I guess they compromised the quality to compete with competitors price.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Service from boat c.care and quality of the product is not satisfactory 😠😠😠

name: Abhishek Rai
title: Poor quality not charging even once

name: G sathish
title: Nice product at this price range - Value for money

name: AKASH GUPTA
title: Over all its a good deal if you buy this in 1000rs.

Build quality is not that good, it is ok.. Microphone quality is not that much good.. Very good for base lovers.. Over all its a good deal if you buy this in 1000rs

name: Manab
title: Best after sales service and good sound quality at this price point

But boat after sales service is one of the best after sales service i have recieved which was totally hassel free for me.

name: Gagandeep Singh

I again contacted boat and received 3 rd item which is not even getting power on. Now again I tried contacting Boat but not getting any response. Amazon is also not giving a convincing reply. They are simply asking me to contact Boat.

name: Ritvik Vaid

name: sahil ghai
title: boat 255 rubber hook keeps coming out

name: nandan mehta

Not happy with the product.

name: M.K Soni

name: Sumit Yadav

name: Roushan raj

name: Cyril
title: Not good

name: abhishek reddy
title: Super awesome, extremely good,loved it

name: Raj

name: Sunny Aggarwal
title: Boat Rockerz-Wastage of money

name: Tej Kumar J

name: Darshan
title: Worst product

name: Suresh

name: Amazon Customer

Battery backup is good for listening music. But if you continuously use for calling then you need to carry the charger alsong with head phones.. Over all performance is ok ok.

name: Gulshan Jain
title: Sound Quality while you are on call

Along with this i couldn't experience any noice cancellation/reduction feature in this because during call (the people with whom i was talking), they were saying some disturbance from your side and the same I was feeling. So overall for listening music its good but for calling purpose its not a nice product to buy.. Thanks

name: Chandan Mishra
title: Superb Earphone

name: Sujoy M.
title: U really need to know the 😂 demerit of this  product
content: I have used it for more than 6 months and still using..it...but the major problem that has occured is ibam addicted to its sound quality and and the tremble bass co ordination is just awesome...hope we can see many futuristic sound mechanics from boat.....all the best and much love..from Sujoy Mukherjee

name: suyog more
title: Quality issue

name: Sanjay choudhary
title: super
content: its a super product in the price, have tried many headsets but this is awesome. you can buy without any confusion or risk.

name: Mahendra P. Singh
title: Sound quality and backup is good
content: Awesome product, I purchase after read review. Sound quality and backup is good.

name: Benjamin Paul Singh
title: Its Nice
content: I was using Sennheiser CX275. Now i shifted to this product. Music quality is the only drawback.. 1. Wireless - 5 Star. 2. Calls - 5 Star. 3. Music - 3 Star (compared to Sennheiser CX275). 4. Movies - 5 Star. 5. Price - 4 Star (Value for money). Over All - 4.5 Star

name: Mavn!
title: A product worth buying
content: It has been the best earphone I have tried.. I'm using it for more than 1 year. The sound quality is awesome. The best part is its fitting. Through it got damaged 2 times in its warranty period but they replaced it even for the 2nd time that was very good service.. I must recommend you this earphone

name: Amazon Customer
title: Mic does not filter any background noise
content: If you are buying for taking calls, pls DON'T.. All the ambient noise comes through the mic.. What boat calls as noise cancelling could be noise getting into your ear... But the mic is pathetic.. I have Jabra evolve 40 which are wired and I wanted to go wireless. Rockerz 255 are not even 1% of them.

name: Samruddhi
title: The Earphones stopped working after 1-2 days of use.
content: The earphones worked okay for the first 1-2 days after delivery and then all of a sudden wont switch on. I doubt the product can get repaired either. During the time I used, the battery died twice (in less than 2 days without heavy use). Waste of 1k on a low quality product listed on amazon. Avoid buying on all means!

name: JAY KRISHNAKUMAR
title: Good headphones with slightly uncomfortable earplugs.
content: Good battery life. Bass is kind of overpowering. The earplugs that come with it was too uncomfortable for me. Maybe fir others it would fit better. Overall I would rate it 7/10.

name: Ayan
title: Best at this price point!

Cons are bit lengthy, low and mid tunes are not clear sometimes.. Overall is a highly recommend product to all budget bass and music lover.

name: Akhilesh
title: Very poor quality product

Though, it has one year warrantee but my experience with BoAt support is very bad. I tired thier customer care nobody takes call, i uploaded the invoice for exchange online but there is no response from company.

name: Bhumit Luhar
title: My experience was very bad

For my online lectures I had used it but there is a lot of extra noise there and when I disconnected it then the sound is good and very clear from my laptop. There is a heavy need to improve it because it is not the value for money device. Please don't buy it.

name: Danvers
title: Bad product
content: Do not buy this. Mine stopped working in 2 months and back in that time it costed me 2k. Also boat services for warranty really sucks and this product will not be replaced by them if found damaged. Instead spend some more money and go for Samsung level U or Sony.

name: Ramesh
title: Un able to attend phone calls with cut cut sound.
content: After using ten days this product I am writing this. My earband not working properly when I get phone call. I am getting proper sound from music and other videos from. I am very much disappointed with phone call answering. If possible please replace my headphones

name: ram
title: Not upto the mark

name: Sudhanva

name: Neha Singh
title: Very very bad product

name: S.Rupesh Reddy

Pros:. 🔋 Battery Life was simply superbb. Connectivity is fast. Sound quality is good and bass is punchy. Build Quality Is good as per price of 999/-. Cons :. Wire is long

name: Amazon Customer
title: Headphones are worked only for a Year

name: Amazon Customer

name: saurabh
title: BoAt Rockerz 255 sports bluetooth wireless headphones

But it charged fastly than any other it is waireless thats why it more useful, it's performance is brilliant, Attractive ergonomics with a Comfort Fit, With the wireless functionalitysurely your companion for your travel and daily needs,Compatible With: Laptop, Mobile, Tablet.

name: Adarsh

content: It has been a month, battery goes upto 6 7 hrs easily, but the battery indicator is all fake, cuz suddenly it will drop to dead, also the low battery notification comes just 2 or 3 mins before shutdown. Sound quality is almost good, connectivity range is not more than 10 m for an open area, if walls are within then it won't get very good to the second room

name: Amit Gupta
title: V.V.V Poor Service
content: From last 6mnths my bluetooth has been issued a faulty, i hd given my product Boat Rockerz 255 for replacement. From last 2 mnths i didnt get any information or any replacements messages from their side, continuosly im mailing they not picking up call, Dont Purchase this companies product

name: Nanjappa

name: rajat

name: Anand Kateja

name: Koushik Das

name: Neha

name: Tarunendra Jaiswal

name: Dhirananda D.
title: Boat rockerz review

And it comes with 1 year warranty ,that's a good thing for me. And over all sound is good and base is too good . I have bought it at 999 RS . Price is good

name: Sam
title: Below average

title: fake  product

name: Siddartha Mandal

So try to order this separately for better packaging service rather than adding to your cart and buying more than one product.

name: Karunakar Reddy

name: Tiger

name: Amazon Customer

name: A Ahmed

name: Jyoti Suresh

name: sanju singh

name: P. SEN

name: Sameer singh

name: Yogesh Dwivedi

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst product!!

name: Lokesh.S.Jain
title: Boat Rockerz 255

name: Shriyansh Rathore
