Customer service of this brand is the worst as compared to other companies, they will never respond you if either register a complaint or not !! Buy at your own risk

name: Amazon Customer
title: Pathetic after sale service
content: Pathetic service from boat. I raised a request for replacement within warranty period as the left side stopped working. They picked the product on time but no update after that. 3 months have passed and I have still not received the replacement nor they are repairing it. Customer service number is useless as they never take your call.

name: Anurag Bampal
title: Just for few hours of music. But it has potential.
content: Just a little con in this product and that is it has a few hours of bettery life, which they have already mentioned.. Purchased two of them one is in neon green and another one is red in color at same time.. Both the shipment were from different vendor & from different state and received in good state.

name: Keshav
title: Worst product.!!!! Waste of money.
content: Worst product. One side stopped working within very few days.. Warranty also cannot be claimed.. Don't buy... Waste of money.

name: Harikrishnan PC
title: Worth money
content: Good headset. The charge will last for 5 to 6 hours on continous use. The sound quality and bass is superb. At times it misbehaves while connecting to devices.

name: Madhukar Raj
title: Its not working
content: Its not working now how can i return back

name: Sushant P.
title: Go for it
content: Good sound and built quality but bluetooth range should be more and wire must be little short it is bigger than other while riding bike it moves lot by wind or also doing jogging on ground that time also it moves a lot it is so irritating if you are looking perfect neck band in low price just go with Boult curve before boat I was using it.

name: Akash BV
title: My experience
content: I personally liked this bluetooth earphone after few days of use because of it good bass and I would not recommend if you don't like heavy bass . The battery life is quite good and the fit is very nice, once put on it would not come of thanks to the rubber support and light weight of the drivers

name: rahul shaw
title: Wrost build quality
content: Don't buy this product.. It's a very low quality product. Build quality is worst. Used this since 10 months but the charging slot is very hard which results moving of the charging slot and now it have been broken.. Wrost wireless headphone I have ever had.

name: The reformer
title: Fake product received
content: It was a fake product delivered by Amazon .. After 10 days it's battery stopped getting charged.. I don't know how to get warranty.. I hope Amazon online order slip will do .. Request Amazon and boat to help .

name: sharad
title: Over bass make music listening unpleasant. Good built
content: Built quality good but bass is not punchy. Its loud which make unnecessary grove in each beat. Even in voice call also it sound bad due to over bass

name: M sabir shaikh
title: Tech box talks
content: I have given my complete detailed review on my YouTube channel TECH BOX TALKS. check out the channel for review. Thank you

name: Digvijay
title: Not fitted into ears. Not good
content: Make sure that it will fit into your ears. I bought for my sister and wife but both has problem with fitting.

name: Himanshu Singh
title: Just Good
content: Nice earphone with good bass.. Sound Quality is Also good.. Sometime there is a connectivity issue or a lag but I don't know it is due to this earphone or my phone.. Overall it's a nice product but not upto my expectations.. P.S.- may be I got high expectations 😉

name: Sai charan
title: Amazing product,but Not suitable for answering calls
content: The sound quality is amazing it is completely light weight . No doubt you will get value for you money by buying this product. Only issue is if you are buying it for answering your calls surely you will be dissatisfied because the Mike is very sensitive and catches every sound in your surroundings and you will not be able to listen what you are talking

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor quality
content: Pathetic products.. Only worked for 2months..since then trying to exchange the product... Gurantee for one year.. But dont know the process how to exchange... Please support..

name: Anita shaw
title: Descent earphones!!!!!
content: The product is osm at the price of 999. The quality is descent. The only thing that disappointed me is its wire. The wire is very thin, I think boat could give better wires quality.

name: Anonymous
title: 4 months rough usage review
content: Review after 4 months of rough usage. > Sound quality 10/10. > Bluetooth 3/10 it disconnects again and again. > Overall good but bluetooth connectivity disappoints bit. So u can go for it as it's best in range still and best for sound quality

name: Amazon Customer
title: Brillient product
content: Dear sir,. The product is awesome.. But it is not working now in lockdown and I am trying to replace this product. Please help to replace as only one month warranty is left.

name: Swapnil Gandhi
title: Value for Money!
content: I got this product during one of Amazon many sale periods. It cost me Rs. 999/-. For the price it is an awesome product. I use it mostly to speak over phone calls and gives me a comfortable battery time of a little more than a day. With music on for most of the day, the batter lasts for a little less than a day.. With the price in mind, its a sure BUY recommendation.

name: Raghu
title: WARRANTY TERMS : TO BE CONSIDER PRIOR TO BRAND NAME
content: WARRANTY TERMS ARE CRITICAL ,NO SERVICE CENTER IN MY STATE CAPITAL.. COMPLIANT RAISED THRICE .AND THEN FINALLY THEY ARRANGED PICKUP OF FAULTY. DEVICE.. I DONT THINK ,THEY ARE GOING TO REPIAR/ REPLACE FAULTY DEVICE.. WARRANTY TERMS TO BE CONSIDERED PRIOR TO BRAND.A

name: Rohit Kumar.S
title: DONT BUY THIS JUNK... WORST WORSTTTTTT ONE....
content: Very worst i would say no customer support .... and frndz 1st of all it is not even 1% swet proof.. Not working in 1 month bluetooth not connecting to my device.. better go for phillips, sony or samsung.... not worth..

name: SARAVANAKUMAR
title: Good product
content: I am using this for last two months. Over all performance is very good. I am using only call purpose. Battary life is about to one day.. Call is very clear & loud.

name: Arvind Joshi
title: Connection issue . Auto connect and disconnect during call.
content: It keeps doing connects and disconnects itself during call. You can not use it for a call because it will switch to phone any time. What is the use of it when you can't make a call out of it . Boat has done everything for adds nothing on product quality. Not worthy.

name: Suneeta
title: Exchange of product
content: The product has not been working since February and it was under warranty .We wanted to proceed a request but due to lockdown we couldn't proceed with it. We would like to exchange the product.

name: Vivacious
title: Value for money
content: Boat has come up with this superb product. Value for money. Great bass, battery, comfortable to use, long back up. Things they can upgrade is the bluetooth range and auto disconnect on joining earpieces.

name: OP
title: Value for money
content: Good bass and sound at this (1000-1500 Rs) price.. Pathetic battery indicator, it will show 100%-80% till 4.5-5 hours and suddenly low battery indicator blinks.. Avg battery backup. Decent looks

name: CHETAN
title: Not working properly after 4 months
content: I used it for 4 months and now its not working properly. Its stopping in between and i have to switch it on again and again even though it has been conected to the device. Battrey is fully charged still it gets stopped in between and i have to start it again. In a minute i have to start 4-5 times again amd again

name: Ravi garud
title: Eco sound in call
content: i am using this headphone from 12 Nov.. Many people says, your noise is not clear, while i am disconnecting a device from phone, then sound quality is clear to other.. i want replace this peace, amazon says, the replacement window is closed, how can i clam warranty.

name: Ayesha
title: Awesome
content: Amazing,Best earphone I have used so far .. I got it what I want...really superb.those who are planning to go for it.. 1.Good sound with extra bass. 2.Good quality with cleared sound.. 3.with nice looks. 4.for bass lovers this is a thumbs up. 5.super very nice design...

name: Anirudh Sharma
title: Awesome Bass
content: Product quality could be better 6/10 in this.. But sound and Bass of these earphone is amazing.. 10/10 on that. You will love the bass of these earphone

name: Josephraj E
title: Broken package
content: First of all the package deal has been already broken and it seems to-be used by someone.. Then the voice is not that much of greater. Third voice cancellation is not perfect.

name: aravind kumar
title: It's completely gone in 4 months
content: I am literally feeling vry bad.. i purchased in April only.. now August but my head phone are not working both ear buds are not functioning... Only Bluetooth paring in phone no sound in both buds. .. more charging for more than 5 hrs and play time up to only 3 to 4 hrs its ridiculous...

name: kv shyam sundar
title: Awesome product value for money
content: I feel very lucky to get this product for 1500₹ sound quality, clarity,bass,treble everything is good I just love the output of music..really product made me write the review..Thanks So Much to Boat for the quality product

name: Hozefa chatriwala
title: Very bad aftersales service
content: I bought this product and within 3 months it stopped charging, on sercice centre does not have stock for replacement.. Its been a month but the issue is not solved.. Service centre dont answer the call and customer service asks to contact service centre and is of no help

name: Punam
title: Poor product .not worth for 500
content: Poor qwality .cheap product .please don't buy it

name: Ramana babu
title: Multiple divises not connecting defective model
content: Battery performance is not good. And multiple divises not connecting. With in 10 days it was giving problem plz okz don't buy this product. I was buy samsung level U head phones. It was good un intrept 2 years still working.

name: Sathiyarasu
title: Boss bass
content: Boat really rockzzzz, stunning boss beat, am music lover its perfectly fit to me,call quality also fine, battery backup also good 5hours surely...

name: Jayapal
title: Exquisite Performance..
content: Great bass and treble, best sound quality, best noise cancellation, battery backup upto 6hrs, very fast bluetooth connectivity. I was able to buy this product for Rs.999/-. After delivering the product, it was found to have received Rs.100/- in the Amazon pay balance. That means I got the boat headphone on Rs.899/-. Thank you Amazon.

name: Jagdamba Prasad Gupta
title: Connecting problem
content: after ten days its disconnection problem occurs frequently.its disconnected and connected again and again itself.its very irritating.don,t waste your money.

name: Average indian consumer
title: Best earphones
content: Long lasting battery, fastest connectivity, awesome sound, durable build, voice assistant... A complete package. Worth the buy. I have 6 headphones,3 of them are boat. this is best so far

name: Amazon Customer
title: WORST QUALITY 1HR PLAY BACK ..CHINESE HEADSET
content: Worst product ,bought when the sale was there ....after full charge just 1 hour playback....my 20watt bluetooth speaker performs better than this...6hr play back ...worst product ,they are not made in india ,they are taking bulk units from china and labeling the name .

name: mayur
title: MyBoatRockerz255 Review
content: The bass quality is too good. I have used other sports in ear bullets also. But this is my personal opinion that this boat rockerz 255 model is one of the finest model. Noise cancellation is above average. And aound quality is good enough. Great product.

name: Viswa
title: For Music lovers
content: I like the headset with bass.. And this is a perfect headset for that.. Even the noise cancelation is good.. Only problem I feel is that the mic is available little bit away from the mouth.. So the voice is not that clear during calls

name: Tasmiya
title: Connection issue after device goes to sleep mode
content: Could not able to connect once the device (earphone) goes to sleep mode. Though battery has enough charge level. This happened 6-7 times within a week of deliverybof the product.. To power on from sleep mode. Device has to be connected to charger and power on. Disappointed

name: NIKHIL MEHRA
title: Worth every penny
content: These r the best Bluetooth earphones under 1000 bucks.. If u r a bass head ull love it.. I don't find such sound quality on JBL t110 Bluetooth or Samsung level u buds.. I bought these for 899 n worth every penny.. Definitely recommend these.

name: Keshava Shreenidhi
title: Only 3 months of durability!! Be aware dont fall for looks of the earphone!!
content: One of the worst product I have ever brought. In 3 months stoped working!. I recommend not to buy this earphone. Everything else like sound quality, noice cancelation are pretty good. But if the durability is less everything else becomes waste.

name: Ram
title: Nice product at this price range. You can go for it.
content: Awesome product. Sound quality is Good. Average Noise cancellation but at this price range, it is good. Sits firmly in the ears and doesn't slip out during workouts.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor after sales service by Boat
content: Never buy Boat. Their after sales service is really bad. They will share a link and ask you to register. No one calls you up despite follow ups. Quality is important. But it needs to be end to end.

name: Arun sivan
title: Don't expect Music quality
content: This one is perfect for workouts... Bluetooth connectivity is super..... But....sound output is not at all good at this price range... I got this for ₹999. That's a pretty deal.. i feel mi basic wired earphones(399₹) gives much better output than any other mid range earphones.. and main thing.. package was open when i received the item.

name: Ajay
title: Return or replace
content: It's one side is not working kindly tell how to claim warranty as it still in warranty period. Not able to file complaint as there site is not accepting complaint.

name: aksh
title: Very good product
content: My friends use it. I and my family use it. It's really good for this price point. Durable too.

name: Ganesh Khandare
title: Average Quality Product
content: Don't buy this. Sound is not very excellent. It is below average. If you are looking for strong base and beats then surely no for it. Battery life is good. Moreover only one service centre in entire mumbai ( This is really weired.) That too in Malad.

name: DHananjay Patil
title: Really good and durable.
content: No doubt it has a great bass and to a great extent noise cancellation and decent sound clarity and mind blowing battery but the following dissapointed me though i tried a lot to adjust.. 1. Pain in ear due the conical buds(can be removed). 2. No pouch provided.

name: Naveen
title: My second boat rockers.
content: This is my second boat rockers. Everything is good sound, battery, bass. I used to recommend to my friends but I don't know why after warranty period one side speaker is not working I was using it smooth. I hope this one works good.

name: Ankur Tyagi
title: New ear phones
content: The reduction in noise from outside is really good however the sound quality could have been much better. Good stuff at this rate. The draw back is it doesn't show how much charging is left, it would keep showing as full even after 3-4hrs of use.

name: twinkle khambra
title: The sound is good, only problem is with noise cancellation.
content: I am using it from last one year, the sound quality is good and the only problem is noise cancellation, there is no feature in it for noise cancellation. When u were travelling or at noisy place , u cant talk on calls using it, the outside sound will irritates the opponent.

name: Abhilash RB
title: Just OK headset.
content: Received Headset today. Will point Cons directly :. 1. Design is Not ergonomic & will not feel comfortable.. 2. Noise cancellation is very poor. Except your voice all are clear while call.. 3. Sound quality is OK only. Lot of Bass is there, if you like it.. 4. Over priced and NO return. Only replacement woth another one is available.

name: sri vindhya
title: Waste product from shamshabad store Hyderabad
content: The product I got from some village near shamshabad,which is waste and the charging cable or the nodes are not provided the battery is heating ,and i got the waste product, I put on many expectations on this product but this turn out to be my bad luck so I have returned it.

name: konaditya b.
title: Earphone stopped working 8n 8 months
content: It worked pretty well for 8 months. Sturdy and wornderful sound quality. But the left earphone stopped working in 8 months. Now I am using it only with the righ earphone

name: debajyoti paul
title: Unnecessary long chord.
content: bluetooth connectivity is not up to mark, wvery time needs to search saved device. Unnecessary long wire,how they can say it is wireless?

name: sanjay sharma
title: This product is not working ,Please replace it
content: I have used Ear phone only one month, after one month it was not working properly. Now it was totally stop working. Please suggest me how it will replace .This product have one year warranty. Please do the needful to replace it at the earliest.. Thanks

name: Naveen
title: Good product with 1399 price and in boat reputated brand
content: It's good product but I feel no use of war hooks and I removed them from my headsets. Sound is fine. Bass is not soo clear as I expected. Overall if ur burget is 1500 can buy these

name: SaikatB
title: Lots of surrounding noise when talking over phone
content: Person on the other side of the phone hears a lot of surrounding noise when i use this earphone for calling...And I have confirmed this issue from many of my friends who are also using this earphone...They all are facing this issue...And it is really irritating for the person on the other side..Rest are good.. Battery is huge..12 hours max on moderate use..Sound quality is okay

name: Amazon Customer
title: Don't buy it
content: Very poor quality always issue while connecting with any device and it will automatically disconnect. I have replaced it with another but same problem is another Lao after some days. Please don't buy it .

name: Sahil
title: Amazon is faking us
content: Its the worst product of the life at first i got technical problem and earphone is getting a different voice but when i changed it with another one its a used peice and some accesories are missing. Im very disappointed with your product and I don't think ill ever buy anything eles from Amazon

name: Selvaraj Venkatesan
title: charging does not stand....
content: Even though there was a good rating about the product which prompted me to buy this, the product's charging does not stand by and everytime when I use I have to charge....

name: Prakash Sivasankar
title: Good headphone
content: This is good product. But cost wise little high for this. Same cost better Bluetooth earphones in same amzon so this is also good but this is not best.. So try any other new brands.

name: Powar
title: best in 1000rupees.
content: sound quality is best.. best battery back-up. it is bass centric earphone. so you want balance sound go for BOULT earphone or another one. because i have both earphone BOAT & BOULT.

name: Kishore
title: One side stops working even using in super optimal conditions
content: Worst product, it been just 15 days and one side is NOT working even though I took very much care on not to overcharge, not to expose to heat/moisture, neither did pulled it much.. With these super optimal condition if the product fails functioning, we should think of its quality.. I am trying to claim warranty/replacement.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bad
content: It's worse head phone I ever bought. Sound is muffled and after couple days couldn't hear anything from the right side of the head phone.

name: Rajaram
title: Battery bulging within two weeks
content: This is the worst product I've ever received from Amazon. My product was working fine for the first few weeks after which I faced problem with the battery, itvis draining so fast and also it is bulged. I'm neither able to return now since the return period is over. I've purchased so many times from Amazon but this is the worst experience. Total waste of money.

name: Lahari
title: Not worth your money.
content: Stopped working within 4 months of purchase. 2 months into the buy, left side stopped and 2 months post that the right one. Please do not buy. Waste of money.

name: Bharat Arora
title: Battery malfunction
content: I heard that generally boAt products are good but i tried neckband first time and in just 2 months the battery malfunctioning, even after full charge loosing battery in few minutes. I want replacement of the product under warranty

name: brijesh singh
title: NOICE CANCELLATION NOT AVAILABLE
content: AS THE PRODUCT IS FINE ONCE CHARGED RUN FOR 8 HRS PLAYTIME CONTINUOUS OR SAY WILL WORK FOR A DAY WITH THE CALLS, ONLY THE NOISE CANCELLATION IS NOT AVAILABLE SO IT TAKES ALL THE BACKGORUND NOISE AND THE CALLER HAS DIFFICULTY TO LISTEN

name: Sasikumar
title: Bluetooth Range Issue
content: I bought 2 nos same device. 1 is working good another one have range issue, in spec it's mentioned bluetooth range is 10 meeters. But 3 to 4 meeters distance it's self call or music got interrupt and disconnected.. Some products are have this problem. But is super.

name: Swapnil Rajesh Arpel
title: Only buy when they are original.
content: Wanna tell u when I bought it for first time. It was the best then any of the headset I have ever used. And after that I ordered two more. But they where the fake or was not that good. Sound was too bad and the Bluetooth chip set was different from the first I ordered. I can say they where not original. So I replaced them and again I got the fake one so I finally returned them.

name: Naveed Pasha
title: Not so good in that price range
content: Honest review after using it for around 1 year 3 months. First the wires are so delicate, one side stopped working only after 3 months of usage, luckily they replaced it as it was under warrant. As it completed one year one side doesn't work and respond. Better go for something else.

name: Sandeep soman
title: Good product only problem facing with noise cancellation
content: Good product. Very comfortable to use it.. The only problem I'm facing is noise cancellation. Some disturbance are been catched while phone calls and records.. please check... Otherwise product is good and battery life is 6 hrs as per the company says..

name: Prithvi Mehta
title: Great headphones, causes headaches.
content: Does everything it states. Mic is particularly great for calls.. But it causes headaches after a use of more than 2hrs. I don't know whether it's because of bluetooth or the magnets in the earbuds.. I have gifter 2 of these and even they have complained the same.

name: Alankar Choudhari
title: Pathetic Return Policy
content: My mom received the product on 5th of Oct. It wasn't tested or opened before today. Wasn't at all happy with the output of the headphones. So tried to replace it with some other. Dont have option for replacing the same.. Its a disgrace. Wasteful use of money.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Need to improve in software for message voice
content: Product is very good but the message for battery low or connection or disconnected is very loud and automatically with full volume.

name: Vakeshkumar
title: Sound quality is good
content: Sound quality is good but the distance is not covering 5 meter also. I kept mobile is hall and went to next room. Not able to here clearly.

name: karthikeyan
title: Go for better product
content: Picture is not appropriate as per the product.. This product doesn't qualify the return/refund policy. Product seems a bit expensive.. We may feel some pain for long time usages.

name: MAYANK
title: VALUE FOR MONEY
content: Ratings. Bass 4.8/5 (Better Than Sennheiser cx180). Tribels 3.8/5. Vocals 4.0/5. Call Quality 3.5/5. Bluetooth Range 3.7/5. Battery 4.2/5(it can easily use up to 2 days if you use daily approx 2 to 3 hrs). Used Material Quality 4.8/5. Overl All Good Product. This is Far better than MI sports basic Bluetooth Earphones

name: BASAVA RAJU PALAGIRI
title: The best option in1k to 1.5k budget.
content: I purchased it for my employee(electrician). Now he is looking like lord Siva with snake like headset at all times except while sleep.

name: Himanshu Suman
title: Please dont buy.
content: I have bought 3 of these in duration of 4 months, every time one side is not working, and it is hard to cover it in warranty as only in few cities service centre available. I suggest sony cs wi 200 little expensive but quality is awesome.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for bucks!!!
content: Sound Quality is good,Bass is not like what u get in Extra Bass Head in ear headphone but solves the purpose.Battery life is good but battery percentage shows incorrectly.Durability i feel the headphone Wire length is more little less would do no harm.. After using it for 1 year & 3 month the RH side earbud stop working.There is frequently Bluetooth loss issue, now not a single song is streamed uninterrupted.

name: L
title: Good sound quality, but really bad mic.
content: Giving it two stars because the the mic is really bad. Too much background noise can be heard and often times I have to just use the phone mic instead during calls because it gets frustrating.. Everything else is great though. Sound quality is great. Plus has a decent battery life.

name: Kabir Thapar
title: Good But not worth it can try
content: It is good but I prefer that the build quality,indication system and sound quality could be better. Good but not worth it. I am telling this because I gifted it to my mother and she is a teacher. For her there is a lot of use of headphones but the fitting was not liked by her.

name: Shekhar Kashyap
title: Product quality not good
content: Voice quality is not good most of the time I face voice break and while driving it’s completely not audible. I’ve used it only 2 or 3 days after purchasing and looking for replacement but there is no option bcz it is more than 10 days old now. I purchased it as a gift for someone but not able to give him bcz of some reasons and used it myself and disappointed.

name: aditya
title: Don't buy
content: It will stop working property after couple of days and you can't replace this item because of return day policy and complaint also not possible on BoAt.............. bad experience never buy it .....

name: mvschaitanya
title: Your need can be fulfilled but not a fully satisfactory product
content: It has to be handled carefully. Be careful and dont over charge. I have used it just for 1 and half month and later it got battery issue. Right now its undergoing warranty claim process . Built quality is good. Sound and bass good. But product lifespan depends on how. you use it.

name: sandeep shastri
title: Boat rockers 255
content: Superb bass probably the best in this price range.Battery life is ok last up to 4 he's on full charge. Got them @999 at this price it is a steal deal.Thank u Amazon. These earphones or way better than jbl.

name: omprakash
title: Good go for it
content: I brought in 999 , amazing quality , sound is good, those who love more bass , will happy with this , unable to find how to connect two device simultaneously , rest is all ok , good headphone go for it.

name: sujit kumar dey
title: Return boat rockerz 255 pro
content: I want to return this item as it is not up to the mark. The range of this product is too short. To hear sound it requires to be fixed at the maximum level. But, no option for return is being seen. Only replacement option is found there. I want to return it not to replace. Please help me.

name: SARADA SATULURI
title: Disconnects automatically
content: This was waste of my money.first i brought this and asked for replacement as sound quality was not gud and distored always.they replaced it and then i got another piece.It disconnects automatically for every 20 secs and it stopped working .Its not even charging now.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Recommended
content: Battery lasts enough, 6hrs on paper would sound less but if you keep it switched off when you aren't using it, it's really not that bad! Sound quality is great and they are really light to be kept hanging all the time! Charging is fast! Overall go for it!

name: Amandeep Singh
title: Nice Quality
content: Really like the product. Used for 2 hours on music (50% Volume Sound) battery percent was still 100%. Had some calls sound is good and clear. Noice cancellation is ok type.. nil bluetooth connectivity issue.. Earbuds are soft/comfortable.. Quality of product is also good.

name: Anil Kumar
title: read the matter than the headline and check if its better or not.
content: if you keep up your volume high for longer timer when you are in a call then a large amount of disturbance will occur.if the volume is low then its fine. i have tested this for 5 times. remaining all is fine.good battery backup,nice sound with more base but we can adjust in our mobile equaliser, durability is good.

name: Hemanth
title: Seamless Connectivity, Light weight and good sound quality.
content: Product is pretty good.. Light weight and comfortable to wear.. Battery performance is good. Lasts for 4-8 hours. Connection is seamless.. Value for money

name: pankaj sharma
title: Not worthy of money
content: Good quality product but does not last.long as in last two years or so I this is 4th boatrockers of same type I have bought.No sound from one side normally left goes out after six months to one year than other side also no sound

name: Avik
title: Defective Product-Really unhappy
content: It's pathetic. Mic of the headphone stopped working withing 3 weeks from the purchasing. Even the Bluetooth connectivity of the headphone is below standard level. I have requested a replacement from their official website and it's been more than 6 days and the product is not yet picked for replacement. Really disappointed.

name: Anas Ahmed
title: Very good deal must have Bluetooth Headset
content: Pros:. • Very good battery life. • Noise cancellation is good. • Sound Quality is excellent. Cons:. • It pains in the ear if used above 1 hour or so

name: bagalkot customer
title: I Don't recommend it to buy
content: Worst thing about this device is it automatically disconnects and connects back frequently. In some situation it is embarrassing. From 3 months I am using it with that experience I can say that I don't recommend this to buy

name: kolkata.avi
title: unbelievable service from such a low cost product
content: better than my apple airpods. great products from boat. also boat charging cable have been a great purchase

name: MANISH KUMAR
title: Some issues
content: Product was quite good sound and backup is almost good but within 6month it's not working properly like wire and noise problem,I just complain to boat team before 10 days from expired date and finally I got a new boat Rockerz 255 😍😍 I truly love this product ,thanks to boat and his team and amazon company policy

name: naren
title: Such wrost support from boat if you face any issue
content: I am giving one start because as long product work fine , everything works fine, if any issue happens there is no one will respond properly, customer care (via email / phone )..my earphone suddenly stopped working one side , I managed one month then second side also stopped working ..now no one responding even it's in warranty

name: SRI RAM
title: Not better than other boat products
content: Not better than other boat products, i bought head phones earphones with mic and Bluetooth speaker from boat and this is the one which is least performer

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not recommended
content: Poor sound quality when it comes to voice call. If you can spend more that definitely avoid buying this.

name: Dr.Rajarajan
title: Horrible microphone
content: Sound quality excellent. Horrible microphone.. In phone call, Opposite end person can't hear me clearly. Useless for calls. I bought only for calling. So, I'm returning immediately.

name: Basheer Ahmed
title: Update...Purchased 9Aug2020. Now spoilt. Bad qlty
content: Product quality is very good. Max vol was not very satisfactory. Bass, treble and clarity was very good. Outside noise cancellation was also good. Used it for 2 days intermittently and found to be good. After abouts 5 minutes you won't feel that it is there on the ears.

name: mankaran
title: Buy it without a doubt
content: This product is pure value for money with good noise reduction and good battery life , the sound is pretty good specially bass is good , built quality is as good as jbl or sony etc

name: Shubham Bajoria
title: Poor noise cancellation
content: You cannot talk to someone using this earphone because the noise cancellation is poor(lot of background noise), if you want to talk to some one u need a quiet room.. Other thing i didn't like is the amount of time it takes to turn up almost 3-4 sec and same to turn off.. What i loved :: Sound quality is good

name: Skc
title: Warranty & Replacement Policy
content: Headset works very well. My unit stopped charging after 8 months of usage. Boat customer service picked up the defective unit and sent a replacement within 2 weeks. Very impressed with warranty coverage and replacement service.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not good for zoom calls
content: Not good to use for laptops, audio does not come and some times speaker of the headphones gets connected but not the mic. Truly the worst thing bought in my life

name: Souradip Mondal
title: BLUETOOTH DISCONNECTS UPON NEW CALL
content: Whenever there is a new Call, the Bluetooth gets auto-disconnected.. Also, there is a constant airy noise that creeps up during any voice-call.. Please suggest what can de done to get rid of these problems.. It is not a smooth experience as I hoped it to be.

name: Vivek Deshwal
title: NOT BEST BUT BETTER THAN OTHER ALL...
content: First of all ...delievery is much panthatic..otherwise everything is Good... Meet mine expectations nearby.....not much effective in Bass bt it is powerfull..I am a MUSIC LOVER mostly for BASS and it is perfect for me...whivh is not best but better than others...all r perfect in this Range....GO AHEAH FOR THIS.... 👍 Thanks for a geat deal in 999/- Amazon...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor product quality and worse service.
content: Don’t buy this product. Battery is dead just after 3 months.. Boat service is very poor. It’s almost 1 month i have raised the complaint and no action has been taken.. They will give you a confirmation that the complaint has been raised but no pickup will be attempted afterwards.. Even after getting in touch with there support staff for over five times, nothing has been done.

name: Mrunal Sonawane
title: Pretty f
content: It works normal in sweat so you can use it in gym or anywhere else you want. Dont believe the ones saying it doesnt cuz they dont know how to use it properly and probably just ruined it on their own. This is the only company which has good sound quality and noise cancelling earphones n headphones for a good price.

name: Jaya S.
title: Wouldn't recommend
content: This was a huge disappointment from boAt. The fit of the buds is very uncomfortable, it starts hurting after a point and also keeps falling out. This could depend on the shape of your ear of course. Sound quality is average. Bluetooth range is sad.

name: Amazon Customer
title: सालो ने चूतिया काट दिया ।
content: Hallo friends. If you think to buy this product. Please don't. This product is waste of money 💰. Please don't..... and I can not got charging cover.. after 8 days, My left ear plug is not working properly.. So please don't buy.

name: Sathya
title: Battery sucks
content: The product was working fine for a month.. it waa charging with 1.5-2 hours. But nowadays it takes 4 or even 5 hours.. I'm really not satisfied.. dont buy it unless u only have 1.5 K. Try to put .5k more and buy boult ones

name: kunal rathod
title: Great music for ears
content: Till date best headphones I had. It is nice product, however few time I do face disturbance while I'm listening to music. Also there is no indicator for Low Battery warning. All of sudden a voice comes which says oops battery low n the Bluetooth is switched off. Rest all is awesome.

name: Avid reader
title: Easy-on-go companion
content: I have been using this earphone particularly while cycling on the way to my office and it comes really handy. (I pass through a not-through-fare road on campus). May be the quality of the call is not the best but at this price range there can't be a better ask.. Go for it.

name: Eshant
title: Never buy
content: I will suggest not to but this product because one side of it will stop working after the warranty period. Honestly one side of it will stop working

name: Hemant Raj
title: Bluetooth Wireless Earphone sound issue
content: Dear Team,. This is for your information that i had bought bluetooth device on 12th April and now a days sound quality is not same as on starting , its quality down 50% , volume also got decreased , so please it is under warranty so kindly do needful , if any other information required then please let me know. Thanks. Hemant Raj. 9304959170

name: Anukumar
title: Worth for the price Rs 1000
content: The headset range and the battery backup is good. Superb bass but sound quality is poor for treble. Lack of sound clearance and the MIC is not clear to the receivers end during phone call.

name: Cherish E.
title: Rocking bass, not so rocking fit
content: The battery is impressive, but the ear piece sometimes pops out of my ear. Sometimes it hurt the ear on wearing it for long period. The bass is good. For a person who loves bass this is good but who wants to hear all the content of a music, this is not recommended

name: Raghvendra Singh
title: Happy to have it
content: Heavy bass.. Comfortable to wear.. Comes 100% charged.. Fast connectivity.. Magnetic buds.. Voice instruction when connected or disconnected or on/off

name: Akshit Raghuvanshi
title: Bass and the controls
content: I bought it for my Uncle and obviously he loved it. The Bass is amazing and the multi function button is just mind boggling(It helps you turning on/off, picking/ending calls and rejecting calls, activating Google Assistant and much more).Hoping that it's gonna last long. Just go for it.✔️

name: Amazon Customer
title: Perfect for Daily Use
content: Good for daily usage.. Listening to music, attending calls, going for a run.. Also good battery life. You can watch an entire movie or two without charging.. If u are ardent music fan with great knowledge about sound, there are other better options.

name: lionel pinto
title: Useful product with long lasting battery and OK sound quality
content: Useful product. Sound quality is just average. Looks are average. But the earphones do the job. Good for attending calls.

name: Ronny
title: Nice product
content: The product is definitely best in class. Although it mentions that the headset is multipoint enabled, it could not connect to my two iPhones at the same time. Returned.

name: Shreya
title: Dislike
content: Dislike.. It stopped working in the 5th month of buying and i am unable to have it replaced as Amazon doesn't show me the link to generate an invoice.. Kindly someone help me in generating or provide me an invoice for my order so that i can give a better rating.

name: Amazon Customer
title: worth for money
content: Within this price limit product is good so don't compare with premium brands. feels slight pain on ears after more than 2hours use other wise perfect. quality is also almost ok. safe packing with fast delivery

name: Kishan Patel
title: Dont bye it,....
content: It's not value for money I'll not prefer this product. We can hear out side noise even in full voice 👎 not impressed. Its looks wired it has very long wire,..... Dont bye it. 0 for noise cancellation

name: bikash
title: Product can be improved..
content: While listening song , if you are on video call it does not work in proper way. Shows connectivity problems. Sound on one side of earphone differ from other it does not make a balnce base on both side ... Only upto 10 metre range that is not enough... Battery backup is poor on video call.

name: PRINCE THAPA
title: Not reliable. Right side got damaged within 5 months.
content: I bought this on Feb 2019. Within 5 months i.e on 19 June 2019 It got damaged. Right side is not working at all. Not a reliable product I guess. They have a 1 yr warranty thankgod. But would not recommend this.

name: Jyotesh Gupta
title: Worst product
content: The earphone has Bluetooth connectivity issue. It stopped working several time also everytime I have to connect again and again. I checked in all phone same issue in IOS and Android. So much disappointed by Indian Made Boat.

name: Viola
title: Great quality, awesome bass, highly affordable
content: The ocean blue colour is gorgeous and the sound quality is definitely the best. I've always loved boat and this definitely reaches my expectations. And it's affordable price just makes it more awesome.

name: Princess
title: Good
content: Open packet received but good one in quality... One question is there how to i get online invoice and warrenty card for thi..?

name: Nitin sharma
title: Value for money
content: Good design. Fits well. Bluetooth connectivity is good and receive voice notifications.. Lacks in bass and beats and sound clarity lacks.

name: Naman Verma
title: The bass is truely awesome
content: These earphones are awesome and there is no trouble with them. Those who are saying that they don't have bass are wrong i have used them and the bass is seriously pretty strong for wireless earphones in such a price range. They are not over priced as well. Moreover while talking over them the person on the other side also didn't face any difficulty hearing me. These earphones are great, I personally highly recommend these.

name: PRATEEK SHARMA
title: Great price
content: Good base. Good noise cancellation . Amazing at this price. Only issue is the Bluetooth connectivity. Keeps disconnecting Randomly. Gets irritating while gaming.

name: Prakash Singh
title: Boat provides great earphones
content: I got my boat rockerz 255 pro today.. 1) Sound- Awasome. 2) Battery life- 8 hours non stop played & support fast charging. 3) Built quality- Great built quality, even it can use in rain and dusty environment.

name: Dinesh
title: Best of Headphones at Amazon.in
content: Very nice product. This is the first time I have ordered any electronic good online and I am fully satisfied with this. Bluetooth connectivity and Sound Quality is very nice. Noice cancellation is also good. Overall a 5 star rating product. Amazon, thanks for staying on your words. What you guys show, you deliver. Thanks :). Much love from Hyderabad, India.

name: Manjeet Singh
title: Bad Product Received
content: The sound shatters when i connect two devices at once,. 2nd issue comes on connecting it with a laptop, it just gives a breaking and shattering audio experience. pros:. Bluetooth connectivity is fast. I feel like I have received a defective product from Appario Retail.

name: ramesh kumar m
title: It Seems like already used product
content: It seems like already used product. The quality of sound is good but the colour is like a faded one. Returned it on the day of delivery itself.

name: Muthu subramaniam
title: Poor Quality product
content: If you are lucky product will work.. I ordered two pieces. Only one working. Second one worked only for one day. When I replaced it was working for one week. Now return window closed I dont know what to do. Go for brands like Samsung albeit a bit costly.

name: Singh Saab
title: Strictly for Bass fans!!
content: Slightly high Bass at times annoys you bcoz of strong bass can't listen or use for long hours

name: rhymeaanytime
title: My first & last BOAT product
content: Writing this afer using for a month. Battery backup is only 3-4 hours which is very bad it should atleat have 7-8 hours also it does not notify for % of battery all of a sudden it starts saying low battery & in 5-10 minutes it switches off. Not expected this from BOAT.

name: Prantik Saha
title: Worst purchase
content: I bought this at a price of 1100. They gave me a second hand product and as expected it stopped working on the second day of purchase. Worst experience ever. Though the return policy worked quiet well and my money was refunded on the same day of return

name: rajat sehdev
title: Warranty support needed for replacement as unit is not working properly
content: Sound is good. Light weight. But within 4months one ear plug stopped working. How to get replacement under warranty??

name: Vikas Jangid
title: Very bad
content: No noise cancellation is working in my boat bluetooth,. It's very bad as per company saying that boat tokers comes with noise cancellation.

name: Ravikiran
title: Warranty Issue
content: These headphones are faulty, I demanded for warranty but company is not paying attention, ignoring calls and not replying emails.

name: Aparna shahare
title: SOUND QUALITY
content: overall look of boat earphone is really good but main thing is sound quality which doesnt reach as per my expectation. any cheap price earphones are giving a good sound quality than this..boat you have to try your best ..

name: Baskaran V
title: Picture shud be apt in Amazon site.  Else, do not sell such color / product.  Treble to be Improved
content: Prdct color is very bad. It is very pretty CuSO4 color in site. But I recd. Dark/cheap look. Treble is not even 30%. Volume level is low when compared to pin typeearphones

name: Shaik Naziya
title: Kaur@lovely
content: Boat wireless good and sound quality too. It's making some noise cancellation and few times it is not connecting properly to my phone. Most of the times when I am in video call this problem is making in boat wireless

name: Abishek
title: Not as expected/satisfied
content: Product is good in terms of sound but when it comes to user friendly it fails a lot. When switch on/off and increase volume it's shouting a background voice over which is irritating even during phone calls also.Battery backup also poor. These queries needs to be taken care from boat company.

name: Shrahi K.
title: Goos
content: This product is good , been using it since past 6 months, I lost the earbuds that fits above your ear and they don't give any extra pair also, overall the product is nice must go for it.

name: Sunish Suresh
title: Stopped working after 2 months
content: The Sound quality is great but it stopped working after 2 months one the is not working. It has no physical damage it just stopped working. I have face this same issue with my previous boat basehead225 2 times, but i thought Bluetooth wont be haviing any issue. very disappointed

name: Priti Rawat
title: Good but not very much good
content: Product look is good but after 8 month the boat rockerz are not working properly even one side butt is not working and the magnetic power is so disturbing in my brain. I can't wear for full day even my 8 hrs shift.. Pls mention boat service center how could i replace or service this product?. Thnaks

name: Sachin Singh
title: Sound is good but call quality is poor.
content: Quality of sound and bass is preety good at this price range but the call quality is really very poor, it catches the surround noise which creats disturbance during ongoing calls. So if you have less call to attend then only buy it otherwise dont buy.

name: Jay magia
title: Great product
content: Awesome. Sound quality top class, Bass is very smooth, Over all for listening it gives you very clear sound.. Money = worth it. And also service from official boat service centre is very good i like it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not good after even few days of use.
content: Wait for some time and then see how it performs.. initially when i bought it, bass sound quality everything was perfect.. n now it's not even 1 month and i can see it's drastically reduced ...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Waste of money
content: After receiving the product I used it for some days one day suddenly stopped working I returned the product I received replacement but now again the replacement product also stopped working after few days of use...... So I think it's manufacturing fault in the product.... Please don't waste your hard earned money

name: Aryan kain
title: Product was so much good
content: I have Buyed many products of boat as same the quality of sound very much good , noise cancellation is also good and bass quality is very good 😊 . In box i got ear cups for different size and warranty card .

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not for life long
content: Purchased it before one year but cable quality is worst, One side cable of Earphone broke internally on 7th Month, I have cut down and joined again, after that another side Cable Cut on 9th Month, I have used it with One earphone and now both side Cable Cut internally, so useless now.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not suitable for calling purpose.
content: Not suitable for calling. The listener always has a complaint regarding voice clarity while being on call. It needs to be adjusted each time due to unclear voice on the other end.

name: Yash Pratap Chauhan
title: Satisfied with this product
content: Sound quality Awesome, Battery life is very good but auto connection problem we have to connect manually otherwise no problem at all. If you want to buy then you can buy it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good Bluetooth earphone under 1500...
content: Best for BASS lovers. Good sound quality. 5 to 7 hr battery life. 1.20hr to 2hr time to charge from 0 to 100%. Available all functionality like pause and play, sound increase and decrease, skipping tracks both front and back, accessing Google assistant...ect. Overall best Bluetooth earphone under 1500rs. If you can buy it under 1000 it would be best deal.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Microphone stopped working
content: Hello,. I purchased this product before one and half months back.. All of sudden now microphone has stopped working.. There is no reasonable reason why it has stopped. Now the use of headphones is just to listen music/audio. It is not atall usable for phone calls or web call conversation.

name: Ather
title: Audio latency when connecting to laptop and watching youtube and audio bass is loud ears will pain
content: BOAT ROCKERZZ 255 connectivity issue is alot takes longer time and it doesnt have any APP to conrtrol audio latency when connecting to laptop and watching youtube there was audio and video deosnt match and voice is very loud better to listen at 70-80% volume and it is not comfortable to wear in helmet worst earphones ever humble request dont buy it is worst then 100rs wired ear phones

name: Akshay Jain
title: Tried all 3 sizes of earbuds, but they  keep falling out of my ears
content: Faced 2 issues :. 1. I tried all three different sizes of earbuds but they don't fit in perfectly in my ear and keep falling out.. 2. While taking a call, the other person keeps complaining that my voice is echoing. I like to use earphones while taking a call, so half the utility of these is lost.

name: Ashish Ku. Pradhan
title: Right on the money
content: All over a good product at a excellent price range. Battery back up really good and Sound quality too.. I have a concern not with this product but with this brand is that its service way too slow as its service center not available directly.

name: Utkarsh
title: Pretty good product except mic and calling quality.
content: For music and similar purpose its an awesome product but if you are looking for a good experience with calling as well then please avoid buying it. Overall its a value for money item except distortion in mic but since my main need was music so it doesn't bother me much.

name: Narendra mistry
title: Bed
content: Very bed

name: Abhishek Vijayvargiya
title: Average buy
content: Good product in range.. But immediately after warranty period got over, it stopped charging.. Best to use for short period of duration.. Also when battery gets to 40%, it keeps on repeating low battery every few minutes

name: Sanchit Singhal
title: Awesome Bluetooth Earphone under 1000..
content: Great product. I buy these earphone in Amazon sale and at that time price was Rs. 999. I found these earphone working with great sound and good noise cancellation with bass itself. But the range in meters is not so good. You can use within a room itself not outside your room where your Mobile is placed connected with Bluetooth. Apart from this range all are best.

name: khyatish
title: Good service but ......
content: It's too good and after warranty my bluetooth is replace. So thank you so much.. Good service.. BUT courier charge is not add in my account since 10 days.. Note : courier charge is ahmedabad to Delhi. So not small amount. For middle class person.

name: AVINASH BHAMIDIPATI
title: Best Budget Bluetooth earphones
content: Got this for just ₹ 1k and the sound quality is excellent considering this price.. The noise cancellation of these earphones is pretty good .. I was using a basic in ear style earphones and now I can feel there's so much difference in the sound quality.. 'Boat rocks' 👌✌️👍

name: Kaustubh Rane
title: Nice Product ...
content: Nice product,I have been using it for more than 4 months ,all ok till now both sides are working , I think it's worth money. Only problem is with amazon delivery they want instant payment but not to deliver the product quickly within 2 days they took 2 week almost to deliver. I hope the improve this .

name: Akansha Johari
title: Best wireless earphones
content: I bought this after seeing the reviews and trust me totally worth it. It is more steadier than others brands that I have used including Sony, Boult

name: Amazon Customer
title: Voice quality and battery backup.
content: The most important thing to know about this product is that, when you are listening to mucic it works ok. But when you are talking to someone, its not good at all. The other person will all the time say, I cant hear you, or speak a little louder. And also the battery backup is not good either. So look for rather something better than this.

name: Alok
title: Worst product.
content: Today I receive this product , sound quality is ok , but its Bluetooth range is so poor . Poor means its worst. Worst product ever. I m surprise that how this product is in amazon's choice list.

name: Prakhar jain
title: Review using 2 months
content: Its very good product, charge in just 25min and Last for 5-6 hours good sound quality , very good for calling purpose in office at bike, at home, mic quality is also good , and good design as well, dont buy its basic version, it is worth for rupee

name: Best Review
title: Waste product trust me
content: Please do not buy it .... I bought and the problem started after 15 days .. Battery is weak .. adjustable buttons skips the song on its own after playing it for 15 seconds ... You can get repair only through official site .. they repaired it thrice still problem continues such a waste .. believe me and I am not joking.... Other two pieces which my friends ordered also has the same issue

name: Rajan v.
title: Worst product ever i bought around 3 device waste of money
content: Sound quality is ok but if problem occurs in device then replacement is very worst it takes too much time and the staff on call is very rude.....and usually they say that the product is out of stock it takes nearly a month to replace this device......am using rockerz since feb and now they are not working properly mic is not working as well as left side is not working properly

name: hetashri upadhyay
title: Perfect product
content: I have used many bluetooth headset,but this one's really good,noise cancellation is amazing,and what I like the most it is light weight

name: Suraj
title: One time investment... And uske baad befikr
content: I want to tell everyone I was so confused to take wirless headphones or bloothooth headphones. But now my confusion is totally cleared... One time investment Boat headphone. I want to must say BOAT headphone are very reliable and very clear sound with superb base. This is not only me talking about headphone my brother also having BOAT wire headphones and he is very satisfied... Thank u Amazon... And for one day delivery thank you so much

name: mallikarjun
title: Not work after 6months
content: I brought this item, but very bad experience is this it works only 6 months now it is switching off after 5minutes when i connect to my phone.. I heard same issues with my office colleagues for same earphone and it wont work when u keep your cell phone inside the jacket or pant.

name: Shubham
title: Great purchase for the price
content: It's a really nice product with great battery backup and sound clarity.. If something goes wrong with your device within the warranty period, you can get it replaced easily.. The connectivity is a little week when you are riding too fast on bike.

name: A Critic
title: Not recommended
content: Horrible experience. Stopped working after 3 months of purchase. Left ear piece does not play/respond. Quiet unhappy and dissatisfied. A Friend advised of how to get a replacement warranty claimed, I've raised a ticket but no response at all. Its been 3 weeks now since I raised the ticket.

name: sonali kashyap
title: Replacement - Boat rockerz not working fine
content: Hi, I ordered boat rockerz 255 on January 2019 and now it's not working properly - some days back one side has stopped working and now it gets turn off after every 10 min. Even if it's 100% charged. I want to replace my headphones with a new one as I believe that it is still in the warranty time.

name: Suman Saha
title: Reviewing after around 6 month of use ....
content: Its pretty decent wireless earpiece at this price range , brought it for 999 rs. 1.Sound quality is good at first but now its become avarage ,. 2. Bass is good. 3. Battery backup is also good at first its runs around 6-7 hours but now 4-5 hours. 5. True sweat proofing , even i have used it under heavy rain but its work fine till now. 6. Avarege build quality

name: sarath
title: Budget friendly , worth for the money .
content: Pros :. ● good price point. ●Built quality. ●Battery back up. ●Bass. ●Easy to use. Cons. ●I'm having bluetooth connectivity issues at sometimes. ●Poor call quality. I would rate 3 out of 5.. There are few alternative option for this like real me and mi neck bands.

name: Kamstar
title: Damage product recieved
content: The product which I have recieved it was fault one the one side of headphone is not working mean no sound from one side. The log was marked with ball pen in blue the box was also damage. That mean it was a used product which I have recieved. Very disappointed by this

name: Rohan
title: Go for it, reasonable price at 1.3k or less.
content: Fitting could have been better as it keeps falling off while running. I tried changing the eartips bit got the same problem. It is not a major problem though.. Apart from that,. Awesome sound and noise cancellation. Go for it.

name: parithosh D
title: Trouble with the charging of this product
content: It's been 6 months I am using it sounds quality is good. Suddenly the battery is draining down a little faster compared originally and now I have a issue with charging, it doesn't charge instead it heats up when I put for charge (heats up too much). I have raised for replacement for this product

name: Amazon Customer
title: Review After 3 weeks usage..
content: After using it for 3 weeks I'm giving this review.. i bought it for 1200.. Sound quality is good with more bass.. if u don't want that much bass means u can change the hear bud to a smaller one.. Quality of the product is also good i guess it will be a durable one.. Battery life is ultimate.. If u use it for 3 hrs a day it will last for 1 week.. Since I'm using it for my gym I feel very comfortable with this battery life..

name: Vinoth V.
title: Average headset
content: Nice headset , but battery is draining soon if it reaches 50℅, getting notified frequently by ivr which makes disturbed instead of that if there a beep sound it will be fine

name: Glamour123
title: Giving 4 stars
content: I'm happy for the sound quality, bass etc.. except for poor bluetooth connectivity range. Overall it's a must to buy product with a budget around 1500 bucks.

name: Rakhi kundu
title: I buy this product on 15.08.2020 , 10days use experience
content: Good : I like it's base and sound quality , it's battery capacity also not bad.. Bad : it's noise cancellation is very bad , because when I called some one I heard her or his voice very clearly , but whome I called he listened like Strom sounds with my voice , this is very bad.

name: Vivek Rao Anand
title: Could have done better. Build quality however is great.
content: Bluetooth connectivity is not as expected. However, it is a good buy under ₹800. Not more than that. Bass is boosted but that appears to me exaggerated. It suppresses actual sound. Everything with these earphones appears exaggerated and fake. There is no naturality with these earphones.

name: Shubham solanki
title: Best Quality Product
content: Super Fantastic product with awesome sound quality and Good design.. Best product for Chennai super kings fans

name: Samson
title: Disappointed with the quality overall
content: The sound quality is not too great, bass is poor. WHile using it to call people, it catches too much of noise from the surrounding making it almost useless to talk.. Good part about it is the build which seems sturdy

name: Neha
title: Boat Rockerz got dysfunctional just in one month
content: My boat rockerz got dysfunctional in just a month. I don't know whether I got defected piece or what but its speakers are not working now in just a month. this is really annoying. All my money is wasted. Also, I don't have a returning option now. This is not accepted from such a big brand boat and amazon.

name: shivaprasad
title: Need of replacement
content: I would prefer not to take because i need to return it and get another one I need replacement still not yet 1month already have a problem one side is audible and other side is muted not audible so I need a replacement can you please take this back and give me another with good quality.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Big Value for Money
content: This is one of the best Bluetooth headphones that I have used. Have been using this for the past 10 days. The sound quality is excellent. The neck band is flexible so its much easier to handle. Overall its a very good value for the money you pay.

name: poonam
title: Worst product.. with worthless price
content: Worst product I have ever experienced. The connectivity is very bad.. the "wireless" word should not be used for it.. it doesn't worth its price.. moreover, the costumer care services are also very bad. It seems like they know that have fooled us.. so never respond to our messages and calls..

name: User
title: Stopped working after 6 months!!! Worst product
content: Worst product it stopped working after 6 months still in the warranty period customer service is also bad they are not taking the product. My previous local bluetooth earphone last more than 1yrs. Compare to it boAt product doesn't last long. Don't buy this product

name: Sayed Wasi
title: Truly Awesome Product by Boat
content: Awesome Product.....its got everything. 1) Sound Quality - Excellent. 2) Noise Cancellation - Excellent. 3) Bass Quality - Excellent. 4) Material Used - Very Good & flexible. 5) Nice Truly Awesome best neckband Bluetooth headphones.... Go for it

name: Arun S
title: Nice and comfort one for your ears with hands free..
content: Presented to my friend and it’s very handy and comfort to use..connectivity is good and proper..good for ears and nice one ..enjoying music to next level ..thanks for this product ..

name: SD
title: Charging point comes out. You can't charge u hv to through it.
content: This item of boat is not good as physically. After 2 months use the charging point comes out. Try to pix 2 times but again it's comes out. So plz don't buy it loss of money.

name: Sravan
title: Not a great product
content: Not as expected.. sometimes will not hear voice until you turnoff and turnon the boat Rockerz.

name: vipul
title: After sales service is worst.
content: After 3 months of use right side speaker stop working, called to customer care, you can connect to their customer care 1 time out of 10 tries, taking so much time, after spending 1500 rs you have to wait for service is pathetic, i prefer to buy some other brands like samsung and sony who own a service centre in local area.

name: Devashish Srestha
title: No Noise cancellation only voice cancellation
content: Unhappy with the noise cancellation, it cancells your voice but not the noise during calls.. Apart from that the ear plugs are slightly diacomforting and comes out while working out sometimes.. Just the sound quality for music is good

name: Akash
title: A good earphone
content: It's overall a really nice earphone... A little expensive but.. It's boat... A brand we can all trust. One problem is that it's part the curved part which stabilises the earphone to the ear becomes loose and sometimes comes off too. Mine lt piece came off and I lost it without even realising it for a whole day.

name: Arpit_p_s
title: Sporty but not highly functional.
content: Overall is a slightly above average product in terms of sound, battery life and ease of use.

name: Vihan
title: Stop working after 9months
content: Good earphone,with excellent base,noise cancellation,sound quality....but after use of 9 months left earphone stop working automatically and this was very disappointing such high priced earphone by boat😠😭

name: Rishi
title: Not recommendable.
content: The product is un-easy on my ears. Doesn't fit well and keeps on falling. All the three size of buds are un-easy.. It's left speaker stopped working after 2weeks of usage. So a waste, now.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Headphone not working.
content: My headphone got defective. Please suggest me how to replace my headphones as it is under warranty. Very disappointed about this product.

name: imran
title: Ok product at this price range
content: Product is ok. Sound mids and lows are ok. Sound gets diatracts if u increase volume above 70% . I found geekcases Status bluetooth headsets better than this bcoz it has Aptx sound technology in it which boat rockerz does not have.

name: Daksh
title: Music addicted must not buy this
content: Don't buy this if you are addicted to music. I got it for Rs 999 but still I don't like it. These earphones do have heavy and boomy bass with excellent noise cancellation but you will not able to notice low vocal in earphones & it's music quality is not too good it don't click the mind

name: Niteksh Jamwal
title: Not good
content: Sound and bass are good but bad battery life. Noise cancellation is also not good.

name: Adrash udyog
title: BOAT GONNA STOP THEIR WORK IN INDIA
content: Guys don't buy any boat product.. May be boat will stop their work in india.. From May2020 to till date march 2021 they didn't solved my complaint yet even after many reminders.. My ticket no 1119068 please check & think. Thanks

name: Utkal
title: Good for fitness freaks like me
content: Working well.... i was unhappy as it was my fault.... i did not charge the item properly before connecting with phone ... ok so now working very well.... thanks amazon

name: Ravi
title: Great product
content: Best product in this price range......not ao smooth as one plus wireless earphones but different doesn't seems to much. Only one complaint this earphone doesn't fit perfectly in ear compare to one plus.

name: Nimish B.
title: Sound quality
content: The one Side of earphones doesn't work and it's very bad please help me out with replacement

name: Deepak J Bhasi
title: Best Neckband If you get it under 1000
content: One of the best Neckband Bluetooth earphone If you get it under 1000. And it's exclusively for Base Lovers. I didn't see any other special things on it. See my review on my youtube Chanel - Deepak J Bhasi

name: User
title: Terrible... Stopped working in 5 months.
content: It was good when I'd bought it 4 months ago, but suddenly left plug is broke. No physical damage, it didn't fell or anything, but all you can hear is terrible noise. And due to that, it even turns off anytime.

name: PANKAJ NATH
title: Boat Rockerz survey
content: Outer coating started discoloring due to sweat .. Pathetic service, earphones stopped charging within 6 months of purchase ; send for servicing around 2 months back and yet to receive the earphone after repairs. No updates available on repair status on boats website and no clue if I will receive it back .

name: Weird Jayesh Shahasane
title: Quality of sound and mic issues
content: For basic level, these headset is best to have. Its just its mic does not pick the sound in proper way. While travelling in train, bus or on bike.. your sound would be heard less to the other party through this headset. Rest sound quality is good.

name: Ashwani
title: Perfect piece !!!Good to go !!!!
content: The sound quality is good with sweet bass . It's not prefers for heavy or large bass people, those who wants high volume music. Noise cancellation is also very good . Even in heavy traffic or riding vehicle you will be able to communicate with each other. Material is also far better than plastic material, it has a rubber type material.

name: shibani
title: Defective piece delivered
content: Wanted to g8lift it to my mom as I had one myself. The one I received was a defective piece which doesn't get paired with any device. Tried on multiple handsets in my house but it's still the same. Wouldn't recommend to buy it from this seller at all.. This is ridiculous!

name: Arun KJ
title: Need replacement.. Not working within a month
content: Bought on July first week and by July end headphone is not working.. it's not switching on.. need a replacement. Pls don't buy from this seller within a month it didn't work and unfortunately my replacement time is also over ... This is worst service

name: Kiru
title: cheap product - cheap quality
content: This product is not good for listening to music. The sound quality is very poor. This can be used for doing only a phone call.. As the price is cheap, the quality is also cheap. I don't recommend this to others.

name: Amit Joshi
title: Mic is not working properly, overall performance is good.
content: This product i ordered for my mother, and she likes it, it is easy to use , also the sound quality is good, only issue is with mic is that you need to hold it with hand near mouth for better experience otherwise it dose not capture the voice. Overall Good

name: MiThOoN
title: Value for money.
content: Value for money. Gobfor it. Voice assistant is not provided. Suggested to add the same.

name: Anish Mohapatra
title: Tested for sweat and run
content: Good range of Bluetooth connectivity. Clear audible sound. Noise cancellation can be improved. Improve

name: Aryan k.
title: Didn't even last a month
content: Not good at all.. Not even a month and they have started pissing me off. They won't put and there is constant beaming of red and blue light it won't even turn off.. I am sure there is a better option out there, don't buy this.

name: Hannan Hashmi
title: Very bad headphones
content: Very bad headphones, cheapest mic quality. 60₹ headphones are better than this. Couldn’t get a replacement as well. Please think twice before purchasing.. Also Bluetooth gets disconnected while listening to songs.

name: Zeen
title: Not easy on the ears for long duration.
content: Using it more than for a hour makes the ear very painful. Bass is only felt when you put it tightly which is again not good thing. Others are saying it is best for the price, i ll say put extra penny and go for some other product.. @zeen.alam

name: Anshu A.
title: Amazing product.
content: Amazing product. Amazing battery capacity. Stays for whole day long. Love this product. Comfortable ear fit. Sturdy design. Cable length might feel bit small. Overall amazing product. Must buy.

name: Harsh Maheshwari
title: Need improvement from technical perspective but can buy.
content: Good product and make me wire free. What make me worry is it's long hour duration.. So after 60% it's battery goes down like market crashed. Might be it's their technical problem which they hide or not aware of it.. I am giving review after using it last 1month

name: Krisssh Sharma
title: Great so far but it has some downsides
content: Headphone is great so far but only downside is am not able control call with this, if I increase its volume during it gets increased but when I try lower down the volume I didnt find any way in both ways increase or decrease volume only increases also after 30 percent of volume it starts prompting volume down volume down

name: Yashwant
title: Boat
content: The sound quality is good. Seems weightless when it hangs around your neck. It doesn't even feel as though the headphones is around your neck. Battery life not up to the mark. Takes time to charge. Overall it's a good product worth the money.

name: Virendra
title: Fair enough
content: The build quality of this wireless is just awesome & the battery life is also fair enough, I charge it first time after 5 days of unboxing it. But sometimes I feel that the sound is not loud enough as compare to other earphones and there is no treble in sound it is just baas dominated earphone.

name: Pramma
title: Good product with proper packaging and delivery
content: With first look, it is a quality product, delivered properly.. Bass is on the higher side, sometimes adding unwanted effect on normal songs.. Bass lovers would love this one for sure. Overall a good buy.

name: Vinay Kumar
title: Worth buying
content: Bought these at 999/- . Decent sound and good quality. But sometime I face too much of interference while driving, couldn't know the exact reason. Anyway I suggest to buy if you are looking for some midrange headset.

name: Utkarsh Mishra
title: Good to hear
content: Sound quality is nice, battery also is good but need to improve range for connectivity. The product is awesome and is really good earphone with bluetooth in this range.

name: Parth pasrija
title: Ok ok
content: Sound quality is good , battery life is bakwas , overall you are always thinking about the battery and enjoy the music less . Buy some product which has more battery backup

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not good
content: Hello,. Kusum this side.I bought two sets of this product but unfortunately one is working well But another one Bluetooth iheadset is not working well, please change it.its only one month .I am not happy with the product. kindly repair it or replace it. It's sounds weird and it's completely uncomfortable.

name: window shopper
title: Ok for daily usage
content: It's ok if you want a headphone for daily usage. However with 400-500 more you can experience a much better quality. I felt the sound was a little dampened.

name: Naddy
title: Not a good option for music lovers and durability is too bad.
content: Just been an year... And the device stopped working properly and there is break in the sound and one of the speaker doesn't work completely. Found it to be defective in it's functionality.

name: Esai
title: Serves the purpose
content: Sound is amazing , build quality is good,. But the range is pretty less. If you leave your phone in the other room, connectivity is gone .. Otherwise all is good , Worth the money spent.

name: VIKAS THAKUR
title: Volume problem!
content: I Have purchased my boat rockerz 255 Sports wireless earphone it on 12 MARCH 2020.. But in 3 months only it is not working properly and when i play game or when i listen music it’s left side ear volume is very low and right side is as it is. So i want to return it and want to buy new.

name: Bobby dewda
title: Very Good Quality,Lightweight Earphones
content: Its sound quality is decent and is very lightweight, I had used it for up to 4hrs continuously without any pain in my ears, bought it for Rs.999, Thank You...

name: Roney
title: After 6 months both earbirds not working, no sound at all
content: Over all good product ,sound is good ,. But after 6 months my earbird was not audible. First left earbird was not working later on both the earbird not working. There is no repairing for this problem .... Bluetooth is completely fine it shows in mobile that it is connected but no use no sound in earbird

name: Mahesh
title: Best product by boat
content: It's good product but battery is drain (5hr) early when continue use otherwise backup good. Quality of sound good bass has to improve more. Vibration is missing. Fitting is really good. Product is long lasting. Wire quality is best

name: Sachi
title: Good product
content: This product isn't upto mark for bass lovers. Sound quality and noise cancellation is excellent. For bass out of 5 my rating is 3.5

name: Aniket verma
title: Honest review
content: Good bass thumps your music overall music quality is good,once you pair it second time it will connect super fast with your device,range is less as you travel frm one room to another the sound getting disconnected,it troubles in range which phones having Bluetooth v5.0 and with Bluetooth v4.2 the range is slightly increase.

name: surbhi
title: Awsome Rockers
content: It's very nice.. and it's very light weight. I loved it... Delivery was sooper awsome within a day morning I had ordered and evening in had received it.. 👍👍Plz go for it..

name: GOWTHAMAN
title: Worth of cost bOAt is mass
content: I'm really proud to say that it crossing 6th month of purchases really gud product and 24 hours standby 8 hours of random usage 5hours of continues usage unbelievable product from bOAt if its finished again I going to buy it again because best in price...

name: Kabir
title: Will not recommend
content: I bought this earphones few months ago and I already have to get them replaced and the new ones are already broken. This not a good quality product. Same for my friend who had the same earphones.. The sound quality is good and it charges quickly.

name: Himanshu sekhar sen
title: Decent Product
