name: Sanjeev kumar
title: Customer service is poor.
content: Sound and bass quality is good but after 4 months one one side earphones is not working and I went to service center where customer service is very poor even I didn't repair my earphones due to shortage of time.. I m not satisfied with service center..

name: Hardik Prajapati
title: Cheap quality product . Not working within few month.
content: I was impressed with the quality products by boat. I ordered handsfree, bluetooth speaker, car charger, data cables and many others. Now this time i purchased bluetooh handsfree. But after few month one side speaker not working and battery draining like anything. Very disappointed with the quality and product.

name: Monika N
title: The Product is okay!!
content: I purchased this product 2 months before already left ear pods are not working , I feel for iPhone it is not the best option to buy.

name: Sanjay Tyagi
title: Overall sound is not loud enough, however, it is indeed a value for money.
content: - Bluetooth range is very good.. - Overall sound is on lower side I think. So not loud enough.. - Fit wise it is good.. It is indeed a pretty good headphone for the price.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Low sound compare to rockers 261
content: Good product, but high volume range is low, means sometimes when you need high volume then you cannot increase much. Better to go with rockerz 261

name: Pratik Zombade
title: Great product for reasonable price

name: Indrajeet
title: 🎧Awesome products, sounds and build quality🎧
content: 🎶Best Earphone at this budget range🎧. 🎶Sounds quality is very good🎧. 🎶Good battery backup🎧. 🎶Fast Charging🎧. 🎶Decent bass🎧. 🎶Fully satisfied with this earphone🎧

name: Bhupendrasingh Bhati
title: Go For It If U get @999!!Best Deal @this price!!!
content: Good product. Got it for 899 with Amazon Republic Sale & Cashback.Fast delivery.Connects very Fast.I use it for nearly 8 Hours still 20% battery remains.Charging Is fast.Paisa wasool Neckband.!!Thanx Amzon💖

name: Mayank
title: Good value product

name: Ayush Kumar
title: Sound quality
content: Ok ok item. The sound quality and noise cancellation are not good as expected..But the battery life is awesome.... You can go for mivi thunder beat at the same price with better sound quality and noise cancellation........

name: Bunnykoushik
title: great Bluetooth earphones for the price
content: sound quality is top notch. there's no active noise cancellation but the ear tips provide excellent isolation from surrounding sounds. bluetooth connectivity has been a mixed experience since it would struggle to stay connected to ur mobile especially when ur mobile is in u jeans pocket.

name: Vaastav T.
title: It is ok..
content: That sound which it makes while starting up is irritating. I am pretty much satisfied with battery life and sound quality. The built quality is also good. But the thing is none of these matters of your Bluetooth connectivity is not good , it was pretty average I was expecting a bit more good connection.

name: Pratibha Kandarkar
title: You won't find such bass quality in any other wireless earphone

name: SUBHOJIT S.
title: Good sound but issue while using it during videocall.
content: The sound it provides is very good. Build quality is good. When I turn on WiFi in my mobile and make a video call, it makes a disturbing noise which is similar in many boat wireless headsets.

name: Henil Collerwala
title: Dead product delivered.
content: Product was dead delivered, not working anymore. Have bought on the great Indian sale. Very disappointed. I got replaced through service center. Boat Sount quality 5 star.

name: Chandrakumar Chavan
title: Bad sound quality

name: K.k.r.prasad
title: I need to replace boat Rockerz 255 sports blue.
content: Actually I booked boat Rockerz 255 sports blue. But I received just boat Rockerz .. it doesn't work properly and Bluetooth conctivity also bad. I need boat Rockerz 255 sports blue. Now I received worest product that's why I replaced. ... In Bluetooth device mentioned just boat Rockerz only.. My Previous product mentioned boat Rockerz 255 connected.

name: Bapugoud
title: The best bluetooth collarband..........
content: It looks amazing and really easy to use. It's neon color gives it a very sporty design. The noise cancellation feature is really very good and it supports both Google Assistant and Alexa.

name: Dilip Vadhiya
title: Worst product at premium price.
content: It works OK for first few months. But after 3 / 4 months battery, and other sound effects disappoints with issues. Service center will simply replace the product but the issue arise as it is after some time. Better to avoid this brand.

name: Madhavi Deshpande
title: Need help for replacement...
content: Its only 2 months we have purchased and its not working now.... We want to get it replaced.. what is the procedure.. it is having one year replacement warranty.... Please help

name: Amazon Customer
title: Require extra ear supporters within the order or in a seperate order
content: Require extra ear supporters atleast 4 to 6 at the time of ordering or in a seperate order if they are available, as they are very weak and losening from the ear phones.

name: I promise to give Genuine Reviews
title: Nice Headphone from Boat
content: Connectivity is super quick, Charging super quick, Sound in this price range is very good.

name: Kaushik Nath Dalal
title: Super Quality
content: All are good in this product, like noise cancellation, bluetooth connectivity, sound quality & main thing look. Don't think to much, go & grab asap.

name: kaustav mandal
title: Connectivity & Sound Clarity
content: For the price worth 999 its worth every penny, its a good quality headphones, the sound is amazing, and connectivity is effortless, charge and backup is great. Recommended product. Even if you buy it for the price of 1499 its worth to buy the same.

name: zallika
title: Review after 3 months of use
content: Its been almost 3 months and its working perfectly fine. The only problem is that it doesn't get along with whatsaap specially video call. When the Bluetooth is connected to the phone and video call is on you will find disturbance in the call and the screen shows reconnecting

name: Tarun Dubey
title: Poor build quality
content: Products was awesome..... Sound quality and everything was perfect but after one month its one side stops and when i claim warranty they took a month to replace it...... this was so disappointing. And also there is no actual replacement of the product they only repair it and send the same product to the costumer

name: Taj999
title: Better than sony
content: Better than sony c200 ... excellent sound quality, great microphone, flexible n quality material ... good battery back up ...

name: Prachi
title: Waste of time and money
content: It's been less than 3 months and one side of the earcord isn't working. The mic's not working as well... I am so disappointed. This is my second purchase from boat and this sort of issue is recurring. My last earcord broke in the same way and this one is no different.

name: Vedant
title: Poor quality - charging port is not working
content: Charging point not working and unable to use. Would like to return or get it repaired. However, there is no system available to apply- inform Amazon staff or seller. Your contact us system is not working as no ring is heard, no one reply, no call back. Please help us urgently.

name: Kondameedi N.
title: Useless Product.
content: Please dont buy this product. My humble request to all. Choose the best product event at the cost of premium also. Not this product.

name: subhash
title: Good sound , great product but ear holder pinch your ear for along term usage

name: Life with Shiva
title: Should you buy 1

name: Vishal
title: Poor noise cancellation and battery status
content: Its a very bad product...no noise cancellation at all.... Also battery performance is poor.. Also it is not showing accurate battery status... 100% then after few hours 80% and then direct battery low. And powered off within 1 minutes after battery low message. It is not showing battery status at 70% and below.

name: Akansha Thakur
title: Item is not getting connected. Voice is breaking.
content: There is a connection issue. They are not getting connected and voice also breaks. There is no such issue of networks. I have gifted the item to my friend and it's not working properly. It has a one year warranty kindly replace it.

name: Sumedh
title: Bit long but awesome quality
content: Awesome bass and sound quality and offcourse better noise cancellation... worth the penny!. You won't regret after buying this item. Let's see the quality after a month usage. The drawback is the length of the headphones.. bit long..

name: Bharat G.
title: Good quality product, meets my expectation.
content: Good quality product, meets my expectation.. Although battery backup can be improved further.

name: Infant Thamson L
title: Good
content: The boat usually have a great sound quality especially in Bluetooth segment I have 3 models of boat Bluetooth earphones all 3 are best on sound quality.

name: Amazon Customer
title: About Red colour
content: Very good product but I was received a old one with some dust on it and manufacture on April'2020

name: Sreejith K U
title: Good product with excellent sound quality and microphone
content: Awesome build style and professional audio quality with noise cancellation.. Microphone is build in such a way to pick up pin drop sound.. Value for money at 899/- (by offer)

name: Meher
title: Value for money product.
content: They're okay! Nothing fabulous, getting the job done type of earphones. Infinity N series offers a little better experience for a slight increase in price. But for the most part this is great! Phenomenal battery life.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good for other mobile but bad for Samsung j7 don't purchase if u have j7
content: It working with other mobile amazing but with Samsung j7 it never stablised connection. Not even seen in searching devices.. its look good, flexible naked band is really good then other brands

name: Sudip Kumar Mandal
title: Like it but could have been love it.
content: Overall a Good Bluetooth Earphone. Battery backup is good enough last around 6-8 hrs. Only thing that bothers me is the Low charge notification and that the percentage of charge only shows 100, 80, 60, 40 & 20. Should be good if the indication is More realistic.

name: Siddhant Wadhai
title: Best
content: Got it for 899rs on sale... Awsome bang on product... Superb sound quality... And awsome bluetooth range... Works perfectly for almost more than 100ft in open space...

name: Bhushan
title: Bluetooth range is very weak
content: Good earphone for sound quality but there is Bluetooth range problem , in specifications boat says 10m range but actually this earphone has range upto only 3m, when battery is below 50% it's Bluetooth range is only 1m, Also battery backup is very poor

name: manish prasad
title: Good for Music, Not recommended for Calling
content: Good quality headphone for Music only. Not recommended for Calling.. Noise Cancellation can be improved.. While talking via headphones, the other person can hear everything in the surrounding,. except for the one whom he/she has talked.

name: Sakshi chhajed
title: Watch is not working and it is still under warranty
content: I purchased this product in Dec and now in april month watch is not working....it is not charging.....please replace my product as this is still under warranty....!!!. It is taking long time to start like almost 24 hours to grt charged...!!!. Either replace my product or refund me the amount.....

name: SHIVAM
title: Not suitable for samsung devices (A50)
content: Not properly working with samsung A50. Whenever i connect it took more than a minute to connect. and. also lowering the volume of headphone also lowering my device volume

name: Tarun kumar
title: This is amazing for me boat rocker 255..
content: Boat 255 rocker is best of suond quality.. Fill this very well.. Battery life is 6 hours.. Nonstop.. Battery charging is 1.50 mints.. This product is very very good for me...

name: Rubina Kaur
title: Hate It!

name: Harsh
title: good sound quality but Bluetooth is totally not good
content: used it for the whole day. the quality of sound is good. wire quality is not even good. and the Bluetooth quality is totally disruptive. there are lags in between.. Bluetooth's range is too short. overall at this pricepoint not a worthy investment

name: Sundeep Singh
title: DOA - Dead on Arrival
content: DOA - Dead on Arrival. Doesn't turn on / Doesn't charge as well. I don't know if I am the only one facing this. Returned on the same day.

name: jithish k k
title: Battery drains after 5 months of use.
content: Headset is okay.! It stopped working now as my battery drains within 5 minutes of use. I am trying to replace it. Guys keep ur invoice safe as this might be useful while claiming.It's been only 5 months of use.

name: Priyan
title: Buy One. Best One. Boat Rockerz 255
content: Boat Rockerz 255:. Quality & Look : 10/10. Sound with BASS effect: 9.5/10. Battery Backup : 9/10. Noice Cancellation During Call: 9/10. Bluetooth Connectivity with range : 10/10. Value for money : 10/10. If you plan for buy new Bluetooth wireless headphone, just go for it & you too enjoy this experience

name: Sukrati
title: Poor battery life
content: I am using it since 1 year and since then it's battery life has reduced. Now it discharges in just 1 hour. Sound quality is good though. I would prefer other options for wireless earphones since with boat rockerz u can't enjoy the music during long traveling.

name: Krishna Kant Gupta
title: Not working after 20 Days of purchase
content: I have purchased this on 16th July 2019 and today (09th Aug 2019) its not working. Its not turning on.. No service center is available for boat wireless headphones.. Its your call if you are purchasing this. but i have bad experience at all.. In photo you can see i am pressing power button but its not turning on.

name: Casey
title: Good product. Needs better ear plugs.
content: Good product with good sound. Works well and does cancel noise. The ear plugs could be better though which is the only improvement required.

name: Manjinder Singh
title: Worst customer Support
content: Earphones are fine . But once it get defected , there will be no one on earth to help you out . I have requested for claiming the warranty and it's been 51 days they haven`t replied yet . I am tired of messaging them . No Customer Support at all . Choose wisely .

name: HAROON
title: Awesome for Pubg
content: One of the best wireless earphones in budget, good battery backups , awesome sound quality for pubg... connect automatically and fast , good build quality don’t think about look it’s worth of money for it’s performance

name: Ranjith
title: Warranty support terrible
content: I have purchased boat Rockerz from here, product is wonderful. after same time one side not working properly and I have escalated complaint in their online site. Now it's one month gone , noreplay from there end .very pathetic support.don't expect warranty from company.

name: Dinesh Vennam
title: Bluetooth Stop Working
content: Product Bluetooth has stop working after 10 days of use. For 10 days product is working fine, but from today Morning (28 Dec 20) onwards bluetooth is not connecting to Phone.. Is my Money Wasted???. Please reply.. Dinesh Vennam

name: Pooja Nagvekar
title: Worth buying!!

name: Kumaradas G S
title: POOR QUALITY

name: Dilip katariya
title: One side earphones stopped working, no physical damage
content: It’s jus been 8 months since i got this and one side earphones is not working itself. There is no physical damage also. I have warranty for one year and I want to claim my warranty for it

name: Isha
title: Good to buy not expecting to much
content: Previously I buy boat 225 wired earphones That's awesome..but this wireless earphones is very low sound and very low Bass.. Noise cancelling is average. Bluetooth connectivity coverage low area... Even my home theater cover more area..compare this earphone

name: Amazon Customer
title: worst bluetooth range!
content: guys dont buy it.sound quality is good but bluetooth range is bad even it doesn't cross single wall.i have return my headphone as its bluetooth doesn't work after 3-4 mt.When another piece i received its bluetooth is ok but again not up to the mark.. DonT buY

name: Pranjal
title: Bad call connection...
content: Call disconnect and connects automatically during the call... making trouble...plzz fix this issue. Same problem in all other pieces..

name: Tanima
title: AVERAGE
content: Not that good bcz battery gets low very soon and Bluetooth range is not good...phone has to be too much nearby so at last you have to carry phone in every room with you while working. Vol. is good!

name: Aalok Goswami
title: Comfortable
content: Have been using it from least 8 months no issue so far except the battery is dying little soon these days. A product full worth it's money.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Don't Buy at ALL..Too Much Disoppinting
content: Please Don't purchase these Headphone..within 4-5 Month my headphone one side is not Working and Not any Response from Custmer Service Center Number.BUY only These Headphone which Service is Better...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Quality and finishing is good...  but, raging red looks cheap... Black should be a safer bet
content: Quality and finishing is good... but, raging red looks cheap... Black should be a safer bet.. Bluetooth range is around 10 to 12 feet.... Currently its priced high, it should be ideally within Rs 800.

name: Sneha
title: Not worth it , doesn't work
content: The product started malfunctions a month after buying. One earphone stopped working completely. Tried applying for a replacement through warranty but got no response from the company.. Now 6months later it's entirely stopped working.. Can't trust this product.

name: Susmita
title: Good quality and genuine product
content: It's a good head phone. After using three months I am reviewing it.. 1.Bluetooth connectivity is good, it covers my hole house.. 2.Noise cancellation is good.. 3. But base sound is not up to the mark.. 4. its charge can run upto 3-4 hours with connection.. Over all I'm satisfied

name: Deepan roy
title: 1st choice Bluetooth headset
content: This product is awesome...The sound quality is terrific and it fits properly with the ear. Noise cancellation is brilliant...Just if u go on using without any stoppage it will discharge at 6 hrs that the only con so what u charge it again...A top rated product..

name: Sujit shaw
title: Must buy product
content: If you want to switch to Bluetooth earphone then buy this I am reviewing this after 1 week of usage and i have not a single issue with my product great battery backup decent sound quality Bluetooth connectivity is also good and its give a good range also this earphone have a great bass quality

name: HARSH KUMAR PALI
title: Worth at ₹1K
content: Worth at ₹1K for all this has to offer. Don't expect headphone like bass, sound is clear. But the voice at on/off is annoying.. Delivery was quite fast, delivery boy woke me up.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Feel Cheap & Dublicate
content: I already purchased this product 9 months ago and I got exact what I wanted.. And again I order this product for my little brother but this time I got little different rockers 255 it's feel like 3 or 4th copy of original Rockers 255.. It's Material feel cheaper and dublicate compare to previous one.

name: Asimparvesh
title: It is just Awesome and Worthy of the Cost.
content: Sound Quality and the Noise Cancellation is Just Awesome,they worth the cost, Bluetooth Connectivity is also quite Good,Easy to Pair,and Finally it's main Pro is it's Battery BackUp,last atleast 5 hours every time I used it.It is worthy of the Cost.No case of Disappointmants,you will get satisfied.

name: ARUN P.
title: Review after 3 years
content: I'm using this for almost three years.. And it working perfectly.. But customer service ia poor.. But product is amazing that one plus

name: Praba
title: Ok product
content: Good product for sound quality in this range but the wiring quality is not good...one side of the earplug spoils very quickly as a result it becomes unusable

name: Akash bhosale
title: Stopped working leftside one in 9 months
content: Orderd it on 29th may 2020 and on 27th feb 2021 left side one stopped working. If you guys paying around 1500rs. Then its up to you.

name: Vinay Ganti
title: Good bass for music. No noise cancellation
content: Best in class for music.. Draw backs are no noise cancellation.. Plus: easy to use. Top class bass for music.

name: Harshit Chaturvedi
title: Worst after sale service!
content: Never buy this! I have bought an earphones boat rockerz 255, it started malfunctioning within a month. So I registered a complaint regarding the same and received a broken product instead! Really disappointed from boat!

name: Harshil Patel
title: Replacement for BOAT 255
content: I have ordered my Boat 255 in month of April 2019 and now I has stopped working from one side I.e from right side it has stopped working and also the Bluetooth connectivity is not appreciable as it loses its connectivity in between and so I want it to be replaced since it is in warranty period. Please do it at the earliest.

name: ramanth
title: Good product in reasonable price with quality
content: I love this product... Firstly i had a doubt on this product whether it is worth or not... But finally my thought goes wrong... Definitely i will suggest my friends and other's to buy this product... Which comes in reasonably rate and good quality of sound.... Thanks to boat and flipkart for giving me such a good product

name: Kim
title: Good product of Boat
content: It's very awesome..Sound is clear...It's mike position is good means it's comes in front of your ur mouth....It's comfortable on ph calls...I inspire others to buy this product...One of my friend also order this product ...

name: Manoj P
title: Not upto the mark
content: i bought same product before and one day it stopped working but i loved it thats why i bought it again and this time it seems to be worthless batter backup is less comparing to previous product and when i received it its seems to be packets were opened and not sealed

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst service
content: Worst after service.... earbud is not working from one side also getting awful noise and boat repair center told my order is not showing and asked to write to boat, I mean seriously they didn’t even responded to me. You lost a customer, won’t recommend to anyone.

name: Akarsh Bajpai
title: Over good neckband at this price
content: Very good neckband, I like "connect two device at a same time" feature Some times it will remove from ear specially when u walk/run faster...

name: Shubham
title: GOOD PRODUCT in this price segment
content: Dislike's. 1 Disturbing noise during calls. 2 No noise cancellation. 3 Bluetooth range max 15 to 20 meter. Like's. 1 Great built quality. 2 Great sound quality. 3 Good bass quality. 4 battery backup was also good it will take 1hour 40min to fully charged. 5. You can use it for whole day or next day as well.

name: Nagendra
title: Good at this price range
content: At this price range nice. As it's more long in the neck, for me personally, felt it should be little short in length.. Initially delivered piece has some defect and was getting some buzz sound both mic n speakers. I opted for replacement. Amazon delivered a nice piece.

name: Gajender
title: little pain in Ears
content: The product is good and a good option in this price segment. But if you accidentally disengage the hooks and couldn't put them correctly again then it may hurt your Ears. So overall a decent product ..and Yes it has zero latency while playing game like pubg .

name: Subrata Dey
title: "plugged into nirvana"
content: Likes : Everything in operations. Dislike : The announcement "plugged into nirvana" ..... always we are not in that mood plz

name: Shouvik Mondal
title: Satisfactory at this price.
content: Response is better on lower frequencies. Equalizing required as per mobile hardware/ sound configuration or personal choices.. Surrounding effect response could be better.. Less responsive on high mid to higher frequencies. Battery backup is pretty good.

name: mohammad kaif
title: The sound quality is really poor.
content: The sound quality of this earphone is really poor, even the wired earphones of boats are way much better than that of wireless product. The noise cancellation is good not bad and there is also no problem with Bluetooth connectivity.But what's the meaning of all features if the sound quality of the earphone is not good.

name: Durgesh
title: Good one, not the best but still nice product.
content: All things great about it, Bluetooth connection fades sometimes while running and battery back up is not as good as I thought, comfortable enough for long use but battery drains too fast.. Battery 3/5. Bass 4/5. Sound 5/5. Noise cancelation 5/5 (it's a 6 though 😁). Comfortable 4.5/5

name: Mohsin
title: Battery Issue with Boat Rockerz 255
content: The battery does not even last for 2 hours.. After charging it shows 100% n suddenly 20%. Not expected from BOAT

name: nitin
title: I want to return my my Bluetooth guarantee of one year to replace it
content: This earphones are unreliable, i bought it before 3 months meanwhile right side ear buds got cracked automatically and it got divided in two parts, and sound quality is also not that much good but ok, one more thing bass is not good as it is a boat earphones.. Biggest thing Yaar thye are not pic and thye are not exchange it

name: Athira satheesan
title: Great product
content: I bought this product for Rs.1000 from Amazon as it was on an offer. I must say it's such a wonderful product at this price. It's been more than 1 month now and I am using it for more than 3 hours everyday and no issues as of now. Great sound quality, good battery life, great product at this value.

name: ritu bansal
title: Good for budget friendly buy
content: If you are looking for budget friendly Bluetooth earphones that this is the one. Two issues that I have noticed, product has no voice cancellation, hence if you are traveling in any noisy place, earphones will not be of help. The battery backup is okok.

name: Anupam srujan sahoo
title: Disappointed, Product not for long term use purpose
content: Got this product delivered on 8 August 2019, and its 9 November 2019, one of its cord is not functioning properly. The sound is cut off.. Boat, being such a big player in this industry gives 15 days guarantee or return policy, now I know why!. Within 3 months, the product failed to deliver its purpose. Disappointed

name: Bharath
title: Delay in sound, Not happy
content: There is delay in sound, while playing games.. is that normal ?

name: Amit Sharma
title: Perfect as expected
content: Product is as expected. Fine and light material, fits to ears perfectly and.....what to say go for it guys without second thought just grab one

name: sanjay Kumar// Ranchi.
title: wow!! very nice sound quality,bass & battery backup is awesome.
content: boAt Rockerz 255 Sports Bluetooth Wireless Earphone ////wow!! very nice sound quality,bass & battery backup is awesome we listen continuesly 3 hours music yesterday, but only 20% battery down.. 1>> sound quality 5/5. 2>> bass 4/5. 3>> battery backup 4.5/5. thanks boat Rockerz & Amazon.

name: Anurag Anand
title: Good Extra bass boosted sound, Bad noise cancellation for mic.
content: Good sound. A little extra bass boosted. Biggest issue is noise cancellation on mic. There is a lot of background voice heard by the person with whom you will be talking.

name: Rajul agrawal
title: Good to buy for the price I got !!!
content: I got it for 800 bucks and according to the price it's worth buying... Connectivity is good... bluetooth range is okay...Sound is good... and good for calling as well.. Just 1 point I would like to highlight...It is not very much comfortable for long calls... Using it for 1-2 hrs in a day is good else you may feel pain in the ear...

name: Niraj Kumar Mishra
title: Good product  but durability is a Big concern
content: I purchased this on 23rd Jan19 and was fully satisfied by this product. However since 14th Feb, some weird sounds started to come during call. It's irritating and can not do anything. Replacement days are gone and dont know what to do. I should have gone for JBL paying small difference. Its on luck i guess......

name: Izikio
title: Average
content: Was interested because I bought their sound bar which was sensational. However, I'm quite disappointed with the sound quality. It lacks bass.. That being said, if my expectations weren't that high based on my previous experience, it would be a decent choice.

name: Rahul Tiwari
title: Pathetic sound quality
content: I bought it because i heard many positive reviews but tge pieces we got even in replacement, mic was very poor. Sound quality during call was very disturbing. Cant recommend it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst product
content: I bought this, and within 6 month it stopped working, no sound in any of the earphone. There are other issues like when connect 2 devices laptop and mobile then this does not work on phone properly.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Product Quality
content: Quality of product is very good. I had bought this product and sound quality of this product is very good. Its battery backup is also very good after one time full recharge it gives full day battery backup

name: Raghu
title: Good earphones with connectivity issues
content: Sometimes I am getting disturbance when my phone is in my pants pocket.. Some issue is there wrt connectivity which is critical thing.. Rest everything is good

name: Avijit
title: Amazing Product @ Amazing Price
content: i got this product during the sale and i did receive it with no damage.. product is awesome both by looks and function..would recommend every one to go for it worth of the price and quality .... 5 star for overall being happy with the product ..cheers :)

name: Nagarajan Vedaraman
title: A nice decent headset with nice bass...!
content: Other Boat headsets had poor bass and was very noisy at times. But this one stands out. It was nice listening to songs for long time. During voice calls, if u lie on right side and talk, voice gets stuck as the connectivity is getting disturbed. Dont know if its normal. Otherwise its a must buy...!

name: amit baja
title: Good sound and battery backup
content: Sound quality and battery life really good . I can't expect this but this is really awesome. Best budget wireless earphone.

name: Amit
title: Too much Bass
content: Too much bass effecting the sound quality. Mid and treble are nowhere balancesand has to use equilizer. Not recommended if you want to listen old Hindi songs else good for current remixes trend.

name: Shashank Tripathi
title: Beware of Amazon products ::: All Fake
content: This is worst .. Amazon is delivering fake products these days .. I have got a fake piece and it has started showing its color, connectivity has gone worse ,music quality can not be poorer .. This is pathetic.. I would be taking this to customer forum .. And the best part is that I can't return it back now.

name: Manoj Kamat
title: Best inexpensive headphones.
content: Product is value for money. Decent battery back up up to 10 hrs for moderate use. Slick and slim design. Sweat-proof. Overall impact is good quality headphones.

name: Ps s.
title: works  only for 8 to 14 months even the replacement product works only for 5 months .
content: I bought it before 15 months approx. it did not work on 8th month then I replaced it . now after 4 months the replacement is also not working .sound Quality is good but product wiring quality is very bad in all headphones.

name: Natesh
title: Prdct was gud, bt don't trust the boAt services....
content: Over all prdct quality was superbb, except that 1 year warranty. My prdct was damaged & i've snt it fr replacement ,8 mnths back, still nw thr is no rply frm them. Idiots r thy, looting the public money...

name: Jathavedan
title: Defective item received
content: The product was not up to my expectation.. The covering box itslef damaged and with full of dust and all.. At first I was not able to open the charging port. Then somehow I managed to open the same and the small and tiny port cover was broken.. Very bad experience from amazon and boat

name: ST
title: Not using due to poor quality of sound reproduction.
content: Not using due to poor quality of sound reproduction - not sure if it's the issue with this pair or the model in general. Cheaper wired earphones have significantly better quality of music output. Disappointing. No issues with the earlier purchased boAt products.

name: aakash
title: Boat for song
content: Using this from 3 months and now I am writing this review . First if you are lucky you got this approx 800. Connectivity excellent. Battery backup good. Sound quality is good if you are average listener .

name: Shashank
title: Very Bad Product with very bad service from Amazon
content: Sound quality is ok ok, but the battery drains out in 15 mins and takes around 2 to 3 hrs to charge, i purchased this in april since i purchased this i am not happy and the when i tried to return the product I don’t have option to do it, i can only replace it which is the worst part of this product and Amazon service. Very disappointed with the product and Amazon.

name: Abhishek kumar
title: Good
content: But Battery only works for 6-7 hrs. Only as it is already mentioned on the box as well as in description but i have been using Infinity wireless n10 they claim 7-8 hrs but they work for more than 10-12 hr easily.. As Bass and Sound Quality its good

name: Chandru
title: Think to buy, it's Damaging your inner ear and create headache
content: Decent sound quality with Deep Bass and 3D surround. but it's creating ear pain if you are using more than a hour, battery indicator also not showing correctly some fluctuations are there.

name: NILESH K GUPTA
title: Do not buy this product.
content: Please dont purchase it..its plastic n rubber quality is not good its hard.. Even the ear buds are not comfortable at all u can't wear it for more then 1 hour. Your ears starts paining. I won't suggest it all.and no replacement also. Purchase infinity its far more better then boat rockers.

name: Jimmit Shah
title: Not good for moving around
content: I wasn't expecting great sound quality from them but what I did not expect was that the sound would go off in one side after a few months. Low design quality too...

name: Gautam kagada
title: Sound quality
content: Ofcourse it's a boat product and I got this in low price in great indian republic day sale its a very good choice in neckband headsets..

name: Mohit Malhotra
title: Manget feature not working
content: The magnet feature not working from day 1.. I didnt knew about the pause feature but after reading the manual,i get to know that the song gets paused when the two magnets get connected.. But this feature is not working from day one.which is very dissapointing,other than that, everything else is fine.

name: Zee Shan
title: Great Headphones , Bass is good, Only pay 1000-1300
content: Great Headphones , Bass is good, Others are low compared to Bass, Only pay 1000-1300. the volume is a little on lower side in its full capacity but still i heard at 70 % volume and that was enough. the price one should pay for this headphone is 1000-1300 not a single penny extra

name: gagansingh
title: Stopped charging
content: The product voice is good bu it has stopped charging suddenly... The range of Bluetooth is satisfactory when line of sight is clear otherwise its gets interrupted very easily.. In 20 days the product was replaced by company and surprisingly new one was even better

name: Sumanta Sinha
title: No complaints. Go for it. Highly recommended.
content: No complain about the product.. Awesome product with great quality.. Bought the product at Rs. 999.. Music lovers try out the product and I am sure you too also feel the same feeling about the product which I am feeling right now... THANK YOU AMAZON for bringing the best product at an affordable price...

name: Kiran kumar
title: Please Don't buy
content: No sound quality.. no bass, connectivity issues, noisy sound for every one minute it stops mic after using one hour.. waste product.. you cheated me Amazon for delivering roadside cheap quality product.. my 1399 rupees wasted.. I'm very disappointed.. please don't sell these type of cheap products..

name: NEERAJ D.
title: POOR AFTER SALE SERVICES
content: Though the product is alright it does have done cons. It needs to be charged almost daily. The charging lead provided is horrible. None attends you even in warranty period........ obviously the after sale services are pathetic....

name: Komal gohri
title: Awsm must try
content: Over all good product. Battery backup is 7 to 8 hrs of usage. Fits well in ears. The only problem i face is that noise cancellation is very strong so if i m puttung on these bluetooth i m not able to listen to anyone.

name: Lavanya Gurjar
title: Disappointed/Stopped working in just 21 days
content: I am greatly disappointed with this product. The Right ear stopped Working in just 21 Days i feel like i wasted my Money I'm so freakin Disappointed thats why I gave 1 star. I think they are selling fake products to people. I want a replacement or a refund.

name: Dhruv
title: Best value for money 💸
content: Sound quality v.good. Bass very good. Noice cancellation very good. Battery life :- i use it whole day 2 doing online class 5 hours and then tution class 2- 3 hours but never discharged....great battery life ....2 - 3. days

name: Azhar
title: Boat make me feel like travelling in a Boat somewhere on the Earth ❤️
content: The Bass is Simple Loud Original and as per the song change its way to rock the atmosphere. I got it in 999/- RS which is worthy with a One year of Warranty. So fellows I got the Brand in 999/- RS. Compare to Jbl but u need to look out for cost too. But the sound is enough to make uhh dance ,mood peace,enjoy & ignore mode on

name: Shreyas Narayan
title: Great build and microphone quality
content: One of the very best that I've used. My favs: great microphone quality, design is so well thought through and it's a great build.. I lost my first pair recently unfortunately. Bought an alternative no-good substitute. Can't wait yo buy this again.

name: Dhruv Nigam
title: Unreliable and not Durable
content: The earphone has stopped working after 20 days in use. This is not a reliable product and I don't rhink I'd comsider buying a boat product anytime soon. In this price range, Indidnnot expect such poor durabil6.

name: Navneet Kumar
title: Not really impressed with quality of build. But yes by quality of sound 🔊
content: Writing after one month of usage the supporting grips given are broken into pieces with in a month not expected such quality of product by Boat. Hope to get it replaced at service centre.

name: Prinshu agarwal
title: Average
content: Sound quality is decent but wire quality, colour and looks are not that much amazing notice cancellation is also average specially can't use continue for long time

name: Samarth fire
title: Good Bluetooth set
content: Good wireless Bluetooth earphones ..value for money.hiwever the design is not good..you start getting earpain after continuous usage of more than 30 mins. Also the wires are too lenghty .. decent Battey life of 4 to 5 hours.. standby time almost 24 hours.

name: Amazon Customer
title: First day review
content: No doubt Sound quality is fantastic. Noise cancellation I would say not very good but some extent ok. Finally Bluetooth connectivity is not very poor and it doesn’t work even within another corner in room.. If you are ok with compromising Bluetooth connectivity than this might be good product in this price.

name: Sam
title: Power not turning on
content: After a month the headset wouldnt turn on. Power issue. Waiting for replacement product to aarive. Never expected the product to be faulty at such a short time. My gym workouts have got boring. Had to buy a 450inr Samsung earphones to make due for the temporary inconvenience.

title: Overall chlega
content: Best headphones but sometimes a little problm with Bluetooth connectivity but it's okay it's not big use. But in other view sometimes sound is dispper in headphone and when u move a noise in headphone

name: Subhradip Mahindar
title: Ok ok product
content: Not good. Only base is very loud, other sounds like vocal and treble not balance. But this price range it's ok product. But you past listen and use senheiser, jbl, sony so you not satisfied this product..

name: Pooja Verma
title: Portability
content: Noise cancellation is poor of this device ...also this device discharge very soon..and Bluetooth connectivity is also not good

name: Amazon Customer
title: When a #Surprise gamechanger comes this cheap #ache_dinnnn
content: Not for heavy bass heads, but yes a decent sound delivery....... Battery life could have been a lil better however its not that bad. Durability is something that i just love this device for........ Kudos to boat team, i won't comment on sound quality but again the sturdy hulk alike built quality durability at its best.. Over all a great product ..... 😉 😊 😊

name: shyam.V
title: Good headphones.
content: Best headphones this price range. but hand with care wire and charging socket are very fragile can get damage easily

name: Sushobhan Mukherjee
title: Very satisfied - Highly recommended
content: Very satisfied with boAt Rockerz 255 - Superb sound, extreme bass and good noise cancellation; Got it at Rs. 999/- Highly recommend

name: SYED MUJAHED
title: BoAt Rockerz is good product and sound is good
content: BoAt Rockerz sound quality is good and bass quality also good order is also time tow delivery quality is good same colour also nice

name: Raghavendra Buddha
title: Good quality but bad battery backup
content: Quality is good but no battery life. I wouldn't recommend this if you are in traveling. You has to charge every 4 to 6 hours once

name: Im_puneeth
title: Best in price....
content: Good and fine product within this price ....I have bought this for 999....It will be 899 some time .....Wait until and buy this for better budget Bluetooth earphone ..... Thank you ....

name: karthikgaddam
title: Sound Quality
content: Sound quality is good when you connect the calls, you voice will always break. This issue started after 4 months of usage and now one side of the earphone is not working. It tells one year warranty but in order there not place to claim warranty

name: Arun Yadav
title: Awesome Product
content: The design of the product is awesome, Packing is fabulous & sound quality is making me surprise, in this price range I didn't expect this kind of quality. Overall excellent product

name: Aaditya Sharma
title: boAt rocks .......
content: the best wireless bluetooth headset under 3k boAt rockerz but i've got it for 999 and this is a best headset under this price tag ..... sound quality is owsome .. not any type of pain in ear very crystal clear sound i love it ... if any one wants a bluetooth headset just go for it ... and don't think about any negative comnt .... i can say that boAt rockxxx...

name: Varun Gandhi
title: Product got damage in 5 months
content: Product is working, getting connected to mobile but speakers stopped working.. Last month one speaker stopped and now another one.. Need a help for repair

name: sonali
title: Disappointed
content: I have received a faulty piece. As I received the product I tried testing it on but it didn't work. So, I charged it for quite sometime and tried switching it on but still the blue light is not flashing. Facing a lot of issues with refund.

name: Nikhil D
title: Superb material
content: The product was too good. It is shiny and has nice look and is comfort in handling. have nice quality sound and base with moderae noise cancellation

name: Srishhti
title: Sound is mediocre, only quality is bluetooth
content: This is basically a normal boat earphones but with Bluetooth, and that too, the boat bassheads have better sound quality. So you're paying extra 1000₹ for Bluetooth.

name: Meghna
title: Missing
content: The product arrived like this as you can see in the pictures. The main Bluetooth wireless earphone was missing. Only the charger was there. Its seems ridiculous. Very disappointed with this.

name: Satya
title: Works only for a short span of time
content: The product was working fine when i bought it 2 months back but after 2months, one of the earphone stopped working and the microphone quality was worst from the time i bought.. Nothing is heard properly when we speak from our end in calls.. It's purely waste of money and there is no even proper support from amazon regarding warranty claim

name: Sandeep
title: Right side airphone not working
content: My right side airphone not working kindly let him know what can I do. I place of order 19 Oct 2019.. Request you to kindly resolve my issue

name: Rahul Sudhakar Utekar
title: Working good. Broken product replaced by boAt
content: Works good. Broken after 3 months but company replaced it with no question asked.

name: Kanishk Upadhyaya
title: Its good
content: I like everything. It is just it does not have the capability to disconnect from Bluetooth once both ear plugs are magnetically joined.

name: Atul lahane
title: Nice sound & surround for a budget friendly headphone.
content: Using it for a while now & I'm quite satisfied with the product. Nice feel, waterproof & Good sound & surround. Battery life is not top notch though. But What else you want in this budget ? Go for it.

name: Anand Tiwary
title: Worth buying.
content: Light weight and perfect fit. Sound quality is okay, bass is good mid tone and high tome missing. Range is very good very less distortion in call when you walk away from your phone. I can walk anywhere in my 3BHK flat putting my phone on charge. Worth buying.

name: B
title: Okay product with adjustment
content: As I read in reviews, the length of the wires are longer and the U shape is not properly sitting over the neck. Ear buds are also barely fixing in the ears.

name: Srinath
title: Don’t buy this product
content: Worst product, one of the head set doesn’t work after one month, if I check with Amazon customer care they told me to contact boat customer care ,Boat customer care never takes care of us and the service Center guys never answer our calls

name: Mrs. R.
title: Very convenient to use
content: I have bought 2 ear phones and they are working well. The only problem is that the other person can not hear my voice clearly because sounds of surroundings are much loud.. Also its battery dies early.

name: Gokul
title: POOR CALL QUALITY
content: I Used 255 Model since last 3 years. So I,ve Purchased this 255 pro.It Gives So Poor Sound call quality and The Other end person always hear very low sounds in all calls. please Dont buy this, IF you Do more calls via Blutooth.

name: Unanimous
title: Not up to mark.
content: Sound quality is ok, but sound coming out if you can increase the volume. Build quality is good. wires are slightly long.

name: Teja alaghari
title: Not a premium
content: I've been using the product once in a while when I go out to jog and every it does a good job at holding in my ears and providing an acceptable quality of sound and novel sound cancellation with no issues of sweat. But none of that feels perfect but just enough to bear with it for a couple of hours. It's a good "product for the price"

name: Amit Kumar Pathak
title: Excellent mobility, good sound and comfort!
content: The headphone was the great purchase. They give good sound, they confirm connection and low battery. They charge fast. And totally free my hands. One thing I noticed they interfere with my wifi router frequency somehow breaking up internet connection. Update after 4 months of use. One ear stopped working.

name: Shashi Gautam
title: good but not connect to Siri
content: everything is good but connecting to Google or Siri is difficult. if i find this option it will be useful

name: Anshu
title: Poor sound quality. I wouldn't buy for Rs.500
content: First thing I noticed was extremely poor sound quality - Poor clarity and more bass than necessary.. It also felt a bit heavy.. The ear buds are painful to ears (could be personal to me only).. I returned that and went for JBL205 BT - Better sound quality and lighter.

name: Saurabh singh
title: Not satisfy

name: Sourabha

name: Amazon Customer
title: Buy this get yourself ready to get annoyed and later endure pain.

name: Akashraj
title: Total experience and saying true' result of BoAt I am take it by 1500

name: Yash Verma
title: Best budget wireless earphones in its class!

name: Sabir Shaikh
title: It has agained issue

Order delivered report is no co sided by merchant and hence replacement item is not customer friendly. It is again damaged.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Decent product
content: Received a product on discount, product seems to be working fine, however, packaging was open and didn't looked like a fresh one

name: Lakshya Morani
title: Love it

name: Shubhu
title: Battery life Is not Good
content: When you buy this Bluetooth earphones, Amazon/ Boat says 6 hours battery backup but its not true only 2-3 hours battery life, cause i calculated 2-3 times, I'm live in Mumbai, i was travel in Mumbai local trains daily 1½ hours to destination but when i was coming my home i daily charge, i just use when i was Traveling only.... But as per comparisons Sound quality Boat 220 is always best...

name: Raghu Nair
title: It's an ok type material

name: Alok singh
title: Boat

name: Pratheesh
title: Good on the ears
content: Bought this for rs 1999/- , easy on the ears and quite comfortable. Gives 3 hrs bty back up in a stretch ( that is max I tried so far). The bass is good. Can use it for run and gym sessions. Go for it.

name: Sridhar
title: Excellent

name: Akshi
title: Sound quality, Noise Cancellation, Connectivity - Problems faced after only 3 months of purchase.
content: Just after 3 months of purchase, one side of headphone stopped working. Now both sides are not working. Initially I was very happy with the product but now I am very disappointed with the product. Als, after saying 1 year warrenty/gurantee, there is no option to replace the item. Seriously this is very disapppointing.

name: Soham gaikwad
title: It's good but has some technical problems.
content: Overall bass and the sound clarity is best in budget but after i I used it for a month the button automatically gets pressed and the tune gets changed and also volume goes down automatically without pressing anything.I have got replacement warranty so I will change it but they have only one store at Mumbai they should extend their branches.Hope u will get some info from this review.

name: MD
title: Waste product dont purchase it ur money will lose its not working more than 10 days properly
content: Waste product its not working more than 30days i purchased it with in a week i got a problem one side ear phone was not working i replaced it but after 20 days again i got the same problem better don't choose to buy it your money will lost .

name: Akash singh patel
title: Quality

name: Karanveer Sareen
title: After use of first day review:
content: The bluetooth connectivity range is very very less.. Easy to pair 2 devices simultaneously, Bass is not excellent but good and sound is clear👍

name: Siddhesh Ganve
title: Good one to buy only in lighning deals

name: Spandan Bhattacharjee
title: Awesome audio quality and suitably priced.
content: Sound Quality: Insane bass. Battery life: a bit mediocre but given the price and build quality, it's cool.. Durability: I've owned boAt products before, I can vouch for it's build quality.. Verdict: Packs a helluva punch when it comes down to audio quality and fits into the wallet pretty well. A must recommend from my side. Research the product tech specs on the internet for more information.

name: Manish Rajalwal
title: This  is best in low price....

title: Poor after delivery support

name: K C SHAH
title: Sound quality is good

name: Kg

name: Amazon Customer

name: Rajdeep
title: Nice product

name: Buyer

It really plays all kind of frequencies. Noises cancelled by 97%. It's genuinely toched me. Thank you BoAt. Thank you Amazon.

name: Pramod
title: Good product

name: Sri
title: Wowwww

name: Shubham Bhatia
title: This is Good For Entertainment Not for calling

name: Dr Shahrukh
title: Sound breaking

name: Sanu
title: Not able to return.

name: Sayan Chowdhury

name: Hitesh
title: Good product during sale

name: anaveerayya
title: Amazing experience go for it

name: Abhisek Sinha
title: The  best bluetooth headswt

name: Amazon Customer
title: Overall it is good

name: Amazon Customer
title: Waste of money

name: Manikandan
title: Go for it if you need worst product @ high price

name: lokesh
title: I love it

name: Souvick Das
title: Detective product

name: Sahil Mhaiske
title: Best thing for PUBG as we face no Sound delay with this Headset.

name: Preeti
title: Poor quality. Plastic hook broke

name: saisravani
title: #best sound quality #trusty brand #worth buying
content: I listen songs daily n i feel boat is the perfect choice in less price and sound quality is really gud perfect product ....

name: Amazon Customer
title: 1400 bucks for 20 days?
content: The product isnt half bad when it works. Seamlessly connects and plays audio with decent isolation. Then it stops working after 20 days. First the left one goes, then the right, then it plays music intermittently till it stops altogethers. Product is a joke.

name: Hardik Malik
title: Go for it!!!!
content: After using it for some time i recommended all of u to buy it as it is a nice product an Indian product, here the sound quality is awsome with super base...... U will face some issue regarding its battery backup but at last it is a good product.

name: hrishikesh r
title: Sastha Sundar Tikaoo!!
content: Extensively use it while riding. Amazing noise cancelling considering that i am riding with it. my headline says it all. looks neat and for my budget and purpose its more than what i could expect. Boat Rocks!!

name: Jayesh
title: Best value for money wireless earphones
content: Overall a good headphone at this price point. Using for 2 months now. The built quality is good & battery life is good as well, enough for a day i.e. 7-8 hours. Sound is decent and has good noise reduction. The only problem is when I connect my phone first and then my laptop, the phone incoming call sound doesn't work. Always have to do it the other way, which fixs the issue.

name: Lala
title: Excellent product
content: Boat team need to work on connectivity part so that mobile and device is connected with any other disturbance.. Multiple times voice cracks between the calls then have to reconnect again and again.

name: VALLIMOHAN
title: there is no acceesories for charging this product. useless item. return both times. not useful
content: this product is using for iphone, ipad etc moicrophone type. but what i received the item is no use even replacement item also same thing sent., i had to return this product, as senior citizen i could not use this product as i wanted.

name: MANISH
title: Awesome earphones in a budget
content: It is one of most selled and awesome product by boat. The base is high. Sometimes it shadows vocals. But if you are new in this price range earphones then you can't get any cons about this product. The battery life is also good. While charging in morning, u can use it whole day easily.. Must buy product if you want budget wireless earphones.

name: HARISHkandekar
title: No boat service bad product
content: Worst product one side stopped within 2months no service by boat no one responding

name: Niranjan Talap
title: Good and Bad both
content: When you are on headphone while on call , other party gets to listen all the noise around you which significantly reduces voice quality. Music quality otherwise is fantastic

name: muniadhas
title: Value for money.
content: Sound quality is very good superb for hearing songs, but mic when attending phone call little bit volume problems.

name: Bizou
title: Left ear speaker damaged within a month.
content: Worked fine for a few days and then the left ear speaker started a little crackling sound and now it has grown worse, so much that i cannot use it anymore. And this is within a month of buying. Pls tell me how to return it.

name: Venkatesh
title: நல்லது
content: நிர்வாகம் குழு இருந்து கூடுதல் விதிமுறைகள் உள்ளன ஆனால் அவற்றுள் சில கூடுதல் இணைப்புகளுக்கு பொருந்தக்கூடிய மற்றும் திருத்தங்கள் உறுதி செய்து கொள்ளுங்கள்

name: Tanu
title: Good but not best

name: Gaurang
title: sound quality good but problem in battery
content: Product is good but create battery issues problem. when battery come on 60% charge and after suddenly got low battery with 20% and shut down. in this product in warranty but no any idea to how to claim warranty otherwise product is too good

name: AVANISH DUBEY
title: good decent earphone
content: the earphone voice quality is good .. but i find the length of chord a bit long .. reaches way below your neck ... and the ear plugs are little difficult to put inside ear .. when loosely put inside ears it has a tendency to slip from years .. and hard push inside ear feels a little uncomfortable..

name: Venky
title: Best Headset and Budget Price
content: Awesome battery backup and sound is simple superb, seriously a worth purchase. I have got 2 for 999 each.

name: Mithun Kumar
title: Overall ok in this price range in 2020, but not ok over phone call as noise cancellation is zero.
content: 1. Sound quality awsm.. 2. Blutooth connectivty good.. 3. Noise cancellation is zero. Zero means zero, when on call. This amplifies the noise.

name: Swapnil A.
title: Don't Buy, Worst Product.
content: Sound quality is very good but many times due to lack of noice cancelation in call opposite person not able to hear your voice properly.. Battery life is also less, 3 hours if you continue play music or play Games. After battery reach to 60% it drains within 15 mins.

name: Asim
title: Fully satisfied
content: It's awesome for music lovers but you can't play pubg because of latency problem theirs a delay in foot sound and other sounds while playing pubg else for music and for other multimedia it's PERFECT ...

name: sharath
title: Bluetooth Connectivity issue

There is a Bluetooth connectivity issue it is not establishing between the my one plus phone and the Bluetooth.. Boat is not recommending to use with one plus, if so please let us know . We can opt for other brands.

name: Vinayak Mhatre
title: Absolute masterpiece

name: Ragavan
title: Best for max of 1 yr usage

name: Sameer khan
title: Great product

name: Saibal Goswami
title: Good product but Spekers spoils very soon

name: Ashutosh yadav

name: VAMSI KRISHNA DANDU

name: JS
title: Disappointing is an understatement
content: Data speaks for itself!!. Purchased - 20 Jan 2019. Sent for Fix - 13 Feb 2019 (Ticket Number is 193015). Set received - 9 March 2019. Sent for Fix - 28 Mar 2019 (Ticket Number is 242547). Set received - 26 April 2019. Raised ticket - 5 May 2019 (Ticket Number is 276013)

name: aziza
title: Don't buy it
content: I purchased this earphones few days back and using it since last one week...... Now its not working it have some technical issues.. I would suggest others not to buy and waste money on it. Really dissatisfied with after sale services provided

name: Lal Singh
title: A good product, long lasting. Served me well.
content: Used this product for 1 year. It worked pretty well, except that its charging port was not type C. My phone has a type C port so I needed wireless Bluetooth earphone with your C port.

name: Sav Men
title: Great product. So far so good after a month of usage
content: Rating this 4.5 design wise. The main neckband is stiff. I wish if it would be flexible.. Otherwise for the price its value for money.

name: Alok Singh Pundhir
title: There is no break this eyerphone 🔥🔥

name: Shafquat Khan
title: Worth every penny.
content: Unparalleled sound quality at this price range when compared to any other brand.. Great accessory for tour and travel.Easy to connect, control and carry. Got this at ₹999 on discounted days. Battery backup also great.

name: Chandrajeet
title: Only for bass lovers. Not for everyone.
content: Pros. -Sound is good for bass lovers. -High volumes contain distortion. -Three keys are running well. Cons. -Avarage build quality and look. -Avarage Bluetooth connectivity. -Avarage battery life. Conclusion. -Just buy if you care about only bass. Otherwise don't.

name: Amazon Customer
title: No proper warranty claim
content: I bought this for 1500rs and within 6 months left speaker stopped working, I tried to apply for warranty and they are redirecting me to some shop address and this happened while corona lockdown no shops are opened, if everything goes well I will update my review

name: Gaurav G.
title: Can't talk while this is on. No noise cancellation
content: To me this headset is worthless. Simple reason that the basic noise cancellation is absent and one can't use these to talk. The other person would complain or hear more of background noise than my own. If a product ignores such a basic feature means its not worth a penny

name: Ritesh Shah
title: Cheap quality, no warranty
content: It just 3 months and it stops working. One side speaker stopped working in less the 2 months and note if is not at all working. Trying to get replacement online from boat rockerz website but not accepting

name: Bharath
title: Honest review
content: Design 4.5/5. Bass5/5. Battery 4.5/5. Build quality 4/5. Only bad thing is charge indicator is worst it shows 100-80-60-0. Battery last for two days for heavy use 1 day. Ultimate bass like home theatre even in low volume. Connecting is bad rarely.. comfortable

name: Pramod R.
title: Great Bass.
content: Sound quality is good,. Battery life with calls n music for 2hrs a day can with stand for 2days.. Durability is very flexible,. Reviews based on 2months of usage. Product stopped working today.. Very Carefully taken care.. Had more expectations from Boat.

name: Panna Dey
title: Lovely Product
content: Very good. Bass is on the higher side. But I enjoy high bass. Very good for songs. Noise cancellation is wonderful. Call quality is also good.

name: Mohan Gangadharan
title: Value for money
content: Best sound quality, better than some Sony headphoes. but noise cancellation is very poor.. Could not be use Bike ride, because that much of poor noise cancellation. Otherwise sound quality and connectivity is Very good. battery life is ok. 6 hrs.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst product ever
content: First 2 weeks everything wa fine. Then suddenly started hearing unwanted sound while on call. The person on the other side started complaining voice drop. Applied fir warranty. Took 1 month for replacement. Got the product back today Same issue. Some annoying background noise while on call.

name: Kiran S.
title: Poor range
content: Sounds good for the price range.. Only disappointment is very poor range, cuts of within 3m.. Think before you buy.

name: Amazon Customer
title: stopped working after 10 months
content: The earphones have stopped working completely after 10 months of usage. This is the second instance that boat earphones have lost sound on both sides within a year of use.

name: Harshh K
title: received a used product
content: I received used product. Really disappointed with this. I paid for the new unsed Item. original seal of the box is already broken and that was covered by a transferent tape.

name: Raj
title: One side of earphone will definitely stop working within 4 months.

I bought it for Rs999. What else you can get with this price. but it won't justify if it is more than that.

name: Akshay Gaikar
title: Good bass,avg Noise cancellation but great price
content: Bluetooth range is not strong..just after 3-4 metres distance its get disconnected.. battery backup as promised.rest all good-avg.but best buy in this range.also boat provie excellent service.. Got it for just 599 in Great Indian festival..go ahead with it

name: Ashis kar
title: Issue with PUBG
content: It has micro lag while playing pubg. I did not face it in Anker.. but here in this it has an issue..god knows why..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bad product bad customer service
content: Sound quality is not good. very artificial bass like some Chinese headphones. Worst part is it looses its quality on high volume.. To cap it all amazon does not give you refund option on it it can only be replaced with same product. Which is of no use.

name: Gopakumar.G
title: Battery back up comparatively low, otherwise great product
content: good product , no strain in ears and fit perfectly, worth of money

name: Aji
title: Unhappy
content: Notice cancellation is very bad. The person on the other side of the call can hear your surroundings.

name: Mahesh magar
title: Good product from boat
content: Well if you fan of bass go for it. If you searching for good experience at this price point this earphone is best if you could afford little more money there are good options available

name: Raja
title: Good Product

name: Shahrukh Khan
title: Worst service
content: This is a 5 star product but unfortunately had very bad experience in service ,it's not been even 6 months my oneside earpiece stopped and I tried to complain they rejected it saying wrong bill , as I have purchased it from amazon.in I attached the bill screenshots and the company rejected. Overall best product as per performance.

name: INDRAJIT BANERJEE
title: Worth buying
content: My experience with Boat Rockerz 255 is amazing..the qualityof this product is very good..a crystal clear sound with a very good bass quality..awful noise cancellation..it is also very light in weight thus it is easy to carry..I am totally in love with this product .don't think twice just go for this product ..

name: ONGC A/C RANJEET KUMAR SINGH CPF NO. 00135661
title: Damaged packaging. Suspected product was not original.
content: Sound contain plane bass. Packaging was damaged .I suspect I didn't get the original one .whatever I got was having slightly good sound quality than earlier i had(₹599). Still i m going to buy boat earphones only because of its quality and durability.

name: Nathan Dsouza
title: Worth the try!
content: Best option for the first time users of a Bluetooth earphones. Best product for the price range. Sound quality is good for the price range. Just that the wire for the earphone is too long than required though it has magnet on the earbuds... it dangles.

name: dalli
title: Not that great
content: There is zero noise cancellation. Instead of the person who is using the earphones, nearby everyone else's voice is more loud to hear. In case you are accepting any other call during existing calls then Bluetooth connectivity doesn't stays.. Only for songs this is best as per the price range.

name: love
title: Not worth full. Not even close to the price,better to buy other genuine BlueTooth device.
content: I am writing my personal & genuine review regarding to this product, after using one month later the quality and the function of this so called sports BlueTooth is very cheap,the BlueTooth is not even connecting to my phone suddenly its get switched off automatically.

name: Sreesh K.
title: Amazing voice quality but a compromise of durability and talking on phone
content: Voice quality is great but not good for talking because of outside noise that will blast the ears of other person on the phone. Sound quality is amazing but now it's been 10 months, now earphone is not working.. Don't know what to do now

name: Amazonlover
title: Decent product but needs few improvements
content: Can't be connected to 2 phones at the same time. There is distortion in audio while you are moving. But overall a decent product.

name: Srinivasa Rajkumar
title: Not worth for the money
content: It's just ok. At times it's not recognized by laptop. And battery life is pathetic 😔

name: Amazon Customer
title: How to claim warranty.
content: I bought this on july 31st. The sound quality and connectivity was awesome. But now one side speaker is not working. How can i claim the warranty..?

name: amritendu mallick
title: Great base
content: Great base , superb loudness.. 80% comfortable for longtime use. But other treble sound is little clumsy...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Frequent stuttering in calls, negligible noise cancellation
content: Interference/stuttering while answering calls even when phone is next to me. Surrounding noise is very audible to the receiver, reducing call quality.

name: me
title: read this review before buying
content: bass quality & sound is just poor, can't even be compared to boat rockerz 600 or 400 headphones ( they are outstanding) anyways its good for taking calls and doing day to day stuff. i would suggest to go for Sony's wired headphones or try jbl one's.

name: nayan chavan
title: Good for sound quality but bad in battery life
content: Nice product in price range but it's having problems with connectivity and battery live . Sound starts breaking when moved 20-30 feets from phone and battery drops from 60% to 20% in very quick time. Sound quality is very good

name: Abhilash S.
title: Low battery standards, slow connection speed.
content: Magnetic earbuds, long battery life and moderately loud headphones is ig what you are looking for or is the most useful for almost everybody. These are excessively loud headphones, battery drains out quickly , hence connection speeds are low.

name: shubham
title: Good sound quality but durability not good
content: I bought these 4 months back, have good quality but already sent for replacement as one side stopped working, same with few of my friends who ordered same product and are having similar issue, and their service about replacement isnt really what one would call great , i had JBL ones though the sound quality is not that good their durability is great.

name: Alok
title: Go grab it.
content: Fast charging is best feature but battery backup sometimes breaks the continuity of season watching in series.. I love music and this gadget gives a great experience, even at low volume beats are good.

name: Biju nair
title: Honest feedback
content: Headphone Bass quality is fine. Good Battery life.. Incoming and outgoing call quality is not up to the mark. Other person keeps complaining about voice.. You may experience Pain in ear or head due the conical buds. When i compared with colored variant, I find cords of black headphone is tinnier.

name: Kunal Roy
title: Quality sound,good battery,easy to connect but poor microphone
content: Good build, nice sound, very easy to connecy, very good battery backup BUT one major problem is poor microphone. Other party feels problem in hearing clearly. Otherwise, as a non calling earphone, very satisfactory

name: SIDDHANT JAIN
title: WORST in class service provider... and worst usable life product ever.
content: Product is not the best of it, when it comes to the usable life of the product... I purchased 6 of these out of which 4 have stopped working in partially first and totally eventually... company (Boat) is not responding to the replacement claims under 1 yr product warranty

name: vigneshbabu
title: Best Bluetooth headset in the market with reasonable price
content: I am using this head set for the past 1 year on daily basis and it's still working like a rockstar. Best headset with reasonable price.

name: Sofiqul hoque
title: Good sounds quality
content: I must say battery backup is 6 hours with 70% volume...but I think that is not enough but consider to this price range and sound quality. I really like that.

name: AnnA
title: No quality.
content: No quality of sound. Ordinary earphones are working better than this product. No stereophonic effect.. No noise cancellation.

name: Ratan
title: This is budget headphone which looks good but doesn’t have a long life
content: Liked this product initially but soon after ,one side of headphones stopped working. Two of my friends faced the same issue.

name: Anand
title: PUBG, seller, battery
content: Superb quality of sound and music some disadvantage is u can't play pubg with this sometimes there is noise when nearby to a mobile tower , battery percentage indication goes from 100,80,60,20 u won't know when ur battery is getting over,. About the seller the package was not up to Mark and box was already opened.

name: vaibhav mehta
title: Great product at this price
content: I bought the product during Amazon sale the product is good. It's durable the sound quality is also good , if you are serious sound/music lover then you can check other options but personally this is all I wanted for my workout.

name: Gaurav
title: Major Problem
content: Lemme come directly to negative issues here :. Bluetooth connectivity - sometimes it just won't connect with my phone, or takes too much time.. Intermittent audio loss: while playing the earphones mutes itself automatically, It happens quite often and it's very annoying. Same issue after replacement. So I had to return it.

name: Ravi Kumar
title: Just value for money spent on it.
content: This product very good at this cost (more than good and less than execellant). If your budget is around 1500, then for sure this is the one you should go for. Who likes excellant sound qulaity and loves perfection then you need to spend more than 5k on a wireless headset otherwise you can get a wired earphone in just around 1000 ( JBL is an option).

name: Neeraj Agrawal
title: Horrible experience
content: Terrific experience. Stopped working within 11 months. Waiting for replacement unit since last 2 months.. Please don't waste your money in thid product.. Poor customer support. They don't bother to reply to your msgs, calls, emails etc

name: Mad
title: Good bluetooth headphones to buy
content: It's been a year since I bought the product, the quality is high. Very convenient especially for outdoor activity. Good life. Change stands for 7 hrs

name: aakash
title: Not upto the mark

name: Nikhil
title: Damaging within warranty
content: I have experienceed boat earphones twice. Both the time it is damaged during warranty. I got new one for replacement. But that also damaged within 6 month of usage

name: MUKESH
title: Catches all the noice in the world except users voice.

I can't use in noisy environment it catches all the sounds in my surroundings rather than my voice.. I would like to request boat to see in these problems. Let's not spoil your brand value for your regular customers.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good Product

name: Abiral Gupta
title: Reviewed after 1year of usage

name: ASHOK KUMAR
title: Excellent product in this range...
content: Nice quality and sound is so crispy and clear bass is very good. I like it very much... battery life is excellent. I use it whole day without charging...my phone is connected withit whole day playback time is nearly 8 hours.

name: Ankush Singh
title: Overall good pruduct..
