name: DIVYESH JOSHI
title: No One Can Beat This If Mic Works Properly...
content: Excellent Product but giving 4 star as sometimes MIC don't work.... I had replaced the item but still problem persists.. else for music ... Excellent one...

name: prabakar
title: Boat rockerz 255  unexpected product
content: sound quality: Excellent compare than wired headset. Bass: Awesome. I got this product offer 1000 ...really amazing. Don't confuse with any one model ... this product 100% assurance good bass and sound quality. good material.. but hear lock buds not fit for all.. but that's not problem.. if you no need , you can remove possible

name: Sagar
title: Superb Sound 👌.. Felling Joyful
content: I am fan of ⛵ Rockerz ..... I am Already Buy Gift To Friend Boat Rockerz 225F.. & Then Another One Boat rockerz Pro... " One Life ". " Jo Bhi Lena Do Lena ". Boat Rockerz Nice Swag Wali Style.. To Much Fun 😉

name: Varenyam Herbalife
title: Bad battery and irritating addional features.
content: Battery is not upto the mark 2 hours max. Draining out very fast. Not accepted from boat.. Additional voice acknowlegement like connecting. Maximum volume. Low battery. Is really irritating and worst.

name: Akash Nakshane
title: Sound and pairing issue while driving
content: I ordered two but the yellow one having some sound issue while driving...i am little bit busy,will see its perfomance few days more otherwise return it back.

name: Vishal khatri
title: Awful noise cancellation and terrible sound quality
content: Boat Rockerz 255 Bluetooth Earphones Reviews- Awful noise cancellation and terrible sound quality.. The receiver hears more background noise than my own voice... Its really a pity a company which acclaims Sound like Nirvana provides such design and quality to the customers.... -- Totally NOT Recommended --

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good for calling. Not that great for music.
content: First thing is the device has some issue with fitment. But battery backup is good for long calls as well. But in terms of music, it can't carry good sound quality from phone to ear

name: Kunal Mishra
title: Best neckline earphone under this price range.
content: Sound, bass quailty is good and easy to carry, these are light weight.. Battery goes for 4.5 to 5.5 hrs.. This charges full in 1 hour. In offers you can get it in only 1000Rs.. Custer service of boat is very good.

name: Nitesh
title: The customer care is not responding
content: The product was stoped working on 24th day and the customer care numbers given on the invoice doesn't work, sent email two times but there is no response still. Hence I will not recommend anyone to buy this product.

name: vipul n Agarwal
title: mic is not good. useful for listening
content: its okay for listening but when it comes to speak it's mic doesn't capture sound properly i have to literally keep it near my mouth than only other person is able to hear what I am speaking.. i m dissapointed with it.

name: Mr chief
title: Best for the price.
content: Best bluetooth earphone available for the price . Battery is also good .If you listen music continuously 2 3 hr then it might drain quickly other wise it will last more than 4 hrs. Don't keep your expectation very high in this price range .

name: Abhijeet Bayas
title: Cheap quality headphones and hopeless post sales service.
content: This is like a new movie with the same old story. Product has stopped working after 3 months of purchase and since then I am chasing the seller and Amazon for warranty claims. Well I didn't had any luck till date but I am hoping in coming year I will atleast be able to get through their customer service executives.

name: ROHAN CHANDRAKANT MESTRY
title: Superb product
content: Awesome earphones in this price segment. 1)First of all I will talk about the base. The base is really awesome that can give u the beats of each songs. 2)second I liked the noise cancellation it's really awesome even while sitting in train u cants feel the noise passing the train besides you. overall I love the product

name: yugal pradhan
title: Want to replace against its warranty.
content: Bluetooth connectivity is good, but during call person at other side hear background sound more than me.. And now in this short duration one of its speaker has stopped working.

name: Helan
title: Worst😓😑😬😭😩
content: Stopped working after 2 months, but I got replacement unit that too stopped working. Worst. Feeling cheated. Buy sony or boult audio.

name: Balaji M S
title: Good
content: #Good but the loop gets expanded after usage.. #The loop should be made little tough. #Sound quality is too good and more than expected. #The rubber is the main part and holds tight in the ear but quality is not good. #A spare loop or hook should have provided like in ear 3 different buds are given

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very poor battery
content: Very poor battery. Once full charge hardly giving 60 minutes of talk time. Purpose of the head phone is failed and hard to keep it in charge continuously. Waste of money and better to go with a good wired one.

name: Mohit g.
title: Never Buy BOAT
content: This is the worst 1500 I have ever spent. They arrived in good shape. But afer few months they stopped working. There was no sound coming.. The after sales service was pathetic. They denied my warranty and I had to leave it. Never ever buy the brand Boat.

name: Omkar Salve
title: Amazing product with only one flaw
content: It’s amazing and the best part it that it is waterproof . The flaw abt these would be the annoying beep it has every time it gets connected and when you lower the voice or you edit a video wearing these . Otherwise amazing product would recommend 100%.

name: P.Parekh
title: Good product
content: The bass output could have been better. Sound quality is adequate, nothing great. In ear fit is very comfortable and secure. Good value for money

name: Biswarup
title: Good Sound Bad Fit!
content: While I like the sound it emanates, I don’t like the fitting. It sits on your ears and makes you feel uncomfortable after a while, at least did so to me. I liked the earphones by Apple the most, not the wireless ones, but the classic one, sound perfect, fits comfortably.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Go for if you are looking for Bass Sound under 1299/-.
content: The Bass sound is good, gives 6hrs of backup after full charge, the material could have been improved, seeing the material got disappointed but the sound makes us feel better. Call quality over bluetooth breaks sometime. Overall it's ok under 1299/-.

name: Mritunjay Kumar
title: Nothing is batter
content: Its a flat feeling ..not suitable for actually music lovers who knows every detail of music ...i cant find beat ..also wire is very long which does not have anything to hand

name: Rajesh Deshpande
title: Great in-ear ear phones.
content: Crisp and clear sound.. Excellent noise cancellation.. Value for money product.

name: swapnapadigela
title: Not getting Charged
content: Unable to use it since long time n could not locate d product... Now we got it... Kindly do d needful

name: Manish Mishra
title: Cheap product
content: Stopped working just in a month. No service center around. Registered complaint but No one come to pick up the product. Replacement SLA is too high 15 days. DONT BUY BOAT HEADSET ... GO FOR SOME REPUTED BRAND WITH GOOD AFTER SALES SERVICE

name: AK
title: Ear buds not comfortable.
content: Ear buds not comfortable,since I have used other brands which were more comfortable.Carrying it if you aren't using is bit difficult.wire is not flexible enough to roll.

name: KVJ
title: Incorrect Advertised Feature
content: One Star is for incorrect advertising for sports! It works but its of no use for running! The hard ends bounce on your collar bone and extremely uncomfortable. You may use it for training or walking but definitely a no-no for any intensity sport. its replaceable and not returnable so be very sure before you buy it.

name: Himanshu Lal
title: Poor battery backup after 3 months
content: After using 3 months I found its battery lasts only for 30 minutes. It is poorest ever headphone. Can you please suggest me where should I claim its warranty from? As its battery lasts only for 30 minutes now after using 3 months.

name: Shubham Joshi
title: Boat Products are Good
content: This is my 1st Time experience With boat rockerz And It was Great. (1)Noise Cancellation Is better 90%. (2)Sound Quality is Awesome. (3)For Working out it's good for Walk In ear Complete Fit. (4)Bass Is slightly Better then the JBL. In this price It was Good Products By Boat Surely Go it

name: G NAVEEN KUMAR
title: Awesome
content: Awesome Product at Rs 800, Sound Quality is good, Noise Cancelation is ok, I almost tried all brand Bluetooth nech bands but only satisfied with boat, finally I gave overall 4 Star ... Need to improve battery backup and Bluetooth connectivity ...

name: Siddharth R.
title: Great quality sound and finish. Except the ear plug length off the neck brace is too long
content: Damn good value for money and sound quality is excellent. Noice cancellation quality is great. Only thing is the ear plug wire length is bit too long for my liking. Wish they could have shortened the length of the ear plug wire of the neck brace.

name: Nishchal Mijar
title: Decent headphones
content: After using it for more than a couple of months I would say it’s decent. Don’t expect an exceptional sound quality with this one. However something I didn’t expect was a good noise cancellation for an in ear headphone.

name: Rahul Saxena
title: Sound is good but not comfortable pain in ear
content: Dear boat designer you have worked on sound quality nicely but missed to make it comfortable to wear....can not wear these earphone more 30min as it pains.

name: susmit
title: Gets disconnected suddenly
content: I like BOAT products, but this one's a disappointment... It disconnects suddenly in the middle of use even though Bluetooth is still connected to it. I don't know whether the product is faulty or it's the default issue by company.

name: Techy
title: The best choice
content: I am using about 1 month. Iam satisfied with the product.. The best bluetooth earphone.. Best noise cancellation.. Best sound quality.. Best bass.. Better connectivity.. Easy to use.. It has better battery life.

name: aazam khan
title: Bass heavy
content: Ok stuff.... Did not meet expectations tuning is a bit off... Too much bass... Where no bass needed there also bass comes... Funny

name: AKSHAY
title: Best Bluetooth headphones in less price
content: Sound quality, Bluetooth connectivity, calling is best. Battery stays for 4-5 hours of continue usage. Charging time is 2 hours exact. When charging its red light and when fully charged turns blue.. I bought it in 899rs, value for money product.

name: VKS
title: Good quality with average sound quality!
content: Product quality good. Packing good. But sound clarity average. Pairing and on/off all in one button, so little different to use, specifically for a non tec savvy person.. Battery life good. Charging time, average.

name: Amit W. Thakur
title: Awesome product❤️❤️❤️Thank you Amazon
content: Today, I have received this Boat Rockerz 255 pro. It's awesome product. Rs. 1299 it's value for money. Sound and material quality is too good. I loved this product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good Deal.
content: Here you go,. Sound wise it's super ... In starting use it has a great sound quality and awesome bass however as time spends ( almost around 20 days ) magnet of buds gets weaker and even sound quality & bass also gets decreased. However it's still good deal, I bought in 1000.

name: Saswata Mukherjee
title: Not the best product
content: Disappointed. One earpiece stopped working before one year. There absolutely no noise cancellation and the background noise often overpowers the voice.

name: Liji A.
title: GAMING
content: Good and valuable product excellent for games like PUBG,FREE FIRE,CALL OF DUTY

name: Srinu
title: Got a defective piece
content: I purchased at 871.61 under prime day sale, but it's right ear bud is defective one, it's opened one,. Have ordered replacement.. Let's see the next replacement. But sound quality is far better and loud bass and good back up

name: Deepak
title: Quality is not good
content: Everything is good but they are too much bulkey it doesn't feel nice if feel like some stupid chinese products becouse of its size

name: JK
title: Average
content: Good noice cancellation and sound quality.. Ear piece not comfortable...Paining ... Can't keep for more than an hour

name: jakheer hussain
title: Good tier Bluetooth earphones but can be better
content: I used it for 2 months even though there is an upgraded version I went with this because of cost , The sound clarity is average, when you go two rooms away from device you won't get the proper signal. It is no match to wired ones, that I can say.

name: krishna kumar
title: Supports SBC codec only.
content: Doesn't suport aptx, so the sound lags a few milli seconds. Not suitable if you are going to use it for games like PUBG.. Rest all good. Value for money.. Bluetooth range is approx 10ft. and that's sufficient.. Bass good, Treble good, Qualtiy good.. Decent for calling purpose. Haven't faced any mic issue.

name: Sonam Kesharwani
title: After using for 10 months, one side of ear phone now working
content: After using for 10 months, one side of ear phone now working.. Worst part is that even having warranty of 1 year hence product is under warranty buy I am not able to reach Boat company from any of the contact number email ids shared by them.. This service is extremely poor.

name: Abin Joseph
title: Low product quality
content: Sound quality and connectivity are okay. But the quality of the product is below average. I got my product broken down within 3 months. So I recommend don't spend 1000+ rupees on a unsure product

name: Atender Sharma
title: 225 Pro is Much Better than 225
content: I used both 225 and 225 pro if you really love Music with long term listing than go for 225 pro without headache if you like only bass not Cristal Clear Sound with Music than go for 225. Overall 225 Pro really Good product in this Budget 👌

name: DipZie
title: Bluetooth connectivity started getting disturbed in two months!
content: First i received defective piece but got replaced by Amazon within two days. Great delivery experience. But soind started getting disrupt frequently aftr using it for almost 2 months regularly. Wasn't expecting for headphones to have issues this soon.

name: Rutuja gajanan Hinge
title: Buying at owners risk
content: Replacing this product is also very hard task boat costumer care never answer your call it has be 10 days that i have raise my complaint to them the taked my earphone but know the are not share the time when it will be delivered to me and again i brought this product 4 months ago and within 4 months this product is not working at all.

name: Harsha Vardhan
title: Don't buy
content: Worst quality don't buy it. It's sound decreasing gradually. Amazon provide only replacement. What can I do with this failure product.... I bought this item for Rs.1499. Waste of your money

name: Hardik
title: Jabardastt!!
content: What an item it is!! Must say, the sound quality, the design, specially the bass effect is just perfect. While the songs are played, you just loose yourself in the mood and the sound quality makes you feel that it is real. Completely happy purchasing the product. Please purchase if would like to.

name: Prabhu Reddy
title: Uncomfortable fit into the ear
content: Quality ok for the price.. Ear plugs/buds Dont fit in year properly (fall off repeatedly) and uncomfortable to the ear.... Bluetooth range is just avg (theoretical distance is 10 meters, but practically doesnt work in next room.. Ok product

name: Milind
title: Average headphones for rs 999
content: I got this product for Rs 999 . The sound quality is not that good enough . I purchased it since it had 22k+ reviews. Not value for money.. I would request all to search for an alternative if you can find on Amazon.

name: Danish R Shaikh
title: Excellent product.
content: Sound quailty,naise cancellation and maister wicking,and google assetane feture are excellent.very good product,money worth product.I m so happy.but box little bit damage,but it is ok.

name: Sujit
title: Worst product... Faulty device...
content: Till now I have complained about it 3 times to Boat company and get this product replaced ( thry are returning someone's headphones to you) but still it is giving issues. I am going to puty complaint again... Pathetic device and service by boat... It was not expected by boat...!!!

name: Sumeet
title: Avoid
content: Just stopped working and charging.. All worked fine for few months and now it just stopped charging. Not sure of the service now.

name: Mahendra Pandit
title: Bad Quality , not worth for money,
content: Very bad experience. It worked well for only 20 days. Now it's not connecting for calls. I want replace it. Plz don't spend your valuable money in this product. I think it would be better for me if I would have bought 400/- rupees wired headphones

name: Sagar Girdhar
title: Worst Product and customer service I have ever encountered
content: left side of stopped working just after 3-4 months raised a complained with boat it took 1 month to get it replaced then again left side stopped working on the replacement unit just after 1 month again raised a complaint with boat haven't got any response even after a week

name: Suganthi
title: Worst product
content: I have purchased this head phone on 15th September 2020, it was good for five months and after that the communication in headphone fails I couldn't able to connect to the phone.. pathetic ... Pls don't buy this product

name: Chaitanya
title: Honest review
content: Earlier i hav used jbl so now i am feeling it's not that much good and the major disadvantage is, for gaming its not good , experienced delay while playing pubG. For 1000 rs it's may be worth but not that much good 😢

name: MESSNOT
title: Excellent product

name: Yogesh
title: Need an exchange.. product received don't seems to be genuine.
content: I received the product well in time but the quality of pack received was horrible, it looked like it was used. The black plastic which holds the device was also torn at edge. I m in two minds whether it's genuine or not. I want an exchange..

name: Dhiraj
title: Not fit for calling purpose
content: Boat wireless is good but having only one issue, while calling or receiving calls, the sound breaks and cannot able to listen properly. This happens every time.

name: SUDHAKAR
title: Good sound and quality
content: I liked the product quantity and sound, initially getting pain in ear while using it for long time

name: Shouvik Bhattacharya
title: Good one but not for gamers
content: Good quality earphones.. Sound quality is very awesome. But i have noticed one issue.. Sometimes sound stops abruptly and starts again. Dont know why.. And while playing games like pubg sound lag occurs ,sound plays lately

name: BHAVESH MARU
title: Audio is good as per price
content: boAt Rockerz 255 Sports Wireless Headset with Super Extra Bass is not up to the expectation on mine as the one Left side ear is not playing sound after few days so it is not worth to purchase same. life of product is very short.

name: Ravi chaurasia
title: Good sound long battery life...
content: Good to opt for if you want a low range bluetooth earphones with long lasting battery life. ... And battery lasts for almost a day of normal usage and 5-6 hours of heavy usage.

name: Amazon Customer
title: ok ok product. battery is only one issue other wise overall a good one
content: easy to use. good in looks. battery is not that great. battery goes down too fast. its shows either 100% or 80% battery always and then suddenly it drops down... switches off.

name: sagar
title: Full charge in 10min...strong build by boat
content: In a discription its a fast charging full charged in 1 hours but its tooo fast .i have 18 w charger it takes onley 10 to 15 min to full charge its awesome ear phone for running ,i daily run 3 km with these ear phones .its makes your workout easy.

name: Saubhik L.
title: Over priced
content: While listening to songs it's good ...but for call conversation it is very cheap product.. it should be priced around Rs.300 to 400..but I bought it @ rs.900 ...but actual price shows Rs.1400 ... don't know how it priced

name: Pranjal Verma
title: Amazing product
content: This Bluetooth wireless net band is is very good quality of sound and easily fit in ear

name: palash
title: Sound quality, over-all.
content: What I felt is I had boat 225 wired earphone so if I compare the wired to this wireless 255 then its 19-20 difference, boat 225 wired gives 1 point better experience than the 255 wireless one, battery life is good of the product, magnets do there job as expected. I bought this for 1500 so overall good product, will recommend this.

name: Mangla S.
title: Good deal for this price.
content: They are fine pair on bluetooth headphones. The sound quality is good. I didn't like the noise cancellation that much. The bluetooth conductivity is good.. Sound quality - 👍👍👍. Noise cancellation - 👍👍. Bluetooth connectivity - 👍👍👍. And considering the price its a pretty good deal.

name: Pushpita baruah
title: average
content: overall good.. sound quality is smooth and nice, bass is good, i like the noise cancelletion performance.. looks little weird in front, little pain in ear, design should be enhance more..

name: Shri
title: Excellent bass quality and value for  money
content: This is amazing quality product with an excellent basss. Fits exact on ears. Best quality and value for money. Good battery life

name: Ramakrishna reddy
title: Good for mid range
content: Overal product is good ,and sound clarity okay but not very clear its mixing bass so clarity will be reducing...and not for gaming purpose

name: Deepak Verma
title: Not working after two months
content: I bought it at Rs. 999/- but after two months it stops working.. No any service center in my city.. Don't buy it if are in that city where no any boat service center.

name: Sunil Kumar Kopparapu
title: Not more than 3 months
content: It was quite alright whennit worked but after 3 months there is no sound on one side of the head phone. My son purchased a new one.

name: Varun Tuwar
title: Grate for Rough users 👍
content: Good Battery backup,. Impressive Range of Bluetooth,. Constant sound quality,. Mic is Really grate. But,,. Color which I have is not as good as seems in images,. Bass is really poor,. Overall,, products for Rough use👍

name: Divyashree Tambade
title: Magic ear phones
content: I am able to listen to Gratitude club videos due to these earphones. Thank you for making them. Thank you 😊💕💝💞 thank you 💓 thank you 💖💖💖

name: Abhi
title: Another great product from Boat.
content: It's very good product, gives me a backup of whole 8-10 hours with medium usage. Songs for about 5-6 hours on low volume, along with calls for about 1-2 hours.. I recommend this, as it is worth the price.

name: Abhishek yadav
title: One of the best neckband.
content: Boat is a great brand. I have earlier purchased headphones of boat it's awesome, data cable- that's fabulous. And now this, battery life is good- charge it once it's enough for a day. Good for listening music, for talking, very convenient and premium design.

name: Ajay Ellandula
title: Wireless problem no canect
content: Colour: Yellow name: Rockerz 255. After 45 days, the charging port isn't working and now I can't even return it. Wat to do ?? I know there is one year warranty but it is only been 45 days. C'mon boat, please send me new one.

name: Gauri S.
title: Sounds good but bad quality of product
content: It was a nice product. I took this on 29th Sep, 2019 and today on 10th Aug, 2020 it broke. It's charging portal came out. I thought I'll be able to use it at least for 2 years. But alas! Quality is bad.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Average product
content: Bass is good but the clarity is on the low side. There are issues while attending calls. Noise cancellation is poor. There is some kind of unwanted sound while switching one task to another in the phone. Pain in ear. Doesn't fix properly. Battery is good.

name: Nidhi
title: Good
content: It's good but not A quality. These stars because while talking on calls and using phone, the background audio that I'm multitasking while talking on call is very low quality. And i mostly do that multitasking so I'm not satisfied.. Else it's really a good product.

name: Joe Christopher
title: Do not go for it unless you have a plan to buy another new earphones sooner
content: Failure model as the built quality is very poor. Unlike Samsung level and Boalt, for example, it's made up of rubberized material and neck band and volume button parts are not assembled/pasted properly.

name: Shree Ch
title: West your money, don't buy it (very Bad service)
content: Please don't WEST your money!. After purchased this product it will work for 8 months then it will start troubling when u ask for warranty request. They will ask you Original bill and that bill get lightly invisible. Due to they rejected my service request

name: Parna
title: Worst Earphones...!!
content: OMG!! Such a bad headset..... Dont buy these products. It looks very cheap too, not only sound quality

name: Bipin
title: Disappointed
content: I purchased it in the month of December, from first week I found it got disconnected several times.. The audio is not sufficient.. But the device get recharged very quickly.. From Yesterday, it is stopped getting on.

name: Deepak Makne
title: Don't buy...sound Quality is not good
content: This is basic head phons and sound Quality is not good bass is even pathetic...I want to return this product and buy diffrent one but on Amazon while selecting return it only prompts that they will ship me the same head phones...what great option...

name: Adarsh
title: Worst Mic ever
content: The mic has so much distortion, I realised it after many days I tried to make a call over it, the person on the other side complained so much. It really is a nuiscance. Didn't expect this from Boat.

name: Sushma a.
title: Worst customer support
content: They have mentioned wrong number for customer support, its unreachable, I'm not able to claim the warranty, its only 2 months since I bought it, left side speaker stopped working.

name: Rahul Kr.
title: Jhakkasssss
content: Boat rockerz 275's sound quality is superb with superb bass and supports voice assistant also. I suggest everyone to buy this wireless in-ear headphone. I got it at just ₹999. After using 6 months regularly, one side of the earphone was not working, but after complaining on the site, I got a new boat rockerz255 in replacement within a month.

name: Keyur Vyas
title: Excellent Product
content: Excellent time delivery with package.. Excellent product.. Excellent Sound quality. Excellent Bass effect. Bluetooth range is about to 10mtr.. Overall excellent

name: shilpa juneja
title: Overall good
content: Overall good but connectivity range is not good!! Have to close phone with you not even 5-6 step away voice break issue starts

name: Manami
title: its good
content: i'm happy with the product good sound quality and battery life but mike is not that good... i am using it on my gym and its comfortable..

name: Sho
title: Great Value for money.
content: Good product. Great sound n battery life. Nice fit in ears.. The Bluetooth range is less.. About 5m only.

name: chandan
title: Just get it
content: The best sound quality, noise cancellation, easily connects to bluetooth and the welcome not when switched on 'welcome to nirvana' that justifies the noise cancellation feature..

name: Sunny Deshmukh
title: This product is very good and also value for money you can buy it directly
content: This product is very good and also value for money and also best quality of sound you can buy directly

name: Arpan Rai
title: Sound is good
content: Good enough but according to price it's quality is little low, overall good, and treble is too high...

name: mallesh
title: I love this product
content: Basically Boat are giving a good quality products at the very good price range. This is one of the very good earphone for you available at this price (only genuine products). Only defect is connectivity range should've been more powerful.

name: Mamta kankan
title: I want a replacement
content: It is not in working condition. I had gifted this too my sister. When she for d first time opened it n tried to connect, it is getting connected but there is no sound coming. It is defective. I want a replacement but the option has disappeared

name: Ranjith
title: Product is good but life is short
content: Product life is too short . Mine got damaged within 6 months . I could not claim replacement as I was abroad

name: Reddy's
title: Got used one insted of new
content: I received boat sports model insted of pro.. Battery not charging afte first use. Requested for return

name: Dr. Anshita Singh Rathore
title: Decent
content: Pretty decent. Noise cancellation is not working I think..or need setting in phone. I'm unsure. But if it's not too noise outside it works fine

name: Wajeeh
title: Great value for money
content: Pros. 1. looks stylish. 2.Great sound quality. 3. Good Battery. 4.Ergonomic design.. Cons. 1.irritating announcement every time you connect/disconnect or Power on/off the device a small beep would have been fine for me.. 2.not exactly a con but latency is a little high so if you are thinking to play games while wearing this be prepared for the lag.

name: khushi modh
title: Bad product
content: Such an worst product... On product it has written that the product has 1 year warranty but by 4 month it stopped working & has disconnecting issues.... I won't rate it. & Website is not reachable and service centres nearby are also not available in our state !!

name: venkata balaji
title: Dont buy this product
content: More than advantages it has only disadvantages. 1) Sound is very low with full volume also. 2) bluetooth connection range is very low. 3) Mobile is getting slow when playing pubg game only when connected to Bluetooth. 4) wire is very long. Irritable. 5) battery not so great. 6) Not worth for money dont buy.

name: Vikas
title: Grwt product at great price

name: Sathish K
title: Good

name: Rajesh
title: Worse and looks like it is damage one they have given!

name: Purushottam gaddamwar
title: Overall features and a good earphones

name: moly
title: Great sound clarity.

name: Rohit Bishnoi
title: Waste of money not good at all please don’t buy it

name: Shrish Singh Negi

name: Alka
title: Bluetooth connectivity issues
content: It has bluetooth connectivity issue, keeps disconnecting itself repeatedly and there is too much of interference sometimes. Not sure if I should keep this product. Even though I got it exchanged it once, I m still facing similar issues.

name: TRex
title: Best quality

name: Amazon Customer
title: Disappointed with product

name: Swag
title: Good product!
content: Product quality is really good and it has good bass.. I got this at 999 as offer was there and boat is a brand! So go for it. 👍

name: kunal gupta
title: HONEST REVIEW.
content: Worst bluetooth headphones ever. The mic doesn't work and the earphone discharges very quickly. Amazon denied return and refund even within 1 day of delivery. Sound quality is bad and the cable is of poor build quality. Not expected from a product of this price.Please don't buy and invest on JBL product for better experience.

name: Pritish
title: Perfect Bluetooth headset
content: Every thing of this product it just great - The sound clarity, Bass level, battery life, design, light weight and comfort to use.. Only thing which I found on downside is its Bluetooth range and mic when on call. But with price of Rs 999, its much acceptable.

name: Sreejith Poyilil
title: Good Product, make sure good service
content: Product I really like it. One and half month back one side is not working. It's under warranty, so they are ready to replace. But until now my replacement product not got. Many times talk to customercare they telling product is out of stock sending tomorrow, day after.....now they not picking the phone also, I don't no when I get my replacement.

name: Hetal Tank
title: Worst experience ever
content: I bought it last week and used it for a couple of days but the voice quality got deteriorated in a day and after I requested for the replacement, a box of used earphones with the broken seal was couriered to me.

name: karthik
title: It's better to go with some other brand

content: I had this boat rockerz 255 and after 6 months of use it was not working and when I applied for warranty they took my product but didn't return back.. Guys please don't buy boat earphones its service warranty service is poor. Earphones shows problem after some months.

name: Kunal Ghosh

I am an edm guy so what i want is good bass and loud music , boat rockerz fulfills it no doubt !! Noise cancellation is good ! Supports voice assistant ! Just go for it ! I am satisfied with the quality of sound, the beats everything! !

name: Unnikrishnan.G
title: Boat rockers, headset review
content: Nice headset. Good sound ,noice cancellation, handy, good battery. One thing is with the mic. Some times the surrounding noice is boosted more while making calls and audio recording. Rest all nice.

name: Dinesh kumar
title: Good product.. battery issue
content: Good product by boat . But battery capacity should be more improve only 6 hours after full charge .

name: Pritam Maji
title: Nice product
content: Boat products have always lived up the user's expectations and talking about this one, it's just great. Compared to rockers 261, its light-weight and the sound quality is very good. The battery life is also decent.

name: SB
title: It has issues.
content: Sound and everything is all good but why is it getting disconnected for every few minutes? I've already replaced it once but still same problem. It's very annoying while playing games or watching a movie with this.

name: Boat user
title: Complete review "the best choice at this price"
content: Bass is not the best what you expect but is ok for light to moderate users. Noise cancellation is the best and easily adjustable and can be worn for 3 to 4 hours without any pain in ears. The battery suppot is also very good i don't use them for long durations at 1 time but it doesn't drain out even on loud sound quickly like other earphones

name: SARANYA
title: Good
content: This product is awesome Bluetooth connection is good if you're visible up-to 30feets if you you're not visible to the phone will not connect even 10 feets. .Sound quality is good.

name: Sagilkumar
title: Recomended
content: Good sound quality, but bad build quality, once serviced within 4 month, and after 2 month it again bocome faulty, boat service team note attended the complaint

name: Rakesh
title: Great quality product .
content: Sound quality is excellent .. Bass is good in this wireless earphones .. battery backup is great.. Bluetooth connectivity range is also fine.. Looks are awesome .. The magnet part is also great.. Charging takes a quite extra time .. Overall, the product is awesome.

name: SHIVSAGAR DEVANAND TAVADE
title: Very nice
content: Excellent Product

name: Nipun Chitkara
title: Feedback
content: 1.Earbuds are too soft & Slippery, it's falling down like anything.. 2. Volume buttons are not working properly.. 3. Can you guys (Boat) produce simple wireless bluetooth earphone without any extra head of earbud

name: suhail
title: Nc product...
content: Noise = 3/5. Bluetooth = 4/5. Sound = 5/5. best if u buy this in 850 or 900...I bought it bit costly... battery is not that good bt it's ok may be 5 hous is max not a minute more then that if it fully charged...

name: rose
title: Need oppo as replacement
content: Bluetooth gets switched off in between calls automatically...worst one

name: Anand K
title: No longer charging in 6 months use.
content: After 6 months of use, now its no longer charging and lights not glowing at all. Tried many different USB cables and plug points.. Looks like very poor quality.. Can Amazon help replace this ?

name: dawnjay s.
title: Dont doubt to buy.. this product is worth to buy
content: there is nothing for dislike the best sound quality and best battery long last up to 9hrs if you play at normal volume for me in this amount this product is better than JBL..

name: vary wrost cream.
title: Bed product.
content: Please suggest all no purchase this product .. I am buying and mourning these people are not even returning.. Poor quality,Bluetooth connectivity low ,bed product.

name: Joby Daniel
title: Bluetooth connection not working properly
content: Noise cancellation is ok, but not that much I expected.. Bluetooth connectivity was very perfect up to 4 month and started to bluetooth connectivity having disconnection even me near the phone.. Sound & Bass quality is very perfect and right side volume decreases automatically some time.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Incorrect specification
content: The product is good. But it cannot be used to connect 2devices at once as mentioned in its specification and the QnA section.. So i am a lil disaapointed with this

name: Suhas D.
title: It stopped working in 1 month
content: Though the sound and battery life is worth buying this product, in one months time the left earplug stopped working without any reason. There was no rough handling neither any connection to water, while listening to the music I realized that there is no sound from left speaker and I dont know what to do or where to go for servicing/checking. So guys, if you wish to buy, rethink and then spend.

name: Aditya Walke
title: Sound quality is good, Mic quality is very bad!!!
content: The sound quality is very good for the headphone, but when it comes to the quality of voice while on call, its definitely a failure for this BOAT Rockerz 255. The other person on the call is not at all able to hear my voice. Very much disappointed !!!

name: Hridoi Rajkhowa
title: (INFLUENCER) HONEST REVIEW: ownership
content: Honest Review. Has been using this product since 4 months , I am really very sattisfied with its sound quality. Mostly the battery backup is next level. With one single charge of 1&half hour i use for for aprox 2days without any problem and if unused then it backups upto 1week

name: neelam kumar menda
title: Bloody Boat
content: Worst product. Waste of money . Not even work for 2 months properly. Boat is worst. Not known where we repair before warranty expires.. go for local brands they are better than this bloody boat products.

name: Naval agarwal
title: Go for it
content: It's superb. Worth for money. If you see any defect like not working with WhatsApp call, try with any other phone. Because i had this issue. And quality is best.. I'm sorry i requested for replacement. I apologise for this inconvenience.

name: vikash
title: Good earphones
content: The earphones are good don't feel any pain even after wearing for 6 hours. I have at times problem connecting to my phone.I have to manually goto Bluetooth settings and select the boatrockers . This happens only some times not always.overall it's a good,

name: Prafull Kumar Swarnkar
title: Poor build
content: Build Quality: 2/5. Bass: 3.5/5. Battery:3/5. Dont purchase it in 2020

name: Thamam M.
title: Great Sound. Bad Connectivity
content: This is literally my life. but bit disappointed because when i use internet through my jiofi, cant talk through calls. there is a wifi bluetooth interference.hope someone can help me. apart from that excellent!!!

name: Ramandeep singh
title: Waste of money
content: This is totally uncomfortable product as per expectations. Waste of money. Zero out of 5. Too larrge size not comfortable while using. Ear buds are also not adjust in both ears. Dont waste money fot it...

name: Safi
title: Don't buy this
content: Battery backup is third class.. pls don't buy this hyped product. I received the product in a squeezy box for which I'm OK but the power back up in this earphones is worst. I heard only 2 songs and one phone call of 5mins. That's all. Battery was down from 80%to 20%

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst ever device
content: Worst ever product.. Within 3 months one side isn't working..I just use it for 2 hours a day max.. Update: After 2 days now even the other side isn't functioning... Probably the best product one should go for..😠

name: nishtha dixit
title: Lovely earphones at a great price
content: The sound quality is superb... love the deep bass it offers... the noise cancellation is also quite good... the fit also snug

name: lokesh
title: Review about boat rockers
content: Sound quality is Excellent, We cannot hear any sound while listening song's or talking with someone in high-volume with good quality performance That's great, When we connect Bluetooth with phone at first time it will take some sort of Time from next time it will connect faster.

name: Akshita
title: Doesnt start
content: Very bad experience..i had heard good things about boat earphones..about soubd quality and durability..but my new earphones wont even start..i have not used it even for a day..it turns on only when its on charge..otherwise it wont even start after charging for a whole day..i want my money

name: Arangaperumal Govindasamy
title: Worth for money
content: This product meets our expectation. Sound, noise cancelling are good. But the ear bud is that much quality. i am able to use while playing using ear fit bud. I am unable to use ( nowadays) because the ear bud not fit now.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not charging after 1yr
content: I have been using this for a year and now this is not charging its battery. I don't know what happened but I hv to buy another.. Sound quality is good but not long lasting.

name: karthik
title: Overly hyped product
content: My Honest review after a week. Sound quality is ok but not upto mark and not clear. Battery backup is poor it shows 60 percentage display but becomes zero in few minutes. Not comfortable for large ears the ear bud keeps falling off. Better go for other options

name: Naveen R
title: Battery backup is disappointing
content: Sound quality is good. If you looking for call purpose than may not be a good option plus battery is not long lasting. I used for office calls last not more than. 4 hrs for continuous use.

name: Jigar V Saraf
title: There is no return policy, only replace polic
content: There is no return policy, only replace policy. Have gifted to someone but unable to get fit / adjusted.

name: avinash dubey
title: Review.
content: Its not that great product, sound quality is just avarage not tobe compared with JBL or Sony. The worst thing about this product is the wire quality they have used its not great and its look wired after wearing it . Suggest you to add some more money and buy Sony.

name: Srikanth
title: Wires got disconnected, too flimsy.
content: The wires are too flimsy, both earphones are not working, found that the wites have gone bust, these were used for about 8months only.. Wouldn't recommend. Waste of time and ofcourse money, will never buy Boat products again.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worse product
content: Very bad product.. I bought 2 earphones of the same brand and both of them are not working fine now.. one of the earpiece doesn't deliver any sound at all after 3 months use..

name: anurag
title: Great for Calls and Podcasts
content: I primarily wanted this for podcasts and calls.. After a month long use , i can say that the call quality is good and the mic picks up voice nicely.. Even connects with two sources simultaneously

name: sindhu
title: One of the best bluetooth headset
content: Amazing bluetooth headset till date with battery back up of 6 to 7 hours easily. It's worth the money. And the wires seems sturdy and stylish.

name: Panku Pinky
title: Bad
content: Very disappointed worst experience and worst behaviour of corrior person and also customer experience service ..

name: Undertaker Tiwari
title: B.O. A. T. Best Of All Time
content: The boat sound quality is the best you can get in earphones ranging 1500+ the boat headphones size. I observed a non compromised sound quality. They can work upon model and earwick, honestly those need 1% improvement. A must buy for free moments of self.

name: Subhayan Das
title: Utterly disappointed at this price range
content: -Sound quality is below average. -Battery backup is very low. -Mic is just terrible. Better go with other options

name: Brijesh Rajpurohit
title: Not comfortable for long time use in ear
content: It has good sound and bass but its not comfortable in ear because of its buds, after some time of use its painful for ear it could be more comfortable

name: B K R Naidu
title: No good. This is the second item but no improvement
content: Not a standard one .in all the ways it has poor quality.. Hence returned

name: Abir Ghosh
title: Just go for it
content: Using it for 4 monthes great battery backup. Audio quality is really awsm. Bass quality is better than boat 225 wired earphone. Cristal clear audio while calling mic quality is also very good. Great noise cancellation comfort in ear. But one problem is carring this while travelling cause there is no carring pouch.

name: TVSR
title: Good for average use
content: Sound quality (both media and voice calls) is okay. At this price you cannot expect hifi quality. For average user it is good.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Useless Product
content: Extremely regretting by buying this headphone.Sound quality not good and MIc is not working.Listeners are alway complaining

name: KD
title: Got it for 999. Can't complain.
content: Everything except the noise cancellation (during calls especially) is more than what i expected. Worth 999.. Update: bought this in Feb 2019. now is November 2019 and the right side has stopped working. It sucks.

name: Sudip Kumar
title: Impressive
content: Bass quality is too good. You can't listen for too long as it causes headache. However I must admit it's sound quality is very impressive. Bass needs to be lowered a bit.. Best made in India sound product.

name: Avinash
title: Good product
content: One star less bcz it keeps saying max volume when ever i receive a text or an app update

name: Kushaal K Kanavi
title: Do not go for it.
content: Either I'm one of the few unlucky ones or they have a many fake good reviews. I had a torrid experience with these earphones. Have sent it back to bOAT 3 times in the last 4 months. Buttons randomly stop working. Mic doesn't work. Battery gets fried randomly. You never know when it'll just stop working. Not reliable at all.

name: Lokesh sharma
title: Very bad experience
content: BOAT should improve quality. when I received this item after buying 3 days cable was not working and after 4 months charger pin not working. when i visited boat service center in Ahmedabad they said your device is damage

name: Viranch Damani
title: not good
content: I found the music quality of these headphones to be pretty substandard. They weren't able to block outside noise and the build was very filmsy.

name: Aakash p.
title: Good buy
content: This is a good wireless earphone in mid range hence there is no rival or alternate option, this on is must buy if you are looking for wireless earphone

name: Dhinesh Kumar
title: worst service and replacment
content: I have applied for replacement based on warranty. they collected the ear phones with in one day. then they will not respond after 15 to 20 days.. they never pick the call.. when ever you calling it will be like busy.. waste don't buy it

name: Naved Rizvi
title: 8month usage review - bad quality
content: Things were going good, until recently one of the speakers not working properly.. Good product overall but It is not suited for rought use.

name: Satyam gupta
title: Sound quality
content: Sound quality is awesome.... Noise cancellation is too gud.... Bass quality is too awesome..... I want to buy again nd again.... Nd I also recommend to buy everyone..... Too gud earphone in diz price....

name: Lakki
title: Duplicate product
content: Received a duplicate product. It is not at all connected to the Mobile. Tried in different ways but there's no luck. Took the product to store and confirmed that it's a fake product. Very much disappointed with the product.

name: Sanjay V.
title: good for this price , but genuinely interested in music don't go for this
content: At this price the quality is good but if u have used sennheiser then u will find the sound n bass are not that good . People looking for good quality of sound and with good budget should go for sennheiser else this is good.

name: Swappy gaikar
title: Good product but battery back up is low you can buy boat rockerz 255 pro +
content: Reviewing after couple of months. Quality is good but. Sound quality is ok. Battery backup is low. No fast charging. Only 3-4 hr. continues play back not satisfied

name: AMIT MISHRA
title: Dislike
content: I have buy this product but with in 6month my product is not working sound is not comming and both i have registered my complaint but still no one come from boar support team dont buy this type of product because you cant be happy by buying this type of product

name: MohammedAthaur
title: Worth to your money
content: I'm using this product for more than a month, it's does its job.. Whatever mentioned on catalog works as expected.. Ready assured and go with this product...

name: Meena manish verma
title: Bad quality
content: Would please exchange it as it automatically shut down and also in between pause vedio. Please exchange it

name: Megha chevli
title: Superb sound quality same as JBL... I am big big happy....
content: I have used only JBL headphones so first I have scared but after that I have collected and listen it's superb....feel like Same as a JBL sound quality.... I am big big happy with this boat headphone.... Guys you can bye without any dout... And this color is toooo tooo good...

name: Shop lover
title: Boat is the best!
content: Wireless,lightweight and flat cable!!. My requirement is fulfilled as I was looking for a wireless for my type C supported phone.. It worked.. Thank you Boat & Amazon!

name: Lalit Mohite
title: Enjoy music with Good sound and feel the music with Good Bass.
content: Value for money. Good bass. Good sound quality. Provided with 1 year Warrenty.. I will suggest company to provide extra ear locking rubber. Water resistant. Good battery backup.. Rest is best.. Go for it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good to make and receive calls. That's it....
content: It is very useful to receive phone calls in case your profession demands the same. However don't expect anything from sound quality. Noramal original headphones are better in sound quality.

name: Vinit Pordhiya
title: Worst after sales services
content: Quality is fine but after sales services are so poor for replacing the earphones , both earpiece are not working after 6 month of purchase and I have no rough use , I took proper care of it but still it is not reliable product and still they are not replacing the product , worst experience

name: Raghavendra K.
title: Current battery status is misleading
content: Current battery status of the device is misleading. From 80% to 0 will be drained out in few mins. Battery status shown in the app (BOAT Bluetooth app from playstore) is also misleading.. Sometimes it is not so convenient to open charging "cap". Overall good product

name: Ajay Rathod
title: Nice but need help
content: Everything was good but suddenly after two months device doesn't get start by pushing the power button searching for service center.

name: Madhavi
title: Received empty box
content: Amazing product so ordered for my husband as well. Received an empty box. Very disappointing. The rating is not for the product, it's for the product not received.

name: Sujith Mathew
title: boat really rockz
content: super bass or base, which is what i am looking for, good volume, not tested calls, this review just after first testing.

name: Rishikesh
title: Good for money
content: I had a skullcandy head set earlier so this is a step down but i wanted a cheaper option. The sound is ok. Only issue is the wires are too long for me and it is not very comfortable to wear on cycle or bike.

name: Simmy
title: Back sound
content: Back sound is coming during callings.... And 7 days after purchasing it...a distracting sound is coming all the time... But I loved it's sound n bass quality .

name: Praveen
title: Bluetooth earphones stopped working
content: Sound quality is good. But my product has stopped working within six months and now when I try to charge its battery it is getting heated within 5 seconds.. Product has 1 year guarantee.. Can you help me in that. My Bluetooth earphones are now of no use for me

name: Santosh K.
title: Best Bluetooth headset in this price segment.
content: Superb built quality, durable, long battery backup, crystal clear voice, fast connect, we can say it a value for money product.

name: Hem
title: product worth the money
content: Very very good product indeed .. this has been working for me from past 8 months without any issues ... it handles excessive sweats during workouts seamlessly... My honest review is .. “Best wiresless earphones” happily go for it.
